br1Syt br1 1lhym 1t hSmym w1t h1rZ in the beginning towards-these-elohim created the namespaces and the earth. bereshit bara ’elohim, hashamayim ve’et ha’arez.
wh1rZ hyth thw wbhw wHSk 8l pny thwm wrwH 1lhym mrHpt 8l pny hmym and the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face-turns of the deep. and breath-spirit of towards-these-elohim moved upon the face-turns of the from-waters. veha’arez hayetah tohu vabohu vekhoshekh ‘al penei tehom, veruakh ’elohim merakhefet ‘al penei hamayim.
wy1mr 1lhym yhy 1wr wyhy 1wr and towards-these-elohim said, let there be light: and there was light. vayomer ’elohim yehi ’or, vayhi ’or.
wyr1 1lhym 1t h1wr ky Twb wybdl 1lhym byn h1wr wbyn hHSk and towards-these-elohim saw the light, that it was good: and towards-these-elohim divided the light from the darkness. vayar ’elohim ha’or ki tob, vayabdel ’elohim ben ha’or uben hakhoshekh.
wyqr1 1lhym l1wr ywm wlHSk qr1 lylh wyhy 8rb wyhy bqr ywm 1Hd and towards-these-elohim called the light day, and the darkness he called night. and the evening and the morning were the first day. vayiqra ’elohim la’or yom velakhoshekh qara layelah, vayhi ‘ereb vayhi boqer yom ’ekhad.
wy1mr 1lhym yhy rqy8 btwk hmym wyhy mbdyl byn mym lmym and towards-these-elohim said, let there be a firmament in the midst of the from-waters, and let it divide the from-waters from the from-waters. vayomer ’elohim yehi raqia‘ betokh hamayim, vihi mabdil ben mayim lamayim.
wy8S 1lhym 1t hrqy8 wybdl byn hmym 1Sr mtHt lrqy8 wbyn hmym 1Sr m8l lrqy8 wyhy kn and towards-these-elohim made the firmament, and divided the from-waters which were under the firmament from the from-waters which were above the firmament: and it was so. vaya‘as ’elohim haraqia‘ vayabdel ben hamayim ’asher mitakhat laraqia‘ uben hamayim ’asher me‘al laraqia‘, vayhi khen.
wyqr1 1lhym lrqy8 Smym wyhy 8rb wyhy bqr ywm Sny and towards-these-elohim called the firmament namespaces. and the evening and the morning were the second day. vayiqra ’elohim laraqia‘ shamayim, vayhi ‘ereb vayhi boqer yom sheni.
wy1mr 1lhym yqww hmym mtHt hSmym 1l mqwm 1Hd wtr1h hybSh wyhy kn and towards-these-elohim said, let the from-waters under the namespaces be added together unto one place, and let the dry land appear: and it was so. vayomer ’elohim yiqavu hamayim mitakhat hashamayim ’el maqom ’ekhad vetera’eh hayabashah, vayhi khen.
wyqr1 1lhym lybSh 1rZ wlmqwh hmym qr1 ymym wyr1 1lhym ky Twb and towards-these-elohim called the dry land earth; and the gathering together of the from-waters called he seas: and towards-these-elohim saw that it was good. vayiqra ’elohim layabashah ’erez ulemiqveh hamayim qara yamim, vayar ’elohim ki tob.
wy1mr 1lhym tdS1 h1rZ dS1 8Sb mzry8 zr8 8Z pry 8Sh pry lmynw 1Sr zr8w bw 8l h1rZ wyhy kn and towards-these-elohim said, let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding seed, and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed is in itself, upon the earth: and it was so. vayomer ’elohim tadshei ha’arez deshe ‘eseb mazria‘ zera‘ ‘ez peri ‘oseh peri lemino ’asher zar‘o bo ‘al ha’arez, vayhi khen.
wtwZ1 h1rZ dS1 8Sb mzry8 zr8 lmynhw w8Z 8Sh pry 1Sr zr8w bw lmynhw wyr1 1lhym ky Twb and the earth brought forth grass, and herb yielding seed after his kind, and the tree yielding fruit, whose seed was in itself, after his kind: and towards-these-elohim saw that it was good. vatozei ha’arez deshe ‘eseb mazria‘ zera‘ leminehu ve‘ez ‘oseh peri ’asher zar‘o bo leminehu, vayar ’elohim ki tob.
wyhy 8rb wyhy bqr ywm SlySy and the evening and the morning were the third day. vayhi ‘ereb vayhi boqer yom shelishi.
wy1mr 1lhym yhy m1rt brqy8 hSmym lhbdyl byn hywm wbyn hlylh whyw l1tt wlmw8dym wlymym wSnym and towards-these-elohim said, let there be lights in the firmament of the namespaces to divide the day from the night; and let them be for signs, and for seasons, and for days, and years: vayomer ’elohim yehi me’orot birqia‘ hashamayim lehabdil ben hayom uben halayelah, vehayu le’otot ulemo‘adim uleyamim veshanim.
whyw lm1wrt brqy8 hSmym lh1yr 8l h1rZ wyhy kn and let them be for lights in the firmament of the namespaces to give light upon the earth: and it was so. vehayu lim’orot birqia‘ hashamayim leha’ir ‘al ha’arez, vayhi khen.
wy8S 1lhym 1t Sny hm1rt hgdlym 1t hm1wr hgdl lmmSlt hywm w1t hm1wr hqTn lmmSlt hlylh w1t hkwkbym and towards-these-elohim made two great lights; the greater light to rule the day, and the lesser light to rule the night: he made the stars also. vaya‘as ’elohim shenei hame’orot hagedolim, hama’or hagadol lememshelet hayom ve’et hama’or haqaton lememshelet halaylah ve’et hakokhabim.
wytn 1tm 1lhym brqy8 hSmym lh1yr 8l h1rZ and towards-these-elohim set them in the firmament of the namespaces to give light upon the earth, vayiten ’otam ’elohim birqia‘ hashamayim, leha’ir ‘al ha’arez.
wlmSl bywm wblylh wlhbdyl byn h1wr wbyn hHSk wyr1 1lhym ky Twb and to rule over the day and over the night, and to divide the light from the darkness: and towards-these-elohim saw that it was good. velimshol bayom ubalaylah ulahabdil ben ha’or uben hakhoshekh, vayar ’elohim ki tob.
wyhy 8rb wyhy bqr ywm rby8y and the evening and the morning were the fourth day. vayhi ‘ereb vayhi boqer yom rebi‘i.
wy1mr 1lhym ySrZw hmym SrZ npS Hyh w8wp y8wpp 8l h1rZ 8l pny rqy8 hSmym and towards-these-elohim said, let the from-waters bring forth abundantly the moving creature that hath life, and fowl that may fly above the earth in the open firmament of namespaces. vayomer ’elohim yishrezu hamayim sherez nefesh khayah, ve‘of ye‘ofef ‘al ha’arez ‘al penei reqia‘ hashamayim.
wybr1 1lhym 1t htnynm hgdlym w1t kl npS hHyh hrmSt 1Sr SrZw hmym lmynhm w1t kl 8wp knp lmynhw wyr1 1lhym ky Twb and towards-these-elohim created great whales, and every living creature that moveth, which the from-waters brought forth abundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and towards-these-elohim saw that it was good. vayibra ’elohim hataninim hagedolim, ve’et kal nefesh hakhayah haromeset ’asher sharezu hamayim leminehem ve’et kal ‘of kanaf leminehu vayar ’elohim ki tob.
wybrk 1tm 1lhym l1mr prw wrbw wml1w 1t hmym bymym wh8wp yrb b1rZ and towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-blessed them, saying, be fruitful, and multiply, and fill the from-waters in the seas, and let fowl multiply in the earth. vaybarekh ’otam ’elohim lemor, peru urebu umil’u hamayim bayamim veha‘of yireb ba’arez.
wyhy 8rb wyhy bqr ywm HmySy and the evening and the morning were the fifth day. vayhi ‘ereb vayhi boqer yom khamishi.
wy1mr 1lhym twZ1 h1rZ npS Hyh lmynh bhmh wrmS wHytw 1rZ lmynh wyhy kn and towards-these-elohim said, let the earth bring forth the living creature after his kind, in-them-animal, and creeping thing, and beast of the earth after his kind: and it was so. vayomer ’elohim tozei ha’arez nefesh khayah leminah behemah varemes vekhayto ’erez leminah, vayhi khen.
wy8S 1lhym 1t Hyt h1rZ lmynh w1t hbhmh lmynh w1t kl rmS h1dmh lmynhw wyr1 1lhym ky Twb and towards-these-elohim made the beast of the earth after his kind, and in-them-animal after their kind, and every thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind: and towards-these-elohim saw that it was good. vaya‘as ’elohim khayat ha’arez leminah ve’et habehemah leminah ve’et kal remes ha’adamah leminehu, vayar ’elohim ki tob.
wy1mr 1lhym n8Sh 1dm bZlmnw kdmwtnw wyrdw bdgt hym wb8wp hSmym wbbhmh wbkl h1rZ wbkl hrmS hrmS 8l h1rZ and towards-these-elohim said, let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the in-them-animal, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth. vayomer ’elohim na‘aseh ’adam bezalmenu kidmutenu, veyirdu bidgat hayam ube‘of hashamayim ubabehemah ubekhal ha’arez ubekhal haremes haromes ‘al ha’arez.
wybr1 1lhym 1t h1dm bZlmw bZlm 1lhym br1 1tw zkr wnqbh br1 1tm so towards-these-elohim created man in his own image, in the image of towards-these-elohim created he him; rememberer and pierced created he them. vayibra ’elohim ha’adam bezalmo bezelem ’elohim bara ’oto, zakhar uneqebah bara ’otam.
wybrk 1tm 1lhym wy1mr lhm 1lhym prw wrbw wml1w 1t h1rZ wkbSh wrdw bdgt hym wb8wp hSmym wbkl Hyh hrmSt 8l h1rZ and towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-blessed them, and towards-these-elohim said unto them, be fruitful, and multiply, and fill the earth, and shepherd-preserve it: and go down on over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over every living thing that moveth upon the earth. vaybarekh ’otam ’elohim vayomer lahem ’elohim peru urebu umil’u ha’arez vekhibshuha, uredu bidgat hayam ube‘of hashamayim ubekhal khayah haromeset ‘al ha’arez.
wy1mr 1lhym hnh ntty lkm 1t kl 8Sb zr8 zr8 1Sr 8l pny kl h1rZ w1t kl h8Z 1Sr bw pry 8Z zr8 zr8 lkm yhyh l1klh and towards-these-elohim said, behold, i have given you every herb bearing seed, which is upon the face-turns of all the earth, and every tree, in the which is the fruit of a tree yielding seed; to you it be for meat. vayomer ’elohim hineh natati lakhem kal ‘eseb zorea‘ zera‘ ’asher ‘al penei khal ha’arez ve’et kal ha‘ez ’asher bo feri ‘ez zorea‘ zara‘, lakhem yihyeh le’akhlah
wlkl Hyt h1rZ wlkl 8wp hSmym wlkl rwmS 8l h1rZ 1Sr bw npS Hyh 1t kl yrq 8Sb l1klh wyhy kn and to every beast of the earth, and to every fowl of the air, and to every thing that creepeth upon the earth, wherein there is life, i have given every green herb for meat: and it was so. ulekhal khayat ha’arez ulekhal ‘of hashamayim ulekhol romes ‘al ha’arez ’asher bo nefesh khayah kal yereq ‘eseb le’akhlah vayhi khen.
wyr1 1lhym 1t kl 1Sr 8Sh whnh Twb m1d wyhy 8rb wyhy bqr ywm hSSy and towards-these-elohim saw every thing that he had made, and, behold, it was very good. and the evening and the morning were the sixth day. vayar ’elohim kal ’asher ‘asah vehineh tob me’od, vayhi ‘ereb vayhi boqer yom hashishi.
wyklw hSmym wh1rZ wkl Zb1m thus the namespacess and the earth were finished, and all the troop-cluster of them. vaykhulu hashamayim veha’arez vekhal zeba’am.
wykl 1lhym bywm hSby8y ml1ktw 1Sr 8Sh wySbt bywm hSby8y mkl ml1ktw 1Sr 8Sh and on the seventh day towards-these-elohim ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made. vaykhal ’elohim bayom hashebi‘i melakhto ’asher ‘asah, vayishbot bayom hashebi‘i mikal melakhto ’asher ‘asah.
wybrk 1lhym 1t ywm hSby8y wyqdS 1tw ky bw Sbt mkl ml1ktw 1Sr br1 1lhym l8Swt and towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-blessed the seventh day, and dedicated-finished it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which towards-these-elohim created and made. vaybarekh ’elohim yom hashebi‘i vayqadesh ’oto, ki bo shabat mikal melakhto ’asher bara ’elohim la‘asot.
1lh twldwt hSmym wh1rZ bhbr1m bywm 8Swt yhwh 1lhym 1rZ wSmym these are the generations of the namespacess and of the earth when they were created, in the day that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim made the earth and the namespacess, ’eleh toldot hashamayim veha’arez behibare’am, beyom ‘asot yhvh ’elohim ’erez veshamayim.
wkl SyH hSdh Trm yhyh b1rZ wkl 8Sb hSdh Trm yZmH ky l1 hmTyr yhwh 1lhym 8l h1rZ w1dm 1yn l8bd 1t h1dmh and every plant of the field before-turns it was in the earth, and every herb of the field before-turns it grew: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim had not caused it to rain upon the earth, and there was not a man to till the ground. vekhol siakh hasadeh terem yihyeh ba’arez vekhal ‘eseb hasadeh terem yizmakh, ki lo himtir yhvh ’elohim ‘al ha’arez ve’adam ’ayin la‘abod ha’adamah.
w1d y8lh mn h1rZ whSqh 1t kl pny h1dmh and there went up a mist from the earth, and watered the whole face-turns of the ground. ve’ed ya‘aleh min ha’arez, vehishqah kal pene ha’adamah.
wyyZr yhwh 1lhym 1t h1dm 8pr mn h1dmh wypH b1pyw nSmt Hyym wyhy h1dm lnpS Hyh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living being. vayizer yhvh ’elohim ha’adam ‘afar min ha’adamah vayipakh be’apav nishmat khayim, vayhi ha’adam lenefesh khayah.
wyT8 yhwh 1lhym gn b8dn mqdm wySm Sm 1t h1dm 1Sr yZr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim planted a garden eastward in eon-eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed. vayita‘ yhvh ’elohim gan be‘eden miqedem, vayasem sham ha’adam ’asher yazar.
wyZmH yhwh 1lhym mn h1dmh kl 8Z nHmd lmr1h wTwb lm1kl w8Z hHyym btwk hgn w8Z hd8t Twb wr8 and out of the ground made yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight, and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden, and the tree of knowledge of good and bad. vayazmakh yhvh ’elohim min ha’adamah kal ‘ez nekhmad lemar’eh vetob lema’akhal, ve‘ez hakhayim betokh hagan ve‘ez hada‘at tob vara‘.
wnhr yZ1 m8dn lhSqwt 1t hgn wmSm yprd whyh l1rb8h r1Sym and a river went out of eon-eden to from-waters the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads. venahar yozei me‘eden lehashqot hagan, umisham yipared vehayah le’arba‘ah rashim.
Sm h1Hd pySwn hw1 hsbb 1t kl 1rZ hHwylh 1Sr Sm hzhb the name of the first is mouth-old-pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of sick-havilah, where there is gold; shem ha’ekhad pishon, hu hasobeb kal ’erez hakhavilah ’asher sham hazahab.
wzhb h1rZ hhw1 Twb Sm hbdlH w1bn hShm and the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and the that-they-onyx father-child-stone. uzahab ha’arez hahiv tob, sham habedolakh ve’eben hashoham.
wSm hnhr hSny gyHwn hw1 hswbb 1t kl 1rZ kwS and the name of the second river is emerged-gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of spindle-spindle-cush. veshem hanahar hasheni gikhon, hu hasobeb kal ’erez kush.
wSm hnhr hSlySy Hdql hw1 hhlk qdmt 1Swr whnhr hrby8y hw1 prt and the name of the third river is trunk-palm-hiddekel: that is it which goeth toward the east of beech-tree-assyri. and the fourth river is cow-euphrates. veshem hanahar hashelishi khideqel hu haholekh qidmat ’ashur, vehanahar harebi‘i hu ferat.
wyqH yhwh 1lhym 1t h1dm wynHhw bgn 8dn l8bdh wlSmrh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim took the man, and put him into the garden of eon-eden to dress it and to keep it. vayiqakh yhvh ’elohim ha’adam, vayanikhehu began ‘eden le‘abedah uleshamerah.
wyZw yhwh 1lhym 8l h1dm l1mr mkl 8Z hgn 1kl t1kl and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim order-prescribed the man, saying, of every tree of the garden thou mayest freely eat: vayzav yhvh ’elohim ha’adam lemor, mikol ‘ez hagan ’akhol tokhel.
wm8Z hd8t Twb wr8 l1 t1kl mmnw ky bywm 1klk mmnw mwt tmwt and of the tree of the knowledge of god and bad, no eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou surely die. ume‘ez hada‘at tob vara‘ lo tokhal mimenu, ki beyom ’akhalekha mimenu mot tamut.
wy1mr yhwh 1lhym l1 Twb hywt h1dm lbdw 18Sh lw 8zr kngdw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim said, it is not good that the man should be alone; i will make him a helping counter-touch for him. vayomer yhvh ’elohim lo tob heyot ha’adam lebado, ’e‘eseh lo ‘ezer kenegdo.
wyZr yhwh 1lhym mn h1dmh kl Hyt hSdh w1t kl 8wp hSmym wyb1 1l h1dm lr1wt mh yqr1 lw wkl 1Sr yqr1 lw h1dm npS Hyh hw1 Smw and out of the ground yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim formed every beast of the field, and every fowl of the air; and brought them unto earth-blood-man-adam to see what he would call them: and whatsoever earth-blood-man-adam called every living creature, that was the name thereof. vayizer yhvh ’elohim min ha’adamah kal khayat hasadeh ve’et kal ‘of hashamayim vayabei ’el ha’adam lir’ot mah yiqra lo, vekhol ’asher yiqra lo ha’adam nefesh khayah hu shemo.
wyqr1 h1dm Smwt lkl hbhmh wl8wp hSmym wlkl Hyt hSdh wl1dm l1 mZ1 8zr kngdw and earth-blood-man-adam gave names to all in-them-animal, and to the fowl of the air, and to every beast of the field; and for earth-blood-man-adam there was not found a helping counter-touch for him. vayiqra ha’adam shemot lekhal habehemah ule‘of hashamayim ulekhol khayat hasadeh, ule’adam lo maza ‘ezer kenegdo.
wypl yhwh 1lhym trdmh 8l h1dm wyySn wyqH 1Ht mZl8tyw wysgr bSr tHtnh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim caused a deep sleep to fall upon earth-blood-man-adam, and he slept: and he took one of his side-zolea-ribs, and closed up the flesh instead thereof; vayapel yhvh ’elohim tardemah ‘al ha’adam vayishan, vayiqakh ’akhat mizal‘otav vayisgor basar takhtenah.
wybn yhwh 1lhym 1t hZl8 1Sr lqH mn h1dm l1Sh wyb1h 1l h1dm and the rib, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim had taken from man, made he a woman, and brought her unto the man. vayiben yhvh ’elohim hazela‘ ’asher laqakh min ha’adam le’ishah, vaybi’eha ’el ha’adam.
wy1mr h1dm z1t hp8m 8Zm m8Zmy wbSr mbSry lz1t yqr1 1Sh ky m1yS lqHh z1t and earth-blood-man-adam said, this is now bone of my bones, and flesh of my flesh: she be called woman, because she was taken out of man. vayomer ha’adam zot hapa‘am ‘ezem me‘azamay ubasar mibesari, lezot yiqarei ’ishah ki me’ish luqokhah zot.
8l kn y8zb 1yS 1t 1byw w1t 1mw wdbq b1Stw whyw lbSr 1Hd therefore a man leave his father and his mother, and cleave unto his woman: and they be one flesh. ‘al ya‘azab ’ish ’abiv ve’et ’imo, vedabaq be’ishto vehayu lebasar ’ekhad.
wyhyw Snyhm 8rwmym h1dm w1Stw wl1 ytbSSw and they were both naked, the man and his woman, and were not ashamed. vayihyu shenehem ‘arumim ha’adam ve’ishto, velo yitboshashu.
whnHS hyh 8rwm mkl Hyt hSdh 1Sr 8Sh yhwh 1lhym wy1mr 1l h1Sh 1p ky 1mr 1lhym l1 t1klw mkl 8Z hgn now the serpent was more subtil than any beast of the field which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim had made. and he said unto the woman, yea, hath towards-these-elohim said, ye not eat of every tree of the garden? vehanakhash hayah ‘arum mikol khayat hasadeh ’asher ‘asah yhvh ’elohim, vayomer ’el ha’ishah ki ’amar ’elohim lo tokhelu mikol ‘ez hagan.
wt1mr h1Sh 1l hnHS mpry 8Z hgn n1kl and the woman said unto the serpent, we may eat of the fruit of the trees of the garden: vatomer ha’ishah ’el hanakhash, miperi ‘ez hagan nokhel.
wmpry h8Z 1Sr btwk hgn 1mr 1lhym l1 t1klw mmnw wl1 tg8w bw pn tmtwn and of the fruit of the tree which is in the midst of the garden, towards-these-elohim hath said, ye not eat of it, neither ye touch it, lest ye die. umiperi ha‘ez ’asher betokh hagan ’amar ’elohim lo tokhelu mimenu velo tige‘u bo, pen temutun.
wy1mr hnHS 1l h1Sh l1 mwt tmtwn and the serpent said unto the woman, ye not surely die: vayomer hanakhash ’el ha’ishah, lo mot temutun.
ky yd8 1lhym ky bywm 1klkm mmnw wnpqHw 8ynykm whyytm k1lhym yd8y Twb wr8 for towards-these-elohim doth hand-know that in the day ye eat thereof, then your eyes be opened, and ye be as towards-these-elohim, knowing good and bad. ki yodea‘ ’elohim ki beyom ’akhalekhem mimenu venifqekhu ‘enekhem, vihyitem kelohim yode‘ei tob vara‘.
wtr1 h1Sh ky Twb h8Z lm1kl wky t1wh hw1 l8ynym wnHmd h8Z lhSkyl wtqH mpryw wt1kl wttn gm l1ySh 8mh wy1kl and when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was pleasant to the eyes, and a tree to be desired to make one wise, she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her man with her; and he did eat. vatere ha’ishah ki tob ha‘ez lema’akhal vekhi ta’avah hu la‘enayim venekhmad ha‘ez lehaskil vatiqakh mipiryo vatokhal, vatiten gam le’ishah ‘imah vayokhal.
wtpqHnh 8yny Snyhm wyd8w ky 8yrmm hm wytprw 8lh t1nh wy8Sw lhm Hgrt and the eyes of them both were opened, and they hand-knew that they were naked; and they sewed fig leaves together, and made themselves aprons. vatipaqakhnah ‘enei shenehem vayede‘u ki ‘erumim hem, vayitperu ‘aleh te’enah vaya‘asu lahem khagorot.
wySm8w 1t qwl yhwh 1lhym mthlk bgn lrwH hywm wytHb1 h1dm w1Stw mpny yhwh 1lhym btwk 8Z hgn and they heard the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim walking in the garden in the cool of the day: and earth-blood-man-adam and his woman hid themselves from the presence of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim amongst the trees of the garden. vayishme‘u qol yhvh ’elohim mithalekh bagan leruakh hayom, vayitkhabei ha’adam ve’ishto mipenei yhvh ’elohim betokh ‘ez hagan.
wyqr1 yhwh 1lhym 1l h1dm wy1mr lw 1ykh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim called unto earth-blood-man-adam, and said unto him, where art thou? vayiqra yhvh ’elohim ’el ha’adam, vayomer lo ’ayekah.
wy1mr 1t qlk Sm8ty bgn w1yr1 ky 8yrm 1nky w1Hb1 and he said, i heard thy voice in the garden, and i was afraid, because i was naked; and i hid myself. vayomer qolekha shama‘ti bagan, va’ira ki ‘erom ’anokhi va’ekhabe.
wy1mr my hgyd lk ky 8yrm 1th hmn h8Z 1Sr Zwytyk lblty 1kl mmnw 1klt and he said, who told thee that thou wast naked? hast thou eaten of the tree, whereof i order-prescribed thee that thou shouldest not eat? vayomer mi higid lekha ki ‘erom ’atah, hamin ha‘ez ’asher zivitikha lebilti ’akhal mimenu ’akhaleta.
wy1mr h1dm h1Sh 1Sr ntth 8mdy hw1 ntnh ly mn h8Z w1kl and the man said, the woman whom thou gavest to be with me, she gave me of the tree, and i did eat. vayomer ha’adam, ha’ishah ’asher natatah ‘imadi hi natenah li min ha‘ez va’okhel.
wy1mr yhwh 1lhym l1Sh mh z1t 8Syt wt1mr h1Sh hnHS hSy1ny w1kl and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim said unto the woman, what is this that thou hast done? and the woman said, the serpent beguiled me, and i did eat. vayomer yhvh ’elohim la’ishah mah zot ‘asit, vatomer ha’ishah hanakhash hishi’ani va’okhel.
wy1mr yhwh 1lhym 1l hnHS ky 8Syt z1t 1rwr 1th mkl hbhmh wmkl Hyt hSdh 8l gHnk tlk w8pr t1kl kl ymy Hyyk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim said unto the serpent, because thou hast done this, thou art cursed above all in-them-animal, and above every beast of the field; upon thy nurture-belly thou go, and dust thou eat all the days of thy life: vayomer yhvh ’elohim ’el hanakhash ki ‘asita zot ’arur ’atah mikal habehemah umikol khayat hasadeh, ‘al gekhonekha telekh ve‘afar tokhal kal yemei khayekha.
w1ybh 1Syt bynk wbyn h1Sh wbyn zr8k wbyn zr8h hw1 ySwpk r1S w1th tSwpnw 8qb and i will put enmity between-bin thee and the woman, and between-bin thy seed and her seed; it bruise thy head, and thou bruise his heel-backstreet-jacob. ve’ebah ’ashit benekha uben ha’ishah uben zar‘akha uben zar‘ah, hu yeshufekha rosh ve’atah teshufenu ‘aqeb.
1l h1Sh 1mr hrbh 1rbh 8Zbwnk whrnk b8Zb tldy bnym w1l 1ySk tSwqtk whw1 ymSl bk unto the woman he said, i will greatly multiply thy sorrow and thy conception; in sorrow thou bring forth children-betweens; and thy desire be to thy man, and he rule over thee. ’el ha’ishah ’amar harbah ’arbeh ‘izebonekh veheronekh be‘ezeb teledi banim, ve’el ’ishekh teshuqatekh vehu yimshal bakh.
wl1dm 1mr ky Sm8t lqwl 1Stk wt1kl mn h8Z 1Sr Zwytyk l1mr l1 t1kl mmnw 1rwrh h1dmh b8bwrk b8Zbwn t1klnh kl ymy Hyyk and unto earth-blood-man-adam he said, because thou hast hearkened unto the voice of thy woman, and hast eaten of the tree, of which i order-prescribed thee, saying, no eat of it: cursed is the ground for thy sake; in sorrow thou eat of it all the days of thy life; ule’adam ’amar ki shama‘ta leqol ’ishtekha vatokhal min ha‘ez ’asher zivitikha lemor lo tokhal mimenu, ’arurah ha’adamah ba‘aburekha be‘izabon tokhalenah kol yemei khayekha.
wqwZ wdrdr tZmyH lk w1klt 1t 8Sb hSdh thorns also and thistles it bring forth to thee; and thou eat the herb of the field; veqoz vedardar tazmiakh lakh, ve’akhalta ‘eseb hasadeh.
bz8t 1pyk t1kl lHm 8d Swbk 1l h1dmh ky mmnh lqHt ky 8pr 1th w1l 8pr tSwb in the sweat of thy face-turns thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground; for out of it wast thou taken: for dust thou art, and unto dust thou return. beze‘at ’apekha tokhal lekhem ‘ad shubekha ’el ha’adamah ki mimenah luqakheta, ki ‘afar ’atah ve’el ‘afar tashub.
wyqr1 h1dm Sm 1Stw Hwh ky hw1 hyth 1m kl Hy and earth-blood-man-adam called his woman's name biosphere-eve; because she was the mother of all living. vayiqra ha’adam shem ’ishto khavah, ki hi hayetah ’em kal khay.
wy8S yhwh 1lhym l1dm wl1Stw ktnwt 8wr wylbSm unto earth-blood-man-adam also and to his woman did yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim make you-wrote-coats of light-skins, and clothed them. vaya‘as yhvh ’elohim le’adam ule’ishto katenot ‘or vayalbishem.
wy1mr yhwh 1lhym hn h1dm hyh k1Hd mmnw ld8t Twb wr8 w8th pn ySlH ydw wlqH gm m8Z hHyym w1kl wHy l8lm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim said, behold, the man is become as one of us, to hand-know good and bad: and now, lest he put forth his hand, and take also of the tree of life, and eat, and live for ever: vayomer yhvh ’elohim hen ha’adam hayah ke’akhad mimenu lada‘at tob vara‘, ve‘atah pen yishlakh yado velaqakh gam me‘ez hakhayim ve’akhal vakhay le‘olam.
wySlHhw yhwh 1lhym mgn 8dn l8bd 1t h1dmh 1Sr lqH mSm therefore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim sent him forth from the garden of eon-eden, to till the ground from whence he was taken. vayshalekhehu yhvh ’elohim migan ‘eden, la‘abod ha’adamah ’asher luqakh.
wygrS 1t h1dm wySkn mqdm lgn 8dn 1t hkrbym w1t lhT hHrb hmthpkt lSmr 1t drk 8Z hHyym so he drove out the man; and he placed at the east of the garden of eon-eden multi-intern-inward-cherubims, and a flaming sword which turned every way, to keep the way of the tree of life. vaygaresh ha’adam, vayashken miqedem legan ‘eden hakerubim ve’et lahat hakhereb hamithapekhet lishmor derekh ‘ez hakhayim.
wh1dm yd8 1t Hwh 1Stw wthr wtld 1t qyn wt1mr qnyty 1yS 1t yhwh and earth-blood-man-adam hand-knew biosphere-eve his woman; and she climaxed-tahar, and conceived-of cell-cain, and said, i have gotten a man from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. veha’adam yada‘ khavah ’ishto, vatahar vateled qayin vatomer qaniti ’ish ’et yhvh.
wtsp lldt 1t 1Hyw 1t hbl wyhy hbl r8h Z1n wqyn hyh 8bd 1dmh and she again conceived-of his brother vapor-abel. and vapor-abel was a keeper of sheep, and cell-cain was a tiller of the ground. vatosef laledet ’akhiv habel, vayhi hebel ro‘eh zon veqayin hayah ‘obed ’adamah.
wyhy mqZ ymym wyb1 qyn mpry h1dmh mnHh lyhwh and in process of time it came to pass, that cell-cain brought of the fruit of the ground an rest-absorber unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayhi miqez yamim, vayabei qayin miperi ha’adamah minkhah yhvh.
whbl hby1 gm hw1 mbkrwt Z1nw wmHlbhn wyS8 yhwh 1l hbl w1l mnHtw and vapor-abel, he also brought of the firstlings of his flock and of the fat thereof. and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had respect unto vapor-abel and to his rest-absorber: vehebel hebi gam hu mibekhorot zono umekhelbehen, vayisha‘ yhvh ’el hebel ve’el minkhato.
w1l qyn w1l mnHtw l1 S8h wyHr lqyn m1d wyplw pnyw and unto cell-cain and to his rest-absorber he had not respect. and cell-cain was very wroth, and his countenance fell. ve’el qayin ve’el minkhato lo sha‘ah, vayikhar leqayin me’od vayipelu panav.
wy1mr yhwh 1l qyn lmh Hrh lk wlmh nplw pnyk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto cell-cain, why art thou wroth? and why is thy countenance fallen? vayomer yhvh ’el qayin, lamah kharah lakh velamah nafelu fanekha.
hlw1 1m tyTyb S1t w1m l1 tyTyb lptH HT1t rbZ w1lyk tSwqtw w1th tmSl bw if thou doest well, thou not be accepted? and if thou doest not well, miss lieth at the opening. and unto thee be his desire, and thou rule over him. halo ’im tetib se’et ve’im lo tetib lapetakh khatat robez, ve’elekha teshuqato ve’atah timshal bo.
wy1mr qyn 1l hbl 1Hyw wyhy bhywtm bSdh wyqm qyn 1l hbl 1Hyw wyhrghw and cell-cain talked with vapor-abel his brother: and it came to pass, when they were in the field, that cell-cain rose up against vapor-abel his brother, and slew him. vayomer qayin ’el hebel ’akhiv, vayhi bihyotam basadeh vayaqam qayin ’el hebel ’akhiv vayahargehu.
wy1mr yhwh 1l qyn 1y hbl 1Hyk wy1mr l1 yd8ty hSmr 1Hy 1nky and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto cell-cain, where is vapor-abel thy brother? and he said, i hand-know not: am i my brother's keeper? vayomer yhvh ’el qayin ’ei hebel ’akhikha, vayomer lo yada‘ti hashomer ’akhi ’anokhi.
wy1mr mh 8Syt qwl dmy 1Hyk Z8qym 1ly mn h1dmh and he said, what hast thou done? the voice of thy brother's blood crieth unto me from the ground. vayomer meh ‘asita, qol demei ’akhikha zo‘aqim ’elay min ha’adamah.
w8th 1rwr 1th mn h1dmh 1Sr pZth 1t pyh lqHt 1t dmy 1Hyk mydk and now art thou cursed from the earth, which hath opened her mouth to receive thy brother's blood from thy hand; ve‘atah ’arur ’atah, min ha’adamah ’asher pazetah piha laqakhat demei ’akhikha miyadekha.
ky t8bd 1t h1dmh l1 tsp tt kHh lk n8 wnd thyh b1rZ when thou tillest the ground, it not henceforth yield unto thee her strength; a fugitive and a vagabond thou be in the earth. ki ta‘abod ha’adamah lo tosef tet kokhah lakh, na‘ vanad tihyeh ba’arez.
wy1mr qyn 1l yhwh gdwl 8wny mnS1 and cell-cain said unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, my punishment is greater than i can bear. vayomer qayin ’el yhvh, gadol ‘avoni mineso.
hn grSt 1ty hywm m8l pny h1dmh wmpnyk 1str whyyty n8 wnd b1rZ whyh kl mZ1y yhrgny behold, thou hast driven me out this day from the face-turns of the earth; and from thy face-turns i be hid; and i be a fugitive and a vagabond in the earth; and it come to pass, that every one that findeth me slay me. hen gerashta ’oti hayom me‘al penei ha’adamah umipanekha ’esater, vehayiti na‘ vanad ba’arez vehayah khal moze’i yahargeni.
wy1mr lw yhwh lkn kl hrg qyn Sb8tym yqm wySm yhwh lqyn 1wt lblty hkwt 1tw kl mZ1w and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto him, therefore whosoever slayeth cell-cain, vengeance be taken on him sevenfold. and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou set a mark upon cell-cain, lest any finding him should kill him. vayomer lo yhvh lakhen kal horeg qayin shib‘atayim yuqam, vayasem yhvh leqayin ’ot lebilti hakot ’oto kal moze’o.
wyZ1 qyn mlpny yhwh wySb b1rZ nwd qdmt 8dn and cell-cain went out from the presence of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and dwelt in the land of nomadic-nodi, on the east of eon-eden. vayezei qayin milifnei yhvh, vayesheb be’erez nod qidmat ‘eden.
wyd8 qyn 1t 1Stw wthr wtld 1t Hnwk wyhy bnh 8yr wyqr1 Sm h8yr kSm bnw Hnwk and cell-cain hand-knew his woman; and she conceived, and conceived-of teach-enoch: and he between-between-builded a light-city, and called the name of the light-city, after the name of his child-between, teach-enoch. vayeda‘ qayin ’ishto vatahar vateled khanokh, vayhi boneh ‘ir vayiqra shem ha‘ir keshem beno khanokh.
wywld lHnwk 1t 8yrd w8yrd yld 1t mHwy1l wmHyy1l yld 1t mtwS1l wmtwS1l yld 1t lmk and unto teach-enoch was born descend-bronze-irad: and descend-bronze-irad begat from-live-towards: and from-live-towards begat weakening-towards: and weakening-towards begat fool-lamech. vayivaled lakhanokh ‘irad ve‘irad yalad mekhuya’el, umekhiya’el yalad metusha’el umetusha’el yalad lamekh.
wyqH lw lmk Sty nSym Sm h1Ht 8dh wSm hSnyt Zlh and fool-lamech took unto him two women: the name of the one was witness-adah, and the name of the other shadow-zillah. vayiqakh lo lemekh shetei nashim, shem ha’akhat ‘adah veshem hashenit zilah.
wtld 8dh 1t ybl hw1 hyh 1by ySb 1hl wmqnh and witness-adah conceived-of spend-time-jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have in-them-animal. vateled ‘adah yabal, hu hayah ’abi yosheb ’ohel umiqneh.
wSm 1Hyw ywbl hw1 hyh 1by kl tpS knwr w8wgb and his brother's name was river-jubal: he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ. veshem ’akhiv yubal, hu hayah ’abi kal tofes kinor ve‘ugab.
wZlh gm hw1 yldh 1t twbl qyn lTS kl HrS nHSt wbrzl w1Hwt twbl qyn n8mh and shadow-zillah, she also conceived-of seasoned-cell-world-tubalcain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of seasoned-cell-world-tubalcain was pleasant-naamah. vezilah gam hi yaledah qayin lotesh kal khoresh nekhoshet ubarzel, va’akhot tubal qayin na‘amah.
wy1mr lmk lnSyw 8dh wZlh Sm8n qwly nSy lmk h1znh 1mrty ky 1yS hrgty lpZ8y wyld lHbrty and fool-lamech said unto his women, witness-adah and shadow-zillah, hear my voice; ye women of fool-lamech, hearken unto my speech: for i have slain a man to my wounding, and a young man to my hurt. vayomer lemekh lenashav ‘adah vezilah shema‘an qoli neshei lemekh ha’zenah ’imrati, ki ’ish haragti lefiz‘i veyeled lekhaburati.
ky Sb8tym yqm qyn wlmk Sb8ym wSb8h if cell-cain be avenged sevenfold, truly fool-lamech seventy and sevenfold. ki shib‘atayim yuqam qayin, velemekh shib‘im veshib‘ah.
wyd8 1dm 8wd 1t 1Stw wtld bn wtqr1 1t Smw St ky St ly 1lhym zr8 1Hr tHt hbl ky hrgw qyn and earth-blood-man-adam hand-knew his woman again; and she conceived-of a child-between, and called his name set-seth: for towards-these-elohim, said she, hath set me up with another seed instead of vapor-abel, whom cell-cain slew. vayeda‘ ’adam ‘od ’ishto vateled ben vatiqra shemo shet, ki shat li ’elohim zera‘ ’akher takhat hebel ki harago qayin.
wlSt gm hw1 yld bn wyqr1 1t Smw 1nwS 1z hwHl lqr1 bSm yhwh and to set-seth, to him also there was born a child-between; and he called his name man-enos: then began men to call upon the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. uleshet gam hu yulad ben vayiqra shemo ’enosh, ’az hukhal liqro beshem yhvh.
zh spr twldt 1dm bywm br1 1lhym 1dm bdmwt 1lhym 8Sh 1tw this is the book of the generations of earth-blood-man-adam. in the day that towards-these-elohim created man, in the likeness of towards-these-elohim made he him; zeh sefer toldot ’adam, beyom bero ’elohim ’adam bidmut ’elohim ‘asah ’oto.
zkr wnqbh br1m wybrk 1tm wyqr1 1t Smm 1dm bywm hbr1m rememberer and pierced created he them; and knee-fluffy-blessed them, and called their name earth-blood-man-adam, in the day when they were created. zakhar uneqebah bera’am, vaybarekh ’otam vayiqra shemam ’adam beyom hibare’am.
wyHy 1dm SlSym wm1t Snh wywld bdmwtw kZlmw wyqr1 1t Smw St and earth-blood-man-adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a child-between in his own likeness, and after his image; and called his name set-seth: vaykhi ’adam sheloshim ume’at shanah vayoled bidmuto kezalmo, vayiqra shemo shet.
wyhyw ymy 1dm 1Hry hwlydw 1t St Smnh m1t Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and the days of earth-blood-man-adam after he had begotten set-seth were eight hundred years: and he begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vayihyu yeme ’adam ’akharei holido shet shemoneh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy 1dm 1Sr Hy tS8 m1wt Snh wSlSym Snh wymt and all the days that earth-blood-man-adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died. vayihyu kal yemei ’adam ’asher khay tesha‘ me’ot shanah usheloshim shanah, vayamot.
wyHy St HmS Snym wm1t Snh wywld 1t 1nwS and set-seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat man-enos: vaykhi shet khamesh shanim ume’at shanah, vayoled ’enosh.
wyHy St 1Hry hwlydw 1t 1nwS Sb8 Snym wSmnh m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and set-seth lived after he begat man-enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi shet ’akharei holido ’enosh sheba‘ shanim ushemoneh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy St Stym 8Srh Snh wtS8 m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of set-seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died. vayihyu kal yeme shet shetem ‘esreh shanah utesha‘ me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyHy 1nwS tS8ym Snh wywld 1t qynn and man-enos lived ninety years, and begat cell-mourned-cainan: vaykhi ’enosh tish‘im shanah, vayoled qenan.
wyHy 1nwS 1Hry hwlydw 1t qynn HmS 8Srh Snh wSmnh m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and man-enos lived after he begat cell-mourned-cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi ’enosh ’akharei holido qenan khamesh ‘esreh shanah ushemoneh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy 1nwS HmS Snym wtS8 m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of man-enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died. vayihyu kal yemei ’enosh khamesh shanim utesha‘ me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyHy qynn Sb8ym Snh wywld 1t mhll1l and cell-mourned-cainan lived seventy years and begat praise-towards-mahalaleel: vaykhi qenan shib‘im shanah, vayoled mahalal’el.
wyHy qynn 1Hry hwlydw 1t mhll1l 1rb8ym Snh wSmnh m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and cell-mourned-cainan lived after he begat praise-towards-mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi qenan ’akharei holido mahalal’el ’arba‘im shanah ushemoneh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy qynn 8Sr Snym wtS8 m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of cell-mourned-cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died. vayihyu kal yemei qenan ‘eser shanim utesha‘ me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyHy mhll1l HmS Snym wSSym Snh wywld 1t yrd and praise-towards-mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat come-down-jared: vaykhi mahalal’el khamesh shanim veshishim shanah, vayoled yared.
wyHy mhll1l 1Hry hwlydw 1t yrd SlSym Snh wSmnh m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and praise-towards-mahalaleel lived after he begat come-down-jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi mahalal’el ’akharei holido yered sheloshim shanah ushemoneh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy mhll1l HmS wtS8ym Snh wSmnh m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of praise-towards-mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died. vayihyu kal yemei mahalal’el khamesh vetish‘im shanah ushemoneh me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyHy yrd Stym wSSym Snh wm1t Snh wywld 1t Hnwk and come-down-jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat teach-enoch: vaykhi yered shetayim veshishim shanah ume’at shanah, vayoled khanokh.
wyHy yrd 1Hry hwlydw 1t Hnwk Smnh m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and come-down-jared lived after he begat teach-enoch eight hundred years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi yered ’akharei holido khanokh shemoneh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy yrd Stym wSSym Snh wtS8 m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of come-down-jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died. vayihyu kal yeme yered shetayim veshishim shanah utesha‘ me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyHy Hnwk HmS wSSym Snh wywld 1t mtwSlH and teach-enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat death-brings-methuselah: vaykhi khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah, vayoled metushalakh.
wythlk Hnwk 1t h1lhym 1Hry hwlydw 1t mtwSlH SlS m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and teach-enoch walked with towards-these-elohim after he begat death-brings-methuselah three hundred years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vayithalekh khanokh ’et ha’elohim ’akharei holido metushelakh shelosh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhy kl ymy Hnwk HmS wSSym Snh wSlS m1wt Snh and all the days of teach-enoch were three hundred sixty and five years: vayhi kal yemei khanokh, khamesh veshishim shanah ushelosh me’ot shanah.
wythlk Hnwk 1t h1lhym w1ynnw ky lqH 1tw 1lhym and teach-enoch walked with towards-these-elohim: and he was not; for towards-these-elohim took him. vayithalekh khanokh ’et ha’elohim, ve’enenu ki laqakh ’oto ’elohim.
wyHy mtwSlH Sb8 wSmnym Snh wm1t Snh wywld 1t lmk and death-brings-methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat fool-lamech. vaykhi metushelakh sheba‘ ushemonim shanah ume’at shanah, vayoled lamekh.
wyHy mtwSlH 1Hry hwlydw 1t lmk Stym wSmwnym Snh wSb8 m1wt Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and death-brings-methuselah lived after he begat fool-lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi metushelakh ’akharei holido lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah usheba‘ me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhyw kl ymy mtwSlH tS8 wSSym Snh wtS8 m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of death-brings-methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died. vayihyu kal yemei metushelakh tesha‘ veshishim shanah utesha‘ me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyHy lmk Stym wSmnym Snh wm1t Snh wywld bn and fool-lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a child-between: vaykhi lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah ume’at shanah, vayoled ben.
wyqr1 1t Smw nH l1mr zh ynHmnw mm8Snw wm8Zbwn ydynw mn h1dmh 1Sr 1rrh yhwh and he called his name rest-noah, saying, this same rest us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath cursed. vayiqra shemo noakh lemor, zeh yenakhamenu mima‘asenu ume‘izebon yadenu min ha’adamah ’asher ’ererah yhvh.
wyHy lmk 1Hry hwlydw 1t nH HmS wtS8ym Snh wHmS m1t Snh wywld bnym wbnwt and fool-lamech lived after he begat rest-noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat children-betweens and children-betweenesss: vaykhi lemekh ’akharei holido noakh khamesh vetish‘im shanah vakhamesh me’ot shanah, vayoled banim ubanot.
wyhy kl ymy lmk Sb8 wSb8ym Snh wSb8 m1wt Snh wymt and all the days of fool-lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died. vayhi kal yeme lemekh sheba‘ veshib‘im shanah usheba‘ me’ot shanah, vayamot.
wyhy nH bn HmS m1wt Snh wywld nH 1t Sm 1t Hm w1t ypt and rest-noah was five hundred years old: and rest-noah begat name-shem, hot-ham, and beautiful-japheth. vayhi noakh ben khamesh me’ot shanah, vayoled noakh shem kham ve’et yafet.
wyhy ky hHl h1dm lrb 8l pny h1dmh wbnwt yldw lhm and it came to pass, when men began to multiply on the face-turns of the earth, and children-betweenesss were born unto them, vayhi ki hekhel ha’adam larob ‘al penei ha’adamah, ubanot yuledu lahem.
wyr1w bny h1lhym 1t bnwt h1dm ky Tbt hnh wyqHw lhm nSym mkl 1Sr bHrw that the he children-betweens of towards-these-elohim saw the she children-betweens of men that they were fair; and they took them women of all which they chose. vayir’u bene ha’elohim benot ha’adam ki tobot henah, vayiqkhu lahem nashim mikol ’asher bakharu.
wy1mr yhwh l1 ydwn rwHy b1dm l8lm bSgm hw1 bSr whyw ymyw m1h w8Srym Snh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said, my breath-spirit not always strive with man, for that he also is flesh: yet his days be an hundred and double-ten-twenty years. vayomer yhvh lo yadon rukhi ba’adam le‘olam beshagam hu basar, vehayu yamav me’ah ve‘esrim shanah.
hnplym hyw b1rZ bymym hhm wgm 1Hry kn 1Sr yb1w bny h1lhym 1l bnwt h1dm wyldw lhm hmh hgbrym 1Sr m8wlm 1nSy hSm there were giants in the earth in those days; and also after that, when children-betweens of towards-these-elohim came in unto children-betweenesss of men, and they conceived-of children-betweens to them, the same became mighty men which were of old, men of renown. hanefilim hayu ba’arez bayamim hahem vegam ’akhare khen ’asher yabo’u benei ha’elohim ’el benot ha’adam veyaledu lahem, hemah hagiborim ’asher me‘olam ’anshei hashem.
wyr1 yhwh ky rbh r8t h1dm b1rZ wkl yZr mHSbt lbw rq r8 kl hywm and towards-these-elohim saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth, and that every imagination of the thoughts of his heart was only bad continually. vayar yhvh ki rabah ra‘at ha’adam ba’arez, vekhal yezer makhshebot libo raq ra‘ kal hayom.
wynHm yhwh ky 8Sh 1t h1dm b1rZ wyt8Zb 1l lbw and it repented yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou that he had made man on the earth, and it grieved him at his heart. vayinakhem yhvh ki ‘asah ha’adam ba’arez, vayit‘azeb ’el libo.
wy1mr yhwh 1mHh 1t h1dm 1Sr br1ty m8l pny h1dmh m1dm 8d bhmh 8d rmS w8d 8wp hSmym ky nHmty ky 8Sytm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said, i will destroy man whom i have created from the face-turns of the earth; both man, and beast, and the creeping thing, and the fowls of the air; for it repenteth me that i have made them. vayomer yhvh ’emkheh ha’adam ’asher barati me‘al penei ha’adamah me’adam ‘ad behemah ‘ad remes ve‘ad ‘of hashamayim, ki nikhamti ki ‘asitim.
wnH mZ1 Hn b8yny yhwh and rest-noah found attractiveness in the eyes of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. venoakh maza khen be‘enei yhvh.
1lh twldt nH nH 1yS Zdyq tmym hyh bdrtyw 1t h1lhym hthlk nH these are the generations of rest-noah: rest-noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and rest-noah walked with towards-these-elohim. ’eleh toldot noakh noakh ’ish zadiq tamim hayah bedorotav, ’et ha’elohim hithalekh noakh.
wywld nH SlSh bnym 1t Sm 1t Hm w1t ypt and rest-noah begat three children-betweens, name-shem, hot-ham, and beautiful-japheth. vayoled noakh sheloshah banim, shem kham ve’et yafet.
wtSHt h1rZ lpny h1lhym wtml1 h1rZ Hms the earth also was corrupt before-turns towards-these-elohim, and the earth was filled with violence. vatishakhet ha’arez lifnei ha’elohim, vatimalei ha’arez khamas.
wyr1 1lhym 1t h1rZ whnh nSHth ky hSHyt kl bSr 1t drkw 8l h1rZ and towards-these-elohim looked upon the earth, and, behold, it was corrupt; for all flesh had corrupted his way upon the earth. vayar ’elohim ha’arez vehineh nishkhatah, ki hishkhit kal basar darko ‘al ha’arez.
wy1mr 1lhym lnH qZ kl bSr b1 lpny ky ml1h h1rZ Hms mpnyhm whnny mSHytm 1t h1rZ and towards-these-elohim said unto rest-noah, the end of all flesh is come before-turns me; for the earth is filled with violence through them; and, behold, i will destroy them with the earth. vayomer ’elohim lenoakh qez kal basar ba lefanay ki male’ah ha’arez khamas mipenehem, vehini mashkhitam ’et ha’arez.
8Sh lk tbt 8Zy gpr qnym t8Sh 1t htbh wkprt 1th mbyt wmHwZ bkpr make thee an ark of gopher wood; rooms thou make in the ark, and pitch it within and without with pitch. ‘aseh lekha tebat ‘aze gofer qinim ta‘aseh ’et hatebah, vekhafarta ’otah mibayit umikhuz bakofer.
wzh 1Sr t8Sh 1th SlS m1wt 1mh 1rk htbh HmSym 1mh rHbh wSlSym 1mh qwmth and this is the fashion which thou make it of: the length of the ark be three hundred cubits, the breadth of it fifty cubits, and the height of it thirty cubits. vezeh ’asher ta‘aseh ’otah, shelosh me’ot ’amah ’orekh hatebah khamishim ’amah rakhebah usheloshim ’amah qomatah.
Zhr t8Sh ltbh w1l 1mh tklnh mlm8lh wptH htbh bZdh tSym tHtym Snym wSlSym t8Sh a window thou make to the ark, and in a cubit thou finish it above; and the opening of the ark thou set in the side thereof; with lower, second, and third stories thou make it. zohar ta‘aseh latebah ve’el ’amah tekhalenah milma‘lah ufetakh hatebah bezidah tasim, takhtiyim sheniyim ushelishim ta‘aseha.
w1ny hnny mby1 1t hmbwl mym 8l h1rZ lSHt kl bSr 1Sr bw rwH Hyym mtHt hSmym kl 1Sr b1rZ ygw8 and, behold, i, even i, do bring a flood of from-waters upon the earth, to destroy all flesh, wherein is the breath of life, from under namespaces; and every thing that is in the earth die. va’ani hini mebi hamabul mayim ‘al ha’arez leshakhet kal basar ’asher bo ruakh khayim mitakhat hashamayim, kol ’asher ba’arez yigva‘.
whqmty 1t bryty 1tk wb1t 1l htbh 1th wbnyk w1Stk wnSy bnyk 1tk and with thee will i establish my covenant; and thou come into the ark, thou, and thy children-betweens, and thy woman, and thy children-betweens' women with thee. vahaqimoti beriti ’itakh, ubata ’el hatebah ’atah ubanekha ve’ishtekha uneshe banekha ’itakh.
wmkl hHy mkl bSr Snym mkl tby1 1l htbh lhHyt 1tk zkr wnqbh yhyw and of every living thing of all flesh, two of every sort thou bring into the ark, to keep them alive with thee; they be rememberer and pierced. umikal hakhay mikal basar shenayim mikol tabi ’el hatebah lehakhayot ’itakh, zakhar uneqebah yihyu.
mh8wp lmynhw wmn hbhmh lmynh mkl rmS h1dmh lmynhw Snym mkl yb1w 1lyk lhHywt of fowls after their kind, and of in-them-animal after their kind, of every creeping thing of the earth after his kind, two of every sort come unto thee, to keep them alive. meha‘of leminehu umin habehemah leminah mikol remes ha’adamah leminehu, shenayim mikol yabo’u ’elekha lehakhayot.
w1th qH lk mkl m1kl 1Sr y1kl w1spt 1lyk whyh lk wlhm l1klh and take thou unto thee of all food that is eaten, and thou gather it to thee; and it be for food for thee, and for them. ve’atah qakh lekha mikal ma’akhal ’asher ye’akhel ve’asafta ’elekha, vehayah lekha velahem le’akhlah
wy8S nH kkl 1Sr Zwh 1tw 1lhym kn 8Sh thus did rest-noah; according to all that towards-these-elohim order-prescribed him, so did he. vaya‘as noakh, kekhol ’asher zivah ’oto ’elohim ken ‘asah.
wy1mr yhwh lnH b1 1th wkl bytk 1l htbh ky 1tk r1yty Zdyq lpny bdwr hzh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto rest-noah, come thou and all thy daughter-house into the ark; for thee have i seen just before-turns me in this generation. vayomer yhvh lenoakh bo ’atah vekhal betekha ’el hatebah, ki ’otekha ra’iti zadiq lefanay bador hazeh.
mkl hbhmh hThwrh tqH lk Sb8h Sb8h 1yS w1Stw wmn hbhmh 1Sr l1 Thrh hw1 Snym 1yS w1Stw of every bright-climaxing beast thou take to thee by sevens, the rememberer and his pierced: and of beasts that are not bright-climaxing by two, the rememberer and his pierced. mikol habehemah hatehorah tiqakh lekha shib‘ah shib‘ah ’ish ve’ishto, umin habehemah ’asher lo tehorah hi shenayim ’ish ve’ishto.
gm m8wp hSmym Sb8h Sb8h zkr wnqbh lHywt zr8 8l pny kl h1rZ of fowls also of the air by sevens, the rememberer and the pierced; to keep seed alive upon the face-turns of all the earth. gam me‘of hashamayim shib‘ah shib‘ah zakhar uneqebah, lekhayot zera‘ ‘al penei khal ha’arez.
ky lymym 8wd Sb8h 1nky mmTyr 8l h1rZ 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh wmHyty 1t kl hyqwm 1Sr 8Syty m8l pny h1dmh for yet seven days, and i will cause it to rain upon the earth forty days and forty nights; and every living substance that i have made will i destroy from off the face-turns of the earth. ki leyamim ‘od shib‘ah ’anokhi mamtir ‘al ha’arez ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im layelah, umakhiti kal hayqum ’asher ‘asiti me‘al penei ha’adamah.
wy8S nH kkl 1Sr Zwhw yhwh and rest-noah did according unto all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him. vaya‘as noakh, kekhol ’asher zivahu yhvh.
wnH bn SS m1wt Snh whmbwl hyh mym 8l h1rZ and rest-noah was six hundred years old when the flood of from-waters was upon the earth. venoakh ben shesh me’ot shanah, vehamabul hayah mayim ‘al ha’arez.
wyb1 nH wbnyw w1Stw wnSy bnyw 1tw 1l htbh mpny my hmbwl and rest-noah went in, and his children-betweens, and his woman, and his children-betweens' women with him, into the ark, because of the from-waters of the flood. vayabo noakh ubanav ve’ishto uneshe banav ’ito ’el hatebah, mipenei mei hamabul.
mn hbhmh hThwrh wmn hbhmh 1Sr 1ynnh Thrh wmn h8wp wkl 1Sr rmS 8l h1dmh of bright-climaxing beasts, and of beasts that are not bright-climaxing, and of fowls, and of every thing that creepeth upon the earth, min habehemah hatehorah umin habehemah ’asher ’enenah tehorah, umin ha‘of vekhol ’asher romes ‘al ha’adamah.
Snym Snym b1w 1l nH 1l htbh zkr wnqbh k1Sr Zwh 1lhym 1t nH there went in two and two unto rest-noah into the ark, the rememberer and the pierced, as towards-these-elohim had order-prescribed rest-noah. shenayim shenayim ba’u ’el noakh ’el hatebah zakhar uneqebah, ka’asher zivah ’elohim noakh.
wyhy lSb8t hymym wmy hmbwl hyw 8l h1rZ and it came to pass after seven days, that the from-waters of the flood were upon the earth. vayhi leshib‘at hayamim, umei hamabul hayu ‘al ha’arez.
bSnt SS m1wt Snh lHyy nH bHdS hSny bSb8h 8Sr ywm lHdS bywm hzh nbq8w kl m8ynt thwm rbh w1rbt hSmym nptHw in the six hundredth year of rest-noah's life, in the second month, the seventeenth day of the month, the same day were all the fountains of the great deep broken up, and the windows of namespaces were opened. bishnat shesh me’ot shanah lekhaye noakh bakhodesh hasheni beshib‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh, bayom hazeh nibqe‘u kal ma‘yenot tehom rabah va’arubot hashamayim niftakhu.
wyhy hgSm 8l h1rZ 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh and the rain was upon the earth forty days and forty nights. vayhi hageshem ‘al ha’arez, ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im layelah.
b8Zm hywm hzh b1 nH wSm wHm wypt bny nH w1St nH wSlSt nSy bnyw 1tm 1l htbh in the selfsame day entered rest-noah, and name-shem, and hot-ham, and beautiful-japheth, children-betweens of rest-noah, and rest-noah's woman, and the three women of his children-betweens with them, into the ark; be‘ezem hayom hazeh ba noakh veshem vekham vayefet bene noakh, ve’eshet noakh usheloshet neshe banav ’itam ’el hatebah.
hmh wkl hHyh lmynh wkl hbhmh lmynh wkl hrmS hrmS 8l h1rZ lmynhw wkl h8wp lmynhw kl Zpwr kl knp they, and every beast after his kind, and all the in-them-animal after their kind, and every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind, and every fowl after his kind, every bird of every sort. hemah vekhal hakhayah leminah vekhal habehemah leminah vekhal haremes haromes ‘al ha’arez leminehu, vekhal ha‘of leminehu kol zipor kal kanaf.
wyb1w 1l nH 1l htbh Snym Snym mkl hbSr 1Sr bw rwH Hyym and they went in unto rest-noah into the ark, two and two of all flesh, wherein is the breath of life. vayabo’u ’el noakh ’el hatebah, shenayim shenayim mikal habasar bo ruakh khayim.
whb1ym zkr wnqbh mkl bSr b1w k1Sr Zwh 1tw 1lhym wysgr yhwh b8dw and they that went in, went in rememberer and pierced of all flesh, as towards-these-elohim had order-prescribed him: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou shut him in. vehaba’im zakhar uneqebah mikal basar ba’u ka’asher zivah ’oto ’elohim, vayisgor yhvh ba‘ado.
wyhy hmbwl 1rb8ym ywm 8l h1rZ wyrbw hmym wyS1w 1t htbh wtrm m8l h1rZ and the flood was forty days upon the earth; and the from-waters increased, and conceived-of up the ark, and it was lift up above the earth. vayhi hamabul ’arba‘im yom ‘al ha’arez, vayirbu hamayim vayis’u hatebah vataram me‘al ha’arez.
wygbrw hmym wyrbw m1d 8l h1rZ wtlk htbh 8l pny hmym and the from-waters prevailed, and were increased greatly upon the earth; and the ark went upon the face-turns of the from-waters. vayigberu hamayim vayirbu me’od ‘al ha’arez, vatelekh hatebah ‘al penei hamayim.
whmym gbrw m1d m1d 8l h1rZ wyksw kl hhrym hgbhym 1Sr tHt kl hSmym and the from-waters prevailed exceedingly upon the earth; and all the high hills, that were under the whole namespaces, were covered. vehamayim gaberu me’od me’od ‘al ha’arez, vaykhusu kal heharim hagebohim ’asher takhat kal hashamayim.
HmS 8Srh 1mh mlm8lh gbrw hmym wyksw hhrym fifteen cubits upward did the from-waters prevail; and the mountains were covered. khamesh ‘esreh ’amah milma‘lah gaberu hamayim, vaykhusu heharim.
wygw8 kl bSr hrmS 8l h1rZ b8wp wbbhmh wbHyh wbkl hSrZ hSrZ 8l h1rZ wkl h1dm and all flesh died that moved upon the earth, both of fowl, and of in-them-animal, and of beast, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth, and every man: vayigva‘ kal basar haromes ‘al ha’arez ba‘of ubabehemah ubakhayah ubekhal hasherez hashorez ‘al ha’arez, vekhol ha’adam.
kl 1Sr nSmt rwH Hyym b1pyw mkl 1Sr bHrbh mtw all in whose nostrils was the breath of life, of all that was in the dry land, died. kol ’asher nishmat ruakh khayim be’apav mikol ’asher bekharabah metu.
wymH 1t kl hyqwm 1Sr 8l pny h1dmh m1dm 8d bhmh 8d rmS w8d 8wp hSmym wymHw mn h1rZ wyS1r 1k nH w1Sr 1tw btbh and every living substance was destroyed which was upon the face-turns of the ground, both man, and in-them-animal, and the creeping things, and the fowl of the namespaces; and they were destroyed from the earth: and rest-noah only remained alive, and they that were with him in the ark. vayimakh kal hayqum ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah me’adam ‘ad behemah ‘ad remes ve‘ad ‘of hashamayim vayimakhu min ha’arez, vayisha’er ’akh noakh va’asher ’ito batebah.
wygbrw hmym 8l h1rZ HmSym wm1t ywm and the from-waters prevailed upon the earth an hundred and fifty days. vayigberu hamayim ‘al ha’arez, khamishim ume’at yom.
wyzkr 1lhym 1t nH w1t kl hHyh w1t kl hbhmh 1Sr 1tw btbh wy8br 1lhym rwH 8l h1rZ wySkw hmym and towards-these-elohim remembered rest-noah, and every living thing, and all the in-them-animal that was with him in the ark: and towards-these-elohim made a wind to pass over the earth, and the from-waters assuaged; vayizkor ’elohim noakh ve’et kal hakhayah ve’et kal habehemah ’asher ’ito batebah, vaya‘aber ’elohim ruakh ‘al ha’arez vayashoku hamayim.
wyskrw m8ynt thwm w1rbt hSmym wykl1 hgSm mn hSmym the fountains also of the deep and the windows of namespaces were stopped, and the rain from namespaces was restrained; vayisakheru ma‘yenot tehom va’arubot hashamayim, vayikalei hageshem min hashamayim.
wySbw hmym m8l h1rZ hlwk wSwb wyHsrw hmym mqZh HmSym wm1t ywm and the from-waters returned from off the earth continually: and after the end of the hundred and fifty days the from-waters were abated. vayashubu hamayim me‘al ha’arez halokh vashob, vayakhseru hamayim miqzeh khamishim ume’at yom.
wtnH htbh bHdS hSby8y bSb8h 8Sr ywm lHdS 8l hry 1rrT and the ark rested in the seventh month, on the seventeenth day of the month, upon the mountains of appeal-ararat. vatanakh hatebah bakhodesh hashebi‘i beshib‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh, ‘al harei ’ararat.
whmym hyw hlwk wHswr 8d hHdS h8Syry b8Syry b1Hd lHdS nr1w r1Sy hhrym and the from-waters decreased continually until the tenth month: in the tenth month, on the first day of the month, were the tops of the mountains seen. vehamayim hayu halokh vekhasor ‘ad hakhodesh ha‘asiri, ba‘asiri be’ekhad lakhodesh nir’u rashei heharim.
wyhy mqZ 1rb8ym ywm wyptH nH 1t Hlwn htbh 1Sr 8Sh and it came to pass at the end of forty days, that rest-noah opened the window of the ark which he had made: vayhi miqez ’arba‘im yom, vayiftakh noakh khalon hatebah ’asher ‘asah.
wySlH 1t h8rb wyZ1 yZw1 wSwb 8d ybSt hmym m8l h1rZ and he sent forth a evening-raven, which went forth to and fro, until the from-waters were dried up from off the earth. vayshalakh ha‘oreb, vayezei yazo vashob ‘ad yeboshet hamayim me‘al ha’arez.
wySlH 1t hywnh m1tw lr1wt hqlw hmym m8l pny h1dmh also he sent forth a dove from him, to see if the from-waters were abated from off the face-turns of the ground; vayshalakh hayonah me’ito, lir’ot haqalu hamayim me‘al penei ha’adamah.
wl1 mZ1h hywnh mnwH lkp rglh wtSb 1lyw 1l htbh ky mym 8l pny kl h1rZ wySlH ydw wyqHh wyb1 1th 1lyw 1l htbh and the dove found no rest for the sole of her foot, and she returned unto him into the ark, for the from-waters were on the face-turns of the whole earth: then he put forth his hand, and took her, and pulled her in unto him into the ark. velo maze’ah hayonah manoakh lekhaf raglah vatashab ’elav ’el hatebah ki mayim ‘al penei khal ha’arez, vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayabei ’otah ’elav ’el hatebah.
wyHl 8wd Sb8t ymym 1Hrym wysp SlH 1t hywnh mn htbh and he stayed yet other seven days; and again he sent forth the dove out of the ark; vayakhel ‘od shib‘at yamim ’akherim, vayosef shalakh hayonah min hatebah.
wtb1 1lyw hywnh l8t 8rb whnh 8lh zyt Trp bpyh wyd8 nH ky qlw hmym m8l h1rZ and the dove came in to him in the evening; and, lo, in her mouth was an olive leaf plucked off: so rest-noah hand-knew that the from-waters were abated from off the earth. vatabo ’elav hayonah le‘et ‘ereb vehineh ‘aleh zayit taraf befiha, vayeda‘ noakh ki qalu hamayim me‘al ha’arez.
wyyHl 8wd Sb8t ymym 1Hrym wySlH 1t hywnh wl1 ysph Swb 1lyw 8wd and he stayed yet other seven days; and sent forth the dove; which returned not again unto him any more. vayiyakhel ‘od shib‘at yamim ’akherim, vayshalakh hayonah velo yasefah shub ’elav ‘od.
wyhy b1Ht wSS m1wt Snh br1Swn b1Hd lHdS Hrbw hmym m8l h1rZ wysr nH 1t mksh htbh wyr1 whnh Hrbw pny h1dmh and it came to pass in the six hundredth and first year, in the first month, the first day of the month, the from-waters were dried up from off the earth: and rest-noah removed the covering of the ark, and looked, and, behold, the face-turns of the ground was dry. vayhi be’akhat veshesh me’ot shanah barishon be’ekhad lakhodesh kharebu hamayim me‘al ha’arez, vayasar noakh mikhseh hatebah vayar vehineh kharebu penei ha’adamah.
wbHdS hSny bSb8h w8Srym ywm lHdS ybSh h1rZ and in the second month, on the seven and twentieth day of the month, was the earth dried. ubakhodesh hasheni beshib‘ah ve‘esrim yom lakhodesh, yabeshah ha’arez.
wydbr 1lhym 1l nH l1mr and towards-these-elohim spake unto rest-noah, saying, vaydaber ’elohim ’el noakh lemor.
Z1 mn htbh 1th w1Stk wbnyk wnSy bnyk 1tk go forth of the ark, thou, and thy woman, and thy children-betweens, and thy children-betweens' women with thee. zei min hatebah, ’atah ve’ishtekha ubanekha uneshe banekha ’itakh.
kl hHyh 1Sr 1tk mkl bSr b8wp wbbhmh wbkl hrmS hrmS 8l h1rZ hwZ1 hyZ1 1tk wSrZw b1rZ wprw wrbw 8l h1rZ bring forth with thee every living thing that is with thee, of all flesh, both of fowl, and of in-them-animal, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth; that they may breed abundantly in the earth, and be fruitful, and multiply upon the earth. kal hakhayah ’asher ’itekha mikal basar ba‘of ubabehemah ubekhal haremes haromes ‘al ha’arez hayzei ’itakh, vesharezu ba’arez ufaru verabu ‘al ha’arez.
wyZ1 nH wbnyw w1Stw wnSy bnyw 1tw and rest-noah went forth, and his children-betweens, and his woman, and his children-betweens' women with him: vayeze noakh, ubanav ve’ishto uneshe banav ’ito.
kl hHyh kl hrmS wkl h8wp kl rwmS 8l h1rZ lmSpHtyhm yZ1w mn htbh every beast, every creeping thing, and every fowl, and whatsoever creepeth upon the earth, after their kinds, went forth out of the ark. kal hakhayah kal haremes vekhal ha‘of kol romes ‘al ha’arez, lemishpekhotehem yaze’u min hatebah.
wybn nH mzbH lyhwh wyqH mkl hbhmh hThwrh wmkl h8wp hThr wy8l 8lt bmzbH and rest-noah between-between-builded an butcher-kitchen unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and took of every bright-climaxing beast, and of every bright-climaxing fowl, and rose on-ups on the butcher-kitchen. vayiben noakh mizbeakh yhvh, vayiqakh mikol habehemah hatehorah umikol ha‘of hatahor vaya‘al ‘olot bamizbeakh.
wyrH yhwh 1t ryH hnyHH wy1mr yhwh 1l lbw l1 1sp lqll 8wd 1t h1dmh b8bwr h1dm ky yZr lb h1dm r8 mn8ryw wl1 1sp 8wd lhkwt 1t kl Hy k1Sr 8Syty and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou smelled a smell fragrance; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said in his heart, i will not again curse the ground any more for man's sake; for the imagination of man's heart is bad from his youth; neither will i again hit any more every thing living, as i have done. vayarakh yhvh reakh hanikhoakh vayomer yhvh ’el libo lo ’osif leqalel ‘od ha’adamah ba‘abur ha’adam ki yezer leb ha’adam ra‘ mine‘urav, velo ’osif ‘od lehakot kal khay ka’asher ‘asiti.
8d kl ymy h1rZ zr8 wqZyr wqr wHm wqyZ wHrp wywm wlylh l1 ySbtw while the earth remaineth, seedtime and harvest, and cold and heat, and summer and winter, and day and night not cease. ‘od kal yemei ha’arez, zera‘ veqazir veqor vakhom veqayiz vakhoref veyom valaylah lo yishbotu.
wybrk 1lhym 1t nH w1t bnyw wy1mr lhm prw wrbw wml1w 1t h1rZ and towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-blessed rest-noah and his children-betweens, and said unto them, be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth. vaybarekh ’elohim noakh ve’et banav, vayomer lahem peru urebu umil’u ha’arez.
wmwr1km wHtkm yhyh 8l kl Hyt h1rZ w8l kl 8wp hSmym bkl 1Sr trmS h1dmh wbkl dgy hym bydkm ntnw and the fear of you and the dread of you be upon every beast of the earth, and upon every fowl of the air, upon all that moveth upon the earth, and upon all the fishes of the sea; into your hand are they delivered. umora’akhem vekhitekhem yihyeh ‘al kal khayat ha’arez ve‘al kal ‘of hashamayim, bekhol ’asher tirmos ha’adamah ubekhal degei hayam beyedkhem nitanu.
kl rmS 1Sr hw1 Hy lkm yhyh l1klh kyrq 8Sb ntty lkm 1t kl every moving thing that liveth be meat for you; even as the green herb have i given you all things. kal remes ’asher hu khay lakhem yihyeh le’akhlah keyereq ‘eseb natati lakhem kol.
1k bSr bnpSw dmw l1 t1klw and flesh with the life thereof, which is the blood thereof, ye not eat. ’akh basar benafsho damo lo tokhelu.

w1t kl npS hHyh 1Sr 1tkm b8wp bbhmh wbkl Hyt h1rZ 1tkm mkl yZ1y htbh lkl Hyt h1rZ and with every living creature that is with you, of the fowl, of the in-them-animal, and of every beast of the earth with you; from all that go out of the ark, to every beast of the earth. ve’et kal nefesh hakhayah ’asher ’itekhem ba‘of babehemah ubekhal khayat ha’arez ’itekhem, mikol yoze’ei hatebah lekhol khayat ha’arez.
whqmty 1t bryty 1tkm wl1 ykrt kl bSr 8wd mmy hmbwl wl1 yhyh 8wd mbwl lSHt h1rZ and i will establish my covenant with you, neither all flesh be cut off any more by the from-waters of a flood; neither there any more be a flood to destroy the earth. vahaqimoti beriti ’itekhem velo yikaret kal basar ‘od mimei hamabul, velo yihyeh ‘od mabul leshakhet ha’arez.
wy1mr 1lhym z1t 1wt hbryt 1Sr 1ny ntn byny wbynykm wbyn kl npS Hyh 1Sr 1tkm ldrt 8wlm and towards-these-elohim said, this is the token of the covenant which i make between-bin me and you and every living creature that is with you, for perpetual generations: vayomer ’elohim zot ’ot haberit ’asher ’ani noten beni ubenekhem uben kal nefesh khayah ’asher ’itekhem, ledorot ‘olam.
1t qSty ntty b8nn whyth l1wt bryt byny wbyn h1rZ i do set my bow in the cloud, and it be for a token of a covenant between-bin me and the earth. qashti natati be‘anan, vehayetah le’ot berit beni uben ha’arez.
whyh b8nny 8nn 8l h1rZ wnr1th hqSt b8nn and it come to pass, when i bring a cloud over the earth, that the bow be seen in the cloud: vehayah be‘ani ‘anan ‘al ha’arez, venir’atah haqeshet be‘anan.
wzkrty 1t bryty 1Sr byny wbynykm wbyn kl npS Hyh bkl bSr wl1 yhyh 8wd hmym lmbwl lSHt kl bSr and i will remember my covenant, which is between-bin me and you and every living creature of all flesh; and the from-waters no more become a flood to destroy all flesh. vezakharti beriti ’asher beni ubenekhem uben kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar, velo yihyeh ‘od hamayim lemabul leshakhet kal basar.
