wy1mr yhwh 1l 1hrn lk lqr1t mSh hmdbrh wylk wypgShw bhr h1lhym wySq lw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said to cabinet-aaron, go into the place-of-word-desert to until-witness extracted-mose. and he went, and met him in the mount of towards-these-elohim, and kissed him. vayomer yhvh ’el ’aharon lekh liqrat mosheh hamidbarah, vayelekh vayifgeshehu behar ha’elohim vayishaq lo.
wygd mSh l1hrn 1t kl dbry yhwh 1Sr SlHw w1t kl h1tt 1Sr Zwhw and extracted-mose told cabinet-aaron all the bee-words of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou who had sent him, and all the signs which he had order-prescribed him. vayaged mosheh le’aharon kal dibrei yhvh ’asher shelakho, ve’et kal ha’otot ’asher zivahu.
wylk mSh w1hrn wy1spw 1t kl zqny bny ySr1l and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron went and added together all the elders of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: vayelekh mosheh ve’aharon, vaya’asfu kal ziqnei benei yisra’el.
wydbr 1hrn 1t kl hdbrym 1Sr dbr yhwh 1l mSh wy8S h1tt l8yny h8m and cabinet-aaron spake all the bee-words which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had bee-spoken unto extracted-mose, and did the signs in the sight of the with-mum-people. vaydaber ’aharon kal hadebarim ’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh, vaya‘as ha’otot le‘enei ha‘am.
wy1mn h8m wySm8w ky pqd yhwh 1t bny ySr1l wky r1h 1t 8nym wyqdw wyStHww and the with-mum-people was coached by: and when they heard that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had visited children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and that he had looked upon their affliction, then they bowed their heads and partook-shatakh. vaya’amen ha‘am, vayishme‘u ki faqad yhvh benei yisra’el vekhi ra’ah ‘aneyam vayiqedu vayishtakhavu
w1Hr b1w mSh w1hrn wy1mrw 1l pr8h kh 1mr yhwh 1lhy ySr1l SlH 1t 8my wyHgw ly bmdbr and afterward extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron went in, and told big-house-pharaoh, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of saturated-towards-israel, let my with-mum-people go, that they may hold a until-conception unto me in the place-of-word-desert. ve’akhar ba’u mosheh ve’aharon vayomeru ’el par‘oh, koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el shalakh ‘ami veyakhogu li bamidbar.
wy1mr pr8h my yhwh 1Sr 1Sm8 bqlw lSlH 1t ySr1l l1 yd8ty 1t yhwh wgm 1t ySr1l l1 1SlH and big-house-pharaoh said, who is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, that i should obey his voice to let saturated-towards-israel go? i hand-know not yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, neither will i let saturated-towards-israel go. vayomer par‘oh mi yhvh ’asher ’eshma‘ beqolo leshalakh yisra’el, lo yada‘ti yhvh vegam ’et yisra’el lo ’ashaleakh.
wy1mrw 1lhy h8brym nqr1 8lynw nlkh n1 drk SlSt ymym bmdbr wnzbHh lyhwh 1lhynw pn ypg8nw bdbr 1w bHrb and they said, the towards-these-elohim of the cross-over-hebrews hath met with us: let us go, we pray thee, three days' journey into the place-of-word-desert, and butcher unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim; lest he fall upon us with word-bee, or with the sword. vayomeru ’elohei ha‘ibrim niqra ‘alenu, nelakhah na derekh sheloshet yamim bamidbar venizbekhah yhvh ’elohenu pen yifga‘enu badeber ’o bekhareb.
wy1mr 1lhm mlk mZrym lmh mSh w1hrn tpry8w 1t h8m mm8Syw lkw lsbltykm and the moloch-king of narrows-mizraim said unto them, wherefore do ye, extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, let the with-mum-people from their works? get you unto your burdens. vayomer ’alehem melekh mizrayim lamah mosheh ve’aharon tafri‘u ha‘am mima‘asav, lekhu lesiblotekhem.
wy1mr pr8h hn rbym 8th 8m h1rZ whSbtm 1tm msbltm and big-house-pharaoh said, behold, the with-mum-people of the land now are many, and ye make them rest from their burdens. vayomer par‘oh hen rabim ‘atah ‘am ha’arez, vehishbatem ’otam misiblotam.
wyZw pr8h bywm hhw1 1t hngSym b8m w1t STryw l1mr and big-house-pharaoh order-prescribed the same day the taskmasters of the with-mum-people, and their officers, saying, vayzav par‘oh bayom hahu, hanogesim ba‘am ve’et shoterav lemor.
l1 t1spwn ltt tbn l8m llbn hlbnym ktmwl SlSm hm ylkw wqSSw lhm tbn ye no more give the with-mum-people straw-t-between to make brick-l-between, as heretofore: let them go and gather straw-t-between for themselves. lo tosifun latet teben la‘am lilbon halebenim kitmol shilshom, hem yelekhu veqosheshu lahem teben.
w1t mtknt hlbnym 1Sr hm 8Sym tmwl SlSm tSymw 8lyhm l1 tgr8w mmnw ky nrpym hm 8l kn hm Z8qym l1mr nlkh nzbHh l1lhynw and the tale of the brick-l-betweens, which they did make heretofore, ye lay upon them; ye not diminish ought thereof: for they be idle; therefore they cry, saying, let us go and butcher to our towards-these-elohim. ve’et matkonet halebenim ’asher hem ‘osim temol shilshom tasimu ‘alehem lo tigre‘u mimenu, ki nirpim hem ‘al ken hem zo‘aqim lemor nelekhah nizbekhah lelohenu.
tkbd h8bdh 8l h1nSym wy8Sw bh w1l yS8w bdbry Sqr let there more work be laid upon the men, that they may labor therein; and let them not regard vain bee-words. tikhbad ha‘abodah ‘al ha’anashim veya‘asu bah, ve’al yish‘u bedibre shaqer.
wyZ1w ngSy h8m wSTryw wy1mrw 1l h8m l1mr kh 1mr pr8h 1ynny ntn lkm tbn and the taskmasters of the with-mum-people went out, and their officers, and they spake to the with-mum-people, saying, thus saith big-house-pharaoh, i will not give you straw-t-between. vayeze’u nogesei ha‘am veshoterav vayomeru ’el ha‘am lemor, koh ’amar par‘oh ’eneni noten lakhem teben.
1tm lkw qHw lkm tbn m1Sr tmZ1w ky 1yn ngr8 m8bdtkm dbr go ye, get you straw-t-between where ye can find it: yet not ought of your work be diminished. ’atem lekhu qekhu lakhem teben me’asher timza’u, ki ’en nigra‘ me‘abodatkhem.
wypZ h8m bkl 1rZ mZrym lqSS qS ltbn so the with-mum-people were scattered abroad throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim to gather stubble instead of straw-t-between. vayafez ha‘am bekhal ’erez mizrayim, leqoshesh qash lateben.
whngSym 1Zym l1mr klw m8Sykm dbr ywm bywmw k1Sr bhywt htbn and the taskmasters hasted them, saying, fulfil your works, your daily tasks, as when there was straw-t-between. vehanogesim ’azim lemor, kalu ma‘asekhem debar yom beyomo ka’asher bihyot hateben.
wykw STry bny ySr1l 1Sr Smw 8lhm ngSy pr8h l1mr mdw8 l1 klytm Hqkm llbn ktmwl SlSm gm tmwl gm hywm and the officers of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which big-house-pharaoh's taskmasters had set over them, were beaten, and demanded, wherefore have ye not fulfilled your task in making brick-l-between both yesterday and to day, as heretofore? vayuku shoterei benei yisra’el ’asher samu ‘alehem nogesei far‘oh lemor, madua‘ lo khilitem khaqekhem lilbon kitmol shilshom gam temol gam hayom.
wyb1w STry bny ySr1l wyZ8qw 1l pr8h l1mr lmh t8Sh kh l8bdyk then the officers of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel came and cried unto big-house-pharaoh, saying, wherefore dealest thou thus with thy workers? vayabo’u shoterei benei yisra’el vayiz‘aqu ’el par‘oh lemor, lamah ta‘aseh khoh la‘abadekha.
tbn 1yn ntn l8bdyk wlbnym 1mrym lnw 8Sw whnh 8bdyk mkym wHT1t 8mk there is no straw-t-between given unto thy workers, and they say to us, make brick-l-between: and, behold, thy workers are beaten; and the fault is in thine own with-mum-people. teben ’en nitan la‘abadekha ulebenim ’omerim lanu ‘asu, vehineh ‘abadekha mukim vekhatat ‘amekha.
wy1mr nrpym 1tm nrpym 8l kn 1tm 1mrym nlkh nzbHh lyhwh and he said, ye are idle, ye are idle: therefore ye say, let us go and do butcher to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayomer nirpim ’atem nirpim, ‘al ken ’atem ’omerim nelekhah nizbekhah yhvh.
w8th lkw 8bdw wtbn l1 yntn lkm wtkn lbnym ttnw go therefore now, and work; for there no straw-t-between be given you, yet ye deliver the tale of brick-l-betweens. ve‘atah lekhu ‘ibdu veteben lo yinaten lakhem, vetokhen lebenim titenu.
wyr1w STry bny ySr1l 1tm br8 l1mr l1 tgr8w mlbnykm dbr ywm bywmw and the officers of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did see that they were in bad case, after it was said, ye not minish ought from your brick-l-betweens of your daily task. vayir’u shoterei bene yisra’el ’otam bera‘ lemor, lo tigre‘u milibnekhem debar yom beyomo.
wypg8w 1t mSh w1t 1hrn nZbym lqr1tm bZ1tm m1t pr8h and they met extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, who stood in the way, as they came forth from big-house-pharaoh: vayifge‘u mosheh ve’et ’aharon nizabim liqratam, bezetam me’et par‘oh.
wy1mrw 1lhm yr1 yhwh 8lykm wySpT 1Sr hb1Stm 1t ryHnw b8yny pr8h wb8yny 8bdyw ltt Hrb bydm lhrgnw and they said unto them, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou look upon you, and decide; because ye have made our savor to be crave-abhorred in the eyes of big-house-pharaoh, and in the eyes of his workers, to put a sword in their hand to slay us. vayomeru ’alehem yere yhvh ‘alekhem veyishpot, ’asher hib’ashtem rekhenu be‘enei far‘oh ube‘enei ‘abadav latet khereb beyadam leharegenu.
wySb mSh 1l yhwh wy1mr 1dny lmh hr8th l8m hzh lmh zh SlHtny and extracted-mose returned unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and said, my lord-base, wherefore hast thou so bad entreated this with-mum-people? why is it that thou hast sent me? vayashab mosheh ’el yhvh vayomar, ’adonay lamah hare‘otah la‘am hazeh lamah zeh shelakhtani.
wm1z b1ty 1l pr8h ldbr bSmk hr8 l8m hzh whZl l1 hZlt 1t 8mk for since i came to big-house-pharaoh to speak in thy name, he hath done bad to this with-mum-people; neither hast thou delivered thy with-mum-people at all. ume’az bati ’el par‘oh ledaber bishmekha hera‘ la‘am hazeh, vehazel lo hizalta ‘amekha.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 8th tr1h 1Sr 18Sh lpr8h ky byd Hzqh ySlHm wbyd Hzqh ygrSm m1rZw then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, now thou see what i will do to big-house-pharaoh: for with a strong hand he let them go, and with a strong hand he drive them out of his land. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘atah tir’eh ’asher ’e‘eseh lefar‘oh, ki beyad khazaqah yeshalekhem ubeyad khazaqah yegareshem me’arzo.
wydbr 1lhym 1l mSh wy1mr 1lyw 1ny yhwh and towards-these-elohim spake unto extracted-mose, and said unto him, i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vaydaber ’elohim ’el mosheh, vayomer ’elav ’ani yhvh.
w1r1 1l 1brhm 1l yZHq w1l y8qb b1l Sdy wSmy yhwh l1 nwd8ty lhm and i appeared unto their-dick-abraham, unto laughter-isaac, and unto backstreet-jacob, by the name of towards-these-elohim almighty, and by my name yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was i not hand-known to them. va’era ’el ’abraham ’el yizkhaq ve’el ya‘aqob be’el shaday, ushemi yhvh lo noda‘ti lahem.
wgm hqmty 1t bryty 1tm ltt lhm 1t 1rZ kn8n 1t 1rZ mgryhm 1Sr grw bh and i have also established my covenant with them, to give them the land of mobile-trade-canaan, the land of their pilgrimage, wherein they were strangers. vegam haqimoti beriti ’itam latet lahem ’erez kena‘an, ’erez megurehem ’asher garu bah.
wgm 1ny Sm8ty 1t n1qt bny ySr1l 1Sr mZrym m8bdym 1tm w1zkr 1t bryty and i have also heard the groaning of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, whom the narrows-mizraimians keep in bondage; and i have remembered my covenant. vegam ’ani shama‘ti na’aqat benei yisra’el ’asher mizrayim ma‘abidim va’ezkor beriti.
lkn 1mr lbny ySr1l 1ny yhwh whwZ1ty 1tkm mtHt sblt mZrym whZlty 1tkm m8bdtm wg1lty 1tkm bzrw8 nTwyh wbSpTym gdlym wherefore say unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and i will bring you out from under the burdens of the narrows-mizraimians, and i will rid you out of their bondage, and i will redeem you with a stretched out arm, and with great decision-grammars: lakhen ’emor libne yisra’el ’ani yhvh vehozeti ’etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim vehizalti ’etkhem me‘abodatam, vega’alti ’etkhem bizroa‘ netuyah ubishfatim gedolim.
wlqHty 1tkm ly l8m whyyty lkm l1lhym wyd8tm ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm hmwZy1 1tkm mtHt sblwt mZrym and i will take you to me for a with-mum-people, and i will be to you a towards-these-elohim: and ye hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which bringeth you out from under the burdens of the narrows-mizraimians. velaqakhti ’etkhem li le‘am vehayiti lakhem lelohim, vida‘tem ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem hamozi ’etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim.
whb1ty 1tkm 1l h1rZ 1Sr nS1ty 1t ydy ltt 1th l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb wntty 1th lkm mwrSh 1ny yhwh and i will bring you in unto the land, concerning the which i did swear to give it to their-dick-abraham, to laughter-isaac, and to backstreet-jacob; and i will give it you for an heritage: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehebeti ’etkhem ’el ha’arez ’asher nasati latet le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob, venatati ’otah lakhem morashah ’ani yhvh.
wydbr mSh kn 1l bny ySr1l wl1 Sm8w 1l mSh mqZr rwH wm8bdh qSh and extracted-mose spake so unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and they hearkened not unto extracted-mose for anguish of breath-spirit, and for cruel bondage. vaydaber mosheh ken ’el benei yisra’el, velo shame‘u ’el mosheh miqozer ruakh ume‘abodah qashah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
b1 dbr 1l pr8h mlk mZrym wySlH 1t bny ySr1l m1rZw go in, speak unto big-house-pharaoh moloch-king of narrows-mizraim, that he let children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel go out of his land. bo daber ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim, vishalakh bene yisra’el me’arzo.
wydbr mSh lpny yhwh l1mr hn bny ySr1l l1 Sm8w 1ly w1yk ySm8ny pr8h w1ny 8rl Sptym and extracted-mose spake before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, behold, children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel have not hearkened unto me; how then big-house-pharaoh hear me, who am of foreskinned lips? vaydaber mosheh lifnei yhvh lemor, hen bene yisra’el lo shame‘u ’elay ve’ekh yishma‘eni far‘oh va’ani ‘aral sefatayim.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn wyZwm 1l bny ySr1l w1l pr8h mlk mZrym lhwZy1 1t bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, and gave them a charge unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and unto big-house-pharaoh moloch-king of narrows-mizraim, to bring children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel out of the land of narrows-mizraim. vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon vayzavem ’el benei yisra’el ve’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim, lehozi bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim.
1lh r1Sy byt 1btm bny r1wbn bkr ySr1l Hnwk wplw1 HZrwn wkrmy 1lh mSpHt r1wbn these be the heads of their fathers' daughter-houses: children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben the firstborn of saturated-towards-israel; educated-hanoch, and wonder-pallu, courtyard-hezron, and my-wine-inherityard-carmi: these be the families of buddy-see-child-reuben. ’eleh rashei bet ’abotam, benei re’uben bekhor yisra’el khanokh ufalu khezron vekharmi ’eleh mishpekhot re’uben.
wbny Sm8wn ymw1l wymyn w1hd wykyn wZHr wS1wl bn hkn8nyt 1lh mSpHt Sm8wn and children-betweens of hear-home-simeon; his-sea-towards, and righthand-jamin, and one-ohad, and prepare-jachin, and bleach-zohar, and lent-shaul child-between of a mobile-trade-canaanitish woman: these are the families of hear-home-simeon. ubenei shim‘on yemu’el veyamin ve’ohad veyakhin vezokhar vesha’ul ben hakena‘anit, ’eleh mishpekhot shim‘on.
w1lh Smwt bny lwy ltldtm grSwn wqht wmrry wSny Hyy lwy Sb8 wSlSym wm1t Snh and these are the names of children-betweens of join-levi according to their generations; drive-out-gershon, and obedient-hope-kohath, and bitter-merari: and the years of the life of join-levi were an hundred thirty and seven years. ve’eleh shemot bene levi letoledotam gereshon uqehat umerari, ushenei khayei levi sheba‘ usheloshim ume’at shanah.
bny grSwn lbny wSm8y lmSpHtm children-betweens of drive-out-gershon; to-build-my-white-libni, and my-hearing-shimi, according to their families. benei gereshon libni veshim‘i lemishpekhotam.
wbny qht 8mrm wyZhr wHbrwn w8zy1l wSny Hyy qht SlS wSlSym wm1t Snh and children-betweens of obedient-hope-kohath; people-high-amram, and aperture-izhar, and friend-joy-hebron, and goose-my-courage-towards-uzziel: and the years of the life of obedient-hope-kohath were an hundred thirty and three years. ubenei qehat ‘amram veyizhar vekhebron ve‘uzi’el, ushenei khayei qehat shalosh usheloshim ume’at shanah.
wbny mrry mHly wmwSy 1lh mSpHt hlwy ltldtm and children-betweens of bitter-merari; my-pardon-makhali and my-draw-mushi: these are the families of join-levi according to their generations. ubenei merari makhli umushi, ’eleh mishpekhot halevi letoledotam.
wyqH 8mrm 1t ywkbd ddtw lw l1Sh wtld lw 1t 1hrn w1t mSh wSny Hyy 8mrm Sb8 wSlSym wm1t Snh and people-high-amram took him made-heavy-jochebed his father's sister to woman; and she conceived-of him cabinet-aaron and extracted-mose: and the years of the life of people-high-amram were an hundred and thirty and seven years. vayiqakh ‘amram yokhebed dodato lo le’ishah vateled lo ’aharon ve’et mosheh, ushenei khayei ‘amram sheba‘ usheloshim ume’at shanah.
wbny yZhr qrH wnpg wzkry and children-betweens of aperture-izhar; bald-ice-korah, and expired-nepheg, and my-rememberer-zichri. ubenei yizhar, qorakh vanefeg vezikhri.
wbny 8zy1l myS1l w1lZpn wstry and children-betweens of goose-my-courage-towards-uzziel; towards-poll-mishael, and towards-cipher-elzaphan, and my-secret-zithri. ubenei ‘uzi’el, misha’el ve’elzafan vesitri.
wyqH 1hrn 1t 1lySb8 bt 8myndb 1Hwt nHSwn lw l1Sh wtld lw 1t ndb w1t 1byhw1 1t 1l8zr w1t 1ytmr and cabinet-aaron took him my-towards-seven-elisheba, daughter-hoof-bat-child of my-people-contribute-aminadab, sister of guess-snake-naashon, to woman; and she conceived-of him volunteer-nadab, and he-my-pa-abihu, towards-stop-eleazar, and with-palm-itamar. vayiqakh ’aharon ’elisheba‘ bat ‘aminadab ’akhot nakhshon lo le’ishah, vateled lo nadab ve’et ’abihu ’el‘azar ve’et ’itamar.
wbny qrH 1syr w1lqnh w1by1sp 1lh mSpHt hqrHy and children-betweens of bald-ice-korah; prisoner-assir, and towards-buy-elkanah, and my-father-collects-abiasaph: these are the families of the bald-ice-korhites. ubenei qorakh ’asir ve’elqanah va’abi’asaf, ’eleh mishpekhot haqarekhi.
w1l8zr bn 1hrn lqH lw mbnwt pwTy1l lw l1Sh wtld lw 1t pynHs 1lh r1Sy 1bwt hlwym lmSpHtm and towards-stop-eleazar cabinet-aaron's child-between took him one of children-betweenesss of my-open-towards-putiel to woman; and she conceived-of him mouth-attempt-pinehas: these are the heads of the fathers of the join-levites according to their families. ve’el‘azar ben ’aharon laqakh lo mibenot puti’el lo le’ishah vateled lo pinekhas, ’eleh rashei ’abot halviyim lemishpekhotam.
hw1 1hrn wmSh 1Sr 1mr yhwh lhm hwZy1w 1t bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym 8l Zb1tm these are that cabinet-aaron and extracted-mose, to whom yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said, bring out children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from the land of narrows-mizraim according to their troop-clusters. hu ’aharon umosheh, ’asher ’amar yhvh lahem hozi’u benei yisra’el me’erez mizrayim ‘al zib’otam.
hm hmdbrym 1l pr8h mlk mZrym lhwZy1 1t bny ySr1l mmZrym hw1 mSh w1hrn these are they which spake to big-house-pharaoh moloch-king of narrows-mizraim, to bring out children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from narrows-mizraim: these are that extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron. hem hamdaberim ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim lehozi bene yisra’el mimizrayim, hu mosheh ve’aharon.
wyhy bywm dbr yhwh 1l mSh b1rZ mZrym and it came to pass on the day when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose in the land of narrows-mizraim, vayhi beyom diber yhvh ’el mosheh be’erez mizrayim.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr 1ny yhwh dbr 1l pr8h mlk mZrym 1t kl 1Sr 1ny dbr 1lyk that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: speak thou unto big-house-pharaoh moloch-king of narrows-mizraim all that i say unto thee. vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor ’ani yhvh, daber ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim kal ’asher ’ani dober ’elekha.
wy1mr mSh lpny yhwh hn 1ny 8rl Sptym w1yk ySm8 1ly pr8h and extracted-mose said before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, behold, i am of foreskinned lips, and how big-house-pharaoh hearken unto me? vayomer mosheh lifnei yhvh, hen ’ani ‘aral sefatayim ve’ekh yishma‘ ’elay par‘oh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh r1h nttyk 1lhym lpr8h w1hrn 1Hyk yhyh nby1k and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, see, i have made thee a towards-these-elohim to big-house-pharaoh: and cabinet-aaron thy brother be thy bringer. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh re’eh netatikha ’elohim lefar‘oh, ve’aharon ’akhikha yihyeh nebi’ekha.
1th tdbr 1t kl 1Sr 1Zwk w1hrn 1Hyk ydbr 1l pr8h wSlH 1t bny ySr1l m1rZw thou speak all that i order-prescribe thee: and cabinet-aaron thy brother speak unto big-house-pharaoh, that he send children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel out of his land. ’atah tedaber kal ’asher ’azaveka, ve’aharon ’akhikha yedaber ’el par‘oh veshilakh bene yisra’el me’arzo.
w1ny 1qSh 1t lb pr8h whrbyty 1t 1tty w1t mwpty b1rZ mZrym and i will harden big-house-pharaoh's heart, and multiply my signs and my wonders in the land of narrows-mizraim. va’ani ’aqsheh leb par‘oh, vehirbeti ’ototay ve’et moftay be’erez mizrayim.
wl1 ySm8 1lkm pr8h wntty 1t ydy bmZrym whwZ1ty 1t Zb1ty 1t 8my bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym bSpTym gdlym and big-house-pharaoh not hearken unto you, that i may lay my hand upon narrows-mizraim, and bring forth mine troop-clusters, and my with-mum-people children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, out of the land of narrows-mizraim by great decision-grammars. velo yishma‘ ’alekhem par‘oh venatati yadi bemizrayim, vehozeti zib’otay ‘ami bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim bishfatim gedolim.
wyd8w mZrym ky 1ny yhwh bnTty 1t ydy 8l mZrym whwZ1ty 1t bny ySr1l mtwkm and the narrows-mizraimians hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, when i stretch forth mine hand upon narrows-mizraim, and bring out children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from inward them. veyade‘u mizrayim ki ’ani yhvh bintoti ’et yadi ‘al mizrayim, vehozeti bene yisra’el mitokham.
wy8S mSh w1hrn k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tm kn 8Sw and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed them, so did they. vaya‘as mosheh ve’aharon, ka’asher zivah yhvh ’otam ken ‘asu.
wmSh bn Smnym Snh w1hrn bn SlS wSmnym Snh bdbrm 1l pr8h and extracted-mose was fourscore years old, and cabinet-aaron fourscore and three years old, when they spake unto big-house-pharaoh. umosheh ben shemonim shanah ve’aharon ben shalosh ushemonim shanah, bedaberam ’el par‘oh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
ky ydbr 1lkm pr8h l1mr tnw lkm mwpt w1mrt 1l 1hrn qH 1t mTk whSlk lpny pr8h yhy ltnyn when big-house-pharaoh speak unto you, saying, show a miracle for you: then thou say unto cabinet-aaron, take thy pen, and cast it before-turns big-house-pharaoh, and it become a serpent. ki yedaber ’alekhem par‘oh lemor tenu lakhem mofet, ve’amarta ’el ’aharon qakh matekha vehashlekh lifne far‘oh yehi letanin.
wyb1 mSh w1hrn 1l pr8h wy8Sw kn k1Sr Zwh yhwh wySlk 1hrn 1t mThw lpny pr8h wlpny 8bdyw wyhy ltnyn and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron went in unto big-house-pharaoh, and they did so as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed: and cabinet-aaron cast down his pen before-turns big-house-pharaoh, and before-turns his workers, and it became a serpent. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el par‘oh vaya‘asu khen ka’asher zivah yhvh, vayashlekh ’aharon matehu lifnei far‘oh velifnei ‘abadav vayhi letanin.
wyqr1 gm pr8h lHkmym wlmkSpym wy8Sw gm hm HrTmy mZrym blhTyhm kn then big-house-pharaoh also called the wise men and the sorcerers: now the magicians of narrows-mizraim, they also did in like manner with their enchantments. vayiqra gam par‘oh lakhakhamim velamkhashefim, vaya‘asu gam hem khartumei mizrayim belahatehem ken.
wySlykw 1yS mThw wyhyw ltnynm wybl8 mTh 1hrn 1t mTtm for they cast down every man his pen, and they became serpents: and cabinet-aaron's pen swallowed up their pens. vayashlikhu ’ish matehu vayihyu letaninim, vayibla‘ mateh ’aharon matotam.
wyHzq lb pr8h wl1 Sm8 1lhm k1Sr dbr yhwh and he hardened big-house-pharaoh's heart, that he hearkened not unto them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said. vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem, ka’asher diber yhvh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh kbd lb pr8h m1n lSlH h8m and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, big-house-pharaoh's heart is hardened, he refuseth to let the with-mum-people go. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh kabed leb par‘oh, me’en leshalakh ha‘am.
lk 1l pr8h bbqr hnh yZ1 hmymh wnZbt lqr1tw 8l Spt hy1r whmTh 1Sr nhpk lnHS tqH bydk get thee unto big-house-pharaoh in the morning; lo, he goeth out unto the from-waters; and thou stand by the river's brink against he come; and the pen which was turned to a serpent thou take in thine hand. lekh ’el par‘oh baboqer hineh yozei hamaymah venizabta liqrato ‘al sefat hay’or, vehamateh ’asher nehpakh lenakhash tiqakh beyadekha.
w1mrt 1lyw yhwh 1lhy h8brym SlHny 1lyk l1mr SlH 1t 8my wy8bdny bmdbr whnh l1 Sm8t 8d kh and thou say unto him, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of the cross-over-hebrews hath sent me unto thee, saying, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me in the place-of-word-desert: and, behold, hitherto thou wouldest not hear. ve’amarta ’elav yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim shelakhani ’elekha lemor shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni bamidbar, vehineh lo shama‘ta ‘ad koh.
kh 1mr yhwh bz1t td8 ky 1ny yhwh hnh 1nky mkh bmTh 1Sr bydy 8l hmym 1Sr by1r wnhpkw ldm thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, in this thou hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: behold, i will hit with the pen that is in mine hand upon the from-waters which are in the river, and they be turned to blood. koh ’amar yhvh bezot teda‘ ki ’ani yhvh, hineh ’anokhi makeh bamateh ’asher beyadi hamayim ’asher bay’or venehefkhu ledam.
whdgh 1Sr by1r tmwt wb1S hy1r wnl1w mZrym lStwt mym mn hy1r and the fish that is in the river die, and the river stink; and the narrows-mizraimians loathe to drink of the from-waters of the river. vehadagah ’asher bay’or tamut uba’ash hay’or, venil’u mizrayim lishtot mayim min hay’or.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1mr 1l 1hrn qH mTk wnTh ydk 8l mymy mZrym 8l nhrtm 8l y1ryhm w8l 1gmyhm w8l kl mqwh mymyhm wyhyw dm whyh dm bkl 1rZ mZrym wb8Zym wb1bnym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, say unto cabinet-aaron, take thy pen, and stretch out thine hand upon the from-waters of narrows-mizraim, upon their streams, upon their rivers, and upon their ponds, and upon all their pools of from-waters, that they may become blood; and that there may be blood throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim, both in tools of wood, and in tools of father-child-stone. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el ’aharon qakh matekha uneteh yadekha ‘al memei mizrayim ‘al naharotam ‘al ye’orehem ve‘al ’agmehem ve‘al kal miqveh memehem veyihyu dam, vehayah dam bekhal ’erez mizrayim uba‘ezim uba’abanim.
wy8Sw kn mSh w1hrn k1Sr Zwh yhwh wyrm bmTh wyk 1t hmym 1Sr by1r l8yny pr8h wl8yny 8bdyw wyhpkw kl hmym 1Sr by1r ldm and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron did so, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed; and he lifted up the pen, and smote the from-waters that were in the river, in the sight of big-house-pharaoh, and in the sight of his workers; and all the from-waters that were in the river were turned to blood. vaya‘asu khen mosheh ve’aharon ka’asher zivah yhvh vayarem bamateh vayakh hamayim ’asher bay’or le‘enei far‘oh ule‘enei ‘abadav, vayehafekhu kal hamayim ’asher bay’or ledam.
whdgh 1Sr by1r mth wyb1S hy1r wl1 yklw mZrym lStwt mym mn hy1r wyhy hdm bkl 1rZ mZrym and the fish that was in the river died; and the river stank, and the narrows-mizraimians could not drink of the from-waters of the river; and there was blood throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim. vehadagah ’asher bay’or metah vayib’ash hay’or velo yakhelu mizrayim lishtot mayim min hay’or, vayhi hadam bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wy8Sw kn HrTmy mZrym blTyhm wyHzq lb pr8h wl1 Sm8 1lhm k1Sr dbr yhwh and the magicians of narrows-mizraim did so with their enchantments: and big-house-pharaoh's heart was hardened, neither did he hearken unto them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said. vaya‘asu khen khartumei mizrayim belatehem, vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem ka’asher diber yhvh.
wypn pr8h wyb1 1l bytw wl1 St lbw gm lz1t and big-house-pharaoh turned and went into his daughter-house, neither did he set his heart to this also. vayifen par‘oh vayabo ’el beto, velo shat libo gam lazot.
wyHprw kl mZrym sbybt hy1r mym lStwt ky l1 yklw lStt mmymy hy1r and all the narrows-mizraimians digged round about the river for from-waters to drink; for they could not drink of the from-waters of the river. vayakhperu khal mizrayim sebibot hay’or mayim lishtot, ki lo yakhelu lishtot mimemei hay’or.
wyml1 Sb8t ymym 1Hry hkwt yhwh 1t hy1r and seven days were fulfilled, after that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had smitten the river. vayimalei shib‘at yamim, ’akharei hakot yhvh hay’or.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh b1 1l pr8h w1mrt 1lyw kh 1mr yhwh SlH 1t 8my wy8bdny and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, go unto big-house-pharaoh, and say unto him, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh bo ’el par‘oh, ve’amarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
w1m m1n 1th lSlH hnh 1nky ngp 1t kl gbwlk bZprd8ym and if thou refuse to let them go, behold, i will hit all thy borders with frogs: ve’im ma’en ’atah leshaleakh, hineh ’anokhi nogef kal gebulekha bazfarde‘im.
wSrZ hy1r Zprd8ym w8lw wb1w bbytk wbHdr mSkbk w8l mTtk wbbyt 8bdyk wb8mk wbtnwryk wbmS1rwtyk and the river bring forth frogs abundantly, which go up and come into thine daughter-house, and into thy bedchamber, and upon thy bed, and into the daughter-house of thy workers, and upon thy with-mum-people, and into thine ovens, and into thy kneadingtroughs: vesharaz hay’or zefarde‘im ve‘alu uba’u bebetekha ubakhadar mishkabekha ve‘al mitatekha, ubebet ‘abadekha ube‘amekha ubetanurekha ubemish’arotekha.
wbkh wb8mk wbkl 8bdyk y8lw hZprd8ym and the frogs come up both on thee, and upon thy with-mum-people, and upon all thy workers. ubekhah ube‘amekha ubekhal ‘abadekha, ya‘alu hazfarde‘im.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1mr 1l 1hrn nTh 1t ydk bmTk 8l hnhrt 8l hy1rym w8l h1gmym wh8l 1t hZprd8ym 8l 1rZ mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, say unto cabinet-aaron, stretch forth thine hand with thy pen over the streams, over the rivers, and over the ponds, and cause frogs to come up upon the land of narrows-mizraim. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el ’aharon neteh yadekha bematekha ‘al haneharot ‘al hay’orim ve‘al ha’agamim, veha‘al hazfarde‘im ‘al ’erez mizrayim.
wyT 1hrn 1t ydw 8l mymy mZrym wt8l hZprd8 wtks 1t 1rZ mZrym and cabinet-aaron stretched out his hand over the from-waters of narrows-mizraim; and the frogs came up, and covered the land of narrows-mizraim. vayet ’aharon yado ‘al memei mizrayim, vata‘al hazefardea‘ vatekhas ’erez mizrayim.
wy8Sw kn hHrTmym blTyhm wy8lw 1t hZprd8ym 8l 1rZ mZrym and the magicians did so with their enchantments, and brought up frogs upon the land of narrows-mizraim. vaya‘asu khen hakhartumim belatehem, vaya‘alu hazfarde‘im ‘al ’erez mizrayim.
wyqr1 pr8h lmSh wl1hrn wy1mr h8tyrw 1l yhwh wysr hZprd8ym mmny wm8my w1SlHh 1t h8m wyzbHw lyhwh then big-house-pharaoh called for extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, and said, entreat yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, that he may take away the frogs from me, and from my with-mum-people; and i will let the with-mum-people go, that they may do butcher unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayiqra far‘oh lemosheh ule’aharon vayomer ha‘tiru yhvh veyaser hazfarde‘im mimeni ume‘ami, va’ashalekhah ha‘am veyizbekhu yhvh.
wy1mr mSh lpr8h htp1r 8ly lmty 18tyr lk wl8bdyk wl8mk lhkryt hZprd8ym mmk wmbtyk rq by1r tS1rnh and extracted-mose said unto big-house-pharaoh, heaviness over me: when i entreat for thee, and for thy workers, and for thy with-mum-people, to destroy the frogs from thee and thy daughter-houses, that they may remain in the river only? vayomer mosheh lefar‘oh hitpa’er ‘alay lematay ’a‘tir lekha vela‘abadekha ule‘amekha lehakhrit hazafarde‘im mimekha umibatekha, raq bay’or tisha’arnah.
wy1mr lmHr wy1mr kdbrk lm8n td8 ky 1yn kyhwh 1lhynw and he said, to morrow. and he said, be it according to thy bee-word: that thou mayest hand-know that there is none like unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim. vayomer lemakhar, vayomer kidbarekha lema‘an teda‘ ki ’en yhvh ’elohenu.
wsrw hZprd8ym mmk wmbtyk wm8bdyk wm8mk rq by1r tS1rnh and the frogs depart from thee, and from thy daughter-houses, and from thy workers, and from thy with-mum-people; they remain in the river only. vesaru hazfarde‘im mimekha umibatekha ume‘abadekha ume‘amekha, raq bay’or tisha’arnah.
wyZ1 mSh w1hrn m8m pr8h wyZ8q mSh 1l yhwh 8l dbr hZprd8ym 1Sr Sm lpr8h and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron went out from big-house-pharaoh: and extracted-mose cried unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou because of the frogs which he had brought against big-house-pharaoh. vayezei mosheh ve’aharon me‘im par‘oh, vayiz‘aq mosheh ’el yhvh debar hazfarde‘im ’asher sam lefar‘oh.
wy8S yhwh kdbr mSh wymtw hZprd8ym mn hbtym mn hHZrt wmn hSdt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did according to the bee-word of extracted-mose; and the frogs died out of the daughter-houses, out of the villages, and out of the fields. vaya‘as yhvh kidbar mosheh, vayamutu hazfarde‘im min habatim min hakhazerot umin hasadot.
wyZbrw 1tm Hmrm Hmrm wtb1S h1rZ and they added them together upon heaps: and the land stank. vayizberu ’otam khomarim khomarim, vatib’ash ha’arez.
wyr1 pr8h ky hyth hrwHh whkbd 1t lbw wl1 Sm8 1lhm k1Sr dbr yhwh and when big-house-pharaoh saw that there was respite, he hardened his heart, and hearkened not unto them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said. vayar par‘oh ki hayetah harevakhah vehakhbed libo velo shama‘ ’alehem, ka’asher diber yhvh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1mr 1l 1hrn nTh 1t mTk whk 1t 8pr h1rZ whyh lknm bkl 1rZ mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, say unto cabinet-aaron, stretch out thy pen, and hit the dust of the land, that it may become lice throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el ’aharon neteh matekha vehakh ‘afar ha’arez, vehayah lekhinim bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wy8Sw kn wyT 1hrn 1t ydw bmThw wyk 1t 8pr h1rZ wthy hknm b1dm wbbhmh kl 8pr h1rZ hyh knym bkl 1rZ mZrym and they did so; for cabinet-aaron stretched out his hand with his pen, and smote the dust of the earth, and it became lice in man, and in beast; all the dust of the land became lice throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim. vaya‘asu khen vayet ’aharon yado bematehu vayakh ‘afar ha’arez vatehi hakinam ba’adam ubabehemah, kal ‘afar ha’arez hayah khinim bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wy8Sw kn hHrTmym blTyhm lhwZy1 1t hknym wl1 yklw wthy hknm b1dm wbbhmh and the magicians did so with their enchantments to bring forth lice, and they could not: so there were lice upon man, and upon beast. vaya‘asu khen hakhartumim belatehem lehozi hakinim velo yakholu, vatehi hakinam ba’adam ubabehemah.
wy1mrw hHrTmym 1l pr8h 1Zb8 1lhym hw1 wyHzq lb pr8h wl1 Sm8 1lhm k1Sr dbr yhwh then the magicians said unto big-house-pharaoh, this is the finger of towards-these-elohim: and big-house-pharaoh's heart was hardened, and he hearkened not unto them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said. vayomeru hakhartumim ’el par‘oh ’ezba‘ ’elohim hi vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem ka’asher diber yhvh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hSkm bbqr whtyZb lpny pr8h hnh ywZ1 hmymh w1mrt 1lyw kh 1mr yhwh SlH 8my wy8bdny and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, rise up early in the morning, and stand before-turns big-house-pharaoh; lo, he cometh forth to the from-waters; and say unto him, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far‘oh hineh yozei hamayemah, ve’amarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky 1m 1ynk mSlH 1t 8my hnny mSlyH bk wb8bdyk wb8mk wbbtyk 1t h8rb wml1w bty mZrym 1t h8rb wgm h1dmh 1Sr hm 8lyh else, if thou wilt not let my with-mum-people go, behold, i will send swarms of flies upon thee, and upon thy workers, and upon thy with-mum-people, and into thy daughter-houses: and the daughter-houses of the narrows-mizraimians be full of swarms of flies, and also the ground whereon they are. ki ’im ’enekha meshaleakh ‘ami hini mashliakh bekha uba‘abadekha ube‘amekha ubebatekha he‘arob, umale’u batei mizrayim ’et he‘arob vegam ha’adamah ’asher hem.
whplyty bywm hhw1 1t 1rZ gSn 1Sr 8my 8md 8lyh lblty hywt Sm 8rb lm8n td8 ky 1ny yhwh bqrb h1rZ and i will sever in that day the land of rain-goshen, in which my with-mum-people dwell, that no swarms of flies be there; to the end thou mayest hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in the midst of the earth. vehifleti bayom hahu ’erez goshen ’asher ‘ami ‘omed ‘aleha lebilti heyot sham ‘arob, lema‘an teda‘ ki ’ani yhvh beqereb ha’arez.
wSmty pdt byn 8my wbyn 8mk lmHr yhyh h1t hzh and i will put a division between-bin my with-mum-people and thy with-mum-people: to morrow this sign be. vesamti fedut ben ‘ami uben ‘amekha, lemakhar yihyeh ha’ot hazeh.
wy8S yhwh kn wyb1 8rb kbd byth pr8h wbyt 8bdyw wbkl 1rZ mZrym tSHt h1rZ mpny h8rb and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did so; and there came a grievous swarm of flies into the daughter-house of big-house-pharaoh, and into his workers' daughter-houses, and into all the land of narrows-mizraim: the land was corrupted by reason of the swarm of flies. vaya‘as yhvh ken vayabo ‘arob kabed betah far‘oh ubet ‘abadav, ubekhal ’erez mizrayim tishakhet ha’arez mipenei he‘arob.
wyqr1 pr8h 1l mSh wl1hrn wy1mr lkw zbHw l1lhykm b1rZ and big-house-pharaoh called for extracted-mose and for cabinet-aaron, and said, go ye, butcher to your towards-these-elohim in the land. vayiqra far‘oh ’el mosheh ule’aharon, vayomer lekhu zibkhu lelohekhem ba’arez.
wy1mr mSh l1 nkwn l8Swt kn ky tw8bt mZrym nzbH lyhwh 1lhynw hn nzbH 1t tw8bt mZrym l8ynyhm wl1 ysqlnw and extracted-mose said, it is not until-witness so to do; for we butcher the abomination of the narrows-mizraimians to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim: lo, we butcher the abomination of the narrows-mizraimians before-turns their eyes, and will they not father-child-stone us? vayomer mosheh lo nakhon la‘asot ken ki to‘abat mizrayim nizbakh yhvh ’elohenu, hen nizbakh to‘abat mizrayim le‘enehem velo yisqelunu.
drk SlSt ymym nlk bmdbr wzbHnw lyhwh 1lhynw k1Sr y1mr 1lynw we will go three days' journey into the place-of-word-desert, and butcher to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim, as he order-prescribe us. derekh sheloshet yamim nelekh bamidbar, vezabakhnu yhvh ’elohenu ka’asher yomar ’elenu.
wy1mr pr8h 1nky 1SlH 1tkm wzbHtm lyhwh 1lhykm bmdbr rq hrHq l1 trHyqw llkt h8tyrw b8dy and big-house-pharaoh said, i will let you go, that ye may butcher to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim in the place-of-word-desert; only ye not go very far away: entreat for me. vayomer par‘oh ’anokhi ’ashalakh ’etkhem uzebakhtem yhvh ’elohekhem bamidbar raq harkheq lo tarkhiqu lalekhet, ha‘tiru ba‘adi.
wy1mr mSh hnh 1nky ywZ1 m8mk wh8trty 1l yhwh wsr h8rb mpr8h m8bdyw wm8mw mHr rq 1l ysp pr8h htl lblty SlH 1t h8m lzbH lyhwh and extracted-mose said, behold, i go out from thee, and i will entreat yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou that the swarms of flies may depart from big-house-pharaoh, from his workers, and from his with-mum-people, to morrow: and let not big-house-pharaoh deal deceitfully any more in not letting the with-mum-people go to butcher to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayomer mosheh hineh ’anokhi yozei me‘imakh veha‘tarti yhvh vesar he‘arob mipar‘oh me‘abadav ume‘amo makhar, raq ’al yosef par‘oh hatel lebilti shalakh ha‘am lizboakh yhvh.
wyZ1 mSh m8m pr8h wy8tr 1l yhwh and extracted-mose went out from big-house-pharaoh, and entreated yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayezei mosheh me‘im par‘oh, vaye‘tar ’el yhvh.
wy8S yhwh kdbr mSh wysr h8rb mpr8h m8bdyw wm8mw l1 nS1r 1Hd and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did according to the bee-word of extracted-mose; and he removed the swarms of flies from big-house-pharaoh, from his workers, and from his with-mum-people; there remained not one. vaya‘as yhvh kidbar mosheh vayasar he‘arob mipar‘oh me‘abadav ume‘amo, lo nish’ar ’ekhad.
wykbd pr8h 1t lbw gm bp8m hz1t wl1 SlH 1t h8m and big-house-pharaoh hardened his heart at this time also, neither would he let the with-mum-people go. vayakhbed par‘oh libo gam bapa‘am hazot, velo shilakh ha‘am.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh b1 1l pr8h wdbrt 1lyw kh 1mr yhwh 1lhy h8brym SlH 1t 8my wy8bdny then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, go in unto big-house-pharaoh, and tell him, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of the cross-over-hebrews, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh bo ’el par‘oh, vedibarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky 1m m1n 1th lSlH w8wdk mHzyq bm for if thou refuse to let them go, and wilt hold them still, ki ’im ma’en ’atah leshaleakh, ve‘odkha makhaziq bam.
hnh yd yhwh hwyh bmqnk 1Sr bSdh bswsym bHmrym bgmlym bbqr wbZ1n dbr kbd m1d behold, the hand of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is upon thy in-them-animal which is in the field, upon the horses, upon the asses, upon the ripen-camels, upon the wall-oxen, and upon the sheep: there be a very grievous murrain. hineh yad yhvh hoyah bemiqnekha basadeh basusim bakhamorim bagemalim babaqar ubazon, deber kabed me’od.
whplh yhwh byn mqnh ySr1l wbyn mqnh mZrym wl1 ymwt mkl lbny ySr1l dbr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sever between-bin the in-them-animal of saturated-towards-israel and the in-them-animal of narrows-mizraim: and there nothing die of all that is children-betweens's of saturated-towards-israel. vehiflah yhvh ben miqneh yisra’el uben miqneh mizrayim, velo yamut mikal libnei yisra’el.
wySm yhwh mw8d l1mr mHr y8Sh yhwh hdbr hzh b1rZ and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appointed a set time, saying, to morrow yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do this thing in the land. vayasem yhvh mo‘ed lemor, makhar ya‘aseh yhvh hadabar hazeh ba’arez.
wy8S yhwh 1t hdbr hzh mmHrt wymt kl mqnh mZrym wmmqnh bny ySr1l l1 mt 1Hd and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did that thing on the morrow, and all the in-them-animal of narrows-mizraim died: and of the in-them-animal of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel died not one. vaya‘as yhvh hadabar hazeh mimakhorat vayamat kol miqneh mizrayim, umimiqneh bene yisra’el lo met ’ekhad.
wySlH pr8h whnh l1 mt mmqnh ySr1l 8d 1Hd wykbd lb pr8h wl1 SlH 1t h8m and big-house-pharaoh sent, and, behold, there was not one of the in-them-animal of the saturated-towards-israelites dead. and the heart of big-house-pharaoh was hardened, and he did not let the with-mum-people go. vayishlakh par‘oh vehineh lo met mimiqneh yisra’el ’ekhad, vayikhbad leb par‘oh velo shilakh ha‘am.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn qHw lkm ml1 Hpnykm pyH kbSn wzrqw mSh hSmymh l8yny pr8h and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, take to you handfuls of ashes of the furnace, and let extracted-mose sprinkle it toward the namespaces in the sight of big-house-pharaoh. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon qekhu lakhem khafenekhem piakh kibshan, uzeraqo mosheh hashamaymah le‘enei far‘oh.
whyh l1bq 8l kl 1rZ mZrym whyh 8l h1dm w8l hbhmh lSHyn prH 1b8b8t bkl 1rZ mZrym and it become small dust in all the land of narrows-mizraim, and be a grace-boil breaking forth with blains upon man, and upon beast, throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim. vehayah le’abaq ‘al kal ’erez mizrayim, vehayah ‘al ha’adam ve‘al habehemah lishkhin poreakh ’aba‘bu‘ot bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wyqHw 1t pyH hkbSn wy8mdw lpny pr8h wyzrq 1tw mSh hSmymh wyhy SHyn 1b8b8t prH b1dm wbbhmh and they took ashes of the furnace, and stood before-turns big-house-pharaoh; and extracted-mose sprinkled it up toward namespaces; and it became a grace-boil breaking forth with blains upon man, and upon beast. vayiqkhu piakh hakibshan vaya‘amdu lifnei far‘oh vayizroq ’oto mosheh hashamayemah, vayhi shekhin ’aba‘bu‘ot poreakh ba’adam ubabehemah.
wl1 yklw hHrTmym l8md lpny mSh mpny hSHyn ky hyh hSHyn bHrTmm wbkl mZrym and the magicians could not stand before-turns extracted-mose because of the grace-boils; for the grace-boil was upon the magicians, and upon all the narrows-mizraimians. velo yakhelu hakhartumim la‘amod lifnei mosheh mipenei hashekhin, ki hayah hashekhin bakhartumim ubekhal mizrayim.
wyHzq yhwh 1t lb pr8h wl1 Sm8 1lhm k1Sr dbr yhwh 1l mSh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hardened the heart of big-house-pharaoh, and he hearkened not unto them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had bee-spoken unto extracted-mose. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem, ka’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hSkm bbqr whtyZb lpny pr8h w1mrt 1lyw kh 1mr yhwh 1lhy h8brym SlH 1t 8my wy8bdny and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, rise up early in the morning, and stand before-turns big-house-pharaoh, and say unto him, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of the cross-over-hebrews, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far‘oh, ve’amarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky bp8m hz1t 1ny SlH 1t kl mgpty 1l lbk wb8bdyk wb8mk b8bwr td8 ky 1yn kmny bkl h1rZ for i will at this time send all my plagues upon thine heart, and upon thy workers, and upon thy with-mum-people; that thou mayest hand-know that there is none like me in all the earth. ki bapa‘am hazot ’ani sholeakh kal magefotay ’el libekha uba‘abadekha ube‘amekha, ba‘abur teda‘ ki ’en kamoni bekhal ha’arez.
ky 8th SlHty 1t ydy w1k 1wtk w1t 8mk bdbr wtkHd mn h1rZ for now i will stretch out my hand, that i may hit thee and thy with-mum-people with pestilence; and thou be cut off from the earth. ki ‘atah shalakhti yadi va’akh ’otkha ve’et ‘amekha badaber, vatikakhed min ha’arez.
w1wlm b8bwr z1t h8mdtyk b8bwr hr1tk 1t kHy wlm8n spr Smy bkl h1rZ and in very deed for this cause have i raised thee up, for to show in thee my dynamic; and that my name may be declared throughout all the earth. ve’ulam ba‘abur zot he‘emadtikha ba‘abur har’otekha kokhi, ulema‘an saper shemi bekhal ha’arez.
8wdk mstwll b8my lblty SlHm as yet exaltest thou thyself against my with-mum-people, that thou wilt not let them go? ‘odkha mistolel be‘ami, lebilti shalekham.
hnny mmTyr k8t mHr brd kbd m1d 1Sr l1 hyh kmhw bmZrym lmn hywm hwsdh w8d 8th behold, to morrow about this time i will cause it to rain a very grievous hail, such as hath not been in narrows-mizraim since the foundation thereof even until now. hini mamtir ka‘et makhar barad kabed me’od, ’asher lo hayah bemizrayim lemin hivasedah ve‘ad ‘atah.
w8th SlH h8z 1t mqnk w1t kl 1Sr lk bSdh kl h1dm whbhmh 1Sr ymZ1 bSdh wl1 y1sp hbyth wyrd 8lhm hbrd wmtw send therefore now, and gather thy in-them-animal, and all that thou hast in the field; for upon every man and beast which be found in the field, and not be brought home, the hail come down upon them, and they die. ve‘atah shelakh ha‘ez miqnekha ve’et kal ’asher lekha basadeh, kal ha’adam vehabehemah ’asher yimazei basadeh velo ye’asef habaytah veyarad ‘alehem habarad vametu.
hyr1 1t dbr yhwh m8bdy pr8h hnys 1t 8bdyw w1t mqnhw 1l hbtym he that feared the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou among the workers of big-house-pharaoh made his workers and his in-them-animal flee into the daughter-houses: hayarei debar yhvh me‘abdei par‘oh, henis ‘abadav ve’et miqnehu ’el habatim.
w1Sr l1 Sm lbw 1l dbr yhwh wy8zb 1t 8bdyw w1t mqnhw bSdh and he that regarded not the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou left his workers and his in-them-animal in the field. va’asher lo libo debar yhvh, vaya‘azob ‘abadav ve’et miqnehu basadeh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh nTh 1t ydk 8l hSmym wyhy brd bkl 1rZ mZrym 8l h1dm w8l hbhmh w8l kl 8Sb hSdh b1rZ mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, stretch forth thine hand toward namespaces, that there may be hail in all the land of narrows-mizraim, upon man, and upon beast, and upon every herb of the field, throughout the land of narrows-mizraim. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al hashamayim vihi barad bekhal ’erez mizrayim, ‘al ha’adam ve‘al habehemah ve‘al kal ‘eseb hasadeh be’erez mizrayim.
wyT mSh 1t mThw 8l hSmym wyhwh ntn qlt wbrd wthlk 1S 1rZh wymTr yhwh brd 8l 1rZ mZrym and extracted-mose stretched forth his pen toward namespaces: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sent thunder and hail, and the fire ran along upon the ground; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou rained hail upon the land of narrows-mizraim. vayet mosheh matehu ‘al hashamayim yhvh natan qolot ubarad vatihalakh ’esh ’arezah, vayamter yhvh barad ‘al ’erez mizrayim.
wyhy brd w1S mtlqHt btwk hbrd kbd m1d 1Sr l1 hyh kmhw bkl 1rZ mZrym m1z hyth lgwy so there was hail, and fire mingled with the hail, very grievous, such as there was none like it in all the land of narrows-mizraim since it became a nation. vayhi barad ve’esh mitlaqakhat betokh habarad, kabed me’od ’asher lo hayah khamohu bekhal ’erez mizrayim me’az hayetah lego.
wyk hbrd bkl 1rZ mZrym 1t kl 1Sr bSdh m1dm w8d bhmh w1t kl 8Sb hSdh hkh hbrd w1t kl 8Z hSdh Sbr and the hail smote throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim all that was in the field, both man and beast; and the hail smote every herb of the field, and brake every tree of the field. vayakh habarad bekhal ’erez mizrayim kal ’asher basadeh me’adam ve‘ad behemah, ve’et kal ‘eseb hasadeh hikah habarad ve’et kal ‘ez hasadeh shiber.
rq b1rZ gSn 1Sr Sm bny ySr1l l1 hyh brd only in the land of rain-goshen, where children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel were, was there no hail. raq be’erez goshen ’asher sham benei yisra’el, lo hayah barad.
wySlH pr8h wyqr1 lmSh wl1hrn wy1mr 1lhm HT1ty hp8m yhwh hZdyq w1ny w8my hrS8ym and big-house-pharaoh sent, and called for extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, and said unto them, i have missed this time: yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is just, and i and my with-mum-people are wicked. vayishlakh par‘oh vayiqra lemosheh ule’aharon vayomer ’alehem khatati hapa‘am, yhvh hazadiq va’ani ve‘ami haresha‘im.
h8tyrw 1l yhwh wrb mhyt qlt 1lhym wbrd w1SlHh 1tkm wl1 tspwn l8md entreat yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou (for it is enough) that there be no more mighty thunderings and hail; and i will let you go, and ye stay no longer. ha‘tiru yhvh verab mihyot qolot ’elohim ubarad, va’ashalekhah ’etkhem velo tosifun la‘amod.
wy1mr 1lyw mSh kZ1ty 1t h8yr 1prS 1t kpy 1l yhwh hqlwt yHdlwn whbrd l1 yhyh 8wd lm8n td8 ky lyhwh h1rZ and extracted-mose said unto him, as soon as i am gone out of the light-city, i will spread abroad my hands unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and the thunder cease, neither there be any more hail; that thou mayest hand-know how that the earth is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's. vayomer ’elav mosheh kezeti ’et ha‘ir ’efros kapay ’el yhvh, haqolot yekhdalun vehabarad lo yihyeh ‘od lema‘an teda‘ ki yhvh ha’arez.
w1th w8bdyk yd8ty ky Trm tyr1wn mpny yhwh 1lhym and as for thee and thy workers, i hand-know that ye will not yet fear yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim. ve’atah va‘abadekha, yada‘ti ki terem tire’un yhvh ’elohim.
whpSth whS8rh nkth ky hS8rh 1byb whpSth gb8l and the flax and the gates-barley was smitten: for the gates-barley was in the ear, and the flax was bolled. vehapishtah vehase‘orah nukatah, ki hase‘orah ’abib vehapishtah gib‘ol.
whHTh whksmt l1 nkw ky 1pylt hnh and the wheat and the rye were not smitten: for they were not grown up. vehakhitah vehakusemet lo nuku, ki ’afilot henah.
wyZ1 mSh m8m pr8h 1t h8yr wyprS kpyw 1l yhwh wyHdlw hqlwt whbrd wmTr l1 ntk 1rZh and extracted-mose went out of the light-city from big-house-pharaoh, and spread abroad his hands unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and the thunders and hail ceased, and the rain was not poured upon the earth. vayezei mosheh me‘im par‘oh ’et ha‘ir vayifros kapav ’el yhvh, vayakhdelu haqolot vehabarad umatar lo nitakh ’arezah.
wyr1 pr8h ky Hdl hmTr whbrd whqlt wysp lHT1 wykbd lbw hw1 w8bdyw and when big-house-pharaoh saw that the rain and the hail and the thunders were ceased, he missed yet more, and hardened his heart, he and his workers. vayar par‘oh ki khadal hamatar vehabarad vehaqolot vayosef lakhato, vayakhbed libo hu va‘abadav.
wyHzq lb pr8h wl1 SlH 1t bny ySr1l k1Sr dbr yhwh byd mSh and the heart of big-house-pharaoh was hardened, neither would he let children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel go; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had bee-spoken by extracted-mose. vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shilakh benei yisra’el, ka’asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh b1 1l pr8h ky 1ny hkbdty 1t lbw w1t lb 8bdyw lm8n Sty 1tty 1lh bqrbw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, go in unto big-house-pharaoh: for i have hardened his heart, and the heart of his workers, that i might show these my signs before-turns him: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh bo ’el par‘oh, ki ’ani hikhbadti libo ve’et leb ‘abadav lema‘an shiti ’ototay ’eleh beqirbo.
wlm8n tspr b1zny bnk wbn bnk 1t 1Sr ht8llty bmZrym w1t 1tty 1Sr Smty bm wyd8tm ky 1ny yhwh and that thou mayest tell in the ears of thy child-between, and of thy child-between's child-between, what things i have wrought in narrows-mizraim, and my signs which i have done among them; that ye may hand-know how that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ulema‘an tesaper be’azenei binkha uben binkha ’asher hit‘alalti bemizrayim ve’et ’ototay ’asher samti bam, vida‘tem ki ’ani yhvh.
wyb1 mSh w1hrn 1l pr8h wy1mrw 1lyw kh 1mr yhwh 1lhy h8brym 8d mty m1nt l8nt mpny SlH 8my wy8bdny and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron came in unto big-house-pharaoh, and said unto him, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of the cross-over-hebrews, how long wilt thou refuse to humble thyself before-turns me? let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el par‘oh vayomeru ’elav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim matay me’anta le‘anot mipanay, shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky 1m m1n 1th lSlH 1t 8my hnny mby1 mHr 1rbh bgblk else, if thou refuse to let my with-mum-people go, behold, to morrow will i bring the locusts into thy coast: ki ’im ma’en ’atah leshaleakh ‘ami, hini mebi makhar ’arbeh bigbulekha.
wksh 1t 8yn h1rZ wl1 ywkl lr1t 1t h1rZ w1kl 1t ytr hplTh hnS1rt lkm mn hbrd w1kl 1t kl h8Z hZmH lkm mn hSdh and they cover the face-turns of the earth, that one cannot be able to see the earth: and they eat the residue of that which is escaped, which remaineth unto you from the hail, and eat every tree which groweth for you out of the field: vekhisah ‘en ha’arez velo yukhal lir’ot ha’arez, ve’akhal yeter hapeletah hanish’eret lakhem min habarad ve’akhal kal ha‘ez hazomeakh lakhem min hasadeh.
wml1w btyk wbty kl 8bdyk wbty kl mZrym 1Sr l1 r1w 1btyk w1bwt 1btyk mywm hywtm 8l h1dmh 8d hywm hzh wypn wyZ1 m8m pr8h and they fill thy daughter-houses, and the daughter-houses of all thy workers, and the daughter-houses of all the narrows-mizraimians; which neither thy fathers, nor thy fathers' fathers have seen, since the day that they were upon the earth unto this day. and he turned himself, and went out from big-house-pharaoh. umale’u batekha ubatei khal ‘abadekha ubatei khal mizrayim ’asher lo ra’u ’abotekha va’abot ’abotekha miyom heyotam ‘al ha’adamah ‘ad hayom hazeh, vayifen vayezei me‘im par‘oh.
wy1mrw 8bdy pr8h 1lyw 8d mty yhyh zh lnw lmwqS SlH 1t h1nSym wy8bdw 1t yhwh 1lhyhm hTrm td8 ky 1bdh mZrym and big-house-pharaoh's workers said unto him, how long this man be a snare unto us? let the men go, that they may work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou their towards-these-elohim: knowest thou not yet that narrows-mizraim is destroyed? vayomeru ‘abdei far‘oh ’elav ‘ad matay yihyeh zeh lanu lemoqesh shalakh ha’anashim veya‘abdu yhvh ’elohehem, haterem teda‘ ki ’abedah mizrayim.
wywSb 1t mSh w1t 1hrn 1l pr8h wy1mr 1lhm lkw 8bdw 1t yhwh 1lhykm my wmy hhlkym and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron were brought again unto big-house-pharaoh: and he said unto them, go, work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim: and who are they that go? vayushab mosheh ve’et ’aharon ’el par‘oh vayomer ’alehem lekhu ‘ibdu yhvh ’elohekhem, mi vami haholekhim.
wy1mr mSh bn8rynw wbzqnynw nlk bbnynw wbbnwtnw bZ1nnw wbbqrnw nlk ky Hg yhwh lnw and extracted-mose said, we will go with our young and with our old, with our children-betweens and with our children-betweenesss, with our flocks and with our visit-cattles will we go; for we must hold a until-conception unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayomer mosheh bin‘arenu ubizqenenu nelekh, bebanenu ubibnotenu bezonenu ubibqarenu nelekh ki khag yhvh lanu.
wy1mr 1lhm yhy kn yhwh 8mkm k1Sr 1SlH 1tkm w1t Tpkm r1w ky r8h ngd pnykm and he said unto them, let yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou be so with you, as i will let you go, and your little ones: look to it; for bad is before-turns you. vayomer ’alehem yehi yhvh ‘imakhem ka’asher ’ashalakh ’etkhem ve’et tapekhem, re’u ki ra‘ah neged penekhem.
l1 kn lkw n1 hgbrym w8bdw 1t yhwh ky 1th 1tm mbqSym wygrS 1tm m1t pny pr8h not so: go now ye that are men, and work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; for that ye did desire. and they were driven out from big-house-pharaoh's presence. lo khen lekhu na hagebarim ve‘ibdu yhvh ki ’otah ’atem mebaqshim, vaygaresh ’otam me’et penei far‘oh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh nTh ydk 8l 1rZ mZrym b1rbh wy8l 8l 1rZ mZrym wy1kl 1t kl 8Sb h1rZ 1t kl 1Sr hS1yr hbrd and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, stretch out thine hand over the land of narrows-mizraim for the locusts, that they may come up upon the land of narrows-mizraim, and eat every herb of the land, even all that the hail hath left. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al ’erez mizrayim ba’arbeh veya‘al ‘al ’erez mizrayim, veyokhal kal ‘eseb ha’arez kal ’asher hish’ir habarad.
wyT mSh 1t mThw 8l 1rZ mZrym wyhwh nhg rwH qdym b1rZ kl hywm hhw1 wkl hlylh hbqr hyh wrwH hqdym nS1 1t h1rbh and extracted-mose stretched forth his pen over the land of narrows-mizraim, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought an east wind upon the land all that day, and all that night; and when it was morning, the east wind brought the locusts. vayet mosheh matehu ‘al ’erez mizrayim yhvh nihag ruakh qadim ba’arez kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah, haboqer hayah veruakh haqadim nasa ha’arbeh.
wy8l h1rbh 8l kl 1rZ mZrym wynH bkl gbwl mZrym kbd m1d lpnyw l1 hyh kn 1rbh kmhw w1Hryw l1 yhyh kn and the locust went up over all the land of narrows-mizraim, and rested in all the coasts of narrows-mizraim: very grievous were they; before-turns them there were no such locusts as they, neither after them be such. vaya‘al ha’arbeh ‘al kal ’erez mizrayim vayanakh bekhol gebul mizrayim, kabed me’od lefanav lo hayah khen ’arbeh kamohu ve’akharav lo yihyeh ken.
wyks 1t 8yn kl h1rZ wtHSk h1rZ wy1kl 1t kl 8Sb h1rZ w1t kl pry h8Z 1Sr hwtyr hbrd wl1 nwtr kl yrq b8Z wb8Sb hSdh bkl 1rZ mZrym for they covered the face-turns of the whole earth, so that the land was darkened; and they did eat every herb of the land, and all the fruit of the trees which the hail had left: and there remained not any green thing in the trees, or in the herbs of the field, through all the land of narrows-mizraim. vaykhas ‘en kal ha’arez vatekhshakh ha’arez vayokhal kal ‘eseb ha’arez ve’et kal peri ha‘ez ’asher hotir habarad, velo notar kal yereq ba‘ez ube‘eseb hasadeh bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wymhr pr8h lqr1 lmSh wl1hrn wy1mr HT1ty lyhwh 1lhykm wlkm then big-house-pharaoh called for extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron in haste; and he said, i have missed to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and against you. vaymaher par‘oh liqro lemosheh ule’aharon, vayomer khatati yhvh ’elohekhem velakhem.
w8th S1 n1 HT1ty 1k hp8m wh8tyrw lyhwh 1lhykm wysr m8ly rq 1t hmwt hzh now therefore forgive, i pray thee, my miss only this once, and entreat yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, that he may take away from me this death only. ve‘atah sa na khatati ’akh hapa‘am veha‘tiru yhvh ’elohekhem, veyaser me‘alay raq hamavet hazeh.
wyZ1 m8m pr8h wy8tr 1l yhwh and he went out from big-house-pharaoh, and entreated yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayezei me‘im par‘oh, vaye‘tar ’el yhvh.
wyhpk yhwh rwH ym Hzq m1d wyS1 1t h1rbh wytq8hw ymh swp l1 nS1r 1rbh 1Hd bkl gbwl mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou turned a mighty strong sea-west wind, which took away the locusts, and cast them into the end sea; there remained not one locust in all the coasts of narrows-mizraim. vayahafokh yhvh ruakh yam khazaq me’od vayisa ha’arbeh vayitqa‘ehu yamah suf, lo nish’ar ’arbeh ’ekhad bekhol gebul mizrayim.
wyHzq yhwh 1t lb pr8h wl1 SlH 1t bny ySr1l and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hardened big-house-pharaoh's heart, so that he would not let children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel go. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh, velo shilakh benei yisra’el.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh nTh ydk 8l hSmym wyhy HSk 8l 1rZ mZrym wymS HSk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, stretch out thine hand toward namespaces, that there may be darkness over the land of narrows-mizraim, even darkness which may be felt. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al hashamayim vihi khoshekh ‘al ’erez mizrayim, veyamesh khoshekh.
wyT mSh 1t ydw 8l hSmym wyhy HSk 1plh bkl 1rZ mZrym SlSt ymym and extracted-mose stretched forth his hand toward namespaces; and there was a thick darkness in all the land of narrows-mizraim three days: vayet mosheh yado ‘al hashamayim, vayhi khoshekh ’afelah bekhal ’erez mizrayim sheloshet yamim.
l1 r1w 1yS 1t 1Hyw wl1 qmw 1yS mtHtyw SlSt ymym wlkl bny ySr1l hyh 1wr bmwSbtm they saw not one another, neither rose any from his place for three days: and all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel had light in their dwellings. lo ra’u ’ish ’akhiv velo qamu ’ish mitakhtav sheloshet yamim, ulekhal benei yisra’el hayah ’or bemoshebotam.
wyqr1 pr8h 1l mSh wy1mr lkw 8bdw 1t yhwh rq Z1nkm wbqrkm yZg gm Tpkm ylk 8mkm and big-house-pharaoh called unto extracted-mose, and said, go ye, work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; only let your flocks and your visit-cattles be stayed: let your little ones also go with you. vayiqra far‘oh ’el mosheh vayomer lekhu ‘ibdu yhvh raq zonekhem ubeqarkhem yuzag, gam tapekhem yelekh ‘imakhem.
wy1mr mSh gm 1th ttn bydnw zbHym w8lwt w8Synw lyhwh 1lhynw and extracted-mose said, thou must give us also butchers and on-ups, that we may butcher unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim. vayomer mosheh gam ’atah titen beyadenu zebakhim ve‘olot, ve‘asinu yhvh ’elohenu.
wgm mqnnw ylk 8mnw l1 tS1r prsh ky mmnw nqH l8bd 1t yhwh 1lhynw w1nHnw l1 nd8 mh n8bd 1t yhwh 8d b1nw Smh our in-them-animal also go with us; there not an part-hoof be left behind; for thereof must we take to work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim; and we hand-know not with what we must work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, until we come thither. vegam miqnenu yelekh ‘imanu lo tisha’er parsah ki mimenu niqakh la‘abod yhvh ’elohenu, va’anakhnu lo neda‘ mah na‘abod yhvh ‘ad bo’enu shamah.
wyHzq yhwh 1t lb pr8h wl1 1bh lSlHm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hardened big-house-pharaoh's heart, and he would not let them go. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh, velo ’abah leshalekham.
wy1mr lw pr8h lk m8ly hSmr lk 1l tsp r1wt pny ky bywm r1tk pny tmwt and big-house-pharaoh said unto him, get thee from me, take heed to thyself, see my face-turns no more; for in that day thou seest my face-turns thou die. vayomer lo far‘oh lekh me‘alay, hishamer lekha ’el tosef re’ot panay ki beyom re’otekha fanay tamut.
wy1mr mSh kn dbrt l1 1sp 8wd r1wt pnyk and extracted-mose said, thou hast bee-spoken well, i will see thy face-turns again no more. vayomer mosheh ken dibarta, lo ’osif ‘od re’ot panekha.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 8wd ng8 1Hd 1by1 8l pr8h w8l mZrym 1Hry kn ySlH 1tkm mzh kSlHw klh grS ygrS 1tkm mzh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, yet will i bring one plague more upon big-house-pharaoh, and upon narrows-mizraim; afterwards he will let you go hence: when he let you go, he surely thrust you out hence altogether. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘od nega‘ ’ekhad ’abi ‘al par‘oh ve‘al mizrayim khen yeshalakh ’etkhem mizeh, keshalekho kalah garesh yegaresh ’etkhem mizeh.
dbr n1 b1zny h8m wyS1lw 1yS m1t r8hw w1Sh m1t r8wth kly ksp wkly zhb speak now in the ears of the with-mum-people, and let every man borrow of his neighbor, and every woman of her neighbor, jewels of silver and jewels of gold. daber na be’azenei ha‘am, veyish’alu ’ish me’et re‘ehu ve’ishah me’et re‘utah kele khesef ukhelei zahab.
wytn yhwh 1t Hn h8m b8yny mZrym gm h1yS mSh gdwl m1d b1rZ mZrym b8yny 8bdy pr8h wb8yny h8m and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou gave the with-mum-people favor in the sight of the narrows-mizraimians. moreover the man extracted-mose was very great in the land of narrows-mizraim, in the sight of big-house-pharaoh's workers, and in the sight of the with-mum-people. vayiten yhvh khen ha‘am be‘enei mizrayim, gam ha’ish mosheh gadol me’od be’erez mizrayim be‘enei ‘abde far‘oh ube‘enei ha‘am.
wy1mr mSh kh 1mr yhwh kHZt hlylh 1ny ywZ1 btwk mZrym and extracted-mose said, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, about midnight will i go out into the midst of narrows-mizraim: vayomer mosheh koh ’amar yhvh, kakhazot halaylah ’ani yozei betokh mizrayim.
wmt kl bkwr b1rZ mZrym mbkwr pr8h hySb 8l ks1w 8d bkwr hSpHh 1Sr 1Hr hrHym wkl bkwr bhmh and all the firstborn in the land of narrows-mizraim die, from the first born of big-house-pharaoh that sitteth upon his throne, even unto the firstborn of the mum-true-maid that is behind the mill; and all the firstborn of beasts. umet kal bekhor be’erez mizrayim mibekhor par‘oh hayosheb ‘al kis’o ‘ad bekhor hashifkhah ’asher ’akhar harekhayim, vekhol bekhor behemah.
whyth Z8qh gdlh bkl 1rZ mZrym 1Sr kmhw l1 nhyth wkmhw l1 tsp and there be a great cry throughout all the land of narrows-mizraim, such as there was none like it, nor be like it any more. vehayetah ze‘aqah gedolah bekhal ’erez mizrayim, ’asher kamohu lo nihyatah vekhamohu lo tosif.
wlkl bny ySr1l l1 yHrZ klb lSnw lm1yS w8d bhmh lm8n td8wn 1Sr yplh yhwh byn mZrym wbyn ySr1l and against any of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel not a dog move his tongue, against man or beast: that ye may hand-know how that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou doth put a difference between-bin the narrows-mizraimians and saturated-towards-israel. ulekhol benei yisra’el lo yekheraz keleb leshono leme’ish ve‘ad behemah, lema‘an tede‘un ’asher yafleh yhvh ben mizrayim uben yisra’el.
wyrdw kl 8bdyk 1lh 1ly whStHww ly l1mr Z1 1th wkl h8m 1Sr brglyk w1Hry kn 1Z1 wyZ1 m8m pr8h bHry 1p and all these thy workers come down unto me, and bow down themselves unto me, saying, get thee out, and all the with-mum-people that follow thee: and after that i will go out. and he went out from big-house-pharaoh in a great nose-anger. veyaredu khal ‘abadekha ’eleh ’elay vehishtakhavu li lemor zei ’atah vekhal ha‘am ’asher beraglekha ve’akhare khen ’eze, vayezei me‘im par‘oh bakhori ’af.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh l1 ySm8 1lykm pr8h lm8n rbwt mwpty b1rZ mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, big-house-pharaoh not hearken unto you; that my wonders may be multiplied in the land of narrows-mizraim. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lo yishma‘ ’alekhem par‘oh, lema‘an rebot moftay be’erez mizrayim.
wmSh w1hrn 8Sw 1t kl hmptym h1lh lpny pr8h wyHzq yhwh 1t lb pr8h wl1 SlH 1t bny ySr1l m1rZw and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron did all these wonders before-turns big-house-pharaoh: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hardened big-house-pharaoh's heart, so that he would not let children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel go out of his land. umosheh ve’aharon ‘asu kal hamofetim ha’eleh lifnei far‘oh, vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh velo shilakh bene yisra’el me’arzo.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn b1rZ mZrym l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron in the land of narrows-mizraim saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon be’erez mizrayim lemor.
hHdS hzh lkm r1S HdSym r1Swn hw1 lkm lHdSy hSnh this month be unto you the head of months: it be the first month of the year to you. hakhodesh hazeh lakhem rosh khodashim, rishon hu lakhem lekhadeshei hashanah.
dbrw 1l kl 8dt ySr1l l1mr b8Sr lHdS hzh wyqHw lhm 1yS Sh lbyt 1bt Sh lbyt speak ye unto all the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel, saying, in the tenth day of this month they take to them every man a lamb, according to the daughter-house of their fathers, a lamb for an daughter-house: daberu ’el kal ‘adat yisra’el lemor be‘asor lakhodesh hazeh, veyiqkhu lahem ’ish seh lebet ’abot seh labayit.
w1m ym8T hbyt mhyt mSh wlqH hw1 wSknw hqrb 1l bytw bmkst npSt 1yS lpy 1klw tksw 8l hSh and if the daughter-household be too little for the lamb, let him and his neighbor next unto his daughter-house take it according to the number of the beings; every man according to his eating make your count for the lamb. ve’im yim‘at habayit miseh velaqakh hu ushekheno haqarob ’el beto bemikhsat nefashot, ’ish lefi ’akhelo takhosu ‘al haseh.
Sh tmym zkr bn Snh yhyh lkm mn hkbSym wmn h8zym tqHw your lamb be simple, a rememberer of the first year: ye take it out from the sheep, or from the intense-goats: seh tamim zakhar ben shanah yihyeh lakhem, min hakebasim umin ha‘izim tiqakhu.
whyh lkm lmSmrt 8d 1rb8h 8Sr ywm lHdS hzh wSHTw 1tw kl qhl 8dt ySr1l byn h8rbym and ye do it up until the fourteenth day of the same month: and the whole assembly of the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel kill it in the evening. vehayah lakhem lemishmeret ‘ad ’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hazeh, veshakhatu ’oto kol qehal ‘adat yisra’el ben ha‘arbayim.
wlqHw mn hdm wntnw 8l Sty hmzwzt w8l hmSqwp 8l hbtym 1Sr y1klw 1tw bhm and they take of the blood, and strike it on the two side posts and on the upper opening post of the daughter-houses, wherein they eat it. velaqekhu min hadam venatenu ‘al shetei hamezuzot ve‘al hamashqof, ‘al habatim ’asher yokhelu ’oto bahem.
w1klw 1t hbSr blylh hzh Zly 1S wmZwt 8l mrrym y1klhw and they eat the flesh in that night, roast with fire, and lit-mazat; and with bitter herbs they eat it. ve’akhelu habasar balaylah hazeh, zeli ’esh umazot ‘al merorim yokheluhu.
1l t1klw mmnw n1 wbSl mbSl bmym ky 1m Zly 1S r1Sw 8l kr8yw w8l qrbw eat not of it raw, nor sodden at all with from-waters, and roast with fire; his head with his legs, and with the purtenance thereof. ’al tokhelu mimenu na ubashel mebushal bamayim, ’im zeli ’esh rosho ‘al kera‘av ve‘al qirbo.
wl1 twtyrw mmnw 8d bqr whntr mmnw 8d bqr b1S tSrpw and ye let nothing of it remain until the morning; and that which remaineth of it until the morning ye burn with fire. velo totiru mimenu ‘ad boqer, vehanotar mimenu ‘ad boqer ba’esh tisrofu.
wkkh t1klw 1tw mtnykm Hgrym n8lykm brglykm wmqlkm bydkm w1kltm 1tw bHpzwn psH hw1 lyhwh and thus ye eat it; with your loins girded, your shoes on your feet, and your staff in your hand; and ye eat it in haste: it is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's passover. vekhakhah tokhelu ’oto matenekhem khagurim na‘alekhem beraglekhem umaqelkhem beyedkhem, va’akhaltem ’oto bekhipazon pesakh hu yhvh.
w8brty b1rZ mZrym blylh hzh whkyty kl bkwr b1rZ mZrym m1dm w8d bhmh wbkl 1lhy mZrym 18Sh SpTym 1ny yhwh for i will pass through the land of narrows-mizraim this night, and will hit all the firstborn in the land of narrows-mizraim, both man and beast; and against all the towards-these-elohim of narrows-mizraim i will execute decision-grammar: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ve‘abarti be’erez mizrayim balaylah hazeh vehiketi khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim me’adam ve‘ad behemah, ubekhal ’elohei mizrayim ’e‘eseh shefatim ’ani yhvh.
whyh hdm lkm l1t 8l hbtym 1Sr 1tm Sm wr1yty 1t hdm wpsHty 8lkm wl1 yhyh bkm ngp lmSHyt bhkty b1rZ mZrym and the blood be to you for a token upon the daughter-houses where ye are: and when i see the blood, i will pass over you, and the plague not be upon you to destroy you, when i hit the land of narrows-mizraim. vehayah hadam lakhem le’ot ‘al habatim ’asher ’atem. vera’iti hadam ufasakhti ‘alekhem, velo yihyeh bakhem negef lemashkhit behakoti be’erez mizrayim.
whyh hywm hzh lkm lzkrwn wHgtm 1tw Hg lyhwh ldrtykm Hqt 8wlm tHghw and this day be unto you for a memorial; and ye do it a until-conception to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou throughout your generations; ye do it a until-conception by an ordinance for ever. vehayah hayom hazeh lakhem lezikaron vekhagotem ’oto khag yhvh, ledorotekhem khuqat ‘olam tekhaguhu.
Sb8t ymym mZwt t1klw 1k bywm hr1Swn tSbytw S1r mbtykm ky kl 1kl HmZ wnkrth hnpS hhw1 mySr1l mywm hr1Sn 8d ywm hSb8y seven days ye eat lit-mazat; even the first day ye put away leaven out of your daughter-houses: for whosoever eateth leaven from the first day until the seventh day, that being be cut off from saturated-towards-israel. shib‘at yamim mazot tokhelu ’akh bayom harishon tashbitu se’or mibatekhem, ki kal ’okhel khamez venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra’el miyom harishon ‘ad yom hashebi‘i.
wbywm hr1Swn mqr1 qdS wbywm hSby8y mqr1 qdS yhyh lkm kl ml1kh l1 y8Sh bhm 1k 1Sr y1kl lkl npS hw1 lbdw y8Sh lkm and in the first day there be an dedicated-finished convocation, and in the seventh day there be an dedicated-finished convocation to you; no manner of work be done in them, save that which every man must eat, that only may be done of you. ubayom harishon miqra qodesh ubayom hashebi‘i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem, kal melakhah lo ye‘aseh bahem ’akh ’asher ye’akhel lekhal nefesh hu lebado ye‘aseh lakhem.
wSmrtm 1t hmZwt ky b8Zm hywm hzh hwZ1ty 1t Zb1wtykm m1rZ mZrym wSmrtm 1t hywm hzh ldrtykm Hqt 8wlm and ye guard-observe the until-conception of lit-mazat; for in this selfsame day have i brought your troop-clusters out of the land of narrows-mizraim: therefore ye guard-observe this day in your generations by an ordinance for ever. ushemartem hamazot ki be‘ezem hayom hazeh hozeti zib’otekhem me’erez mizrayim, ushemartem hayom hazeh ledorotekhem khuqat ‘olam.
br1Sn b1rb8h 8Sr ywm lHdS b8rb t1klw mZt 8d ywm h1Hd w8Srym lHdS b8rb in the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month at even, ye eat lit-mazat, until the one and twentieth day of the month at even. barishon be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh ba‘ereb tokhelu mazot, ‘ad yom ha’ekhad ve‘esrim lakhodesh ba‘areb.
Sb8t ymym S1r l1 ymZ1 bbtykm ky kl 1kl mHmZt wnkrth hnpS hhw1 m8dt ySr1l bgr wb1zrH h1rZ seven days there be no leaven found in your daughter-houses: for whosoever eateth that which is leavened, even that being be cut off from the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel, whether he be a stranger, or born in the land. shib‘at yamim se’or lo yimazei bebatekhem, ki kal ’okhel makhmezet venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘adat yisra’el bager ube’ezrakh ha’arez.
kl mHmZt l1 t1klw bkl mwSbtykm t1klw mZwt ye eat nothing leavened; in all your habitations ye eat lit-mazat. kal makhmezet lo tokhelu, bekhol moshebotekhem tokhelu mazot.
wyqr1 mSh lkl zqny ySr1l wy1mr 1lhm mSkw wqHw lkm Z1n lmSpHtykm wSHTw hpsH then extracted-mose called for all the elders of saturated-towards-israel, and said unto them, draw out and take you a lamb according to your families, and kill the passover. vayiqra mosheh lekhal ziqnei yisra’el vayomer ’alehem, mishkhu uqekhu lakhem zon lemishpekhotekhem veshakhatu hapasakh.
wlqHtm 1gdt 1zwb wTbltm bdm 1Sr bsp whg8tm 1l hmSqwp w1l Sty hmzwzt mn hdm 1Sr bsp w1tm l1 tZ1w 1yS mptH bytw 8d bqr and ye take a bunch of discharging-hyssop, and dip it in the blood that is in the basin, and strike the lintel and the two side posts with the blood that is in the basin; and none of you go out at the opening of his daughter-house until the morning. uleqakhtem ’agudat ’ezob utebaltem badam ’asher basaf vehiga‘tem ’el hamashqof ve’el shetei hamezuzot min hadam ’asher basaf, ve’atem lo teze’u mipetakh beto ‘ad boqer.
w8br yhwh lngp 1t mZrym wr1h 1t hdm 8l hmSqwp w8l Sty hmzwzt wpsH yhwh 8l hptH wl1 ytn hmSHyt lb1 1l btykm lngp for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will pass through to hit the narrows-mizraimians; and when he seeth the blood upon the lintel, and on the two side posts, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will pass over the opening, and will not suffer the destroyer to come in unto your daughter-houses to hit you. ve‘abar yhvh lingof mizrayim vera’ah hadam ‘al hamashqof ve‘al shetei hamezuzot, ufasakh yhvh ‘al hapetakh velo yiten hamashkhit labo ’el batekhem lingof.
wSmrtm 1t hdbr hzh lHq lk wlbnyk 8d 8wlm and ye guard-observe this thing for an ordinance to thee and to thy children-betweens for ever. ushemartem hadabar hazeh, lekhaq lekha ulebanekha ‘ad ‘olam.
whyh ky tb1w 1l h1rZ 1Sr ytn yhwh lkm k1Sr dbr wSmrtm 1t h8bdh hz1t and it come to pass, when ye be come to the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will give you, according as he hath promised, that ye keep this work. vehayah ki tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher yiten yhvh lakhem ka’asher diber, ushemartem ha‘abodah hazot.
whyh ky y1mrw 1lykm bnykm mh h8bdh hz1t lkm and it come to pass, when your children-betweens say unto you, what mean ye by this work? vehayah ki yomeru ’alekhem benekhem, mah ha‘abodah hazot lakhem.
w1mrtm zbH psH hw1 lyhwh 1Sr psH 8l bty bny ySr1l bmZrym bngpw 1t mZrym w1t btynw hZyl wyqd h8m wyStHww that ye say, it is the butcher of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's passover, who passed over the daughter-houses of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in narrows-mizraim, when he smote the narrows-mizraimians, and delivered our daughter-houses. and the with-mum-people bowed the head and partook-shatakh. va’amartem zebakh pesakh hu yhvh ’asher pasakh ‘al batei bene yisra’el bemizrayim benagepo mizrayim ve’et batenu hizil, vayiqod ha‘am vayishtakhavu.
wylkw wy8Sw bny ySr1l k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh w1hrn kn 8Sw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel went away, and did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, so did they. vayelekhu vaya‘asu benei yisra’el, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ve’aharon ken ‘asu.
wyhy bHZy hlylh wyhwh hkh kl bkwr b1rZ mZrym mbkr pr8h hySb 8l ks1w 8d bkwr hSby 1Sr bbyt hbwr wkl bkwr bhmh and it came to pass, that at midnight yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou smote all the firstborn in the land of narrows-mizraim, from the firstborn of big-house-pharaoh that sat on his throne unto the firstborn of the captive that was in the dungeon; and all the firstborn of in-them-animal. vayhi bakhazi halaylah yhvh hikah khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim mibekhor par‘oh hayosheb ‘al kis’o ‘ad bekhor hashebi ’asher bebet habor, vekhol bekhor behemah.
wyqm pr8h lylh hw1 wkl 8bdyw wkl mZrym wthy Z8qh gdlh bmZrym ky 1yn byt 1Sr 1yn Sm mt and big-house-pharaoh rose up in the night, he, and all his workers, and all the narrows-mizraimians; and there was a great cry in narrows-mizraim; for there was not a daughter-house where there was not one dead. vayaqam par‘oh laylah hu vekhal ‘abadav vekhal mizrayim vatehi ze‘aqah gedolah bemizrayim, ki ’en bayit ’asher ’en met.
wyqr1 lmSh wl1hrn lylh wy1mr qwmw Z1w mtwk 8my gm 1tm gm bny ySr1l wlkw 8bdw 1t yhwh kdbrkm and he called for extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron by night, and said, rise up, and get you forth from inward my with-mum-people, both ye and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; and go, work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, as ye have said. vayiqra lemosheh ule’aharon laylah vayomer qumu ze’u mitokh ‘ami gam ’atem gam benei yisra’el, ulekhu ‘ibdu yhvh kedaberkhem.
gm Z1nkm gm bqrkm qHw k1Sr dbrtm wlkw wbrktm gm 1ty also take your flocks and your visit-cattles, as ye have said, and be gone; and knee-fluffy-bless me also. gam zonekhem gam beqarkhem qekhu ka’asher dibartem valekhu, uberakhtem gam ’oti.
wtHzq mZrym 8l h8m lmhr lSlHm mn h1rZ ky 1mrw klnw mtym and the narrows-mizraimians were urgent upon the with-mum-people, that they might send them out of the land in haste; for they said, we be all dead men. vatekhezaq mizrayim ha‘am lemaher leshalekham min ha’arez, ki ’ameru kulanu metim.
wyS1 h8m 1t bZqw Trm yHmZ mS1rtm Zrrt bSmltm 8l Skmm and the with-mum-people took their dough before-turns it was leavened, their kneadingtroughs being bound up in their clothes upon their shoulders. vayisa ha‘am bezeqo terem yekhmaz, mish’arotam zerurot besimlotam ‘al shikhmam.
wbny ySr1l 8Sw kdbr mSh wyS1lw mmZrym kly ksp wkly zhb wSmlt and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did according to the bee-word of extracted-mose; and they borrowed of the narrows-mizraimians jewels of silver, and jewels of gold, and raiment: ubene yisra’el ‘asu kidbar mosheh, vayish’alu mimizrayim kele khesef ukhelei zahab usemalot.
wyhwh ntn 1t Hn h8m b8yny mZrym wyS1lwm wynZlw 1t mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou gave the with-mum-people favor in the sight of the narrows-mizraimians, so that they lent unto them such things as they required. and they spoiled the narrows-mizraimians. yhvh natan khen ha‘am be‘enei mizrayim vayash’ilum, vaynazelu mizrayim.
