wys8w bny ySr1l mr8mss skth kSS m1wt 1lp rgly hgbrym lbd mTp and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel journeyed from born-by-ra-voiceless-ramses to booths-succoth, about six hundred thousand on foot that were men, beside children-betweens. vayis‘u bene yisra’el mera‘meses sukotah, keshesh me’ot ’elef ragli hagebarim lebad mitaf.
wgm 8rb rb 8lh 1tm wZ1n wbqr mqnh kbd m1d and a mixed multitude went up also with them; and flocks, and visit-cattles, even very much in-them-animal. vegam ‘ereb rab ‘alah ’itam, vezon ubaqar miqneh kabed me’od.
wy1pw 1t hbZq 1Sr hwZy1w mmZrym 8gt mZwt ky l1 HmZ ky grSw mmZrym wl1 yklw lhtmhmh wgm Zdh l1 8Sw lhm and they baked unleavened cakes of the dough which they brought forth out of narrows-mizraim, for it was not leavened; because they were thrust out of narrows-mizraim, and could not tarry, neither had they prepared for themselves any victual. vayofu habazeq ’asher hozi’u mimizrayim ‘ugot mazot ki lo khamez, ki goreshu mimizrayim velo yakhelu lehitmahmeah vegam zedah lo ‘asu lahem.
wmwSb bny ySr1l 1Sr ySbw bmZrym SlSym Snh w1rb8 m1wt Snh now the sojourning of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, who dwelt in narrows-mizraim, was four hundred and thirty years. umoshab benei yisra’el ’asher yashebu bemizrayim, sheloshim shanah ve’arba‘ me’ot shanah.
wyhy mqZ SlSym Snh w1rb8 m1wt Snh wyhy b8Zm hywm hzh yZ1w kl Zb1wt yhwh m1rZ mZrym and it came to pass at the end of the four hundred and thirty years, even the selfsame day it came to pass, that all the troop-clusters of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou went out from the land of narrows-mizraim. vayhi miqez sheloshim shanah ve’arba‘ me’ot shanah, vayhi be‘ezem hayom hazeh yaze’u kal zib’ot yhvh me’erez mizrayim.
lyl Smrym hw1 lyhwh lhwZy1m m1rZ mZrym hw1 hlylh hzh lyhwh Smrym lkl bny ySr1l ldrtm it is a night to be much guard-observed unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for bringing them out from the land of narrows-mizraim: this is that night of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to be guard-observed of all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in their generations. lel shimurim hu yhvh lehozi’am me’erez mizrayim, hu halaylah hazeh yhvh shimurim lekhal benei yisra’el ledorotam.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1hrn z1t Hqt hpsH kl bn nkr l1 y1kl bw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, this is the ordinance of the passover: there no stranger eat thereof: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’aharon zot khuqat hapasakh, kal ben nekhar lo yokhal bo.
wkl 8bd 1yS mqnt ksp wmlth 1tw 1z y1kl bw and every man's worker that is bought for money, when thou hast scribe-circumcised him, then he eat thereof. vekhal ‘ebed ’ish miqnat kasef, umaltah ’oto ’az yokhal bo.
twSb wSkyr l1 y1kl bw a foreigner and an hired worker not eat thereof. toshab vesakhir lo yokhal bo.
bbyt 1Hd y1kl l1 twZy1 mn hbyt mn hbSr HwZh w8Zm l1 tSbrw bw in one daughter-house it be eaten; no carry forth ought of the flesh abroad out of the daughter-house; neither ye break a bone thereof. bebayit ’ekhad ye’akhel lo tozi min habayit min habasar khuzah, ve‘ezem lo tishberu bo.
kl 8dt ySr1l y8Sw 1tw all the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel do it. kal ‘adat yisra’el ya‘asu ’oto.
wky ygwr 1tk gr w8Sh psH lyhwh hmwl lw kl zkr w1z yqrb l8Stw whyh k1zrH h1rZ wkl 8rl l1 y1kl bw and when a stranger sojourn with thee, and will keep the passover to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, let all his rememberers be scribe-circumcised, and then let him come near and do it; and he be as one that is born in the land: for no foreskinned person eat thereof. vekhi yagur ’itekha ger ve‘asah fesakh yhvh himol lo khal zakhar ve’az yiqrab la‘asoto vehayah ke’ezrakh ha’arez, vekhal ‘arel lo yokhal bo.
twrh 1Ht yhyh l1zrH wlgr hgr btwkkm one teaching be to him that is homeborn, and unto the stranger that sojourneth among you. torah ’akhat yihyeh la’ezrakh, velager hagar betokhkhem.
wy8Sw kl bny ySr1l k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh w1t 1hrn kn 8Sw thus did all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, so did they. vaya‘asu kal benei yisra’el, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ve’et ’aharon ken ‘asu.
wyhy b8Zm hywm hzh hwZy1 yhwh 1t bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym 8l Zb1tm and it came to pass the selfsame day, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did bring children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel out of the land of narrows-mizraim by their troop-clusters. vayhi be‘ezem hayom hazeh, hozi yhvh benei yisra’el me’erez mizrayim ‘al zib’otam.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qdS ly kl bkwr pTr kl rHm bbny ySr1l b1dm wbbhmh ly hw1 dedicate-finify unto me all the firstborn, whatsoever openeth the womb among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, both of man and of beast: it is mine. qadesh li khal bekhor peter kal rekhem bibnei yisra’el ba’adam ubabehemah, li hu.
wy1mr mSh 1l h8m zkwr 1t hywm hzh 1Sr yZ1tm mmZrym mbyt 8bdym ky bHzq yd hwZy1 yhwh 1tkm mzh wl1 y1kl HmZ and extracted-mose said unto the with-mum-people, remember this day, in which ye came out from narrows-mizraim, out of the daughter-house of bondage; for by strength of hand yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought you out from this place: there no leaven be eaten. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am zakhor hayom hazeh ’asher yezatem mimizrayim mibet ‘abadim ki bekhozeq yad hozi yhvh ’etkhem mizeh, velo ye’akhel khamez.
hywm 1tm yZ1ym bHdS h1byb this day came ye out in the month spring-abib. hayom ’atem yoze’im, bekhodesh ha’abib.
whyh ky yby1k yhwh 1l 1rZ hkn8ny whHty wh1mry whHwy whybwsy 1Sr nSb8 l1btyk ltt lk 1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS w8bdt 1t h8bdh hz1t bHdS hzh and it be when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring thee into the land of the mobile-trade-canaanites, and the tusk-cut-hittites, and the talker-amorites, and the experience-hivites, and the trampler-jebusites, which he sware unto thy fathers to give thee, a land flowing with milk and honey, that thou work this work in this month. vehayah khi yebi’akha yhvh ’el ’erez hakena‘ani vehakhiti veha’emori vehakhivi vehaybusi ’asher nishba‘ la’abotekha latet lakh ’erez zabat khalab udebash, ve‘abadta ha‘abodah hazot bakhodesh hazeh.
Sb8t ymym t1kl mZt wbywm hSby8y Hg lyhwh seven days thou eat lit-mazat, and in the seventh day be a until-conception to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. shib‘at yamim tokhal mazot, ubayom hashebi‘i khag yhvh.
mZwt y1kl 1t Sb8t hymym wl1 yr1h lk HmZ wl1 yr1h lk S1r bkl gblk lit-mazat be eaten seven days; and there no leaven be seen with thee, neither there be rests seen with thee in all thy quarters. mazot ye’akhel shib‘at hayamim, velo yera’eh lekha khamez velo yera’eh lekha se’or bekhal gebulekha.
whgdt lbnk bywm hhw1 l1mr b8bwr zh 8Sh yhwh ly bZ1ty mmZrym and thou show thy child-between in that day, saying, this is done because of that which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did unto me when i came forth out of narrows-mizraim. vehigadta lebinkha bayom hahu lemor, ba‘abur zeh ‘asah yhvh li bezeti mimizrayim.
whyh lk l1wt 8l ydk wlzkrwn byn 8ynyk lm8n thyh twrt yhwh bpyk ky byd Hzqh hwZ1k yhwh mmZrym and it be for a sign unto thee upon thine hand, and for a memorial between-bin thine eyes, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's teaching may be in thy mouth: for with a strong hand hath yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought thee out of narrows-mizraim. vehayah lekha le’ot ‘al yadekha ulezikaron ben ‘enekha lema‘an tihyeh torat yhvh befikha, ki beyad khazaqah hozi’akha yhvh mimizrayim.
wSmrt 1t hHqh hz1t lmw8dh mymym ymymh thou therefore keep this ordinance in his season from year to year. veshamarta hakhuqah hazot lemo‘adah, miyamim yamimah.
whyh ky yb1k yhwh 1l 1rZ hkn8ny k1Sr nSb8 lk wl1btyk wntnh lk and it be when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring thee into the land of the mobile-trade-canaanites, as he sware unto thee and to thy fathers, and give it thee, vehayah ki yebi’akha yhvh ’el ’erez hakena‘ani ka’asher nishba‘ lekha vela’abotekha, unetanah lakh.
wh8brt kl pTr rHm lyhwh wkl pTr Sgr bhmh 1Sr yhyh lk hzkrym lyhwh that thou set apart unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou all that openeth the womb-matrix, and every firstling that cometh of a beast which thou hast; the rememberers be yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's. veha‘abarta khal peter rekhem yhvh, vekhal peter sheger behemah ’asher yihyeh lekha hazekharim yhvh.
wkl pTr Hmr tpdh bSh w1m l1 tpdh w8rptw wkl bkwr 1dm bbnyk tpdh and every firstling of an ass thou redeem with a lamb; and if thou wilt not redeem it, then thou break his neck: and all the firstborn of man among thy children-betweens thou redeem. vekhal peter khamor tifdeh beseh ve’im lo tifdeh va‘arafto, vekhol bekhor ’adam bebanekha tifdeh.
whyh ky yS1lk bnk mHr l1mr mh z1t w1mrt 1lyw bHzq yd hwZy1nw yhwh mmZrym mbyt 8bdym and it be when thy child-between asketh thee in time to come, saying, what is this? that thou say unto him, by strength of hand yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought us out from narrows-mizraim, from the daughter-house of bondage: vehayah ki yish’alekha binkha makhar lemor mah zot, ve’amarta ’elav bekhozeq yad hozi’anu yhvh mimizrayim mibet ‘abadim.
wyhy ky hqSh pr8h lSlHnw wyhrg yhwh kl bkwr b1rZ mZrym mbkr 1dm w8d bkwr bhmh 8l kn 1ny zbH lyhwh kl pTr rHm hzkrym wkl bkwr bny 1pdh and it came to pass, when big-house-pharaoh would hardly let us go, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou slew all the firstborn in the land of narrows-mizraim, both the firstborn of man, and the firstborn of beast: therefore i butcher to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou all that openeth the womb-matrix, being rememberers; and all the firstborn of my children-betweens i redeem. vayhi ki hiqshah far‘oh leshalekhenu vayaharog yhvh kal bekhor be’erez mizrayim mibekhor ’adam ve‘ad bekhor behemah, ‘al ken ’ani zobeakh yhvh kal peter rekhem hazekharim vekhal bekhor banay ’efdeh.
whyh l1wt 8l ydkh wlTwTpt byn 8ynyk ky bHzq yd hwZy1nw yhwh mmZrym and it be for a token upon thine hand, and for frontlets between-bin thine eyes: for by strength of hand yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought us forth out of narrows-mizraim. vehayah le’ot ‘al yadekhah uletotafot ben ‘enekha, ki bekhozeq yad hozi’anu yhvh mimizrayim.
wyhy bSlH pr8h 1t h8m wl1 nHm 1lhym drk 1rZ plStym ky qrwb hw1 ky 1mr 1lhym pn ynHm h8m br1tm mlHmh wSbw mZrymh and it came to pass, when big-house-pharaoh had sent the with-mum-people, that towards-these-elohim led them not through the way of the land of the griever-philistines, although that was near; for towards-these-elohim said, lest peradventure the with-mum-people repent when they see war, and they return to narrows-mizraim: vayhi beshalakh par‘oh ha‘am velo nakham ’elohim derekh ’erez pelishtim ki qarob hu, ki ’amar ’elohim pen yinakhem ha‘am bir’otam milkhamah veshabu mizrayemah.
wysb 1lhym 1t h8m drk hmdbr ym swp wHmSym 8lw bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym and towards-these-elohim led the with-mum-people about, through the way of the place-of-word-desert of the end sea: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel went up harnessed out of the land of narrows-mizraim. vayaseb ’elohim ha‘am derekh hamidbar yam suf, vakhamushim ‘alu bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim.
wyqH mSh 1t 8Zmwt ywsp 8mw ky hSb8 hSby8 1t bny ySr1l l1mr pqd ypqd 1lhym 1tkm wh8lytm 1t 8Zmty mzh 1tkm and extracted-mose took the bones of add-joseph with him: for he had straitly sworn children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, towards-these-elohim will surely visit you; and ye carry up my bones away hence with you. vayiqakh mosheh ‘azmot yosef ‘imo, ki hashbea‘ hishbia‘ benei yisra’el lemor paqod yifqod ’elohim ’etkhem veha‘alitem ‘azmotay mizeh ’itekhem.
wys8w mskt wyHnw b1tm bqZh hmdbr and they took their journey from booths-succoth, and encamped in you-etam, in the edge of the place-of-word-desert. vayis‘u misukot, vayakhanu be’etam biqzeh hamidbar.
wyhwh hlk lpnyhm ywmm b8mwd 8nn lnHtm hdrk wlylh b8mwd 1S lh1yr lhm llkt ywmm wlylh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou went before-turns them by day in a page-column-erection of a cloud, to lead them the way; and by night in a page-column-erection of fire, to give them light; to go by day and night: yhvh holekh lifnehem yomam be‘amud ‘anan lankhotam haderekh velaylah be‘amud ’esh leha’ir lahem, lalekhet yomam valayelah.
l1 ymyS 8mwd h8nn ywmm w8mwd h1S lylh lpny h8m he took not away the page-column-erection of the cloud by day, nor the page-column-erection of fire by night, from before-turns the with-mum-people. lo yamish ‘amud he‘anan yomam ve‘amud ha’esh layelah, lifnei ha‘am.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l wySbw wyHnw lpny py hHyrt byn mgdl wbyn hym lpny b8l Zpn nkHw tHnw 8l hym speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they turn and encamp before-turns mouth-of-the-choice-pihahirot, between-bin tower-migdol and the sea, over against owner-of-cipher-baalzephon: before-turns it ye encamp by the sea. daber ’el benei yisra’el veyashubu veyakhanu lifnei hakhirot ben migdol uben hayam, lifnei zefon nikhkho takhanu ‘al hayam.
w1mr pr8h lbny ySr1l nbkym hm b1rZ sgr 8lyhm hmdbr for big-house-pharaoh will say of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, they are entangled in the land, the place-of-word-desert hath shut them in. ve’amar par‘oh libnei yisra’el nebukhim hem ba’arez, sagar ‘alehem hamidbar.
wHzqty 1t lb pr8h wrdp 1Hryhm w1kbdh bpr8h wbkl Hylw wyd8w mZrym ky 1ny yhwh wy8Sw kn and i will harden big-house-pharaoh's heart, that he follow after them; and i will be honored upon big-house-pharaoh, and upon all his troop-cluster; that the narrows-mizraimians may hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. and they did so. vekhizaqti leb par‘oh veradaf ’akharehem ve’ikabedah befar‘oh ubekhal khelo veyade‘u mizrayim ki ’ani yhvh, vaya‘asu khen.
wygd lmlk mZrym ky brH h8m wyhpk lbb pr8h w8bdyw 1l h8m wy1mrw mh z1t 8Synw ky SlHnw 1t ySr1l m8bdnw and it was told the moloch-king of narrows-mizraim that the with-mum-people fled: and the heart of big-house-pharaoh and of his workers was turned against the with-mum-people, and they said, why have we done this, that we have let saturated-towards-israel go from serving us? vayugad lemelekh mizrayim ki barakh ha‘am, vayehafekh lebab par‘oh va‘abadav ’el ha‘am vayomru mah zot ‘asinu ki shilakhnu yisra’el me‘abedenu.
wy1sr 1t rkbw w1t 8mw lqH 8mw and he made ready his chariot, and took his with-mum-people with him: vaye’sor rikhbo, ve’et ‘amo laqakh ‘imo.
wyqH SS m1wt rkb bHwr wkl rkb mZrym wSlSm 8l klw and he took six hundred chosen chariots, and all the chariots of narrows-mizraim, and captains over every one of them. vayiqakh shesh me’ot rekheb bakhur vekhol rekheb mizrayim, veshalishim ‘al kulo.
wyHzq yhwh 1t lb pr8h mlk mZrym wyrdp 1Hry bny ySr1l wbny ySr1l yZ1ym byd rmh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hardened the heart of big-house-pharaoh moloch-king of narrows-mizraim, and he pursued after children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel went out with an high hand. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh melekh mizrayim vayirdof ’akharei benei yisra’el, ubenei yisra’el yoze’im beyad ramah.
wyrdpw mZrym 1Hryhm wySygw 1wtm Hnym 8l hym kl sws rkb pr8h wprSyw wHylw 8l py hHyrt lpny b8l Zpn and the narrows-mizraimians pursued after them, all the horses and chariots of big-house-pharaoh, and his horsemen, and his army, and overtook them encamping by the sea, beside mouth-of-the-choice-pihahirot, before-turns owner-of-cipher-baalzephon. vayirdefu mizrayim ’akharehem vayasigu ’otam khonim ‘al hayam kal sus rekheb par‘oh ufarashav vekhelo, ‘al hakhirot lifnei zefon.
wpr8h hqryb wyS1w bny ySr1l 1t 8ynyhm whnh mZrym ns8 1Hryhm wyyr1w m1d wyZ8qw bny ySr1l 1l yhwh and when big-house-pharaoh drew nigh, children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel lifted up their eyes, and, behold, the narrows-mizraimians marched after them; and they were sore afraid: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel cried out unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ufar‘oh hiqrib, vayis’u bene yisra’el ‘enehem vehineh mizrayim nosea‘ ’akharehem vayire’u me’od vayiz‘aqu bene yisra’el ’el yhvh.
wy1mrw 1l mSh hmbly 1yn qbrym bmZrym lqHtnw lmwt bmdbr mh z1t 8Syt lnw lhwZy1nw mmZrym and they said unto extracted-mose, because there were no graves in narrows-mizraim, hast thou taken us away to die in the place-of-word-desert? wherefore hast thou dealt thus with us, to carry us forth out of narrows-mizraim? vayomeru ’el mosheh hamibeli ’en qebarim bemizrayim leqakhtanu lamut bamidbar, mah zot ‘asita lanu lehozi’anu mimizrayim.
hl1 zh hdbr 1Sr dbrnw 1lyk bmZrym l1mr Hdl mmnw wn8bdh 1t mZrym ky Twb lnw 8bd 1t mZrym mmtnw bmdbr is not this the bee-word that we did tell thee in narrows-mizraim, saying, let us alone, that we may work for the narrows-mizraimians? for it had been better for us to work for the narrows-mizraimians, than that we should die in the place-of-word-desert. halo zeh hadabar ’asher dibarnu ’elekha bemizrayim lemor khadal mimenu vena‘abdah mizrayim, ki tob lanu ‘abod mizrayim mimutenu bamidbar.
wy1mr mSh 1l h8m 1l tyr1w htyZbw wr1w 1t ySw8t yhwh 1Sr y8Sh lkm hywm ky 1Sr r1ytm 1t mZrym hywm l1 tsypw lr1tm 8wd 8d 8wlm and extracted-mose said unto the with-mum-people, fear ye not, stand still, and see the saving of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which he will show to you to day: for the narrows-mizraimians whom ye have seen to day, ye see them again no more for ever. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am ’al tira’u hityazbu ure’u yeshu‘at yhvh ’asher ya‘aseh lakhem hayom, ki ’asher re’item mizrayim hayom lo tosifu lir’otam ‘od ‘ad ‘olam.
yhwh ylHm lkm w1tm tHrySwn yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou fight for you, and ye hold your peace. yhvh yilakhem lakhem, ve’atem takharishun.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh mh tZ8q 1ly dbr 1l bny ySr1l wys8w and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, wherefore criest thou unto me? speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they go forward: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh mah tiz‘aq ’elay, daber ’el bene yisra’el veyisa‘u.
w1th hrm 1t mTk wnTh 1t ydk 8l hym wbq8hw wyb1w bny ySr1l btwk hym bybSh and lift thou up thy pen, and stretch out thine hand over the sea, and divide it: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel go on dry ground through the midst of the sea. ve’atah harem matekha uneteh yadekha ‘al hayam ubeqa‘ehu, veyabo’u bene yisra’el betokh hayam bayabashah.
w1ny hnny mHzq 1t lb mZrym wyb1w 1Hryhm w1kbdh bpr8h wbkl Hylw brkbw wbprSyw and i, behold, i will harden the hearts of the narrows-mizraimians, and they follow them: and i will get heavy upon big-house-pharaoh, and upon all his troop-cluster, upon his chariots, and upon his horsemen. va’ani hini mekhazeq leb mizrayim veyabo’u ’akharehem, ve’ikabedah befar‘oh ubekhal khelo berikhbo ubefarashav.
wyd8w mZrym ky 1ny yhwh bhkbdy bpr8h brkbw wbprSyw and the narrows-mizraimians hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, when i have gotten me honor upon big-house-pharaoh, upon his chariots, and upon his horsemen. veyade‘u mizrayim ki ’ani yhvh, behikabedi befar‘oh berikhbo ubefarashav.
wys8 ml1k h1lhym hhlk lpny mHnh ySr1l wylk m1Hryhm wys8 8mwd h8nn mpnyhm wy8md m1Hryhm and the angel-messanger of towards-these-elohim, which went before-turns the camp of saturated-towards-israel, removed and went behind them; and the page-column-erection of the cloud went from before-turns their face-turns, and stood behind them: vayisa‘ mal’akh ha’elohim haholekh lifnei makhaneh yisra’el vayelekh me’akharehem, vayisa‘ ‘amud he‘anan mipenehem vaya‘amod me’akharehem.
wyb1 byn mHnh mZrym wbyn mHnh ySr1l wyhy h8nn whHSk wy1r 1t hlylh wl1 qrb zh 1l zh kl hlylh and it came between-bin the camp of the narrows-mizraimians and the camp of saturated-towards-israel; and it was a cloud and darkness to them, and it gave light by night to these: so that the one came not near the other all the night. vayabo ben makhaneh mizrayim uben makhaneh yisra’el vayhi he‘anan vehakhoshekh vaya’er halayelah, velo qarab zeh ’el zeh kal halayelah.
wyT mSh 1t ydw 8l hym wywlk yhwh 1t hym brwH qdym 8zh kl hlylh wySm 1t hym lHrbh wybq8w hmym and extracted-mose stretched out his hand over the sea; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou caused the sea to go back by a strong east wind all that night, and made the sea dry land, and the from-waters were divided. vayet mosheh yado ‘al hayam vayolekh yhvh hayam beruakh qadim ‘azah kal halaylah vayasem hayam lekharabah, vayibaqe‘u hamayim.
wyb1w bny ySr1l btwk hym bybSh whmym lhm Hmh mymynm wmSm1lm and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel went into the midst of the sea upon the dry ground: and the from-waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left. vayabo’u bene yisra’el betokh hayam bayabashah, vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam.
wyrdpw mZrym wyb1w 1Hryhm kl sws pr8h rkbw wprSyw 1l twk hym and the narrows-mizraimians pursued, and went in after them to the midst of the sea, even all big-house-pharaoh's horses, his chariots, and his horsemen. vayirdefu mizrayim vayabo’u ’akharehem kol sus par‘oh rikhbo ufarashav, ’el tokh hayam.
wyhy b1Smrt hbqr wySqp yhwh 1l mHnh mZrym b8mwd 1S w8nn wyhm 1t mHnh mZrym and it came to pass, that in the morning watch yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou looked unto the troop-cluster of the narrows-mizraimians through the page-column-erection of fire and of the cloud, and troubled the troop-cluster of the narrows-mizraimians, vayhi be’ashmoret haboqer vayashqef yhvh ’el makhaneh mizrayim be‘amud ’esh ve‘anan, vayaham makhaneh mizrayim.
wysr 1t 1pn mrkbtyw wynhghw bkbdt wy1mr mZrym 1nwsh mpny ySr1l ky yhwh nlHm lhm bmZrym and took off their chariot wheels, that they drave them heavily: so that the narrows-mizraimians said, let us flee from the face-turns of saturated-towards-israel; for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou fighteth for them against the narrows-mizraimians. vayasar ’ofan markebotav vaynahagehu bikhbedut, vayomer mizrayim ’anusah mipenei yisra’el ki yhvh nilkham lahem bemizrayim
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh nTh 1t ydk 8l hym wySbw hmym 8l mZrym 8l rkbw w8l prSyw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, stretch out thine hand over the sea, that the from-waters may come again upon the narrows-mizraimians, upon their chariots, and upon their horsemen. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al hayam, veyashubu hamayim ‘al mizrayim ‘al rikhbo ve‘al parashav.
wyT mSh 1t ydw 8l hym wySb hym lpnwt bqr l1ytnw wmZrym nsym lqr1tw wyn8r yhwh 1t mZrym btwk hym and extracted-mose stretched forth his hand over the sea, and the sea returned to his strength when the morning appeared; and the narrows-mizraimians fled against it; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou overthrew the narrows-mizraimians in the midst of the sea. vayet mosheh yado ‘al hayam vayashab hayam lifnot boqer le’etano umizrayim nasim liqrato, vayna‘er yhvh mizrayim betokh hayam.
wySbw hmym wyksw 1t hrkb w1t hprSym lkl Hyl pr8h hb1ym 1Hryhm bym l1 nS1r bhm 8d 1Hd and the from-waters returned, and covered the chariots, and the horsemen, and all the troop-cluster of big-house-pharaoh that came into the sea after them; there remained not so much as one of them. vayashubu hamayim vaykhasu harekheb ve’et haparashim lekhol khel par‘oh haba’im ’akharehem bayam, lo nish’ar bahem ‘ad ’ekhad.
wbny ySr1l hlkw bybSh btwk hym whmym lhm Hmh mymynm wmSm1lm and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel walked upon dry land in the midst of the sea; and the from-waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left. ubenei yisra’el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam, vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam
wywS8 yhwh bywm hhw1 1t ySr1l myd mZrym wyr1 ySr1l 1t mZrym mt 8l Spt hym thus yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou saved saturated-towards-israel that day out of the hand of the narrows-mizraimians; and saturated-towards-israel saw the narrows-mizraimians dead upon the sea shore. vayosha‘ yhvh bayom hahu yisra’el miyad mizrayim, vayar yisra’el mizrayim met ‘al sefat hayam.
wyr1 ySr1l 1t hyd hgdlh 1Sr 8Sh yhwh bmZrym wyyr1w h8m 1t yhwh wy1mynw byhwh wbmSh 8bdw and saturated-towards-israel saw that great work which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did upon the narrows-mizraimians: and the with-mum-people feared yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and was coached by yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and his worker extracted-mose. vayar yisra’el hayad hagedolah ’asher ‘asah yhvh bemizrayim vayire’u ha‘am yhvh, vaya’aminu yhvh ubemosheh ‘abdo.
1z ySyr mSh wbny ySr1l 1t hSyrh hz1t lyhwh wy1mrw l1mr 1Syrh lyhwh ky g1h g1h sws wrkbw rmh bym then sang extracted-mose and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel this song unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and spake, saying, i will sing unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, for he hath triumphed gloriously: the horse and his rider hath he thrown into the sea. ’az yashir mosheh ubenei yisra’el hashirah hazot yhvh vayomeru lemor, ’ashirah yhvh ki ga’oh ga’ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam.
8zy wzmrt yh wyhy ly lySw8h zh 1ly w1nwhw 1lhy 1by w1rmmnhw yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is my strength and song, and he is become my saving: he is my towards-these-elohim, and i will prepare him an habitation; my father's towards-these-elohim, and i will exalt him. ‘azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu‘ah, zeh ’eli ve’anvehu ’elohei ’abi va’aromemenhu.
yhwh 1yS mlHmh yhwh Smw yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is a man of war: yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is his name. yhvh ’ish milkhamah, yhvh shemo.
mrkbt pr8h wHylw yrh bym wmbHr SlSyw Tb8w bym swp big-house-pharaoh's chariots and his troop-cluster hath he cast into the sea: his chosen captains also are drowned in the end sea. markebot par‘oh vekhelo yarah bayam, umibkhar shalishav tube‘u beyam suf.
thmt yksymw yrdw bmZwlt kmw 1bn the depths have covered them: they sank into the bottom as a father-child-stone. tehomot yekhasyumu, yaredu bimzolot kemo ’aben.
ymynk yhwh n1dry bkH ymynk yhwh tr8Z 1wyb thy right hand, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, is become glorious in dynamic: thy right hand, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, hath dashed in pieces the enemy. yeminekha yhvh ne’dari bakoakh, yeminekha yhvh tir‘az ’oyeb.
wbrb g1wnk thrs qmyk tSlH Hrnk y1klmw kqS and in the greatness of thine excellency thou hast overthrown them that rose up against thee: thou sentest forth thy wrath, which consumed them as stubble. uberob ge’onkha taharos qamekha, teshalakh kharonekha yokhelemo kaqash.
wbrwH 1pyk n8rmw mym nZbw kmw nd nzlym qp1w thmt blb ym and with the blast of thy nostrils the from-waters were added together, the floods stood upright as an heap, and the depths were congealed in the heart of the sea. uberuakh ’apekha ne‘ermu mayim nizebu khemo ned nozelim, qafe’u tehomot beleb yam.
1mr 1wyb 1rdp 1Syg 1Hlq Sll tml1mw npSy 1ryq Hrby twrySmw ydy the enemy said, i will pursue, i will overtake, i will divide the spoil; my lust be satisfied upon them; i will draw my sword, my hand destroy them. ’amar ’oyeb ’erdof ’asig ’akhaleq shalal, timla’emo nafshi ’ariq kharbi torishemo yadi.
nSpt brwHk ksmw ym Zllw k8wprt bmym 1dyrym thou didst blow with thy wind, the sea covered them: they sank as lead in the mighty from-waters. nashafta berukhakha kisamo yam, zalalu ka‘oferet bemayim ’adirim.
my kmkh b1lm yhwh my kmkh n1dr bqdS nwr1 thlt 8Sh pl1 who is like unto thee, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, among the towards-these-elohim? who is like thee, glorious in dedication, fearful in praises, doing wonders? mi khamokhah ba’elim yhvh mi kamokhah ne’dar baqodesh, nora tehilot ‘oseh fele.
nTyt ymynk tbl8mw 1rZ thou stretchedst out thy right hand, the earth swallowed them. natita yeminekha tibla‘emo ’arez.
nHyt bHsdk 8m zw g1lt nhlt b8zk 1l nwh qdSk thou in thy mercy hast led forth the with-mum-people which thou hast redeemed: thou hast guided them in thy strength unto thy dedicated-finished habitation. nakhita bekhasdekha ‘am zu ga’aleta, nehalta be‘azekha ’el neveh qadshekha
Sm8w 8mym yrgzwn Hyl 1Hz ySby plSt the with-mum-people hear, and be afraid: sorrow take hold on the inhabitants of break-into-grief-pelashet. shame‘u ‘amim yirgazun, khil ’akhaz yoshebei pelashet.
1z nbhlw 1lwpy 1dwm 1yly mw1b y1Hzmw r8d nmgw kl ySby kn8n then the dukes of man-edom be amazed; the mighty men of from-father-moab, trembling take hold upon them; all the inhabitants of mobile-trade-canaan melt away. ’az nibhalu ’alufei ’edom ’elei mo’ab yokhazemo ra‘ad, namogu kol yoshebei khena‘an.
tpl 8lyhm 1ymth wpHd bgdl zrw8k ydmw k1bn 8d y8br 8mk yhwh 8d y8br 8m zw qnyt fear and dread fall upon them; by the greatness of thine arm they be as still as a father-child-stone; till thy with-mum-people pass over, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, till the with-mum-people pass over, which thou hast purchased. tipol ‘alehem ’ematah vafakhad bigdol zero‘akha yidemu ka’aben, ‘ad ya‘abor ‘amekha yhvh ‘ad ya‘abor ‘am zu qanita.
tb1mw wtT8mw bhr nHltk mkwn lSbtk p8lt yhwh mqdS 1dny kwnnw ydyk thou bring them in, and plant them in the mountain of thine inheritance, in the place, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which thou hast made for thee to dwell in, in the dedicated-finished, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which thy hands have established. tebi’emo vetita‘emo behar nakhalatekha makhon leshibtekha pa‘alta yhvh, miqedash ’adonay konu yadekha.
yhwh ymlk l8lm w8d yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou reign for ever and ever. yhvh yimlokh le‘olam va‘ed.
ky b1 sws pr8h brkbw wbprSyw bym wySb yhwh 8lhm 1t my hym wbny ySr1l hlkw bybSh btwk hym for the horse of big-house-pharaoh went in with his chariots and with his horsemen into the sea, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought again the from-waters of the sea upon them; and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel went on dry land in the midst of the sea. ki ba sus par‘oh berikhbo ubefarashav bayam vayasheb yhvh ‘alehem mei hayam, ubenei yisra’el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam.
wtqH mrym hnby1h 1Hwt 1hrn 1t htp bydh wtZ1n kl hnSym 1Hryh btpym wbmHlt and rebel-bitter-miriam the bringeress, the sister of cabinet-aaron, took a timbrel in her hand; and all the women went out after her with timbrels and with dances. vatiqakh miryam hanebi’ah ’akhot ’aharon ’et hatof beyadah, vatezena khal hanashim ’akhareha betupim ubimkholot.
wt8n lhm mrym Syrw lyhwh ky g1h g1h sws wrkbw rmh bym and rebel-bitter-miriam answered them, sing ye to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, for he hath triumphed gloriously; the horse and his rider hath he thrown into the sea. vata‘an lahem miryam, shiru yhvh ki ga’oh ga’ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam.
wys8 mSh 1t ySr1l mym swp wyZ1w 1l mdbr Swr wylkw SlSt ymym bmdbr wl1 mZ1w mym so extracted-mose brought saturated-towards-israel from the end sea, and they went out into the place-of-word-desert of wall-shur; and they went three days in the place-of-word-desert, and found no from-waters. vayasa‘ mosheh yisra’el miyam suf vayeze’u ’el midbar shur, vayelekhu sheloshet yamim bamidbar velo maze’u mayim.
wyb1w mrth wl1 yklw lStt mym mmrh ky mrym hm 8l kn qr1 Smh mrh and when they came to bitter-mercy-maratah, they could not drink of the from-waters of bitter-marah, for they were bitter: therefore the name of it was called bitter-marah. vayabo’u maratah velo yakhelu lishtot mayim mimarah ki marim hem, ‘al ken qara shemah marah.
wylnw h8m 8l mSh l1mr mh nSth and the with-mum-people murmured against extracted-mose, saying, what we drink? vayilonu ha‘am ‘al mosheh lemor mah nishteh.
wyZ8q 1l yhwh wywrhw yhwh 8Z wySlk 1l hmym wymtqw hmym Sm Sm lw Hq wmSpT wSm nshw and he cried unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou showed him a tree, which when he had cast into the from-waters, the from-waters were made sweet: there he made for them a statute and an ordinance, and there he proved them, vayiz‘aq ’el yhvh vayorehu yhvh ‘ez vayashlekh ’el hamayim vayimtequ hamayim, sham sam lo khoq umishpat vesham nisahu.
wy1mr 1m Smw8 tSm8 lqwl yhwh 1lhyk whySr b8ynyw t8Sh wh1znt lmZwtyw wSmrt kl Hqyw kl hmHlh 1Sr Smty bmZrym l1 1Sym 8lyk ky 1ny yhwh rp1k and said, if thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his order-prescriptions, and keep all his statutes, i will put none of these diseases upon thee, which i have brought upon the narrows-mizraimians: for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou that healeth thee. vayomer ’im shamoa‘ tishma‘ leqol yhvh ’elohekha vehayashar be‘enav ta‘aseh veha’azanta lemizvotav veshamarta kal khuqav, kal hamakhalah ’asher samti bemizrayim lo ’asim ‘alekha ki ’ani yhvh rofe’ekha.
wyb1w 1ylmh wSm Stym 8Srh 8ynt mym wSb8ym tmrym wyHnw Sm 8l hmym and they came to bind-elim, where were twelve wells of from-waters, and threescore and ten palm trees: and they encamped there by the from-waters. vayabo’u ’elimah vesham shetem ‘esreh ‘enot mayim veshib‘im temarim, vayakhanu sham ‘al hamayim.
wys8w m1ylm wyb1w kl 8dt bny ySr1l 1l mdbr syn 1Sr byn 1ylm wbyn syny bHmSh 8Sr ywm lHdS hSny lZ1tm m1rZ mZrym and they took their journey from bind-elim, and all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel came unto the place-of-word-desert of miss, which is between-bin bind-elim and bush-(proto-)sinai, on the fifteenth day of the second month after their departing out of the land of narrows-mizraim. vayis‘u me’elim vayabo’u kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ’el midbar sin ’asher ben ’elim uben sinay, bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hasheni lezetam me’erez mizrayim.
wylynw wylwnw kl 8dt bny ySr1l 8l mSh w8l 1hrn bmdbr and the whole until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel murmured against extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron in the place-of-word-desert: vayilonu kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon bamidbar.
wy1mrw 1lhm bny ySr1l my ytn mwtnw byd yhwh b1rZ mZrym bSbtnw 8l syr hbSr b1klnw lHm lSb8 ky hwZ1tm 1tnw 1l hmdbr hzh lhmyt 1t kl hqhl hzh br8b and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel said unto them, would to towards-these-elohim we had died by the hand of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in the land of narrows-mizraim, when we sat by the flesh pots, and when we did eat bread to the full; for ye have brought us forth into this place-of-word-desert, to kill this whole assembly with hunger. vayomeru ’alehem benei yisra’el mi mutenu beyad yhvh be’erez mizrayim beshibtenu ‘al sir habasar be’akhelenu lekhem lasoba‘, ki hozetem ’otanu ’el hamidbar hazeh lehamit kal haqahal hazeh bara‘ab.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hnny mmTyr lkm lHm mn hSmym wyZ1 h8m wlqTw dbr ywm bywmw lm8n 1nsnw hylk btwrty 1m l1 then said yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou unto extracted-mose, behold, i will rain bread from namespaces for you; and the with-mum-people go out and gather a certain rate every day, that i may prove them, whether they will walk in my teaching, or no. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hini mamtir lakhem lekhem min hashamayim, veyaza ha‘am velaqetu debar beyomo lema‘an ’anasenu hayelekh betorati ’im lo.
whyh bywm hSSy whkynw 1t 1Sr yby1w whyh mSnh 8l 1Sr ylqTw ywm ywm and it come to pass, that on the sixth day they prepare that which they bring in; and it be twice as much as they gather daily. vehayah bayom hashishi vehekhinu ’asher yabi’u, vehayah mishneh ‘al ’asher yilqetu yom yom.
wy1mr mSh w1hrn 1l kl bny ySr1l 8rb wyd8tm ky yhwh hwZy1 1tkm m1rZ mZrym and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron said unto all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, at even, then ye hand-know that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath brought you out from the land of narrows-mizraim: vayomer mosheh ve’aharon ’el kal benei yisra’el, ‘ereb vida‘tem ki yhvh hozi ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim.
wbqr wr1ytm 1t kbwd yhwh bSm8w 1t tlntykm 8l yhwh wnHnw mh ky tlwnw tlynw 8lynw and in the morning, then ye see the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; for that he heareth your murmurings to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and what are we, that ye murmur against us? uboqer ure’item kebod yhvh beshame‘o telunotekhem ‘al yhvh, venakhnu mah ki talinu ‘alenu.
wy1mr mSh btt yhwh lkm b8rb bSr l1kl wlHm bbqr lSb8 bSm8 yhwh 1t tlntykm 1Sr 1tm mlynm 8lyw wnHnw mh l1 8lynw tlntykm ky 8l yhwh and extracted-mose said, this be, when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou give you in the evening flesh to eat, and in the morning bread to the full; for that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou heareth your murmurings which ye murmur against him: and what are we? your murmurings are not against us, and to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayomer mosheh betet yhvh lakhem ba‘ereb basar le’ekhol velekhem baboqer lisboa‘ bishmoa‘ yhvh telunotekhem ’asher ’atem malinim ‘alav, venakhnu mah lo ‘alenu telunotekhem ki ‘al yhvh.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn 1mr 1l kl 8dt bny ySr1l qrbw lpny yhwh ky Sm8 1t tlntykm and extracted-mose spake unto cabinet-aaron, say unto all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, come near before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: for he hath heard your murmurings. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ’emor ’el kal ‘adat benei yisra’el qirbu lifnei yhvh, ki shama‘ telunotekhem.
wyhy kdbr 1hrn 1l kl 8dt bny ySr1l wypnw 1l hmdbr whnh kbwd yhwh nr1h b8nn and it came to pass, as cabinet-aaron spake unto the whole until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they looked toward the place-of-word-desert, and, behold, the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared in the cloud. vayhi kedaber ’aharon ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el vayifnu ’el hamidbar, vehineh kebod yhvh nir’ah be‘anan.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Sm8ty 1t tlwnt bny ySr1l dbr 1lhm l1mr byn h8rbym t1klw bSr wbbqr tSb8w lHm wyd8tm ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm i have heard the murmurings of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: speak unto them, saying, at even ye eat flesh, and in the morning ye be filled with bread; and ye hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. shama‘ti telunot benei yisra’el daber ’alehem lemor ben ha‘arbayim tokhelu basar ubaboqer tisbe‘u lakhem, vida‘tem ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wyhy b8rb wt8l hSlw wtks 1t hmHnh wbbqr hyth Skbt hTl sbyb lmHnh and it came to pass, that at even the quails came up, and covered the camp: and in the morning the dew lay round about the troop-cluster. vayhi ba‘ereb vata‘al haselav vatekhas hamakhaneh, ubaboqer shikhbat hatal sabib lamakhaneh.
wt8l Skbt hTl whnh 8l pny hmdbr dq mHsps dq kkpr 8l h1rZ and when the dew that lay was gone up, behold, upon the face-turns of the place-of-word-desert there lay a small round thing, as small as the hoar frost on the ground. vata‘al shikhbat hatal, vehineh ‘al penei hamidbar daq mekhuspas daq kakefor ‘al ha’arez.
wyr1w bny ySr1l wy1mrw 1yS 1l 1Hyw mn hw1 ky l1 yd8w mh hw1 wy1mr mSh 1lhm hw1 hlHm 1Sr ntn yhwh lkm l1klh and when children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel saw it, they said one to another, it is whats-that-manna: for they wist not what it was. and extracted-mose said unto them, this is the bread which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath given you to eat. vayir’u bene yisra’el vayomeru ’ish ’el ’akhiv man hu ki lo yade‘u mah hu, vayomer mosheh ’alehem hu halekhem ’asher natan yhvh lakhem le’akhlah
zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh lqTw mmnw 1yS lpy 1klw 8mr lglglt mspr npStykm 1yS l1Sr b1hlw tqHw this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed, gather of it every man according to his eating, an say-omer for every man, according to the number of your rolling-heads; take ye every man for them which are in his tents. zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh liqtu mimenu ’ish lefi ’akhelo, ‘omer lagulgolet mispar nafshotekhem ’ish la’asher be’aholo tiqakhu.
wy8Sw kn bny ySr1l wylqTw hmrbh whmm8yT and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did so, and added, some more, some less. vaya‘asu khen benei yisra’el, vayilqetu hamarbeh vehamam‘it.
wymdw b8mr wl1 h8dyp hmrbh whmm8yT l1 hHsyr 1yS lpy 1klw lqTw and when they did mete it with an say-omer, he that added much had nothing over, and he that added little had no lack; they added every man according to his eating. vayamodu ba‘omer velo he‘dif hamarbeh vehamam‘it lo hekhsir, ’ish lefi ’akhelo laqatu.
wy1mr mSh 1lhm 1yS 1l ywtr mmnw 8d bqr and extracted-mose said, let no man leave of it till the morning. vayomer mosheh ’ish ’al yoter mimenu ‘ad boqer.
wl1 Sm8w 1l mSh wywtrw 1nSym mmnw 8d bqr wyrm twl8ym wyb1S wyqZp 8lhm mSh notwithstanding they hearkened not unto extracted-mose; and some of them left of it until the morning, and it bred worms, and stank: and extracted-mose was wroth with them. velo shame‘u ’el mosheh vayotiru ’anashim mimenu ‘ad boqer vayarum tola‘im vayib’ash, vayiqzof ‘alehem mosheh.
wylqTw 1tw bbqr bbqr 1yS kpy 1klw wHm hSmS wnms and they added it every morning, every man according to his eating: and when the sun waxed hot, it melted. vayilqetu ’oto baboqer baboqer ’ish kefi ’akhelo, vekham hashemesh venamas.
wyhy bywm hSSy lqTw lHm mSnh Sny h8mr l1Hd wyb1w kl nSy1y h8dh wygydw lmSh and it came to pass, that on the sixth day they added twice as much bread, two say-omers for one man: and all the rulers of the until-witness came and told extracted-mose. vayhi bayom hashishi laqetu lekhem mishneh shenei ha‘omer la’ekhad, vayabo’u kal nesi’ei ha‘edah vayagidu lemosheh.
wy1mr 1lhm hw1 1Sr dbr yhwh Sbtwn Sbt qdS lyhwh mHr 1t 1Sr t1pw 1pw w1t 1Sr tbSlw bSlw w1t kl h8dp hnyHw lkm lmSmrt 8d hbqr and he said unto them, this is that which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath said, to morrow is the rest of the dedicated-finished seven-sabbath unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: bake that which ye will bake to day, and seethe that ye will seethe; and that which remaineth over lay up for you to be kept until the morning. vayomer ’alehem hu ’asher diber yhvh shabaton shabat qodesh yhvh makhar,. ’asher tofu ’efu ve’et ’asher tebashelu bashelu ve’et kal ha‘odef hanikhu lakhem lemishmeret ‘ad haboqer.
wynyHw 1tw 8d hbqr k1Sr Zwh mSh wl1 hb1yS wrmh l1 hyth bw and they laid it up till the morning, as extracted-mose bade: and it did not stink, neither was there any worm therein. vayanikhu ’oto ‘ad haboqer ka’asher zivah mosheh, velo hib’ish verimah lo hayetah bo.
wy1mr mSh 1klhw hywm ky Sbt hywm lyhwh hywm l1 tmZ1hw bSdh and extracted-mose said, eat that to day; for to day is a seven-sabbath unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: to day ye not find it in the field. vayomer mosheh ’ikhluhu hayom ki shabat hayom yhvh, hayom lo timza’uhu basadeh.
SSt ymym tlqThw wbywm hSby8y Sbt l1 yhyh bw six days ye gather it; and on the seventh day, which is the seven-sabbath, in it there be none. sheshet yamim tilqetuhu, ubayom hashebi‘i shabat lo yihyeh bo.
wyhy bywm hSby8y yZ1w mn h8m llqT wl1 mZ1w and it came to pass, that there went out some of the with-mum-people on the seventh day for to gather, and they found none. vayhi bayom hashebi‘i yaze’u min ha‘am lilqot, velo maza’u.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 8d 1nh m1ntm lSmr mZwty wtwrty and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, how long refuse ye to keep my order-prescriptions and my teachings? vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, ‘ad ’anah me’antem lishmor mizvotay vetorotay.
r1w ky yhwh ntn lkm hSbt 8l kn hw1 ntn lkm bywm hSSy lHm ywmym Sbw 1yS tHtyw 1l yZ1 1yS mmqmw bywm hSby8y see, for that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath given you the seven-sabbath, therefore he giveth you on the sixth day the bread of two days; abide ye every man in his place, let no man go out of his place on the seventh day. re’u ki yhvh natan lakhem hashabat ‘al ken hu noten lakhem bayom hashishi lekhem yomayim, shebu ’ish takhtav ’al yezei ’ish mimeqomo bayom hashebi‘i.
wySbtw h8m bywm hSb8y so the with-mum-people rested on the seventh day. vayishbetu ha‘am bayom hashebi‘i.
wyqr1w byt ySr1l 1t Smw mn whw1 kzr8 gd lbn wT8mw kZpyHt bdbS and the daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel called the name thereof whats-that-manna: and it was like coriander seed, to-between-bin-between-build-white; and the taste of it was like wafers made with honey. vayiqre’u bet yisra’el ’et shemo man, vehu kezera‘ gad laban veta‘mo kezapikhit bidbash.
wy1mr mSh zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh ml1 h8mr mmnw lmSmrt ldrtykm lm8n yr1w 1t hlHm 1Sr h1klty 1tkm bmdbr bhwZy1y 1tkm m1rZ mZrym and extracted-mose said, this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribeeth, fill an say-omer of it to be kept for your generations; that they may see the bread wherewith i have fed you in the place-of-word-desert, when i brought you forth from the land of narrows-mizraim. vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh melo ha‘omer mimenu lemishmeret ledorotekhem, lema‘an yir’u halekhem ’asher he’ekhalti ’etkhem bamidbar behozi’i ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn qH ZnZnt 1Ht wtn Smh ml1 h8mr mn whnH 1tw lpny yhwh lmSmrt ldrtykm and extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron, take a pot, and put an say-omer full of whats-that-manna therein, and lay it up before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to be kept for your generations. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon qakh zinzenet ’akhat veten shamah melo ha‘omer man, vehanakh ’oto lifnei yhvh lemishmeret ledorotekhem.
k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1l mSh wynyHhw 1hrn lpny h8dt lmSmrt as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so cabinet-aaron laid it up before-turns the until-witness, to be kept. ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, vayanikhehu ’aharon lifnei ha‘edut lemishmaret.
wbny ySr1l 1klw 1t hmn 1rb8ym Snh 8d b1m 1l 1rZ nwSbt 1t hmn 1klw 8d b1m 1l qZh 1rZ kn8n and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did eat whats-that-manna forty years, until they came to a land inhabited; they did eat whats-that-manna, until they came unto the borders of the land of mobile-trade-canaan. ubenei yisra’el ’akhelu haman ’arba‘im shanah ‘ad bo’am ’el ’erez noshabet, haman ’akhelu ‘ad bo’am ’el qezeh ’erez kena‘an.
wh8mr 8Sryt h1yph hw1 now an say-omer is the tenth part of an tired-ephah. veha‘omer ‘asirit ha’efah hu.
wys8w kl 8dt bny ySr1l mmdbr syn lms8yhm 8l py yhwh wyHnw brpydym w1yn mym lStt h8m and all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel journeyed from the place-of-word-desert of miss, after their journeys, according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and pitched in upholstery-rephidim: and there was no from-waters for the with-mum-people to drink. vayis‘u kal ‘adat bene yisra’el mimidbar sin lemas‘ehem ‘al pi yhvh, vayakhanu birfidim ve’en mayim lishtot ha‘am.
wyrb h8m 8m mSh wy1mrw tnw lnw mym wnSth wy1mr lhm mSh mh trybwn 8mdy mh tnswn 1t yhwh wherefore the with-mum-people did chide with extracted-mose, and said, give us from-waters that we may drink. and extracted-mose said unto them, why chide ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou? vayareb ha‘am ‘im mosheh vayomeru tenu lanu mayim venishteh, vayomer lahem mosheh mah teribun ‘imadi mah tenasun yhvh.
wyZm1 Sm h8m lmym wyln h8m 8l mSh wy1mr lmh zh h8lytnw mmZrym lhmyt 1ty w1t bny w1t mqny bZm1 and the with-mum-people thirsted there for from-waters; and the with-mum-people murmured against extracted-mose, and said, wherefore is this that thou hast brought us up out of narrows-mizraim, to kill us and our children-betweens and our in-them-animal with thirst? vayizma sham ha‘am lamayim vayalen ha‘am ‘al mosheh, vayomer lamah zeh he‘elitanu mimizrayim lehamit ’oti ve’et banay ve’et miqnay bazama.
wyZ8q mSh 1l yhwh l1mr mh 18Sh l8m hzh 8wd m8T wsqlny and extracted-mose cried unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, what i do unto this with-mum-people? they be almost ready to father-child-stone me. vayiz‘aq mosheh ’el yhvh lemor mah ’e‘eseh la‘am hazeh, ‘od me‘at useqaluni.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 8br lpny h8m wqH 1tk mzqny ySr1l wmTk 1Sr hkyt bw 1t hy1r qH bydk whlkt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, go on before-turns the with-mum-people, and take with thee of the elders of saturated-towards-israel; and thy pen, wherewith thou hit the river, take in thine hand, and go. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘abor lifnei ha‘am veqakh ’itekha miziqnei yisra’el, umatekha ’asher hikita bo hay’or qakh beyadekha vehalakheta.
hnny 8md lpnyk Sm 8l hZwr bHrb whkyt bZwr wyZ1w mmnw mym wSth h8m wy8S kn mSh l8yny zqny ySr1l behold, i will stand before-turns thee there upon the rock in sword-horeb; and thou hit the rock, and there come from-waters out of it, that the with-mum-people may drink. and extracted-mose did so in the sight of the elders of saturated-towards-israel. hini ‘omed lefanekha sham ‘al hazur bekhoreb vehikita bazur veyaze’u mimenu mayim veshatah ha‘am, vaya‘as ken mosheh le‘enei ziqnei yisra’el.
wyqr1 Sm hmqwm msh wmrybh 8l ryb bny ySr1l w8l nstm 1t yhwh l1mr hyS yhwh bqrbnw 1m 1yn and he called the name of the place load-essay-massah, and jam-meribah, because of the chiding of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and because they tempted yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou among us, or not? vayiqra shem hamaqom masah umeribah, ‘al rib benei yisra’el ve‘al nasotam yhvh lemor hayesh yhvh beqirbenu ’im ’ayin.
wyb1 8mlq wylHm 8m ySr1l brpydm then came labour-moloch-king-amalek, and fought with saturated-towards-israel in upholstery-rephidim. vayabo ‘amaleq, vayilakhem ‘im yisra’el birfidim.
wy1mr mSh 1l yhwS8 bHr lnw 1nSym wZ1 hlHm b8mlq mHr 1nky nZb 8l r1S hgb8h wmTh h1lhym bydy and extracted-mose said unto save-joshua-jesus, choose us out men, and go out, fight with labour-moloch-king-amalek: to morrow i will stand on the top of the hill with the pen of towards-these-elohim in mine hand. vayomer mosheh ’el yehoshua‘ bekhar lanu ’anashim vezei hilakhem ba‘amaleq, makhar ’anokhi nizab ‘al rosh hagib‘ah umateh ha’elohim beyadi.
wy8S yhwS8 k1Sr 1mr lw mSh lhlHm b8mlq wmSh 1hrn wHwr 8lw r1S hgb8h so save-joshua-jesus did as extracted-mose had said to him, and fought with labour-moloch-king-amalek: and extracted-mose, cabinet-aaron, and small-place-prince-hur went up to the top of the hill. vaya‘as yehoshua‘ ka’asher ’amar lo mosheh lehilakhem ba‘amaleq, umosheh ’aharon vekhur ‘alu rosh hagib‘ah.
whyh k1Sr yrym mSh ydw wgbr ySr1l wk1Sr ynyH ydw wgbr 8mlq and it came to pass, when extracted-mose held up his hand, that saturated-towards-israel prevailed: and when he let down his hand, labour-moloch-king-amalek prevailed. vehayah ka’asher yarim mosheh yado vegabar yisra’el, vekha’asher yaniakh yado vegabar ‘amaleq.
wydy mSh kbdym wyqHw 1bn wySymw tHtyw wySb 8lyh w1hrn wHwr tmkw bydyw mzh 1Hd wmzh 1Hd wyhy ydyw 1mwnh 8d b1 hSmS and extracted-mose hands were heavy; and they took a father-child-stone, and put it under him, and he sat thereon; and cabinet-aaron and small-place-prince-hur stayed up his hands, the one on the one side, and the other on the other side; and his hands were steady until the going down of the sun. videi mosheh kebedim vayiqkhu ’eben vayasimu takhtav vayesheb ‘aleha, ve’aharon vekhur tamekhu beyadav mizeh ’ekhad umizeh ’ekhad vayhi yadav ’emunah ‘ad bo hashamesh.
wyHlS yhwS8 1t 8mlq w1t 8mw lpy Hrb and save-joshua-jesus discomfited labour-moloch-king-amalek and his with-mum-people with the edge of the sword. vayakhalosh yehoshua‘ ‘amaleq ve’et ‘amo lefi khareb.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh ktb z1t zkrwn bspr wSym b1zny yhwS8 ky mHh 1mHh 1t zkr 8mlq mtHt hSmym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, write this for a memorial in a book, and rehearse it in the ears of save-joshua-jesus: for i will utterly put out the remembrance of labour-moloch-king-amalek from under namespaces. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ketob zot zikaron basefer vesim be’azenei yehoshua‘, ki makhoh ’emkheh zekher ‘amaleq mitakhat hashamayim.
wybn mSh mzbH wyqr1 Smw yhwh nsy and extracted-mose between-built an butcher-kitchen, and called the name of it yeahoh-yhwh-aeiounissi: vayiben mosheh mizbeakh, vayiqra shemo yhvh nisi.
wy1mr ky yd 8l ks yh mlHmh lyhwh b8mlq mdr dr for he said, because yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath sworn that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will have war with labour-moloch-king-amalek from generation to generation. vayomer ki kes yah milkhamah yhvh ba‘amaleq, midor dor.
wySm8 ytrw khn mdyn Htn mSh 1t kl 1Sr 8Sh 1lhym lmSh wlySr1l 8mw ky hwZy1 yhwh 1t ySr1l mmZrym when look-jethro, the dimmer-server of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian, extracted-mose' father in law, heard of all that towards-these-elohim had done for extracted-mose, and for saturated-towards-israel his with-mum-people, and that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had brought saturated-towards-israel out of narrows-mizraim; vayishma‘ yitro khohen midyan khoten mosheh kal ’asher ‘asah ’elohim lemosheh uleyisra’el ‘amo, ki hozi yhvh yisra’el mimizrayim.
wyqH ytrw Htn mSh 1t Zprh 1St mSh 1Hr SlwHyh then look-jethro, extracted-mose' father in law, took bird-bird-ziporah, extracted-mose' woman, after he had sent her back, vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh ziporah ’eshet mosheh, ’akhar shilukheha.
w1t Sny bnyh 1Sr Sm h1Hd grSm ky 1mr gr hyyty b1rZ nkryh and her two children-betweens; of which the name of the one was stranger-gershom; for he said, i have been an alien in a strange land: ve’et shenei baneha, ’asher shem ha’ekhad gereshom ki ’amar ger hayiti be’erez nakheriyah.
wSm h1Hd 1ly8zr ky 1lhy 1by b8zry wyZlny mHrb pr8h and the name of the other was my-towards-helps-eliezer; for the towards-these-elohim of my father, said he, was mine help, and delivered me from the sword of big-house-pharaoh: veshem ha’ekhad ’eli‘ezer, ki ’elohei ’abi be‘ezri vayazileni mekhereb par‘oh.
wyb1 ytrw Htn mSh wbnyw w1Stw 1l mSh 1l hmdbr 1Sr hw1 Hnh Sm hr h1lhym and look-jethro, extracted-mose' father in law, came with his children-betweens and his woman unto extracted-mose into the place-of-word-desert, where he encamped at the mount of towards-these-elohim: vayabo yitro khoten mosheh ubanav ve’ishto ’el mosheh, ’el hamidbar ’asher hu khoneh har ha’elohim.
wy1mr 1l mSh 1ny Htnk ytrw b1 1lyk w1Stk wSny bnyh 8mh and he said unto extracted-mose, i thy father in law look-jethro am come unto thee, and thy woman, and her two children-betweens with her. vayomer ’el mosheh ’ani khotenkha yitro ba ’elekha, ve’ishtekha ushenei baneha ‘imah.
wyZ1 mSh lqr1t Htnw wyStHw wySq lw wyS1lw 1yS lr8hw lSlwm wyb1w h1hlh and extracted-mose went out to until-witness his father in law, and did obeisance, and kissed him; and they asked each other of their welfare; and they came into the tent. vayezei mosheh liqrat khoteno vayishtakhu vayishaq lo vayish’alu ’ish lere‘ehu leshalom, vayabo’u ha’ohelah.
wyspr mSh lHtnw 1t kl 1Sr 8Sh yhwh lpr8h wlmZrym 8l 1wdt ySr1l 1t kl htl1h 1Sr mZ1tm bdrk wyZlm yhwh and extracted-mose told his father in law all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had done unto big-house-pharaoh and to the narrows-mizraimians for saturated-towards-israel's sake, and all the travail that had come upon them by the way, and how yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou delivered them. vaysaper mosheh lekhoteno kal ’asher ‘asah yhvh lefar‘oh ulemizrayim ‘al ’odot yisra’el, kal hatela’ah ’asher meza’atam baderekh vayazilem yhvh.
wyHd ytrw 8l kl hTwbh 1Sr 8Sh yhwh lySr1l 1Sr hZylw myd mZrym and look-jethro rejoiced for all the goodness which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had done to saturated-towards-israel, whom he had delivered out of the hand of the narrows-mizraimians. vayikhad yitro ‘al kal hatobah ’asher ‘asah yhvh leyisra’el, ’asher hizilo miyad mizrayim.
wy1mr ytrw brwk yhwh 1Sr hZyl 1tkm myd mZrym wmyd pr8h 1Sr hZyl 1t h8m mtHt yd mZrym and look-jethro said, knee-fluffy-blessed be yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, who hath delivered you out of the hand of the narrows-mizraimians, and out of the hand of big-house-pharaoh, who hath delivered the with-mum-people from under the hand of the narrows-mizraimians. vayomer yitro barukh yhvh ’asher hizil ’etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad par‘oh, ’asher hizil ha‘am mitakhat yad mizrayim.
8th yd8ty ky gdwl yhwh mkl h1lhym ky bdbr 1Sr zdw 8lyhm now i hand-know that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is greater than all towards-these-elohim: for in the thing wherein they dealt proudly he was above them. ‘atah yada‘ti ki gadol yhvh mikal ha’elohim, ki badabar ’asher zadu ‘alehem.
wyqH ytrw Htn mSh 8lh wzbHym l1lhym wyb1 1hrn wkl zqny ySr1l l1kl lHm 8m Htn mSh lpny h1lhym and look-jethro, extracted-mose' father in law, took a on-up and butchers for towards-these-elohim: and cabinet-aaron came, and all the elders of saturated-towards-israel, to eat bread with extracted-mose' father in law before-turns towards-these-elohim. vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh ‘olah uzebakhim lelohim, vayabo ’aharon vekhol ziqnei yisra’el le’ekhal lekhem ‘im khoten mosheh lifnei ha’elohim.
wyhy mmHrt wySb mSh lSpT 1t h8m wy8md h8m 8l mSh mn hbqr 8d h8rb and it came to pass on the morrow, that extracted-mose sat to decide the with-mum-people: and the with-mum-people stood by extracted-mose from the morning unto the evening. vayhi mimakhorat vayesheb mosheh lishpot ha‘am, vaya‘amod ha‘am ‘al mosheh min haboqer ‘ad ha‘areb.
wyr1 Htn mSh 1t kl 1Sr hw1 8Sh l8m wy1mr mh hdbr hzh 1Sr 1th 8Sh l8m mdw8 1th ywSb lbdk wkl h8m nZb 8lyk mn bqr 8d 8rb and when extracted-mose' father in law saw all that he did to the with-mum-people, he said, what is this thing that thou doest to the with-mum-people? why sittest thou thyself alone, and all the with-mum-people stand by thee from morning unto even? vayar khoten mosheh kal ’asher hu ‘oseh la‘am, vayomer mah hadabar hazeh ’asher ’atah ‘oseh la‘am madua‘ ’atah yosheb lebadekha vekhal ha‘am nizab ‘alekha min boqer ‘ad ‘areb.
wy1mr mSh lHtnw ky yb1 1ly h8m ldrS 1lhym and extracted-mose said unto his father in law, because the with-mum-people come unto me to inquire of towards-these-elohim: vayomer mosheh lekhoteno, ki yabo ’elay ha‘am lidrosh ’elohim.
ky yhyh lhm dbr b1 1ly wSpTty byn 1yS wbyn r8hw whwd8ty 1t Hqy h1lhym w1t twrtyw when they have a matter, they come unto me; and i decide between-bin one and another, and i do make them hand-know the statutes of towards-these-elohim, and his teachings. ki yihyeh lahem dabar ba ’elay veshafati ben ’ish uben re‘ehu, vehoda‘ti khuqei ha’elohim ve’et torotav.
wy1mr Htn mSh 1lyw l1 Twb hdbr 1Sr 1th 8Sh and extracted-mose' father in law said unto him, the thing that thou doest is not good. vayomer khoten mosheh ’elav, lo tob hadabar ’asher ’atah ‘oseh.
nbl tbl gm 1th gm h8m hzh 1Sr 8mk ky kbd mmk hdbr l1 twkl 8Shw lbdk thou wilt surely wear away, both thou, and this with-mum-people that is with thee: for this thing is too heavy for thee; thou art not able to perform it thyself alone. nabol tibol gam ’atah gam ha‘am hazeh ’asher ‘imakh, ki khabed mimekha hadabar lo tukhal ‘asohu lebadekha.
8th Sm8 bqly 1y8Zk wyhy 1lhym 8mk hyh 1th l8m mwl h1lhym whb1t 1th 1t hdbrym 1l h1lhym hearken now unto my voice, i will give thee counsel, and towards-these-elohim be with thee: be thou for the with-mum-people to towards-these-elohim-ward, that thou mayest bring the causes unto towards-these-elohim: ‘atah shema‘ beqoli ’i‘azekha vihi ’elohim ‘imakh, heyeh ’atah la‘am mul ha’elohim vehebeta ’atah hadebarim ’el ha’elohim.
whzhrth 1thm 1t hHqym w1t htwrt whwd8t lhm 1t hdrk ylkw bh w1t hm8Sh 1Sr y8Swn and thou teach them ordinances and teachings, and show them the way wherein they must walk, and the work that they must do. vehizhartah ’ethem hakhuqim ve’et hatorot, vehoda‘ta lahem haderekh yelekhu bah ve’et hama‘aseh ’asher ya‘asun.
w1th tHzh mkl h8m 1nSy Hyl yr1y 1lhym 1nSy 1mt Sn1y bZ8 wSmt 8lhm Sry 1lpym Sry m1wt Sry HmSym wSry 8Srt moreover thou provide out of all the with-mum-people able men, such as fear towards-these-elohim, men of truth, hating covetousness; and place such over them, to be rulers of thousands, and rulers of hundreds, rulers of fifties, and rulers of tens: ve’atah tekhezeh mikal ha‘am ’anshe khayil yir’ei ’elohim ’anshei ’emet sone’ei baza‘, vesamta ‘alehem sarei ’alafim sarei me’ot sarei khamishim vesarei ‘asarot.
wSpTw 1t h8m bkl 8t whyh kl hdbr hgdl yby1w 1lyk wkl hdbr hqTn ySpTw hm whql m8lyk wnS1w 1tk and let them decide the with-mum-people at all seasons: and it be, that every great matter they bring unto thee, and every small matter they decide: so it be easier for thyself, and they bear the burden with thee. veshafetu ha‘am bekhal ‘et vehayah kal hadabar hagadol yabi’u ’elekha vekhal hadabar haqaton yishpetu hem, vehaqel me‘alekha venase’u ’itakh.
1m 1t hdbr hzh t8Sh wZwk 1lhym wyklt 8md wgm kl h8m hzh 8l mqmw yb1 bSlwm if thou do this thing, and towards-these-elohim order-prescribe thee so, then thou be able to endure, and all this with-mum-people also go to their place in peace. ’im hadabar hazeh ta‘aseh vezivekha ’elohim veyakhaleta ‘amod, vegam kal ha‘am hazeh ‘al meqomo yabo beshalom.
wySm8 mSh lqwl Htnw wy8S kl 1Sr 1mr so extracted-mose hearkened to the voice of his father in law, and did all that he had said. vayishma‘ mosheh leqol khoteno, vaya‘as kol ’asher ’amar.
wybHr mSh 1nSy Hyl mkl ySr1l wytn 1tm r1Sym 8l h8m Sry 1lpym Sry m1wt Sry HmSym wSry 8Srt and extracted-mose chose able men out of all saturated-towards-israel, and made them heads over the with-mum-people, rulers of thousands, rulers of hundreds, rulers of fifties, and rulers of tens. vayibkhar mosheh ’anshe khayil mikal yisra’el vayiten ’otam rashim ‘al ha‘am, sarei ’alafim sarei me’ot sarei khamishim vesarei ‘asarot.
wSpTw 1t h8m bkl 8t 1t hdbr hqSh yby1wn 1l mSh wkl hdbr hqTn ySpwTw hm and they decided the with-mum-people at all seasons: the hard causes they brought unto extracted-mose, and every small matter they decided themselves. veshafetu ha‘am bekhal ‘et, hadabar haqasheh yebi’un ’el mosheh vekhal hadabar haqaton yishputu hem.
wySlH mSh 1t Htnw wylk lw 1l 1rZw and extracted-mose let his father in law depart; and he went his way into his own land. vayshalakh mosheh ’et khoteno, vayelekh lo ’el ’arzo.
bHdS hSlySy lZ1t bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym bywm hzh b1w mdbr syny in the third month, when children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel were gone forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim, the same day came they into the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai. bakhodesh hashelishi lezet bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim, bayom hazeh ba’u midbar sinay.
wys8w mrpydym wyb1w mdbr syny wyHnw bmdbr wyHn Sm ySr1l ngd hhr for they were departed from upholstery-rephidim, and were come to the place-of-word-desert of bush-missai, and had pitched in the place-of-word-desert; and there saturated-towards-israel camped before-turns the mount. vayis‘u merefidim vayabo’u midbar sinay vayakhanu bamidbar, vayikhan sham yisra’el neged hahar.
wmSh 8lh 1l h1lhym wyqr1 1lyw yhwh mn hhr l1mr kh t1mr lbyt y8qb wtgyd lbny ySr1l and extracted-mose went up unto towards-these-elohim, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou called unto him out of the mountain, saying, thus thou say to the daughter-house of backstreet-jacob, and tell children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; umosheh ‘alah ’el ha’elohim, vayiqra ’elav yhvh min hahar lemor koh tomar lebet ya‘aqob vetaged libnei yisra’el.
1tm r1ytm 1Sr 8Syty lmZrym w1S1 1tkm 8l knpy nSrym w1b1 1tkm 1ly ye have seen what i did unto the narrows-mizraimians, and how i conceived-of you on drop-eagles' wings, and brought you unto myself. ’atem re’item ’asher ‘asiti lemizrayim, va’esa ’etkhem ‘al kanfei nesharim va’abi ’etkhem ’elay.
w8th 1m Smw8 tSm8w bqly wSmrtm 1t bryty whyytm ly sglh mkl h8mym ky ly kl h1rZ now therefore, if ye will obey my voice indeed, and keep my covenant, then ye be a peculiar treasure unto me above all with-mum-people: for all the earth is mine: ve‘atah ’im shamoa‘ tishme‘u beqoli ushemartem beriti, vihyitem li segulah mikal ha‘amim ki li kal ha’arez.
w1tm thyw ly mmlkt khnym wgwy qdwS 1lh hdbrym 1Sr tdbr 1l bny ySr1l and ye be unto me a moloch-kingdom of dimmer-servers, and an dedicated-finished nation. these are the bee-words which thou speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ve’atem tihyu li mamlekhet kohanim vego qadosh, ’eleh hadebarim ’asher tedaber ’el benei yisra’el.
wyb1 mSh wyqr1 lzqny h8m wySm lpnyhm 1t kl hdbrym h1lh 1Sr Zwhw yhwh and extracted-mose came and called for the elders of the with-mum-people, and laid before-turns their face-turns-turns all these bee-words which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him. vayabo mosheh vayiqra leziqnei ha‘am, vayasem lifnehem kal hadebarim ha’eleh ’asher zivahu yhvh.
wy8nw kl h8m yHdw wy1mrw kl 1Sr dbr yhwh n8Sh wySb mSh 1t dbry h8m 1l yhwh and all the with-mum-people answered together, and said, all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath bee-spoken we will do. and extracted-mose returned the bee-words of the with-mum-people unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vaya‘anu khal ha‘am yakhdav vayomeru kol ’asher diber yhvh na‘aseh, vayasheb mosheh dibrei ha‘am ’el yhvh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hnh 1nky b1 1lyk b8b h8nn b8bwr ySm8 h8m bdbry 8mk wgm bk y1mynw l8wlm wygd mSh 1t dbry h8m 1l yhwh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, lo, i come unto thee in a thick cloud, that the with-mum-people may hear when i speak with thee, and be coached by thee for ever. and extracted-mose told the bee-words of the with-mum-people unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hineh ’anokhi ba ’elekha be‘ab he‘anan ba‘abur yishma‘ ha‘am bedaberi ‘imakh vegam bekha ya’aminu le‘olam, vayaged mosheh dibrei ha‘am ’el yhvh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh lk 1l h8m wqdStm hywm wmHr wkbsw Smltm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, go unto the with-mum-people, and dedicate-finify them to day and to morrow, and let them wash their clothes, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lekh ’el ha‘am veqidashtam hayom umakhar, vekhibesu simlotam.
whyw nknym lywm hSlySy ky bywm hSlySy yrd yhwh l8yny kl h8m 8l hr syny and be ready against the third day: for the third day yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will come down in the sight of all the with-mum-people upon mount bush-(proto-)sinai. vehayu nekhonim layom hashelishi, ki bayom hashelishi yered yhvh le‘enei khal ha‘am ‘al har sinay.
whgblt 1t h8m sbyb l1mr hSmrw lkm 8lwt bhr wng8 bqZhw kl hng8 bhr mwt ywmt and thou set bounds unto the with-mum-people round about, saying, take heed to yourselves, that ye go not up into the mount, or touch the border of it: whosoever toucheth the mount be deadly put to death: vehigbalta ha‘am sabib lemor hishameru lakhem ‘alot bahar unegoa‘ beqazehu, kal hanogea‘ bahar mot yumat.
l1 tg8 bw yd ky sqwl ysql 1w yrh yyrh 1m bhmh 1m 1yS l1 yHyh bmSk hybl hmh y8lw bhr there not an hand touch it, and he surely be stoned, or shot through; whether it be beast or man, it not live: when the mouthpiece-trumpet soundeth long, they come up to the mount. lo tiga‘ bo yad ki saqol yisaqel ’o yiyareh ’im behemah ’im ’ish lo yikhyeh, bimshokh hayobel hemah ya‘alu bahar.
wyrd mSh mn hhr 1l h8m wyqdS 1t h8m wykbsw Smltm and extracted-mose went down from the mount unto the with-mum-people, and dedicated-finished the with-mum-people; and they washed their clothes. vayered mosheh min hahar ’el ha‘am, vayqadesh ha‘am vaykhabesu simlotam.
wy1mr 1l h8m hyw nknym lSlSt ymym 1l tgSw 1l 1Sh and he said unto the with-mum-people, be ready against the third day: come not at your women. vayomer ’el ha‘am heyu nekhonim lishloshet yamim, ’al tigeshu ’el ’ishah.
wyhy bywm hSlySy bhyt hbqr wyhy qlt wbrqym w8nn kbd 8l hhr wql Spr Hzq m1d wyHrd kl h8m 1Sr bmHnh and it came to pass on the third day in the morning, that there were thunders and lightnings, and a thick cloud upon the mount, and the voice of the mouthpiece-trumpet exceeding loud; so that all the with-mum-people that was in the camp trembled. vayhi bayom hashelishi bihyot haboqer vayhi qolot uberaqim ve‘anan kabed ‘al hahar veqol shofar khazaq me’od, vayekherad kal ha‘am ’asher bamakhaneh.
wywZ1 mSh 1t h8m lqr1t h1lhym mn hmHnh wytyZbw btHtyt hhr and extracted-mose brought forth the with-mum-people out of the camp to until-witness with towards-these-elohim; and they stood at the nether part of the mount. vayozei mosheh ha‘am liqrat ha’elohim min hamakhaneh, vayityazebu betakhtit hahar.
whr syny 8Sn klw mpny 1Sr yrd 8lyw yhwh b1S wy8l 8Snw k8Sn hkbSn wyHrd kl hhr m1d and mount bush-(proto-)sinai was altogether on a smoke, because yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou descended upon it in fire: and the smoke thereof ascended as the smoke of a furnace, and the whole mount quaked greatly. vehar sinay ‘ashan kulo ’asher yarad ‘alav yhvh ba’esh, vaya‘al ‘ashano ke‘eshen hakibshan vayekherad kal hahar me’od.
wyhy qwl hSwpr hwlk wHzq m1d mSh ydbr wh1lhym y8nnw bqwl and when the voice of the mouthpiece-trumpet sounded long, and waxed louder and louder, extracted-mose spake, and towards-these-elohim answered him by a voice. vayhi qol hashofar holekh vekhazeq me’od, mosheh yedaber veha’elohim ya‘anenu beqol.
wyrd yhwh 8l hr syny 1l r1S hhr wyqr1 yhwh lmSh 1l r1S hhr wy8l mSh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou came down upon mount bush-(proto-)sinai, on the head of the mount: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou called extracted-mose up to the head of the mount; and extracted-mose went up. vayered yhvh ‘al har sinay ’el rosh hahar, vayiqra yhvh lemosheh ’el rosh hahar vaya‘al mosheh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh rd h8d b8m pn yhrsw 1l yhwh lr1wt wnpl mmnw rb and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, go down, charge the with-mum-people, lest they break through unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to gaze, and many of them perish. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh red ha‘ed ba‘am, pen yehersu ’el yhvh lir’ot venafal mimenu rab.
wgm hkhnym hngSym 1l yhwh ytqdSw pn yprZ bhm yhwh and let the dimmer-servers also, which come near to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, dedicate-finify themselves, lest yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou break forth upon them. vegam hakohanim hanigashim ’el yhvh yitqadashu, pen yifroz bahem yhvh.
wy1mr mSh 1l yhwh l1 ywkl h8m l8lt 1l hr syny ky 1th h8dth bnw l1mr hgbl 1t hhr wqdStw and extracted-mose said unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, the with-mum-people cannot come up to mount bush-(proto-)sinai: for thou chargedst us, saying, set bounds about the mount, and dedicate-finify it. vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh lo ha‘am la‘alot ’el har sinay, ki ’atah ha‘edotah banu lemor hagbel hahar veqidashto.
wy1mr 1lyw yhwh lk rd w8lyt 1th w1hrn 8mk whkhnym wh8m 1l yhrsw l8lt 1l yhwh pn yprZ bm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto him, away, get thee down, and thou come up, thou, and cabinet-aaron with thee: and let not the dimmer-servers and the with-mum-people break through to come up unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, lest he break forth upon them. vayomer ’elav yhvh lekh red ve‘alita ’atah ve’aharon ‘imakh, vehakohanim veha‘am ’al yehersu la‘alot ’el yhvh pen yifraz bam.
wyrd mSh 1l h8m wy1mr 1lhm so extracted-mose went down unto the with-mum-people, and spake unto them. vayered mosheh ’el ha‘am, vayomer ’alehem.
wydbr 1lhym 1t kl hdbrym h1lh l1mr and towards-these-elohim spake all these bee-words, saying, vaydaber ’elohim kal hadebarim ha’eleh lemor.
1nky yhwh 1lhyk 1Sr hwZ1tyk m1rZ mZrym mbyt 8bdym i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, which have brought thee out of the land of narrows-mizraim, out of the daughter-house of bondage. ’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha ’asher hozetikha me’erez mizrayim mibet ‘abadim.
l1 yhyh lk 1lhym 1Hrym 8l pny thou have no other towards-these-elohim before-turns me. lo yihyeh lekha ’elohim ’akherim ‘al panaya
l1 t8Sh lk psl wkl tmwnh 1Sr bSmym mm8l w1Sr b1rZ mtHt w1Sr bmym mtHt l1rZ no make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing that is in namespaces above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the from-waters under the earth. lo ta‘aseh lekha fesel vekhal temunah ’asher bashamayim mima‘al va’asher ba’arez mitakhat va’asher bamayim mitakhat la’arez
l1 tStHwh lhm wl1 t8bdm ky 1nky yhwh 1lhyk 1l qn1 pqd 8wn 1bt 8l bnym 8l SlSym w8l rb8ym lSn1y no bow down thyself to them, nor work for them: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim am a jealous towards-these-elohim, visiting the torment of the fathers upon children-betweens unto the third and fourth generation of them that hate me; lo tishtakhveh lahem velo ta‘abedem ki ’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha ’el qana poqed ‘avon ’abot ‘al banim ‘al shileshim ve‘al ribe‘im lesone’ay.
w8Sh Hsd l1lpym l1hby wlSmry mZwty and showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me, and keep my order-prescriptions. ve‘oseh khesed la’alafim le’ohabay uleshomerei mizvotay.
l1 tS1 1t Sm yhwh 1lhyk lSw1 ky l1 ynqh yhwh 1t 1Sr yS1 1t Smw lSw1 no take the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim in vain; for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain. lo tisa shem yhvh ’elohekha lashav, ki lo yenaqeh yhvh ’asher yisa shemo lashav.
zkwr 1t ywm hSbt lqdSw remember the seven-sabbath day, to keep it dedicated-finished. zakhor ’et yom hashabat leqadesho
SSt ymym t8bd w8Syt kl ml1ktk six days thou labor, and do all thy work: sheshet yamim ta‘abod ve‘asita kal melakhtekha
wywm hSby8y Sbt lyhwh 1lhyk l1 t8Sh kl ml1kh 1th wbnk wbtk 8bdk w1mtk wbhmtk wgrk 1Sr bS8ryk and the seventh day is the seven-sabbath of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: in it no do any work, thou, nor thy child-between, nor thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, thy worker, nor thy mum-true-maid, nor thy in-them-animal, nor thy stranger that is within thy hair-gates: veyom hashebi‘i shabat yhvh ’elohekha lo ta‘aseh khal melakhah ’atah ubinkha ubitekha ‘abdekha va’amatekha ubehemtekha vegerekha ’asher bish‘arekha
ky SSt ymym 8Sh yhwh 1t hSmym w1t h1rZ 1t hym w1t kl 1Sr bm wynH bywm hSby8y 8l kn brk yhwh 1t ywm hSbt wyqdShw for in six days yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made namespaces and earth, the sea, and all that in them is, and rested the seventh day: wherefore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou knee-fluffy-blessed the seven-sabbath day, and dedicateed it. ki sheshet yamim ‘asah yhvh hashamayim ve’et ha’arez hayam ve’et kal ’asher bam vayanakh bayom hashebi‘i, ken berakh yhvh ’et yom hashabat vayqadeshehu.
kbd 1t 1byk w1t 1mk lm8n y1rkwn ymyk 8l h1dmh 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk give weight to thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee. kabed ’abikha ve’et ’imekha, lema‘an ya’arikhun yamekha ‘al ha’adamah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
l1 trZH no kill. lo trezakh.
l1 tn1p no commit adultery. lo tne’af.
l1 tgnb no steal. lo tgenob.
l1 t8nh br8k 8d Sqr no bear false witness against thy neighbor. lo ta‘aneh bere‘akha ‘ed shaqer.
l1 tHmd byt r8k l1 tHmd 1St r8k w8bdw w1mtw wSwrw wHmrw wkl 1Sr lr8k no covet thy neighbor's daughter-house, no covet thy neighbor's woman, nor his worker, nor his mum-true-maid, nor his wall-ox, nor his ass, nor any thing that is thy neighbor's. lo takhmod bet re‘ekha, lo takhmod ’eshet re‘ekha ve‘abdo va’amato veshoro vakhamoro vekhol ’asher lere‘ekha.
wkl h8m r1ym 1t hqwlt w1t hlpydm w1t qwl hSpr w1t hhr 8Sn wyr1 h8m wyn8w wy8mdw mrHq and all the with-mum-people saw the thunderings, and the lightnings, and the noise of the mouthpiece-trumpet, and the mountain smoking: and when the with-mum-people saw it, they removed, and stood afar off. vekhal ha‘am ro’im haqolot ve’et halapidim ve’et qol hashofar ve’et hahar ‘ashen, vayar ha‘am vayanu‘u vaya‘amdu merakhoq.
wy1mrw 1l mSh dbr 1th 8mnw wnSm8h w1l ydbr 8mnw 1lhym pn nmwt and they said unto extracted-mose, speak thou with us, and we will hear: and let not towards-these-elohim speak with us, lest we die. vayomeru ’el mosheh daber ’atah ‘imanu venishma‘ah, ve’al yedaber ‘imanu ’elohim pen namut.
wy1mr mSh 1l h8m 1l tyr1w ky lb8bwr nswt 1tkm b1 h1lhym wb8bwr thyh yr1tw 8l pnykm lblty tHT1w and extracted-mose said unto the with-mum-people, fear not: for towards-these-elohim is come to prove you, and that his fear may be before-turns your face-turns-turns, that ye miss not. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am ’al tira’u ki leba‘abur nasot ’etkhem ba ha’elohim, uba‘abur tihyeh yir’ato ‘al penekhem lebilti tekheta’u.
wy8md h8m mrHq wmSh ngS 1l h8rpl 1Sr Sm h1lhym and the with-mum-people stood afar off, and extracted-mose drew near unto the thick darkness where towards-these-elohim was. vaya‘amod ha‘am merakhoq, umosheh nigash ’el ha‘arafel ’asher sham ha’elohim.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh kh t1mr 1l bny ySr1l 1tm r1ytm ky mn hSmym dbrty 8mkm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, thus thou say unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, ye have seen that i have talked with you from namespaces. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh koh tomar ’el benei yisra’el, ’atem re’item ki min hashamayim dibarti ‘imakhem.
l1 t8Swn 1ty 1lhy ksp w1lhy zhb l1 t8Sw lkm ye not make with me towards-these-elohim of silver, neither ye make unto you towards-these-elohim of gold. lo ta‘asun ’iti, ’elohei khesef velohei zahab lo ta‘asu lakhem.
mzbH 1dmh t8Sh ly wzbHt 8lyw 1t 8ltyk w1t Slmyk 1t Z1nk w1t bqrk bkl hmqwm 1Sr 1zkyr 1t Smy 1bw1 1lyk wbrktyk an butcher-kitchen of earth thou make unto me, and butcher thereon thy on-ups, and thy wholes, thy sheep, and thine wall-oxen: in all places where i record my name i will come unto thee, and i will knee-fluffy-bless thee. mizbakh ’adamah ta‘aseh li vezabakhta ‘alav ‘olotekha ve’et shelamekha zonekha ve’et beqarekha, bekhal hamaqom ’asher ’azkir shemi ’abo ’elekha uberakhtikha.
w1m mzbH 1bnym t8Sh ly l1 tbnh 1thn gzyt ky Hrbk hnpt 8lyh wtHllh and if thou wilt make me an butcher-kitchen of father-child-stone, no between-build it of hewn father-child-stone: for if thou lift up thy tool upon it, thou hast polluted it. ve’im mizbakh ’abanim ta‘aseh li lo tibneh ’ethen gazit, ki kharbekha henafta ‘aleha vatekhaleha.
wl1 t8lh bm8lt 8l mzbHy 1Sr l1 tglh 8rwtk 8lyw neither thou go up by steps unto mine butcher-kitchen, that thy nakedness be not discovered thereon. velo ta‘aleh bema‘alot ‘al mizbekhi, ’asher lo tigaleh ‘ervatekha ‘alav.
w1lh hmSpTym 1Sr tSym lpnyhm now these are the decision-grammars which thou set before-turns them. ve’eleh hamishpatim ’asher tasim lifnehem.
ky tqnh 8bd 8bry SS Snym y8bd wbSb8t yZ1 lHpSy Hnm if thou buy an cross-over-hebrew worker, six years he work for: and in the seventh he go out free for nothing. ki tiqneh ‘ebed ‘ibri shesh shanim ya‘abod, ubashebi‘it yezei lakhafeshi khinam.
1m bgpw yb1 bgpw yZ1 1m b8l 1Sh hw1 wyZ1h 1Stw 8mw if he came in by himself, he go out by himself: if he were married, then his woman go out with him. ’im begapo yabo begapo yeze, ’im ba‘al ’ishah hu veyaze’ah ’ishto ‘imo.
1m 1dnyw ytn lw 1Sh wyldh lw bnym 1w bnwt h1Sh wyldyh thyh l1dnyh whw1 yZ1 bgpw if his master have given him a woman, and she have born him children-betweens or children-betweenesss; the woman and her children-betweens be her master's, and he go out by himself. ’im ’adonav yiten lo ’ishah veyaledah lo banim ’o banot, ha’ishah viladeha tihyeh ladoneha vehu yezei begapo.
w1m 1mr y1mr h8bd 1hbty 1t 1dny 1t 1Sty w1t bny l1 1Z1 HpSy and if the worker plainly say, i love my master, my woman, and my children-betweens; i will not go out free: ve’im ’amor yomar ha‘ebed ’ahabti ’adoni ’ishti ve’et banay, lo ’ezei khafeshi.
whgySw 1dnyw 1l h1lhym whgySw 1l hdlt 1w 1l hmzwzh wrZ8 1dnyw 1t 1znw bmrZ8 w8bdw l8lm then his master bring him unto the decides; he also bring him to the opening, or unto the opening post; and his master bore his ear through with an awl; and he work for him for ever. vehigisho ’adonav ’el ha’elohim vehigisho ’el hadelet ’o ’el hamezuzah, veraza‘ ’adonav ’azeno bamarzea‘ va‘abado le‘olam.
wky ymkr 1yS 1t btw l1mh l1 tZ1 kZ1t h8bdym and if a man sell his daughter-hoof-bat-child to be a mum-true-maid, she not go out as the workers do. vekhi yimkor ’ish bito le’amah, lo tezei kezet ha‘abadim.
1m r8h b8yny 1dnyh 1Sr l1 lw y8dh whpdh l8m nkry l1 ymSl lmkrh bbgdw bh if she please not her master, who hath betrothed her to himself, then he let her be redeemed: to sell her unto a strange nation he have no dynamic, seeing he hath dealt deceitfully with her. ’im ra‘ah be‘enei ’adoneha ’asher lo ye‘adah vehefdah, le‘am nakheri lo yimshol lemakherah bebigdo bah.
w1m lbnw yy8dnh kmSpT hbnwt y8Sh lh and if he have betrothed her unto his child-between, he deal with her after the manner of children-betweenesss. ve’im libno yi‘adenah, kemishpat habanot ya‘aseh lah.
1m 1Hrt yqH lw S1rh kswth w8nth l1 ygr8 if he take him another woman; her food, her raiment, and her duty of marriage, he not diminish. ’im ’akheret yiqakh lo, she’erah kesutah ve‘onatah lo yigra‘.
w1m SlS 1lh l1 y8Sh lh wyZ1h Hnm 1yn ksp and if he do not these three unto her, then she go out free without money. ve’im shelash ’eleh lo ya‘aseh lah, veyaze’ah khinam ’en kasef.
mkh 1yS wmt mwt ywmt he that hits a man, so that he die, be deadly put to death. makeh ’ish vamet mot yumat.
w1Sr l1 Zdh wh1lhym 1nh lydw wSmty lk mqwm 1Sr ynws Smh and if a man lie not in wait, and towards-these-elohim deliver him into his hand; then i will appoint thee a place whither he flee. va’asher lo zadah veha’elohim ’inah leyado, vesamti lekha maqom ’asher yanus.
wky yzd 1yS 8l r8hw lhrgw b8rmh m8m mzbHy tqHnw lmwt and if a man come presumptuously upon his neighbor, to slay him with guile; thou take him from mine butcher-kitchen, that he may die. vekhi yazid ’ish ‘al re‘ehu leharego be‘aremah, me‘im mizbekhi tiqakhenu lamut.
wmkh 1byw w1mw mwt ywmt and he that hits his father, or his mother, be deadly put to death. umakeh ’abiv ve’imo mot yumat.
