wgnb 1yS wmkrw wnmZ1 bydw mwt ywmt and he that stealeth a man, and selleth him, or if he be found in his hand, he surely be put to death. vegoneb ’ish umekharo venimza beyado mot yumat.
wmqll 1byw w1mw mwt ywmt and he that curseth his father, or his mother, surely be put to death. umeqalel ’abiv ve’imo mot yumat.
wky yrybn 1nSym whkh 1yS 1t r8hw b1bn 1w b1grp wl1 ymwt wnpl lmSkb and if men strive together, and one hit another with a father-child-stone, or with his fist, and he die not, and keepeth his bed: vekhi yeribun ’anashim vehikah ’ish re‘ehu be’eben ’o be’egrof, velo yamut venafal lemishkab.
1m yqwm whthlk bHwZ 8l mS8ntw wnqh hmkh rq Sbtw ytn wrp1 yrp1 if he rise again, and walk abroad upon his staff, then he that smote him be quit: only he pay for the loss of his time, and cause him to be thoroughly healed. ’im yaqum vehithalekh bakhuz ‘al mish‘anto veniqah hamakeh, raq shibto yiten verapo yerape.
wky ykh 1yS 1t 8bdw 1w 1t 1mtw bSbT wmt tHt ydw nqm ynqm and if a man hit his worker, or his maid, with a rod, and he die under his hand; he be surely punished. vekhi yakeh ’ish ‘abdo ’o ’amato bashebet umet takhat yado, naqom yinaqem.
1k 1m ywm 1w ywmym y8md l1 yqm ky kspw hw1 notwithstanding, if he continue a day or two, he not be punished: for he is his money. ’akh ’im yom ’o yomayim ya‘amod, lo yuqam ki khaspo hu.
wky ynZw 1nSym wngpw 1Sh hrh wyZ1w yldyh wl1 yhyh 1swn 8nwS y8nS k1Sr ySyt 8lyw b8l h1Sh wntn bpllym if men strive, and hurt a woman with child, so that her fruit depart from her, and yet no mischief follow: he be surely punished, according as the woman's man will lay upon him; and he pay as the decides determine. vekhi yinazu ’anashim venagefu ’ishah harah veyaze’u yeladeha velo yihyeh ’ason, ‘anosh ye‘anesh ka’asher yashit ‘alav ba‘al ha’ishah venatan biflilim.
w1m 1swn yhyh wntth npS tHt npS and if any mischief follow, then thou give life for life, ve’im ’ason yihyeh, venatatah nefesh takhat nafesh.
8yn tHt 8yn Sn tHt Sn yd tHt yd rgl tHt rgl eye for eye, tooth for tooth, hand for hand, foot for foot, ‘ayin takhat ‘ayin shen takhat shen, yad takhat yad regel takhat ragel.
kwyh tHt kwyh pZ8 tHt pZ8 Hbwrh tHt Hbwrh burning for burning, wound for wound, stripe for stripe. keviyah takhat keviyah peza‘ takhat paza‘, khaburah takhat khaburah.
wky ykh 1yS 1t 8yn 8bdw 1w 1t 8yn 1mtw wSHth lHpSy ySlHnw tHt 8ynw and if a man hit the eye of his worker, or the eye of his maid, that it perish; he let him go free for his eye's sake. vekhi yakeh ’ish ‘en ‘abdo ’o ‘en ’amato veshikhatah, lakhafeshi yeshalekhenu ‘eno.
w1m Sn 8bdw 1w Sn 1mtw ypyl lHpSy ySlHnw tHt Snw and if he hit out his worker's tooth, or his mum-true-maid's tooth; he let him go free for his tooth's sake. ve’im shen ‘abdo ’o shen ’amato yapil, lakhafeshi yeshalekhenu shino.
wky ygH Swr 1t 1yS 1w 1t 1Sh wmt sqwl ysql hSwr wl1 y1kl 1t bSrw wb8l hSwr nqy if an wall-ox gore a man or a woman, that they die: then the wall-ox be surely stoned, and his flesh not be eaten; and the owner of the wall-ox be quit. vekhi yigakh shor ’ish ’o ’ishah vamet, saqol yisaqel hashor velo ye’akhel besaro uba‘al hashor naqi.
w1m Swr ngH hw1 mtml SlSm whw8d bb8lyw wl1 ySmrnw whmyt 1yS 1w 1Sh hSwr ysql wgm b8lyw ywmt and if the wall-ox were wont to push with his horn-ray in time past, and it hath been testified to his owner, and he hath not kept him in, and that he hath killed a man or a woman; the wall-ox be stoned, and his owner also be put to death. ve’im shor nagakh hu mitemol shilshom vehu‘ad bib‘alav velo yishmerenu vehemit ’ish ’o ’ishah, hashor yisaqel vegam be‘alav yumat.
1m kpr ywSt 8lyw wntn pdyn npSw kkl 1Sr ywSt 8lyw if there be laid on him a sum of money, then he give for the ransom of his life whatsoever is laid upon him. ’im kofer yushat ‘alav, venatan pidyon nafsho kekhol ’asher yushat ‘alav.
1w bn ygH 1w bt ygH kmSpT hzh y8Sh lw whether he have gored a child-between, or have gored a daughter-hoof-bat-child, according to this decision-grammar it be done unto him. ’o ben yigakh ’o bat yigakh, kamishpat hazeh ye‘aseh lo.
1m 8bd ygH hSwr 1w 1mh ksp SlSym Sqlym ytn l1dnyw whSwr ysql if the wall-ox push a worker or a mum-true-maid; he give unto their master thirty light-shekels of silver, and the wall-ox be stoned. ’im ‘ebed yigakh hashor ’o ’amah, kesef sheloshim sheqalim yiten ladonav vehashor yisaqel.
wky yptH 1yS bwr 1w ky ykrh 1yS br wl1 yksnw wnpl Smh Swr 1w Hmwr and if a man open a pit, or if a man dig a pit, and not cover it, and an wall-ox or an ass fall therein; vekhi yiftakh ’ish bor ’o ki yikhreh ’ish bor velo yekhasenu, venafal shamah shor ’o khamor.
b8l hbwr ySlm ksp ySyb lb8lyw whmt yhyh lw the owner of the pit make it good, and give money unto the owner of them; and the dead beast be his. ba‘al habor yeshalem kesef yashib lib‘alav, vehamet yihyeh lo.
wky ygp Swr 1yS 1t Swr r8hw wmt wmkrw 1t hSwr hHy wHZw 1t kspw wgm 1t hmt yHZwn and if one man's wall-ox hurt another's, that he die; then they sell the live wall-ox, and divide the money of it; and the dead wall-ox also they divide. vekhi yigof shor ’ish re‘ehu vamet, umakheru hashor hakhay vekhazu kaspo vegam ’et hamet yekhezun.
1w nwd8 ky Swr ngH hw1 mtmwl SlSm wl1 ySmrnw b8lyw Slm ySlm Swr tHt hSwr whmt yhyh lw or if it be hand-known that the wall-ox hath used to push in time past, and his owner hath not kept him in; he surely pay wall-ox for wall-ox; and the dead be his own. ’o noda‘ ki shor nagakh hu mitemol shilshom velo yishmerenu be‘alav, shalem yeshalem shor takhat hashor vehamet yihyeh lo.
ky ygnb 1yS Swr 1w Sh wTbHw 1w mkrw HmSh bqr ySlm tHt hSwr w1rb8 Z1n tHt hSh if a man steal an wall-ox, or a sheep, and kill it, or sell it; he restore five wall-oxen for an wall-ox, and four sheep for a sheep. ki yignob ’ish shor ’o seh utebakho ’o mekharo, khamishah baqar yeshalem takhat hashor ve’arba‘ zon takhat haseh.
1m bmHtrt ymZ1 hgnb whkh wmt 1yn lw dmym if a thief be found breaking up, and be smitten that he die, there no blood be shed for him. ’im bamakhteret yimazei haganab vehukah vamet, ’en lo damim.
1m zrHh hSmS 8lyw dmym lw Slm ySlm 1m 1yn lw wnmkr bgnbtw if the sun be risen upon him, there be blood shed for him; for he should make full wholeness; if he have nothing, then he be sold for his theft. ’im zarekhah hashemesh ‘alav damim lo, shalem yeshalem ’im ’en lo venimkar bignebato.
1m hmZ1 tmZ1 bydw hgnbh mSwr 8d Hmwr 8d Sh Hyym Snym ySlm if the theft be certainly found in his hand alive, whether it be wall-ox, or ass, or sheep; he restore double. ’im himazei timazei beyado hagenebah mishor ‘ad khamor ‘ad seh khayim, shenayim yeshalem.
ky yb8r 1yS Sdh 1w krm wSlH 1t b8yrh b8yrw wb8r bSdh 1Hr myTb Sdhw wmyTb krmw ySlm if a man cause a field or vineyard to be eaten, and put in his beast, and feed in another man's field; of the best of his own field, and of the best of his own vineyard, he make wholeness. ki yab‘er ’ish sadeh ’o kherem veshilakh be‘iro ubi‘er bisdeh ’akher, metab sadehu umetab karmo yeshalem.
ky tZ1 1S wmZ1h qZym wn1kl gdyS 1w hqmh 1w hSdh Slm ySlm hmb8r 1t hb8rh if fire break out, and catch in thorns, so that the stacks of corn-swimming, or the standing corn-swimming, or the field, be consumed therewith; he that kindled the fire surely make wholeness. ki tezei ’esh umaze’ah qozim vene’ekhal gadish ’o haqamah ’o hasadeh, shalem yeshalem hamab‘ir habe‘erah.
ky ytn 1yS 1l r8hw ksp 1w klym lSmr wgnb mbyt h1yS 1m ymZ1 hgnb ySlm Snym if a man deliver unto his neighbor money or stuff to keep, and it be stolen out of the man's daughter-house; if the thief be found, let him pay double. ki yiten ’ish ’el re‘ehu kesef ’o khelim lishmor vegunab mibet ha’ish, ’im yimazei haganab yeshalem shenayim.
1m l1 ymZ1 hgnb wnqrb b8l hbyt 1l h1lhym 1m l1 SlH ydw bml1kt r8hw if the thief be not found, then the master of the daughter-house be brought unto the decides, to see whether he have put his hand unto his neighbor's goods. ’im lo yimazei haganab veniqrab ba‘al habayit ’el ha’elohim, lo shalakh yado bimlekhet re‘ehu.
8l kl dbr pS8 8l Swr 8l Hmwr 8l Sh 8l Slmh 8l kl 1bdh 1Sr y1mr ky hw1 zh 8d h1lhym yb1 dbr Snyhm 1Sr yrSy8n 1lhym ySlm Snym lr8hw for all manner of fire-name, whether it be for wall-ox, for ass, for sheep, for raiment, or for any manner of lost thing which another challengeth to be his, the cause of both parties come before-turns the decides; and whom the decides condemn, he pay double unto his neighbor. ‘al kal debar pesha‘ ‘al shor ‘al khamor ‘al seh ‘al salmah ‘al kal ’abedah ’asher yomar ki hu zeh ‘ad ha’elohim yabo debar shenehem, ’asher yarshi‘un ’elohim yeshalem shenayim lere‘ehu.
ky ytn 1yS 1l r8hw Hmwr 1w Swr 1w Sh wkl bhmh lSmr wmt 1w nSbr 1w nSbh 1yn r1h if a man deliver unto his neighbor an ass, or an wall-ox, or a sheep, or any beast, to keep; and it die, or be hurt, or driven away, no man seeing it: ki yiten ’ish ’el re‘ehu khamor ’o shor ’o seh vekhal behemah lishmor, umet ’o nishbar ’o nishbah ’en ro’eh.
Sb8t yhwh thyh byn Snyhm 1m l1 SlH ydw bml1kt r8hw wlqH b8lyw wl1 ySlm then an toward-oath of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou be between-bin them both, that he hath not put his hand unto his neighbor's goods; and the owner of it accept thereof, and he not make it good. shebu‘at yhvh tihyeh ben shenehem ’im lo shalakh yado bimlekhet re‘ehu, velaqakh be‘alav velo yeshalem.
w1m gnb ygnb m8mw ySlm lb8lyw and if it be stolen from him, he make wholeness unto the owner thereof. ve’im ganob yiganeb me‘imo, yeshalem lib‘alav.
1m Trp yTrp yb1hw 8d hTrph l1 ySlm if it be torn in pieces, then let him bring it for witness, and he not make good that which was torn. ’im tarof yitaref yebi’ehu ‘ed, haterefah lo yeshalem.
wky yS1l 1yS m8m r8hw wnSbr 1w mt b8lyw 1yn 8mw Slm ySlm and if a man borrow ought of his neighbor, and it be hurt, or die, the owner thereof being not with it, he surely make it good. vekhi yish’al ’ish me‘im re‘ehu venishbar ’o met, be‘alav ’en ‘imo shalem yeshalem.
1m b8lyw 8mw l1 ySlm 1m Skyr hw1 b1 bSkrw and if the owner thereof be with it, he not make it good: if it be an hired thing, it came for his hire. ’im be‘alav ‘imo lo yeshalem, ’im sakhir hu ba biskharo.
wky ypth 1yS btwlh 1Sr l1 1rSh wSkb 8mh mhr ymhrnh lw l1Sh and if a man entice a maid that is not betrothed, and lie with her, he surely endow her to be his woman. vekhi yefateh ’ish betulah ’asher lo ’orasah veshakhab ‘imah, mahor yimharenah le’ishah.
1m m1n ym1n 1byh ltth lw ksp ySql kmhr hbtwlt if her father utterly refuse to give her unto him, he pay money according to the dowry of virgins. ’im ma’en yema’en ’abiha letitah lo, kesef yishqol kemohar habetulot.
mkSph l1 tHyh no suffer a spell-caster to live. mekhashefah lo tekhayeh.
kl Skb 8m bhmh mwt ywmt whosoever lieth with a beast surely be put to death. kal shokheb ‘im behemah mot yumat.
zbH l1lhym yHrm blty lyhwh lbdw he that butcherth unto any towards-these-elohim, save unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou only, he be fishing-net-destroyed. zobeakh la’elohim yakhoram, bilti yhvh lebado.
wgr l1 twnh wl1 tlHZnw ky grym hyytm b1rZ mZrym thou neither vex a stranger, nor oppress him: for ye were strangers in the land of narrows-mizraim. veger lo toneh velo tilkhazenu, ki gerim heyitem be’erez mizrayim.
kl 1lmnh wytwm l1 t8nwn ye not afflict any widow, or fatherless child. kal ’almanah veyatom lo te‘anun.
1m 8nh t8nh 1tw ky 1m Z8q yZ8q 1ly Sm8 1Sm8 Z8qtw if thou afflict them in any wise, and they cry at all unto me, i will surely hear their cry; ’im ‘aneh te‘aneh ’oto, ki ’im za‘oq yiz‘aq ’elay shamoa‘ ’eshma‘ za‘aqato.
wHrh 1py whrgty 1tkm bHrb whyw nSykm 1lmnwt wbnykm ytmym and my wrath wax hot, and i will kill you with the sword; and your women be widows, and your children-betweens fatherless. vekharah ’api veharagti ’etkhem bekhareb, vehayu neshekhem ’almanot ubenekhem yetomim.
1m ksp tlwh 1t 8my 1t h8ny 8mk l1 thyh lw knSh l1 tSymwn 8lyw nSk if thou lend money to any of my with-mum-people that is poor by thee, no be to him as an usurer, neither thou lay upon him usury. ’im kesef talveh ’et ‘ami he‘ani ‘imakh lo tihyeh lo kenosheh, lo tesimun ‘alav neshekh.
1m Hbl tHbl Slmt r8k 8d b1 hSmS tSybnw lw if thou at all take thy neighbor's raiment to pledge, thou deliver it unto him by that the sun goeth down: ’im khabol takhbol salmat re‘ekha, ‘ad bo hashemesh teshibenu lo.
ky hw1 kswth kswtw lbdh hw1 Smltw l8rw bmh ySkb whyh ky yZ8q 1ly wSm8ty ky Hnwn 1ny for that is his covering only, it is his raiment for his light-skin: wherein he sleep? and it come to pass, when he crieth unto me, that i will hear; for i am gracious. ki hi khesuto lebadah hi simlato le‘oro, bameh yishkab vehayah ki yiz‘aq ’elay veshama‘ti ki khanun ’ani.
1lhym l1 tqll wnSy1 b8mk l1 t1r no revile the towards-these-elohim, nor curse the ruler of thy with-mum-people. ’elohim lo teqalel, venasi be‘amekha lo ta’or.
ml1tk wdm8k l1 t1Hr bkwr bnyk ttn ly no delay to inward the first of thy ripe fruits, and of thy liquors: the firstborn of thy children-betweens thou give unto me. mele’atekha vedim‘akha lo te’akher, bekhor banekha titen li
kn t8Sh lSrk lZ1nk Sb8t ymym yhyh 8m 1mw bywm hSmyny ttnw ly likewise thou do with thine wall-oxen, and with thy sheep: seven days it be with his dam; on the eighth day thou give it me. ken ta‘aseh leshorekha lezonekha, shib‘at yamim yihyeh ‘im ’imo bayom hashemini titeno li.
w1nSy qdS thywn ly wbSr bSdh Trph l1 t1klw lklb tSlkwn 1tw and ye be dedicated-finished men unto me: neither ye eat any flesh that is torn of beasts in the field; ye cast it to the dogs. ve’anshe qodesh tihyun li, ubasar basadeh terefah lo tokhelu lakeleb tashlikhun ’oto.
l1 tS1 Sm8 Sw1 1l tSt ydk 8m rS8 lhyt 8d Hms no raise a false report: put not thine hand with the wicked to be an unrighteous witness. lo tisa shema‘ shav, ’al tashet yadekha ‘im rasha‘ lihyot ‘ed khamas.
l1 thyh 1Hry rbym lr8t wl1 t8nh 8l rb lnTt 1Hry rbym lhTt no follow a multitude to do bad; neither thou speak in a cause to decline after many to wrest decision-grammar: lo tihyeh ’akhare rabim lera‘ot, velo ta‘aneh ‘al rib lintot ’akharei rabim lehatot.
wdl l1 thdr brybw neither thou countenance a poor man in his cause. vedal lo tehdar beribo.
ky tpg8 Swr 1ybk 1w Hmrw t8h hSb tSybnw lw if thou until-witness thine enemy's wall-ox or his ass going astray, thou surely bring it back to him again. ki tifga‘ shor ’oyibkha ’o khamoro to‘eh, hasheb teshibenu lo.
ky tr1h Hmwr Sn1k rbZ tHt mS1w wHdlt m8zb lw 8zb t8zb 8mw if thou see the ass of him that hateth thee lying under his burden, and wouldest forbear to help him, thou surely help with him. ki tir’eh khamor sona’akha robez takhat masa’o vekhadalta me‘azob lo, ‘azob ta‘azob ‘imo.
l1 tTh mSpT 1bynk brybw no wrest the decision-grammar of thy poor in his cause. lo tateh mishpat ’ebyonekha beribo.
mdbr Sqr trHq wnqy wZdyq 1l thrg ky l1 1Zdyq rS8 keep thee far from a false matter; and the innocent and just slay thou not: for i will not justify the wicked. midebar sheqer tirkhaq, venaqi vezadiq ’al taharog ki lo ’azdiq rasha‘.
wSHd l1 tqH ky hSHd y8wr pqHym wyslp dbry Zdyqym and thou take no gift: for the gift blindeth the wise, and perverteth the bee-words of the just. veshokhad lo tiqakh, ki hashokhad ye‘aver piqkhim visalef dibrei zadiqim.
wgr l1 tlHZ w1tm yd8tm 1t npS hgr ky grym hyytm b1rZ mZrym also no oppress a stranger: for ye hand-know the heart of a stranger, seeing ye were strangers in the land of narrows-mizraim. veger lo tilkhaz, ve’atem yeda‘tem nefesh hager ki gerim heyitem be’erez mizrayim.
wSS Snym tzr8 1t 1rZk w1spt 1t tbw1th and six years thou sow thy land, and gather in the fruits thereof: veshesh shanim tizra‘ ’arzekha, ve’asafta tebu’atah.
whSby8t tSmTnh wnTSth w1klw 1byny 8mk wytrm t1kl Hyt hSdh kn t8Sh lkrmk lzytk and the seventh year thou let it rest and lie still; that the poor of thy with-mum-people may eat: and what they leave the beasts of the field eat. in like manner thou deal with thy vineyard, and with thy oliveyard. vehashebi‘it tishmetenah unetashtah ve’akhelu ’ebyonei ‘amekha veyitram tokhal khayat hasadeh, ken ta‘aseh lekharmekha lezetekha.
SSt ymym t8Sh m8Syk wbywm hSby8y tSbt lm8n ynwH Swrk wHmrk wynpS bn 1mtk whgr six days thou do thy work, and on the seventh day thou rest: that thine wall-ox and thine ass may rest, and child-between of thy handmaid, and the stranger, may be refreshed. sheshet yamim ta‘aseh ma‘asekha ubayom hashebi‘i tishbot, lema‘an yanuakh shorkha vakhamorekha veyinafesh ben ’amatekha vehager.
wbkl 1Sr 1mrty 1lykm tSmrw wSm 1lhym 1Hrym l1 tzkyrw l1 ySm8 8l pyk and in all things that i have said unto you be circumspect: and make no mention of the name of other towards-these-elohim, neither let it be heard out of thy mouth. ubekhol ’asher ’amarti ’alekhem tishameru, veshem ’elohim ’akherim lo tazkiru lo yishama‘ ‘al pikha.
SlS rglym tHg ly bSnh three times thou keep a until-conception unto me in the year. shalosh regalim takhog li bashanah.
1t Hg hmZwt tSmr Sb8t ymym t1kl mZwt k1Sr Zwytk lmw8d HdS h1byb ky bw yZ1t mmZrym wl1 yr1w pny ryqm thou keep the until-conception of lit-mazat: (thou eat lit-mazat seven days, as i order-prescribed thee, in the time appointed of the month spring-abib; for in it thou camest out from narrows-mizraim: and none appear before-turns me empty:) khag hamazot tishmor shib‘at yamim tokhal mazot ka’asher zivitikha lemo‘ed khodesh ha’abib ki bo yazata mimizrayim, velo yera’u fanay reqam.
wHg hqZyr bkwry m8Syk 1Sr tzr8 bSdh wHg h1sp bZ1t hSnh b1spk 1t m8Syk mn hSdh and the until-conception of harvest, the firstfruits of thy labors, which thou hast sown in the field: and the until-conception of ingathering, which is in the end of the year, when thou hast added in thy labors out of the field. vekhag haqazir bikurei ma‘asekha ’asher tizra‘ basadeh, vekhag ha’asif bezet hashanah be’asepekha ma‘asekha min hasadeh.
SlS p8mym bSnh yr1h kl zkwrk 1l pny h1dn yhwh three items in the year all thy rememberers appear before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim. shalosh pe‘amim bashanah, yera’eh kal zekhurekha ’el penei ha’adon yhvh.
l1 tzbH 8l HmZ dm zbHy wl1 ylyn Hlb Hgy 8d bqr no inward the blood of my butcher with leaven; neither the fat of my butcher remain until the morning. lo tizbakh ‘al khamez dam zibkhi, velo yalin kheleb khagi ‘ad boqer.
r1Syt bkwry 1dmtk tby1 byt yhwh 1lhyk l1 tbSl gdy bHlb 1mw the first of the firstfruits of thy land thou bring into the daughter-house of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. no seethe a kid in his mother's milk. reshit bikurei ’admatekha tabi bet yhvh ’elohekha, lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb ’imo.
hnh 1nky SlH ml1k lpnyk lSmrk bdrk wlhby1k 1l hmqwm 1Sr hknty behold, i send an angel-messanger before-turns thee, to keep thee in the way, and to bring thee into the stand-up-place which i have prepared. hineh ’anokhi sholeakh mal’akh lefanekha lishmarekha badarekh, velahabi’akha ’el hamaqom ’asher hakhinoti.
hSmr mpnyw wSm8 bqlw 1l tmr bw ky l1 yS1 lpS8km ky Smy bqrbw beware of him, and obey his voice, provoke him not; for he will not pardon your crimes: for my name is in him. hishamer mipanav ushema‘ beqolo ’al tamer bo, ki lo yisa lefish‘akhem ki shemi beqirbo.
ky 1m Sm8 tSm8 bqlw w8Syt kl 1Sr 1dbr w1ybty 1t 1ybyk wZrty 1t Zrryk and if thou indeed obey his voice, and do all that i speak; then i will be an enemy unto thine father-adversaries, and an adversary unto thine adversaries. ki ’im shamoa‘ tishma‘ beqolo ve‘asita kol ’asher ’adaber, ve’ayabti ’oyebekha vezarti zorerekha.
ky ylk ml1ky lpnyk whby1k 1l h1mry whHty whprzy whkn8ny hHwy whybwsy whkHdtyw for mine angel-messanger go before-turns thee, and bring thee in unto the talker-amorites, and the tusk-cut-hittites, and the unwalled-perizzites, and the mobile-trade-canaanites, the experience-hivites, and the trampler-jebusites: and i will cut them off. ki yelekh mal’akhi lefanekha vehebi’akha ’el ha’emori vehakhiti vehaperizi vehakena‘ani hakhivi vehaybusi, vehikhkhadtiv.
l1 tStHwh l1lhyhm wl1 t8bdm wl1 t8Sh km8Syhm ky hrs thrsm wSbr tSbr mZbtyhm no bow down to their towards-these-elohim, nor work for them, nor do after their works: and thou utterly overthrow them, and quite break down their images. lo tishtakhaveh lelohehem velo ta‘abedem velo ta‘aseh kema‘asehem, ki hares teharesem veshaber teshaber mazebotehem.

l1 thyh mSklh w8qrh b1rZk 1t mspr ymyk 1ml1 there nothing cast their young, nor be barren, in thy land: the number of thy days i will fulfil. lo tihyeh meshakelah va‘aqarah be’arzekha, mispar yamekha ’amale.
1t 1ymty 1SlH lpnyk whmty 1t kl h8m 1Sr tb1 bhm wntty 1t kl 1ybyk 1lyk 8rp i will send my fear before-turns thee, and will destroy all the with-mum-people to whom thou come, and i will make all thine father-adversaries turn their backs unto thee. ’emati ’ashalakh lefanekha vehamoti kal ha‘am ’asher tabo bahem, venatati kal ’oyebekha ’elekha ‘oref.
wSlHty 1t hZr8h lpnyk wgrSh 1t hHwy 1t hkn8ny w1t hHty mlpnyk and i will send the wasp before-turns thee, which drive out the experience-hivite, the mobile-trade-canaanite, and the cut-hittite, from before-turns thee. veshalakhti hazir‘ah lefanekha, vegereshah hakhivi hakena‘ani ve’et hakhiti milefanekha.
l1 1grSnw mpnyk bSnh 1Ht pn thyh h1rZ Smmh wrbh 8lyk Hyt hSdh i will not drive them out from before-turns thee in one year; lest the land become desolate, and the beast of the field multiply against thee. lo ’agareshenu mipanekha beshanah ’ekhat, pen tihyeh ha’arez shemamah verabah ‘alekha khayat hasadeh.

wSty 1t gblk mym swp w8d ym plStym wmmdbr 8d hnhr ky 1tn bydkm 1t ySby h1rZ wgrStmw mpnyk and i will set thy bounds from the end sea even unto the sea of the griever-philistines, and from the place-of-word-desert unto the river: for i will deliver the inhabitants of the land into your hand; and thou drive them out before-turns thee. veshati gebulkha miyam suf ve‘ad yam pelishtim umimidbar ‘ad hanahar, ki ’eten beyedkhem yoshebei ha’arez vegerashtamo mipanekha.

w1l mSh 1mr 8lh 1l yhwh 1th w1hrn ndb w1byhw1 wSb8ym mzqny ySr1l whStHwytm mrHq and he said unto extracted-mose, come up unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, thou, and cabinet-aaron, volunteer-nadab, and he-my-pa-abihu, and seventy of the elders of saturated-towards-israel; and partake-shatakh ye afar off. ve’el mosheh ’amar ‘aleh ’el yhvh ’atah ve’aharon nadab va’abihu veshib‘im miziqnei yisra’el, vehishtakhavitem merakhoq.

wyb1 mSh wyspr l8m 1t kl dbry yhwh w1t kl hmSpTym wy8n kl h8m qwl 1Hd wy1mrw kl hdbrym 1Sr dbr yhwh n8Sh and extracted-mose came and told the with-mum-people all the bee-words of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and all the decision-grammars: and all the with-mum-people answered with one voice, and said, all the bee-words which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath said will we do. vayabo mosheh vaysaper la‘am kal dibrei yhvh ve’et kal hamishpatim, vaya‘an kal ha‘am qol ’ekhad vayomeru kal hadebarim ’asher diber yhvh na‘aseh.
wyktb mSh 1t kl dbry yhwh wySkm bbqr wybn mzbH tHt hhr wStym 8Srh mZbh lSnym 8Sr SbTy ySr1l and extracted-mose wrote all the bee-words of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and rose up early in the morning, and between-between-builded an butcher-kitchen under the hill, and twelve column-stands, according to the twelve branchs of saturated-towards-israel. vayikhtob mosheh kal dibrei yhvh vayashkem baboqer vayiben mizbeakh takhat hahar, ushetem ‘esreh mazebah lishnem ‘asar shibtei yisra’el.
wySlH 1t n8ry bny ySr1l wy8lw 8lt wyzbHw zbHym Slmym lyhwh prym and he sent young men of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which rose on-ups, and butcherd wholes of wall-oxen unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayishlakh na‘arei benei yisra’el vaya‘alu ‘olot, vayizbekhu zebakhim shelamim yhvh parim.

wy8l mSh w1hrn ndb w1byhw1 wSb8ym mzqny ySr1l then went up extracted-mose, and cabinet-aaron, volunteer-nadab, and he-my-pa-abihu, and seventy of the elders of saturated-towards-israel: vaya‘al mosheh ve’aharon, nadab va’abihu veshib‘im miziqnei yisra’el.

w1l 1Zyly bny ySr1l l1 SlH ydw wyHzw 1t h1lhym wy1klw wyStw and upon the nobles of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel he laid not his hand: also they saw towards-these-elohim, and did eat and drink. ve’el ’azilei benei yisra’el lo shalakh yado, vayekhezu ha’elohim vayokhelu vayishtu.

wSSh qnym yZ1ym mZdyh SlSh qny mnrh mZdh h1Hd wSlSh qny mnrh mZdh hSny and six branches come out of the sides of it; three branches of the light-stream-candle out of the one side, and three branches of the light-stream-candle out of the other side: veshishah qanim yoze’im mizideha, sheloshah qenei menorah mizidah ha’ekhad usheloshah qenei menorah mizidah hasheni.

wkptr tHt Sny hqnym mmnh wkptr tHt Sny hqnym mmnh wkptr tHt Sny hqnym mmnh lSSt hqnym hyZ1ym mn hmnrh and there be a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the light-stream-candle. vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah, lesheshet haqanim hayoze’im min hamenorah.
kptryhm wqntm mmnh yhyw klh mqSh 1Ht zhb Thwr their knops and their branches be of the same: all it be one beaten work of pure-tahor gold. kaftorehem uqenotam mimenah yihyu, kulah miqshah ’akhat zahab tahor.
w8Syt 1t nrtyh Sb8h wh8lh 1t nrtyh wh1yr 8l 8br pnyh and thou make the seven lamps thereof: and they light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it. ve‘asita neroteha shib‘ah, vehe‘elah neroteha vehe’ir ‘al ‘eber paneha.
wmlqHyh wmHttyh zhb Thwr and the tongs thereof, and the shutters thereof, be of pure-tahor gold. umalqakheha umakhtoteha zahab tahor.
kkr zhb Thwr y8Sh 1th 1t kl hklym h1lh of a talent of pure-tahor gold he make it, with all these tools. kikar zahab tahor ya‘aseh ’otah, ’et kal hakelim ha’eleh.
wr1h w8Sh btbnytm 1Sr 1th mr1h bhr and look that thou make them after their pattern, which was showed thee in the mount. ure’eh va‘aseh, betabnitam ’asher ’atah mare’eh bahar.
w1t hmSkn t8Sh 8Sr yry8t SS mSzr wtklt w1rgmn wtl8t Sny krbym m8Sh HSb t8Sh 1tm moreover thou make the dwelling with ten curtains six, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars: with inward-cherubim of cunning work thou make them. ve’et hamishkan ta‘aseh ‘eser yeri‘ot, shesh mashezar utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani kerubim ma‘aseh khosheb ta‘aseh ’otam.
1rk hyry8h h1Ht Smnh w8Srym b1mh wrHb 1rb8 b1mh hyry8h h1Ht mdh 1Ht lkl hyry8t the length of one curtain be eight and double-ten-twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains have one measure. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat shemoneh ve‘esrim ba’amah verokhab ’arba‘ ba’amah hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat lekhal hayri‘ot.
HmS hyry8t thyyn Hbrt 1Sh 1l 1Hth wHmS yry8t Hbrt 1Sh 1l 1Hth the five curtains be coupled together one to another; and other five curtains be coupled one to another. khamesh hayri‘ot tihyena khoberot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah, vekhamesh yeri‘ot khoberot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah.
w8Syt ll1t tklt 8l Spt hyry8h h1Ht mqZh bHbrt wkn t8Sh bSpt hyry8h hqyZwnh bmHbrt hSnyt and thou make loops of blue upon the edge of the one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling; and likewise thou make in the uttermost edge of another curtain, in the coupling of the second. ve‘asita lul’ot tekhelet ‘al sefat hayri‘ah ha’ekhat miqazah bakhobaret, vekhen ta‘aseh bisfat hayri‘ah haqizonah bamakhberet hashenit.
HmSym ll1t t8Sh byry8h h1Ht wHmSym ll1t t8Sh bqZh hyry8h 1Sr bmHbrt hSnyt mqbylt hll1t 1Sh 1l 1Hth fifty loops thou make in the one curtain, and fifty loops thou make in the edge of the curtain that is in the coupling of the second; that the loops may take hold one of another. khamishim lula’ot ta‘aseh bayri‘ah ha’ekhat vakhamishim lula’ot ta‘aseh biqzeh hayri‘ah ’asher bamakhberet hashenit, maqbilot halula’ot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah.
w8Syt HmSym qrsy zhb wHbrt 1t hyry8t 1Sh 1l 1Hth bqrsym whyh hmSkn 1Hd and thou make fifty taches of gold, and couple the curtains together with the taches: and it be one dwelling. ve‘asita khamishim qarsei zahab, vekhibarta hayri‘ot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah baqerasim vehayah hamishkan ’ekhad.
w8Syt yry8t 8zym l1hl 8l hmSkn 8Sty 8Srh yry8t t8Sh 1tm and thou make curtains of intense-goats' gate-hair to be a covering upon the dwelling: eleven curtains thou make. ve‘asita yeri‘ot ‘izim le’ohel ‘al hamishkan, ‘ashte ‘esreh yeri‘ot ta‘aseh.
1rk hyry8h h1Ht SlSym b1mh wrHb 1rb8 b1mh hyry8h h1Ht mdh 1Ht l8Sty 8Srh yry8t the length of one curtain be thirty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and the eleven curtains be all of one measure. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat sheloshim ba’amah verokhab ’arba‘ ba’amah hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat le‘ashtei ‘esreh yeri‘ot.
wHbrt 1t HmS hyry8t lbd w1t SS hyry8t lbd wkplt 1t hyry8h hSSyt 1l mwl pny h1hl and thou couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and double the sixth curtain in the forefront of the oheltabernacle. vekhibarta khamesh hayri‘ot lebad ve’et shesh hayri‘ot lebad, vekhafalta hayri‘ah hashishit mul penei ha’ohel.

w8Syt qrsy nHSt HmSym whb1t 1t hqrsym bll1t wHbrt 1t h1hl whyh 1Hd and thou make fifty taches of brass, and put the taches into the loops, and couple the tent together, that it may be one. ve‘asita qarsei nekhoshet khamishim, vehebeta haqerasim balula’ot vekhibarta ha’ohel vehayah ’ekhad.
wsrH h8dp byry8t h1hl HZy hyry8h h8dpt tsrH 8l 1Hry hmSkn and the remnant that remaineth of the curtains of the tent, the half curtain that remaineth, hang over the backside of the dwelling. veserakh ha‘odef biri‘ot ha’ohel, khazi hayri‘ah ha‘odefet tisrakh ‘al ’akhorei hamishkan.

1rk hHZr m1h b1mh wrHb HmSym bHmSym wqmh HmS 1mwt SS mSzr w1dnyhm nHSt the length of the court be an hundred cubits, and the breadth fifty every where, and the height five cubits six, and their sockets of brass. ’orekh hekhazer me’ah ba’amah verokhab khamishim bakhamishim veqomah khamesh ’amot shesh mashezar, ve’adnehem nekhoshet.
lkl kly hmSkn bkl 8bdtw wkl ytdtyw wkl ytdt hHZr nHSt all the tools of the dwelling in all the work thereof, and all the pins thereof, and all the pins of the court, be of brass. lekhol kelei hamishkan bekhol ‘abodato, vekhal yetedotav vekhal yitdot hekhazer nekhoshet.
w1th tZwh 1t bny ySr1l wyqHw 1lyk Smn zyt zk ktyt lm1wr lh8lt nr tmyd and thou order-prescribe children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they bring thee pure-tahor name-from-oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamp to burn always. ve’atah tezaveh benei yisra’el veyiqkhu ’elekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama’or, leha‘alot ner tamid.
b1hl mw8d mHwZ lprkt 1Sr 8l h8dt y8rk 1tw 1hrn wbnyw m8rb 8d bqr lpny yhwh Hqt 8wlm ldrtm m1t bny ySr1l in the tent of until-conception without the breaker, which is before-turns the until-witness, cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens order it from evening to morning before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: it be a statute for ever unto their generations on the behalf of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. be’ohel mo‘ed mikhuz laparokhet ’asher ‘al ha‘edut ya‘arokh ’oto ’aharon ubanav me‘ereb ‘ad boqer lifnei yhvh, khuqat ‘olam ledorotam me’et benei yisra’el.
w1th hqrb 1lyk 1t 1hrn 1Hyk w1t bnyw 1tw mtwk bny ySr1l lkhnw ly 1hrn ndb w1byhw1 1l8zr w1ytmr bny 1hrn and take thou unto thee cabinet-aaron thy brother, and his children-betweens with him, from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that he may dimmer-server unto me, even cabinet-aaron, volunteer-nadab and he-my-pa-abihu, towards-stop-eleazar and with-palm-itamar, cabinet-aaron's children-betweens. ve’atah haqreb ’elekha ’aharon ’akhikha ve’et banav ’ito mitokh benei yisra’el lekhahano li, ’aharon nadab va’abihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar benei ’aharon.
w8Syt bgdy qdS l1hrn 1Hyk lkbwd wltp1rt and thou make dedicated-finished garments for cabinet-aaron thy brother for heaviness and for beauty. ve‘asita bigde qodesh le’aharon ’akhikha, lekhabod uletif’aret.
w1th tdbr 1l kl Hkmy lb 1Sr ml1tyw rwH Hkmh w8Sw 1t bgdy 1hrn lqdSw lkhnw ly and thou speak unto all that are wise hearted, whom i have filled with breath-spirit of wisdom, that they may make cabinet-aaron's garments to fill him, that he may dimmer-server unto me. ve’atah tedaber ’el kal leb ’asher miletiv ruakh khakhmah ve‘asu bigdei ’aharon leqadesho lekhahano li.
w1lh hbgdym 1Sr y8Sw HSn w1pwd wm8yl wktnt tSbZ mZnpt w1bnT w8Sw bgdy qdS l1hrn 1Hyk wlbnyw lkhnw ly and these are the garments which they make; a bronze-tooth-khashan, and an cash-in-ephod, and a robe, and a broidered you-wrote-coat, a branch-bonnet, and a girdle: and they make dedicated-finished garments for cabinet-aaron thy brother, and his children-betweens, that he may dimmer-server unto me. ve’eleh habegadim ’asher ya‘asu khoshen ve’efod ume‘il ukhetonet tashbez miznefet ve’abnet, ve‘asu bigde qodesh le’aharon ’akhikha ulebanav lekhahano li.
whm yqHw 1t hzhb w1t htklt w1t h1rgmn w1t twl8t hSny w1t hSS and they take gold, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine linen. vehem yiqkhu ’et hazahab ve’et hatekhelet ve’et ha’argaman, ve’et tola‘at hashani ve’et hashesh.
w8Sw 1t h1pd zhb tklt w1rgmn twl8t Sny wSS mSzr m8Sh HSb and they make the cash-in-ephod of gold, of blue, and of purple, of two caterpillars, and fine twined linen, with cunning work. ve‘asu ha’efod, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman tola‘at shani veshesh mashezar ma‘aseh khosheb.
Sty ktpt Hbrt yhyh lw 1l Sny qZwtyw wHbr it have the two shoulderpieces thereof joined at the two edges thereof; and so it be joined together. shetei khetefot khoberot yihyeh lo ’el shenei qezotav vekhubar.
wHSb 1pdtw 1Sr 8lyw km8Shw mmnw yhyh zhb tklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny wSS mSzr and the accounting of the cash-in-ephod, which is upon it, be of the same, according to the work thereof; even of gold, of blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen. vekhesheb ’afudato ’asher ‘alav kema‘asehu mimenu yihyeh, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar.

m8Sh HrS 1bn ptwHy Htm tptH 1t Sty h1bnym 8l Smt bny ySr1l msbt mSbZwt zhb t8Sh 1tm with the work of an engraver in father-child-stone, like the engravings of a signet, thou engrave the two stones with the names of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: thou make them to be set in ouches of gold. ma‘aseh kharash ’eben pitukhei khotam tefatakh shetei ha’abanim ‘al shemot benei yisra’el, musabot mishbezot zahab ta‘aseh ’otam.

w8Syt mSbZt zhb and thou make ouches of gold; ve‘asita mishbezot zahab.
wSty SrSrt zhb Thwr mgblt t8Sh 1tm m8Sh 8bt wntth 1t SrSrt h8btt 8l hmSbZt and two chains of pure-tahor gold at the ends; of wreathed work thou make them, and fasten the wreathed chains to the ouches. ushetei sharsherot zahab tahor migbalot ta‘aseh ma‘aseh ‘abot, venatatah sharsherot ha‘abotot ‘al hamishbezot.

wml1t bw ml1t 1bn 1rb8h Twrym 1bn Twr 1dm pTdh wbrqt hTwr h1Hd and thou set in it settings of stones, even four rows of stones: the first row be a red-column-sardius, a topaz, and a temple-carbuncle: this be the first row. umileta bo milu’at ’eben ’arba‘ah turim ’aben, tur ’odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha’ekhad.
whTwr hSny npk spyr wyhlm and the second row be an emerald, a countable-saphire, and a shock-diamond. vehatur hasheni, nofekh sapir veyahalom.

wlqHt mdm hpr wntth 8l qrnt hmzbH b1Zb8k w1t kl hdm tSpk 1l yswd hmzbH and thou take of the blood of the bull, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen with thy finger, and pour all the blood beside the bottom of the butcher-kitchen. velaqakhta midam hapar venatatah ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh be’ezba‘ekha, ve’et kal hadam tishpokh ’el yesod hamizbeakh.
wlqHt 1t kl hHlb hmksh 1t hqrb w1t hytrt 8l hkbd w1t Sty hklyt w1t hHlb 1Sr 8lyhn whqTrt hmzbHh and thou take all the fat that covereth the inwards, and the remainder that is above the heavy-liver, and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, and burn them upon the butcher-kitchen. velaqakhta kal hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb ve’et hayoteret ‘al hakabed ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen, vehiqtarta hamizbekhah.
w1t bSr hpr w1t 8rw w1t prSw tSrp b1S mHwZ lmHnh HT1t hw1 and the flesh of the bull, and his light-skin, and his dung, thou burn with fire without the camp: it is a miss. ve’et besar hapar ve’et ‘oro ve’et pirsho tisrof ba’esh mikhuz lamakhaneh, khatat hu.
w1t h1yl h1Hd tqH wsmkw 1hrn wbnyw 1t ydyhm 8l r1S h1yl thou also take one voiceless-ram; and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens put their hands upon the head of the voiceless-ram. ve’et ha’ayil ha’ekhad tiqakh, vesamekhu ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh ha’ayil.
wSHTt 1t h1yl wlqHt 1t dmw wzrqt 8l hmzbH sbyb and thou slay the voiceless-ram, and thou take his blood, and sprinkle it round about upon the butcher-kitchen. veshakhata ha’ayil, velaqakhta damo vezaraqta ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
w1t h1yl tntH lntHyw wrHZt qrbw wkr8yw wntt 8l ntHyw w8l r1Sw and thou cut the voiceless-ram in pieces, and wash the inwards of him, and his legs, and put them unto his pieces, and unto his head. ve’et ha’ayil tenateakh lintakhav, verakhazta qirbo ukhera‘av venatata ‘al netakhav ve‘al rosho.
whqTrt 1t kl h1yl hmzbHh 8lh hw1 lyhwh ryH nyHwH 1Sh lyhwh hw1 and thou burn the whole voiceless-ram upon the butcher-kitchen: it is a on-up unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: it is a smell fragrance, a feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehiqtarta kal ha’ayil hamizbekhah ‘olah hu yhvh, reakh nikhoakh ’isheh yhvh hu.
wlqHt 1t h1yl hSny wsmk 1hrn wbnyw 1t ydyhm 8l r1S h1yl and thou take the other voiceless-ram; and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens put their hands upon the head of the voiceless-ram. velaqakhta ha’ayil hasheni, vesamakh ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh ha’ayil.
wSHTt 1t h1yl wlqHt mdmw wntth 8l tnwk 1zn 1hrn w8l tnwk 1zn bnyw hymnyt w8l bhn ydm hymnyt w8l bhn rglm hymnyt wzrqt 1t hdm 8l hmzbH sbyb then thou kill the voiceless-ram, and take of his blood, and put it upon the tip of the right ear of cabinet-aaron, and upon the tip of the right ear of his children-betweens, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot, and sprinkle the blood upon the butcher-kitchen round about. veshakhata ha’ayil velaqakhta midamo venatatah ‘al tenukh ’ozen ’aharon ve‘al tenukh ’ozen banav haymanit ve‘al bohen yadam haymanit ve‘al bohen raglam haymanit, vezaraqta hadam ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
wlqHt mn hdm 1Sr 8l hmzbH wmSmn hmSHh whzyt 8l 1hrn w8l bgdyw w8l bnyw w8l bgdy bnyw 1tw wqdS hw1 wbgdyw wbnyw wbgdy bnyw 1tw and thou take of the blood that is upon the butcher-kitchen, and of the lubeing name-from-oil, and sprinkle it upon cabinet-aaron, and upon his garments, and upon his children-betweens, and upon the garments of his children-betweens with him: and he be dedicateed, and his garments, and his children-betweens, and his children-betweens' garments with him. velaqakhta min hadam ’asher ‘al hamizbeakh umishemen hamishkhah vehizeta ‘al ’aharon ve‘al begadav ve‘al banav ve‘al bigdei banav ’ito, veqadash hu ubegadav ubanav ubigdei banav ’ito.
wlqHt mn h1yl hHlb wh1lyh w1t hHlb hmksh 1t hqrb w1t ytrt hkbd w1t Sty hklyt w1t hHlb 1Sr 8lhn w1t Swq hymyn ky 1yl ml1ym hw1 also thou take of the voiceless-ram the fat and the rump, and the fat that covereth the inwards, and the remainder above the heavy-liver, and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, and the right shoulder; for it is a voiceless-ram of fullness: velaqakhta min ha’ayil hakheleb veha’alyah ve’et hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb ve’et yoteret hakabed ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen ve’et shoq hayamin, ki ’el milu’im hu.
wkkr lHm 1Ht wHlt lHm Smn 1Ht wrqyq 1Hd msl hmZwt 1Sr lpny yhwh and one loaf of bread, and one cake of name-from-oiled bread, and one wafer out of the basket of the lit-mazat that is before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vekhikar lekhem ’akhat vakhalat lekhem shemen ’akhat veraqiq ’ekhad, misal hamazot ’asher lifnei yhvh.
wSmt hkl 8l kpy 1hrn w8l kpy bnyw whnpt 1tm tnwph lpny yhwh and thou put all in the hands of cabinet-aaron, and in the hands of his children-betweens; and sieve-pana them for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vesamta hakol ‘al kapei ’aharon ve‘al kapei banav, vehenafta ’otam tenufah lifnei yhvh.
wlqHt 1tm mydm whqTrt hmzbHh 8l h8lh lryH nyHwH lpny yhwh 1Sh hw1 lyhwh and thou receive them of their hands, and burn them upon the butcher-kitchen for a on-up, for a smell fragrance before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: it is a feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. velaqakhta ’otam miyadam vehiqtarta hamizbekhah ‘al ha‘olah, lereakh nikhoakh lifnei yhvh ’isheh hu yhvh.
wlqHt 1t hHzh m1yl hml1ym 1Sr l1hrn whnpt 1tw tnwph lpny yhwh whyh lk lmnh and thou take the breast of the voiceless-ram of cabinet-aaron's fullness, and sieve-pana it for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and it be thy part. velaqakhta hekhazeh me’el hamilu’im le’aharon vehenafta ’oto tenufah lifnei yhvh, vehayah lekha lemanah.
wqdSt 1t Hzh htnwph w1t Swq htrwmh 1Sr hwnp w1Sr hwrm m1yl hml1ym m1Sr l1hrn wm1Sr lbnyw and thou dedicate-finify the breast of the sieve, and the shoulder of the raise-rum, which is sieve-panad, and which is raised up, of the voiceless-ram of the fullness, even of that which is for cabinet-aaron, and of that which is for his children-betweens: veqidashta khazeh hatenufah ve’et shoq haterumah ’asher hunaf va’asher huram, me’el hamilu’im me’asher le’aharon ume’asher lebanav.
whyh l1hrn wlbnyw lHq 8wlm m1t bny ySr1l ky trwmh hw1 wtrwmh yhyh m1t bny ySr1l mzbHy Slmyhm trwmtm lyhwh and it be cabinet-aaron's and his children-betweens' by a statute for ever from children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: for it is an raise-rum: and it be an raise-rum from children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel of the butcher of their wholes, even their raise-rum unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehayah le’aharon ulebanav lekhaq ‘olam me’et benei yisra’el ki terumah hu, uterumah yihyeh me’et bene yisra’el mizibkhei shalmehem terumatam yhvh.
wbgdy hqdS 1Sr l1hrn yhyw lbnyw 1Hryw lmSHh bhm wlml1 bm 1t ydm and the dedicated-finished garments of cabinet-aaron be his children-betweens' after him, to be lubeed therein, and to be filld in them. ubigdei haqodesh le’aharon yihyu lebanav ’akharav, lemashekhah bahem ulemale bam.
Sb8t ymym ylbSm hkhn tHtyw mbnyw 1Sr yb1 1l 1hl mw8d lSrt bqdS and that child-between that is dimmer-server in his stead put them on seven days, when he cometh into the tent of until-conception to in the dedicated-finished place. shib‘at yamim yilbasham hakohen takhtav mibanav, ’asher yabo ’el ’ohel mo‘ed lesharet baqodesh.
w1t 1yl hml1ym tqH wbSlt 1t bSrw bmqm qdS and thou take the voiceless-ram of the fullness, and seethe his flesh in the dedicated-finished place. ve’et ’el hamilu’im tiqakh, ubishalta besaro bemaqom qadosh.
w1kl 1hrn wbnyw 1t bSr h1yl w1t hlHm 1Sr bsl ptH 1hl mw8d and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens eat the flesh of the voiceless-ram, and the bread that is in the basket by the opening of the tent of until-conception. ve’akhal ’aharon ubanav besar ha’ayil ve’et halekhem ’asher basal, petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
w1klw 1tm 1Sr kpr bhm lml1 1t ydm lqdS 1tm wzr l1 y1kl ky qdS hm and they eat those things wherewith the out-of-town-ment was made, to fill and to dedicate-finify them: and a stranger not eat thereof, because they are dedicated-finished. ve’akhelu ’asher kupar lemalei leqadesh ’otam, vezar lo yokhal ki qodesh hem.
w1m ywtr mbSr hml1ym wmn hlHm 8d hbqr wSrpt 1t hnwtr b1S l1 y1kl ky qdS hw1 and if ought of the flesh of the fullnesss, or of the bread, remain unto the morning, then thou burn the remainder with fire: it not be eaten, because it is dedicated-finished. ve’im yivater mibesar hamilu’im umin halekhem ‘ad haboqer, vesarafta hanotar ba’esh lo ye’akhel ki qodesh hu.
w8Syt l1hrn wlbnyw kkh kkl 1Sr Zwyty 1tkh Sb8t ymym tml1 ydm and thus thou do unto cabinet-aaron, and to his children-betweens, according to all things which i have order-prescribed thee: seven days thou fill them. ve‘asita le’aharon ulebanav kakhah kekhol ’asher ziviti ’otakhah, shib‘at yamim temalei yadam.
wpr HT1t t8Sh lywm 8l hkprym wHT1t 8l hmzbH bkprk 8lyw wmSHt 1tw lqdSw and thou inward every day a bull for a miss for out-of-town-ment: and thou miss the butcher-kitchen, when thou hast made an out-of-town-ment for it, and thou lube it, to dedicate-finify it. ufar khatat ta‘aseh layom ‘al hakipurim vekhiteta ‘al hamizbeakh bekhaperkha ‘alav, umashakhta ’oto leqadesho.
Sb8t ymym tkpr 8l hmzbH wqdSt 1tw whyh hmzbH qdS qdSym kl hng8 bmzbH yqdS seven days thou make an out-of-town-ment for the butcher-kitchen, and dedicate-finify it; and it be an butcher-kitchen most dedicated-finished: whatsoever toucheth the butcher-kitchen be dedicated-finished. shib‘at yamim tekhaper ‘al hamizbeakh veqidashta ’oto, vehayah hamizbeakh qodesh qadashim kal hanogea‘ bamizbeakh yiqdash.
wzh 1Sr t8Sh 8l hmzbH kbSym bny Snh Snym lywm tmyd now this is that which thou inward upon the butcher-kitchen; two lambs of the first year day by day continually. vezeh ’asher ta‘aseh ‘al hamizbeakh, kebasim bene shanah shenayim layom tamid.
1t hkbS h1Hd t8Sh bbqr w1t hkbS hSny t8Sh byn h8rbym the one lamb thou inward in the morning; and the other lamb thou inward at even: hakebes ha’ekhad ta‘aseh baboqer, ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim.
w8Srn slt blwl bSmn ktyt rb8 hhyn wnsk rb8yt hhyn yyn lkbS h1Hd and with the one lamb a tenth deal of basket-flour mingled with the fourth part of an here-hin of beaten name-from-oil; and the fourth part of an here-hin of wine-inherit for a pouring. ve‘isaron solet balul beshemen katit reba‘ hahin venesekh rebi‘it hahin yayin, lakebes ha’ekhad.
w1t hkbS hSny t8Sh byn h8rbym kmnHt hbqr wknskh t8Sh lh lryH nyHH 1Sh lyhwh and the other lamb thou inward at even, and do thereto according to the absorber of the morning, and according to the pouring thereof, for a smell fragrance, a feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim, keminkhat haboqer ukheniskah ta‘aseh lah lereakh nikhoakh ’isheh yhvh.
8lt tmyd ldrtykm ptH 1hl mw8d lpny yhwh 1Sr 1w8d lkm Smh ldbr 1lyk Sm this be a continual on-up throughout your generations at the opening of the tent of until-conception before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: where i will until-witness you, to speak there unto thee. ‘olat tamid ledorotekhem petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lifnei yhvh, ’asher ’iva‘ed lakhem shamah ledaber ’elekha sham.
wn8dty Smh lbny ySr1l wnqdS bkbdy and there i will until-witness with children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and the dwelling be dedicated-finished by my heaviness. veno‘adti shamah libnei yisra’el, veniqdash bikhbodi.
wqdSty 1t 1hl mw8d w1t hmzbH w1t 1hrn w1t bnyw 1qdS lkhn ly and i will dedicate-finify the tent of until-conception, and the butcher-kitchen: i will dedicate-finify also both cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens, to dimmer-server to me. veqidashti ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et hamizbeakh, ve’et ’aharon ve’et banav ’aqadesh lekhahen li.
wSknty btwk bny ySr1l whyyty lhm l1lhym and i will dwell among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and will be their towards-these-elohim. veshakhanti betokh benei yisra’el, vehayiti lahem lelohim.
wyd8w ky 1ny yhwh 1lhyhm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1tm m1rZ mZrym lSkny btwkm 1ny yhwh 1lhyhm and they hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou their towards-these-elohim, that brought them forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim, that i may dwell among them: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou their towards-these-elohim. veyade‘u ki ’ani yhvh ’elohehem ’asher hozeti ’otam me’erez mizrayim leshakheni betokham, ’ani yhvh ’elohehem.
w8Syt mzbH mqTr qTrt 8Zy STym t8Sh 1tw and thou make an butcher-kitchen to burn incense upon: of sailing-shitim wood thou make it. ve‘asita mizbeakh miqtar qetoret, ‘azei shitim ta‘aseh ’oto.
1mh 1rkw w1mh rHbw rbw8 yhyh w1mtym qmtw mmnw qrntyw a cubit be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof; foursquare it be: and two cubits be the height thereof: the horn-rays thereof be of the same. ’amah ’areko ve’amah rakhebo rabua‘ yihyeh ve’amatayim qomato, mimenu qarnotav.
wZpyt 1tw zhb Thwr 1t ggw w1t qyrtyw sbyb w1t qrntyw w8Syt lw zr zhb sbyb and thou overlay it with pure-tahor gold, the top thereof, and the sides thereof round about, and the horn-rays thereof; and thou make unto it a frame of gold round about. vezipita zahab tahor gago ve’et qirotav sabib ve’et qarnotav, ve‘asita lo zer zahab sabib.
wSty Tb8t zhb t8Sh lw mtHt lzrw 8l Sty Zl8tyw t8Sh 8l Sny Zdyw whyh lbtym lbdym lS1t 1tw bhmh and two golden rings thou make to it under the crown of it, by the two corners thereof, upon the two sides of it thou make it; and they be for places for the canvas to bear it withal. ushetei tabe‘ot zahab ta‘aseh lo mitakhat lezero ‘al shetei zal‘otav ta‘aseh ‘al shenei zidav, vehayah lebatim lebadim laset ’oto bahemah.
w8Syt 1t hbdym 8Zy STym wZpyt 1tm zhb and thou make the canvas of sailing-shitim wood, and overlay them with gold. ve‘asita habadim ‘azei shitim, vezipita ’otam zahab.
wntth 1tw lpny hprkt 1Sr 8l 1rn h8dt lpny hkprt 1Sr 8l h8dt 1Sr 1w8d lk Smh and thou put it before-turns the breaker that is by the cabinet of the until-witness, before-turns the out-of-townment that is over the until-witness, where i will until-witness with thee. venatatah ’oto lifnei haparokhet ’asher ‘al ’aron ha‘edut, lifnei hakaporet ’asher ‘al ha‘edut ’asher ’iva‘ed lekha.

wbh8lt 1hrn 1t hnrt byn h8rbym yqTyrnh qTrt tmyd lpny yhwh ldrtykm and when cabinet-aaron lighteth the lamps at even, he burn incense upon it, a perpetual incense before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou throughout your generations. ubeha‘alot ’aharon hanerot ben ha‘arbayim yaqtirenah, qetoret tamid lifnei yhvh ledorotekhem.
l1 t8lw 8lyw qTrt zrh w8lh wmnHh wnsk l1 tskw 8lyw ye inward no strange incense thereon, nor on-up, nor absorber; neither ye pour pouring thereon. lo ta‘alu ‘alav qetoret zarah ve‘olah uminkhah, venesekh lo tisekhu ‘alav.
wkpr 1hrn 8l qrntyw 1Ht bSnh mdm HT1t hkprym 1Ht bSnh ykpr 8lyw ldrtykm qdS qdSym hw1 lyhwh and cabinet-aaron make an out-of-town-ment upon the horn-rays of it once in a year with the blood of the miss of out-of-town-ments: once in the year he make out-of-town-ment upon it throughout your generations: it is most dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vekhiper ’aharon ‘al qarnotav ’akhat bashanah, midam khatat hakipurim ’akhat bashanah yekhaper ‘alav ledorotekhem qodesh qadashim hu yhvh.

ky tS1 1t r1S bny ySr1l lpqdyhm wntnw 1yS kpr npSw lyhwh bpqd 1tm wl1 yhyh bhm ngp bpqd 1tm when thou takest the sum of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel after their number, then they give every man a ransom for his being unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, when thou numberest them; that there be no obstacle-nagaf among them, when thou numberest them. ki tisa rosh bene yisra’el lifqudehem venatenu ’ish kofer nafsho yhvh bifqod ’otam, velo yihyeh bahem negef bifqod ’otam.
zh ytnw kl h8br 8l hpqdym mHZyt hSql bSql hqdS 8Srym grh hSql mHZyt hSql trwmh lyhwh this they give, every one that passeth among them that are numbered, half a light-shekel after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished: (a light-shekel is double-ten-twenty stranger-gerahs:) an half light-shekel be the plateau-contributeing of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. zeh yitenu kal ‘al hapequdim makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh, ‘esrim gerah hasheqel makhazit hasheqel terumah yhvh.
kl h8br 8l hpqdym mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh ytn trwmt yhwh every one that passeth among them that are numbered, from double-ten-twenty years old and above, give an inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. kol ‘al hapequdim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah, yiten terumat yhvh.
h8Syr l1 yrbh whdl l1 ym8yT mmHZyt hSql ltt 1t trwmt yhwh lkpr 8l npStykm the rich not give more, and the poor not give less than half a light-shekel, when they give an inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to make an out-of-town-ment for your beings. he‘ashir lo yarbeh vehadal lo yam‘it mimakhazit hashaqel, latet terumat yhvh lekhaper ‘al nafshotekhem.

wrHZw 1hrn wbnyw mmnw 1t ydyhm w1t rglyhm for cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens wash their hands and their feet thereat: verakhazu ’aharon ubanav mimenu, yedehem ve’et raglehem.
bb1m 1l 1hl mw8d yrHZw mym wl1 ymtw 1w bgStm 1l hmzbH lSrt lhqTyr 1Sh lyhwh when they go into the tent of until-conception, they wash with from-waters, that they die not; or when they come near to the butcher-kitchen to , to burn feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: bebo’am ’el ’ohel mo‘ed yirkhazu mayim velo yamutu, ’o begishtam ’el hamizbeakh lesharet lehaqtir ’isheh yhvh.
wrHZw ydyhm wrglyhm wl1 ymtw whyth lhm Hq 8wlm lw wlzr8w ldrtm so they wash their hands and their feet, that they die not: and it be a statute for ever to them, even to him and to his seed throughout their generations. verakhazu yedehem veraglehem velo yamutu, vehayetah lahem khaq ‘olam lo ulezar‘o ledorotam.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr moreover yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
w1th qH lk bSmym r1S mr drwr HmS m1wt wqnmn bSm mHZytw HmSym wm1tym wqnh bSm HmSym wm1tym take thou also unto thee head scents, of pure-tahor myrrh five hundred light-shekels, and of sweet cinnamon half so much, even two hundred and fifty light-shekels, and of sweet calamus two hundred and fifty light-shekels, ve’atah qakh lekha besamim rosh mar deror khamesh me’ot veqineman besem makhazito khamishim umatayim, uqeneh bosem khamishim umatayim.
wqdh HmS m1wt bSql hqdS wSmn zyt hyn and of cassia five hundred light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished, and of name-from-oil olive an here-hin: veqidah khamesh me’ot besheqel haqodesh, veshemen zayit hin.
w8Syt 1tw Smn mSHt qdS rqH mrqHt m8Sh rqH Smn mSHt qdS yhyh and thou make it an name-from-oil of dedicated-finished ointment, an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary: it be an dedicated-finished lubeing name-from-oil. ve‘asita ’oto men mishkhat qodesh roqakh mirqakhat ma‘aseh roqeakh, shemen mishkhat qodesh yihyeh.
wmSHt bw 1t 1hl mw8d w1t 1rwn h8dt and thou lube the tent of until-conception therewith, and the cabinet of the until-witness, umashakhta bo ’ohel mo‘ed, ve’et ’aron ha‘edut.
w1t hSlHn w1t kl klyw w1t hmnrh w1t klyh w1t mzbH hqTrt and the send-table and all his tools, and the light-stream-candle and his tools, and the butcher-kitchen of incense, ve’et hashulkhan ve’et kal kelav ve’et hamenorah ve’et keleha, ve’et mizbakh haqetoret.

w1l bny ySr1l tdbr l1mr Smn mSHt qdS yhyh zh ly ldrtykm and thou speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, this be an dedicated-finished lubeing name-from-oil unto me throughout your generations. ve’el benei yisra’el tedaber lemor, men mishkhat qodesh yihyeh zeh li ledorotekhem.
8l bSr 1dm l1 yysk wbmtkntw l1 t8Sw kmhw qdS hw1 qdS yhyh lkm upon man's flesh it not be poured, neither ye make any other like it, after the composition of it: it is dedicated-finished, and it be dedicated-finished unto you. ‘al besar ’adam lo yisakh ubematkunto lo ta‘asu kamohu, qodesh hu qodesh yihyeh lakhem.
1yS 1Sr yrqH kmhw w1Sr ytn mmnw 8l zr wnkrt m8myw whosoever compoundeth any like it, or whosoever putteth any of it upon a stranger, even be cut off from his with-mum-people. ’ish ’asher yirqakh kamohu va’asher yiten mimenu ‘al zar, venikhrat me‘amav.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh qH lk smym nTp wSHlt wHlbnh smym wlbnh zkh bd bbd yhyh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, take unto thee sweet scents, stacte, and onycha, and galbanum; these sweet scents with pure-tahor white-frankincense: of each there be a like weight: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh qakh lekha samim nataf ushekhelet vekhelbenah samim ulebonah zakah, bad bebad yihyeh.
w8Syt 1th qTrt rqH m8Sh rwqH mmlH Thwr qdS and thou make it a perfume, a confection after the art of the apothecary, tempered together, pure-tahor and dedicated-finished: ve‘asita ’otah qetoret roqakh ma‘aseh roqeakh, memulakh tahor qodesh.
wSHqt mmnh hdq wntth mmnh lpny h8dt b1hl mw8d 1Sr 1w8d lk Smh qdS qdSym thyh lkm and thou beat some of it very small, and put of it before-turns the until-witness in the tent of until-conception, where i will until-witness with thee: it be unto you most dedicated-finished. veshakhaqta mimenah hadeq venatatah mimenah lifnei ha‘edut be’ohel mo‘ed ’asher ’iva‘ed lekha. qadashim tihyeh lakhem.
whqTrt 1Sr t8Sh bmtknth l1 t8Sw lkm qdS thyh lk lyhwh and as for the perfume which thou make, ye not make to yourselves according to the composition thereof: it be unto thee dedicated-finished for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehaqetoret ’asher ta‘aseh bematkuntah lo ta‘asu lakhem, qodesh tihyeh lekha yhvh.

wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
r1h qr1ty bSm bZl1l bn 1wry bn Hwr lmTh yhwdh see, i have called by name onion-towards-bezaleel child-between of small-place-prince-hur, child-between of small-place-prince-hur, of the branch of know-judah: re’eh qarati beshem, bezal’el ben ’uri ben khur lemateh yehudah.
w1ml1 1tw rwH 1lhym bHkmh wbtbwnh wbd8t wbkl ml1kh and i have filled him with breath-spirit of towards-these-elohim, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of message-craft, va’amalei ’oto ruakh ’elohim, bekhakhemah ubitbunah ubeda‘at ubekhal melakhah.

wbHrSt 1bn lml1t wbHrSt 8Z l8Swt bkl ml1kh and in cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of timber, to work in all manner of message-craft. ubakharoshet ’eben lemalot ubakharoshet ‘ez, la‘asot bekhal melakhah.
w1ny hnh ntty 1tw 1t 1hly1b bn 1Hysmk lmTh dn wblb kl Hkm lb ntty Hkmh w8Sw 1t kl 1Sr Zwytk and i, behold, i have given with him my-tent-dad-aholiab, child-between of my-brother-support-ahisamakh, of the branch of discuss-dan: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted i have put wisdom, that they may make all that i have order-prescribed thee; va’ani hineh natati ’ito ’aholi’ab ben ’akhisamakh lemateh dan ubeleb kal khakham leb natati khakhmah ve‘asu kal ’asher zivitikha.

wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
w1th dbr 1l bny ySr1l l1mr 1k 1t Sbtty tSmrw ky 1wt hw1 byny wbynykm ldrtykm ld8t ky 1ny yhwh mqdSkm speak thou also unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, verily my seven-sabbaths ye keep: for it is a sign between-bin me and you throughout your generations; that ye may hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou that doth dedicate-finify you. ve’atah daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor ’akh shabetotay tishmoru, ki ’ot hi beni ubenekhem ledorotekhem lada‘at ki ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
wSmrtm 1t hSbt ky qdS hw1 lkm mHllyh mwt ywmt ky kl h8Sh bh ml1kh wnkrth hnpS hhw1 mqrb 8myh ye keep the seven-sabbath therefore; for it is dedicated-finished unto you: every one that ceaseth it surely be put to death: for whosoever doeth any work therein, that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. ushemartem hashabat ki qodesh hi lakhem, mekhaleha mot yumat ki kal ha‘oseh bah melakhah venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb ‘ameha.
SSt ymym y8Sh ml1kh wbywm hSby8y Sbt Sbtwn qdS lyhwh kl h8Sh ml1kh bywm hSbt mwt ywmt six days may work be done; and in the seventh is the seven-sabbath of rest, dedicated-finished to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: whosoever doeth any work in the seven-sabbath day, he surely be put to death. sheshet yamim ye‘aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi‘i shabat shabaton qodesh yhvh, kal ha‘oseh melakhah beyom hashabat mot yumat.
wSmrw bny ySr1l 1t hSbt l8Swt 1t hSbt ldrtm bryt 8wlm wherefore children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel keep the seven-sabbath, to guard-observe the seven-sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant. veshameru bene yisra’el hashabat, la‘asot hashabat ledorotam berit ‘olam.
byny wbyn bny ySr1l 1wt hw1 l8lm ky SSt ymym 8Sh yhwh 1t hSmym w1t h1rZ wbywm hSby8y Sbt wynpS it is a sign between-bin me and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel for ever: for in six days yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made namespaces and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed. beni uben benei yisra’el ’ot hi le‘olam, ki sheshet yamim ‘asah yhvh hashamayim ve’et ha’arez ubayom hashebi‘i shabat vayinafash.
wytn 1l mSh kkltw ldbr 1tw bhr syny Sny lHt h8dt lHt 1bn ktbym b1Zb8 1lhym and he gave unto extracted-mose, when he had made an end of communing with him upon mount bush-(proto-)sinai, two tables of until-witness, tables of father-child-stone, written with the finger of towards-these-elohim. vayiten ’el mosheh kekhaloto ledaber ’ito behar sinay shenei lukhot ha‘edut, lukhot ’eben ketubim be’ezba‘ ’elohim.
wyr1 h8m ky bSS mSh lrdt mn hhr wyqhl h8m 8l 1hrn wy1mrw 1lyw qwm 8Sh lnw 1lhym 1Sr ylkw lpnynw ky zh mSh h1yS 1Sr h8lnw m1rZ mZrym l1 yd8nw mh hyh lw and when the with-mum-people saw that extracted-mose delayed to come down out of the mount, the with-mum-people added themselves together unto cabinet-aaron, and said unto him, up, make us towards-these-elohim, which go before-turns us; for as for this extracted-mose, the man that brought us up out of the land of narrows-mizraim, we wot not what is become of him. vayar ha‘am ki boshesh mosheh laredet min hahar, vayiqahel ha‘am ‘al ’aharon vayomeru ’elav qum ‘aseh lanu ’elohim ’asher yelekhu lefanenu ki zeh mosheh ha’ish ’asher he‘elanu me’erez mizrayim lo yada‘nu meh hayah lo.
wy1mr 1lhm 1hrn prqw nzmy hzhb 1Sr b1zny nSykm bnykm wbntykm whby1w 1ly and cabinet-aaron said unto them, break off the golden earrings, which are in the ears of your women, of your children-betweens, and of your children-betweenesss, and bring them unto me. vayomer ’alehem ’aharon parequ nizmei hazahab ’asher be’azenei neshekhem benekhem ubenotekhem, vehabi’u ’elay.
wytprqw kl h8m 1t nzmy hzhb 1Sr b1znyhm wyby1w 1l 1hrn and all the with-mum-people brake off the golden earrings which were in their ears, and brought them unto cabinet-aaron. vayitparequ kal ha‘am nizmei hazahab ’asher be’azenehem, vayabi’u ’el ’aharon.
wyqH mydm wyZr 1tw bHrT wy8Shw 8gl mskh wy1mrw 1lh 1lhyk ySr1l 1Sr h8lwk m1rZ mZrym and he received them at their hand, and fashioned it with a graving tool, after he had made it a molten calf: and they said, these be thy towards-these-elohim, o saturated-towards-israel, which brought thee up out of the land of narrows-mizraim. vayiqakh miyadam vayazar ’oto bakheret vaya‘asehu ‘egel masekhah, vayomeru ’eleh ’elohekha yisra’el ’asher he‘elukha me’erez mizrayim.
wyr1 1hrn wybn mzbH lpnyw wyqr1 1hrn wy1mr Hg lyhwh mHr and when cabinet-aaron saw it, he between-built an butcher-kitchen before-turns it; and cabinet-aaron made proclamation, and said, to morrow is a until-conception to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayar ’aharon vayiben mizbeakh lefanav, vayiqra ’aharon vayomar khag yhvh makhar.
wySkymw mmHrt wy8lw 8lt wygSw Slmym wySb h8m l1kl wStw wyqmw lZHq and they rose up early on the morrow, and rose on-ups, and brought wholes; and the with-mum-people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to play. vayashkimu mimakhorat vaya‘alu ‘olot vayagishu shelamim, vayesheb ha‘am le’ekhol veshato vayaqumu lezakheq.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh lk rd ky SHt 8mk 1Sr h8lyt m1rZ mZrym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, go, get thee down; for thy with-mum-people, which thou broughtest out of the land of narrows-mizraim, have corrupted themselves: vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh, lekh red ki shikhet ‘amekha ’asher he‘eleta me’erez mizrayim.
srw mhr mn hdrk 1Sr Zwytm 8Sw lhm 8gl mskh wyStHww lw wyzbHw lw wy1mrw 1lh 1lhyk ySr1l 1Sr h8lwk m1rZ mZrym they have turned aside quickly out of the way which i order-prescribed them: they have made them a molten calf, and have partook-shatakh it, and have butcherd thereunto, and said, these be thy towards-these-elohim, o saturated-towards-israel, which have brought thee up out of the land of narrows-mizraim. saru maher min haderekh ’asher zivitim ‘asu lahem ‘egel masekhah, vayishtakhavu lo vayizbekhu lo vayomeru ’eleh ’elohekha yisra’el ’asher he‘elukha me’erez mizrayim.

w8th hnyHh ly wyHr 1py bhm w1klm w18Sh 1wtk lgwy gdwl now therefore let me alone, that my wrath may wax hot against them, and that i may consume them: and i will make of thee a great nation. ve‘atah hanikhah li veyikhar ’api bahem va’akhalem, ve’e‘eseh ’otkha lego gadol.
wyHl mSh 1t pny yhwh 1lhyw wy1mr lmh yhwh yHrh 1pk b8mk 1Sr hwZ1t m1rZ mZrym bkH gdwl wbyd Hzqh and extracted-mose besought yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou his towards-these-elohim, and said, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, why doth thy wrath wax hot against thy with-mum-people, which thou hast brought forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim with great dynamic, and with a mighty hand? vaykhal mosheh penei yhvh ’elohav, vayomer lamah yhvh yekhereh ’apekha be‘amekha ’asher hozeta me’erez mizrayim bekhoakh gadol ubeyad khazaqah.
lmh y1mrw mZrym l1mr br8h hwZy1m lhrg 1tm bhrym wlkltm m8l pny h1dmh Swb mHrwn 1pk whnHm 8l hr8h l8mk wherefore should the narrows-mizraimians speak, and say, for mischief did he bring them out, to slay them in the mountains, and to consume them from the face-turns of the earth? turn from thy fierce wrath, and repent of this bad against thy with-mum-people. lamah yomeru mizrayim lemor bera‘ah hozi’am laharog ’otam beharim ulekhalotam me‘al penei ha’adamah, ub mekharon ’apekha vehinakhem ‘al hara‘ah le‘amekha.
zkr l1brhm lyZHq wlySr1l 8bdyk 1Sr nSb8t lhm bk wtdbr 1lhm 1rbh 1t zr8km kkwkby hSmym wkl h1rZ hz1t 1Sr 1mrty 1tn lzr8km wnHlw l8lm remember their-dick-abraham, laughter-isaac, and saturated-towards-israel, thy workers, to whom thou swarest by thine own self, and saidst unto them, i will multiply your seed as the stars of namespaces, and all this land that i have bee-spoken of will i give unto your seed, and they inherit it for ever. zekhor le’abraham leyizkhaq uleyisra’el ‘abadekha ’asher nishba‘ta lahem bakh vatedaber ’alehem ’arbeh zar‘akhem kekhokhbei hashamayim, vekhal ha’arez hazot ’asher ’amarti ’eten lezar‘akhem venakhalu le‘olam.
wynHm yhwh 8l hr8h 1Sr dbr l8Swt l8mw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou repented of the bad which he thought to do unto his with-mum-people. vayinakhem yhvh, ‘al hara‘ah ’asher diber la‘asot le‘amo.
wypn wyrd mSh mn hhr wSny lHt h8dt bydw lHt ktbym mSny 8bryhm mzh wmzh hm ktbym and extracted-mose turned, and went down from the mount, and the two tables of the until-witness were in his hand: the tables were written on both their sides; on the one side and on the other were they written. vayifen vayered mosheh min hahar ushenei lukhot ha‘edut beyado, lukhot ketubim mishenei ‘ebrehem mizeh umizeh hem ketubim.
whlHt m8Sh 1lhym hmh whmktb mktb 1lhym hw1 Hrwt 8l hlHt and the tables were the work of towards-these-elohim, and the writing was the writing of towards-these-elohim, graven upon the tables. vehalukhot ma‘aseh ’elohim hemah, vehamikhtab mikhtab ’elohim hu kharut ‘al halukhot.
wySm8 yhwS8 1t qwl h8m br8h wy1mr 1l mSh qwl mlHmh bmHnh and when save-joshua-jesus heard the noise of the with-mum-people as they shouted, he said unto extracted-mose, there is a noise of war in the camp. vayishma‘ yehoshua‘ qol ha‘am bere‘oh, vayomer ’el mosheh qol milkhamah bamakhaneh
wy1mr 1yn qwl 8nwt gbwrh w1yn qwl 8nwt HlwSh qwl 8nwt 1nky Sm8 and he said, it is not the voice of them that shout for mastery, neither is it the voice of them that cry for being overcome: and the noise of them that sing do i hear. vayomer ’en qol ‘anot geburah ve’en qol ‘anot khalushah, qol ‘anot ’anokhi shomea‘.
wyhy k1Sr qrb 1l hmHnh wyr1 1t h8gl wmHlt wyHr 1p mSh wySlk mydw mydyw 1t hlHt wySbr 1tm tHt hhr and it came to pass, as soon as he came inward the camp, that he saw the calf, and the dancing: and extracted-mose' nose-anger waxed hot, and he cast the tables out of his hands, and brake them beneath the mount. vayhi ka’asher qarab ’el hamakhaneh vayar ha‘egel umekholot, vayikhar ’af mosheh vayashlekh miyado miyadav halukhot vayshaber ’otam takhat hahar.
wyqH 1t h8gl 1Sr 8Sw wySrp b1S wyTHn 8d 1Sr dq wyzr 8l pny hmym wySq 1t bny ySr1l and he took the calf which they had made, and burnt it in the fire, and ground it to powder, and strewed it upon the from-waters, and made children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel drink of it. vayiqakh ha‘egel ’asher ‘asu vayisrof ba’esh vayitkhan ‘ad ’asher daq, vayizer ‘al penei hamayim vayashq benei yisra’el.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn mh 8Sh lk h8m hzh ky hb1t 8lyw HT1h gdlh and extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron, what did this with-mum-people unto thee, that thou hast brought so great a miss upon them? vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon meh ‘asah lekha ha‘am hazeh, ki hebeta ‘alav khata’ah gedolah.
wy1mr 1hrn 1l yHr 1p 1dny 1th yd8t 1t h8m ky br8 hw1 and cabinet-aaron said, let not the nose-anger of my lord-base wax hot: thou knowest the with-mum-people, that they are set on mischief. vayomer ’aharon ’al yikhar ’af ’adoni, ’atah yada‘ta ha‘am ki bera‘ hu.
wy1mrw ly 8Sh lnw 1lhym 1Sr ylkw lpnynw ky zh mSh h1yS 1Sr h8lnw m1rZ mZrym l1 yd8nw mh hyh lw for they said unto me, make us towards-these-elohim, which go before-turns us: for as for this extracted-mose, the man that brought us up out of the land of narrows-mizraim, we wot not what is become of him. vayomeru li ‘aseh lanu ’elohim ’asher yelekhu lefanenu, ki zeh mosheh ha’ish ’asher he‘elanu me’erez mizrayim lo yada‘nu meh hayah lo.
w1mr lhm lmy zhb htprqw wytnw ly w1Slkhw b1S wyZ1 h8gl hzh and i said unto them, whosoever hath any gold, let them break it off. so they gave it me: then i cast it into the fire, and there came out this calf. va’omar lahem lemi zahab hitparaqu vayitenu li, va’ashlikhehu ba’esh vayezei ha‘egel hazeh.
wyr1 mSh 1t h8m ky pr8 hw1 ky pr8h 1hrn lSmZh bqmyhm and when extracted-mose saw that the with-mum-people were naked; (for cabinet-aaron had made them naked unto their shame among their father-adversaries:) vayar mosheh ha‘am ki farua‘ hu, ki fera‘oh ’aharon leshimzah beqamehem.
wy8md mSh bS8r hmHnh wy1mr my lyhwh 1ly wy1spw 1lyw kl bny lwy then extracted-mose stood in the hair-gate of the camp, and said, who is on yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's side? let him come unto me. and all children-betweens of join-levi added themselves together unto him. vaya‘amod mosheh besha‘ar hamakhaneh vayomer mi yhvh ’elay, vaye’asefu ’elav kal benei levi.
wy1mr lhm kh 1mr yhwh 1lhy ySr1l Symw 1yS Hrbw 8l yrkw 8brw wSwbw mS8r lS8r bmHnh whrgw 1yS 1t 1Hyw w1yS 1t r8hw w1yS 1t qrbw and he said unto them, thus saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of saturated-towards-israel, put every man his sword by his side, and go in and out from hair-gate to hair-gate throughout the camp, and slay every man his brother, and every man his companion, and every man his neighbor. vayomer lahem koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el simu ’ish kharbo ‘al yerekho, ‘ibru vashubu misha‘ar lasha‘ar bamakhaneh vehirgu ’ish ’akhiv ve’ish re‘ehu ve’ish qerobo.
wy8Sw bny lwy kdbr mSh wypl mn h8m bywm hhw1 kSlSt 1lpy 1yS and children-betweens of join-levi did according to the bee-word of extracted-mose: and there fell of the with-mum-people that day about three thousand men. vaya‘asu bene levi kidbar mosheh, vayipol min ha‘am bayom hahu kishloshet ’alfei ’ish.
wy1mr mSh ml1w ydkm hywm lyhwh ky 1yS bbnw wb1Hyw wltt 8lykm hywm brkh for extracted-mose had said, fill yourselves today to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, even every man upon his child-between, and upon his brother; that he may bestow upon you a knee-fluffy-blessing this day. vayomer mosheh mil’u yedkhem hayom yhvh ki ’ish bibno ube’akhiv, velatet ‘alekhem hayom berakhah.
wyhy mmHrt wy1mr mSh 1l h8m 1tm HT1tm HT1h gdlh w8th 18lh 1l yhwh 1wly 1kprh b8d HT1tkm and it came to pass on the morrow, that extracted-mose said unto the with-mum-people, ye have missed a great miss: and now i will go up unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; peradventure i make an out-of-town-ment for your miss. vayhi mimakhorat vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am ’atem khatatem khata’ah gedolah, ve‘atah ’e‘eleh ’el yhvh ’ulay ’akhaperah be‘ad khatatkhem.
wySb mSh 1l yhwh wy1mr 1n1 HT1 h8m hzh HT1h gdlh wy8Sw lhm 1lhy zhb and extracted-mose returned unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and said, oh, this with-mum-people have missed a great miss, and have made them towards-these-elohim of gold. vayashab mosheh ’el yhvh vayomar, ’ana khata ha‘am hazeh khata’ah gedolah vaya‘asu lahem ’elohei zahab.
w8th 1m tS1 HT1tm w1m 1yn mHny n1 msprk 1Sr ktbt yet now, if thou wilt forgive their miss--; and if not, blot me, i pray thee, out of thy book which thou hast written. ve‘atah ’im tisa khatatam, ve’im ’ayin mekheni na misifrekha ’asher katabeta.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh my 1Sr HT1 ly 1mHnw mspry and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, whosoever hath missed against me, him will i blot out of my book. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, mi ’asher khata li ’emkhenu misifri.
w8th lk nHh 1t h8m 1l 1Sr dbrty lk hnh ml1ky ylk lpnyk wbywm pqdy wpqdty 8lyhm HT1tm therefore now go, lead the with-mum-people unto the place of which i have bee-spoken unto thee: behold, mine angel-messanger go before-turns thee: nevertheless in the day when i visit i will visit their miss upon them. ve‘atah lekh nekheh ha‘am ’el ’asher dibarti lakh hineh mal’akhi yelekh lefanekha, ubeyom paqedi ufaqadti ‘alehem khatatam.
wygp yhwh 1t h8m 8l 1Sr 8Sw 1t h8gl 1Sr 8Sh 1hrn and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou plagued the with-mum-people, because they made the calf, which cabinet-aaron made. vayigof yhvh ha‘am, ‘al ’asher ‘asu ha‘egel ’asher ‘asah ’aharon.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh lk 8lh mzh 1th wh8m 1Sr h8lyt m1rZ mZrym 1l h1rZ 1Sr nSb8ty l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb l1mr lzr8k 1tnnh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, depart, and go up hence, thou and the with-mum-people which thou hast brought up out of the land of narrows-mizraim, unto the land which i sware unto their-dick-abraham, to laughter-isaac, and to backstreet-jacob, saying, unto thy seed will i give it: vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lekh ‘aleh mizeh ’atah veha‘am ’asher he‘elita me’erez mizrayim, ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob lemor lezar‘akha ’etenenah.
wSlHty lpnyk ml1k wgrSty 1t hkn8ny h1mry whHty whprzy hHwy whybwsy and i will send an angel-messanger before-turns thee; and i will drive out the mobile-trade-canaanite, the talker-amorite, and the cut-hittite, and the unwalled-perizzite, the experience-hivite, and the trampler-jebusite: veshalakhti lefanekha mal’akh, vegerashti hakena‘ani ha’emori vehakhiti vehaperizi hakhivi vehaybusi.
1l 1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS ky l1 18lh bqrbk ky 8m qSh 8rp 1th pn 1klk bdrk unto a land flowing with milk and honey: for i will not go up in the inward of thee; for thou art a stiffnecked with-mum-people: lest i consume thee in the way. ’el ’erez zabat khalab udebash, ki lo ’e‘eleh beqirbekha ki ‘am qesheh ‘oref ’atah pen ’akhelkha badarekh.
wySm8 h8m 1t hdbr hr8 hzh wyt1blw wl1 Stw 1yS 8dyw 8lyw and when the with-mum-people heard these bad tidings, they mourned: and no man did put on him his ornaments. vayishma‘ ha‘am hadabar hara‘ hazeh vayit’abalu, velo shatu ’ish ‘edyo ‘alav.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1mr 1l bny ySr1l 1tm 8m qSh 8rp rg8 1Hd 18lh bqrbk wklytyk w8th hwrd 8dyk m8lyk w1d8h mh 18Sh lk for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said unto extracted-mose, say unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, ye are a stiffnecked with-mum-people: i will come up into the qrbmidst of thee in a moment, and consume thee: therefore now put off thy ornaments from thee, that i may hand-know what to do unto thee. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el bene yisra’el ’atem ‘am qesheh ‘oref rega‘ ’ekhad ’e‘eleh beqirbekha vekhilitikha, ve‘atah hored ‘edyekha me‘alekha ve’ede‘ah mah ’e‘eseh lakh.
wytnZlw bny ySr1l 1t 8dym mhr Hwrb and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel stripped themselves of their ornaments by the mount sword-horeb. vayitnazelu bene yisra’el ’et ‘edyam mehar khoreb.
wmSh yqH 1t h1hl wnTh lw mHwZ lmHnh hrHq mn hmHnh wqr1 lw 1hl mw8d whyh kl mbqS yhwh yZ1 1l 1hl mw8d 1Sr mHwZ lmHnh and extracted-mose took the dwelling, and pitched it without the camp, afar off from the camp, and called it the tent of until-conception. and it came to pass, that every one which sought yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou went out unto the tent of until-conception, which was without the camp. umosheh yiqakh ha’ohel venatah lo mikhuz lamakhaneh harkheq min hamakhaneh veqara lo ’ohel mo‘ed, vehayah kal mebaqesh yhvh yezei ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ’asher mikhuz lamakhaneh.
whyh kZ1t mSh 1l h1hl yqwmw kl h8m wnZbw 1yS ptH 1hlw whbyTw 1Hry mSh 8d b1w h1hlh and it came to pass, when extracted-mose went out unto the dwelling, that all the with-mum-people rose up, and stood every man at his tent opening, and looked after extracted-mose, until he was gone into the dwelling. vehayah kezet mosheh ’el ha’ohel yaqumu kal ha‘am venizebu ’ish petakh ’aholo, vehibitu ’akharei mosheh ‘ad bo’o ha’ohelah.
whyh kb1 mSh h1hlh yrd 8mwd h8nn w8md ptH h1hl wdbr 8m mSh and it came to pass, as extracted-mose entered into the dwelling, the cloudy page-column-erection descended, and stood at the opening of the dwelling, and talked with extracted-mose. vehayah kebo mosheh ha’ohelah yered ‘amud he‘anan ve‘amad petakh ha’ohel, vediber ‘im mosheh.
wr1h kl h8m 1t 8mwd h8nn 8md ptH h1hl wqm kl h8m whStHww 1yS ptH 1hlw and all the with-mum-people saw the cloudy page-column-erection stand at the dwelling opening: and all the with-mum-people rose up and partook-shatakh, every man in his tent opening. vera’ah khal ha‘am ‘amud he‘anan ‘omed petakh ha’ohel, veqam kal ha‘am vehishtakhavu ’ish petakh ’aholo.
wdbr yhwh 1l mSh pnym 1l pnym k1Sr ydbr 1yS 1l r8hw wSb 1l hmHnh wmSrtw yhwS8 bn nwn n8r l1 ymyS mtwk h1hl and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose face-turns to face-turns, as a man speaketh unto his friend. and he turned again into the camp: and his worker save-joshua-jesus, child-between of fish-nun, a young man, departed not out of the dwelling. vediber yhvh ’el mosheh panim ’el panim ka’asher yedaber ’ish ’el re‘ehu, veshab ’el hamakhaneh umeshareto yehoshua‘ bin nun na‘ar lo yamish mitokh ha’ohel.
wy1mr mSh 1l yhwh r1h 1th 1mr 1ly h8l 1t h8m hzh w1th l1 hwd8tny 1t 1Sr tSlH 8my w1th 1mrt yd8tyk bSm wgm mZ1t Hn b8yny and extracted-mose said unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, see, thou sayest unto me, bring up this with-mum-people: and thou hast not let me hand-know whom thou wilt send with me. yet thou hast said, i hand-know thee by name, and thou hast also found attractiveness in my sight. vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh re’eh ’atah ’omer ’elay ha‘al ha‘am hazeh ve’atah lo hoda‘tani ’asher tishlakh ‘imi, ve’atah ’amarta yeda‘tikha beshem vegam mazata khen be‘enay.
w8th 1m n1 mZ1ty Hn b8ynyk hwd8ny n1 1t drkk w1d8k lm8n 1mZ1 Hn b8ynyk wr1h ky 8mk hgwy hzh now therefore, i pray thee, if i have found attractiveness in thy sight, show me now thy way, that i may hand-know thee, that i may find attractiveness in thy sight: and consider that this nation is thy with-mum-people. ve‘atah ’im na mazati khen be‘enekha hodi‘eni na derakhekha ve’eda‘akha lema‘an ’emza khen be‘enekha, ure’eh ki ‘amekha hago hazeh.
wy1mr pny ylkw whnHty lk and he said, my presence go with thee, and i will give thee rest. vayomar, panay yelekhu vahanikhoti lakh.

wbmh ywd8 1pw1 ky mZ1ty Hn b8ynyk 1ny w8mk hlw1 blktk 8mnw wnplynw 1ny w8mk mkl h8m 1Sr 8l pny h1dmh for wherein it be hand-known here that i and thy with-mum-people have found attractiveness in thy sight? is it not in that thou goest with us? so we be separated, i and thy with-mum-people, from all the with-mum-people that are upon the face-turns of the earth. ubameh yivada‘ ’efo ki mazati khen be‘enekha ’ani ve‘amekha halo belekhtekha ‘imanu, veniflenu ’ani ve‘amekha mikal ha‘am ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah.
