wy1mr hr1ny n1 1t kbdk and he said, i beseech thee, show me thy heaviness. vayomar, har’eni na kebodekha.
wy1mr 1ny 18byr kl Twby 8l pnyk wqr1ty bSm yhwh lpnyk wHnty 1t 1Sr 1Hn wrHmty 1t 1Sr 1rHm and he said, i will make all my goodness pass before-turns thee, and i will proclaim the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou before-turns thee; and will be attracted to whom i will be attracted, and will cream on whom i will cream. vayomer ’ani ’a‘abir kal tubi ‘al panekha veqarati beshem yhvh lefanekha, vekhanoti ’asher ’akhon verikhamti ’asher ’arakhem.
wy1mr l1 twkl lr1t 1t pny ky l1 yr1ny h1dm wHy and he said, thou canst not see my face-turns: for there no man see me, and live. vayomer lo tukhal lir’ot panay, ki lo yir’ani ha’adam vakhay.

whyh b8br kbdy wSmtyk bnqrt hZwr wSkty kpy 8lyk 8d 8bry and it come to pass, while my heaviness passeth by, that i will put thee in a cleft of the rock, and will cover thee with my hand while i pass by: vehayah ba‘abor kebodi vesamtikha beniqrat hazur, vesakoti khapi ‘alekha ‘ad ‘aberi.
whsrty 1t kpy wr1yt 1t 1Hry wpny l1 yr1w and i will take away mine hand, and thou see my back parts: and my face-turns not be seen. vahasiroti kapi vera’ita ’akhoray, ufanay lo yera’u.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh psl lk Sny lHt 1bnym kr1Snym wktbty 8l hlHt 1t hdbrym 1Sr hyw 8l hlHt hr1Snym 1Sr Sbrt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, hew thee two tables of father-child-stone like unto the first: and i will write upon these tables the bee-words that were in the first tables, which thou brakest. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh pesal lekha shene lukhot ’abanim karishonim, vekhatabti ‘al halukhot hadebarim ’asher hayu ‘al halukhot harishonim ’asher shibarta.
whyh nkwn lbqr w8lyt bbqr 1l hr syny wnZbt ly Sm 8l r1S hhr and be ready in the morning, and come up in the morning unto mount bush-(proto-)sinai, and present thyself there to me in the head of the mount. vehyeh nakhon laboqer, ve‘alita baboqer ’el har sinay venizabta li sham ‘al rosh hahar.
w1yS l1 y8lh 8mk wgm 1yS 1l yr1 bkl hhr gm hZ1n whbqr 1l yr8w 1l mwl hhr hhw1 and no man come up with thee, neither let any man be seen throughout all the mount; neither let the flocks nor visit-cattles feed before-turns that mount. ve’ish lo ya‘aleh ‘imakh vegam ’ish ’al yera bekhal hahar, gam hazon vehabaqar ’al yir‘u ’el mul hahar hahu.
wypsl Sny lHt 1bnym kr1Snym wySkm mSh bbqr wy8l 1l hr syny k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw wyqH bydw Sny lHt 1bnym and he hewed two tables of father-child-stone like unto the first; and extracted-mose rose up early in the morning, and went up unto mount bush-(proto-)sinai, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed him, and took in his hand the two tables of father-child-stone. vayifsol shene lukhot ’abanim karishonim vayashkem mosheh baboqer vaya‘al ’el har sinay ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto, vayiqakh beyado shenei lukhot ’abanim.
wyrd yhwh b8nn wytyZb 8mw Sm wyqr1 bSm yhwh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou descended in the cloud, and stood with him there, and called the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayered yhvh be‘anan vayityazeb ‘imo sham, vayiqra beshem yhvh.
wy8br yhwh 8l pnyw wyqr1 yhwh yhwh 1l rHwm wHnwn 1rk 1pym wrb Hsd w1mt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou passed by before-turns him, and proclaimed, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim, merciful and gracious, long-suffering, and abundant in goodness and truth, vaya‘abor yhvh ‘al panav vayiqra yhvh yhvh ’el rakhum vekhanun, ’erekh ’apayim verab khesed ve’emet.
nZr Hsd l1lpym nS1 8wn wpS8 wHT1h wnqh l1 ynqh pqd 8wn 1bwt 8l bnym w8l bny bnym 8l SlSym w8l rb8ym keeping mercy for thousands, forgiving torment and crime and miss, and that will by no means clear the fire-name; visiting the torment of the fathers upon children-betweens, and upon children-betweens's children-betweens, unto the third and to the fourth generation. nozer khesed la’alafim nosei ‘avon vafesha‘ vekhata’ah, venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed ‘avon ’abot ‘al banim ve‘al benei banim ‘al shileshim ve‘al ribe‘im.
wymhr mSh wyqd 1rZh wyStHw and extracted-mose made haste, and bowed his head toward the earth, and partook-shatakh. vaymaher mosheh, vayiqod ’arzah vayishtakhu.
wy1mr 1m n1 mZ1ty Hn b8ynyk 1dny ylk n1 1dny bqrbnw ky 8m qSh 8rp hw1 wslHt l8wnnw wlHT1tnw wnHltnw and he said, if now i have found attractiveness in thy sight, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, let my yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, i pray thee, inward among us; for it is a stiffnecked with-mum-people; and pardon our torment and our miss, and take us for thine inheritance. vayomer ’im na mazati khen be‘enekha ’adonay yelekh na ’adonay beqirbenu, ki ‘am qesheh ‘oref hu vesalakhta la‘avonenu ulekhatatenu unekhaltanu.
wy1mr hnh 1nky krt bryt ngd kl 8mk 18Sh npl1t 1Sr l1 nbr1w bkl h1rZ wbkl hgwym wr1h kl h8m 1Sr 1th bqrbw 1t m8Sh yhwh ky nwr1 hw1 1Sr 1ny 8Sh 8mk and he said, behold, i make a covenant: before-turns all thy with-mum-people i will do marvels, such as have not been done in all the earth, nor in any nation: and all the with-mum-people inward which thou art see the work of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: for it is a terrible thing that i will do with thee. vayomer hineh ’anokhi koret berit neged kal ‘amekha ’e‘eseh nifla’ot ’asher lo nibre’u bekhal ha’arez ubekhal hagoyim, vera’ah khal ha‘am ’asher ’atah beqirbo ma‘aseh yhvh ki nora hu ’asher ’ani ‘oseh ‘imakh.
Smr lk 1t 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm hnny grS mpnyk 1t h1mry whkn8ny whHty whprzy whHwy whybwsy observe thou that which i order-prescribe thee this day: behold, i drive out before-turns thee the talker-amorite, and the mobile-trade-canaanite, and the cut-hittite, and the unwalled-perizzite, and the experience-hivite, and the trampler-jebusite. shemar lekha ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, hini goresh mipanekha ha’emori vehakena‘ani vehakhiti vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi.
hSmr lk pn tkrt bryt lywSb h1rZ 1Sr 1th b1 8lyh pn yhyh lmwqS bqrbk take heed to thyself, lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land whither thou goest, lest it be for a snare in the midst of thee: hishamer lekha pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha’arez ’asher ’atah ba pen yihyeh lemoqesh beqirbekha.
ky 1t mzbHtm ttZwn w1t mZbtm tSbrwn w1t 1Sryw tkrtwn and ye destroy their butcher-kitchens, break their images, and cut down their groves: ki mizbekhotam titozun ve’et mazebotam teshaberun, ve’et ’asherav tikhrotun.
ky l1 tStHwh l1l 1Hr ky yhwh qn1 Smw 1l qn1 hw1 for thou partake-shatakh no other towards-these-elohim: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, whose name is jealous, is a jealous towards-these-elohim: ki lo tishtakhaveh le’el ’akher, ki yhvh qana shemo ’el qana hu.
pn tkrt bryt lywSb h1rZ wznw 1Hry 1lhyhm wzbHw l1lhyhm wqr1 lk w1klt mzbHw lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land, and they go a whoring after their towards-these-elohim, and do butcher unto their towards-these-elohim, and one call thee, and thou eat of his butcher; pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha’arez, vezanu ’akharei ’elohehem vezabekhu lelohehem veqara lekha ve’akhalta mizibkho.
wlqHt mbntyw lbnyk wznw bntyw 1Hry 1lhyhn whznw 1t bnyk 1Hry 1lhyhn and thou take of their children-betweenesss unto thy children-betweens, and their children-betweenesss go a whoring after their towards-these-elohim, and make thy children-betweens go a whoring after their towards-these-elohim. velaqakhta mibenotav lebanekha, vezanu benotav ’akharei ’elohehen vehiznu ’et banekha ’akharei ’elohehen.
1lhy mskh l1 t8Sh lk thou make thee no molten towards-these-elohim. ’elohei masekhah lo ta‘aseh lakh.
1t Hg hmZwt tSmr Sb8t ymym t1kl mZwt 1Sr Zwytk lmw8d HdS h1byb ky bHdS h1byb yZ1t mmZrym the until-conception of lit-mazat thou keep. seven days thou eat lit-mazat, as i order-prescribed thee, in the time of the month spring-abib: for in the month spring-abib thou camest out from narrows-mizraim. khag hamazot tishmor shib‘at yamim tokhal mazot ’asher zivitikha lemo‘ed khodesh ha’abib, ki bekhodesh ha’abib yazata mimizrayim.
kl pTr rHm ly wkl mqnk tzkr pTr Swr wSh all that openeth the womb-matrix is mine; and every firstling among thy in-them-animal, whether wall-ox or sheep, that is rememberer. kal peter rekhem li, vekhal miqnekha peter shor vaseh.
wpTr Hmwr tpdh bSh w1m l1 tpdh w8rptw kl bkwr bnyk tpdh wl1 yr1w pny ryqm and the firstling of an ass thou redeem with a lamb: and if thou redeem him not, then thou break his neck. all the firstborn of thy children-betweens thou redeem. and none appear before-turns me empty. ufeter khamor tifdeh beseh ve’im lo tifdeh va‘arafto, kol bekhor banekha tifdeh velo yera’u fanay reqam.
SSt ymym t8bd wbywm hSby8y tSbt bHryS wbqZyr tSbt six days thou work, and on the seventh day thou rest: in earing time and in harvest thou rest. sheshet yamim ta‘abod ubayom hashebi‘i tishbot, bekharish ubaqazir tishbot.
wHg Sb8t t8Sh lk bkwry qZyr HTym wHg h1syp tqwpt hSnh and thou guard-observe the until-conception of weeks, of the firstfruits of wheat harvest, and the until-conception of ingathering at the year's end. vekhag shabu‘ot ta‘aseh lekha bikurei qezir khitim, vekhag ha’asif tequfat hashanah.
SlS p8mym bSnh yr1h kl zkwrk 1t pny h1dn yhwh 1lhy ySr1l thrice in the year all your rememberers children-betweens appear before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim, the towards-these-elohim of saturated-towards-israel. shalosh pe‘amim bashanah, yera’eh kal zekhurekha penei ha’adon yhvh ’elohei yisra’el.
ky 1wryS gwym mpnyk whrHbty 1t gbwlk wl1 yHmd 1yS 1t 1rZk b8ltk lr1wt 1t pny yhwh 1lhyk SlS p8mym bSnh for i will cast out the nations before-turns thee, and enlarge thy borders: neither any man desire thy land, when thou go up to appear before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim thrice in the year. ki ’orish goyim mipanekha vehirkhabti gebulekha, velo yakhmod ’ish ’arzekha ba‘alotekha lera’ot penei yhvh ’elohekha shalosh pe‘amim bashanah.
l1 tSHT 8l HmZ dm zbHy wl1 ylyn lbqr zbH Hg hpsH no inward the blood of my butcher with leaven; neither the butcher of the until-conception of the passover be left unto the morning. lo tishkhat ‘al khamez dam zibkhi, velo yalin laboqer zebakh khag hapasakh.
r1Syt bkwry 1dmtk tby1 byt yhwh 1lhyk l1 tbSl gdy bHlb 1mw the first of the firstfruits of thy land thou bring unto the daughter-house of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. no seethe a kid in his mother's milk. reshit bikurei ’admatekha tabi bet yhvh ’elohekha, lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb ’imo.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh ktb lk 1t hdbrym h1lh ky 8l py hdbrym h1lh krty 1tk bryt w1t ySr1l and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, write thou these bee-words: for after the tenor of these bee-words i have made a covenant with thee and with saturated-towards-israel. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ketab lekha hadebarim ha’eleh, ki ‘al pi hadebarim ha’eleh karati ’itekha berit ve’et yisra’el.
wyhy Sm 8m yhwh 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh lHm l1 1kl wmym l1 Sth wyktb 8l hlHt 1t dbry hbryt 8Srt hdbrym and he was there with yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou forty days and forty nights; he did neither eat bread, nor drink from-waters. and he wrote upon the tables the bee-words of the covenant, the ten order-prescriptions. vayhi sham ‘im yhvh ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im laylah lekhem lo ’akhal umayim lo shatah, vayikhtob ‘al halukhot dibrei haberit ‘aseret hadebarim.
wyhy brdt mSh mhr syny wSny lHt h8dt byd mSh brdtw mn hhr wmSh l1 yd8 ky qrn 8wr pnyw bdbrw 1tw and it came to pass, when extracted-mose came down from mount bush-(proto-)sinai with the two tables of until-witness in extracted-mose' hand, when he came down from the mount, that extracted-mose wist not that the light-skin of his face-turns shone while he talked with him. vayhi beredet mosheh mehar sinay ushenei lukhot ha‘edut beyad mosheh beridto min hahar, umosheh lo yada‘ ki qaran ‘or panav bedabero ’ito.
wyr1 1hrn wkl bny ySr1l 1t mSh whnh qrn 8wr pnyw wyyr1w mgSt 1lyw and when cabinet-aaron and all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel saw extracted-mose, behold, the light-skin of his face-turns shone; and they were afraid to come nigh him. vayar ’aharon vekhal benei yisra’el mosheh vehineh qaran ‘or panav, vayire’u migeshet ’elav.
wyqr1 1lhm mSh wySbw 1lyw 1hrn wkl hnS1ym b8dh wydbr mSh 1lhm and extracted-mose called unto them; and cabinet-aaron and all the rulers of the until-witness returned unto him: and extracted-mose talked with them. vayiqra ’alehem mosheh vayashubu ’elav ’aharon vekhal hanesi’im ba‘edah, vaydaber mosheh ’alehem.
w1Hry kn ngSw kl bny ySr1l wyZwm 1t kl 1Sr dbr yhwh 1tw bhr syny and afterward all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel came nigh: and he gave them in order-prescription all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had bee-spoken with him in mount bush-(proto-)sinai. ve’akhare khen nigeshu kal benei yisra’el, vayzavem kal ’asher diber yhvh ’ito behar sinay.
wykl mSh mdbr 1tm wytn 8l pnyw mswh and till extracted-mose had done speaking with them, he put a breaker on his face-turns. vaykhal mosheh midaber ’itam, vayiten ‘al panav masveh.
wbb1 mSh lpny yhwh ldbr 1tw ysyr 1t hmswh 8d Z1tw wyZ1 wdbr 1l bny ySr1l 1t 1Sr yZwh and when extracted-mose went in before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to speak with him, he took the breaker off, until he came out. and he came out, and spake unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel that which he was order-prescribed. ubebo mosheh lifnei yhvh ledaber ’ito yasir hamasveh ‘ad zeto, veyaza vediber ’el benei yisra’el ’asher yezuveh.
wr1w bny ySr1l 1t pny mSh ky qrn 8wr pny mSh whSyb mSh 1t hmswh 8l pnyw 8d b1w ldbr 1tw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel saw the face-turns of extracted-mose, that the light-skin of extracted-mose' face-turns shone: and extracted-mose put the breaker upon his face-turns again, until he went in to speak with him. vera’u bene yisra’el penei mosheh ki qaran ‘or penei mosheh, veheshib mosheh hamasveh ‘al panav ‘ad bo’o ledaber ’ito.
wyqhl mSh 1t kl 8dt bny ySr1l wy1mr 1lhm 1lh hdbrym 1Sr Zwh yhwh l8St 1tm and extracted-mose added all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel together, and said unto them, these are the bee-words which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed, that ye should do them. vayaqhel mosheh kal ‘adat benei yisra’el vayomer ’alehem, ’eleh hadebarim ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot.
SSt ymym t8Sh ml1kh wbywm hSby8y yhyh lkm qdS Sbt Sbtwn lyhwh kl h8Sh bw ml1kh ywmt six days work be done, and on the seventh day there be to you an dedicated-finished day, a seven-sabbath of rest to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: whosoever doeth work therein be put to death. sheshet yamim te‘aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi‘i yihyeh lakhem qodesh shabat shabaton yhvh, kal ha‘oseh bo melakhah yumat.
l1 tb8rw 1S bkl mSbtykm bywm hSbt ye kindle no fire throughout your habitations upon the seven-sabbath day. lo teba‘aru ’esh bekhol moshebotekhem, beyom hashabat.
wy1mr mSh 1l kl 8dt bny ySr1l l1mr zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh l1mr and extracted-mose spake unto all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed, saying, vayomer mosheh ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el lemor, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh lemor.

wyb1w h1nSym 8l hnSym kl ndyb lb hby1w HH wnzm wTb8t wkwmz kl kly zhb wkl 1yS 1Sr hnyp tnwpt zhb lyhwh and they came, both men and women, as many as were willing hearted, and brought bracelets, and earrings, and rings, and tablets, all jewels of gold: and every man that sieved a sieve of gold unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayabo’u ha’anashim ‘al hanashim, kol nedib leb hebi’u khakh vanezem vetaba‘at vekhumaz kal keli zahab vekhal ’ish ’asher henif tenufat zahab yhvh.

wlhwrt ntn blbw hw1 w1hly1b bn 1Hysmk lmTh dn and he hath put in his heart that he may teach, both he, and my-tent-dad-aholiab, child-between of my-brother-support-ahisamakh, of the branch of discuss-dan. ulehorot natan belibo, hu ve’aholi’ab ben ’akhisamakh lemateh dan.
ml1 1tm Hkmt lb l8Swt kl ml1kt HrS wHSb wrqm btklt wb1rgmn btwl8t hSny wbSS w1rg 8Sy kl ml1kh wHSby mHSbt them hath he filled with wisdom of heart, to work all manner of work, of the engraver, and of the cunning workman, and of the embroiderer, in blue, and in purple, in two caterpillars, and in fine linen, and of the weaver, even of them that do any work, and of those that devise cunning work. milei ’otam khakhemat leb la‘asot kal melekhet kharash vekhosheb veroqem batekhelet uba’argaman betola‘at hashani ubashesh ve’oreg, ‘osei kal melakhah vekhoshebei makhashabot.
w8Sh bZl1l w1hly1b wkl 1yS Hkm lb 1Sr ntn yhwh Hkmh wtbwnh bhmh ld8t l8St 1t kl ml1kt 8bdt hqdS lkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh then wrought onion-towards-bezaleel and my-tent-dad-aholiab, and every wise hearted man, in whom yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou put wisdom and understanding to hand-know how to work all manner of work for the work of the dedicated-finished, according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed. ve‘asah bezal’el ve’aholi’ab vekhol ’ish khakham leb ’asher natan yhvh khakhmah utebunah bahemah lada‘at la‘asot kal melekhet ‘abodat haqodesh, lekhol ’asher zivah yhvh.
wyqr1 mSh 1l bZl1l w1l 1hly1b w1l kl 1yS Hkm lb 1Sr ntn yhwh Hkmh blbw kl 1Sr nS1w lbw lqrbh 1l hml1kh l8St 1th and extracted-mose called onion-towards-bezaleel and my-tent-dad-aholiab, and every wise hearted man, in whose heart yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had put wisdom, even every one whose heart inwarded him up to come unto the work to do it: vayiqra mosheh ’el bezal’el ve’el ’aholi’ab ve’el kal ’ish khakham leb ’asher natan yhvh khakhmah belibo, kol ’asher nesa’o libo leqarebah ’el hamelakhah la‘asot.
wyqHw mlpny mSh 1t kl htrwmh 1Sr hby1w bny ySr1l lml1kt 8bdt hqdS l8St 1th whm hby1w 1lyw 8wd ndbh bbqr bbqr and they received of extracted-mose all the inward, which children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel had brought for the work of the work of the dedicated-finished, to make it withal. and they brought yet unto him free inwards every morning. vayiqkhu milifnei mosheh kal haterumah ’asher hebi’u benei yisra’el limlekhet ‘abodat haqodesh la‘asot. vehem hebi’u ’elav ‘od nedabah baboqer baboqer.
wyb1w kl hHkmym h8Sym 1t kl ml1kt hqdS 1yS 1yS mml1ktw 1Sr hmh 8Sym and all the wise men, that wrought all the work of the dedicated-finished, came every man from his work which they made; vayabo’u kal hakhakhamim ha‘osim kal melekhet haqodesh, ’ish ’ish mimelakhto ’asher hemah ‘osim.
wy1mrw 1l mSh l1mr mrbym h8m lhby1 mdy h8bdh lml1kh 1Sr Zwh yhwh l8St 1th and they spake unto extracted-mose, saying, the with-mum-people bring much more than enough for the work of the work, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed to make. vayomeru ’el mosheh lemor marbim ha‘am lehabi, midei ha‘abodah lamelakhah ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot.
wyZw mSh wy8byrw qwl bmHnh l1mr 1yS w1Sh 1l y8Sw 8wd ml1kh ltrwmt hqdS wykl1 h8m mhby1 and extracted-mose gave order-prescription, and they caused it to be proclaimed throughout the camp, saying, let neither man nor woman make any more work for the inward of the dedicated-finished. so the with-mum-people were restrained from bringing. vayzav mosheh vaya‘abiru qol bamakhaneh lemor ’ish ve’ishah ’al ya‘asu ‘od melakhah litrumat haqodesh, vayikalei ha‘am mehabi.
whml1kh hyth dym lkl hml1kh l8Swt 1th whwtr for the stuff they had was sufficient for all the work to make it, and too much. vehamelakhah hayetah dayam lekhal hamelakhah la‘asot vehoter.
wy8Sw kl Hkm lb b8Sy hml1kh 1t hmSkn 8Sr yry8t SS mSzr wtklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny krbym m8Sh HSb 8Sh 1tm and every wise hearted man among them that wrought the work of the dwelling made ten curtains six, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars: with inward-cherubim of cunning work made he them. vaya‘asu khal khakham leb be‘osei hamelakhah ’et hamishkan ‘eser yeri‘ot, shesh mashezar utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani kerubim ma‘aseh khosheb ‘asah ’otam.
1rk hyry8h h1Ht Smnh w8Srym b1mh wrHb 1rb8 b1mh hyry8h h1Ht mdh 1Ht lkl hyry8t the length of one curtain was double-ten-twenty and eight cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: the curtains were all of one size. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat shemoneh ve‘esrim ba’amah verokhab ’arba‘ ba’amah hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat lekhal hayri‘ot.
wyHbr 1t HmS hyry8t 1Ht 1l 1Ht wHmS yry8t Hbr 1Ht 1l 1Ht and he coupled the five curtains one unto another: and the other five curtains he coupled one unto another. vaykhaber khamesh hayri‘ot ’akhat ’el ’ekhat, vekhamesh yeri‘ot khibar ’akhat ’el ’ekhat.
wy8S ll1t tklt 8l Spt hyry8h h1Ht mqZh bmHbrt kn 8Sh bSpt hyry8h hqyZwnh bmHbrt hSnyt and he made loops of blue on the edge of one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling: likewise he made in the uttermost side of another curtain, in the coupling of the second. vaya‘as lul’ot tekhelet ‘al sefat hayri‘ah ha’ekhat miqazah bamakhbaret, ken ‘asah bisfat hayri‘ah haqizonah bamakhberet hashenit.
HmSym ll1t 8Sh byry8h h1Ht wHmSym ll1t 8Sh bqZh hyry8h 1Sr bmHbrt hSnyt mqbylt hll1t 1Ht 1l 1Ht fifty loops made he in one curtain, and fifty loops made he in the edge of the curtain which was in the coupling of the second: the loops held one curtain to another. khamishim lula’ot ‘asah bayri‘ah ha’ekhat vakhamishim lula’ot ‘asah biqzeh hayri‘ah ’asher bamakhberet hashenit, maqbilot halula’ot ’akhat ’el ’ekhat.
wy8S HmSym qrsy zhb wyHbr 1t hyr8t 1Ht 1l 1Ht bqrsym wyhy hmSkn 1Hd and he made fifty taches of gold, and coupled the curtains one unto another with the taches: so it became one dwelling. vaya‘as khamishim qarsei zahab, vaykhaber hayri‘ot ’akhat ’el ’akhat baqerasim vayhi hamishkan ’ekhad.
wy8S yry8t 8zym l1hl 8l hmSkn 8Sty 8Srh yry8t 8Sh 1tm and he made curtains of intense-goats' gate-hair for the tent over the dwelling: eleven curtains he made them. vaya‘as yeri‘ot ‘izim le’ohel ‘al hamishkan, ‘ashte ‘esreh yeri‘ot ‘asah.
1rk hyry8h h1Ht SlSym b1mh w1rb8 1mwt rHb hyry8h h1Ht mdh 1Ht l8Sty 8Srh yry8t the length of one curtain was thirty cubits, and four cubits was the breadth of one curtain: the eleven curtains were of one size. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat sheloshim ba’amah ve’arba‘ ’amot rokhab hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat le‘ashtei ‘esreh yeri‘ot.
wyHbr 1t HmS hyry8t lbd w1t SS hyry8t lbd and he coupled five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves. vaykhaber khamesh hayri‘ot lebad, ve’et shesh hayri‘ot lebad.
wy8S ll1t HmSym 8l Spt hyry8h hqyZnh bmHbrt wHmSym ll1t 8Sh 8l Spt hyry8h hHbrt hSnyt and he made fifty loops upon the uttermost edge of the curtain in the coupling, and fifty loops made he upon the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second. vaya‘as lula’ot khamishim ‘al sefat hayri‘ah haqizonah bamakhbaret, vakhamishim lula’ot ‘asah ‘al sefat hayri‘ah hakhoberet hashenit.
wy8S qrsy nHSt HmSym lHbr 1t h1hl lhyt 1Hd and he made fifty taches of brass to couple the tent together, that it might be one. vaya‘as qarsei nekhoshet khamishim, lekhaber ha’ohel lihyot ’ekhad.
wy8S mksh l1hl 8rt 1lym m1dmym wmksh 8rt tHSym mlm8lh and he made a covering for the tent of voiceless-rams' light-skins from red-earth-adam, and a covering of feel-takhash light-skins above that. vaya‘as mikhseh la’ohel ‘orot ’elim me’adamim, umikhseh ‘orot tekhashim milma‘elah.
wy8S 1t hqrSym lmSkn 8Zy STym 8mdym and he made boards for the dwelling of sailing-shitim wood, standing up. vaya‘as haqerashim lamishkan, ‘azei shitim ‘omedim.
8Sr 1mt 1rk hqrS w1mh wHZy h1mh rHb hqrS h1Hd the length of a board was ten cubits, and the breadth of a board one cubit and a half. ‘eser ’amot ’orekh haqaresh, ve’amah vakhazi ha’amah rokhab haqeresh ha’ekhad.
Sty ydt lqrS h1Hd mSlbt 1Ht 1l 1Ht kn 8Sh lkl qrSy hmSkn one board had two tenons, equally distant one from another: thus did he make for all the boards of the dwelling. shetei yadot laqeresh ha’ekhad meshulabot ’akhat ’el ’ekhat, ken ‘asah lekhol qarshei hamishkan.
wy8S 1t hqrSym lmSkn 8Srym qrSym lp1t ngb tymnh and he made boards for the dwelling; double-ten-twenty boards for the dry-south side dry-southward: vaya‘as haqerashim lamishkan, ‘esrim qerashim lif’at negeb temanah.
w1rb8ym 1dny ksp 8Sh tHt 8Srym hqrSym Sny 1dnym tHt hqrS h1Hd lSty ydtyw wSny 1dnym tHt hqrS h1Hd lSty ydtyw and forty sockets of silver he made under the double-ten-twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons. ve’arba‘im ’adne khesef ‘asah takhat ‘esrim haqerashim, shenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad lishtei yedotav ushenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad lishtei yedotav.
wlZl8 hmSkn hSnyt lp1t Zpwn 8Sh 8Srym qrSym and for the other side of the dwelling, which is toward the hide-north corner, he made double-ten-twenty boards, ulezela‘ hamishkan hashenit lif’at zafon, ‘asah ‘esrim qerashim.
w1rb8ym 1dnyhm ksp Sny 1dnym tHt hqrS h1Hd wSny 1dnym tHt hqrS h1Hd and their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board. ve’arba‘im ’adnehem kasef, shenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad ushenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad.
wlyrkty hmSkn ymh 8Sh SSh qrSym and for the sides of the dwelling sea-westward he made six boards. uleyarketei hamishkan yamah, ‘asah shishah qerashim.
wSny qrSym 8Sh lmqZ8t hmSkn byrktym and two boards made he for the corners of the dwelling in the two sides. ushenei qerashim ‘asah limquz‘ot hamishkan, bayarkhatayim.
whyw tw1mm mlmTh wyHdw yhyw tmym 1l r1Sw 1l hTb8t h1Ht kn 8Sh lSnyhm lSny hmqZ8t and they were coupled beneath, and coupled together at the head thereof, to one ring: thus he did to both of them in both the corners. vehayu to’amim milematah veyakhdav tamim ’el rosho ’el hataba‘at ha’ekhat, ken ‘asah lishnehem lishnei hamiqzo‘ot.
whyw Smnh qrSym w1dnyhm ksp SSh 8Sr 1dnym Sny 1dnym Sny 1dnym tHt hqrS h1Hd and there were eight boards; and their sockets were sixteen sockets of silver, under every board two sockets. vehayu shemonah qerashim ve’adnehem kesef shishah ‘asar ’adanim, shenei ’adanim shenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad.
wy8S bryHy 8Zy STym HmSh lqrSy Zl8 hmSkn h1Ht and he made bars of sailing-shitim wood; five for the boards of the one side of the dwelling, vaya‘as berikhei ‘azei shitim, khamishah leqarshei zela‘ hamishkan ha’ekhat.
wHmSh bryHm lqrSy Zl8 hmSkn hSnyt wHmSh bryHm lqrSy hmSkn lyrktym ymh and five bars for the boards of the other side of the dwelling, and five bars for the boards of the dwelling for the sides sea-westward. vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela‘ hamishkan hashenit, vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei hamishkan layarkhatayim yamah.
wy8S 1t hbryH htykn lbrH btwk hqrSym mn hqZh 1l hqZh and he made the middle bar to shoot through the boards from the one end to the other. vaya‘as haberiakh hatikhon, libroakh betokh haqerashim min haqazeh ’el haqazeh.

1lh pqwdy hmSkn mSkn h8dt 1Sr pqd 8l py mSh 8bdt hlwym byd 1ytmr bn 1hrn hkhn this is the sum of the dwelling, even of the dwelling of until-witness, as it was counted, according to the order-prescription of extracted-mose, for the work of the join-levites, by the hand of with-palm-itamar, child-between to cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server. ’eleh fequdei hamishkan mishkan ha‘edut ’asher puqad ‘al pi mosheh, ‘abodat halviyim beyad ’itamar ben ’aharon hakohen.

w1tw 1hly1b bn 1Hysmk lmTh dn HrS wHSb wrqm btklt wb1rgmn wbtwl8t hSny wbSS and with him was my-tent-dad-aholiab, child-between of my-brother-support-ahisamakh, of the branch of discuss-dan, an engraver, and a cunning workman, and an embroiderer in blue, and in purple, and in two caterpillars, and fine linen. ve’ito ’aholi’ab ben ’akhisamakh lemateh dan kharash vekhosheb, veroqem batekhelet uba’argaman ubetola‘at hashani ubashesh.

wksp pqwdy h8dh m1t kkr w1lp wSb8 m1wt wHmSh wSb8ym Sql bSql hqdS and the silver of them that were numbered of the until-witness was an hundred talents, and a thousand seven hundred and threescore and fifteen light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished: vekhesef pequdei ha‘edah me’at kikar, ve’elef usheba‘ me’ot vakhamishah veshib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh.
bq8 lglglt mHZyt hSql bSql hqdS lkl h8br 8l hpqdym mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh lSS m1wt 1lp wSlSt 1lpym wHmS m1wt wHmSym a split-bekah for every man, that is, half a light-shekel, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished, for every one that went to be numbered, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, for six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty men. beqa‘ lagulgolet makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh, lekhol ha‘ober ‘al hapequdim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah leshesh me’ot ’elef usheloshet ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot vakhamishim.

wnHSt htnwph Sb8ym kkr w1lpym w1rb8 m1wt Sql and the brass of the inward was seventy talents, and two thousand and four hundred light-shekels. unekhoshet hatenufah shib‘im kikar, ve’alpayim ve’arba‘ me’ot shaqel.
wy8S bh 1t 1dny ptH 1hl mw8d w1t mzbH hnHSt w1t mkbr hnHSt 1Sr lw w1t kl kly hmzbH and therewith he made the sockets to the opening of the tent of until-conception, and the brazen butcher-kitchen, and the brazen place-of-already-mikhbar for it, and all the tools of the butcher-kitchen, vaya‘as bah ’adnei petakh ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et mizbakh hanekhoshet ve’et mikhbar hanekhoshet lo, ve’et kal kelei hamizbeakh.
w1t 1dny hHZr sbyb w1t 1dny S8r hHZr w1t kl ytdt hmSkn w1t kl ytdt hHZr sbyb and the sockets of the court round about, and the sockets of the court hair-gate, and all the pins of the dwelling, and all the pins of the court round about. ve’et ’adnei hekhazer sabib ve’et ’adnei sha‘ar hekhazer, ve’et kal yitdot hamishkan ve’et kal yitdot hekhazer sabib.
wmn htklt wh1rgmn wtwl8t hSny 8Sw bgdy Srd lSrt bqdS wy8Sw 1t bgdy hqdS 1Sr l1hrn k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and of the blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, they made cloths of work, to do work in the dedicated-finished place, and made the dedicated-finished garments for cabinet-aaron; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. umin hatekhelet veha’argaman vetola‘at hashani ‘asu bigde serad lesharet baqodesh, vaya‘asu bigdei haqodesh ’asher le’aharon ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wy8S 1t h1pd zhb tklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny wSS mSzr and he made the cash-in-ephod of gold, blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen. vaya‘as ha’efod, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar.
wyrq8w 1t pHy hzhb wqZZ ptylm l8Swt btwk htklt wbtwk h1rgmn wbtwk twl8t hSny wbtwk hSS m8Sh HSb and they did beat the gold into thin plates, and cut it into wires, to work it in the blue, and in the purple, and in the two caterpillars, and in the fine linen, with cunning work. vayraqe‘u ’et pakhei hazahab veqizez petilim la‘asot betokh hatekhelet ubetokh ha’argaman ubetokh tola‘at hashani ubetokh hashesh, ma‘aseh khosheb.
ktpt 8Sw lw Hbrt 8l Sny qZwwtw qZwtyw Hbr they made shoulderpieces for it, to couple it together: by the two edges was it coupled together. ketefot ‘asu lo khoberot, ‘al shenei qezotav khubar.
wHSb 1pdtw 1Sr 8lyw mmnw hw1 km8Shw zhb tklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny wSS mSzr k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and the accounting of his cash-in-ephod, that was upon it, was of the same, according to the work thereof; of gold, blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vekhesheb ’afudato ’asher ‘alav mimenu hu kema‘asehu zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wy8Sw 1t 1bny hShm msbt mSbZt zhb mptHt ptwHy Hwtm 8l Smwt bny ySr1l and they wrought that-they-onyx stones inclosed in ouches of gold, graven, as signets are graven, with the names of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vaya‘asu ’abnei hashoham musabot mishbezot zahab, mefutakhot pitukhei khotam ‘al shemot benei yisra’el.
wySm 1tm 8l ktpt h1pd 1bny zkrwn lbny ySr1l k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and he put them on the shoulders of the cash-in-ephod, that they should be stones for a memorial to children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayasem ’otam ‘al kitfot ha’efod ’abnei zikaron libnei yisra’el, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wy8S 1t hHSn m8Sh HSb km8Sh 1pd zhb tklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny wSS mSzr and he made the bronze-tooth-khashan of cunning work, like the work of the cash-in-ephod; of gold, blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen. vaya‘as hakhoshen ma‘aseh khosheb kema‘aseh ’efod, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar.
rbw8 hyh kpwl 8Sw 1t hHSn zrt 1rkw wzrt rHbw kpwl it was foursquare; they made the bronze-tooth-khashan double: a span was the length thereof, and a span the breadth thereof, being doubled. rabua‘ hayah kaful ‘asu hakhoshen, zeret ’areko vezeret rakhebo kaful.
wyml1w bw 1rb8h Twry 1bn Twr 1dm pTdh wbrqt hTwr h1Hd and they set in it four rows of stones: the first row was a red-column-sardius, a topaz, and a temple-carbuncle: this was the first row. vaymal’u bo ’arba‘ah turei ’aben, tur ’odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha’ekhad.
whTwr hSny npk spyr wyhlm and the second row, an emerald, a countable-saphire, and a shock-diamond. vehatur hasheni, nofekh sapir veyahalom.
whTwr hSlySy lSm Sbw w1Hlmh and the third row, a put-there-opal, an sit-agate, and an dream-amethyst. vehatur hashelishi, leshem shebo ve’akhlamah.
whTwr hrby8y trSyS Shm wySph mwsbt mSbZwt zhb bml1tm and the fourth row, a chrysolite-aquamarine-tarshish, an that-they-onyx, and a smooth-jasper: they were inclosed in ouches of gold in their inclosings. vehatur harebi‘i tarshish shoham veyashefeh, musabot mishbezot zahab bemilu’otam.
wh1bnym 8l Smt bny ySr1l hnh Stym 8Srh 8l Smtm ptwHy Htm 1yS 8l Smw lSnym 8Sr SbT and the stones were according to the names of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, twelve, according to their names, like the engravings of a signet, every one with his name, according to the twelve shfttribes. veha’abanim ‘al shemot bene yisra’el henah shetem ‘esreh ‘al shemotam, pitukhei khotam ’ish ‘al shemo lishnem ‘asar shabet.
wy8Sw 8l hHSn SrSrt gblt m8Sh 8bt zhb Thwr and they made upon the bronze-tooth-khashan chains at the ends, of wreathed work of pure-tahor gold. vaya‘asu ‘al hakhoshen sharsherot gablut ma‘aseh ‘abot, zahab tahor.
wy8Sw Sty mSbZt zhb wSty Tb8t zhb wytnw 1t Sty hTb8t 8l Sny qZwt hHSn and they made two ouches of gold, and two gold rings; and put the two rings in the two ends of the bronze-tooth-khashan. vaya‘asu shetei mishbezot zahab ushetei tabe‘ot zahab, vayitenu shetei hataba‘ot ‘al shenei qezot hakhoshen.
wytnw Sty h8btt hzhb 8l Sty hTb8t 8l qZwt hHSn and they put the two wreathed chains of gold in the two rings on the ends of the bronze-tooth-khashan. vayitenu shetei ha‘abotot hazahab ‘al shetei hataba‘ot, ‘al qezot hakhoshen.
w1t Sty qZwt Sty h8btt ntnw 8l Sty hmSbZt wytnm 8l ktpt h1pd 1l mwl pnyw and the two ends of the two wreathed chains they fastened in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the cash-in-ephod, before-turns it. ve’et shetei qezot shetei ha‘abotot natenu ‘al shetei hamishbezot, vayitenum ‘al kitfot ha’efod ’el mul panav.
wy8Sw Sty Tb8t zhb wySymw 8l Sny qZwt hHSn 8l Sptw 1Sr 1l 8br h1pd byth and they made two rings of gold, and put them on the two ends of the bronze-tooth-khashan, upon the border of it, which was on the side of the cash-in-ephod inward. vaya‘asu shetei tabe‘ot zahab vayasimu ‘al shenei qezot hakhoshen, ‘al sefato ’asher ’el ‘eber ha’efod bayetah.
wy8Sw Sty Tb8t zhb wytnm 8l Sty ktpt h1pd mlmTh mmwl pnyw l8mt mHbrtw mm8l lHSb h1pd and they made two other golden rings, and put them on the two sides of the cash-in-ephod underneath, toward the forepart of it, over against the other coupling thereof, above the accounting of the cash-in-ephod. vaya‘asu shetei tabe‘ot zahab vayitenum ‘al shetei khitfot ha’efod milmatah mimul panav le‘umat mekhbarto, mima‘al lekhesheb ha’efod.
wyrksw 1t hHSn mTb8tyw 1l Tb8t h1pd bptyl tklt lhyt 8l HSb h1pd wl1 yzH hHSn m8l h1pd k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and they did bind the bronze-tooth-khashan by his rings unto the rings of the cash-in-ephod with a lace of blue, that it might be above the accounting of the cash-in-ephod, and that the bronze-tooth-khashan might not be loosed from the cash-in-ephod; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayirkesu hakhoshen mitabe‘otav ’el tabe‘ot ha’efod biftil tekhelet lihyot ‘al khesheb ha’efod velo yizakh hakhoshen me‘al ha’efod, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wy8S 1t m8yl h1pd m8Sh 1rg klyl tklt and he made the robe of the cash-in-ephod of woven work, all of blue. vaya‘as me‘il ha’efod ma‘aseh ’oreg, kelil tekhelet.
wpy hm8yl btwkw kpy tHr1 Sph lpyw sbyb l1 yqr8 and there was an hole in the midst of the robe, as the hole of an habergeon, with a band round about the hole, that it should not rend. ufi hame‘il betokho kefi takhra, safah lefiv sabib lo yiqarea‘.
wy8Sw 8l Swly hm8yl rmwny tklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny mSzr and they made upon the hems of the robe high-pomegranates of blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and twined linen. vaya‘asu ‘al shulei hame‘il rimonei tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani, mashezar.
wy8Sw p8mny zhb Thwr wytnw 1t hp8mnym btwk hrmnym 8l Swly hm8yl sbyb btwk hrmnym and they made nurture-bells of pure-tahor gold, and put the nurture-bells between-bin the high-pomegranates upon the hem of the robe, round about between-bin the high-pomegranates; vaya‘asu fa‘amonei zahab tahor, vayitenu hapa‘amonim betokh harimonim ‘al shulei hame‘il sabib betokh harimonim.

w1t h1bnT SS mSzr wtklt w1rgmn wtwl8t Sny m8Sh rqm k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and six girdles, twined, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, of needlework; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. ve’et ha’abnet shesh mashezar utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani ma‘aseh roqem, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wy8Sw 1t ZyZ nzr hqdS zhb Thwr wyktbw 8lyw mktb ptwHy Hwtm qdS lyhwh and they made the plate of the dedicated-finished crown of pure-tahor gold, and wrote upon it a writing, like to the engravings of a signet, dedication to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vaya‘asu ziz nezer haqodesh zahab tahor, vayikhtebu ‘alav mikhtab pitukhei khotam qodesh yhvh.

wtkl kl 8bdt mSkn 1hl mw8d wy8Sw bny ySr1l kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh kn 8Sw thus was all the work of the dwelling of the tent of until-conception finished: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so did they. vatekhel kal ‘abodat mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed, vaya‘asu benei yisra’el kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asu.
wyby1w 1t hmSkn 1l mSh 1t h1hl w1t kl klyw qrsyw qrSyw bryHw bryHyw w8mdyw w1dnyw and they brought the dwelling unto extracted-mose, the tent, and all his all-tool, his taches, his boards, his bars, and his column-stands, and his sockets, vayabi’u hamishkan ’el mosheh ha’ohel ve’et kal kelav, qerasav qerashav berikhav ve‘amudav va’adanav.
w1t mksh 8wrt h1ylm hm1dmym w1t mksh 8rt htHSym w1t prkt hmsk and the covering of voiceless-rams' light-skins from red-earth-adam, and the covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and breaker-screen, ve’et mikhseh ‘orot ha’elim ham’adamim ve’et mikhseh ‘orot hatekhashim, ve’et parokhet hamasakh.

1t mzbH hnHSt w1t mkbr hnHSt 1Sr lw 1t bdyw w1t kl klyw 1t hkyr w1t knw the brazen butcher-kitchen, and his grate of brass, his canvas, and all his tools, the bulging and his base, mizbakh hanekhoshet ve’et mikhbar hanekhoshet lo badav ve’et kal kelav, hakiyor ve’et kano.
1t ql8y hHZr 1t 8mdyh w1t 1dnyh w1t hmsk lS8r hHZr 1t mytryw wytdtyh w1t kl kly 8bdt hmSkn l1hl mw8d the hangings of the court, his column-stands, and his sockets, and the hanging for the court hair-gate, his cords, and his pins, and all the tools of the work of the dwelling, for the tent of until-conception, qal‘ei hekhazer ‘amudeha ve’et ’adaneha ve’et hamasakh lesha‘ar hekhazer metarav vitedoteha, ve’et kal kelei ‘abodat hamishkan le’ohel mo‘ed.
1t bgdy hSrd lSrt bqdS 1t bgdy hqdS l1hrn hkhn w1t bgdy bnyw lkhn the cloths of work to do work in the dedicated-finished place, and the dedicated-finished garments for cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server, and his children-betweens' garments, to dimmer-server. bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh, bigdei haqodesh le’aharon hakohen ve’et bigdei banav lekhahen.
kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh kn 8Sw bny ySr1l 1t kl h8bdh according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel made all the work. kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, ken ‘asu benei yisra’el kal ha‘abodah.
wyr1 mSh 1t kl hml1kh whnh 8Sw 1th k1Sr Zwh yhwh kn 8Sw wybrk 1tm mSh and extracted-mose did look upon all the work, and, behold, they had done it as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed, even so had they done it: and extracted-mose knee-fluffy-blessed them. vayar mosheh kal hamelakhah vehineh ‘asu ’otah ka’asher zivah yhvh ken ‘asu, vaybarekh ’otam mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
bywm hHdS hr1Swn b1Hd lHdS tqym 1t mSkn 1hl mw8d on the first day of the first month thou set up the dwelling of the tent of until-conception. beyom hakhodesh harishon be’ekhad lakhodesh, taqim mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed.
wSmt Sm 1t 1rwn h8dwt wskt 8l h1rn 1t hprkt and thou put therein the cabinet of the until-witness, and cover the cabinet with the breaker. vesamta sham ’aron ha‘edut, vesakota ‘al ha’aron ’et haparokhet.
whb1t 1t hSlHn w8rkt 1t 8rkw whb1t 1t hmnrh wh8lyt 1t nrtyh and thou bring in the table, and set in order the things that are to be set in order upon it; and thou bring in the light-stream-candle, and light the lamps thereof. vehebeta hashulkhan ve‘arakhta ‘erko, vehebeta hamenorah veha‘aleta neroteha.
wntth 1t mzbH hzhb lqTrt lpny 1rwn h8dt wSmt 1t msk hptH lmSkn and thou set the butcher-kitchen of gold for the incense before-turns the cabinet of the until-witness, and put the hanging of the opening to the dwelling. venatatah mizbakh hazahab liqtoret lifnei ’aron ha‘edut, vesamta masakh hapetakh lamishkan.
wntth 1t mzbH h8lh lpny ptH mSkn 1hl mw8d and thou set the butcher-kitchen of the on-up before-turns the opening of the dwelling of the tent of until-conception. venatatah mizbakh ha‘olah, lifnei petakh mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed.
wntt 1t hkyr byn 1hl mw8d wbyn hmzbH wntt Sm mym and thou set the bulging between-bin the tent of until-conception and the butcher-kitchen, and put from-waters therein. venatata hakiyor ben ’ohel mo‘ed uben hamizbeakh, venatata sham mayim.
wSmt 1t hHZr sbyb wntt 1t msk S8r hHZr and thou set up the court round about, and hang up the hanging at the court hair-gate. vesamta hekhazer sabib, venatata masakh sha‘ar hekhazer.
wlqHt 1t Smn hmSHh wmSHt 1t hmSkn w1t kl 1Sr bw wqdSt 1tw w1t kl klyw whyh qdS and thou take the lubeing name-from-oil, and lube the dwelling, and all that is therein, and dedicate-finify it, and all the tools thereof: and it be dedicated-finished. velaqakhta shemen hamishkhah umashakhta hamishkan ve’et kal ’asher bo, veqidashta ’oto ve’et kal kelav vehayah qodesh.
wmSHt 1t mzbH h8lh w1t kl klyw wqdSt 1t hmzbH whyh hmzbH qdS qdSym and thou lube the butcher-kitchen of the on-up, and all his tools, and dedicate-finify the butcher-kitchen: and it be an butcher-kitchen most dedicated-finished. umashakhta mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et kal kelav, veqidashta hamizbeakh vehayah hamizbeakh qodesh qadashim.
wmSHt 1t hkyr w1t knw wqdSt 1tw and thou lube the bulging and his base, and dedicate-finify it. umashakhta hakiyor ve’et kano, veqidashta ’oto.
whqrbt 1t 1hrn w1t bnyw 1l ptH 1hl mw8d wrHZt 1tm bmym and thou inward cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, and wash them with from-waters. vehiqrabta ’aharon ve’et banav ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, verakhazta ’otam bamayim.
whlbSt 1t 1hrn 1t bgdy hqdS wmSHt 1tw wqdSt 1tw wkhn ly and thou put upon cabinet-aaron the dedicated-finished garments, and lube him, and dedicate-finify him; that he may dimmer-server unto me. vehilbashta ’aharon ’et bigdei haqodesh, umashakhta ’oto veqidashta ’oto vekhihen li.
w1t bnyw tqryb whlbSt 1tm ktnt and thou bring his children-betweens, and clothe them with you-wrote-coats: ve’et banav taqrib, vehilbashta ’otam kutonot.
wmSHt 1tm k1Sr mSHt 1t 1byhm wkhnw ly whyth lhyt lhm mSHtm lkhnt 8wlm ldrtm and thou lube them, as thou didst lube their father, that they may dimmer-server unto me: for their lubeing surely be an everlasting dimmer-serverhood throughout their generations. umashakhta ’otam ka’asher mashakhta ’abihem vekhihanu li, vehayetah lihyot lahem mashekhatam likhhunat ‘olam ledorotam
wy8S mSh kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw kn 8Sh thus did extracted-mose: according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him, so did he. vaya‘as mosheh, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh ’oto ken ‘asah.
wyhy bHdS hr1Swn bSnh hSnyt b1Hd lHdS hwqm hmSkn and it came to pass in the first month in the second year, on the first day of the month, that the dwelling was reared up. vayhi bakhodesh harishon bashanah hashenit be’ekhad lakhodesh, huqam hamishkan.
wyqm mSh 1t hmSkn wytn 1t 1dnyw wySm 1t qrSyw wytn 1t bryHyw wyqm 1t 8mwdyw and extracted-mose reared up the dwelling, and fastened his sockets, and set up the boards thereof, and put in the bars thereof, and reared up his column-stands. vayaqem mosheh hamishkan vayiten ’adanav vayasem qerashav vayiten berikhav, vayaqem ‘amudav.
wyprS 1t h1hl 8l hmSkn wySm 1t mksh h1hl 8lyw mlm8lh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and he spread abroad the tent over the dwelling, and put the covering of the tent above upon it; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayifros ha’ohel ‘al hamishkan vayasem mikhseh ha’ohel ‘alav milma‘elah, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqH wytn 1t h8dt 1l h1rn wySm 1t hbdym 8l h1rn wytn 1t hkprt 8l h1rn mlm8lh and he took and put the until-witness into the cabinet, and set the canvas on the cabinet, and put the out-of-townment above upon the cabinet: vayiqakh vayiten ha‘edut ’el ha’aron vayasem habadim ‘al ha’aron, vayiten hakaporet ‘al ha’aron milma‘elah.
wyb1 1t h1rn 1l hmSkn wySm 1t prkt hmsk wysk 8l 1rwn h8dwt k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and he brought the cabinet into the dwelling, and set up breaker-screen, and covered the cabinet of the until-witness; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayabei ha’aron ’el hamishkan vayasem parokhet hamasakh vayasekh ‘al ’aron ha‘edut, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wytn 1t hSlHn b1hl mw8d 8l yrk hmSkn Zpnh mHwZ lprkt and he put the send-table in the tent of until-conception, upon the side of the dwelling hide-northward, without the breaker. vayiten hashulkhan be’ohel mo‘ed ‘al yerekh hamishkan zafonah, mikhuz laparokhet.
wy8rk 8lyw 8rk lHm lpny yhwh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and he set the bread in order upon it before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed extracted-mose. vaya‘arokh ‘alav ‘erekh lekhem lifnei yhvh, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wySm 1t hmnrh b1hl mw8d nkH hSlHn 8l yrk hmSkn ngbh and he put the light-stream-candle in the tent of until-conception, over against the table, on the side of the dwelling dry-southward. vayasem hamenorah be’ohel mo‘ed nokhakh hashulkhan, ‘al yerekh hamishkan negbah.

wrHZw mmnw mSh w1hrn wbnyw 1t ydyhm w1t rglyhm and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens washed their hands and their feet thereat: verakhazu mimenu mosheh ve’aharon ubanav, yedehem ve’et raglehem.

wyks h8nn 1t 1hl mw8d wkbwd yhwh ml1 1t hmSkn then a cloud covered the tent of until-conception, and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou filled the dwelling. vaykhas he‘anan ’ohel mo‘ed, ukhebod yhvh malei hamishkan.

Hqt 8wlm ldrtykm bkl mwSbtykm kl Hlb wkl dm l1 t1klw it be a perpetual statute for your generations throughout all your dwellings, that ye eat neither fat nor blood. khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem bekhol moshebotekhem, kal kheleb vekhal dam lo tokhelu.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l l1mr npS ky tHT1 bSggh mkl mZwt yhwh 1Sr l1 t8Synh w8Sh m1Ht mhnh speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, if a being miss through ignorance against any of the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou concerning things which ought not to be done, and do against any of them: daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor nefesh ki tekheta bishgagah mikol mizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah, ve‘asah me’akhat mehenah.
1m hkhn hmSyH yHT1 l1Smt h8m whqryb 8l HT1tw 1Sr HT1 pr bn bqr tmym lyhwh lHT1t if the dimmer-server that is lubeed do miss according to the miss of the with-mum-people; then let him bring for his miss, which he hath missed, a bull child-between of visit-cattle simple unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for a miss. ’im hakohen hamashiakh yekheta le’ashmat ha‘am, vehiqrib ‘al khatato ’asher khata par ben baqar tamim yhvh lekhatat.
whby1 1t hpr 1l ptH 1hl mw8d lpny yhwh wsmk 1t ydw 8l r1S hpr wSHT 1t hpr lpny yhwh and he inward the bull unto the opening of the tent of until-conception before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and lay his hand upon the bull's head, and kill the bull before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehebi hapar ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lifnei yhvh, vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hapar veshakhat hapar lifnei yhvh.
wlqH hkhn hmSyH mdm hpr whby1 1tw 1l 1hl mw8d and the dimmer-server that is lubeed take of the bull's blood, and bring it to the tent of until-conception: velaqakh hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar, vehebi ’oto ’el ’ohel mo‘ed.
wTbl hkhn 1t 1Zb8w bdm whzh mn hdm Sb8 p8mym lpny yhwh 1t pny prkt hqdS and the dimmer-server dip his finger in the blood, and sprinkle of the blood seven times before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, before-turns the breaker of the dedicated-finished. vetabal hakohen ’ezba‘o badam, vehizah min hadam sheba‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhvh penei parokhet haqodesh.
wntn hkhn mn hdm 8l qrnwt mzbH qTrt hsmym lpny yhwh 1Sr b1hl mw8d w1t kl dm hpr ySpk 1l yswd mzbH h8lh 1Sr ptH 1hl mw8d and the dimmer-server put some of the blood upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen of smoke drug before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which is in the tent of until-conception; and pour all the blood of the bull at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen of the on-up, which is at the opening of the tent of until-conception. venatan hakohen min hadam ‘al qarnot mizbakh qetoret hasamim lifnei yhvh ’asher be’ohel mo‘ed, ve’et kal dam hapar yishpokh ’el yesod mizbakh ha‘olah ’asher petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
w1t kl Hlb pr hHT1t yrym mmnw 1t hHlb hmksh 8l hqrb w1t kl hHlb 1Sr 8l hqrb and he take off from it all the fat of the bull for the miss; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards, ve’et kal kheleb par hakhatat yarim mimenu, hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb ve’et kal hakheleb ’asher ‘al haqereb.
w1t Sty hklyt w1t hHlb 1Sr 8lyhn 1Sr 8l hkslym w1t hytrt 8l hkbd 8l hklywt ysyrnh and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the remainder above the heavy-liver, with the eliminate-kidneys, it he take away, ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen ’asher ‘al hakesalim, ve’et hayoteret ‘al hakabed ‘al hakelayot yesirenah.
k1Sr ywrm mSwr zbH hSlmym whqTyrm hkhn 8l mzbH h8lh as it was taken off from the bull of the butcher of wholes: and the dimmer-server burn them upon the butcher-kitchen of the on-up. ka’asher yuram mishor zebakh hashelamim, vehiqtiram hakohen ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah.
w1t 8wr hpr w1t kl bSrw 8l r1Sw w8l kr8yw wqrbw wprSw and the light-skin of the bull, and all his flesh, with his head, and with his legs, and his inwards, and his dung, ve’et ‘or hapar ve’et kal besaro ‘al rosho ve‘al kera‘av, veqirbo ufirsho.
whwZy1 1t kl hpr 1l mHwZ lmHnh 1l mqwm Thwr 1l Spk hdSn wSrp 1tw 8l 8Zym b1S 8l Spk hdSn ySrp even the whole bull he carry forth without the camp unto a bright-climaxing place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire: where the ashes are poured out he be burnt. vehozi kal hapar mikhuz lamakhaneh ’el maqom tahor ’el shefekh hadeshen vesaraf ’oto ‘al ‘ezim ba’esh, ‘al shefekh hadeshen yisaref.
w1m kl 8dt ySr1l ySgw wn8lm dbr m8yny hqhl w8Sw 1Ht mkl mZwt yhwh 1Sr l1 t8Synh w1Smw and if the whole until-witness of saturated-towards-israel miss through ignorance, and the thing be hid from the eyes of the assembly, and they have done somewhat against any of the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou concerning things which should not be done, and are fire-name; ve’im kal ‘adat yisra’el yishgu vene‘lam dabar me‘enei haqahal, ve‘asu ’akhat mikal mizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah ve’ashemu.
wnwd8h hHT1t 1Sr HT1w 8lyh whqrybw hqhl pr bn bqr lHT1t whby1w 1tw lpny 1hl mw8d when the miss, which they have missed against it, is hand-known, then the until-witness inward a bull child-between of visit-cattle for the miss, and bring him before-turns the tent of until-conception. venod‘ah hakhatat ’asher khate’u ‘aleha, vehiqribu haqahal par baqar lekhatat vehebi’u ’oto lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed.
wsmkw zqny h8dh 1t ydyhm 8l r1S hpr lpny yhwh wSHT 1t hpr lpny yhwh and the elders of the until-witness lay their hands upon the head of the bull before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and the bull be killed before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vesamekhu ziqnei ha‘edah yedehem ‘al rosh hapar lifnei yhvh, veshakhat hapar lifnei yhvh.
whby1 hkhn hmSyH mdm hpr 1l 1hl mw8d and the dimmer-server that is lubeed bring of the bull's blood to the tent of until-conception: vehebi hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar, ’el ’ohel mo‘ed.
wTbl hkhn 1Zb8w mn hdm whzh Sb8 p8mym lpny yhwh 1t pny hprkt and the dimmer-server dip his finger in some of the blood, and sprinkle it seven times before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, even before-turns the breaker. vetabal hakohen ’ezba‘o min hadam, vehizah sheba‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhvh penei haparokhet.
wmn hdm ytn 8l qrnt hmzbH 1Sr lpny yhwh 1Sr b1hl mw8d w1t kl hdm ySpk 1l yswd mzbH h8lh 1Sr ptH 1hl mw8d and he put some of the blood upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen which is before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, that is in the tent of until-conception, and pour out all the blood at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen of the on-up, which is at the opening of the tent of until-conception. umin hadam yiten ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh ’asher lifnei yhvh ’asher be’ohel mo‘ed, ve’et kal hadam yishpokh ’el yesod mizbakh ha‘olah ’asher petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.

w8Sh lpr k1Sr 8Sh lpr hHT1t kn y8Sh lw wkpr 8lhm hkhn wnslH lhm and he do with the bull as he did with the bull for a miss, so he do with this: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for them, and it be released them. ve‘asah lapar ka’asher ‘asah lefar hakhatat ken ya‘aseh lo, vekhiper ‘alehem hakohen venislakh lahem.
whwZy1 1t hpr 1l mHwZ lmHnh wSrp 1tw k1Sr Srp 1t hpr hr1Swn HT1t hqhl hw1 and he carry forth the bull without the camp, and burn him as he burned the first bull: it is a miss for the until-witness. vehozi hapar ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesaraf ’oto ka’asher saraf hapar harishon, khatat haqahal hu.
1Sr nSy1 yHT1 w8Sh 1Ht mkl mZwt yhwh 1lhyw 1Sr l1 t8Synh bSggh w1Sm when a ruler hath missed, and done somewhat through ignorance against any of the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou his towards-these-elohim concerning things which should not be done, and is fire-name; ’asher nasi yekheta, ve‘asah ’akhat mikal mizvot yhvh ’elohav ’asher lo te‘asenah bishgagah ve’ashem.
1w hwd8 1lyw HT1tw 1Sr HT1 bh whby1 1t qrbnw S8yr 8zym zkr tmym or if his miss, wherein he hath missed, come to his knowledge; he inward his inward, a kid of the intense-goats, a rememberer simple: ’o hoda‘ ’elav khatato ’asher khata bah, vehebi qarebano se‘ir ‘izim zakhar tamim.
wsmk ydw 8l r1S hS8yr wSHT 1tw bmqwm 1Sr ySHT 1t h8lh lpny yhwh HT1t hw1 and he lay his hand upon the head of the intense-goat, and kill it in the place where they kill the on-up before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: it is a miss. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hasa‘ir veshakhat ’oto bimqom ’asher yishkhat ha‘olah lifnei yhvh, khatat hu.

w1m npS 1Ht tHT1 bSggh m8m h1rZ b8Sth 1Ht mmZwt yhwh 1Sr l1 t8Synh w1Sm and if any one of the upstarting with-mum-people miss through ignorance, while he doeth somewhat against any of the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou concerning things which ought not to be done, and be fire-name; ve’im nefesh ’akhat tekheta bishgagah me‘am ha’arez, ba‘asotah ’akhat mimizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah ve’ashem.
1w hwd8 1lyw HT1tw 1Sr HT1 whby1 qrbnw S8yrt 8zym tmymh nqbh 8l HT1tw 1Sr HT1 or if his miss, which he hath missed, come to his knowledge: then he inward his inward, a kid of the intense-goats, a pierced simple, for his miss which he hath missed. ’o hoda‘ ’elav khatato ’asher khata, vehebi qarebano se‘irat ‘izim temimah neqebah ‘al khatato ’asher khata.
wsmk 1t ydw 8l r1S hHT1t wSHT 1t hHT1t bmqwm h8lh and he lay his hand upon the head of the miss, and slay the miss in the place of the on-up. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hakhatat, veshakhat hakhatat bimqom ha‘olah.

w1m kbS yby1 qrbnw lHT1t nqbh tmymh yby1nh and if he bring a lamb for a miss, he inward it a pierced simple. ve’im kebes yabi qarebano lekhatat, neqebah temimah yebi’enah.
wsmk 1t ydw 8l r1S hHT1t wSHT 1th lHT1t bmqwm 1Sr ySHT 1t h8lh and he lay his hand upon the head of the miss, and slay it for a miss in the place where they kill the on-up. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hakhatat, veshakhat ’otah lekhatat bimqom ’asher yishkhat ha‘olah.
wlqH hkhn mdm hHT1t b1Zb8w wntn 8l qrnt mzbH h8lh w1t kl dmh ySpk 1l yswd hmzbH and the dimmer-server take of the blood of the miss with his finger, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen of on-up, and pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen: velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be’ezba‘o venatan ‘al qarnot mizbakh ha‘olah, ve’et kal damah yishpokh ’el yesod hamizbeakh.
w1t kl Hlbh ysyr k1Sr ywsr Hlb hkSb mzbH hSlmym whqTyr hkhn 1tm hmzbHh 8l 1Sy yhwh wkpr 8lyw hkhn 8l HT1tw 1Sr HT1 wnslH lw and he take away all the fat thereof, as the fat of the lamb is taken away from the butcher of the wholes; and the dimmer-server burn them upon the butcher-kitchen, according to the inwards made by fire unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for his miss that he hath committed, and it be released him. ve’et kal khelbah yasir ka’asher yusar kheleb hakeseb mizebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen ’otam hamizbekhah ‘al ’ishei yhvh, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen ‘al khatato ’asher khata venislakh lo.
wnpS ky tHT1 wSm8h qwl 1lh whw1 8d 1w r1h 1w yd8 1m lw1 ygyd wnS1 8wnw and if a being miss, and hear the voice of swearing, and is a witness, whether he hath seen or hand-known of it; if he do not utter it, then he bear his torment. venefesh ki tekheta veshame‘ah qol ’alah vehu ‘ed ’o ra’ah ’o yada‘, ’im lo yagid venasa ‘avono.
1w npS 1Sr tg8 bkl dbr Tm1 1w bnblt Hyh Tm1h 1w bnblt bhmh Tm1h 1w bnblt SrZ Tm1 wn8lm mmnw whw1 Tm1 w1Sm or if a being touch any stained-ceased thing, whether it be a carcass of an stained-ceased beast, or a carcass of stained-ceased in-them-animal, or the carcass of stained-ceased creeping things, and if it be hidden from him; he also be stained-ceased, and fire-name. ’o nefesh ’asher tiga‘ bekhal dabar tamei ’o beniblat khayah teme’ah ’o beniblat behemah teme’ah ’o beniblat sherez tame, vene‘lam mimenu vehu tamei ve’ashem.
1w ky yg8 bTm1t 1dm lkl Tm1tw 1Sr yTm1 bh wn8lm mmnw whw1 yd8 w1Sm or if he touch the stained-ceasedness of man, whatsoever stained-ceasedness it be that a man be ceased withal, and it be hid from him; when he knoweth of it, then he be fire-name. ’o khi yiga‘ betum’at ’adam lekhol tum’ato ’asher yitma bah, vene‘lam mimenu vehu yada‘ ve’ashem.
1w npS ky tSb8 lbT1 bSptym lhr8 1w lhyTyb lkl 1Sr ybT1 h1dm bSb8h wn8lm mmnw whw1 yd8 w1Sm l1Ht m1lh or if a being swear, pronouncing with his lips to do bad, or to do good, whatsoever it be that a man pronounce with an toward-oath, and it be hid from him; when he knoweth of it, then he be fire-name in one of these. ’o nefesh ki tishaba‘ lebatei bisfatayim lehara‘ ’o lehetib lekhol ’asher yebatei ha’adam bishbu‘ah vene‘lam mimenu, vehu yada‘ ve’ashem le’akhat me’eleh.
whyh ky y1Sm l1Ht m1lh whtwdh 1Sr HT1 8lyh and it be, when he be fire-name in one of these things, that he confess that he hath missed in that thing: vehayah khi ye’sham le’akhat me’eleh, vehitvadah ’asher khata ‘aleha.
whby1 1t 1Smw lyhwh 8l HT1tw 1Sr HT1 nqbh mn hZ1n kSbh 1w S8yrt 8zym lHT1t wkpr 8lyw hkhn mHT1tw and he bring his fire-name unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for his miss which he hath missed, a pierced from the flock, a lamb or a gate-hairy intense-goat, for a miss; and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him concerning his miss. vehebi ’ashamo yhvh ‘al khatato ’asher khata neqebah min hazon kisbah ’o se‘irat ‘izim lekhatat, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen mekhatato.
w1m l1 tgy8 ydw dy Sh whby1 1t 1Smw 1Sr HT1 Sty trym 1w Sny bny ywnh lyhwh 1Hd lHT1t w1Hd l8lh and if he be not able to bring a lamb, then he inward for his name-fire, which he hath missed, two rises, or two child-betweens of pigeons, unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; one for a miss, and the other for a on-up. ve’im lo tagi‘ seh vehebi ’ashamo ’asher khata shetei torim ’o shenei bene yonah yhvh, ’ekhad lekhatat ve’ekhad le‘olah.
whby1 1tm 1l hkhn whqryb 1t 1Sr lHT1t r1Swnh wmlq 1t r1Sw mmwl 8rpw wl1 ybdyl and he inward them unto the dimmer-server, who inward that which is for the miss first, and wring off his head from his neck, and not divide it asunder: vehebi ’otam ’el hakohen vehiqrib ’asher lakhatat rishonah, umalaq rosho mimul ‘arepo velo yabdil.
whzh mdm hHT1t 8l qyr hmzbH whnS1r bdm ymZh 1l yswd hmzbH HT1t hw1 and he sprinkle of the blood of the miss upon the side of the butcher-kitchen; and the rest of the blood be wrung out at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen: it is a miss. vehizah midam hakhatat ‘al qir hamizbeakh vehanish’ar badam yimazeh ’el yesod hamizbeakh, khatat hu.
w1t hSny y8Sh 8lh kmSpT wkpr 8lyw hkhn mHT1tw 1Sr HT1 wnslH lw and he inward the second for a on-up, according to the manner: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him for his miss which he hath missed, and it be released him. ve’et hasheni ya‘aseh ‘olah kamishpat, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen mekhatato ’asher khata venislakh lo.
w1m l1 tSyg ydw lSty trym 1w lSny bny ywnh whby1 1t qrbnw 1Sr HT1 8Syrt h1ph slt lHT1t l1 ySym 8lyh Smn wl1 ytn 8lyh lbnh ky HT1t hy1 and if he be not able to bring two rises, or two child-betweens of pigeons, then he that missed bring for his inward the tenth part of an tired-ephah of fine basket-flour for a miss; he put no name-from-oil upon it, neither he put any white-frankincense thereon: for it is a miss. ve’im lo tasig lishtei torim ’o lishnei bene yonah vehebi qarebano ’asher khata ‘asirit ha’efah solet lekhatat, lo yasim ‘aleha shemen velo yiten ‘aleha lebonah ki khatat hi.
whby1h 1l hkhn wqmZ hkhn mmnh mlw1 qmZw 1t 1zkrth whqTyr hmzbHh 8l 1Sy yhwh HT1t hw1 then he bring it to the dimmer-server, and the dimmer-server take his handful of it, even a memorial thereof, and burn it on the butcher-kitchen, according to the inwards made by fire unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: it is a miss. vehebi’ah ’el hakohen veqamaz hakohen mimenah melo qumzo ’azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbekhah ‘al ’ishei yhvh, khatat hi
wkpr 8lyw hkhn 8l HT1tw 1Sr HT1 m1Ht m1lh wnslH lw whyth lkhn kmnHh and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him as touching his miss that he hath missed in one of these, and it be released him: and the remnant be the dimmer-server's, as a absorber. vekhiper ‘alav hakohen ‘al khatato ’asher khata me’akhat me’eleh venislakh lo, vehayetah lakohen kaminkhah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
npS ky tm8l m8l wHT1h bSggh mqdSy yhwh whby1 1t 1Smw lyhwh 1yl tmym mn hZ1n b8rkk ksp Sqlym bSql hqdS l1Sm if a being goes over the top, and miss through ignorance, in the dedicated-finished things of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; then he inward for his fire-name unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou a voiceless-ram simple out of the flocks, with thy estimation by light-shekels of silver, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished, for a fire-name. nefesh ki tim‘ol ma‘al vekhate’ah bishgagah miqadeshei yhvh, vehebi ’ashamo yhvh ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha kesef sheqalim besheqel haqodesh le’asham.
w1t 1Sr HT1 mn hqdS ySlm w1t HmyStw ywsp 8lyw wntn 1tw lkhn whkhn ykpr 8lyw b1yl h1Sm wnslH lw and he peacify that which he had missed in the dedicated-finished thing, and add the fifth part thereto, and give it unto the dimmer-server: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him with the voiceless-ram of the fire-name, and it be released him. ve’et ’asher khata min haqodesh yeshalem ve’et khamishito yosef ‘alav venatan ’oto lakohen, vehakohen yekhaper ‘alav be’el ha’asham venislakh lo.
w1m npS ky tHT1 w8Sth 1Ht mkl mZwt yhwh 1Sr l1 t8Synh wl1 yd8 w1Sm wnS1 8wnw and if a being miss, and commit any of these things which are forbidden to be done by the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; though he wist it not, yet is he fire-name, and bear his torment. ve’im nefesh tekheta ve‘asetah ’akhat mikal mizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah, velo yada‘ ve’ashem venasa ‘avono.
whby1 1yl tmym mn hZ1n b8rkk l1Sm 1l hkhn wkpr 8lyw hkhn 8l Sggtw 1Sr Sgg whw1 l1 yd8 wnslH lw and he inward a voiceless-ram simple out of the flock, with thy estimation, for a fire-name, unto the dimmer-server: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him concerning his ignorance wherein he erred and wist it not, and it be released him. vehebi ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha le’asham ’el hakohen, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen ‘al shiggato ’asher shagag vehu lo yada‘ venislakh lo.
1Sm hw1 1Sm 1Sm lyhwh it is a fire-name: he hath certainly fire-nameed to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’asham hu, ’ashom ’asham yhvh.

npS ky tHT1 wm8lh m8l byhwh wkHS b8mytw bpqdwn 1w btSwmt yd 1w bgzl 1w 8Sq 1t 8mytw if a being miss, and goes over the top to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and lie unto his neighbor in that which was delivered him to keep, or in fellowship, or in a thing taken away by violence, or hath deceived his neighbor; nefesh ki tekheta uma‘alah ma‘al yhvh, vekhikhesh ba‘amito befiqadon ’o bitsumet yad ’o begazel ’o ‘ashaq ‘amito.
1w mZ1 1bdh wkHS bh wnSb8 8l Sqr 8l 1Ht mkl 1Sr y8Sh h1dm lHT1 bhnh or have found that which was lost, and lieth concerning it, and sweareth falsely; in any of all these that a man doeth, missing therein: ’o maza ’abedah vekhikhesh bah venishba‘ ‘al shaqer, ‘al ’akhat mikol ’asher ya‘aseh ha’adam lakhato bahenah.
whyh ky yHT1 w1Sm whSyb 1t hgzlh 1Sr gzl 1w 1t h8Sq 1Sr 8Sq 1w 1t hpqdwn 1Sr hpqd 1tw 1w 1t h1bdh 1Sr mZ1 then it be, because he hath missed, and is fire-name, that he restore that which he took violently away, or the thing which he hath deceitfully gotten, or that which was delivered him to keep, or the lost thing which he found, vehayah ki yekheta ve’ashem veheshib hagezelah ’asher gazal ’o ha‘osheq ’asher ‘ashaq ’o ’asher hafeqad ’ito, ’o ha’abedah ’asher maza.

1m 8l twdh yqrybnw whqryb 8l zbH htwdh Hlwt mZwt blwlt bSmn wrqyqy mZwt mSHym bSmn wslt mrbkt Hlt blwlt bSmn if he inward it for a thanksgiving, then he inward with the butcher of thanksgiving unleavened cakes mingled with name-from-oil, and unleavened wafers lubeed with name-from-oil, and cakes mingled with name-from-oil, of fine basket-flour, fried. ’im ‘al todah yaqribenu vehiqrib ‘al zebakh hatodah khalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen, vesolet khalot belulot bashamen.

w1m ndr 1w ndbh zbH qrbnw bywm hqrybw 1t zbHw y1kl wmmHrt whnwtr mmnw y1kl and if the butcher of his inward be a vow, or a voluntary inward, it be eaten the same day that he inwardeth his butcher: and on the morrow also the remainder of it be eaten: ve’im neder ’o nedabah zebakh qarebano beyom haqribo zibkho ye’akhel, umimakhorat vehanotar mimenu ye’akhel.

dbr 1l bny ySr1l l1mr kl Hlb Swr wkSb w8z l1 t1klw speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, ye eat no manner of fat, of wall-ox, or of sheep, or of intense-goat. daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor, kheleb shor vekheseb va‘ez lo tokhelu.
wHlb nblh wHlb Trph y8Sh lkl ml1kh w1kl l1 t1klhw and the fat of the beast that dieth of itself, and the fat of that which is torn with beasts, may be used in any other use: and ye in no wise eat of it. vekheleb nebelah vekheleb terefah ye‘aseh lekhal melakhah, ve’akhol lo tokheluhu.
ky kl 1kl Hlb mn hbhmh 1Sr yqryb mmnh 1Sh lyhwh wnkrth hnpS h1klt m8myh for whosoever eateth the fat of the beast, of which men inward a feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, even the being that eateth it be cut off from his with-mum-people. ki kal ’okhel kheleb min habehemah ’asher yaqrib ’isheh yhvh, venikhretah hanefesh ha’okhelet me‘ameha.

ky 1t Hzh htnwph w1t Swq htrwmh lqHty m1t bny ySr1l mzbHy Slmyhm w1tn 1tm l1hrn hkhn wlbnyw lHq 8wlm m1t bny ySr1l for the sieve-pana breast and the raise shoulder have i taken of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from off the butchers of their wholes, and have given them unto cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server and unto his children-betweens by a statute for ever from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ki khazeh hatenufah ve’et shoq haterumah laqakhti me’et bene yisra’el mizibkhei shalmehem, va’eten ’otam le’aharon hakohen ulebanav lekhaq ‘olam me’et benei yisra’el.
z1t mSHt 1hrn wmSHt bnyw m1Sy yhwh bywm hqryb 1tm lkhn lyhwh this is the portion of the lubeing of cabinet-aaron, and of the lubeing of his children-betweens, out of the inwards of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made by fire, in the day when he presented them to unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in the dimmer-server's office; zot mishkhat ’aharon umishkhat banav me’ishei yhvh, beyom hiqrib ’otam lekhahen yhvh.
1Sr Zwh yhwh ltt lhm bywm mSHw 1tm m1t bny ySr1l Hqt 8wlm ldrtm which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed to be given them of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, in the day that he lubeed them, by a statute for ever throughout their generations. ’asher zivah yhvh latet lahem beyom mashekho ’otam me’et benei yisra’el, khuqat ‘olam ledorotam.
z1t htwrh l8lh lmnHh wlHT1t wl1Sm wlmlw1ym wlzbH hSlmym this is the teaching of the on-up, of the absorber, and of the miss, and of the fire-name, and of the fullnesss, and of the butcher of the wholes; zot hatorah la‘olah laminkhah velakhatat vela’asham, velamilu’im ulezebakh hashelamim.
1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh bhr syny bywm Zwtw 1t bny ySr1l lhqryb 1t qrbnyhm lyhwh bmdbr syny which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose in mount bush-(proto-)sinai, in the day that he order-prescribed children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel to inward their inwards unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, in the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai. ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh behar sinay, beyom zavoto benei yisra’el lehaqrib qarebenehem yhvh bemidbar sinay.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qH 1t 1hrn w1t bnyw 1tw w1t hbgdym w1t Smn hmSHh w1t pr hHT1t w1t Sny h1ylym w1t sl hmZwt take cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens with him, and the garments, and the lubeing name-from-oil, and a bull for the miss, and two voiceless-rams, and a basket of lit-mazat; qakh ’aharon ve’et banav ’ito ve’et habegadim ve’et shemen hamishkhah, ve’et par hakhatat ve’et shenei ha’elim ve’et sal hamazot.
w1t kl h8dh hqhl 1l ptH 1hl mw8d and gather thou all the until-witness together unto the opening of the tent of until-conception. ve’et kal ha‘edah haqhel, ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wy8S mSh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw wtqhl h8dh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d and extracted-mose did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him; and the assembly was added together unto the opening of the tent of until-conception. vaya‘as mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto, vatiqahel ha‘edah ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wy1mr mSh 1l h8dh zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh l8Swt and extracted-mose said unto the until-witness, this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed to be done. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘edah, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot.
wyqrb mSh 1t 1hrn w1t bnyw wyrHZ 1tm bmym and extracted-mose brought cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens, and washed them with from-waters. vayaqreb mosheh ’aharon ve’et banav, vayirkhaz ’otam bamayim.
wytn 8lyw 1t hktnt wyHgr 1tw b1bnT wylbS 1tw 1t hm8yl wytn 8lyw 1t h1pd wyHgr 1tw bHSb h1pd wy1pd lw bw and he gave him the you-wrote-coat, and girded him with the girdle, and clothed him with the robe, and put the cash-in-ephod upon him, and he girded him with the accounting of the cash-in-ephod, and bound it unto him therewith. vayiten ‘alav hakutonet vayakhgor ’oto ba’abnet vayalbesh ’oto ’et hame‘il vayiten ‘alav ha’efod, vayakhgor ’oto bekhesheb ha’efod vaye’pod lo bo.
wySm 8lyw 1t hHSn wytn 1l hHSn 1t h1wrym w1t htmym and he put the bronze-tooth-khashan upon him: also he put in the bronze-tooth-khashan the fires-urim and the naively-finished-thummim. vayasem ‘alav hakhoshen, vayiten ’el hakhoshen ha’urim ve’et hatumim.
wySm 1t hmZnpt 8l r1Sw wySm 8l hmZnpt 1l mwl pnyw 1t ZyZ hzhb nzr hqdS k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and he put the branch-bonnet upon his head; also upon the branch-bonnet, even upon his forefront, did he put the golden plate, the dedicated-finished crown; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayasem hamiznefet ‘al rosho, vayasem ‘al hamiznefet ’el mul panav ziz hazahab nezer haqodesh ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqH mSh 1t Smn hmSHh wymSH 1t hmSkn w1t kl 1Sr bw wyqdS 1tm and extracted-mose took the lubeing name-from-oil, and lubeed the dwelling and all that was therein, and dedicated-finished them. vayiqakh mosheh shemen hamishkhah vayimshakh hamishkan ve’et kal ’asher bo, vayqadesh ’otam.
wyz mmnw 8l hmzbH Sb8 p8mym wymSH 1t hmzbH w1t kl klyw w1t hkyr w1t knw lqdSm and he sprinkled thereof upon the butcher-kitchen seven times, and lubeed the butcher-kitchen and all his tools, both the bulging and his base, to dedicate-finify them. vayaz mimenu ‘al hamizbeakh sheba‘ pe‘amim, vayimshakh hamizbeakh ve’et kal kelav ve’et hakiyor ve’et kano leqadesham.
wyZq mSmn hmSHh 8l r1S 1hrn wymSH 1tw lqdSw and he poured of the lubeing name-from-oil upon cabinet-aaron's head, and lubeed him, to dedicate-finify him. vayizoq mishemen hamishkhah ‘al rosh ’aharon, vayimshakh ’oto leqadesho.
wyqrb mSh 1t bny 1hrn wylbSm ktnt wyHgr 1tm 1bnT wyHbS lhm mgb8wt k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and extracted-mose brought cabinet-aaron's children-betweens, and put you-wrote-coats upon them, and girded them with girdles, and put bonnets upon them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayaqreb mosheh benei ’aharon vayalbishem kutonot vayakhgor ’otam ’abnet vayakhabosh lahem migba‘ot, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wygS 1t pr hHT1t wysmk 1hrn wbnyw 1t ydyhm 8l r1S pr hHT1t and he brought the bull for the miss: and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens laid their hands upon the head of the bull for the miss. vayagesh par hakhatat, vayismokh ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh par hakhatat.
wySHT wyqH mSh 1t hdm wytn 8l qrnwt hmzbH sbyb b1Zb8w wyHT1 1t hmzbH w1t hdm yZq 1l yswd hmzbH wyqdShw lkpr 8lyw and he slew it; and extracted-mose took the blood, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen round about with his finger, and missed the butcher-kitchen, and poured the blood at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen, and dedicated-finished it, to make reconciliation upon it. vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh hadam vayiten ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh sabib be’ezba‘o vaykhatei hamizbeakh, ve’et hadam yazaq ’el yesod hamizbeakh vayqadeshehu lekhaper ‘alav.
wyqH 1t kl hHlb 1Sr 8l hqrb w1t ytrt hkbd w1t Sty hklyt w1t Hlbhn wyqTr mSh hmzbHh and he took all the fat that was upon the inwards, and the remainder above the heavy-liver, and the two eliminate-kidneys, and their fat, and extracted-mose burned it upon the butcher-kitchen. vayiqakh kal hakheleb ’asher ‘al haqereb ve’et yoteret hakabed ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et khelbehen, vayaqter mosheh hamizbekhah.

wyqrb 1t 1yl h8lh wysmkw 1hrn wbnyw 1t ydyhm 8l r1S h1yl and he brought the voiceless-ram for the on-up: and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens laid their hands upon the head of the voiceless-ram. vayaqreb ’el ha‘olah, vayismekhu ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh ha’ayil.
wySHT wyzrq mSh 1t hdm 8l hmzbH sbyb and he killed it; and extracted-mose sprinkled the blood upon the butcher-kitchen round about. vayishkhat, vayizroq mosheh hadam ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
w1t h1yl ntH lntHyw wyqTr mSh 1t hr1S w1t hntHym w1t hpdr and he cut the voiceless-ram into pieces; and extracted-mose burnt the head, and the pieces, and the fat. ve’et ha’ayil nitakh lintakhav, vayaqter mosheh harosh ve’et hanetakhim ve’et hapader.
w1t hqrb w1t hkr8ym rHZ bmym wyqTr mSh 1t kl h1yl hmzbHh 8lh hw1 lryH nyHH 1Sh hw1 lyhwh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and he washed the inwards and the legs in from-waters; and extracted-mose burnt the whole voiceless-ram upon the butcher-kitchen: it was a on-up for a smell fragrance, and a feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. ve’et haqereb ve’et hakera‘ayim rakhaz bamayim, vayaqter mosheh kal ha’ayil hamizbekhah ‘olah hu lereakh nikhoakh ’isheh hu yhvh ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqrb 1t h1yl hSny 1yl hml1ym wysmkw 1hrn wbnyw 1t ydyhm 8l r1S h1yl and he brought the other voiceless-ram, the voiceless-ram of fullness: and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens laid their hands upon the head of the voiceless-ram. vayaqreb ha’ayil hasheni ’el hamilu’im, vayismekhu ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh ha’ayil.
wySHT wyqH mSh mdmw wytn 8l tnwk 1zn 1hrn hymnyt w8l bhn ydw hymnyt w8l bhn rglw hymnyt and he slew it; and extracted-mose took of the blood of it, and put it upon the tip of cabinet-aaron's right ear, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot. vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh midamo vayiten ‘al tenukh ’ozen ’aharon haymanit, ve‘al bohen yado haymanit ve‘al bohen raglo haymanit.
wyqrb 1t bny 1hrn wytn mSh mn hdm 8l tnwk 1znm hymnyt w8l bhn ydm hymnyt w8l bhn rglm hymnyt wyzrq mSh 1t hdm 8l hmzbH sbyb and he brought cabinet-aaron's children-betweens, and extracted-mose put of the blood upon the tip of their right ear, and upon the thumbs of their right hands, and upon the great toes of their right feet: and extracted-mose sprinkled the blood upon the butcher-kitchen round about. vayaqreb benei ’aharon vayiten mosheh min hadam ‘al tenukh ’azenam haymanit ve‘al bohen yadam haymanit ve‘al bohen raglam haymanit, vayizroq mosheh hadam ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.

wmsl hmZwt 1Sr lpny yhwh lqH Hlt mZh 1Ht wHlt lHm Smn 1Ht wrqyq 1Hd wySm 8l hHlbym w8l Swq hymyn and out of the basket of lit-mazat, that was before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, he took one unleavened cake, and a cake of name-from-oiled bread, and one wafer, and put them on the fat, and upon the right shoulder: umisal hamazot ’asher lifnei yhvh laqakh khalat mazah ’akhat vekhalat lekhem shemen ’akhat veraqiq ’ekhad, vayasem ‘al hakhalabim ve‘al shoq hayamin.
