wyqH mSh 1t hHzh wynyphw tnwph lpny yhwh m1yl hml1ym lmSh hyh lmnh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and extracted-mose took the breast, and sieve-panad it for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: for of the voiceless-ram of fullness it was extracted-mose' part; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayiqakh mosheh hekhazeh vaynifehu tenufah lifnei yhvh, me’el hamilu’im lemosheh hayah lemanah ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqH mSh mSmn hmSHh wmn hdm 1Sr 8l hmzbH wyz 8l 1hrn 8l bgdyw w8l bnyw w8l bgdy bnyw 1tw wyqdS 1t 1hrn 1t bgdyw w1t bnyw w1t bgdy bnyw 1tw and extracted-mose took of the lubeing name-from-oil, and of the blood which was upon the butcher-kitchen, and sprinkled it upon cabinet-aaron, and upon his garments, and upon his children-betweens, and upon his children-betweens' garments with him; and dedicated-finished cabinet-aaron, and his garments, and his children-betweens, and his children-betweens' garments with him. vayiqakh mosheh mishemen hamishkhah umin hadam ’asher ‘al hamizbeakh vayaz ‘al ’aharon ‘al begadav ve‘al banav ve‘al bigdei banav ’ito, vayqadesh ’aharon begadav ve’et banav ve’et bigdei banav ’ito.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn w1l bnyw bSlw 1t hbSr ptH 1hl mw8d wSm t1klw 1tw w1t hlHm 1Sr bsl hml1ym k1Sr Zwyty l1mr 1hrn wbnyw y1klhw and extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron and to his children-betweens, grace-boil the flesh at the opening of the tent of until-conception: and there eat it with the bread that is in the basket of fullnesss, as i order-prescribed, saying, cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens eat it. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ve’el banav bashelu habasar petakh ’ohel mo‘ed vesham tokhelu ’oto ve’et halekhem ’asher besal hamilu’im, ka’asher ziveti lemor ’aharon ubanav yokheluhu.
whnwtr bbSr wblHm b1S tSrpw and that which remaineth of the flesh and of the bread ye burn with fire. vehanotar babasar ubalakhem, ba’esh tisrofu.
wmptH 1hl mw8d l1 tZ1w Sb8t ymym 8d ywm ml1t ymy ml1ykm ky Sb8t ymym yml1 1t ydkm and ye not go out of the opening of the tent of until-conception in seven days, until the days of your fullness be at an end: for seven days he fill you. umipetakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo teze’u shib‘at yamim ‘ad yom melot yemei milu’ekhem, ki shib‘at yamim yemalei yedkhem.
k1Sr 8Sh bywm hzh Zwh yhwh l8St lkpr 8lykm as he hath done this day, so yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed to do, to make an out-of-town-ment for you. ka’asher ‘asah bayom hazeh, zivah yhvh la‘asot lekhaper ‘alekhem.
wptH 1hl mw8d tSbw ywmm wlylh Sb8t ymym wSmrtm 1t mSmrt yhwh wl1 tmwtw ky kn Zwyty therefore ye abide at the opening of the tent of until-conception day and night seven days, and keep the charge of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, that ye die not: for so i am order-prescribed. ufetakh ’ohel mo‘ed teshebu yomam valaylah shib‘at yamim ushemartem mishmeret yhvh velo tamutu, ki khen zuveti.
wy8S 1hrn wbnyw 1t kl hdbrym 1Sr Zwh yhwh byd mSh so cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens did all things which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed by the hand of extracted-mose. vaya‘as ’aharon ubanav, kal hadebarim ’asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh.
wyhy bywm hSmyny qr1 mSh l1hrn wlbnyw wlzqny ySr1l and it came to pass on the eighth day, that extracted-mose called cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens, and the elders of saturated-towards-israel; vayhi bayom hashemini qara mosheh le’aharon ulebanav, uleziqnei yisra’el.
wy1mr 1l 1hrn qH lk 8gl bn bqr lHT1t w1yl l8lh tmymm whqrb lpny yhwh and he said unto cabinet-aaron, take thee a young calf for a miss, and a voiceless-ram for a on-up, simple, and inward them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayomer ’el ’aharon qakh lekha ‘egel ben baqar lekhatat ve’ayil le‘olah temimim, vehaqreb lifnei yhvh.
w1l bny ySr1l tdbr l1mr qHw S8yr 8zym lHT1t w8gl wkbS bny Snh tmymm l8lh and unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel thou speak, saying, take ye a kid of the intense-goats for a miss; and a calf and a lamb, both of the first year, simple, for a on-up; ve’el benei yisra’el tedaber lemor, qekhu se‘ir ‘izim lekhatat ve‘egel vakhebes bene shanah temimim le‘olah.
wSwr w1yl lSlmym lzbH lpny yhwh wmnHh blwlh bSmn ky hywm yhwh nr1h 1lykm also a bull and a voiceless-ram for wholes, to butcher before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and a absorber mingled with name-from-oil: for to day yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will appear unto you. veshor va’ayil lishlamim lizboakh lifnei yhvh uminkhah belulah bashamen, ki hayom yhvh nir’ah ’alekhem.

wy1mr mSh zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh t8Sw wyr1 1lykm kbwd yhwh and extracted-mose said, this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed that ye should do: and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appear unto you. vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh ta‘asu, veyera ’alekhem kebod yhvh.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn qrb 1l hmzbH w8Sh 1t HT1tk w1t 8ltk wkpr b8dk wb8d h8m w8Sh 1t qrbn h8m wkpr b8dm k1Sr Zwh yhwh and extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron, go unto the butcher-kitchen, and inward thy miss, and thy on-up, and make an out-of-town-ment for thyself, and for the with-mum-people: and inward the inward of the with-mum-people, and make an out-of-town-ment for them; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon qerab ’el hamizbeakh va‘aseh khatatekha ve’et ‘olatekha vekhaper ba‘adkha ube‘ad ha‘am, va‘aseh qareban ha‘am vekhaper ba‘adam ka’asher zivah yhvh.
wyqrb 1hrn 1l hmzbH wySHT 1t 8gl hHT1t 1Sr lw cabinet-aaron therefore went unto the butcher-kitchen, and slew the calf of the miss, which was for himself. vayiqrab ’aharon ’el hamizbeakh, vayishkhat ‘egel hakhatat ’asher lo.
wyqrbw bny 1hrn 1t hdm 1lyw wyTbl 1Zb8w bdm wytn 8l qrnwt hmzbH w1t hdm yZq 1l yswd hmzbH and children-betweens of cabinet-aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dipped his finger in the blood, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen, and poured out the blood at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen: vayaqribu benei ’aharon hadam ’elav vayitbol ’ezba‘o badam vayiten ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh, ve’et hadam yazaq ’el yesod hamizbeakh.
w1t hHlb w1t hklyt w1t hytrt mn hkbd mn hHT1t hqTyr hmzbHh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and the fat, and the eliminate-kidneys, and the remainder above the heavy-liver of the miss, he burnt upon the butcher-kitchen; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. ve’et hakheleb ve’et hakelayot ve’et hayoteret min hakabed min hakhatat hiqtir hamizbekhah, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.

wyrHZ 1t hqrb w1t hkr8ym wyqTr 8l h8lh hmzbHh and he did wash the inwards and the legs, and burnt them upon the on-up on the butcher-kitchen. vayirkhaz haqereb ve’et hakera‘ayim, vayaqter ‘al ha‘olah hamizbekhah.
wyqrb 1t qrbn h8m wyqH 1t S8yr hHT1t 1Sr l8m wySHThw wyHT1hw kr1Swn and he brought the with-mum-people's inward, and took the intense-goat, which was the miss for the with-mum-people, and slew it, and inwarded it for miss, as the first. vayaqreb qareban ha‘am, vayiqakh se‘ir hakhatat ’asher la‘am vayishkhatehu vaykhate’ehu karishon.
wyqrb 1t h8lh wy8Sh kmSpT and he brought the on-up, and inwarded it according to the manner. vayaqreb ha‘olah, vaya‘aseha kamishpat.
wyqrb 1t hmnHh wyml1 kpw mmnh wyqTr 8l hmzbH mlbd 8lt hbqr and he brought the absorber, and took an handful thereof, and burnt it upon the butcher-kitchen, beside the on-up of the morning. vayaqreb haminkhah vaymalei khapo vayaqter ‘al hamizbeakh, milebad ‘olat haboqer.
wySHT 1t hSwr w1t h1yl zbH hSlmym 1Sr l8m wymZ1w bny 1hrn 1t hdm 1lyw wyzrqhw 8l hmzbH sbyb he slew also the bull and the voiceless-ram for a butcher of wholes, which was for the with-mum-people: and cabinet-aaron's children-betweens presented unto him the blood, which he sprinkled upon the butcher-kitchen round about, vayishkhat hashor ve’et ha’ayil zebakh hashelamim ’asher la‘am, vayamzi’u benei ’aharon hadam ’elav vayizreqehu ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
w1t hHlbym mn hSwr wmn h1yl h1lyh whmksh whklyt wytrt hkbd and the fat of the bull and of the voiceless-ram, the rump, and that which covereth the inwards, and the eliminate-kidneys, and the remainder above the heavy-liver: ve’et hakhalabim min hashor, umin ha’ayil ha’alyah vehamkhaseh vehakelayot veyoteret hakabed.
wySymw 1t hHlbym 8l hHzwt wyqTr hHlbym hmzbHh and they put the fat upon the breasts, and he burnt the fat upon the butcher-kitchen: vayasimu hakhalabim ‘al hekhazot, vayaqter hakhalabim hamizbekhah.
w1t hHzwt w1t Swq hymyn hnyp 1hrn tnwph lpny yhwh k1Sr Zwh mSh and the breasts and the right shoulder cabinet-aaron sieve-panad for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; as extracted-mose order-prescribed. ve’et hekhazot ve’et shoq hayamin henif ’aharon tenufah lifnei yhvh, ka’asher zivah mosheh.
wyS1 1hrn 1t ydw ydyw 1l h8m wybrkm wyrd m8St hHT1t wh8lh whSlmym and cabinet-aaron lifted up his hand toward the with-mum-people, and knee-fluffy-blessed them, and came down from inward of the miss, and the on-up, and wholes. vayisa ’aharon yadav ’el ha‘am vaybarekhem, vayered me‘asot hakhatat veha‘olah vehashelamim.
wyb1 mSh w1hrn 1l 1hl mw8d wyZ1w wybrkw 1t h8m wyr1 kbwd yhwh 1l kl h8m and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron went into the tent of until-conception, and came out, and knee-fluffy-blessed the with-mum-people: and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared unto all the with-mum-people. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el ’ohel mo‘ed vayeze’u vaybarakhu ha‘am, vayera khebod yhvh ’el kal ha‘am.
wtZ1 1S mlpny yhwh wt1kl 8l hmzbH 1t h8lh w1t hHlbym wyr1 kl h8m wyrnw wyplw 8l pnyhm and there came a fire out from before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and consumed upon the butcher-kitchen the on-up and the fat: which when all the with-mum-people saw, they shouted, and fell on their face-turns-turns. vatezei ’esh milifnei yhvh vatokhal ‘al hamizbeakh ha‘olah ve’et hakhalabim, vayar kal ha‘am vayaronu vayipelu ‘al penehem.
wyqHw bny 1hrn ndb w1byhw1 1yS mHttw wytnw bhn 1S wySymw 8lyh qTrt wyqrbw lpny yhwh 1S zrh 1Sr l1 Zwh 1tm and volunteer-nadab and he-my-pa-abihu, children-betweens of cabinet-aaron, took either of them his censer, and put fire therein, and put incense thereon, and inwarded strange fire before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which he order-prescribed them not. vayiqkhu bene ’aharon nadab va’abihu ’ish makhtato vayitenu bahen ’esh vayasimu ‘aleha qetoret, vayaqribu lifnei yhvh ’esh zarah ’asher lo zivah ’otam.
wtZ1 1S mlpny yhwh wt1kl 1wtm wymtw lpny yhwh and there went out fire from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and devoured them, and they died before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vatezei ’esh milifnei yhvh vatokhal ’otam, vayamutu lifnei yhvh.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn hw1 1Sr dbr yhwh l1mr bqrby 1qdS w8l pny kl h8m 1kbd wydm 1hrn then extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron, this is it that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake, saying, i will be dedicated-finished in them that come nigh me, and before-turns all the with-mum-people i will be heavied. and cabinet-aaron held his peace. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon hu ’asher diber yhvh lemor biqrobay ’eqadesh ve‘al penei khal ha‘am ’ekabed, vayidom ’aharon.
wyqr1 mSh 1l myS1l w1l 1lZpn bny 8zy1l dd 1hrn wy1mr 1lhm qrbw S1w 1t 1Hykm m1t pny hqdS 1l mHwZ lmHnh and extracted-mose called towards-poll-mishael and towards-cipher-elzaphan, children-betweens of goose-my-courage-towards-uzziel the uncle of cabinet-aaron, and said unto them, come near, carry your brethren from before-turns the dedicated-finished out of the camp. vayiqra mosheh ’el misha’el ve’el ’elzafan benei ‘uzi’el dod ’aharon, vayomer ’alehem qirbu se’u ’akhekhem me’et pene haqodesh ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wyqrbw wyS1m bktntm 1l mHwZ lmHnh k1Sr dbr mSh so they went near, and carried them in their you-wrote-coats out of the camp; as extracted-mose had said. vayiqrebu vayisa’um bekhutonotam ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh, ka’asher diber mosheh.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn wl1l8zr wl1ytmr bnyw r1Sykm 1l tpr8w wbgdykm l1 tprmw wl1 tmtw w8l kl h8dh yqZp w1Hykm kl byt ySr1l ybkw 1t hSrph 1Sr Srp yhwh and extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron, and unto towards-stop-eleazar and unto with-palm-itamar, his children-betweens, uncover not your heads, neither rend your clothes; lest ye die, and lest wrath come upon all the with-mum-people: and let your brethren, the whole daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel, bewail the burning which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath kindled. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ule’el‘azar ule’itamar banav rashekhem ’al tifra‘u ubigdekhem lo tifromu velo tamutu ve‘al kal ha‘edah yiqzof, va’akhekhem kal bet yisra’el yibku haserefah ’asher saraf yhvh.
wmptH 1hl mw8d l1 tZ1w pn tmtw ky Smn mSHt yhwh 8lykm wy8Sw kdbr mSh and ye not go out from the opening of the tent of until-conception, lest ye die: for the lubeing name-from-oil of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is upon you. and they did according to the bee-word of extracted-mose. umipetakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo teze’u pen tamutu ki shemen mishkhat yhvh ‘alekhem, vaya‘asu kidbar mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el ’aharon lemor.
yyn wSkr 1l tSt 1th wbnyk 1tk bb1km 1l 1hl mw8d wl1 tmtw Hqt 8wlm ldrtykm do not drink wine-inherit nor strong drink, thou, nor thy children-betweens with thee, when ye go into the tent of until-conception, lest ye die: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations: yayin veshekhar ’al teshet ’atah ubanekha ’itakh bebo’akhem ’el ’ohel mo‘ed velo tamutu, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem.
wlhbdyl byn hqdS wbyn hHl wbyn hTm1 wbyn hThwr and that ye may put difference between-bin dedicated-finished and starting, and between-bin stained-ceased and bright-climaxing; ulahabdil ben haqodesh uben hakhol, uben hatamei uben hatahor.
wlhwrt 1t bny ySr1l 1t kl hHqym 1Sr dbr yhwh 1lyhm byd mSh and that ye may teach children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel all the statutes which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath bee-spoken unto them by the hand of extracted-mose. ulehorot benei yisra’el, kal hakhuqim ’asher diber yhvh ’alehem beyad mosheh.
wydbr mSh 1l 1hrn w1l 1l8zr w1l 1ytmr bnyw hnwtrym qHw 1t hmnHh hnwtrt m1Sy yhwh w1klwh mZwt 1Zl hmzbH ky qdS qdSym hw1 and extracted-mose spake unto cabinet-aaron, and unto towards-stop-eleazar and unto with-palm-itamar, his children-betweens that were left, take the absorber that remaineth of the inwards of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made by fire, and eat it without leaven beside the butcher-kitchen: for it is most dedicated-finished: vaydaber mosheh ’el ’aharon ve’el ’el‘azar ve’el ’itamar banav hanotarim qekhu haminkhah hanoteret me’ishei yhvh ve’ikhluha mazot ’ezel hamizbeakh, ki qadashim hi
w1kltm 1th bmqwm qdS ky Hqk wHq bnyk hw1 m1Sy yhwh ky kn Zwyty and ye eat it in the dedicated-finished place, because it is thy due, and thy children-betweens' due, of the butchers of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made by fire: for so i am order-prescribed. va’akhaltem ’otah bemaqom qadosh ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha hi me’ishei yhvh, ki khen zuveti.
w1t Hzh htnwph w1t Swq htrwmh t1klw bmqwm Thwr 1th wbnyk wbntyk 1tk ky Hqk wHq bnyk ntnw mzbHy Slmy bny ySr1l and the sieve-pana breast and raise shoulder ye eat in a bright-climaxing place; thou, and thy children-betweens, and thy children-betweenesss with thee: for they be thy due, and thy children-betweens' due, which are given out of the butchers of wholes of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ve’et khazeh hatenufah ve’et shoq haterumah tokhelu bemaqom tahor ’atah ubanekha ubenotekha ’itakh, ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha nitenu mizibkhei shalmei benei yisra’el.
Swq htrwmh wHzh htnwph 8l 1Sy hHlbym yby1w lhnyp tnwph lpny yhwh whyh lk wlbnyk 1tk lHq 8wlm k1Sr Zwh yhwh the raise shoulder and the sieve-pana breast they bring with the inwards made by fire of the fat, to sieve-pana it for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and it be thine, and thy children-betweens' with thee, by a statute for ever; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed. shoq haterumah vakhazeh hatenufah ‘al ’ishei hakhalabim yabi’u lehanif tenufah lifnei yhvh, vehayah lekha ulebanekha ’itekha lekhaq ‘olam ka’asher zivah yhvh.
w1t S8yr hHT1t drS drS mSh whnh Srp wyqZp 8l 1l8zr w8l 1ytmr bny 1hrn hnwtrm l1mr and extracted-mose diligently sought the intense-goat of the miss, and, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry with towards-stop-eleazar and with-palm-itamar, children-betweens of cabinet-aaron which were left alive, saying, ve’et se‘ir hakhatat darosh darash mosheh vehineh soraf, vayiqzof ‘al ’el‘azar ve‘al ’itamar benei ’aharon hanotarim lemor.
mdw8 l1 1kltm 1t hHT1t bmqwm hqdS ky qdS qdSym hw1 w1th ntn lkm lS1t 1t 8wn h8dh lkpr 8lyhm lpny yhwh wherefore have ye not eaten the miss in the dedicated-finished place, seeing it is most dedicated-finished, and towards-these-elohim hath given it you to bear the torment of the until-witness, to make out-of-town-ment for them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou? madua‘ lo ’akhaltem hakhatat bimqom haqodesh ki qadashim hi ve’otah natan lakhem laset ‘avon ha‘edah lekhaper ‘alehem lifnei yhvh.
hn l1 hwb1 1t dmh 1l hqdS pnymh 1kwl t1klw 1th bqdS k1Sr Zwyty behold, the blood of it was not brought in within the dedicated-finished place: ye should indeed have eaten it in the dedicated-finished place, as i order-prescribed. hen lo huba damah ’el haqodesh. ’akhol tokhelu ’otah baqodesh ka’asher ziveti.
wydbr 1hrn 1l mSh hn hywm hqrybw 1t HT1tm w1t 8ltm lpny yhwh wtqr1nh 1ty k1lh w1klty HT1t hywm hyyTb b8yny yhwh and cabinet-aaron said unto extracted-mose, behold, this day have they inwarded their miss and their on-up before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and such things have befallen me: and if i had eaten the miss to day, should it have been accepted in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou? vaydaber ’aharon ’el mosheh hen hayom hiqribu khatatam ve’et ‘olatam lifnei yhvh vatiqrenah ’oti ka’eleh, ve’akhalti khatat hayom hayitab be‘enei yhvh.
wySm8 mSh wyyTb b8ynyw and when extracted-mose heard that, he was content. vayishma‘ mosheh vayitab be‘enav.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr 1lhm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and to cabinet-aaron, saying unto them, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor ’alehem.
dbrw 1l bny ySr1l l1mr z1t hHyh 1Sr t1klw mkl hbhmh 1Sr 8l h1rZ speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, these are the beasts which ye eat among all the beasts that are on the earth. daberu ’el benei yisra’el lemor, zot hakhayah ’asher tokhelu mikal habehemah ’asher ‘al ha’arez.
kl mprst prsh wSs8t Ss8 prst m8lt grh bbhmh 1th t1klw whatsoever parteth the part-hoof, and is cloven-footed, and cheweth the cud, among the beasts, that ye eat. kol mafreset parsah veshosa‘at shesa‘ perasot ma‘alat gerah babehemah, tokhelu.
1k 1t zh l1 t1klw mm8ly hgrh wmmprysy hprsh 1t hgml ky m8lh grh hw1 wprsh 1ynnw mprys Tm1 hw1 lkm nevertheless these ye not eat of them that chew the cud, or of them that divide the part-hoof: as the ripen-camel, because he cheweth the cud, and divideth not the part-hoof; he is stained-ceased unto you. ’akh zeh lo tokhelu mima‘alei hagerah umimafrisei haparsah, hagamal ki ma‘aleh gerah hu ufarsah ’enenu mafris tamei hu lakhem.
w1t hSpn ky m8lh grh hw1 wprsh l1 yprys Tm1 hw1 lkm and the turn-coney, because he cheweth the cud, and divideth not the part-hoof; he is stained-ceased unto you. ve’et hashafan ki ma‘aleh gerah hu ufarsah lo yafris, tamei hu lakhem.
w1t h1rnbt ky m8lt grh hw1 wprsh l1 hprysh Tm1h hw1 lkm and the pine-house-hare, because he cheweth the cud, and divideth not the part-hoof; he is stained-ceased unto you. ve’et ha’arnebet ki ma‘alat gerah hi ufarsah lo hifrisah, teme’ah hi lakhem.
w1t hHzyr ky mprys prsh hw1 wSs8 Ss8 prsh whw1 grh l1 ygr Tm1 hw1 lkm and the return-swine, though he divide the part-hoof, and be cloven-footed, yet he cheweth not the cud; he is stained-ceased to you. ve’et hakhazir ki mafris parsah hu veshosa‘ shesa‘ parsah vehu gerah lo yigar, tamei hu lakhem.
mbSrm l1 t1klw wbnbltm l1 tg8w Tm1ym hm lkm of their flesh ye not eat, and their carcass ye not touch; they are stained-ceased to you. mibesaram lo tokhelu ubeniblatam lo tiga‘u, teme’im hem lakhem.
1t zh t1klw mkl 1Sr bmym kl 1Sr lw snpyr wqSqSt bmym bymym wbnHlym 1tm t1klw these ye eat of all that are in the from-waters: whatsoever hath fins and scales in the from-waters, in the seas, and in the rivers, them ye eat. zeh tokhelu mikol ’asher bamayim, kol ’asher lo senapir veqasqeset bamayim bayamim ubanekhalim ’otam tokhelu.
wkl 1Sr 1yn lw snpyr wqSqSt bymym wbnHlym mkl SrZ hmym wmkl npS hHyh 1Sr bmym SqZ hm lkm and all that have not fins and scales in the seas, and in the rivers, of all that move in the from-waters, and of any living thing which is in the from-waters, they be an abomination unto you: vekhol ’asher ’en lo senapir veqasqeset bayamim ubanekhalim mikol sherez hamayim umikol nefesh hakhayah ’asher bamayim, sheqez hem.
wSqZ yhyw lkm mbSrm l1 t1klw w1t nbltm tSqZw they be even an abomination unto you; ye not eat of their flesh, and ye have their carcasses in abomination. vesheqez yihyu lakhem, mibesaram lo tokhelu ve’et niblatam teshaqezu.
kl 1Sr 1yn lw snpyr wqSqSt bmym SqZ hw1 lkm whatsoever hath no fins nor scales in the from-waters, that be an abomination unto you. kol ’asher ’en senapir veqasqeset bamayim, sheqez hu lakhem.
w1t 1lh tSqZw mn h8wp l1 y1klw SqZ hm 1t hnSr w1t hprs w1t h8znyh and these are they which ye have in abomination among the fowls; they not be eaten, they are an abomination: the drop-eagle, and the slize-spread-ossifrage, and the daring-ospray, ve’et ’eleh teshaqezu min ha‘of lo ye’akhelu sheqez hem, hanesher ve’et haperes ve’et ha‘azeniyah.
w1t hd1h w1t h1yh lmynh and the enough-kite, and the where-buzzard after his kind; ve’et hada’ah ve’et ha’ayah leminah.
1t kl 8rb lmynw every evening-raven after his kind; kal ‘oreb lemino.
w1t bt hy8nh w1t htHms w1t hSHp w1t hnZ lmynhw and the daughter-of-dove-ostrich, and the rob-night-go-out-hawk, and the sprocket-seagull, and the go-out-hawk after his kind, ve’et haya‘anah ve’et hatakhmas ve’et hashakhaf, ve’et hanez leminehu.
w1t hkws w1t hSlk w1t hynSwp and the cup-daughter-of-dove-ostrich, and the send-cormorant, and the blow-daughter-of-dove-ostrich, ve’et hakos ve’et hashalakh ve’et hayanshuf.
w1t htnSmt w1t hq1t w1t hrHm and the give-that-dead-barn-daughter-of-dove-ostrich, and the now-pelican, and the gier drop-eagle, ve’et hatinshemet ve’et haqa’at ve’et harakham.
w1t hHsydh h1nph lmynh w1t hdwkypt w1t h8Tlp and the charity-stork, the sift-heron after her kind, and the pushing-lapwing, and the hoof-bat. ve’et hakhasidah ha’anafah leminah, ve’et hadukhifat ve’et ha‘atalef.
kl SrZ h8wp hhlk 8l 1rb8 SqZ hw1 lkm all fowls that creep, going upon all four, be an abomination unto you. kol sherez ha‘of haholekh ‘al ’arba‘, sheqez hu lakhem.
1k 1t zh t1klw mkl SrZ h8wp hhlk 8l 1rb8 1Sr l1 lw kr8ym mm8l lrglyw lntr bhn 8l h1rZ yet these may ye eat of every flying creeping thing that goeth upon all four, which have legs above their feet, to leap withal upon the earth; ’akh zeh tokhelu mikol sherez ha‘of haholekh ‘al ’arba‘, ’asher lo khera‘ayim mima‘al leraglav lenater bahen ‘al ha’arez.
1t 1lh mhm t1klw 1t h1rbh lmynw w1t hsl8m lmynhw w1t hHrgl lmynhw w1t hHgb lmynhw even these of them ye may eat; the locust after his kind, and the bald locust after his kind, and the beetle after his kind, and the grasshopper after his kind. ’eleh tokhelu ha’arbeh lemino ve’et hasale‘am leminehu, ve’et hakhargol leminehu ve’et hekhagab leminehu.
wkl SrZ h8wp 1Sr lw 1rb8 rglym SqZ hw1 lkm and all other flying creeping things, which have four feet, be an abomination unto you. vekhol ha‘of ’asher lo ’arba‘ raglayim, sheqez hu lakhem.
wl1lh tTm1w kl hng8 bnbltm yTm1 8d h8rb and for these ye be stained-ceased: whosoever toucheth the carcass of them be stained-ceased until the even. ule’eleh titama’u, kal hanogea‘ beniblatam yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl hnS1 mnbltm ykbs bgdyw wTm1 8d h8rb and whosoever beareth ought of the carcass of them wash his clothes, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhal hanosei miniblatam, yekhabes begadav vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
lkl hbhmh 1Sr hw1 mprst prsh wSs8 1ynnh Ss8t wgrh 1ynnh m8lh Tm1ym hm lkm kl hng8 bhm yTm1 the carcasses of every beast which divideth the part-hoof, and is not cloven-footed, nor cheweth the cud, are stained-ceased unto you: every one that toucheth them be stained-ceased. lekhal habehemah ’asher hi mafreset parsah veshesa‘ ’enenah shosa‘at vegerah ’enenah ma‘alah teme’im hem lakhem, kal hanogea‘ bahem yitma.
wkl hwlk 8l kpyw bkl hHyh hhlkt 8l 1rb8 Tm1ym hm lkm kl hng8 bnbltm yTm1 8d h8rb and whatsoever goeth upon his paws, among all manner of beasts that go on all four, those are stained-ceased unto you: whoso toucheth their carcass be stained-ceased until the even. vekhol holekh ‘al kapav bekhal hakhayah haholekhet ‘al ’arba‘ teme’im hem lakhem, kal hanogea‘ beniblatam yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
whnS1 1t nbltm ykbs bgdyw wTm1 8d h8rb Tm1ym hmh lkm and he that beareth the carcass of them wash his clothes, and be stained-ceased until the even: they are stained-ceased unto you. vehanosei niblatam yekhabes begadav vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb, teme’im hemah lakhem.
wzh lkm hTm1 bSrZ hSrZ 8l h1rZ hHld wh8kbr whZb lmynhw these also be stained-ceased unto you among the creeping things that creep upon the earth; the weasel, and the mouse, and the tortoise after his kind, vezeh lakhem hatame basherez hashorez ‘al ha’arez, hakholed veha‘akhbar vehazab leminehu.
wh1nqh whkH whlT1h whHmT whtnSmt and the ferret, and the chameleon, and the lizard, and the snail, and the mole. veha’anaqah vehakoakh vehaleta’ah, vehakhomet vehatinshamet.
1lh hTm1ym lkm bkl hSrZ kl hng8 bhm bmtm yTm1 8d h8rb these are stained-ceased to you among all that creep: whosoever doth touch them, when they be dead, be stained-ceased until the even. ’eleh hateme’im lakhem bekhal hasharez, kal hanogea‘ bahem bemotam yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl 1Sr ypl 8lyw mhm bmtm yTm1 mkl kly 8Z 1w bgd 1w 8wr 1w Sq kl kly 1Sr y8Sh ml1kh bhm bmym ywb1 wTm1 8d h8rb wThr and upon whatsoever any of them, when they are dead, doth fall, it be stained-ceased; whether it be any tool of wood, or raiment, or light-skin, or sack, whatsoever tool it be, wherein any work is done, it must be put into from-waters, and it be stained-ceased until the even; so it be bright-climaxingsed. vekhol ’asher yipol ‘alav mehem bemotam yitma mikal keli ‘ez ’o beged ’o ‘or ’o saq kal keli ’asher ye‘aseh melakhah bahem, bamayim yuba vetamei ‘ad ha‘ereb vetaher.
wkl kly HrS 1Sr ypl mhm 1l twkw kl 1Sr btwkw yTm1 w1tw tSbrw and every earthen tool, whereinto any of them falleth, whatsoever is in it be stained-ceased; and ye break it. vekhal keli kheres ’asher yipol mehem ’el tokho, kol ’asher betokho yitma ve’oto tishboru.
mkl h1kl 1Sr y1kl 1Sr ybw1 8lyw mym yTm1 wkl mSqh 1Sr ySth bkl kly yTm1 of all meat which may be eaten, that on which such from-waters cometh be stained-ceased: and all drink that may be drunk in every such tool be stained-ceased. mikal ha’okhel ’asher ye’akhel ’asher yabo ‘alav mayim yitma, vekhal mashqeh ’asher yishateh bekhal keli yitma.
wkl 1Sr ypl mnbltm 8lyw yTm1 tnwr wkyrym ytZ Tm1ym hm wTm1ym yhyw lkm and every thing whereupon any part of their carcass falleth be stained-ceased; whether it be oven, or ranges for pots, they be broken down: for they are stained-ceased and be stained-ceased unto you. vekhol ’asher yipol miniblatam ‘alav yitma tanur vekhirayim yutaz teme’im hem, uteme’im yihyu lakhem.
1k m8yn wbwr mqwh mym yhyh Thwr wng8 bnbltm yTm1 nevertheless a fountain or pit, wherein there is plenty of from-waters, be bright-climaxing: and that which toucheth their carcass be stained-ceased. ’akh ma‘yan ubor miqveh mayim yihyeh tahor, venogea‘ beniblatam yitma.
wky ypl mnbltm 8l kl zr8 zrw8 1Sr yzr8 Thwr hw1 and if any part of their carcass fall upon any sowing seed which is to be sown, it be bright-climaxing. vekhi yipol miniblatam ‘al kal zera‘ zerua‘ ’asher yizarea‘, tahor hu.
wky ytn mym 8l zr8 wnpl mnbltm 8lyw Tm1 hw1 lkm and if any from-waters be put upon the seed, and any part of their carcass fall thereon, it be stained-ceased unto you. vekhi yutan mayim ‘al zera‘ venafal miniblatam ‘alav, tamei hu lakhem.
wky ymwt mn hbhmh 1Sr hy1 lkm l1klh hng8 bnblth yTm1 8d h8rb and if any beast, of which ye may eat, die; he that toucheth the carcass thereof be stained-ceased until the even. vekhi yamut min habehemah ’asher hi lakhem le’akhlah hanogea‘ beniblatah yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wh1kl mnblth ykbs bgdyw wTm1 8d h8rb whnS1 1t nblth ykbs bgdyw wTm1 8d h8rb and he that eateth of the carcass of it wash his clothes, and be stained-ceased until the even: he also that beareth the carcass of it wash his clothes, and be stained-ceased until the even. veha’okhel miniblatah yekhabes begadav vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb, vehanosei niblatah yekhabes begadav vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl hSrZ hSrZ 8l h1rZ SqZ hw1 l1 y1kl and every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth be an abomination; it not be eaten. vekhal hasherez hashorez ‘al ha’arez, sheqez hu lo ye’akhel.
kl hwlk 8l gHwn wkl hwlk 8l 1rb8 8d kl mrbh rglym lkl hSrZ hSrZ 8l h1rZ l1 t1klwm ky SqZ hm whatsoever goeth upon the nurture-belly, and whatsoever goeth upon all four, or whatsoever hath more feet among all creeping things that creep upon the earth, them ye not eat; for they are an abomination. kol holekh ‘al gakhon vekhol holekh ‘al ’arba‘ ‘ad kal marbeh raglayim lekhal hasherez hashorez ‘al ha’arez, lo tokhelum ki sheqez hem.
1l tSqZw 1t npStykm bkl hSrZ hSrZ wl1 tTm1w bhm wnTmtm bm ye not make yourselves abominable with any creeping thing that creepeth, neither ye make yourselves stained-ceased with them, that ye should be ceased thereby. ’al teshaqezu nafshotekhem bekhal hasherez hashorez, velo titame’u bahem venitmetem bam.
ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm whtqdStm whyytm qdSym ky qdwS 1ny wl1 tTm1w 1t npStykm bkl hSrZ hrmS 8l h1rZ for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim: ye therefore dedicate-finify yourselves, and ye be dedicated-finished; for i am dedicated-finished: neither ye cease yourselves with any manner of creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth. ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim ki qadosh ’ani, velo tetame’u nafshotekhem bekhal hasherez haromes ‘al ha’arez.
ky 1ny yhwh hm8lh 1tkm m1rZ mZrym lhyt lkm l1lhym whyytm qdSym ky qdwS 1ny for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou that bringeth you up out of the land of narrows-mizraim, to be your towards-these-elohim: ye therefore be dedicated-finished, for i am dedicated-finished. ki ’ani yhvh hama‘aleh ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem lelohim, vihyitem qedoshim ki qadosh ’ani.
z1t twrt hbhmh wh8wp wkl npS hHyh hrmSt bmym wlkl npS hSrZt 8l h1rZ this is the teaching of the beasts, and of the fowl, and of every living creature that moveth in the from-waters, and of every creature that creepeth upon the earth: zot torat habehemah veha‘of vekhol nefesh hakhayah haromeset bamayim, ulekhal nefesh hashorezet ‘al ha’arez.
lhbdyl byn hTm1 wbyn hThr wbyn hHyh hn1klt wbyn hHyh 1Sr l1 t1kl to make a difference between-bin the stained-ceased and the bright-climaxing, and between-bin the beast that may be eaten and the beast that may not be eaten. lehabdil ben hatamei uben hatahor, uben hakhayah hane’ekhelet uben hakhayah ’asher lo te’akhel.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l l1mr 1Sh ky tzry8 wyldh zkr wTm1h Sb8t ymym kymy ndt dwth tTm1 speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, if a woman have conceived seed, and born a man child: then she be stained-ceased seven days; according to the days of the separation for her infirmity she be stained-ceased. daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor ’ishah ki tazria‘ veyaledah zakhar, vetame’ah shib‘at yamim kimei nidat devotah titma.
wbywm hSmyny ymwl bSr 8rltw and in the eighth day the flesh of his foreskin be scribe-circumcised. ubayom hashemini, yimol besar ‘arelato.
wSlSym ywm wSlSt ymym tSb bdmy Thrh bkl qdS l1 tg8 w1l hmqdS l1 tb1 8d ml1t ymy Thrh and she then continue in the blood of her purifying three and thirty days; she touch no dedicateed thing, nor come into the dedicated-finished, until the days of her purifying be fulfilled. usheloshim yom usheloshet yamim tesheb bidmei tahorah, bekhal qodesh lo tiga‘ ve’el hamiqdash lo tabo ‘ad melot yemei tahorah.
w1m nqbh tld wTm1h Sb8ym kndth wSSym ywm wSSt ymym tSb 8l dmy Thrh and if she bear a maid child, then she be stained-ceased two weeks, as in her separation: and she continue in the blood of her purifying threescore and six days. ve’im neqebah teled vetame’ah shebu‘ayim kenidatah, veshishim yom vesheshet yamim tesheb ‘al demei tahorah.
wbml1t ymy Thrh lbn 1w lbt tby1 kbS bn Sntw l8lh wbn ywnh 1w tr lHT1t 1l ptH 1hl mw8d 1l hkhn and when the days of her purifying are fulfilled, for a child-between, or for a daughter-hoof-bat-child, she bring a lamb of the first year for a on-up, and a young pigeon, or a turtledove, for a miss, unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, unto the dimmer-server: ubimlot yemei tahorah leben ’o lebat tabi kebes ben shenato le‘olah uben yonah ’o tor lekhatat, ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed ’el hakohen.
whqrybw lpny yhwh wkpr 8lyh wThrh mmqr dmyh z1t twrt hyldt lzkr 1w lnqbh who inward it before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and make an out-of-town-ment for her; and she be bright-climaxingsed from the issue of her blood. this is the teaching for her that hath born a rememberer or a pierced. vehiqribo lifnei yhvh vekhiper ‘aleha vetaharah mimeqor dameha, zot torat hayoledet lazakhar ’o laneqebah.
w1m l1 tmZ1 ydh dy Sh wlqHh Sty trym 1w Sny bny ywnh 1Hd l8lh w1Hd lHT1t wkpr 8lyh hkhn wThrh and if she be not able to bring a lamb, then she bring two turtles, or two child-betweens of pigeons; the one for the on-up, and the other for a miss: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for her, and she be bright-climaxing. ve’im lo timza yadah dei seh velaqekhah shete torim ’o shenei benei yonah ’ekhad le‘olah ve’ekhad lekhatat, vekhiper ‘aleha hakohen vetaherah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
1dm ky yhyh b8wr bSrw S1t 1w spHt 1w bhrt whyh b8wr bSrw lng8 Zr8t whwb1 1l 1hrn hkhn 1w 1l 1Hd mbnyw hkhnym when a man have in the light-skin of his flesh a rising, a scab, or bright spot, and it be in the light-skin of his flesh like the neganegaplague of vexing-waspish-speckledness; then he be brought unto cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server, or unto one of his children-betweens the dimmer-servers: ’adam ki yihyeh be‘or besaro se’et ’o sapakhat ’o baheret vehayah be‘or besaro lenega‘ zara‘at, vehuba ’el ’aharon hakohen ’o ’el ’akhad mibanav hakohanim.
wr1h hkhn 1t hng8 b8wr hbSr wS8r bng8 hpk lbn wmr1h hng8 8mq m8wr bSrw ng8 Zr8t hw1 wr1hw hkhn wTm1 1tw and the dimmer-server look on the touch in the light-skin of the flesh: and when the gate-hair in the touch is turned to-between-bin-between-build-white, and the touch in sight be deeper than the light-skin of his flesh, it is a touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness: and the dimmer-server look on him, and pronounce him stained-ceased. vera’ah hakohen hanega‘ be‘or habasar vese‘ar banega‘ hafakh laban umar’eh hanega‘ ‘amoq me‘or besaro nega‘ zara‘at hu, vera’ahu hakohen vetimei ’oto.
w1m bhrt lbnh hw1 b8wr bSrw w8mq 1yn mr1h mn h8wr wS8rh l1 hpk lbn whsgyr hkhn 1t hng8 Sb8t ymym if the bright spot be to-between-bin-between-build-white in the light-skin of his flesh, and in sight be not deeper than the light-skin, and the gate-hair thereof be not turned to-between-bin-between-build-white; then the dimmer-server shut up him that hath the touch seven days: ve’im baheret lebanah hi be‘or besaro ve‘amoq ’en mar’eha min ha‘or use‘arah lo hafakh laban, vehisgir hakohen hanega‘ shib‘at yamim.
wr1hw hkhn bywm hSby8y whnh hng8 8md b8ynyw l1 pSh hng8 b8wr whsgyrw hkhn Sb8t ymym Snyt and the dimmer-server look on him the seventh day: and, behold, if the touch in his sight be at a stay, and the touch spread not in the light-skin; then the dimmer-server shut him up seven days more: vera’ahu hakohen bayom hashebi‘i vehineh hanega‘ ‘amad be‘enav lo fasah hanega‘ ba‘or, vehisgiro hakohen shib‘at yamim shenit.
wr1h hkhn 1tw bywm hSby8y Snyt whnh khh hng8 wl1 pSh hng8 b8wr wThrw hkhn mspHt hy1 wkbs bgdyw wThr and the dimmer-server look on him again the seventh day: and, behold, if the touch be somewhat dark, and the touch spread not in the light-skin, the dimmer-server bright-climaxe him: it is and a scab: and he wash his clothes, and be bright-climaxing. vera’ah hakohen ’oto bayom hashebi‘i shenit vehineh kehah hanega‘ velo fasah hanega‘ ba‘or, vetiharo hakohen mispakhat hi vekhibes begadav vetaher.
w1m pSh tpSh hmspHt b8wr 1Hry hr1tw 1l hkhn lThrtw wnr1h Snyt 1l hkhn and if the scab spread much abroad in the light-skin, after that he hath been seen of the dimmer-server for his bright-climaxingsing, he be seen of the dimmer-server again. ve’im pasoh tifseh hamispakhat ba‘or ’akharei hera’oto ’el hakohen letahorato, venir’ah shenit ’el hakohen.
wr1h hkhn whnh pSth hmspHt b8wr wTm1w hkhn Zr8t hw1 and if the dimmer-server see that, behold, the scab spreadeth in the light-skin, then the dimmer-server stained-ceased him: it is a vexing-waspish-speckledness. vera’ah hakohen vehineh pasetah hamispakhat ba‘or, vetime’o hakohen zara‘at hi
ng8 Zr8t ky thyh b1dm whwb1 1l hkhn when the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness is in a man, then he be brought unto the dimmer-server; nega‘ zara‘at ki tihyeh be’adam, vehuba ’el hakohen.
wr1h hkhn whnh S1t lbnh b8wr why1 hpkh S8r lbn wmHyt bSr Hy bS1t and the dimmer-server see him: and, behold, if the rising be to-between-bin-between-build-white in the light-skin, and it have turned the gate-hair to-between-bin-between-build-white, and there be quick live-raw flesh in the rising; vera’ah hakohen vehineh se’et lebanah ba‘or vehi hafekhah se‘ar laban, umikhyat basar khay bas’et.
Zr8t nwSnt hw1 b8wr bSrw wTm1w hkhn l1 ysgrnw ky Tm1 hw1 it is an old vexing-waspish-speckledness in the light-skin of his flesh, and the dimmer-server stained-ceased him, and not shut him up: for he is stained-ceased. zara‘at noshenet hi be‘or besaro vetime’o hakohen, lo yasgirenu ki tamei hu.
w1m prwH tprH hZr8t b8wr wksth hZr8t 1t kl 8wr hng8 mr1Sw w8d rglyw lkl mr1h 8yny hkhn and if a vexing-waspish-speckledness break out abroad in the light-skin, and the vexing-waspish-speckledness cover all the light-skin of him that hath the touch from his head even to his foot, wheresoever the dimmer-server looketh; ve’im paroakh tifrakh hazara‘at ba‘or vekhisetah hazara‘at kal ‘or hanega‘ merosho ve‘ad raglav, lekhal ‘enei hakohen.
wr1h hkhn whnh ksth hZr8t 1t kl bSrw wThr 1t hng8 klw hpk lbn Thwr hw1 then the dimmer-server consider: and, behold, if the vexing-waspish-speckledness have covered all his flesh, he bright-climaxe him that hath the touch: it is all turned to-between-bin-between-build-white: he is bright-climaxing. vera’ah hakohen vehineh khisetah hazara‘at kal besaro vetihar hanaga‘, kulo hafakh laban tahor hu.
wbywm hr1wt bw bSr Hy yTm1 and when live-raw flesh appeareth in him, he be stained-ceased. ubeyom hera’ot bo basar khay yitma.
wr1h hkhn 1t hbSr hHy wTm1w hbSr hHy Tm1 hw1 Zr8t hw1 and the dimmer-server see the live-raw flesh, and pronounce him to be stained-ceased: for the live-raw flesh is stained-ceased: it is a vexing-waspish-speckledness. vera’ah hakohen habasar hakhay vetime’o, habasar hakhay tamei hu zara‘at hu.
1w ky ySwb hbSr hHy wnhpk llbn wb1 1l hkhn or if the live-raw flesh turn again, and be changed unto to-between-bin-between-build-white, he come unto the dimmer-server; ’o khi yashub habasar hakhay venehpakh lelaban, uba ’el hakohen.
wr1hw hkhn whnh nhpk hng8 llbn wThr hkhn 1t hng8 Thwr hw1 and the dimmer-server see him: and, behold, if the touch be turned into to-between-bin-between-build-white; then the dimmer-server bright-climaxe him that hath the touch: he is bright-climaxing. vera’ahu hakohen vehineh nehpakh hanega‘ lelaban, vetihar hakohen hanega‘ tahor hu.
wbSr ky yhyh bw b8rw SHyn wnrp1 the flesh also, in which, even in the light-skin thereof, was a grace-boil, and is healed, ubasar ki yihyeh be‘oro shekhin, venirpa.
whyh bmqwm hSHyn S1t lbnh 1w bhrt lbnh 1dmdmt wnr1h 1l hkhn and in the place of the grace-boil there be a to-between-bin-between-build-white rising, or a bright spot, to-between-bin-between-build-white, and somewhat earthy-man-reddish, and it be showed to the dimmer-server; vehayah bimqom hashekhin se’et lebanah ’o baheret lebanah ’adamdamet, venir’ah ’el hakohen.
wr1h hkhn whnh mr1h Spl mn h8wr wS8rh hpk lbn wTm1w hkhn ng8 Zr8t hw1 bSHyn prHh and if, when the dimmer-server seeth it, behold, it be in sight lower than the light-skin, and the gate-hair thereof be turned to-between-bin-between-build-white; the dimmer-server stained-ceased him: it is a touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness broken out of the grace-boil. vera’ah hakohen vehineh mar’eha shafal min ha‘or use‘arah hafakh laban, vetime’o hakohen nega‘ zara‘at hi bashekhin parakhah.
w1m yr1nh hkhn whnh 1yn bh S8r lbn wSplh 1ynnh mn h8wr why1 khh whsgyrw hkhn Sb8t ymym and if the dimmer-server look on it, and, behold, there be no to-between-bin-between-build-white gate-hairs therein, and if it be not lower than the light-skin, and be somewhat dark; then the dimmer-server shut him up seven days: ve’im yir’enah hakohen vehineh ’en bah se‘ar laban ushefalah ’enenah min ha‘or vehi khehah, vehisgiro hakohen shib‘at yamim.
w1m pSh tpSh b8wr wTm1 hkhn 1tw ng8 hw1 and if it spread much abroad in the light-skin, then the dimmer-server stained-ceased him: it is a touch. ve’im pasoh tifseh ba‘or, vetimei hakohen nega‘ hi
w1m tHtyh t8md hbhrt l1 pSth Zrbt hSHyn hw1 wThrw hkhn and if below stand-up the bright not spread a burning swimmer it and climaxe him the dimmer-server, it is a burning grace-boil; and the dimmer-server bright-climaxe him. ve’im takhteha ta‘amod habaheret lo fasatah zarebet hashekhin hi vetiharo hakohen.
1w bSr ky yhyh b8rw mkwt 1S whyth mHyt hmkwh bhrt lbnh 1dmdmt 1w lbnh or if there be any flesh, in the light-skin whereof there is a hot burning, and the quick flesh that burneth have a to-between-bin-between-build-white bright spot, somewhat earthy-man-reddish, or to-between-bin-between-build-white; ’o basar ki yihyeh be‘oro mikhvat ’esh, vehayetah mikhyat hamikhvah baheret lebanah ’adamdemet ’o lebanah.
wr1h 1th hkhn whnh nhpk S8r lbn bbhrt wmr1h 8mq mn h8wr Zr8t hw1 bmkwh prHh wTm1 1tw hkhn ng8 Zr8t hw1 then the dimmer-server look upon it: and, behold, if the gate-hair in the bright spot be turned to-between-bin-between-build-white, and it be in sight deeper than the light-skin; it is a vexing-waspish-speckledness broken out of the burning: wherefore the dimmer-server stained-ceased him: it is the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness. vera’ah ’otah hakohen vehineh nehpakh se‘ar laban babaheret umar’eha ‘amoq min ha‘or zara‘at hi bamikhvah parakhah, vetimei hakohen nega‘ zara‘at hi
w1m yr1nh hkhn whnh 1yn bbhrt S8r lbn wSplh 1ynnh mn h8wr whw1 khh whsgyrw hkhn Sb8t ymym and if the dimmer-server look on it, and, behold, there be no to-between-bin-between-build-white gate-hair in the bright spot, and it be no lower than the other light-skin, and be somewhat dark; then the dimmer-server shut him up seven days: ve’im yir’enah hakohen vehineh ’en babeheret se‘ar laban ushefalah ’enenah min ha‘or vehiv khehah, vehisgiro hakohen shib‘at yamim.
wr1hw hkhn bywm hSby8y 1m pSh tpSh b8wr wTm1 hkhn 1tw ng8 Zr8t hw1 and the dimmer-server look upon him the seventh day: and if it be spread much abroad in the light-skin, then the dimmer-server stained-ceased him: it is the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness. vera’ahu hakohen bayom hashebi‘i, ’im pasoh tifseh ba‘or vetimei hakohen nega‘ zara‘at hi
w1m tHtyh t8md hbhrt l1 pSth b8wr whw1 khh S1t hmkwh hw1 wThrw hkhn ky Zrbt hmkwh hw1 and if below stand-up the bright not spread a burning swimmer it and climaxe him the dimmer-server in the light-skin, and it be somewhat dark; it is a rising of the burning, and the dimmer-server bright-climaxe him: for it is an inflammation of the burning. ve’im takhteha ta‘amod habaheret lo fasetah ba‘or vehiv khehah se’et hamikhvah hi vetiharo hakohen ki zarebet hamikhvah hi
w1yS 1w 1Sh ky yhyh bw ng8 br1S 1w bzqn if a man or woman have a touch upon the head or the beard; ve’ish ’o ’ishah ki yihyeh bo naga‘, berosh ’o bezaqan.
wr1h hkhn 1t hng8 whnh mr1hw 8mq mn h8wr wbw S8r Zhb dq wTm1 1tw hkhn ntq hw1 Zr8t hr1S 1w hzqn hw1 then the dimmer-server see the touch: and, behold, if it be in sight deeper than the light-skin; and there be in it a yellow thin gate-hair; then the dimmer-server stained-ceased him: it is a dry scall, even a vexing-waspish-speckledness upon the head or beard. vera’ah hakohen hanega‘ vehineh mar’ehu ‘amoq min ha‘or ubo se‘ar zahob daq, vetimei hakohen neteq hu zara‘at harosh ’o hazaqan hu.
wky yr1h hkhn 1t ng8 hntq whnh 1yn mr1hw 8mq mn h8wr wS8r SHr 1yn bw whsgyr hkhn 1t ng8 hntq Sb8t ymym and if the dimmer-server look on the touch of the scall, and, behold, it be not in sight deeper than the light-skin, and that there is no black gate-hair in it; then the dimmer-server shut up him that hath the touch of the scall seven days: vekhi yir’eh hakohen nega‘ haneteq vehineh ’en mar’ehu ‘amoq min ha‘or vese‘ar shakhor ’en bo, vehisgir hakohen haneteq shib‘at yamim.
wr1h hkhn 1t hng8 bywm hSby8y whnh l1 pSh hntq wl1 hyh bw S8r Zhb wmr1h hntq 1yn 8mq mn h8wr and in the seventh day the dimmer-server look on the touch: and, behold, if the scall spread not, and there be in it no yellow gate-hair, and the scall be not in sight deeper than the light-skin; vera’ah hakohen hanega‘ bayom hashebi‘i vehineh lo fasah haneteq velo hayah bo se‘ar zahob, umar’eh haneteq ’en ‘amoq min ha‘or.
whtglH w1t hntq l1 yglH whsgyr hkhn 1t hntq Sb8t ymym Snyt he be shaven, and the scall he not shave; and the dimmer-server shut up him that hath the scall seven days more: vehitgalakh ve’et haneteq lo yegaleakh, vehisgir hakohen haneteq shib‘at yamim shenit.
wr1h hkhn 1t hntq bywm hSby8y whnh l1 pSh hntq b8wr wmr1hw 1ynnw 8mq mn h8wr wThr 1tw hkhn wkbs bgdyw wThr and in the seventh day the dimmer-server look on the scall: and, behold, if the scall be not spread in the light-skin, nor be in sight deeper than the light-skin; then the dimmer-server bright-climaxe him: and he wash his clothes, and be bright-climaxing. vera’ah hakohen haneteq bayom hashebi‘i vehineh lo fasah haneteq ba‘or umar’ehu ’enenu ‘amoq min ha‘or, vetihar hakohen vekhibes begadav vetaher.
w1m pSh ypSh hntq b8wr 1Hry Thrtw and if the scall spread much in the light-skin after his bright-climaxingsing; ve’im pasoh yifseh haneteq ba‘or, ’akharei tahorato.
wr1hw hkhn whnh pSh hntq b8wr l1 ybqr hkhn lS8r hZhb Tm1 hw1 then the dimmer-server look on him: and, behold, if the scall be spread in the light-skin, the dimmer-server not seek for yellow gate-hair; he is stained-ceased. vera’ahu hakohen vehineh pasah haneteq ba‘or, lo yebaqer hakohen lase‘ar hazahob tamei hu.
w1m b8ynyw 8md hntq wS8r SHr ZmH bw nrp1 hntq Thwr hw1 wThrw hkhn and if the scall be in his sight at a stay, and that there is black gate-hair grown up therein; the scall is healed, he is bright-climaxing: and the dimmer-server bright-climaxe him. ve’im be‘enav ‘amad haneteq vese‘ar shakhor zamakh bo nirpa haneteq tahor hu, vetiharo hakohen.
w1yS 1w 1Sh ky yhyh b8wr bSrm bhrt bhrt lbnt if a man also or a woman have in the light-skin of their flesh bright spots, even to-between-bin-between-build-white bright spots; ve’ish ’o ’ishah ki yihyeh be‘or besaram beharot, beharot lebanot.
wr1h hkhn whnh b8wr bSrm bhrt khwt lbnt bhq hw1 prH b8wr Thwr hw1 then the dimmer-server look: and, behold, if the bright spots in the light-skin of their flesh be darkish to-between-bin-between-build-white; it is a freckled spot that groweth in the light-skin; he is bright-climaxing. vera’ah hakohen vehineh be‘or besaram beharot kehot lebanot, bohaq hu parakh ba‘or tahor hu.
w1yS ky ymrT r1Sw qrH hw1 Thwr hw1 and the man whose gate-hair is fallen off his head, he is bald; yet is he bright-climaxing. ve’ish ki yimaret rosho, qereakh hu tahor hu.
w1m mp1t pnyw ymrT r1Sw gbH hw1 Thwr hw1 and he that hath his gate-hair fallen off from the part of his head toward his face-turns, he is forehead bald: yet is he bright-climaxing. ve’im mipe’at panav yimaret rosho, gibeakh hu tahor hu.
wky yhyh bqrHt 1w bgbHt ng8 lbn 1dmdm Zr8t prHt hw1 bqrHtw 1w bgbHtw and if there be in the baldness, or thigh, a to-between-bin-between-build-white earthy-man-reddish touch; it is a vexing-waspish-speckledness sprung up in his baldness, or his thigh. vekhi yihyeh baqarakhat ’o bagabakhat nega‘ laban ’adamdam, zara‘at porakhat hi beqarakhto ’o begabakhto.
wr1h 1tw hkhn whnh S1t hng8 lbnh 1dmdmt bqrHtw 1w bgbHtw kmr1h Zr8t 8wr bSr then the dimmer-server look upon it: and, behold, if the rising of the touch be to-between-bin-between-build-white earthy-man-reddish in his baldness, or in his thigh, as the vexing-waspish-speckledness appeareth in the light-skin of the flesh; vera’ah ’oto hakohen vehineh se’et hanega‘ lebanah ’adamdemet beqarakhto ’o begabakhto, kemar’eh zara‘at ‘or basar.
1yS Zrw8 hw1 Tm1 hw1 Tm1 yTm1nw hkhn br1Sw ng8w he is a waspish-speckled-speckled man, he is stained-ceased: the dimmer-server pronounce him utterly stained-ceased; his touch is in his head. ’ish zarua‘ hu tamei hu, tamei yetame’enu hakohen berosho nig‘o.
whZrw8 1Sr bw hng8 bgdyw yhyw prmym wr1Sw yhyh prw8 w8l Spm y8Th wTm1 Tm1 yqr1 and the waspish-speckled in whom the touch is, his clothes be rent, and his head conceived-of, and he put a covering upon his upper lip, and cry, stained-ceased, stained-ceased. vehazarua‘ ’asher bo hanega‘ begadav yihyu ferumim verosho yihyeh farua‘ ve‘al safam ya‘teh, vetamei tamei yiqra.
kl ymy 1Sr hng8 bw yTm1 Tm1 hw1 bdd ySb mHwZ lmHnh mwSbw all the days wherein the touch be in him he be ceased; he is stained-ceased: he dwell alone; without the camp his habitation be. kal yemei ’asher hanega‘ bo yitma tamei hu, badad yesheb mikhuz lamakhaneh moshabo.
whbgd ky yhyh bw ng8 Zr8t bbgd Zmr 1w bbgd pStym the garment also that the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness is in, whether it be a woolen garment, or a linen garment; vehabeged ki yihyeh bo nega‘ zara‘at, bebeged zemer ’o bebeged pishtim.
1w bSty 1w b8rb lpStym wlZmr 1w b8wr 1w bkl ml1kt 8wr whether it be in the warp, or woof; of linen, or of woolen; whether in a light-skin, or in any thing made of light-skin; ’o bishti ’o be‘ereb lapishtim velazamer, ’o be‘or ’o bekhal melekhet ‘or.
whyh hng8 yrqrq 1w 1dmdm bbgd 1w b8wr 1w bSty 1w b8rb 1w bkl kly 8wr ng8 Zr8t hw1 whr1h 1t hkhn and if the touch be greenish or earthy-man-reddish in the garment, or in the light-skin, either in the warp, or in the woof, or in any thing of light-skin; it is a touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness, and be showed unto the dimmer-server: vehayah hanega‘ yeraqraq ’o ’adamdam babeged ’o ba‘or ’o basheti ’o ba‘ereb ’o bekhal keli ‘or nega‘ zara‘at hu, vehare’ah hakohen.
wr1h hkhn 1t hng8 whsgyr 1t hng8 Sb8t ymym and the dimmer-server look upon the touch, and shut up it that hath the touch seven days: vera’ah hakohen hanaga‘, vehisgir hanega‘ shib‘at yamim.
wr1h 1t hng8 bywm hSby8y ky pSh hng8 bbgd 1w bSty 1w b8rb 1w b8wr lkl 1Sr y8Sh h8wr lml1kh Zr8t mm1rt hng8 Tm1 hw1 and he look on the touch on the seventh day: if the touch be spread in the garment, either in the warp, or in the woof, or in a light-skin, or in any work that is made of light-skin; the touch is a fretting vexing-waspish-speckledness; it is stained-ceased. vera’ah hanega‘ bayom hashebi‘i ki fasah hanega‘ babeged ’o basheti ’o ba‘ereb ’o ba‘or lekhol ’asher ye‘aseh ha‘or zara‘at mam’eret hanega‘ tamei hu.
wSrp 1t hbgd 1w 1t hSty 1w 1t h8rb bZmr 1w bpStym 1w 1t kl kly h8wr 1Sr yhyh bw hng8 ky Zr8t mm1rt hw1 b1S tSrp he therefore burn that garment, whether warp or woof, in woolen or in linen, or any thing of light-skin, wherein the touch is: for it is a fretting vexing-waspish-speckledness; it be burnt in the fire. vesaraf habeged ’o hasheti ’o ha‘ereb bazemer ’o bapishtim ’o kal keli ha‘or ’asher yihyeh bo hanaga‘, ki zara‘at mam’eret hi ba’esh tisaref.
w1m yr1h hkhn whnh l1 pSh hng8 bbgd 1w bSty 1w b8rb 1w bkl kly 8wr and if the dimmer-server look, and, behold, the touch be not spread in the garment, either in the warp, or in the woof, or in any thing of light-skin; ve’im yir’eh hakohen vehineh lo fasah hanega‘ babeged ’o basheti ’o ba‘ereb, ’o bekhal keli ‘or.
wZwh hkhn wkbsw 1t 1Sr bw hng8 whsgyrw Sb8t ymym Snyt then the dimmer-server order-prescribe that they wash the thing wherein the touch is, and he shut it up seven days more: vezivah hakohen vekhibesu ’asher bo hanaga‘, vehisgiro shib‘at yamim shenit.
wr1h hkhn 1Hry hkbs 1t hng8 whnh l1 hpk hng8 1t 8ynw whng8 l1 pSh Tm1 hw1 b1S tSrpnw pHtt hw1 bqrHtw 1w bgbHtw and the dimmer-server look on the touch, after that it is washed: and, behold, if the touch have not changed his color, and the touch be not spread; it is stained-ceased; thou burn it in the fire; it is fret inward, whether it be conceived-of within or without. vera’ah hakohen ’akharei hukabes hanega‘ vehineh lo hafakh hanega‘ ‘eno vehanega‘ lo fasah tamei hu ba’esh tisrefenu, pekhetet hi beqarakhto ’o begabakhto.
w1m r1h hkhn whnh khh hng8 1Hry hkbs 1tw wqr8 1tw mn hbgd 1w mn h8wr 1w mn hSty 1w mn h8rb and if the dimmer-server look, and, behold, the touch be somewhat dark after the washing of it; then he rend it out of the garment, or out of the light-skin, or out of the warp, or out of the woof: ve’im ra’ah hakohen vehineh kehah hanega‘ ’akharei hukabes ’oto, veqara‘ ’oto min habeged ’o min ha‘or ’o min hasheti ’o min ha‘ereb.
w1m tr1h 8wd bbgd 1w bSty 1w b8rb 1w bkl kly 8wr prHt hw1 b1S tSrpnw 1t 1Sr bw hng8 and if it appear still in the garment, either in the warp, or in the woof, or in any thing of light-skin; it is a spreading touch: thou burn that wherein the touch is with fire. ve’im tera’eh ‘od babeged ’o basheti ’o ba‘ereb ’o bekhal keli ‘or porakhat hi ba’esh tisrefenu ’asher bo hanaga‘.
whbgd 1w hSty 1w h8rb 1w kl kly h8wr 1Sr tkbs wsr mhm hng8 wkbs Snyt wThr and the garment, either warp, or woof, or whatsoever thing of light-skin it be, which thou wash, if the touch be departed from them, then it be washed the second time, and be bright-climaxing. vehabeged ’o hasheti ’o ha‘ereb ’o khal keli ha‘or ’asher tekhabes vesar mehem hanaga‘, vekhubas shenit vetaher.
z1t twrt ng8 Zr8t bgd hZmr 1w hpStym 1w hSty 1w h8rb 1w kl kly 8wr lThrw 1w lTm1w this is the teaching of the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness in a garment of woolen or linen, either in the warp, or woof, or any thing of light-skins, to pronounce it bright-climaxing, or to pronounce it stained-ceased. zot torat nega‘ zara‘at beged hazemer ’o hapishtim ’o hasheti ’o ha‘ereb ’o kal keli ‘or, letaharo ’o letame’o.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
z1t thyh twrt hmZr8 bywm Thrtw whwb1 1l hkhn this be the teaching of the waspish-speckled in the day of his bright-climaxingsing: he be brought unto the dimmer-server: zot tihyeh torat hamezora‘ beyom tahorato, vehuba ’el hakohen.
wyZ1 hkhn 1l mHwZ lmHnh wr1h hkhn whnh nrp1 ng8 hZr8t mn hZrw8 and the dimmer-server go forth out of the camp; and the dimmer-server look, and, behold, if the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness be healed in the waspish-speckled; veyaza hakohen ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh, vera’ah hakohen vehineh nirpa nega‘ hazara‘at min hazarua‘.
wZwh hkhn wlqH lmThr Sty Zprym Hywt Thrwt w8Z 1rz wSny twl8t w1zb then the dimmer-server order-prescribe to take for him that is to be bright-climaxingsed two birds alive and bright-climaxing, and cedar wood, and two caterpillars, and discharging-hyssop: vezivah hakohen velaqakh lamitaher shete ziporim khayot tehorot, ve‘ez ’erez usheni tola‘at ve’ezob.
wZwh hkhn wSHT 1t hZpwr h1Ht 1l kly HrS 8l mym Hyym and the dimmer-server order-prescribe that one of the birds be killed in an earthen tool over running from-waters: vezivah hakohen veshakhat hazipor ha’ekhat, ’el keli kheres ‘al mayim khayim.
1t hZpr hHyh yqH 1th w1t 8Z h1rz w1t Sny htwl8t w1t h1zb wTbl 1wtm w1t hZpr hHyh bdm hZpr hSHTh 8l hmym hHyym as for the living bird, he take it, and the cedar wood, and the two caterpillars, and the discharging-hyssop, and dip them and the living bird in the blood of the bird that was killed over the running from-waters: ’et hazipor hakhayah yiqakh ’otah ve’et ‘ez ha’erez ve’et sheni hatola‘at ve’et ha’ezob, vetabal ’otam ve’et hazipor hakhayah bedam hazipor hashekhutah ‘al hamayim hakhayim.
whzh 8l hmThr mn hZr8t Sb8 p8mym wThrw wSlH 1t hZpr hHyh 8l pny hSdh and he sprinkle upon him that is to be bright-climaxingsed from the vexing-waspish-speckledness seven times, and bright-climaxe him, and let the living bird loose into the open field. vehizah ‘al hamitaher min hazara‘at sheba‘ pe‘amim, vetiharo veshilakh hazipor hakhayah ‘al penei hasadeh.
wkbs hmThr 1t bgdyw wglH 1t kl S8rw wrHZ bmym wThr w1Hr ybw1 1l hmHnh wySb mHwZ l1hlw Sb8t ymym and he that is to be bright-climaxingsed wash his clothes, and shave off all his gate-hair, and wash himself in from-waters, that he may be bright-climaxing: and after that he come into the camp, and tarry abroad out of his tent seven days. vekhibes hamitaher begadav vegilakh kal se‘aro verakhaz bamayim vetaher ve’akhar yabo ’el hamakhaneh, veyashab mikhuz le’aholo shib‘at yamim.
whyh bywm hSby8y yglH 1t kl S8rw 1t r1Sw w1t zqnw w1t gbt 8ynyw w1t kl S8rw yglH wkbs 1t bgdyw wrHZ 1t bSrw bmym wThr and it be on the seventh day, that he shave all his gate-hair off his head and his beard and his eyebrows, even all his gate-hair he shave off: and he wash his clothes, also he wash his flesh in from-waters, and he be bright-climaxing. vehayah bayom hashebi‘i yegalakh kal se‘aro rosho ve’et zeqano ve’et ‘enav ve’et kal se‘aro yegaleakh, vekhibes begadav verakhaz besaro bamayim vetaher.
wbywm hSmyny yqH Sny kbSym tmymym wkbSh 1Ht bt Snth tmymh wSlSh 8Srnym slt mnHh blwlh bSmn wlg 1Hd Smn and on the eighth day he take two he lambs simple, and one ewe lamb of the first year simple, and three tenth deals of fine basket-flour for a absorber, mingled with name-from-oil, and one log of name-from-oil. ubayom hashemini yiqakh shene khebasim temimim vekhabsah ’akhat bat shenatah temimah, usheloshah ‘esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen velog ’ekhad shamen.
wh8myd hkhn hmThr 1t h1yS hmThr w1tm lpny yhwh ptH 1hl mw8d and the dimmer-server that maketh him bright-climaxing present the man that is to be made bright-climaxing, and those things, before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, at the opening of the tent of until-conception: vehe‘emid hakohen hamtaher ha’ish hamitaher ve’otam, lifnei yhvh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wlqH hkhn 1t hkbS h1Hd whqryb 1tw l1Sm w1t lg hSmn whnyp 1tm tnwph lpny yhwh and the dimmer-server take one he lamb, and inward him for a fire-name, and the log of name-from-oil, and sieve-pana them for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: velaqakh hakohen hakebes ha’ekhad vehiqrib ’oto le’asham ve’et log hashamen, vehenif ’otam tenufah lifnei yhvh.
wSHT 1t hkbS bmqwm 1Sr ySHT 1t hHT1t w1t h8lh bmqwm hqdS ky kHT1t h1Sm hw1 lkhn qdS qdSym hw1 and he slay the lamb in the place where he kill the miss and the on-up, in the dedicated-finished place: for as the miss is the dimmer-server's, so is the fire-name: it is most dedicated-finished: veshakhat hakebes bimqom ’asher yishkhat hakhatat ve’et ha‘olah bimqom haqodesh, ki kakhatat ha’asham hu lakohen qodesh qadashim hu.
wlqH hkhn mdm h1Sm wntn hkhn 8l tnwk 1zn hmThr hymnyt w8l bhn ydw hymnyt w8l bhn rglw hymnyt and the dimmer-server take some of the blood of the fire-name, and the dimmer-server put it upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to be bright-climaxingsed, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot: velaqakh hakohen midam ha’asham venatan hakohen ‘al tenukh ’ozen hamitaher haymanit, ve‘al bohen yado haymanit ve‘al bohen raglo haymanit.
wlqH hkhn mlg hSmn wyZq 8l kp hkhn hSm1lyt and the dimmer-server take some of the log of name-from-oil, and pour it into the palm of his own left hand: velaqakh hakohen milog hashamen, veyazaq ‘al kaf hakohen hasemalit.
wTbl hkhn 1t 1Zb8w hymnyt mn hSmn 1Sr 8l kpw hSm1lyt whzh mn hSmn b1Zb8w Sb8 p8mym lpny yhwh and the dimmer-server dip his right finger in the name-from-oil that is in his left hand, and sprinkle of the name-from-oil with his finger seven times before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vetabal hakohen ’ezba‘o haymanit min hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo hasemalit, vehizah min hashemen be’ezba‘o sheba‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhvh.
wmytr hSmn 1Sr 8l kpw ytn hkhn 8l tnwk 1zn hmThr hymnyt w8l bhn ydw hymnyt w8l bhn rglw hymnyt 8l dm h1Sm and of the rest of the name-from-oil that is in his hand the dimmer-server put upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to be bright-climaxingsed, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot, upon the blood of the fire-name: umiyeter hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo yiten hakohen ‘al tenukh ’ozen hamitaher haymanit ve‘al bohen yado haymanit ve‘al bohen raglo haymanit, ‘al dam ha’asham.
whnwtr bSmn 1Sr 8l kp hkhn ytn 8l r1S hmThr wkpr 8lyw hkhn lpny yhwh and the remnant of the name-from-oil that is in the dimmer-server's hand he pour upon the head of him that is to be bright-climaxingsed: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehanotar bashemen ’asher ‘al kaf hakohen yiten ‘al rosh hamitaher, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen lifnei yhvh.
w8Sh hkhn 1t hHT1t wkpr 8l hmThr mTm1tw w1Hr ySHT 1t h8lh and the dimmer-server inward the miss, and make an out-of-town-ment for him that is to be bright-climaxingsed from his stained-ceasedness; and afterward he kill the on-up: ve‘asah hakohen hakhatat vekhiper ‘al hamitaher mitum’ato, ve’akhar yishkhat ha‘olah.
wh8lh hkhn 1t h8lh w1t hmnHh hmzbHh wkpr 8lyw hkhn wThr and the dimmer-server inward the on-up and the absorber upon the butcher-kitchen: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him, and he be bright-climaxing. vehe‘elah hakohen ha‘olah ve’et haminkhah hamizbekhah, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen vetaher.
w1m dl hw1 w1yn ydw mSgt wlqH kbS 1Hd 1Sm ltnwph lkpr 8lyw w8Srwn slt 1Hd blwl bSmn lmnHh wlg Smn and if he be poor, and cannot get so much; then he take one lamb for a fire-name to be sieve-panad, to make an out-of-town-ment for him, and one tenth deal of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber, and a log of name-from-oil; ve’im dal hu ve’en yado maseget velaqakh kebes ’ekhad ’asham litnufah lekhaper ‘alav, ve‘isaron solet ’ekhad balul bashemen leminkhah velog shamen.
wSty trym 1w Sny bny ywnh 1Sr tSyg ydw whyh 1Hd HT1t wh1Hd 8lh and two rises, or two child-betweens of pigeons, such as he is able to get; and the one be a miss, and the other a on-up. ushetei torim ’o shenei benei yonah ’asher tasig yado, vehayah ’ekhad khatat veha’ekhad ‘olah.
whby1 1tm bywm hSmyny lThrtw 1l hkhn 1l ptH 1hl mw8d lpny yhwh and he inward them on the eighth day for his bright-climaxingsing unto the dimmer-server, unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehebi ’otam bayom hashemini letahorato ’el hakohen, ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lifnei yhvh.
wlqH hkhn 1t kbS h1Sm w1t lg hSmn whnyp 1tm hkhn tnwph lpny yhwh and the dimmer-server take the lamb of the fire-name, and the log of name-from-oil, and the dimmer-server sieve-pana them for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: velaqakh hakohen kebes ha’asham ve’et log hashamen, vehenif ’otam hakohen tenufah lifnei yhvh.
wSHT 1t kbS h1Sm wlqH hkhn mdm h1Sm wntn 8l tnwk 1zn hmThr hymnyt w8l bhn ydw hymnyt w8l bhn rglw hymnyt and he kill the lamb of the fire-name, and the dimmer-server take some of the blood of the fire-name, and put it upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to be bright-climaxingsed, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot: veshakhat kebes ha’asham velaqakh hakohen midam ha’asham venatan ‘al tenukh ’ozen hamitaher haymanit, ve‘al bohen yado haymanit ve‘al bohen raglo haymanit.
wmn hSmn yZq hkhn 8l kp hkhn hSm1lyt and the dimmer-server pour of the name-from-oil into the palm of his own left hand: umin hashemen yizoq hakohen, ‘al kaf hakohen hasemalit.
whzh hkhn b1Zb8w hymnyt mn hSmn 1Sr 8l kpw hSm1lyt Sb8 p8mym lpny yhwh and the dimmer-server sprinkle with his right finger some of the name-from-oil that is in his left hand seven times before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vehizah hakohen be’ezba‘o haymanit min hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo hasemalit, sheba‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhvh.
wntn hkhn mn hSmn 1Sr 8l kpw 8l tnwk 1zn hmThr hymnyt w8l bhn ydw hymnyt w8l bhn rglw hymnyt 8l mqwm dm h1Sm and the dimmer-server put of the name-from-oil that is in his hand upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to be bright-climaxingsed, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot, upon the place of the blood of the fire-name: venatan hakohen min hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo ‘al tenukh ’ozen hamitaher haymanit ve‘al bohen yado haymanit ve‘al bohen raglo haymanit, ‘al meqom dam ha’asham.
whnwtr mn hSmn 1Sr 8l kp hkhn ytn 8l r1S hmThr lkpr 8lyw lpny yhwh and the rest of the name-from-oil that is in the dimmer-server's hand he put upon the head of him that is to be bright-climaxingsed, to make an out-of-town-ment for him before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehanotar min hashemen ’asher ‘al kaf hakohen yiten ‘al rosh hamitaher, lekhaper ‘alav lifnei yhvh.
w8Sh 1t h1Hd mn htrym 1w mn bny hywnh m1Sr tSyg ydw and he inward the one of the rises, or of child-betweens of pigeons, such as he can get; ve‘asah ha’ekhad min hatorim ’o min benei hayonah, me’asher tasig yado.
1t 1Sr tSyg ydw 1t h1Hd HT1t w1t h1Hd 8lh 8l hmnHh wkpr hkhn 8l hmThr lpny yhwh even such as he is able to get, the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up, with the absorber: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him that is to be bright-climaxingsed before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’asher tasig yado ha’ekhad khatat ve’et ha’ekhad ‘olah ‘al haminkhah, vekhiper hakohen ‘al hamitaher lifnei yhvh.
z1t twrt 1Sr bw ng8 Zr8t 1Sr l1 tSyg ydw bThrtw this is the teaching of him in whom is the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness, whose hand is not able to get that which pertaineth to his bright-climaxingsing. zot torat ’asher nega‘ zara‘at, ’asher lo tasig yado betahorato.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
ky tb1w 1l 1rZ kn8n 1Sr 1ny ntn lkm l1Hzh wntty ng8 Zr8t bbyt 1rZ 1Hztkm when ye be come into the land of mobile-trade-canaan, which i give to you for a possession, and i put the touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness in a daughter-house of the land of your possession; ki tabo’u ’el ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani noten lakhem la’akhuzah, venatati nega‘ zara‘at bebet ’erez ’akhuzatkhem.
wb1 1Sr lw hbyt whgyd lkhn l1mr kng8 nr1h ly bbyt and he that owneth the daughter-house come and tell the dimmer-server, saying, it seemeth to me there is as it were a touch in the daughter-house: uba ’asher lo habayit vehigid lakohen lemor, kenega‘ nir’ah li babayit.
wZwh hkhn wpnw 1t hbyt bTrm yb1 hkhn lr1wt 1t hng8 wl1 yTm1 kl 1Sr bbyt w1Hr kn yb1 hkhn lr1wt 1t hbyt then the dimmer-server order-prescribe that they empty the daughter-house, before-turns the dimmer-server go into it to see the touch, that all that is in the daughter-house be not made stained-ceased: and afterward the dimmer-server go in to see the daughter-house: vezivah hakohen ufinu habayit beterem yabo hakohen lir’ot hanega‘ velo yitma kal ’asher babayit, ve’akhar ken yabo hakohen lir’ot habayit.
wr1h 1t hng8 whnh hng8 bqyrt hbyt Sq8rwrt yrqrqt 1w 1dmdmt wmr1yhn Spl mn hqyr and he look on the touch, and, behold, if the touch be in the walls of the daughter-house with hollow streaks, greenish or earthy-man-reddish, which in sight are lower than the wall; vera’ah hanega‘ vehineh hanega‘ beqirot habayit sheqa‘arurot yeraqraqot ’o ’adamdamot, umar’ehen shafal min haqir.
wyZ1 hkhn mn hbyt 1l ptH hbyt whsgyr 1t hbyt Sb8t ymym then the dimmer-server go out of the daughter-house to the opening of the daughter-house, and shut up the daughter-house seven days: veyaza hakohen min habayit ’el petakh habayit, vehisgir habayit shib‘at yamim.
wSb hkhn bywm hSby8y wr1h whnh pSh hng8 bqyrt hbyt and the dimmer-server come again the seventh day, and look: and, behold, if the touch be spread in the walls of the daughter-house; veshab hakohen bayom hashebi‘i, vera’ah vehineh pasah hanega‘ beqirot habayit.
wZwh hkhn wHlZw 1t h1bnym 1Sr bhn hng8 whSlykw 1thn 1l mHwZ l8yr 1l mqwm Tm1 then the dimmer-server order-prescribe that they take away the stones in which the touch is, and they cast them into an stained-ceased place without the light-city: vezivah hakohen vekhilezu ha’abanim ’asher bahen hanaga‘, vehishlikhu ’ethen mikhuz la‘ir maqom tame.
w1t hbyt yqZ8 mbyt sbyb wSpkw 1t h8pr 1Sr hqZw 1l mHwZ l8yr 1l mqwm Tm1 and he cause the daughter-house to be scraped within round about, and they pour out the dust that they scrape off without the light-city into an stained-ceased place: ve’et habayit yaqzia‘ mibayit sabib, veshafekhu he‘afar ’asher hiqzu mikhuz la‘ir ’el maqom tame.
wlqHw 1bnym 1Hrwt whby1w 1l tHt h1bnym w8pr 1Hr yqH wTH 1t hbyt and they take other stones, and put them in the place of those stones; and he take other mortar, and plaster the daughter-house. velaqekhu ’abanim ’akherot vehebi’u ’el takhat ha’abanim, ve‘afar ’akher yiqakh vetakh habayit.
w1m ySwb hng8 wprH bbyt 1Hr HlZ 1t h1bnym w1Hry hqZwt 1t hbyt w1Hry hTwH and if the touch come again, and break out in the daughter-house, after that he hath taken away the stones, and after he hath scraped the daughter-house, and after it is plastered; ve’im yashub hanega‘ ufarakh babayit ’akhar khilez ha’abanim, ve’akharei hiqzot habayit ve’akharei hitoakh.
wb1 hkhn wr1h whnh pSh hng8 bbyt Zr8t mm1rt hw1 bbyt Tm1 hw1 then the dimmer-server come and look, and, behold, if the touch be spread in the daughter-house, it is a fretting vexing-waspish-speckledness in the daughter-house; it is stained-ceased. uba hakohen vera’ah vehineh pasah hanega‘ babayit, zara‘at mam’eret hi babayit tamei hu.
wntZ 1t hbyt 1t 1bnyw w1t 8Zyw w1t kl 8pr hbyt whwZy1 1l mHwZ l8yr 1l mqwm Tm1 and he break down the daughter-house, the stones of it, and the timber thereof, and all the mortar of the daughter-house; and he carry them forth out of the light-city into an stained-ceased place. venataz habayit ’abanav ve’et ‘ezav ve’et kal ‘afar habayit, vehozi mikhuz la‘ir ’el maqom tame.
whb1 1l hbyt kl ymy hsgyr 1tw yTm1 8d h8rb moreover he that goeth into the daughter-house all the while that it is shut up be stained-ceased until the even. vehaba ’el habayit kal yemei hisgir yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
whSkb bbyt ykbs 1t bgdyw wh1kl bbyt ykbs 1t bgdyw and he that lieth in the daughter-house wash his clothes; and he that eateth in the daughter-house wash his clothes. vehashokheb babayit yekhabes begadav, veha’okhel babayit yekhabes begadav.
w1m b1 yb1 hkhn wr1h whnh l1 pSh hng8 bbyt 1Hry hTH 1t hbyt wThr hkhn 1t hbyt ky nrp1 hng8 and if the dimmer-server come in, and look upon it, and, behold, the touch hath not spread in the daughter-house, after the daughter-house was plastered: then the dimmer-server pronounce the daughter-house bright-climaxing, because the touch is healed. ve’im bo yabo hakohen vera’ah vehineh lo fasah hanega‘ babayit ’akharei hitoakh habayit, vetihar hakohen habayit ki nirpa hanaga‘.
wlqH lHT1 1t hbyt Sty Zprym w8Z 1rz wSny twl8t w1zb and he take to bright-climaxingse the daughter-house two birds, and cedar wood, and two caterpillars, and discharging-hyssop: velaqakh lekhatei habayit shetei ziporim, ve‘ez ’erez usheni tola‘at ve’ezob.
wSHT 1t hZpr h1Ht 1l kly HrS 8l mym Hyym and he kill the one of the birds in an earthen tool over running from-waters: veshakhat hazipor ha’ekhat, ’el keli kheres ‘al mayim khayim.
wlqH 1t 8Z h1rz w1t h1zb w1t Sny htwl8t w1t hZpr hHyh wTbl 1tm bdm hZpr hSHwTh wbmym hHyym whzh 1l hbyt Sb8 p8mym and he take the cedar wood, and the discharging-hyssop, and the two caterpillars, and the living bird, and dip them in the blood of the slain bird, and in the running from-waters, and sprinkle the daughter-house seven times: velaqakh ‘ez ha’erez ve’et ha’ezob ve’et sheni hatola‘at ve’et hazipor hakhayah vetabal ’otam bedam hazipor hashekhutah ubamayim hakhayim, vehizah ’el habayit sheba‘ pe‘amim.
wHT1 1t hbyt bdm hZpwr wbmym hHyym wbZpr hHyh wb8Z h1rz wb1zb wbSny htwl8t and he bright-climaxingse the daughter-house with the blood of the bird, and with the running from-waters, and with the living bird, and with the cedar wood, and with the discharging-hyssop, and with the two caterpillars: vekhitei habayit bedam hazipor ubamayim hakhayim, ubazipor hakhayah ube‘ez ha’erez uba’ezob ubishni hatola‘at.
wSlH 1t hZpr hHyh 1l mHwZ l8yr 1l pny hSdh wkpr 8l hbyt wThr and he send the living bird out of the light-city into the open fields, and make an out-of-town-ment for the daughter-house: and it be bright-climaxing. veshilakh hazipor hakhayah mikhuz la‘ir ’el penei hasadeh, vekhiper ‘al habayit vetaher.
z1t htwrh lkl ng8 hZr8t wlntq this is the teaching for all manner of touch of vexing-waspish-speckledness, and scall, zot hatorah, lekhal nega‘ hazara‘at velanateq.
wlZr8t hbgd wlbyt and for the vexing-waspish-speckledness of a garment, and of a daughter-house, ulezara‘at habeged velabayit.
wlS1t wlspHt wlbhrt and for a rising, and for a scab, and for a bright spot: velas’et velasapakhat velabeharet.
lhwrt bywm hTm1 wbywm hThr z1t twrt hZr8t to teach when it is stained-ceased, and when it is bright-climaxing: this is the teaching of vexing-waspish-speckledness. lehorot beyom hatamei ubeyom hatahor, zot torat hazara‘at.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and to cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
dbrw 1l bny ySr1l w1mrtm 1lhm 1yS 1yS ky yhyh zb mbSrw zwbw Tm1 hw1 speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when any man hath a running issue out of his flesh, because of his issue he is stained-ceased. daberu ’el benei yisra’el va’amartem ’alehem, ’ish ’ish ki yihyeh zab mibesaro zobo tamei hu.
wz1t thyh Tm1tw bzwbw rr bSrw 1t zwbw 1w hHtym bSrw mzwbw Tm1tw hw1 and this be his stained-ceasedness in his issue: whether his flesh run with his issue, or his flesh be stopped from his issue, it is his stained-ceasedness. vezot tihyeh tum’ato bezobo, rar besaro ’et zobo ’o hekhtim besaro mizobo tum’ato hi
kl hmSkb 1Sr ySkb 8lyw hzb yTm1 wkl hkly 1Sr ySb 8lyw yTm1 every bed, whereon he lieth that hath the issue, is stained-ceased: and every thing, whereon he sitteth, be stained-ceased. kal hamishkab ’asher yishkab hazab yitma, vekhal hakeli ’asher yesheb ‘alav yitma.
w1yS 1Sr yg8 bmSkbw ykbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and whosoever toucheth his bed wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. ve’ish ’asher yiga‘ bemishkabo, yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
whySb 8l hkly 1Sr ySb 8lyw hzb ykbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and he that sitteth on any thing whereon he sat that hath the issue wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vehayosheb ‘al hakeli ’asher yesheb hazab, yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
whng8 bbSr hzb ykbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and he that toucheth the flesh of him that hath the issue wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vehanogea‘ bibsar hazab, yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wky yrq hzb bThwr wkbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and if he that hath the issue spit upon him that is bright-climaxing; then he wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhi yaroq hazab batahor, vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl hmrkb 1Sr yrkb 8lyw hzb yTm1 and what saddle soever he rideth upon that hath the issue be stained-ceased. vekhal hamerkab ’asher yirkab ‘alav hazab yitma.
wkl hng8 bkl 1Sr yhyh tHtyw yTm1 8d h8rb whnwS1 1wtm ykbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and whosoever toucheth any thing that was under him be stained-ceased until the even: and he that beareth any of those things wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhal hanogea‘ bekhol ’asher yihyeh takhtav yitma ‘ad ha‘areb, vehanosei ’otam yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl 1Sr yg8 bw hzb wydyw l1 STp bmym wkbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and whomsoever he toucheth that hath the issue, and hath not rinsed his hands in from-waters, he wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhol ’asher yiga‘ bo hazab veyadav lo shataf bamayim, vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkly HrS 1Sr yg8 bw hzb ySbr wkl kly 8Z ySTp bmym and the tool of earth, that he toucheth which hath the issue, be broken: and every tool of wood be rinsed in from-waters. ukheli kheres ’asher yiga‘ bo hazab yishaber, vekhal keli ‘ez yishatef bamayim.
wky yThr hzb mzwbw wspr lw Sb8t ymym lThrtw wkbs bgdyw wrHZ bSrw bmym Hyym wThr and when he that hath an issue is bright-climaxingsed of his issue; then he number to himself seven days for his bright-climaxingsing, and wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in running from-waters, and be bright-climaxing. vekhi yithar hazab mizobo vesafar lo shib‘at yamim letahorato vekhibes begadav, verakhaz besaro bemayim khayim vetaher.
wbywm hSmyny yqH lw Sty trym 1w Sny bny ywnh wb1 lpny yhwh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d wntnm 1l hkhn and on the eighth day he take to him two rises, or two child-betweens of pigeons, and come before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, and give them unto the dimmer-server: ubayom hashemini yiqakh lo shetei torim ’o shenei benei yonah, uba lifnei yhvh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed unetanam ’el hakohen.
w8Sh 1tm hkhn 1Hd HT1t wh1Hd 8lh wkpr 8lyw hkhn lpny yhwh mzwbw and the dimmer-server inward them, the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up; and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for his issue. ve‘asah ’otam hakohen ’ekhad khatat veha’ekhad ‘olah, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen lifnei yhvh mizobo.
w1yS ky tZ1 mmnw Skbt zr8 wrHZ bmym 1t kl bSrw wTm1 8d h8rb and if any man's seed of copulation go out from him, then he wash all his flesh in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. ve’ish ki tezei mimenu shikhbat zara‘, verakhaz bamayim kal besaro vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl bgd wkl 8wr 1Sr yhyh 8lyw Skbt zr8 wkbs bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and every garment, and every light-skin, whereon is the seed of copulation, be washed with from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhal beged vekhal ‘or ’asher yihyeh shikhbat zara‘, vekhubas bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
w1Sh 1Sr ySkb 1yS 1th Skbt zr8 wrHZw bmym wTm1w 8d h8rb the woman also with whom man lie with seed of copulation, they both bathe themselves in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. ve’ishah ’asher yishkab ’ish shikhbat zara‘, verakhazu bamayim vetame’u ‘ad ha‘areb.
w1Sh ky thyh zbh dm yhyh zbh bbSrh Sb8t ymym thyh bndth wkl hng8 bh yTm1 8d h8rb and if a woman have an issue, and her issue in her flesh be blood, she be put apart seven days: and whosoever toucheth her be stained-ceased until the even. ve’ishah ki tihyeh zabah dam yihyeh zobah bibsarah, shib‘at yamim tihyeh benidatah vekhal hanogea‘ bah yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
