wkl 1Sr tSkb 8lyw bndth yTm1 wkl 1Sr tSb 8lyw yTm1 and every thing that she lieth upon in her separation be stained-ceased: every thing also that she sitteth upon be stained-ceased. vekhol ’asher tishkab ‘alav benidatah yitma, vekhol ’asher tesheb ‘alav yitma.
wkl hng8 bmSkbh ykbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and whosoever toucheth her bed wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhal hanogea‘ bemishkabah, yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl hng8 bkl kly 1Sr tSb 8lyw ykbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and whosoever toucheth any thing that she sat upon wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhal hanogea‘ bekhal keli ’asher tesheb ‘alav, yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
w1m 8l hmSkb hw1 1w 8l hkly 1Sr hw1 ySbt 8lyw bng8w bw yTm1 8d h8rb and if it be on her bed, or on any thing whereon she sitteth, when he toucheth it, he be stained-ceased until the even. ve’im ‘al hamishkab hu ’o ‘al hakeli ’asher hi yoshebet benage‘o yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
w1m Skb ySkb 1yS 1th wthy ndth 8lyw wTm1 Sb8t ymym wkl hmSkb 1Sr ySkb 8lyw yTm1 and if any man lie with her at all, and her flowers be upon him, he be stained-ceased seven days; and all the bed whereon he lieth be stained-ceased. ve’im shakhob yishkab ’ish ’otah utehi nidatah ‘alav vetamei shib‘at yamim, vekhal hamishkab ’asher yishkab yitma.
w1Sh ky yzwb zwb dmh ymym rbym bl1 8t ndth 1w ky tzwb 8l ndth kl ymy zwb Tm1th kymy ndth thyh Tm1h hw1 and if a woman have an issue of her blood many days out of the time of her separation, or if it run beyond the time of her separation; all the days of the issue of her stained-ceasedness be as the days of her separation: she be stained-ceased. ve’ishah ki yazub zob damah yamim rabim belo ‘et nidatah ’o khi tazub ‘al nidatah, kal yemei zob tum’atah kimei nidatah tihyeh teme’ah hi
kl hmSkb 1Sr tSkb 8lyw kl ymy zwbh kmSkb ndth yhyh lh wkl hkly 1Sr tSb 8lyw Tm1 yhyh kTm1t ndth every bed whereon she lieth all the days of her issue be unto her as the bed of her separation: and whatsoever she sitteth upon be stained-ceased, as the stained-ceasedness of her separation. kal hamishkab ’asher tishkab kal yemei zobah kemishkab nidatah yihyeh lah, vekhal hakeli ’asher tesheb ‘alav tamei yihyeh ketum’at nidatah.
wkl hnwg8 bm yTm1 wkbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and whosoever toucheth those things be stained-ceased, and wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vekhal hanogea‘ bam yitma, vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
w1m Thrh mzwbh wsprh lh Sb8t ymym w1Hr tThr and if she be bright-climaxingsed of her issue, then she number to herself seven days, and after that she be bright-climaxing. ve’im taharah mizobah, vesaferah lah shib‘at yamim ve’akhar tithar.
wbywm hSmyny tqH lh Sty trym 1w Sny bny ywnh whby1h 1wtm 1l hkhn 1l ptH 1hl mw8d and on the eighth day she take unto her two turtles, or two child-betweens of pigeons, and bring them unto the dimmer-server, to the opening of the tent of until-conception. ubayom hashemini tiqakh lah shetei torim ’o shenei benei yonah, vehebi’ah ’otam ’el hakohen ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
w8Sh hkhn 1t h1Hd HT1t w1t h1Hd 8lh wkpr 8lyh hkhn lpny yhwh mzwb Tm1th and the dimmer-server inward the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up; and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for her before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for the issue of her stained-ceasedness. ve‘asah hakohen ha’ekhad khatat ve’et ha’ekhad ‘olah, vekhiper ‘aleha hakohen lifnei yhvh mizob tum’atah.
whzrtm 1t bny ySr1l mTm1tm wl1 ymtw bTm1tm bTm1m 1t mSkny 1Sr btwkm thus ye separate children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from their stained-ceasedness; that they die not in their stained-ceasedness, when they cease my dwelling that is among them. vehizartem bene yisra’el mitum’atam, velo yamutu betum’atam betame’am mishkani ’asher betokham.
z1t twrt hzb w1Sr tZ1 mmnw Skbt zr8 lTm1h bh this is the teaching of him that hath an issue, and of him whose seed goeth from him, and is ceased therewith; zot torat hazab, va’asher tezei mimenu shikhbat zera‘ letame’ah bah.
whdwh bndth whzb 1t zwbw lzkr wlnqbh wl1yS 1Sr ySkb 8m Tm1h and of her that is sick of her flowers, and of him that hath an issue, of the man, and of the woman, and of him that lieth with her that is stained-ceased. vehadavah benidatah vehazab zobo lazakhar velaneqebah, ule’ish ’asher yishkab ‘im teme’ah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh 1Hry mwt Sny bny 1hrn bqrbtm lpny yhwh wymtw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose after the death of the two children-betweens of cabinet-aaron, when they inwarded before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and died; vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ’akharei mot shenei benei ’aharon, beqarebatam lifne yhvh vayamutu.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh dbr 1l 1hrn 1Hyk w1l yb1 bkl 8t 1l hqdS mbyt lprkt 1l pny hkprt 1Sr 8l h1rn wl1 ymwt ky b8nn 1r1h 8l hkprt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, speak unto cabinet-aaron thy brother, that he come not at all times into the dedicated-finished place within the breaker before-turns the out-of-townment, which is upon the cabinet; that he die not: for i will appear in the cloud upon the out-of-townment. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh daber ’el ’aharon ’akhikha ve’al yabo bekhal ‘et ’el haqodesh mibet laparokhet, ’el penei hakaporet ’asher ‘al ha’aron velo yamut ki be‘anan ’era’eh ‘al hakaporet.
bz1t yb1 1hrn 1l hqdS bpr bn bqr lHT1t w1yl l8lh thus cabinet-aaron come into the dedicated-finished place: with a bull child-between of visit-cattle for a miss, and a voiceless-ram for a on-up. bezot yabo ’aharon ’el haqodesh, befar baqar lekhatat ve’ayil le‘olah.
ktnt bd qdS ylbS wmknsy bd yhyw 8l bSrw wb1bnT bd yHgr wbmZnpt bd yZnp bgdy qdS hm wrHZ bmym 1t bSrw wlbSm he put on the dedicated-finished linen you-wrote-coat, and he have the linen trousers upon his flesh, and be girded with a linen girdle, and with the linen branch-bonnet he be attired: these are dedicated-finished garments; therefore he wash his flesh in from-waters, and so put them on. ketonet bad qodesh yilbash umikhnese bad yihyu ‘al besaro ube’abnet bad yakhgor ubemiznefet bad yiznof, bigde qodesh hem verakhaz bamayim besaro ulebesham.
wm1t 8dt bny ySr1l yqH Sny S8yry 8zym lHT1t w1yl 1Hd l8lh and he take of the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel two kids of the intense-goats for a miss, and one voiceless-ram for a on-up. ume’et ‘adat benei yisra’el yiqakh shene se‘irei ‘izim lekhatat, ve’ayil ’ekhad le‘olah.
whqryb 1hrn 1t pr hHT1t 1Sr lw wkpr b8dw wb8d bytw and cabinet-aaron inward his bull of the miss, which is for himself, and make an out-of-town-ment for himself, and for his daughter-house. vehiqrib ’aharon par hakhatat ’asher lo, vekhiper ba‘ado ube‘ad beto.
wlqH 1t Sny hS8yrm wh8myd 1tm lpny yhwh ptH 1hl mw8d and he take the two intense-goats, and present them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou at the opening of the tent of until-conception. velaqakh shenei hase‘irim, vehe‘emid ’otam lifnei yhvh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wntn 1hrn 8l Sny hS8yrm gwrlwt gwrl 1Hd lyhwh wgwrl 1Hd l8z1zl and cabinet-aaron cast cover-lots upon the two intense-goats; one cover-lot for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and the other cover-lot for the out-outof-azazel. venatan ’aharon ‘al shenei hase‘irim goralot, goral ’ekhad yhvh vegoral ’ekhad la‘azazel.
whqryb 1hrn 1t hS8yr 1Sr 8lh 8lyw hgwrl lyhwh w8Shw HT1t and cabinet-aaron bring the intense-goat upon which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's cover-lot fell, and inward him for a miss. vehiqrib ’aharon hasa‘ir ’asher ‘alah ‘alav hagoral yhvh, ve‘asahu khatat.
whS8yr 1Sr 8lh 8lyw hgwrl l8z1zl y8md Hy lpny yhwh lkpr 8lyw lSlH 1tw l8z1zl hmdbrh and the intense-goat, on which the cover-lot fell to be the out-outof-azazel, be presented alive before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to make an out-of-town-ment with him, and to let him go for a out-outof-azazel into the place-of-word-desert. vehasa‘ir ’asher ‘alah ‘alav hagoral la‘azazel ya‘omad khay lifnei yhvh lekhaper ‘alav, leshalakh la‘azazel hamidbarah.
whqryb 1hrn 1t pr hHT1t 1Sr lw wkpr b8dw wb8d bytw wSHT 1t pr hHT1t 1Sr lw and cabinet-aaron bring the bull of the miss, which is for himself, and make an out-of-town-ment for himself, and for his daughter-house, and kill the bull of the miss which is for himself: vehiqrib ’aharon par hakhatat ’asher lo vekhiper ba‘ado ube‘ad beto, veshakhat par hakhatat ’asher lo.
wlqH ml1 hmHth gHly 1S m8l hmzbH mlpny yhwh wml1 Hpnyw qTrt smym dqh whby1 mbyt lprkt and he take a censer full of burning coals of fire from off the butcher-kitchen before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and his hands full of smoke drug beaten small, and bring it within the breaker: velaqakh melo hamakhtah gakhale ’esh me‘al hamizbeakh milifnei yhvh umelo khafenav qetoret samim daqah, vehebi mibet laparokhet.
wntn 1t hqTrt 8l h1S lpny yhwh wksh 8nn hqTrt 1t hkprt 1Sr 8l h8dwt wl1 ymwt and he put the incense upon the fire before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, that the cloud of the incense may cover the out-of-townment that is upon the until-witness, that he die not: venatan haqetoret ‘al ha’esh lifnei yhvh, vekhisah ‘anan haqetoret hakaporet ’asher ‘al ha‘edut velo yamut.
wlqH mdm hpr whzh b1Zb8w 8l pny hkprt qdmh wlpny hkprt yzh Sb8 p8mym mn hdm b1Zb8w and he take of the blood of the bull, and sprinkle it with his finger upon the out-of-townment eastward; and before-turns the out-of-townment he sprinkle of the blood with his finger seven times. velaqakh midam hapar vehizah be’ezba‘o ‘al penei hakaporet qedemah, velifnei hakaporet yazeh sheba‘ pe‘amim min hadam be’ezba‘o.
wSHT 1t S8yr hHT1t 1Sr l8m whby1 1t dmw 1l mbyt lprkt w8Sh 1t dmw k1Sr 8Sh ldm hpr whzh 1tw 8l hkprt wlpny hkprt then he kill the intense-goat of the miss, that is for the with-mum-people, and bring his blood within the breaker, and do with that blood as he did with the blood of the bull, and sprinkle it upon the out-of-townment, and before-turns the out-of-townment: veshakhat se‘ir hakhatat ’asher la‘am vehebi damo ’el mibet laparokhet, ve‘asah ’et damo ka’asher ‘asah ledam hapar vehizah ’oto ‘al hakaporet velifnei hakaporet.
wkpr 8l hqdS mTm1t bny ySr1l wmpS8yhm lkl HT1tm wkn y8Sh l1hl mw8d hSkn 1tm btwk Tm1tm and he make an out-of-town-ment for the dedicated-finished place, because of the stained-ceasedness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and because of their crimes in all their misses: and so he do for the tent of until-conception, that remaineth among them in the midst of their stained-ceasedness. vekhiper ‘al haqodesh mitum’ot benei yisra’el umipish‘ehem lekhal khatotam, vekhen ya‘aseh le’ohel mo‘ed hashokhen ’itam betokh tum’otam.
wkl 1dm l1 yhyh b1hl mw8d bb1w lkpr bqdS 8d Z1tw wkpr b8dw wb8d bytw wb8d kl qhl ySr1l and there be no man in the tent of until-conception when he goeth in to make an out-of-town-ment in the dedicated-finished place, until he come out, and have made an out-of-town-ment for himself, and for his daughter-household, and for all the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel. vekhal ’adam lo yihyeh be’ohel mo‘ed bebo’o lekhaper baqodesh ‘ad zeto, vekhiper ba‘ado ube‘ad beto ube‘ad kal qehal yisra’el.
wyZ1 1l hmzbH 1Sr lpny yhwh wkpr 8lyw wlqH mdm hpr wmdm hS8yr wntn 8l qrnwt hmzbH sbyb and he go out unto the butcher-kitchen that is before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and make an out-of-town-ment for it; and take of the blood of the bull, and of the blood of the intense-goat, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen round about. veyaza ’el hamizbeakh ’asher lifne yhvh vekhiper ‘alav, velaqakh midam hapar umidam hasa‘ir venatan ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh sabib.
whzh 8lyw mn hdm b1Zb8w Sb8 p8mym wThrw wqdSw mTm1t bny ySr1l and he sprinkle of the blood upon it with his finger seven times, and bright-climaxingse it, and dedicate-finify it from the stained-ceasedness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vehizah ‘alav min hadam be’ezba‘o sheba‘ pe‘amim, vetiharo veqidesho mitum’ot benei yisra’el.
wklh mkpr 1t hqdS w1t 1hl mw8d w1t hmzbH whqryb 1t hS8yr hHy and when he hath made an end of out-of-towning the dedicated-finished place, and the tent of until-conception, and the butcher-kitchen, he inward the live intense-goat: vekhilah mikaper haqodesh ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et hamizbeakh, vehiqrib hasa‘ir hekhay.
wsmk 1hrn 1t Sty ydw ydyw 8l r1S hS8yr hHy whtwdh 8lyw 1t kl 8wnt bny ySr1l w1t kl pS8yhm lkl HT1tm wntn 1tm 8l r1S hS8yr wSlH byd 1yS 8ty hmdbrh and cabinet-aaron lay both his hands upon the head of the live intense-goat, and confess over him all the seasons of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and all their crimes in all their misses, putting them upon the head of the intense-goat, and send him away by the hand of a fit man into the place-of-word-desert: vesamakh ’aharon shetei yado yadav ‘al rosh hasa‘ir hakhay vehitvadah ‘alav kal ‘avonot benei yisra’el ve’et kal pish‘ehem lekhal khatotam, venatan ’otam ‘al rosh hasa‘ir veshilakh beyad ’ish ‘iti hamidbarah.
wnS1 hS8yr 8lyw 1t kl 8wntm 1l 1rZ gzrh wSlH 1t hS8yr bmdbr and the intense-goat bear upon him all their seasons unto cut-off land: and he send the intense-goat in the place-of-word-desert. venasa hasa‘ir ‘alav kal ‘avonotam ’el ’erez gezerah, veshilakh hasa‘ir bamidbar.
wb1 1hrn 1l 1hl mw8d wpST 1t bgdy hbd 1Sr lbS bb1w 1l hqdS whnyHm Sm and cabinet-aaron come into the tent of until-conception, and put off the linen garments, which he put on when he went into the dedicated-finished place, and leave them there: uba ’aharon ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ufashat bigdei habad ’asher labash bebo’o ’el haqodesh, vehinikham sham.
wrHZ 1t bSrw bmym bmqwm qdwS wlbS 1t bgdyw wyZ1 w8Sh 1t 8ltw w1t 8lt h8m wkpr b8dw wb8d h8m and he wash his flesh with from-waters in the dedicated-finished place, and put on his garments, and come forth, and inward his on-up, and the on-up of the with-mum-people, and make an out-of-town-ment for himself, and for the with-mum-people. verakhaz besaro bamayim bemaqom qadosh velabash begadav, veyaza ve‘asah ‘olato ve’et ‘olat ha‘am vekhiper ba‘ado ube‘ad ha‘am.
w1t Hlb hHT1t yqTyr hmzbHh and the fat of the miss he burn upon the butcher-kitchen. ve’et kheleb hakhatat yaqtir hamizbekhah.
whmSlH 1t hS8yr l8z1zl ykbs bgdyw wrHZ 1t bSrw bmym w1Hry kn ybw1 1l hmHnh and he that send the intense-goat for the out-outof-azazel wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in from-waters, and afterward come into the camp. vehamshaleakh hasa‘ir la‘azazel yekhabes begadav verakhaz besaro bamayim, ve’akhare khen yabo ’el hamakhaneh.
w1t pr hHT1t w1t S8yr hHT1t 1Sr hwb1 1t dmm lkpr bqdS ywZy1 1l mHwZ lmHnh wSrpw b1S 1t 8rtm w1t bSrm w1t prSm and the bull for the miss, and the intense-goat for the miss, whose blood was brought in to make out-of-town-ment in the dedicated-finished place, one carry forth without the camp; and they burn in the fire their light-skins, and their flesh, and their dung. ve’et par hakhatat ve’et se‘ir hakhatat ’asher huba damam lekhaper baqodesh yozi mikhuz lamakhaneh, vesarefu ba’esh ‘orotam ve’et besaram ve’et pirsham.
whSrp 1tm ykbs bgdyw wrHZ 1t bSrw bmym w1Hry kn ybw1 1l hmHnh and he that burneth them wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in from-waters, and afterward he come into the camp. vehasoref ’otam yekhabes begadav verakhaz besaro bamayim, ve’akhare khen yabo ’el hamakhaneh.
whyth lkm lHqt 8wlm bHdS hSby8y b8Swr lHdS t8nw 1t npStykm wkl ml1kh l1 t8Sw h1zrH whgr hgr btwkkm and this be a statute for ever unto you: that in the seventh month, on the tenth day of the month, ye pauper your beings, and do no work at all, whether it be one of your own country, or a stranger that sojourneth among you: vehayetah lakhem lekhuqat ‘olam, bakhodesh hashebi‘i be‘asor lakhodesh te‘anu nafshotekhem vekhal melakhah lo ta‘asu ha’ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem.
ky bywm hzh ykpr 8lykm lThr 1tkm mkl HT1tykm lpny yhwh tThrw for on that day the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for you, to bright-climaxingse you, that ye may be bright-climaxing from all your misses before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ki bayom hazeh yekhaper ‘alekhem letaher ’etkhem, mikol khatotekhem lifnei yhvh titharu.
Sbt Sbtwn hy1 lkm w8nytm 1t npStykm Hqt 8wlm it be a seven-sabbath of rest unto you, and ye pauper your beings, by a statute for ever. shabat shabaton hi lakhem ve‘initem nafshotekhem, khuqat ‘olam.
wkpr hkhn 1Sr ymSH 1tw w1Sr yml1 1t ydw lkhn tHt 1byw wlbS 1t bgdy hbd bgdy hqdS and the dimmer-server, whom he lube, and whom he fill to dimmer-server in his father's stead, make the out-of-town-ment, and put on the linen clothes, even the dedicated-finished garments: vekhiper hakohen ’asher yimshakh va’asher yemalei yado lekhahen takhat ’abiv, velabash bigdei habad bigdei haqodesh.
wkpr 1t mqdS hqdS w1t 1hl mw8d w1t hmzbH ykpr w8l hkhnym w8l kl 8m hqhl ykpr and he make an out-of-town-ment for the dedicated-finished dedicated, and he make an out-of-town-ment for the tent of until-conception, and for the butcher-kitchen, and he make an out-of-town-ment for the dimmer-servers, and for all the with-mum-people of the until-witness. vekhiper ’et miqdash haqodesh ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et hamizbeakh yekhaper, ve‘al hakohanim ve‘al kal ‘am haqahal yekhaper.
whyth z1t lkm lHqt 8wlm lkpr 8l bny ySr1l mkl HT1tm 1Ht bSnh wy8S k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and this be an everlasting statute unto you, to make an out-of-town-ment for children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel for all their misses once a year. and he did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vehayetah zot lakhem lekhuqat ‘olam lekhaper ‘al benei yisra’el mikal khatotam ’akhat bashanah, vaya‘as ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l 1hrn w1l bnyw w1l kl bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lyhm zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh l1mr speak unto cabinet-aaron, and unto his children-betweens, and unto all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them; this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed, saying, daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav ve’el kal benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh lemor.
1yS 1yS mbyt ySr1l 1Sr ySHT Swr 1w kSb 1w 8z bmHnh 1w 1Sr ySHT mHwZ lmHnh what man soever there be of the daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel, that killeth an wall-ox, or lamb, or intense-goat, in the camp, or that killeth it out of the camp, ’ish mibet yisra’el ’asher yishkhat shor ’o kheseb ’o ‘ez bamakhaneh, ’o ’asher yishkhat mikhuz lamakhaneh.
w1l ptH 1hl mw8d l1 hby1w lhqryb qrbn lyhwh lpny mSkn yhwh dm yHSb l1yS hhw1 dm Spk wnkrt h1yS hhw1 mqrb 8mw and bringeth it not unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, to inward an inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou before-turns the dwelling of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; blood be imputed unto that man; he hath shed blood; and that man be cut off from his with-mum-people: ve’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo hebi’o lehaqrib qarban yhvh lifnei mishkan yhvh, dam yekhasheb la’ish hahu dam shafakh venikhrat ha’ish hahu miqereb ‘amo.
lm8n 1Sr yby1w bny ySr1l 1t zbHyhm 1Sr hm zbHym 8l pny hSdh whby1m lyhwh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d 1l hkhn wzbHw zbHy Slmym lyhwh 1wtm to the end that children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel may bring their butchers, which they inward in the open field, even that they may bring them unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, unto the dimmer-server, and inward them for wholes unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. lema‘an ’asher yabi’u benei yisra’el zibkhehem ’asher hem zobekhim ‘al penei hasadeh vehebi’um yhvh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed ’el hakohen, vezabekhu zibkhei shelamim yhvh ’otam.
wzrq hkhn 1t hdm 8l mzbH yhwh ptH 1hl mw8d whqTyr hHlb lryH nyHH lyhwh and the dimmer-server sprinkle the blood upon the butcher-kitchen of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou at the opening of the tent of until-conception, and burn the fat for a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vezaraq hakohen hadam ‘al mizbakh yhvh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, vehiqtir hakheleb lereakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wl1 yzbHw 8wd 1t zbHyhm lS8yrm 1Sr hm znym 1Hryhm Hqt 8wlm thyh z1t lhm ldrtm and they no more inward their butchers unto devils, after whom they have gone a whoring. this be a statute for ever unto them throughout their generations. velo yizbekhu ‘od zibkhehem lase‘irim ’asher hem zonim ’akharehem, khuqat ‘olam tihyeh zot lahem ledorotam.
w1lhm t1mr 1yS 1yS mbyt ySr1l wmn hgr 1Sr ygwr btwkm 1Sr y8lh 8lh 1w zbH and thou say unto them, whatsoever man there be of the daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel, or of the strangers which sojourn among you, that inwardeth a on-up or butcher, va’alehem tomar ’ish mibet yisra’el umin hager ’asher yagur betokham, ’asher ya‘aleh ‘olah ’o zabakh.
w1l ptH 1hl mw8d l1 yby1nw l8Swt 1tw lyhwh wnkrt h1yS hhw1 m8myw and bringeth it not unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, to inward it unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; even that man be cut off from his with-mum-people. ve’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo yebi’enu la‘asot ’oto yhvh, venikhrat ha’ish hahu me‘amav.
w1yS 1yS mbyt ySr1l wmn hgr hgr btwkm 1Sr y1kl kl dm wntty pny bnpS h1klt 1t hdm whkrty 1th mqrb 8mh and whatsoever man there be of the daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel, or of the strangers that sojourn among you, that eateth any manner of blood; i will even set my face-turns against that being that eateth blood, and will cut him off from inward his with-mum-people. ve’ish ’ish mibet yisra’el umin hager hagar betokham ’asher yokhal kal dam, venatati fanay banefesh ha’okhelet hadam vehikhrati miqereb ‘amah.
ky npS hbSr bdm hw1 w1ny nttyw lkm 8l hmzbH lkpr 8l npStykm ky hdm hw1 bnpS ykpr for the life of the flesh is in the blood: and i have given it to you upon the butcher-kitchen to make an out-of-town-ment for your beings: for it is the blood that maketh an out-of-town-ment for the being. ki nefesh habasar badam hi va’ani netativ lakhem ‘al hamizbeakh lekhaper ‘al nafshotekhem, ki hadam hu banefesh yekhaper.
8l kn 1mrty lbny ySr1l kl npS mkm l1 t1kl dm whgr hgr btwkkm l1 y1kl dm therefore i said unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, no being of you eat blood, neither any stranger that sojourneth among you eat blood. ‘al ken ’amarti libnei yisra’el kal nefesh mikem lo tokhal dam, vehager hagar betokhkhem lo yokhal dam.
w1yS 1yS mbny ySr1l wmn hgr hgr btwkm 1Sr yZwd Zyd Hyh 1w 8wp 1Sr y1kl wSpk 1t dmw wkshw b8pr and whatsoever man there be of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, or of the strangers that sojourn among you, which hunteth and catcheth any beast or fowl that may be eaten; he even pour out the blood thereof, and cover it with dust. ve’ish ’ish mibenei yisra’el umin hager hagar betokham ’asher yazud zed khayah ’o ‘of ’asher ye’akhel, veshafakh damo vekhisahu be‘afar.
ky npS kl bSr dmw bnpSw hw1 w1mr lbny ySr1l dm kl bSr l1 t1klw ky npS kl bSr dmw hw1 kl 1klyw ykrt for it is the life of all flesh; the blood of it is for the life thereof: therefore i said unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, ye eat the blood of no manner of flesh: for the life of all flesh is the blood thereof: whosoever eateth it be cut off. ki nefesh kal basar damo benafsho hu va’omar libnei yisra’el dam kal basar lo tokhelu, ki nefesh kal basar damo hi kal ’okhelav yikaret.
wkl npS 1Sr t1kl nblh wTrph b1zrH wbgr wkbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wTm1 8d h8rb wThr and every being that eateth that which died of itself, or that which was torn with beasts, whether it be one of your own country, or a stranger, he both wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even: then he be bright-climaxing. vekhal nefesh ’asher tokhal nebelah uterefah ba’ezrakh ubager, vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘ereb vetaher.
w1m l1 ykbs wbSrw l1 yrHZ wnS1 8wnw and if he wash them not, nor bathe his flesh; then he bear his torment. ve’im lo yekhabes ubesaro yirkhaz, venasa ‘avono.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
km8Sh 1rZ mZrym 1Sr ySbtm bh l1 t8Sw wkm8Sh 1rZ kn8n 1Sr 1ny mby1 1tkm Smh l1 t8Sw wbHqtyhm l1 tlkw after the doings of the land of narrows-mizraim, wherein ye dwelt, ye not do: and after the doings of the land of mobile-trade-canaan, whither i bring you, ye not do: neither ye walk in their ordinances. kema‘aseh ’erez mizrayim ’asher yeshabtem bah lo ta‘asu, ukhema‘aseh ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani mebi ’etkhem lo ta‘asu ubekhuqotehem lo telekhu.
1t mSpTy t8Sw w1t Hqty tSmrw llkt bhm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm ye do my decision-grammars, and keep mine ordinances, to walk therein: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. mishpatay ta‘asu ve’et khuqotay tishmeru lalekhet bahem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wSmrtm 1t Hqty w1t mSpTy 1Sr y8Sh 1tm h1dm wHy bhm 1ny yhwh ye therefore keep my statutes, and my decision-grammars: which if a man do, he live in them: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ushemartem khuqotay ve’et mishpatay ’asher ya‘aseh. ha’adam vakhay bahem, ’ani yhvh.
1yS 1yS 1l kl S1r bSrw l1 tqrbw lglwt 8rwh 1ny yhwh none of you approach to any that is near of kin to him, to uncover their nakedness: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’ish ’ish ’el kal she’er besaro lo tiqrebu legalot ‘ervah, ’ani yhvh.
8rwt 1byk w8rwt 1mk l1 tglh 1mk hw1 l1 tglh 8rwth the nakedness of thy father, or the nakedness of thy mother, thou not uncover: she is thy mother; no uncover her nakedness. ‘ervat ’abikha ve‘ervat ’imekha lo tegaleh, ’imekha hi lo tegaleh ‘ervatah.
8rwt 1St 1byk l1 tglh 8rwt 1byk hw1 the nakedness of thy father's woman thou not uncover: it is thy father's nakedness. ‘ervat ’eshet ’abikha lo tegaleh, ‘ervat ’abikha hi
8rwt 1Hwtk bt 1byk 1w bt 1mk mwldt byt 1w mwldt HwZ l1 tglh 8rwtn the nakedness of thy sister, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of thy father, or daughter-hoof-bat-child of thy mother, whether she be born at home, or born abroad, even their nakedness no uncover. ‘ervat ’akhotkha bat ’abikha ’o bat ’imekha moledet bayit ’o moledet khuz, lo tegaleh ‘ervatan.
8rwt bt bnk 1w bt btk l1 tglh 8rwtn ky 8rwtk hnh the nakedness of thy child-between's daughter-hoof-bat-child, or of thy daughter-hoof-bat-child's daughter-hoof-bat-child, even their nakedness no uncover: for theirs is thine own nakedness. ‘ervat bat binkha ’o bat bitekha lo tegaleh ‘ervatan, ki ‘ervatekha henah.
8rwt bt 1St 1byk mwldt 1byk 1Hwtk hw1 l1 tglh 8rwth the nakedness of thy father's woman's daughter-hoof-bat-child, begotten of thy father, she is thy sister, no uncover her nakedness. ‘ervat bat ’eshet ’abikha moledet ’abikha ’akhotkha hi lo tegaleh ‘ervatah.
8rwt 1Hwt 1byk l1 tglh S1r 1byk hw1 no uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman. ‘ervat ’akhot ’abikha lo tegaleh, she’er ’abikha hi
8rwt 1Hwt 1mk l1 tglh ky S1r 1mk hw1 no uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister: for she is thy mother's near kinswoman. ‘ervat ’akhot ’imekha lo tegaleh, ki she’er ’imekha hi
8rwt 1Hy 1byk l1 tglh 1l 1Stw l1 tqrb ddtk hw1 no uncover the nakedness of thy father's brother, no approach to his woman: she is thine aunt. ‘ervat ’akhi ’abikha lo tegaleh, ’el ’ishto lo tiqrab dodatekha hi
8rwt kltk l1 tglh 1St bnk hw1 l1 tglh 8rwth no uncover the nakedness of thy daughter-hoof-bat-child in teaching: she is thy child-between's woman; no uncover her nakedness. ‘ervat kalatekha lo tegaleh, ’eshet binkha hi lo tegaleh ‘ervatah.
8rwt 1St 1Hyk l1 tglh 8rwt 1Hyk hw1 no uncover the nakedness of thy brother's woman: it is thy brother's nakedness. ‘ervat ’eshet ’akhikha lo tegaleh, ‘ervat ’akhikha hi
8rwt 1Sh wbth l1 tglh 1t bt bnh w1t bt bth l1 tqH lglwt 8rwth S1rh hnh zmh hw1 no uncover the nakedness of a woman and her daughter-hoof-bat-child, neither thou take her child-between's daughter-hoof-bat-child, or her daughter-hoof-bat-child's daughter-hoof-bat-child, to uncover her nakedness; for they are her near kinswomen: it is wickedness. ‘ervat ’ishah ubitah lo tegaleh, ’et bat benah ve’et bat bitah lo tiqakh legalot ‘ervatah sha’arah henah zimah hi
w1Sh 1l 1Hth l1 tqH lZrr lglwt 8rwth 8lyh bHyyh neither thou take a woman to her sister, to vex her, to uncover her nakedness, beside the other in her life time. ve’ishah ’el ’akhotah lo tiqakh, lizror legalot ‘ervatah bekhayeha.
w1l 1Sh bndt Tm1th l1 tqrb lglwt 8rwth also no approach unto a woman to uncover her nakedness, as long as she is put apart for her stained-ceasedness. ve’el ’ishah benidat tum’atah, lo tiqrab legalot ‘ervatah.
w1l 1St 8mytk l1 ttn Skbtk lzr8 lTm1h bh moreover no lie carnally with thy neighbor's woman, to cease thyself with her. ve’el ’eshet ‘amitekha lo titen shekhabetekha lezara‘, letame’ah bah.
wmzr8k l1 ttn lh8byr lmlk wl1 tHll 1t Sm 1lhyk 1ny yhwh and no let any of thy seed pass through the fire to moloch-king-molech, neither thou profane the name of thy towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. umizar‘akha lo titen leha‘abir lamolekh, velo tekhalel shem ’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
w1t zkr l1 tSkb mSkby 1Sh tw8bh hw1 no lie with mankind, as with womankind: it is abomination. ve’et zakhar lo tishkab mishkebei ’ishah, to‘ebah hi
wbkl bhmh l1 ttn Skbtk lTm1h bh w1Sh l1 t8md lpny bhmh lrb8h tbl hw1 neither thou lie with any beast to cease thyself therewith: neither any woman stand before-turns a beast to lie down thereto: it is confusion. ubekhal behemah lo titen shekhabetekha letame’ah bah, ve’ishah lo ta‘amod lifnei behemah lerib‘ah tebel hu.
1l tTm1w bkl 1lh ky bkl 1lh nTm1w hgwym 1Sr 1ny mSlH mpnykm cease not ye yourselves in any of these things: for in all these the nations are ceased which i cast out before-turns you: ’al titame’u bekhal ’eleh, ki bekhal ’eleh nitme’u hagoyim ’asher ’ani meshaleakh mipenekhem.
wtTm1 h1rZ w1pqd 8wnh 8lyh wtq1 h1rZ 1t ySbyh and the land is ceased: therefore i do visit the torment thereof upon it, and the land itself vomiteth out her inhabitants. vatitma ha’arez va’efqod ‘avonah ‘aleha, vataqi ha’arez yoshebeha.
wSmrtm 1tm 1t Hqty w1t mSpTy wl1 t8Sw mkl htw8bt h1lh h1zrH whgr hgr btwkkm ye therefore keep my statutes and my decision-grammars, and not commit any of these abominations; neither any of your own nation, nor any stranger that sojourneth among you: ushemartem ’atem khuqotay ve’et mishpatay velo ta‘asu mikol hato‘ebot ha’eleh, ha’ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem.
ky 1t kl htw8bt h1l 8Sw 1nSy h1rZ 1Sr lpnykm wtTm1 h1rZ (for all these abominations have the men of the land done, which were before-turns you, and the land is ceased;) ki kal hato‘ebot ha’el ‘asu ’anshe ha’arez ’asher lifnekhem, vatitma ha’arez.
wl1 tqy1 h1rZ 1tkm bTm1km 1th k1Sr q1h 1t hgwy 1Sr lpnykm that the land spue not you out also, when ye cease it, as it spued out the nations that were before-turns you. velo taqi ha’arez betama’akhem ka’asher qa’ah hago ’asher lifnekhem.
ky kl 1Sr y8Sh mkl htw8bwt h1lh wnkrtw hnpSwt h8St mqrb 8mm for whosoever commit any of these abominations, even the beings that commit them be cut off from inward their with-mum-people. ki kal ’asher ya‘aseh mikol hato‘ebot ha’eleh, venikhretu hanefashot ha‘osot miqereb ‘amam.
wSmrtm 1t mSmrty lblty 8Swt mHqwt htw8bt 1Sr n8Sw lpnykm wl1 tTm1w bhm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm therefore ye keep mine ordinance, that ye commit not any one of these abominable customs, which were committed before-turns you, and that ye cease not yourselves therein: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ushemartem mishmarti lebilti ‘asot mekhuqot hato‘ebot ’asher na‘asu lifnekhem velo titame’u bahem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor
dbr 1l kl 8dt bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm qdSym thyw ky qdwS 1ny yhwh 1lhykm speak unto all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, ye be dedicated-finished: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim am dedicated-finished. daber ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem qedoshim tihyu, ki qadosh ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
1yS 1mw w1byw tyr1w w1t Sbtty tSmrw 1ny yhwh 1lhykm ye fear every man his mother, and his father, and keep my seven-sabbaths: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ’ish ’imo ve’abiv tira’u ve’et shabetotay tishmoru, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
1l tpnw 1l h1lylym w1lhy mskh l1 t8Sw lkm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm turn ye not unto idols, nor make to yourselves molten towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ’al tifnu ’el ha’elilim velohei masekhah lo ta‘asu lakhem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wky tzbHw zbH Slmym lyhwh lrZnkm tzbHhw and if ye inward a butcher of wholes unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, ye inward it at your own will. vekhi tizbekhu zebakh shelamim yhvh, lirzonekhem tizbakhuhu.
bywm zbHkm y1kl wmmHrt whnwtr 8d ywm hSlySy b1S ySrp it be eaten the same day ye inward it, and on the morrow: and if ought remain until the third day, it be burnt in the fire. beyom zibkhakhem ye’akhel umimakhorat, vehanotar ‘ad yom hashelishi ba’esh yisaref.
w1m h1kl y1kl bywm hSlySy pgwl hw1 l1 yrZh and if it be eaten at all on the third day, it is abominable; it not be accepted. ve’im he’akhol ye’akhel bayom hashelishi, pigul hu lo yerazeh.
w1klyw 8wnw yS1 ky 1t qdS yhwh Hll wnkrth hnpS hhw1 m8myh therefore every one that eateth it bear his torment, because he hath profaned the dedicateed thing of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. ve’okhelav ‘avono yisa ki qodesh yhvh khilel, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha.
wbqZrkm 1t qZyr 1rZkm l1 tklh p1t Sdk lqZr wlqT qZyrk l1 tlqT and when ye reap the harvest of your land, no wholly reap the corners of thy field, neither thou gather the gleanings of thy harvest. ubequzrekhem qezir ’arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe’at sadekha veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet.
wkrmk l1 t8wll wprT krmk l1 tlqT l8ny wlgr t8zb 1tm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm and no glean thy vineyard, neither thou gather every grape of thy vineyard; thou leave them for the poor and stranger: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. vekharmekha lo te‘olel uferet karmekha lo telaqet, le‘ani velager ta‘azob ’otam ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
l1 tgnbw wl1 tkHSw wl1 tSqrw 1yS b8mytw ye not steal, neither deal falsely, neither lie one to another. lo tignobu, velo tekhakhashu velo teshaqeru ’ish ba‘amito.
wl1 tSb8w bSmy lSqr wHllt 1t Sm 1lhyk 1ny yhwh and ye not swear by my name falsely, neither thou profane the name of thy towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. velo tishabe‘u bishmi lashaqer, vekhilalta shem ’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
l1 t8Sq 1t r8k wl1 tgzl l1 tlyn p8lt Skyr 1tk 8d bqr no defraud thy neighbor, neither rob him: the wages of him that is hired not abide with thee all night until the morning. lo ta‘ashoq re‘akha velo tigzol, lo talin pe‘ulat sakhir ’itekha ‘ad boqer.
l1 tqll HrS wlpny 8wr l1 ttn mkSl wyr1t m1lhyk 1ny yhwh no curse the deaf, nor put a stumbling-block before-turns the blind, and fear thy towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. lo teqalel kheresh velifnei ‘iver lo titen mikhshol, veyareta me’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
l1 t8Sw 8wl bmSpT l1 tS1 pny dl wl1 thdr pny gdwl bZdq tSpT 8mytk ye do no not being right in decision-grammar: no respect the person of the poor, nor honor the person of the mighty: and in being right thou decide thy neighbor. lo ta‘asu ‘avel bamishpat lo tisa fene dal velo tehdar penei gadol, bezedeq tishpot ‘amitekha.
l1 tlk rkyl b8myk l1 t8md 8l dm r8k 1ny yhwh no go up and down as a talebearer among thy with-mum-people: neither thou stand against the blood of thy neighbor; i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. lo telekh rakhil be‘amekha lo ta‘amod ‘al dam re‘ekha, ’ani yhvh.
l1 tSn1 1t 1Hyk blbbk hwkH twkyH 1t 8mytk wl1 tS1 8lyw HT1 no hate thy brother in thine heart: thou in any wise rebuke thy neighbor, and not suffer miss upon him. lo tisna ’akhikha bilbabekha, hokheakh tokhiakh ‘amitekha velo tisa ‘alav khet.
l1 tqm wl1 tTr 1t bny 8mk w1hbt lr8k kmwk 1ny yhwh no avenge, nor bear any grudge against children-betweens of thy with-mum-people, and thou love thy neighbor as thyself: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. lo tiqom velo titor ’et benei ‘amekha ve’ahabta lere‘akha kamokha, ’ani yhvh.
1t Hqty tSmrw bhmtk l1 trby8 kl1ym Sdk l1 tzr8 kl1ym wbgd kl1ym S8Tnz l1 y8lh 8lyk ye keep my statutes. no let thy in-them-animal gender with a diverse kind: no sow thy field with mingled seed: neither a garment mingled of linen and woolen come upon thee. khuqotay tishmoru behemtekha lo tarbia‘ kil’ayim sadekha lo tizra‘ kil’ayim, ubeged kil’ayim sha‘atnez lo ya‘aleh ‘alekha.
w1yS ky ySkb 1t 1Sh Skbt zr8 whw1 SpHh nHrpt l1yS whpdh l1 npdth 1w HpSh l1 ntn lh bqrt thyh l1 ywmtw ky l1 HpSh and whosoever lieth carnally with a woman, that is a bondmaid, betrothed to an man, and not at all redeemed, nor freedom given her; she be scourged; they not be put to death, because she was not free. ve’ish ki yishkab ’et ’ishah shikhbat zera‘ vehiv shifkhah nekherefet le’ish vehafedeh lo nifdatah ’o khufshah lo nitan lah, biqoret tihyeh lo yumetu ki lo khupashah.
whby1 1t 1Smw lyhwh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d 1yl 1Sm and he inward his fire-name unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, even a voiceless-ram for a fire-name. vehebi ’ashamo yhvh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, ’el ’asham.
wkpr 8lyw hkhn b1yl h1Sm lpny yhwh 8l HT1tw 1Sr HT1 wnslH lw mHT1tw 1Sr HT1 and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him with the voiceless-ram of the fire-name before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for his miss which he hath done: and the miss which he hath done be released him. vekhiper ‘alav hakohen be’el ha’asham lifnei yhvh ‘al khatato ’asher khata, venislakh lo mekhatato ’asher khata.
wky tb1w 1l h1rZ wnT8tm kl 8Z m1kl w8rltm 8rltw 1t pryw SlS Snym yhyh lkm 8rlym l1 y1kl and when ye come into the land, and have planted all manner of trees for food, then ye count the fruit thereof as foreskinned: three years it be as foreskinned unto you: it not be eaten of. vekhi tabo’u ’el ha’arez uneta‘tem kal ‘ez ma’akhal va‘araltem ‘arelato piryo, shalosh shanim yihyeh lakhem ‘arelim lo ye’akhel.
wbSnh hrby8t yhyh kl pryw qdS hlwlym lyhwh and in the fourth year all the fruit thereof be dedicated-finished to praise yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou withal. ubashanah harebi‘it yihyeh kal piryo, qodesh hilulim yhvh.
wbSnh hHmySt t1klw 1t pryw lhwsyp lkm tbw1tw 1ny yhwh 1lhykm and in the fifth year ye eat of the fruit thereof, that it may yield unto you the increase thereof: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ubashanah hakhamishit tokhelu piryo lehosif lakhem tebu’ato, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
l1 t1klw 8l hdm l1 tnHSw wl1 t8wnnw ye not eat any thing with the blood: neither ye use enchantment, nor guard-observe times. lo tokhelu ‘al hadam, lo tenakhashu velo te‘onenu.
l1 tqpw p1t r1Skm wl1 tSHyt 1t p1t zqnk ye not round the corners of your heads, neither thou mar the corners of thy beard. lo taqifu pe’at roshekhem, velo tashkhit pe’at zeqanekha.
wSrT lnpS l1 ttnw bbSrkm wktbt q8q8 l1 ttnw bkm 1ny yhwh ye not make any cuttings in your flesh for the dead, nor print any marks upon you: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. veseret lanefesh lo titenu bibsarkhem ukhetobet qa‘aqa‘ lo titenu bakhem, ’ani yhvh.
1l tHll 1t btk lhznwth wl1 tznh h1rZ wml1h h1rZ zmh do not prostitute thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, to cause her to be a whore; lest the land fall to whoredom, and the land become full of wickedness. ’al tekhalel bitekha lehaznotah, velo tizneh ha’arez umale’ah ha’arez zimah.
1t Sbtty tSmrw wmqdSy tyr1w 1ny yhwh ye keep my seven-sabbaths, and reverence my dedicated-finished: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. shabetotay tishmoru umiqdashi tira’u, ’ani yhvh.
1l tpnw 1l h1bt w1l hyd8nym 1l tbqSw lTm1h bhm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm regard not them that have familiar breath-spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be ceased by them: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ’al tifnu ’el ha’obot ve’el hayide‘onim ’al tebaqshu letame’ah bahem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
mpny Sybh tqwm whdrt pny zqn wyr1t m1lhyk 1ny yhwh thou rise up before-turns the hoary head, and honor the face-turns of the old man, and fear thy towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. mipenei sebah taqum vehadarta penei zaqen, veyareta me’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
wky ygwr 1tk gr b1rZkm l1 twnw 1tw and if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land, ye not vex him. vekhi yagur ’itekha ger be’arzekhem, lo tonu ’oto.
k1zrH mkm yhyh lkm hgr hgr 1tkm w1hbt lw kmwk ky grym hyytm b1rZ mZrym 1ny yhwh 1lhykm and the stranger that dwelleth with you be unto you as one born among you, and thou love him as thyself; for ye were strangers in the land of narrows-mizraim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ke’ezrakh mikem yihyeh lakhem hager hagar ’itekhem ve’ahabta lo kamokha ki gerim heyitem be’erez mizrayim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
l1 t8Sw 8wl bmSpT bmdh bmSql wbmSwrh ye do no not being right in decision-grammar, in meteyard, in weight, or in measure. lo ta‘asu ‘avel bamishpat, bamidah bamishqal ubamesurah.
m1zny Zdq 1bny Zdq 1ypt Zdq whyn Zdq yhyh lkm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1tkm m1rZ mZrym just balances, just weights, a just tired-ephah, and a just here-hin, ye have: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which brought you out of the land of narrows-mizraim. mozenei zedeq ’abne zedeq ’efat zedeq vehin zedeq yihyeh lakhem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim.
wSmrtm 1t kl Hqty w1t kl mSpTy w8Sytm 1tm 1ny yhwh therefore ye guard-observe all my statutes, and all my decision-grammars, and do them: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ushemartem kal khuqotay ve’et kal mishpatay va‘asitem ’otam, ’ani yhvh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
w1l bny ySr1l t1mr 1yS 1yS mbny ySr1l wmn hgr hgr bySr1l 1Sr ytn mzr8w lmlk mwt ywmt 8m h1rZ yrgmhw b1bn again, thou say to children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, whosoever he be of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in saturated-towards-israel, that giveth any of his seed unto moloch-king-molech; he surely be put to death: the with-mum-people of the land father-child-stone him with stones. ve’el benei yisra’el tomar ’ish mibenei yisra’el umin hager hagar beyisra’el ’asher yiten mizar‘o lamolekh mot yumat, ‘am ha’arez yirgemuhu ba’aben.
w1ny 1tn 1t pny b1yS hhw1 whkrty 1tw mqrb 8mw ky mzr8w ntn lmlk lm8n Tm1 1t mqdSy wlHll 1t Sm qdSy and i will set my face-turns against that man, and will cut him off from inward his with-mum-people; because he hath given of his seed unto moloch-king-molech, to cease my dedicated-finished, and to profane my dedicated-finished name. va’ani ’eten panay ba’ish hahu vehikhrati miqereb ‘amo, ki mizar‘o natan lamolekh lema‘an tamei miqdashi ulekhalel shem qadshi
w1m h8lm y8lymw 8m h1rZ 1t 8ynyhm mn h1yS hhw1 bttw mzr8w lmlk lblty hmyt 1tw and if the with-mum-people of the land do any ways hide their eyes from the man, when he giveth of his seed unto moloch-king-molech, and kill him not: ve’im ha‘lem ya‘limu ‘am ha’arez ‘enehem min ha’ish hahu betito mizar‘o lamolekh, lebilti hamit ’oto.
wSmty 1ny 1t pny b1yS hhw1 wbmSpHtw whkrty 1tw w1t kl hznym 1Hryw lznwt 1Hry hmlk mqrb 8mm then i will set my face-turns against that man, and against his family, and will cut him off, and all that go a whoring after him, to prostitute with moloch-king-molech, from inward their with-mum-people. vesamti ’ani panay ba’ish hahu ubemishpakhto, vehikhrati ’oto ve’et kal hazonim ’akharav liznot ’akharei hamolekh miqereb ‘amam.
whnpS 1Sr tpnh 1l h1bt w1l hyd8nym lznwt 1Hryhm wntty 1t pny bnpS hhw1 whkrty 1tw mqrb 8mw and the being that turneth after such as have familiar breath-spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, i will even set my face-turns against that being, and will cut him off from inward his with-mum-people. vehanefesh ’asher tifneh ’el ha’obot ve’el hayide‘onim liznot ’akharehem, venatati panay banefesh hahiv vehikhrati ’oto miqereb ‘amo.
whtqdStm whyytm qdSym ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm dedicate-finify yourselves therefore, and be ye dedicated-finished: for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wSmrtm 1t Hqty w8Sytm 1tm 1ny yhwh mqdSkm and ye keep my statutes, and do them: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou which dedicate-finify you. ushemartem khuqotay va‘asitem ’otam, ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
ky 1yS 1yS 1Sr yqll 1t 1byw w1t 1mw mwt ywmt 1byw w1mw qll dmyw bw for every one that curseth his father or his mother be deadly put to death: he hath cursed his father or his mother; his blood be upon him. ki ’ish ’ish ’asher yeqalel ’abiv ve’et ’imo mot yumat, ’abiv ve’imo qilel damav bo.
w1yS 1Sr yn1p 1t 1St 1yS 1Sr yn1p 1t 1St r8hw mwt ywmt hn1p whn1pt and the man that committeth adultery with another man's woman, even he that committeth adultery with his neighbor's woman, the adulterer and the adulteress surely be put to death. ve’ish ’asher yin’af ’et ’eshet ’ish ’asher yin’af ’et ’eshet re‘ehu, mot yumat hano’ef vehano’afet.
w1yS 1Sr ySkb 1t 1St 1byw 8rwt 1byw glh mwt ywmtw Snyhm dmyhm bm and the man that lieth with his father's woman hath uncovered his father's nakedness: both of them surely be put to death; their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et ’eshet ’abiv ‘ervat ’abiv gilah, mot yumetu shenehem demehem bam.
w1yS 1Sr ySkb 1t kltw mwt ywmtw Snyhm tbl 8Sw dmyhm bm and if a man lie with his daughter-hoof-bat-child in teaching, both of them surely be put to death: they have wrought confusion; their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et kalato mot yumetu shenehem, tebel ‘asu demehem bam.
w1yS 1Sr ySkb 1t zkr mSkby 1Sh tw8bh 8Sw Snyhm mwt ywmtw dmyhm bm if a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they surely be put to death; their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et zakhar mishkebei ’ishah to‘ebah ‘asu shenehem, mot yumatu demehem bam.
w1yS 1Sr yqH 1t 1Sh w1t 1mh zmh hw1 b1S ySrpw 1tw w1thn wl1 thyh zmh btwkkm and if a man take a woman and her mother, it is wickedness: they be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you. ve’ish ’asher yiqakh ’ishah ve’et ’imah zimah hi ba’esh yisrefu ’oto ve’ethen velo tihyeh zimah betokhkhem.
w1yS 1Sr ytn Skbtw bbhmh mwt ywmt w1t hbhmh thrgw and if a man lie with a beast, he surely be put to death: and ye slay the beast. ve’ish ’asher yiten shekhabeto bibhemah mot yumat, ve’et habehemah taharogu.
w1Sh 1Sr tqrb 1l kl bhmh lrb8h 1th whrgt 1t h1Sh w1t hbhmh mwt ywmtw dmyhm bm and if a woman approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou kill the woman, and the beast: they surely be put to death; their blood be upon them. ve’ishah ’asher tiqrab ’el kal behemah lerib‘ah ’otah veharagta ha’ishah ve’et habehemah, mot yumatu demehem bam.
w1yS 1Sr yqH 1t 1Htw bt 1byw 1w bt 1mw wr1h 1t 8rwth why1 tr1h 1t 8rwtw Hsd hw1 wnkrtw l8yny bny 8mm 8rwt 1Htw glh 8wnw yS1 and if a man take his sister, his father's daughter-hoof-bat-child, or his mother's daughter-hoof-bat-child, and see her nakedness, and she see his nakedness; it is a wicked thing; and they be cut off in the sight of their with-mum-people: he hath uncovered his sister's nakedness; he bear his torment. ve’ish ’asher yiqakh ’akhoto bat ’abiv ’o bat ’imo vera’ah ‘ervatah vehi tir’eh ‘ervato khesed hu venikhretu le‘enei benei ‘amam, ‘ervat ’akhoto gilah ‘avono yisa.
w1yS 1Sr ySkb 1t 1Sh dwh wglh 1t 8rwth 1t mqrh h8rh why1 glth 1t mqwr dmyh wnkrtw Snyhm mqrb 8mm and if a man lie with a woman having her sickness, and uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them be cut off from inward their with-mum-people. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et ’ishah davah vegilah ‘ervatah meqorah he‘erah vehi giletah meqor dameha, venikhretu shenehem miqereb ‘amam.
w8rwt 1Hwt 1mk w1Hwt 1byk l1 tglh ky 1t S1rw h8rh 8wnm yS1w and no uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister, nor of thy father's sister: for he uncovereth his near kin: they bear their torment. ve‘ervat ’akhot ’imekha va’akhot ’abikha lo tegaleh, ki she’ero he‘erah ‘avonam yisa’u.
w1yS 1Sr ySkb 1t ddtw 8rwt ddw glh HT1m yS1w 8ryrym ymtw and if a man lie with his uncle's woman, he hath uncovered his uncle's nakedness: they bear their miss; they die childless. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et dodato ‘ervat dodo gilah, khet’am yisa’u ‘aririm yamutu.
w1yS 1Sr yqH 1t 1St 1Hyw ndh hw1 8rwt 1Hyw glh 8ryrym yhyw and if a man take his brother's woman, it is an stained-ceased thing: he hath uncovered his brother's nakedness; they be childless. ve’ish ’asher yiqakh ’eshet ’akhiv nidah hi ‘ervat ’akhiv gilah ‘aririm yihyu.
wSmrtm 1t kl Hqty w1t kl mSpTy w8Sytm 1tm wl1 tqy1 1tkm h1rZ 1Sr 1ny mby1 1tkm Smh lSbt bh ye therefore keep all my statutes, and all my decision-grammars, and do them: that the land, whither i bring you to dwell therein, spue you not out. ushemartem kal khuqotay ve’et kal mishpatay va‘asitem ’otam, velo taqi ’etkhem ha’arez ’asher ’ani mebi ’etkhem lashebet bah.
wl1 tlkw bHqt hgwy 1Sr 1ny mSlH mpnykm ky 1t kl 1lh 8Sw w1qZ bm and ye not walk in the manners of the nation, which i cast out before-turns you: for they committed all these things, and therefore i crave-abhorred them. velo telekhu bekhuqot hago ’asher ’ani meshaleakh mipenekhem, ki kal ’eleh ‘asu va’aquz bam.
w1mr lkm 1tm tyrSw 1t 1dmtm w1ny 1tnnh lkm lrSt 1th 1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS 1ny yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr hbdlty 1tkm mn h8mym and i have said unto you, ye inherit their land, and i will give it unto you to possess it, a land that floweth with milk and honey: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which have separated you from other with-mum-people. va’omar lakhem ’atem tireshu ’admatam va’ani ’etenenah lakhem lareshet ’erez zabat khalab udebash, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hibdalti ’etkhem min ha‘amim.
whbdltm byn hbhmh hThrh lTm1h wbyn h8wp hTm1 lThr wl1 tSqZw 1t npStykm bbhmh wb8wp wbkl 1Sr trmS h1dmh 1Sr hbdlty lkm lTm1 ye therefore put difference between-bin bright-climaxing beasts and stained-ceased, and between-bin stained-ceased fowls and bright-climaxing: and ye not make your beings abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which i have separated from you as stained-ceased. vehibdaltem ben habehemah hatehorah lateme’ah uben ha‘of hatamei latahor, velo teshaqezu nafshotekhem babehemah uba‘of ubekhol ’asher tirmos ha’adamah ’asher hibdalti lakhem letame.
whyytm ly qdSym ky qdwS 1ny yhwh w1bdl 1tkm mn h8mym lhywt ly and ye be dedicated-finished unto me: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou am dedicated-finished, and have severed you from other with-mum-people, that ye should be mine. vihyitem li qedoshim ki qadosh ’ani yhvh, va’abdil ’etkhem min ha‘amim lihyot li.
w1yS 1w 1Sh ky yhyh bhm 1wb 1w yd8ny mwt ywmtw b1bn yrgmw 1tm dmyhm bm a man also or woman that hath a familiar breath-spirit, or that is a wizard, surely be put to death: they father-child-stone them with stones: their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’o ’ishah ki yihyeh ’ob ’o yide‘oni mot yumatu, ba’eben yirgemu ’otam demehem bam.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1mr 1l hkhnym bny 1hrn w1mrt 1lhm lnpS l1 yTm1 b8myw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, speak unto the dimmer-servers children-betweens of cabinet-aaron, and say unto them, there none be ceased for the dead among his with-mum-people: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el hakohanim benei ’aharon, ve’amarta ’alehem lenefesh lo yitama be‘amav.
ky 1m lS1rw hqrb 1lyw l1mw wl1byw wlbnw wlbtw wl1Hyw and for his kin, that is near unto him, that is, for his mother, and for his father, and for his child-between, and for his daughter-hoof-bat-child, and for his brother. ki ’im lish’ero haqarob ’elav, le’imo ule’abiv velibno ulebito ule’akhiv.
wl1Htw hbtwlh hqrwbh 1lyw 1Sr l1 hyth l1yS lh yTm1 and for his sister a virgin, that is nigh unto him, which hath had no man; for her may he be ceased. vela’akhoto habetulah haqerobah ’elav ’asher lo hayetah le’ish, lah yitama.
l1 yTm1 b8l b8myw lhHlw and he not cease himself, being a chief man among his with-mum-people, to profane himself. lo yitama ba‘al be‘amav, lehekhalo.
l1 yqrHh yqrHw qrHh br1Sm wp1t zqnm l1 yglHw wbbSrm l1 ySrTw SrTt they not make baldness upon their head, neither they shave off the corner of their beard, nor make any cuttings in their flesh. lo yiqrekhu qarekhah berosham ufe’at zeqanam lo yegalekhu, ubibsaram lo yisretu saratet.
qdSym yhyw l1lhyhm wl1 yHllw Sm 1lhyhm ky 1t 1Sy yhwh lHm 1lhyhm hm mqrybm whyw qdS they be dedicated-finished unto their towards-these-elohim, and not profane the name of their towards-these-elohim: for the inwards of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made by fire, and the bread of their towards-these-elohim, they do inward: therefore they be dedicated-finished. qedoshim yihyu lelohehem velo yekhalelu shem ’elohehem, ki ’ishei yhvh lekhem ’elohehem hem maqribim vehayu qodesh.
1Sh znh wHllh l1 yqHw w1Sh grwSh m1ySh l1 yqHw ky qdS hw1 l1lhyw they not take a woman that is a whore, or profane; neither they take a woman put away from her man: for he is dedicated-finished unto his towards-these-elohim. ’ishah zonah vakhalalah lo yiqakhu ve’ishah gerushah me’ishah lo yiqakhu, ki qadosh hu lelohav.
wqdStw ky 1t lHm 1lhyk hw1 mqryb qdS yhyh lk ky qdwS 1ny yhwh mqdSkm thou dedicate-finify him therefore; for he inwardeth the bread of thy towards-these-elohim: he be dedicated-finished unto thee: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which dedicate-finify you, am dedicated-finished. veqidashto ki lekhem ’elohekha hu maqrib, qadosh yihyeh lakh ki qadosh ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
wbt 1yS khn ky tHl lznwt 1t 1byh hy1 mHllt b1S tSrp and the daughter-hoof-bat-child of any dimmer-server, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she be burnt with fire. ubat ’ish kohen ki tekhel liznot, ’abiha hi mekhalelet ba’esh tisaref.
whkhn hgdwl m1Hyw 1Sr ywZq 8l r1Sw Smn hmSHh wml1 1t ydw llbS 1t hbgdym 1t r1Sw l1 ypr8 wbgdyw l1 yprm and he that is the high dimmer-server among his brethren, upon whose head the lubeing name-from-oil was poured, and that is filld to put on the garments, not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes; vehakohen hagadol me’ekhav ’asher yuzaq ‘al rosho shemen hamishkhah umilei yado lilbosh habegadim, rosho lo yifra‘ ubegadav lo yifrom.
w8l kl npSt mt l1 yb1 l1byw wl1mw l1 yTm1 neither he go in to any dead body, nor cease himself for his father, or for his mother; ve‘al kal nafshot met lo yabo, le’abiv ule’imo lo yitama.
wmn hmqdS l1 yZ1 wl1 yHll 1t mqdS 1lhyw ky nzr Smn mSHt 1lhyw 8lyw 1ny yhwh neither he go out of the dedicated-finished, nor profane the dedicated-finished of his towards-these-elohim; for the crown of the lubeing name-from-oil of his towards-these-elohim is upon him: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. umin hamiqdash lo yeze velo yekhalel miqdash ’elohav, ki nezer shemen mishkhat ’elohav ‘alav ’ani yhvh.
whw1 1Sh bbtwlyh yqH and he take a woman in her virginity. vehu ’ishah bibtuleha yiqakh.
1lmnh wgrwSh wHllh znh 1t 1lh l1 yqH ky 1m btwlh m8myw yqH 1Sh a widow, or a divorced woman, or profane, or an harlot, these he not take: and he take a virgin of his own with-mum-people to woman. ’almanah ugerushah vakhalalah zonah ’eleh lo yiqakh, ’im betulah me‘amav yiqakh ’ishah.
wl1 yHll zr8w b8myw ky 1ny yhwh mqdSw neither he profane his seed among his with-mum-people: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do dedicate-finify him. velo yekhalel zar‘o be‘amav, ki ’ani yhvh meqadesho.

dbr 1l 1hrn l1mr 1yS mzr8k ldrtm 1Sr yhyh bw mwm l1 yqrb lhqryb lHm 1lhyw speak unto cabinet-aaron, saying, whosoever he be of thy seed in their generations that hath any blemish, let him not approach to inward the bread of his towards-these-elohim. daber ’el ’aharon lemor, ’ish mizar‘akha ledorotam ’asher yihyeh bo mum lo yiqrab lehaqrib lekhem ’elohav.
ky kl 1yS 1Sr bw mwm l1 yqrb 1yS 8wr 1w psH 1w Hrm 1w Srw8 for whatsoever man he be that hath a blemish, he not approach: a blind man, or a lame, or he that hath a flat nose, or any thing superfluous, ki khal ’ish ’asher bo mum lo yiqrab, ’ish ‘iver ’o fiseakh ’o kharum ’o sarua‘.
1w 1yS 1Sr yhyh bw Sbr rgl 1w Sbr yd or a man that is broken-footed, or broken-handed, ’o ’ish ’asher yihyeh bo sheber ragel, ’o sheber yad.
1w gbn 1w dq 1w tbll b8ynw 1w grb 1w ylpt 1w mrwH 1Sk or crookbacked, or a dwarf, or that hath a blemish in his eye, or be scurvy, or scabbed, or hath his stones broken; ’o giben ’o daq ’o tebalul be‘eno, ’o garab ’o yalefet ’o ’ashekh.
kl 1yS 1Sr bw mwm mzr8 1hrn hkhn l1 ygS lhqryb 1t 1Sy yhwh mwm bw 1t lHm 1lhyw l1 ygS lhqryb no man that hath a blemish of the seed of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server come nigh to inward the inwards of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made by fire: he hath a blemish; he not come nigh to inward the bread of his towards-these-elohim. kal ’ish ’asher bo mum mizera‘ ’aharon hakohen lo yigash lehaqrib ’ishei yhvh, mum bo. lekhem ’elohav lo yigash lehaqrib.
lHm 1lhyw mqdSy hqdSym wmn hqdSym y1kl he eat the bread of his towards-these-elohim, both of the most dedicated-finished, and of the dedicated-finished. lekhem ’elohav haqodashim, umin haqodashim yokhel.
1k 1l hprkt l1 yb1 w1l hmzbH l1 ygS ky mwm bw wl1 yHll 1t mqdSy ky 1ny yhwh mqdSm only he not go in unto the breaker, nor come nigh unto the butcher-kitchen, because he hath a blemish; that he profane not my finishes: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do dedicate-finify them. ’akh ’el haparokhet lo yabo ve’el hamizbeakh lo yigash ki mum bo, velo yekhalel miqdashay ki ’ani yhvh meqadesham.
wydbr mSh 1l 1hrn w1l bnyw w1l kl bny ySr1l and extracted-mose told it unto cabinet-aaron, and to his children-betweens, and unto all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vaydaber mosheh ’el ’aharon ve’el banav, ve’el kal benei yisra’el.

1mr 1lhm ldrtykm kl 1yS 1Sr yqrb mkl zr8km 1l hqdSym 1Sr yqdySw bny ySr1l lyhwh wTm1tw 8lyw wnkrth hnpS hhw1 mlpny 1ny yhwh say unto them, whosoever he be of all your seed among your generations, that goeth unto the dedicated-finished things, which children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel dedicate-finify unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, having his stained-ceasedness upon him, that being be cut off from my presence: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’emor ’alehem ledorotekhem kal ’asher yiqrab mikal zar‘akhem ’el haqodashim ’asher yaqdishu bene yisra’el yhvh vetum’ato ‘alav, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv milefanay ’ani yhvh.
1yS 1yS mzr8 1hrn whw1 Zrw8 1w zb bqdSym l1 y1kl 8d 1Sr yThr whng8 bkl Tm1 npS 1w 1yS 1Sr tZ1 mmnw Skbt zr8 what man soever of the seed of cabinet-aaron is a waspish-speckled, or hath a running issue; he not eat of the dedicated-finished things, until he be bright-climaxing. and whoso toucheth any thing that is stained-ceased by the dead, or a man whose seed goeth from him; ’ish ’ish mizera‘ ’aharon vehu zarua‘ ’o zab baqodashim lo yokhal ‘ad ’asher yithar, vehanogea‘ bekhal teme nefesh ’o ’ish ’asher tezei mimenu shikhbat zara‘.
1w 1yS 1Sr yg8 bkl SrZ 1Sr yTm1 lw 1w b1dm 1Sr yTm1 lw lkl Tm1tw or whosoever toucheth any creeping thing, whereby he may be made stained-ceased, or a man of whom he may take stained-ceasedness, whatsoever stained-ceasedness he hath; ’o ’ish ’asher yiga‘ bekhal sherez ’asher yitma lo, ’o be’adam ’asher yitma lo lekhol tum’ato.
npS 1Sr tg8 bw wTm1h 8d h8rb wl1 y1kl mn hqdSym ky 1m rHZ bSrw bmym the being which hath touched any such be stained-ceased until even, and not eat of the dedicated-finished things, unless he wash his flesh with from-waters. nefesh ’asher tiga‘ bo vetame’ah ‘ad ha‘areb, velo yokhal min haqodashim ki ’im rakhaz besaro bamayim.
wb1 hSmS wThr w1Hr y1kl mn hqdSym ky lHmw hw1 and when the sun is down, he be bright-climaxing, and afterward eat of the dedicated-finished things; because it is his food. uba hashemesh vetaher, ve’akhar yokhal min haqodashim ki lakhmo hu.
nblh wTrph l1 y1kl lTm1h bh 1ny yhwh that which dieth of itself, or is torn with beasts, he not eat to cease himself therewith; i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. nebelah uterefah lo yokhal letame’ah bah, ’ani yhvh.
wSmrw 1t mSmrty wl1 yS1w 8lyw HT1 wmtw bw ky yHllhw 1ny yhwh mqdSm they therefore keep mine ordinance, lest they bear miss for it, and die therefore, if they profane it: i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do dedicate-finify them. veshameru mishmarti velo yis’u ‘alav khet umetu bo ki yekhaleluhu, ’ani yhvh meqadesham.
wkl zr l1 y1kl qdS twSb khn wSkyr l1 y1kl qdS there no stranger eat of the dedicated-finished thing: a sojourner of the dimmer-server, or an hired worker, not eat of the dedicated-finished thing. vekhal zar lo yokhal qodesh, toshab kohen vesakhir lo yokhal qodesh.
wkhn ky yqnh npS qnyn kspw hw1 y1kl bw wylyd bytw hm y1klw blHmw and if the dimmer-server buy any being with his money, he eat of it, and he that is born in his daughter-house: they eat of his meat. vekhohen ki yiqneh nefesh qinyan kaspo hu yokhal bo, vilid beto hem yokhelu belakhmo.
wbt khn ky thyh l1yS zr hw1 btrwmt hqdSym l1 t1kl if the dimmer-server's daughter-hoof-bat-child also be married unto a stranger, she may not eat of an inward of the dedicated-finished things. ubat kohen ki tihyeh le’ish zar, hi bitrumat haqodashim lo tokhel.
wbt khn ky thyh 1lmnh wgrwSh wzr8 1yn lh wSbh 1l byt 1byh kn8wryh mlHm 1byh t1kl wkl zr l1 y1kl bw and if the dimmer-server's daughter-hoof-bat-child be a widow, or divorced, and have no child, and is returned unto her father's daughter-house, as in her youth, she eat of her father's meat: and there be no stranger eat thereof. ubat kohen ki tihyeh ’almanah ugerushah vezera‘ ’en lah veshabah ’el bet ’abiha kin‘ureha milekhem ’abiha tokhel, vekhal zar lo yokhal bo.
w1yS ky y1kl qdS bSggh wysp HmSytw 8lyw wntn lkhn 1t hqdS and if a man eat of the dedicated-finished thing unwittingly, then he put the fifth part thereof unto it, and give it unto the dimmer-server with the dedicated-finished thing. ve’ish ki yokhal qodesh bishgagah, veyasaf khamishito ‘alav venatan lakohen haqodesh.
wl1 yHllw 1t qdSy bny ySr1l 1t 1Sr yrymw lyhwh and they not profane the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which they inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; velo yekhalelu qadeshei benei yisra’el, ’asher yarimu yhvh.
whSy1w 1wtm 8wn 1Smh b1klm 1t qdSyhm ky 1ny yhwh mqdSm or suffer them to bear the torment of fire-name, when they eat their dedicated-finished things: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do dedicate-finify them. vehisi’u ’otam ‘avon ’ashmah be’akhelam qadeshehem, ki ’ani yhvh meqadesham.

dbr 1l 1hrn w1l bnyw w1l kl bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm 1yS 1yS mbyt ySr1l wmn hgr bySr1l 1Sr yqryb qrbnw lkl ndryhm wlkl ndbwtm 1Sr yqrybw lyhwh l8lh speak unto cabinet-aaron, and to his children-betweens, and unto all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, whatsoever he be of the daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel, or of the strangers in saturated-towards-israel, that will inward his inward for all his vows, and for all his volunteers, which they will inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for a on-up; daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav ve’el kal benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ish ’ish mibet yisra’el umin hager beyisra’el ’asher yaqrib qarebano lekhal nidrehem ulekhal nidbotam ’asher yaqribu yhvh le‘olah.
lrZnkm tmym zkr bbqr bkSbym wb8zym ye inward at your own will a rememberer simple, of the beeves, of the sheep, or of the intense-goats. lirzonekhem, tamim zakhar babaqar bakesabim uba‘izim.
kl 1Sr bw mwm l1 tqrybw ky l1 lrZwn yhyh lkm and whatsoever hath a blemish, that ye not inward: for it not be acceptable for you. kol ’asher bo mum lo taqribu, ki lo lerazon yihyeh lakhem.
w1yS ky yqryb zbH Slmym lyhwh lpl1 ndr 1w lndbh bbqr 1w bZ1n tmym yhyh lrZwn kl mwm l1 yhyh bw and whosoever inwardeth a butcher of wholes unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to accomplish his vow, or a volunteer in beeves or sheep, it be perfect to be accepted; there be no blemish therein. ve’ish yaqrib zebakh shelamim yhvh lefale neder ’o lindabah babaqar ’o bazon, tamim yihyeh lerazon kal mum lo yihyeh bo.
8wrt 1w Sbwr 1w HrwZ 1w yblt 1w grb 1w ylpt l1 tqrybw 1lh lyhwh w1Sh l1 ttnw mhm 8l hmzbH lyhwh blind, or broken, or maimed, or having a wen, or scurvy, or scabbed, ye not inward these unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, nor make an inward by fire of them upon the butcher-kitchen unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ‘averet ’o shabur ’o kharuz ’o yabelet ’o garab ’o yalefet lo taqribu ’eleh yhvh, ve’isheh titenu mehem ‘al hamizbeakh yhvh.
wSwr wSh Srw8 wqlwT ndbh t8Sh 1tw wlndr l1 yrZh either a bull or a lamb that hath any thing superfluous or lacking in his parts, that mayest thou inward for a volunteer; and for a vow it not be accepted. veshor vaseh sarua‘ veqalut, nedabah ta‘aseh uleneder lo yerazeh.
wm8wk wktwt wntwq wkrwt l1 tqrybw lyhwh wb1rZkm l1 t8Sw ye not inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou that which is bruised, or crushed, or broken, or cut; neither ye make any inward thereof in your land. uma‘ukh vekhatut venatuq vekharut lo taqribu yhvh, ube’arzekhem lo ta‘asu.
wmyd bn nkr l1 tqrybw 1t lHm 1lhykm mkl 1lh ky mSHtm bhm mwm bm l1 yrZw lkm neither from a stranger's hand ye inward the bread of your towards-these-elohim of any of these; because their corruption is in them, and blemishes be in them: they not be accepted for you. umiyad ben nekhar lo taqribu ’et lekhem ’elohekhem mikal ’eleh, ki mashekhatam bahem mum bam lo yerazu lakhem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Swr 1w kSb 1w 8z ky ywld whyh Sb8t ymym tHt 1mw wmywm hSmyny whl1h yrZh lqrbn 1Sh lyhwh when a bull, or a sheep, or a intense-goat, is brought forth, then it be seven days under the dam; and from the eighth day and thenceforth it be accepted for a feminine-firy unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. shor ’o kheseb ’o ‘ez ki yivaled vehayah shib‘at yamim takhat ’imo, umiyom hashemini vahale’ah yerazeh leqareban ’isheh yhvh.
wSwr 1w Sh 1tw w1t bnw l1 tSHTw bywm 1Hd and whether it be cow, or ewe, ye not kill it and her young both in one day. veshor ’o seh, ’oto ve’et beno lo tishkhatu beyom ’ekhad.
wky tzbHw zbH twdh lyhwh lrZnkm tzbHw and when ye will inward a butcher of thanksgiving unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, inward it at your own will. vekhi tizbekhu zebakh todah yhvh, lirzonekhem tizbakhu.
bywm hhw1 y1kl l1 twtyrw mmnw 8d bqr 1ny yhwh on the same day it be eaten up; ye leave none of it until the morrow: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. bayom hahu ye’akhel lo totiru mimenu ‘ad boqer, ’ani yhvh.
wSmrtm mZwty w8Sytm 1tm 1ny yhwh therefore ye keep my order-prescriptions, and do them: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ushemartem mizvotay va‘asitem ’otam, ’ani yhvh.

wlHm wqly wkrml l1 t1klw 8d 8Zm hywm hzh 8d hby1km 1t qrbn 1lhykm Hqt 8wlm ldrtykm bkl mSbtykm and ye eat neither bread, nor parched corn-swimming, nor green ears, until the selfsame day that ye have brought an inward unto your towards-these-elohim: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings. velekhem veqali vekharmel lo tokhelu ‘ad ‘ezem hayom hazeh ‘ad habi’akhem qareban ’elohekhem, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem bekhol moshebotekhem.
