whyth l1hrn wlbnyw w1klhw bmqwm qdS ky qdS qdSym hw1 lw m1Sy yhwh Hq 8wlm and it be cabinet-aaron's and his children-betweens'; and they eat it in the dedicated-finished place: for it is most dedicated-finished unto him of the inwards of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made by fire by a perpetual statute. vehayetah le’aharon ulebanav va’akhaluhu bemaqom qadosh, ki qodesh qadashim hu lo me’ishei yhvh khaq ‘olam.
wyZ1 bn 1Sh ySr1lyt whw1 bn 1yS mZry btwk bny ySr1l wynZw bmHnh bn hySr1lyt w1yS hySr1ly and child-between of an saturated-towards-israelitish woman, whose father was an narrows-mizraimian, went out among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and this child-between of the saturated-towards-israelitish woman and a man of saturated-towards-israel strove together in the camp; vayezei ben ’ishah yisre’elit vehu ben ’ish mizri betokh benei yisra’el, vayinazu bamakhaneh ben hayisre’elit ve’ish hayisre’eli.
wyqb bn h1Sh hySr1lyt 1t hSm wyqll wyby1w 1tw 1l mSh wSm 1mw Slmyt bt dbry lmTh dn and the saturated-towards-israelitish woman's child-between blasphemed the name of the lord-base, and cursed. and they brought him unto extracted-mose: (and his mother's name was my-peace-shelomith, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of dibri, of the branch of discuss-dan:) vayiqob ben ha’ishah hayisre’elit hashem vayqalel vayabi’u ’oto ’el mosheh, veshem ’imo shelomit bat dibri lemateh dan.
wynyHhw bmSmr lprS lhm 8l py yhwh and they put him in ward, that the mind of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou might be showed them. vayanikhuhu bamishmar, lifrosh lahem pi yhvh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
hwZ1 1t hmqll 1l mHwZ lmHnh wsmkw kl hSm8ym 1t ydyhm 8l r1Sw wrgmw 1tw kl h8dh bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp; and let all that heard him lay their hands upon his head, and let all the until-witness father-child-stone him. hozei hamqalel ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesamekhu khal hashome‘im yedehem ‘al rosho, veragemu ’oto kal ha‘edah.
w1l bny ySr1l tdbr l1mr 1yS 1yS ky yqll 1lhyw wnS1 HT1w and thou speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, whosoever curseth his towards-these-elohim bear his miss. ve’el benei yisra’el tedaber lemor, ’ish ki yeqalel ’elohav venasa khet’o.
wnqb Sm yhwh mwt ywmt rgwm yrgmw bw kl h8dh kgr k1zrH bnqbw Sm ywmt and he that blasphemeth the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, he surely be put to death, and all the until-witness certainly father-child-stone him: as well the stranger, as he that is born in the land, when he blasphemeth the name of the lord-base, be put to death. venoqeb shem yhvh mot yumat ragom yirgemu bo kal ha‘edah, kager ka’ezrakh benaqebo shem yumat.
w1yS ky ykh kl npS 1dm mwt ywmt and he that killeth any man surely be put to death. ve’ish yakeh kal ’adam, mot yumat.
wmkh npS bhmh ySlmnh npS tHt npS and he that killeth a beast make it good; beast for beast. umakeh nefesh behemah yeshalemenah, nefesh takhat nafesh.
w1yS ky ytn mwm b8mytw k1Sr 8Sh kn y8Sh lw and if a man cause a blemish in his neighbor; as he hath done, so it be done to him; ve’ish ki yiten mum ba‘amito, ka’asher ‘asah ken ye‘aseh lo.
Sbr tHt Sbr 8yn tHt 8yn Sn tHt Sn k1Sr ytn mwm b1dm kn yntn bw breach for breach, eye for eye, tooth for tooth: as he hath caused a blemish in a man, so it be done to him again. ber takhat sheber ‘ayin takhat ‘ayin shen takhat shen, ka’asher yiten mum ba’adam ken yinaten bo.
wmkh bhmh ySlmnh wmkh 1dm ywmt and he that killeth a beast, he restore it: and he that killeth a man, he be put to death. umakeh behemah yeshalemenah, umakeh ’adam yumat.
mSpT 1Hd yhyh lkm kgr k1zrH yhyh ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm ye have one manner of teaching, as well for the stranger, as for one of your own country: for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. mishpat ’ekhad yihyeh lakhem kager ka’ezrakh yihyeh, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wydbr mSh 1l bny ySr1l wywZy1w 1t hmqll 1l mHwZ lmHnh wyrgmw 1tw 1bn wbny ySr1l 8Sw k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and extracted-mose spake to children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp, and father-child-stone him with stones. and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vaydaber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el vayozi’u hamqalel mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu ’oto ’aben, ubene yisra’el ‘asu ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh bhr syny l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose in mount bush-(proto-)sinai, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh behar sinay lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm ky tb1w 1l h1rZ 1Sr 1ny ntn lkm wSbth h1rZ Sbt lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when ye come into the land which i give you, then the land keep a seven-sabbath unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ki tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher ’ani noten lakhem, veshabetah ha’arez shabat yhvh.
SS Snym tzr8 Sdk wSS Snym tzmr krmk w1spt 1t tbw1th six years thou sow thy field, and six years thou prune thy vineyard, and gather in the fruit thereof; shesh shanim tizra‘ sadekha veshesh shanim tizmor karmekha, ve’asafta tebu’atah.
wbSnh hSby8t Sbt Sbtwn yhyh l1rZ Sbt lyhwh Sdk l1 tzr8 wkrmk l1 tzmr and in the seventh year be a seven-sabbath of rest unto the land, a seven-sabbath for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: thou neither sow thy field, nor prune thy vineyard. ubashanah hashebi‘it shabat shabaton yihyeh la’arez shabat yhvh, sadekha lo tizra‘ vekharmekha lo tizmor.
1t spyH qZyrk l1 tqZwr w1t 8nby nzyrk l1 tbZr Snt Sbtwn yhyh l1rZ that which groweth of its own accord of thy harvest no reap, neither gather the grapes of thy vine undressed: for it is a year of rest unto the land. sefiakh qezirekha lo tiqzor ve’et ‘inebei nezirekha lo tibzor, shenat shabaton yihyeh la’arez.
whyth Sbt h1rZ lkm l1klh lk wl8bdk wl1mtk wlSkyrk wltwSbk hgrym 8mk and the seven-sabbath of the land be meat for you; for thee, and for thy worker, and for thy maid, and for thy hired worker, and for thy stranger that sojourneth with thee. vehayetah shabat ha’arez lakhem le’akhlah lekha ule‘abdekha vela’amatekha, veliskhirekha uletoshabekha hagarim ‘imakh.
wlbhmtk wlHyh 1Sr b1rZk thyh kl tbw1th l1kl and for thy in-them-animal, and for the beast that are in thy land, all the increase thereof be meat. velibhemtekha velakhayah ’asher be’arzekha, tihyeh khal tebu’atah le’ekhol.
wsprt lk Sb8 Sbtt Snym Sb8 Snym Sb8 p8mym whyw lk ymy Sb8 Sbtt hSnym tS8 w1rb8ym Snh and thou number seven seven-sabbaths of years unto thee, seven times seven years; and the space of the seven seven-sabbaths of years be unto thee forty and nine years. vesafarta lekha ba‘ shabetot shanim sheba‘ shanim sheba‘ pe‘amim, vehayu lekha yemei ba‘ shabetot hashanim tesha‘ ve’arba‘im shanah.
wh8brt Swpr trw8h bHdS hSb8y b8Swr lHdS bywm hkprym t8byrw Swpr bkl 1rZkm then thou cause the mouthpiece-trumpet of the river-jubilee to sound on the tenth day of the seventh month, in the day of out-of-town-ment ye make the mouthpiece-trumpet sound throughout all your land. veha‘abarta shofar teru‘ah bakhodesh hashebi‘i be‘asor lakhodesh, beyom hakipurim ta‘abiru shofar bekhal ’arzekhem.
wqdStm 1t Snt hHmSym Snh wqr1tm drwr b1rZ lkl ySbyh ywbl hw1 thyh lkm wSbtm 1yS 1l 1Hztw w1yS 1l mSpHtw tSbw and ye dedicate-finify the fiftieth year, and proclaim liberty throughout all the land unto all the inhabitants thereof: it be a river-jubilee unto you; and ye return every man unto his possession, and ye return every man unto his family. veqidashtem shenat hakhamishim shanah uqeratem deror ba’arez lekhal yoshebeha, yobel hi tihyeh lakhem veshabtem ’ish ’el ’akhuzato ve’ish ’el mishpakhto tashubu.
ywbl hw1 Snt hHmSym Snh thyh lkm l1 tzr8w wl1 tqZrw 1t spyHyh wl1 tbZrw 1t nzryh a river-jubilee that fiftieth year be unto you: ye not sow, neither reap that which groweth of itself in it, nor gather the grapes in it of thy vine undressed. yobel hi shenat hakhamishim shanah tihyeh lakhem, lo tizra‘u velo tiqzeru ’et sefikheha velo tibzeru nezireha.
ky ywbl hw1 qdS thyh lkm mn hSdh t1klw 1t tbw1th for it is the river-jubilee; it be dedicated-finished unto you: ye eat the increase thereof out of the field. ki yobel hi qodesh tihyeh lakhem, min hasadeh tokhelu tebu’atah.
bSnt hywbl hz1t tSbw 1yS 1l 1Hztw in the year of this river-jubilee ye return every man unto his possession. bishnat hayobel hazot, tashubu ’ish ’el ’akhuzato.
wky tmkrw mmkr l8mytk 1w qnh myd 8mytk 1l twnw 1yS 1t 1Hyw and if thou sell ought unto thy neighbor, or buyest ought of thy neighbor's hand, ye not oppress one another: vekhi timkeru mimkar la‘amitekha ’o qanoh miyad ‘amitekha, ’al tonu ’ish ’akhiv.
bmspr Snym 1Hr hywbl tqnh m1t 8mytk bmspr Sny tbw1t ymkr lk according to the number of years after the river-jubilee thou buy of thy neighbor, and according unto the number of years of the fruits he sell unto thee: bemispar shanim ’akhar hayobel tiqneh me’et ‘amitekha, bemispar shene tebu’ot yimkar lakh.
lpy rb hSnym trbh mqntw wlpy m8T hSnym tm8yT mqntw ky mspr tbw1t hw1 mkr lk according to the multitude of years thou increase the price thereof, and according to the fewness of years thou diminish the price of it: for according to the number of the years of the fruits doth he sell unto thee. lefi rob hashanim tarbeh miqnato ulefi me‘ot hashanim tam‘it miqnato, ki mispar tebu’ot hu mokher lakh.
wl1 twnw 1yS 1t 8mytw wyr1t m1lhyk ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm ye not therefore oppress one another; and thou fear thy towards-these-elohim: for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. velo tonu ’ish ‘amito veyareta me’elohekha, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
w8Sytm 1t Hqty w1t mSpTy tSmrw w8Sytm 1tm wySbtm 8l h1rZ lbTH wherefore ye do my statutes, and keep my decision-grammars, and do them; and ye dwell in the land in safety. va‘asitem khuqotay ve’et mishpatay tishmeru va‘asitem ’otam, vishabtem ‘al ha’arez labetakh.
wntnh h1rZ pryh w1kltm lSb8 wySbtm lbTH 8lyh and the land yield her fruit, and ye eat your fill, and dwell therein in safety. venatenah ha’arez piryah va’akhaltem lasoba‘, vishabtem labetakh ‘aleha.
wky t1mrw mh n1kl bSnh hSby8t hn l1 nzr8 wl1 n1sp 1t tbw1tnw and if ye say, what we eat the seventh year? behold, we not sow, nor gather in our increase: vekhi tomeru mah nokhal bashanah hashebi‘it, hen lo nizra‘ velo ne’esof tebu’atenu.
wZwyty 1t brkty lkm bSnh hSSyt w8St 1t htbw1h lSlS hSnym then i will order-prescribe my knee-fluffy-blessing upon you in the sixth year, and it bring forth fruit for three years. veziviti birkhati lakhem bashanah hashishit, ve‘asat hatebu’ah lishlosh hashanim.
wzr8tm 1t hSnh hSmynt w1kltm mn htbw1h ySn 8d hSnh htSy8t 8d bw1 tbw1th t1klw ySn and ye sow the eighth year, and eat yet of old fruit until the ninth year; until her fruits come in ye eat of the old store. uzera‘tem hashanah hasheminit va’akhaltem min hatebu’ah yashan, ‘ad hashanah hateshi‘it ‘ad bo tebu’atah tokhelu yashan.
wh1rZ l1 tmkr lZmtt ky ly h1rZ ky grym wtwSbym 1tm 8mdy the land not be sold for ever: for the land is mine, for ye are strangers and sojourners with me. veha’arez lo timakher lizmitut ki li ha’arez, ki gerim vetoshabim ’atem ‘imadi.
wbkl 1rZ 1Hztkm g1lh ttnw l1rZ and in all the land of your possession ye grant a redemption for the land. ubekhol ’erez ’akhuzatkhem, ge’ulah titenu la’arez.
ky ymwk 1Hyk wmkr m1Hztw wb1 g1lw hqrb 1lyw wg1l 1t mmkr 1Hyw if thy brother be waxen poor, and hath sold away some of his possession, and if any of his kin come to redeem it, then he redeem that which his brother sold. ki yamukh ’akhikha umakhar me’akhuzato, uba go’alo haqarob ’elav vega’al mimkar ’akhiv.
w1yS ky l1 yhyh lw g1l whSygh ydw wmZ1 kdy g1ltw and if the man have none to redeem it, and himself be able to redeem it; ve’ish ki lo yihyeh lo go’el, vehisigah yado umaza kedei ge’ulato.
wHSb 1t Sny mmkrw whSyb 1t h8dp l1yS 1Sr mkr lw wSb l1Hztw then let him count the years of the sale thereof, and restore the overplus unto the man to whom he sold it; that he may return unto his possession. vekhishab shenei mimkaro veheshib ha‘odef la’ish ’asher makhar lo, veshab la’akhuzato.
w1m l1 mZ1h ydw dy hSyb lw whyh mmkrw byd hqnh 1tw 8d Snt hywbl wyZ1 bybl wSb l1Hztw and if he be not able to restore it to him, then that which is sold remain in the hand of him that hath bought it until the year of river-jubilee: and in the river-jubilee it go out, and he return unto his possession. ve’im lo maze’ah yado dei hashib lo vehayah mimkaro beyad haqoneh ’oto ‘ad shenat hayobel, veyaza bayobel veshab la’akhuzato.
w1yS ky ymkr byt mwSb 8yr Hwmh whyth g1ltw 8d tm Snt mmkrw ymym thyh g1ltw and if a man sell a dwelling daughter-house in a walled light-city, then he may redeem it within a whole year after it is sold; within a full year may he redeem it. ve’ish ki yimkor bet moshab ‘ir khomah vehayetah ge’ulato ‘ad tom shenat mimkaro, yamim tihyeh ge’ulato.
w1m l1 yg1l 8d ml1t lw Snh tmymh wqm hbyt 1Sr b8yr 1Sr l1 lw Hmh lZmytt lqnh 1tw ldrtyw l1 yZ1 bybl and if it be not redeemed within the space of a full year, then the daughter-house that is in the walled light-city be established for ever to him that bought it throughout his generations: it not go out in the river-jubilee. ve’im lo yiga’el ‘ad melot lo shanah temimah veqam habayit ’asher ba‘ir ’asher lo khomah lazemitut laqoneh ’oto ledorotav, lo yezei bayobel.
wbty hHZrym 1Sr 1yn lhm Hmh sbyb 8l Sdh h1rZ yHSb g1lh thyh lw wbybl yZ1 and the daughter-houses of the villages which have no wall round about them be counted as the fields of the country: they may be redeemed, and they go out in the river-jubilee. ubatei hakhazerim ’asher ’en khomah sabib ‘al sedeh ha’arez yekhasheb, ge’ulah tihyeh lo ubayobel yeze.
w8ry hlwym bty 8ry 1Hztm g1lt 8wlm thyh llwym notwithstanding the cities of the join-levites, and the daughter-houses of the cities of their possession, may the join-levites redeem at any time. ve‘arei halviyim batei ‘arei ’akhuzatam, ge’ulat ‘olam lalviyim.
w1Sr yg1l mn hlwym wyZ1 mmkr byt w8yr 1Hztw bybl ky bty 8ry hlwym hw1 1Hztm btwk bny ySr1l and if a man purchase of the join-levites, then the daughter-house that was sold, and the light-city of his possession, go out in the year of river-jubilee: for the daughter-houses of the cities of the join-levites are their possession among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. va’asher yig’al min halviyim veyaza mimkar bayit ve‘ir ’akhuzato bayobel, ki batei ‘arei halviyim hi ’akhuzatam betokh benei yisra’el.
wSdh mgrS 8ryhm l1 ymkr ky 1Hzt 8wlm hw1 lhm and the field of the plots of their cities may not be sold; for it is their perpetual possession. usedeh migrash ‘arehem lo yimakher, ki ’akhuzat ‘olam hu lahem.
wky ymwk 1Hyk wmTh ydw 8mk whHzqt bw gr wtwSb wHy 8mk and if thy brother be waxen poor, and fallen in decay with thee; then thou relieve him: yea, though he be a stranger, or a sojourner; that he may live with thee. vekhi yamukh ’akhikha umatah ‘imakh, vehekhezaqta bo ger vetoshab vakhay ‘imakh.
1l tqH m1tw nSk wtrbyt wyr1t m1lhyk wHy 1Hyk 8mk take thou no usury of him, or increase: and fear thy towards-these-elohim; that thy brother may live with thee. ’al tiqakh me’ito neshekh vetarbit veyareta me’elohekha, vekhei ’akhikha ‘imakh.
1t kspk l1 ttn lw bnSk wbmrbyt l1 ttn 1klk no give him thy money upon usury, nor lend him thy victuals for increase. kaspekha lo titen lo beneshekh, ubemarbit lo titen ’akhelekha.
1ny yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1tkm m1rZ mZrym ltt lkm 1t 1rZ kn8n lhywt lkm l1lhym i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which brought you forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim, to give you the land of mobile-trade-canaan, and to be your towards-these-elohim. ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim, latet lakhem ’erez kena‘an lihyot lakhem lelohim.
wky ymwk 1Hyk 8mk wnmkr lk l1 t8bd bw 8bdt 8bd and if thy brother that dwelleth by thee be waxen poor, and be sold unto thee; no compel him to work for as a bondservant: vekhi yamukh ’akhikha ‘imakh venimkar lakh, lo ta‘abod bo ‘abodat ‘abed.
kSkyr ktwSb yhyh 8mk 8d Snt hybl y8bd 8mk and as an hired worker, and as a sojourner, he be with thee, and work for thee unto the year of river-jubilee. kesakhir ketoshab yihyeh ‘imakh, ‘ad shenat hayobel ya‘abod ‘imakh.
wyZ1 m8mk hw1 wbnyw 8mw wSb 1l mSpHtw w1l 1Hzt 1btyw ySwb and then he depart from thee, both he and his children-betweens with him, and return unto his own family, and unto the possession of his fathers he return. veyaza me‘imakh hu ubanav ‘imo, veshab ’el mishpakhto ve’el ’akhuzat ’abotav yashub.
ky 8bdy hm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1tm m1rZ mZrym l1 ymkrw mmkrt 8bd for they are my workers, which i brought forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim: they not be sold as workers. ki ‘abaday hem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim, lo yimakheru mimkeret ‘abed.
l1 trdh bw bprk wyr1t m1lhyk no rule over him with rigor; and fear thy towards-these-elohim. lo tirdeh bo befarekh, veyareta me’elohekha.
w8bdk w1mtk 1Sr yhyw lk m1t hgwym 1Sr sbybtykm mhm tqnw 8bd w1mh both thy workers, and thy bondmaids, which thou have, be of the nations that are round about you; of them ye buy workers and bondmaids. ve‘abdekha va’amatekha ’asher yihyu lakh, me’et hagoyim ’asher sebibotekhem mehem tiqnu ‘ebed ve’amah.
wgm mbny htwSbym hgrym 8mkm mhm tqnw wmmSpHtm 1Sr 8mkm 1Sr hwlydw b1rZkm whyw lkm l1Hzh moreover of children-betweens of the strangers that do sojourn among you, of them ye buy, and of their families that are with you, which they begat in your land: and they be your possession. vegam mibenei hatoshabim hagarim ‘imakhem mehem tiqnu umimishpakhtam ’asher ‘imakhem ’asher holidu be’arzekhem, vehayu lakhem la’akhuzah.
whtnHltm 1tm lbnykm 1Hrykm lrSt 1Hzh l8lm bhm t8bdw wb1Hykm bny ySr1l 1yS b1Hyw l1 trdh bw bprk and ye take them as an inheritance for your children-betweens after you, to inherit them for a possession; they be your workers for ever: and over your brethren children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, ye not rule one over another with rigor. vehitnakhaltem ’otam libnekhem ’akharekhem lareshet ’akhuzah le‘olam bahem ta‘abodu, ube’akhekhem bene yisra’el ’ish be’akhiv lo tirdeh bo befarekh.
wky tSyg yd gr wtwSb 8mk wmk 1Hyk 8mw wnmkr lgr twSb 8mk 1w l8qr mSpHt gr and if a sojourner or stranger wax rich by thee, and thy brother that dwelleth by him wax poor, and sell himself unto the stranger or sojourner by thee, or to the stock of the stranger's family: vekhi tasig ger vetoshab ‘imakh umakh ’akhikha ‘imo, venimkar leger toshab ‘imakh ’o le‘eqer mishpakhat ger.
1Hry nmkr g1lh thyh lw 1Hd m1Hyw yg1lnw after that he is sold he may be redeemed again; one of his brethren may redeem him: ’akharei nimkar ge’ulah tihyeh lo, ’ekhad me’ekhav yig’alenu.
1w ddw 1w bn ddw yg1lnw 1w mS1r bSrw mmSpHtw yg1lnw 1w hSygh ydw wng1l either his uncle, or his uncle's child-between, may redeem him, or any that is nigh of kin unto him of his family may redeem him; or if he be able, he may redeem himself. ’o dodo ’o ben dodo yig’alenu ’o mishe’er besaro mimishpakhto yig’alenu, ’o hisigah yado venig’al.
wHSb 8m qnhw mSnt hmkrw lw 8d Snt hybl whyh ksp mmkrw bmspr Snym kymy Skyr yhyh 8mw and he reckon with him that bought him from the year that he was sold to him unto the year of river-jubilee: and the price of his sale be according unto the number of years, according to the time of an hired worker it be with him. vekhishab ‘im qonehu mishenat himakhero lo ‘ad shenat hayobel, vehayah kesef mimkaro bemispar shanim kimei sakhir yihyeh ‘imo.
1m 8wd rbwt bSnym lpyhn ySyb g1ltw mksp mqntw if there be yet many years behind, according unto them he give again the price of his redemption out of the money that he was bought for. ’im ‘od rabot bashanim, lefihen yashib ge’ulato mikesef miqnato.
w1m m8T nS1r bSnym 8d Snt hybl wHSb lw kpy Snyw ySyb 1t g1ltw and if there remain and few years unto the year of river-jubilee, then he count with him, and according unto his years he give him again the price of his redemption. ve’im me‘at nish’ar bashanim ‘ad shenat hayobel vekhishab lo, kefi shanav yashib ge’ulato.
kSkyr Snh bSnh yhyh 8mw l1 yrdnw bprk l8ynyk and as a yearly hired worker he be with him: and the other not rule with rigor over him in thy sight. kiskhir shanah beshanah yihyeh ‘imo, lo yirdenu beferekh le‘enekha.
w1m l1 yg1l b1lh wyZ1 bSnt hybl hw1 wbnyw 8mw and if he be not redeemed in these years, then he go out in the year of river-jubilee, both he, and his children-betweens with him. ve’im lo yiga’el be’eleh, veyaza bishnat hayobel hu ubanav ‘imo.
ky ly bny ySr1l 8bdym 8bdy hm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1wtm m1rZ mZrym 1ny yhwh 1lhykm for unto me children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel are workers; they are my workers whom i brought forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ki li bene yisra’el ‘abadim ‘abaday hem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
l1 t8Sw lkm 1lylm wpsl wmZbh l1 tqymw lkm w1bn mSkyt l1 ttnw b1rZkm lhStHwt 8lyh ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm ye make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither ye set up any image of father-child-stone in your land, to partake in it: for i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. lo ta‘asu lakhem ’elilim ufesel umazebah lo taqimu lakhem ve’eben maskit lo titenu be’arzekhem lehishtakhavot ‘aleha, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
1t Sbtty tSmrw wmqdSy tyr1w 1ny yhwh ye keep my seven-sabbaths, and reverence my dedicated-finished: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. shabetotay tishmoru umiqdashi tira’u, ’ani yhvh.
1m bHqty tlkw w1t mZwty tSmrw w8Sytm 1tm if ye walk in my statutes, and keep my order-prescriptions, and do them; ’im bekhuqotay telekhu, ve’et mizvotay tishmeru va‘asitem ’otam.
wntty gSmykm b8tm wntnh h1rZ ybwlh w8Z hSdh ytn pryw then i will give you rain in due season, and the land yield her increase, and the trees of the field yield their fruit. venatati gishmekhem be‘itam, venatenah ha’arez yebulah ve‘ez hasadeh yiten piryo.
whSyg lkm dyS 1t bZyr wbZyr ySyg 1t zr8 w1kltm lHmkm lSb8 wySbtm lbTH b1rZkm and your threshing reach unto the vintage, and the vintage reach unto the sowing time: and ye eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely. vehisig lakhem dayish bazir ubazir yasig zara‘, va’akhaltem lakhmekhem lasoba‘ vishabtem labetakh be’arzekhem.
wntty Slwm b1rZ wSkbtm w1yn mHryd whSbty Hyh r8h mn h1rZ wHrb l1 t8br b1rZkm and i will give peace in the land, and ye lie down, and none make you afraid: and i will rid bad beasts out of the land, neither the sword go through your land. venatati shalom ba’arez ushekhabtem ve’en makharid, vehishbati khayah ra‘ah min ha’arez vekhereb lo ta‘abor be’arzekhem.
wrdptm 1t 1ybykm wnplw lpnykm lHrb and ye chase your father-adversaries, and they fall before-turns you by the sword. uredaftem ’oyebekhem, venafelu lifnekhem lekhareb

1ny yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1tkm m1rZ mZrym mhyt lhm 8bdym w1Sbr mTt 8lkm w1wlk 1tkm qwmmywt i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which brought you forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim, that ye should not be their workers; and i have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright. ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim mihyot lahem ‘abadim, va’eshbor motot ‘ulekhem va’olekh qomiyut.

1lh hHqym whmSpTym whtwrt 1Sr ntn yhwh bynw wbyn bny ySr1l bhr syny byd mSh these are the statutes and decision-grammars and teachings, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made between-bin him and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in mount bush-(proto-)sinai by the hand of extracted-mose. ’eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim vehatorot ’asher natan yhvh beno uben benei yisra’el, behar sinay beyad mosheh.

w1m nqbh hw1 whyh 8rkk SlSym Sql and if it be a pierced, then thy estimation be thirty light-shekels. ve’im neqebah hi vehayah ‘erkekha sheloshim shaqel.

w1m bhmh 1Sr yqrybw mmnh qrbn lyhwh kl 1Sr ytn mmnw lyhwh yhyh qdS and if it be a beast, whereof men bring an inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, all that any man giveth of such unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou be dedicated-finished. ve’im behemah ’asher yaqribu qarban yhvh, kol ’asher yiten mimenu yhvh yihyeh qodesh.
l1 yHlypnw wl1 ymyr 1tw Twb br8 1w r8 bTwb w1m hmr ymyr bhmh bbhmh whyh hw1 wtmwrtw yhyh qdS he not alter it, nor change it, a good for a bad, or a bad for a good: and if he at all change beast for beast, then it and the exchange thereof be dedicated-finished. lo yakhalifenu velo yamir ’oto tob bera‘ ’o ra‘ betob, ve’im hamer yamir behemah bibhemah vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh.
w1m kl bhmh Tm1h 1Sr l1 yqrybw mmnh qrbn lyhwh wh8myd 1t hbhmh lpny hkhn and if it be any stained-ceased beast, of which they do not inward a butcher unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, then he present the beast before-turns the dimmer-server: ve’im kal behemah teme’ah ’asher lo yaqribu qarban yhvh, vehe‘emid habehemah lifnei hakohen.
wh8ryk hkhn 1th byn Twb wbyn r8 k8rkk hkhn kn yhyh and the dimmer-server value it, whether it be good or bad: as thou valuest it, who art the dimmer-server, so it be. vehe‘erikh hakohen ’otah ben tob uben ra‘, ke‘erkekha hakohen ken yihyeh.
w1m g1l yg1lnh wysp HmyStw 8l 8rkk and if he will at all redeem it, then he add a fifth part thereof unto thy estimation. ve’im ga’ol yig’alenah, veyasaf khamishito ‘al ‘erkekha.
w1yS ky yqdS 1t bytw qdS lyhwh wh8rykw hkhn byn Twb wbyn r8 k1Sr y8ryk 1tw hkhn kn yqwm and when a man dedicate-finify his daughter-house to be dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, then the dimmer-server estimate it, whether it be good or bad: as the dimmer-server estimate it, so it stand. ve’ish ki yaqdish beto qodesh yhvh vehe‘erikho hakohen ben tob uben ra‘, ka’asher ya‘arikh ’oto hakohen ken yaqum.

w1m mSdh 1Hztw yqdyS 1yS lyhwh whyh 8rkk lpy zr8w zr8 Hmr S8rym bHmSym Sql ksp and if a man dedicate-finify unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou some part of a field of his possession, then thy estimation be according to the seed thereof: an homer of gates-barley seed be valued at fifty light-shekels of silver. ve’im misedeh ’akhuzato yaqdish ’ish yhvh vehayah ‘erkekha lefi zar‘o, zera‘ khomer se‘orim bakhamishim sheqel kasef.
1m mSnt hybl yqdyS Sdhw k8rkk yqwm if he dedicate-finify his field from the year of river-jubilee, according to thy estimation it stand. ’im mishenat hayobel yaqdish sadehu, ke‘erkekha yaqum.
w1m 1Hr hybl yqdyS Sdhw wHSb lw hkhn 1t hksp 8l py hSnym hnwtrt 8d Snt hybl wngr8 m8rkk and if he dedicate-finify his field after the river-jubilee, then the dimmer-server reckon unto him the money according to the years that remain, even unto the year of the river-jubilee, and it be abated from thy estimation. ve’im ’akhar hayobel yaqdish sadehu vekhishab lo hakohen hakesef ‘al hashanim hanotarot ‘ad shenat hayobel, venigra‘ me‘erkekha.
w1m g1l yg1l 1t hSdh hmqdyS 1tw wysp HmSyt ksp 8rkk 8lyw wqm lw and if he that dedicated-finished the field will in any wise redeem it, then he add the fifth part of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it be assured to him. ve’im ga’ol yig’al hasadeh hamaqdish ’oto, veyasaf khamishit kesef ‘erkekha ‘alav veqam lo.
w1m l1 yg1l 1t hSdh w1m mkr 1t hSdh l1yS 1Hr l1 yg1l 8wd and if he will not redeem the field, or if he have sold the field to another man, it not be redeemed any more. ve’im lo yig’al hasadeh ve’im makhar hasadeh le’ish ’akher, lo yiga’el ‘od.
whyh hSdh bZ1tw bybl qdS lyhwh kSdh hHrm lkhn thyh 1Hztw and the field, when it goeth out in the river-jubilee, be dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, as a field devoted; the possession thereof be the dimmer-server's. vehayah hasadeh bezeto bayobel qodesh yhvh kisdeh hakherem, lakohen tihyeh ’akhuzato.
w1m 1t Sdh mqntw 1Sr l1 mSdh 1Hztw yqdyS lyhwh and if a man dedicate-finify unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou a field which he hath bought, which is not of the fields of his possession; ve’im sedeh miqnato ’asher lo misedeh ’akhuzato, yaqdish yhvh.
wHSb lw hkhn 1t mkst h8rkk 8d Snt hybl wntn 1t h8rkk bywm hhw1 qdS lyhwh then the dimmer-server reckon unto him the worth of thy estimation, even unto the year of the river-jubilee: and he give thine estimation in that day, as a dedicated-finished thing unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vekhishab lo hakohen mikhsat ha‘erkekha ‘ad shenat hayobel, venatan ha‘erkekha bayom hahu qodesh yhvh.
bSnt hywbl ySwb hSdh l1Sr qnhw m1tw l1Sr lw 1Hzt h1rZ in the year of the river-jubilee the field return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong. bishnat hayobel yashub hasadeh la’asher qanahu me’ito, la’asher lo ’akhuzat ha’arez.
wkl 8rkk yhyh bSql hqdS 8Srym grh yhyh hSql and all thy estimations be according to the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished: double-ten-twenty stranger-gerahs be the light-shekel. vekhal ‘erkekha yihyeh besheqel haqodesh, ‘esrim gerah yihyeh hashaqel.
1k bkwr 1Sr ybkr lyhwh bbhmh l1 yqdyS 1yS 1tw 1m Swr 1m Sh lyhwh hw1 only the firstling of the beasts, which should be yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's firstling, no man dedicate-finify it; whether it be wall-ox, or sheep: it is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's. ’akh bekhor ’asher yebukar yhvh bibhemah lo yaqdish ’ish ’im shor ’im seh yhvh hu.
w1m bbhmh hTm1h wpdh b8rkk wysp HmStw 8lyw w1m l1 yg1l wnmkr b8rkk and if it be of an stained-ceased beast, then he redeem it according to thine estimation, and add a fifth part of it thereto: or if it be not redeemed, then it be sold according to thy estimation. ve’im babehemah hateme’ah ufadah be‘erkekha veyasaf khamishito ‘alav, ve’im lo yiga’el venimkar be‘erkekha.
1k kl Hrm 1Sr yHrm 1yS lyhwh mkl 1Sr lw m1dm wbhmh wmSdh 1Hztw l1 ymkr wl1 yg1l kl Hrm qdS qdSym hw1 lyhwh notwithstanding no devoted thing, that a man devote unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou of all that he hath, both of man and beast, and of the field of his possession, be sold or redeemed: every devoted thing is most dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’akh kherem ’asher yakharim ’ish yhvh mikal ’asher lo me’adam ubehemah umisedeh ’akhuzato lo yimakher velo yiga’el, kal kherem qodesh qadashim hu yhvh.
kl Hrm 1Sr yHrm mn h1dm l1 ypdh mwt ywmt none devoted, which be devoted of men, be redeemed; and surely be put to death. kal kherem ’asher yakhoram min ha’adam lo yipadeh, mot yumat.
wkl m8Sr h1rZ mzr8 h1rZ mpry h8Z lyhwh hw1 qdS lyhwh and all the tithe of the land, whether of the seed of the land, or of the fruit of the tree, is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's: it is dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vekhal ma‘sar ha’arez mizera‘ ha’arez miperi ha‘ez yhvh hu, qodesh yhvh.
w1m g1l yg1l 1yS mm8Srw HmSytw ysp 8lyw and if a man will at all redeem ought of his tithes, he add thereto the fifth part thereof. ve’im ga’ol yig’al ’ish mima‘asro, khamishito yosef ‘alav.
wkl m8Sr bqr wZ1n kl 1Sr y8br tHt hSbT h8Syry yhyh qdS lyhwh and concerning the tithe of the visit-cattle, or of the flock, even of whatsoever passeth under the pen, the tenth be dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vekhal ma‘sar baqar vazon kol ’asher ya‘abor takhat hashabet, ha‘asiri yihyeh qodesh yhvh.
l1 ybqr byn Twb lr8 wl1 ymyrnw w1m hmr ymyrnw whyh hw1 wtmwrtw yhyh qdS l1 yg1l he not search whether it be good or bad, neither he change it: and if he change it at all, then both it and the change thereof be dedicated-finished; it not be redeemed. lo yebaqer ben tob lara‘ velo yemirenu, ve’im hamer yemirenu vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh lo yiga’el.
1lh hmZwt 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh 1l bny ySr1l bhr syny these are the order-prescriptions, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose for children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in mount bush-(proto-)sinai. ’eleh hamizvot ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ’el benei yisra’el, behar sinay.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh bmdbr syny b1hl mw8d b1Hd lHdS hSny bSnh hSnyt lZ1tm m1rZ mZrym l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose in the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai, in the tent of until-conception, on the first day of the second month, in the second year after they were come out of the land of narrows-mizraim, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh bemidbar sinay be’ohel mo‘ed, be’ekhad lakhodesh hasheni bashanah hashenit lezetam me’erez mizrayim lemor.
S1w 1t r1S kl 8dt bny ySr1l lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smwt kl zkr lglgltm take ye the sum of all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, with the number of their names, every rememberer by their polls; se’u rosh kal ‘adat bene yisra’el lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot kal zakhar legulgelotam.
mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 bySr1l tpqdw 1tm lZb1tm 1th w1hrn from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that are able to go forth to war in saturated-towards-israel: thou and cabinet-aaron number them by their troop-clusters. miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kal yozei zaba beyisra’el, tifqedu ’otam lezib’otam ’atah ve’aharon.
w1tkm yhyw 1yS 1yS lmTh 1yS r1S lbyt 1btyw hw1 and with you there be a man of every branch; every one head of the daughter-house of his fathers. ve’itekhem yihyu ’ish ’ish lamateh, ’ish rosh lebet ’abotav hu.
w1lh Smwt h1nSym 1Sr y8mdw 1tkm lr1wbn 1lyZwr bn Sdy1wr and these are the names of the men that stand with you: of the branch of buddy-see-child-reuben; my-towards-flint-elizur child-between of my-breast-light-shediur. ve’eleh shemot ha’anashim ’asher ya‘amdu ’itekhem, lir’uben ’elizur ben shede’ur.
lSm8wn Slmy1l bn ZwrySdy of hear-home-simeon; my-whole-towards child-between of my-flint-my-breast-flint-zurishaddai. leshim‘on shelumi’el ben zurishaday.
lyhwdh nHSwn bn 8myndb of know-judah; pioneer-nahshon child-between of my-people-contribute-aminadab. lihudah nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.
lySSkr ntn1l bn Zw8r of wage-issachar; given-towards-nethaneel child-between of junior-zuar. leyisashkhar netan’el ben zu‘ar.
lzbwln 1ly1b bn Hln of fertile-zebulun; my-towards-dad-my-towards-eliab child-between of success-sick-helon. lizbulun ’eli’ab ben khelon.
lbny ywsp l1prym 1lySm8 bn 8myhwd lmnSh gmly1l bn pdhZwr of children-betweens of add-joseph: of fruitful-ephraim; towards-saves-elishama child-between of with-my-glory-amihud: of place-of-sleep-manasseh; my-detox-ripen-camel-towards-gamaliel child-between of cash-in-flint-pedahzur. libnei yosef le’efrayim ’elishama‘ ben ‘amihud, limnasheh gamli’el ben pedahzur.
lbnymn 1bydn bn gd8ny of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin; my-father-deals-with-abidan child-between of my-cut-down-gideoni. lebinyamin ’abidan ben gid‘oni.
ldn 1Hy8zr bn 8mySdy of discuss-dan; my-brother-help-ahiezer child-between of my-with-my-breast-amishadai. ledan ’akhi‘ezer ben ‘amishaday.
l1Sr pg8y1l bn 8krn of bliss-asher; my-injury-towards-pagiel child-between of disturb-ocran. le’asher pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
lgd 1lysp bn d8w1l of luck-gad; my-towards-adds-my-towards-eliasaph child-between of know-towards-deuel. legad ’elyasaf ben de‘u’el.
lnptly 1Hyr8 bn 8ynn of twisted-naphtali; my-brother-ra-ahira child-between of torture-eye-enan. lenaftali ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
1lh qry1y qrw1y h8dh nSy1y mTwt 1bwtm r1Sy 1lpy ySr1l hm these were the renowned of the until-witness, princes of the branchs of their fathers, heads of thousands in saturated-towards-israel. ’eleh qeru’ei ha‘edah nesi’ei matot ’abotam, rashei ’alfei yisra’el hem.
wyqH mSh w1hrn 1t h1nSym h1lh 1Sr nqbw bSmwt and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron took these men which are expressed by their names: vayiqakh mosheh ve’aharon, ha’anashim ha’eleh ’asher niqebu beshemot.
w1t kl h8dh hqhylw b1Hd lHdS hSny wytyldw 8l mSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smwt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh lglgltm and they assembled all the until-witness together on the first day of the second month, and they declared their pedigrees after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, by their polls. ve’et kal ha‘edah hiqhilu be’ekhad lakhodesh hasheni vayityaldu ‘al mishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah legulgelotam.
k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh wypqdm bmdbr syny as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so he numbered them in the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai. ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, vayifqedem bemidbar sinay.
wyhyw bny r1wbn bkr ySr1l twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smwt lglgltm kl zkr mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 and children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben, saturated-towards-israel's eldest child-between, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, by their polls, every rememberer from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; vayihyu bene re’uben bekhor yisra’el toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh r1wbn SSh w1rb8ym 1lp wHmS m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of buddy-see-child-reuben, were forty and six thousand and five hundred. pequdehem lemateh re’uben, shishah ve’arba‘im ’elef vakhamesh me’ot.
lbny Sm8wn twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm pqdyw bmspr Smwt lglgltm kl zkr mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of hear-home-simeon, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, those that were order-numbered of them, according to the number of the names, by their polls, every rememberer from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei shim‘on toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, pequdav bemispar shemot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh Sm8wn tS8h wHmSym 1lp wSlS m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of hear-home-simeon, were fifty and nine thousand and three hundred. pequdehem lemateh shim‘on, tish‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ushelosh me’ot.
lbny gd twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smwt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of luck-gad, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei gad toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh gd HmSh w1rb8ym 1lp wSS m1wt wHmSym those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of luck-gad, were forty and five thousand six hundred and fifty. pequdehem lemateh gad, khamishah ve’arba‘im ’elef veshesh me’ot vakhamishim.
lbny yhwdh twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of know-judah, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei yehudah toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.

lbny ySSkr twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of wage-issachar, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei yisashkhar toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.

lbny zbwln twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of fertile-zebulun, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei zebulun toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh zbwln Sb8h wHmSym 1lp w1rb8 m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of fertile-zebulun, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh zebulun, shib‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
lbny ywsp lbny 1prym twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of add-joseph, namely, of children-betweens of fruitful-ephraim, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei yosef libnei ’efrayim toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh 1prym 1rb8ym 1lp wHmS m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of fruitful-ephraim, were forty thousand and five hundred. pequdehem lemateh ’efrayim, ’arba‘im ’elef vakhamesh me’ot.
lbny mnSh twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smwt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of place-of-sleep-manasseh, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei menasheh toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh mnSh Snym wSlSym 1lp wm1tym those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of place-of-sleep-manasseh, were thirty and two thousand and two hundred. pequdehem lemateh menasheh, shenayim usheloshim ’elef umatayim.
lbny bnymn twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei binyamin toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh bnymn HmSh wSlSym 1lp w1rb8 m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin, were thirty and five thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh binyamin, khamishah usheloshim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
lbny dn twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of discuss-dan, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei dan toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh dn Snym wSSym 1lp wSb8 m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of discuss-dan, were threescore and two thousand and seven hundred. pequdehem lemateh dan, shenayim veshishim ’elef usheba‘ me’ot.
lbny 1Sr twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of bliss-asher, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei ’asher toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.

bny nptly twldtm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm bmspr Smt mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 of children-betweens of twisted-naphtali, throughout their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; benei naftali toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh nptly SlSh wHmSym 1lp w1rb8 m1wt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of twisted-naphtali, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh naftali, sheloshah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
1lh hpqdym 1Sr pqd mSh w1hrn wnSy1y ySr1l Snym 8Sr 1yS 1yS 1Hd lbyt 1btyw hyw these are those that were numbered, which extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron numbered, and the princes of saturated-towards-israel, being twelve men: each one was for the daughter-house of his fathers. ’eleh hapequdim ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon unesi’ei yisra’el shenem ‘asar ’ish, ’ish ’ekhad lebet ’abotav hayu.
wyhyw kl pqwdy bny ySr1l lbyt 1btm mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh kl yZ1 Zb1 bySr1l so were all those that were numbered of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, by the daughter-house of their fathers, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters in saturated-towards-israel; vayihyu kal pequdei bene yisra’el lebet ’abotam, miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kal yozei zaba beyisra’el.
wyhyw kl hpqdym SS m1wt 1lp wSlSt 1lpym wHmS m1wt wHmSym even all they that were numbered were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty. vayihyu kal hapequdim shesh me’ot ’elef usheloshet ’alafim, vakhamesh me’ot vakhamishim.
whlwym lmTh 1btm l1 htpqdw btwkm and the join-levites after the branch of their fathers were not numbered among them. vehalviyim lemateh ’abotam, lo hatepaqedu betokham.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had bee-spoken unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
1k 1t mTh lwy l1 tpqd w1t r1Sm l1 tS1 btwk bny ySr1l only no number the branch of join-levi, neither take the sum of them among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: ’akh mateh levi lo tifqod ve’et rosham lo tisa, betokh benei yisra’el.
w1th hpqd 1t hlwym 8l mSkn h8dt w8l kl klyw w8l kl 1Sr lw hmh yS1w 1t hmSkn w1t kl klyw whm ySrthw wsbyb lmSkn yHnw and thou appoint the join-levites over the dwelling of until-witness, and over all the tools thereof, and over all things that belong to it: they bear the dwelling, and all the tools thereof; and they unto it, and encamp round about the dwelling. ve’atah hafqed halviyim ‘al mishkan ha‘edut ve‘al kal kelav ve‘al kal ’asher lo hemah yis’u hamishkan ve’et kal kelav vehem yesharetuhu, vesabib lamishkan yakhanu.
wbns8 hmSkn ywrydw 1tw hlwym wbHnt hmSkn yqymw 1tw hlwym whzr hqrb ywmt and when the dwelling setteth forward, the join-levites take it down: and when the dwelling is to be pitched, the join-levites set it up: and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. ubinsoa‘ hamishkan yoridu ’oto halviyim ubakhanot hamishkan yaqimu ’oto halviyim, vehazar haqareb yumat.
wHnw bny ySr1l 1yS 8l mHnhw w1yS 8l dglw lZb1tm and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel pitch their tents, every man by his own camp, and every man by his own standard, throughout their troop-clusters. vekhanu benei yisra’el, ’ish ‘al makhanehu ve’ish ‘al diglo lezib’otam.
whlwym yHnw sbyb lmSkn h8dt wl1 yhyh qZp 8l 8dt bny ySr1l wSmrw hlwym 1t mSmrt mSkn h8dwt and the join-levites pitch round about the dwelling of until-witness, that there be no wrath upon the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and the join-levites keep the charge of the dwelling of until-witness. vehalviyim yakhanu sabib lemishkan ha‘edut velo yihyeh qezef ‘al ‘adat benei yisra’el, veshameru halviyim mishmeret mishkan ha‘edut.
wy8Sw bny ySr1l kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh kn 8Sw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so did they. vaya‘asu benei yisra’el, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asu.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
1yS 8l dglw b1tt lbyt 1btm yHnw bny ySr1l mngd sbyb l1hl mw8d yHnw every man of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their father's daughter-house: far off about the tent of until-conception they pitch. ’ish ‘al diglo be’otot lebet ’abotam yakhanu benei yisra’el, mineged sabib le’ohel mo‘ed yakhanu.
whHnym qdmh mzrHh dgl mHnh yhwdh lZb1tm wnSy1 lbny yhwdh nHSwn bn 8myndb and on the east side toward the rising of the sun they of the standard of the camp of know-judah pitch throughout their troop-clusters: and pioneer-nahshon child-between of my-people-contribute-aminadab be captain of children-betweens of know-judah. vehakhonim qedemah mizrakhah degel makhaneh yehudah lezib’otam, venasi libnei yehudah nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.
wZb1w wpqdyhm 1rb8h wSb8ym 1lp wSS m1wt and his troop-cluster, and those that were order-numbered of them, were threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred. uzeba’o ufequdehem, ’arba‘ah veshib‘im ’elef veshesh me’ot.
whHnym 8lyw mTh ySSkr wnSy1 lbny ySSkr ntn1l bn Zw8r and those that do pitch next unto him be the branch of wage-issachar: and given-towards-nethaneel child-between of junior-zuar be captain of children-betweens of wage-issachar. vehakhonim ‘alav mateh yisashkhar, venasi libnei yisashkhar netan’el ben zu‘ar.
wZb1w wpqdyw 1rb8h wHmSym 1lp w1rb8 m1wt and his troop-cluster, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred. uzeba’o ufequdav, ’arba‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.

kl hpqdym lmHnh yhwdh m1t 1lp wSmnym 1lp wSSt 1lpym w1rb8 m1wt lZb1tm r1Snh ys8w all that were numbered in the camp of know-judah were an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, throughout their troop-clusters. these first set forth. kal hapequdim lemakhaneh yehudah me’at ’elef ushemonim ’elef vesheshet ’alafim ve’arba‘ me’ot lezib’otam, rishonah yisa‘u.

1lh pqwdy bny ySr1l lbyt 1btm kl pqwdy hmHnt lZb1tm SS m1wt 1lp wSlSt 1lpym wHmS m1wt wHmSym these are those which were numbered of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel by the daughter-house of their fathers: all those that were numbered of the camps throughout their troop-clusters were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty. ’eleh pequdei bene yisra’el lebet ’abotam, kal pequdei hamakhanot lezib’otam shesh me’ot ’elef usheloshet ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot vakhamishim.

w1ny hnh lqHty 1t hlwym mtwk bny ySr1l tHt kl bkwr pTr rHm mbny ySr1l whyw ly hlwym and i, behold, i have taken the join-levites from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel instead of all the firstborn that openeth the womb-matrix among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: therefore the join-levites be mine; va’ani hineh laqakhti halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el takhat kal bekhor peter rekhem mibenei yisra’el, vehayu li halviyim.
ky ly kl bkwr bywm hkty kl bkwr b1rZ mZrym hqdSty ly kl bkwr bySr1l m1dm 8d bhmh ly yhyw 1ny yhwh because all the firstborn are mine; for on the day that i smote all the firstborn in the land of narrows-mizraim i dedicateed unto me all the firstborn in saturated-towards-israel, both man and beast: mine they be: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ki li kal bekhor beyom hakoti khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim hiqdashti li khal bekhor beyisra’el me’adam ‘ad behemah, li yihyu ’ani yhvh.

wnSy1 nSy1y hlwy 1l8zr bn 1hrn hkhn pqdt Smry mSmrt hqdS and towards-stop-eleazar child-between of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server be chief over the chief of the join-levites, and have the oversight of them that keep the charge of the dedicated-finished. unesi nesi’ei halevi ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen, pequdat shomerei mishmeret haqodesh.
lmrry mSpHt hmHly wmSpHt hmwSy 1lh hm mSpHt mrry of bitter-merari was the family of the disease-forgive-mahlites, and the family of the my-draw-mushites: these are the families of bitter-merari. limrari mishpakhat hamakhli umishpakhat hamushi, ’eleh hem mishpekhot merari.
