wpqdt mSmrt bny mrry qrSy hmSkn wbryHyw w8mdyw w1dnyw wkl klyw wkl 8bdtw and under the custody and charge of children-betweens of bitter-merari be the boards of the dwelling, and the bars thereof, and the column-stands thereof, and the sockets thereof, and all the tools thereof, and all that serveth thereto, ufequdat mishmeret benei merari qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve‘amudav va’adanav, vekhal kelav vekhol ‘abodato.
w8mdy hHZr sbyb w1dnyhm wytdtm wmytryhm and the column-stands of the court round about, and their sockets, and their pins, and their cords. ve‘amudei hekhazer sabib ve’adnehem, vitedotam umeterehem.
whHnym lpny hmSkn qdmh lpny 1hl mw8d mzrHh mSh w1hrn wbnyw Smrym mSmrt hmqdS lmSmrt bny ySr1l whzr hqrb ywmt and those that encamp before-turns the dwelling toward the east, even before-turns the tent of until-conception eastward, be extracted-mose, and cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens, keeping the charge of the dedicated-finished for the charge of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. vehakhonim lifnei hamishkan qedemah lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed mizrakhah mosheh ve’aharon ubanav shomerim mishmeret hamiqdash lemishmeret benei yisra’el, vehazar haqareb yumat.
kl pqwdy hlwym 1Sr pqd mSh w1hrn 8l py yhwh lmSpHtm kl zkr mbn HdS wm8lh Snym w8Srym 1lp all that were numbered of the join-levites, which extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron numbered at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, throughout their families, all the rememberers from a month old and upward, were double-ten-twenty and two thousand. kal pequdei halviyim ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh lemishpekhotam, kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘lah shenayim ve‘esrim ’alef.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh pqd kl bkr zkr lbny ySr1l mbn HdS wm8lh wS1 1t mspr Smtm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, number all the firstborn of the rememberers of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from a month old and upward, and take the number of their names. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh peqod kal bekhor zakhar libnei yisra’el miben khodesh vama‘elah, vesa mispar shemotam.
wlqHt 1t hlwym ly 1ny yhwh tHt kl bkr bbny ySr1l w1t bhmt hlwym tHt kl bkwr bbhmt bny ySr1l and thou take the join-levites for me (i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou) instead of all the firstborn among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; and the in-them-animal of the join-levites instead of all the firstlings among the in-them-animal of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. velaqakhta halviyim li ’ani yhvh takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el, ve’et behemat halviyim takhat kal bekhor bebehemat benei yisra’el.
wypqd mSh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw 1t kl bkr bbny ySr1l and extracted-mose numbered, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him, all the firstborn among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayifqod mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto, kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el.
wyhy kl bkwr zkr bmspr Smwt mbn HdS wm8lh lpqdyhm Snym w8Srym 1lp SlSh wSb8ym wm1tym and all the firstborn rememberers by the number of names, from a month old and upward, of those that were order-numbered of them, were double-ten-twenty and two thousand two hundred and threescore and thirteen. vayhi khal bekhor zakhar bemispar shemot miben khodesh vama‘lah lifqudehem, shenayim ve‘esrim ’elef sheloshah veshib‘im umatayim.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qH 1t hlwym tHt kl bkwr bbny ySr1l w1t bhmt hlwym tHt bhmtm whyw ly hlwym 1ny yhwh take the join-levites instead of all the firstborn among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and the in-them-animal of the join-levites instead of their in-them-animal; and the join-levites be mine: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. qakh halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el ve’et behemat halviyim takhat behemtam, vehayu li halviyim ’ani yhvh.
w1t pdwyy hSlSh whSb8ym whm1tym h8dpym 8l hlwym mbkwr bny ySr1l and for those that are to be redeemed of the two hundred and threescore and thirteen of the firstborn of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which are more than the join-levites; ve’et peduyei hasheloshah vehashib‘im vehamatayim, ha‘odefim ‘al halviyim mibekhor benei yisra’el.
wlqHt HmSt HmSt Sqlym lglglt bSql hqdS tqH 8Srym grh hSql thou even take five light-shekels apiece by the poll, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished thou take them: (the light-shekel is double-ten-twenty stranger-gerahs:) velaqakhta khameshet khameshet sheqalim lagulgolet, besheqel haqodesh tiqakh ‘esrim gerah hashaqel.
wntth hksp l1hrn wlbnyw pdwyy h8dpym bhm and thou give the money, wherewith the odd number of them is to be redeemed, unto cabinet-aaron and to his children-betweens. venatatah hakesef le’aharon ulebanav, peduyei ha‘odefim bahem.
wyqH mSh 1t ksp hpdywm m1t h8dpym 8l pdwyy hlwym and extracted-mose took the redemption money of them that were over and above them that were redeemed by the join-levites: vayiqakh mosheh kesef hapidyom, me’et ha‘odefim ‘al peduyei halviyim.
m1t bkwr bny ySr1l lqH 1t hksp HmSh wSSym wSlS m1wt w1lp bSql hqdS of the firstborn of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel took he the money; a thousand three hundred and threescore and five light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished: me’et bekhor benei yisra’el laqakh hakasef, khamishah veshishim ushelosh me’ot va’elef besheqel haqodesh.
wytn mSh 1t ksp hpdym l1hrn wlbnyw 8l py yhwh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and extracted-mose gave the money of them that were redeemed unto cabinet-aaron and to his children-betweens, according to the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayiten mosheh kesef hapeduyim le’aharon ulebanav ‘al pi yhvh, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
nS1 1t r1S bny qht mtwk bny lwy lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm take the sum of children-betweens of obedient-hope-kohath from inward children-betweens of join-levi, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, naso rosh benei qehat mitokh benei levi, lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh w8d bn HmSym Snh kl b1 lZb1 l8Swt ml1kh b1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward even until fifty years old, all that enter into the troop-cluster, to do the work in the tent of until-conception. miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal ba lazaba la‘asot melakhah be’ohel mo‘ed.
z1t 8bdt bny qht b1hl mw8d qdS hqdSym this be the work of children-betweens of obedient-hope-kohath in the tent of until-conception, about the most dedicated-finished things: zot ‘abodat bene qehat be’ohel mo‘ed, qodesh haqodashim.
wb1 1hrn wbnyw bns8 hmHnh whwrdw 1t prkt hmsk wksw bh 1t 1rn h8dt and when the camp setteth forward, cabinet-aaron come, and his children-betweens, and they take down the covering breaker, and cover the cabinet of until-witness with it: uba ’aharon ubanav binsoa‘ hamakhaneh vehoridu parokhet hamasakh, vekhisu bah ’et ’aron ha‘edut.
wntnw 8lyw kswy 8wr tHS wprSw bgd klyl tklt mlm8lh wSmw bdyw and put thereon the covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and spread over it a cloth wholly of blue, and put in the canvas thereof. venatenu ‘alav kesui ‘or takhash ufaresu beged kelil tekhelet milma‘elah, vesamu badav.
w8l SlHn hpnym yprSw bgd tklt wntnw 8lyw 1t hq8rt w1t hkpt w1t hmnqyt w1t qSwt hnsk wlHm htmyd 8lyw yhyh and upon the table of within-turns-bread they spread a cloth of blue, and put thereon the dishes, and the spoons, and the bowls, and covers to cover withal: and the continual bread be thereon: ve‘al shulkhan hapanim yifresu beged tekhelet venatenu ‘alav haqe‘arot ve’et hakapot ve’et hamenaqiyot ve’et qesot hanasekh, velekhem hatamid ‘alav yihyeh.
wprSw 8lyhm bgd twl8t Sny wksw 1tw bmksh 8wr tHS wSmw 1t bdyw and they spread upon them a cloth of two caterpillars, and cover the same with a covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and put in the canvas thereof. ufaresu ‘alehem beged tola‘at shani vekhisu ’oto bemikhseh ‘or takhash, vesamu badav.
wlqHw bgd tklt wksw 1t mnrt hm1wr w1t nrtyh w1t mlqHyh w1t mHttyh w1t kl kly Smnh 1Sr ySrtw lh bhm and they take a cloth of blue, and cover the light-stream-candle of the light, and his lamps, and his tongs, and his shutters, and all the name-from-oil tools thereof, wherewith they unto it: velaqekhu beged tekhelet vekhisu menorat hama’or ve’et neroteha ve’et malqakheha ve’et makhtoteha, ve’et kal kelei shamnah ’asher yesharetu lah bahem.
wntnw 1th w1t kl klyh 1l mksh 8wr tHS wntnw 8l hmwT and they put it and all the tools thereof within a covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and put it upon a bar. venatenu ’otah ve’et kal keleha ’el mikhseh ‘or takhash, venatenu ‘al hamot.
w8l mzbH hzhb yprSw bgd tklt wksw 1tw bmksh 8wr tHS wSmw 1t bdyw and upon the golden butcher-kitchen they spread a cloth of blue, and cover it with a covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and put to the canvas thereof: ve‘al mizbakh hazahab yifresu beged tekhelet vekhisu ’oto bemikhseh ‘or takhash, vesamu badav.
wlqHw 1t kl kly hSrt 1Sr ySrtw bm bqdS wntnw 1l bgd tklt wksw 1wtm bmksh 8wr tHS wntnw 8l hmwT and they take all the instruments of ministry, wherewith they in the dedicated-finished, and put them in a cloth of blue, and cover them with a covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and put them on a bar: velaqekhu kal kelei hasharet ’asher yesharetu bam baqodesh venatenu ’el beged tekhelet vekhisu ’otam bemikhseh ‘or takhash, venatenu ‘al hamot.
wdSnw 1t hmzbH wprSw 8lyw bgd 1rgmn and they take away the ashes from the butcher-kitchen, and spread a purple cloth thereon: vedishenu hamizbeakh, ufaresu ‘alav beged ’argaman.
wntnw 8lyw 1t kl klyw 1Sr ySrtw 8lyw bhm 1t hmHtt 1t hmzlgt w1t hy8ym w1t hmzrqt kl kly hmzbH wprSw 8lyw kswy 8wr tHS wSmw bdyw and they put upon it all the tools thereof, wherewith they about it, even the censers, the fleshhooks, and the shovels, and the basins, all the tools of the butcher-kitchen; and they spread upon it a covering of feel-takhash light-skins, and put to the canvas of it. venatenu ‘alav kal kelav ’asher yesharetu ‘alav bahem hamakhtot hamizlagot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizraqot kol kelei hamizbeakh, ufaresu ‘alav kesui ‘or takhash vesamu badav.
wklh 1hrn wbnyw lkst 1t hqdS w1t kl kly hqdS bns8 hmHnh w1Hry kn yb1w bny qht lS1t wl1 yg8w 1l hqdS wmtw 1lh mS1 bny qht b1hl mw8d and when cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens have made an end of covering the dedicated-finished, and all the tools of the dedicated-finished, as the camp is to set forward; after that, children-betweens of obedient-hope-kohath come to bear it: and they not touch any dedicated-finished thing, lest they die. these things are the burden of children-betweens of obedient-hope-kohath in the tent of until-conception. vekhilah ’aharon ubanav lekhasot haqodesh ve’et kal kelei haqodesh binsoa‘ hamakhaneh ve’akhare khen yabo’u bene qehat laset velo yige‘u ’el haqodesh vametu, ’eleh masa bene qehat be’ohel mo‘ed.
wpqdt 1l8zr bn 1hrn hkhn Smn hm1wr wqTrt hsmym wmnHt htmyd wSmn hmSHh pqdt kl hmSkn wkl 1Sr bw bqdS wbklyw and to the office of towards-stop-eleazar child-between of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server pertaineth the name-from-oil for the light, and the smoke drug, and the daily absorber, and the lubeing name-from-oil, and the oversight of all the dwelling, and of all that therein is, in the dedicated-finished, and in the tools thereof. ufequdat ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen shemen hama’or uqetoret hasamim uminkhat hatamid veshemen hamishkhah, pequdat kal hamishkan vekhal ’asher bo beqodesh ubekhelav.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
1l tkrytw 1t SbT mSpHt hqhty mtwk hlwym cut ye not off the branch of the families of the obedient-hope-kohathites from inward the join-levites: ’al takhritu shebet mishpekhot haqehati, mitokh halviyim.
wz1t 8Sw lhm wHyw wl1 ymtw bgStm 1t qdS hqdSym 1hrn wbnyw yb1w wSmw 1wtm 1yS 1yS 8l 8bdtw w1l mS1w and thus do unto them, that they may live, and not die, when they approach unto the most dedicated-finished things: cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens go in, and appoint them every one to his work and to his burden: vezot ‘asu lahem vekhayu velo yamutu begishtam qodesh haqodashim, ’aharon ubanav yabo’u vesamu ’ish ’ish ‘al ‘abodato ve’el masa’o.
wl1 yb1w lr1wt kbl8 1t hqdS wmtw and they not go in to see when the dedicated-finished things are covered, lest they die. velo yabo’u lir’ot kebala‘ haqodesh vametu.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
nS1 1t r1S bny grSwn gm hm lbyt 1btm lmSpHtm take also the sum of children-betweens of drive-out-gershon, throughout the daughter-houses of their fathers, by their families; naso rosh benei gereshon gam hem, lebet ’abotam lemishpekhotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh 8d bn HmSym Snh tpqd 1wtm kl hb1 lZb1 Zb1 l8bd 8bdh b1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward until fifty years old thou number them; all that enter in to perform the work, to do the work in the tent of until-conception. miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ‘ad ben khamishim shanah tifqod ’otam, kal haba lizbo zaba la‘abod ‘abodah be’ohel mo‘ed.
z1t 8bdt mSpHt hgrSny l8bd wlmS1 this is the work of the families of the drive-out-gershonites, to work for, and for burdens: zot ‘abodat mishpekhot hagereshuni, la‘abod ulemasa.
wnS1w 1t yry8t hmSkn w1t 1hl mw8d mkshw wmksh htHS 1Sr 8lyw mlm8lh w1t msk ptH 1hl mw8d and they bear the curtains of the dwelling, and the tent of until-conception, his covering, and the covering of the feel-takhash light-skins that is above upon it, and the hanging for the opening of the tent of until-conception, venase’u yeri‘ot hamishkan ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed mikhsehu umikhseh hatakhash ’asher ‘alav ve’et masakh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
w1t ql8y hHZr w1t msk ptH S8r hHZr 1Sr 8l hmSkn w8l hmzbH sbyb w1t mytryhm w1t kl kly 8bdtm w1t kl 1Sr y8Sh lhm w8bdw and the hangings of the court, and the hanging for the opening of the hair-gate of the court, which is by the dwelling and by the butcher-kitchen round about, and their cords, and all the instruments of their work, and all that is made for them: so they work for. ve’et qal‘ei hekhazer ve’et masakh petakh sha‘ar hekhazer ’asher ‘al hamishkan ve‘al hamizbeakh sabib ve’et meterehem ve’et kal kelei ‘abodatam, ve’et kal ’asher ye‘aseh lahem ve‘abadu.
8l py 1hrn wbnyw thyh kl 8bdt bny hgrSny lkl mS1m wlkl 8bdtm wpqdtm 8lhm bmSmrt 1t kl mS1m at the appointment of cabinet-aaron and his children-betweens be all the work of children-betweens of the drive-out-gershonites, in all their burdens, and in all their work: and ye appoint unto them in charge all their burdens. ‘al pi ’aharon ubanav tihyeh kal ‘abodat benei hagereshuni lekhal masa’am ulekhol ‘abodatam, ufeqadtem ‘alehem bemishmeret kal masa’am.
z1t 8bdt mSpHt bny hgrSny b1hl mw8d wmSmrtm byd 1ytmr bn 1hrn hkhn this is the work of the families of children-betweens of drive-out-gershon in the tent of until-conception: and their charge be under the hand of with-palm-itamar child-between of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server. zot ‘abodat mishpekhot benei hagereshuni be’ohel mo‘ed, umishmartam beyad ’itamar ben ’aharon hakohen.
bny mrry lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm tpqd 1tm as for children-betweens of bitter-merari, thou number them after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers; benei merari, lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam tifqod ’otam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh w8d bn HmSym Snh tpqdm kl hb1 lZb1 l8bd 1t 8bdt 1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old thou number them, every one that entereth into the work, to do the work of the tent of until-conception. miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah tifqedem, kal haba lazaba la‘abod ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
wz1t mSmrt mS1m lkl 8bdtm b1hl mw8d qrSy hmSkn wbryHyw w8mwdyw w1dnyw and this is the charge of their burden, according to all their work in the tent of until-conception; the boards of the dwelling, and the bars thereof, and the column-stands thereof, and sockets thereof, vezot mishmeret masa’am lekhal ‘abodatam be’ohel mo‘ed, qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve‘amudav va’adanav.
w8mwdy hHZr sbyb w1dnyhm wytdtm wmytryhm lkl klyhm wlkl 8bdtm wbSmt tpqdw 1t kly mSmrt mS1m and the column-stands of the court round about, and their sockets, and their pins, and their cords, with all their instruments, and with all their work: and by name ye reckon the instruments of the charge of their burden. ve‘amudei hekhazer sabib ve’adnehem vitedotam umeterehem lekhal kelehem ulekhol ‘abodatam, ubeshemot tifqedu kelei mishmeret masa’am.
z1t 8bdt mSpHt bny mrry lkl 8bdtm b1hl mw8d byd 1ytmr bn 1hrn hkhn this is the work of the families of children-betweens of bitter-merari, according to all their work, in the tent of until-conception, under the hand of with-palm-itamar child-between of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server. zot ‘abodat mishpekhot benei merari lekhal ‘abodatam be’ohel mo‘ed, beyad ’itamar ben ’aharon hakohen.
wypqd mSh w1hrn wnSy1y h8dh 1t bny hqhty lmSpHtm wlbyt 1btm and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron and the chief of the until-witness numbered children-betweens of the obedient-hope-kohathites after their families, and after the daughter-house of their fathers, vayifqod mosheh ve’aharon unesi’ei ha‘edah benei haqehati, lemishpekhotam ulebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh w8d bn HmSym Snh kl hb1 lZb1 l8bdh b1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that entereth into the work, for the work in the tent of until-conception: miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal haba lazaba la‘abodah be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyhyw pqdyhm lmSpHtm 1lpym Sb8 m1wt wHmSym and those that were order-numbered of them by their families were two thousand seven hundred and fifty. vayihyu fequdehem lemishpekhotam, ’alpayim sheba‘ me’ot vakhamishim.
1lh pqwdy mSpHt hqhty kl h8bd b1hl mw8d 1Sr pqd mSh w1hrn 8l py yhwh byd mSh these were they that were numbered of the families of the obedient-hope-kohathites, all that might do work in the tent of until-conception, which extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron did number according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou by the hand of extracted-mose. ’eleh fequdei mishpekhot haqehati kal ha‘obed be’ohel mo‘ed, ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
wpqwdy bny grSwn lmSpHwtm wlbyt 1btm and those that were numbered of children-betweens of drive-out-gershon, throughout their families, and by the daughter-house of their fathers, ufequdei benei gereshon, lemishpekhotam ulebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh w8d bn HmSym Snh kl hb1 lZb1 l8bdh b1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that entereth into the work, for the work in the tent of until-conception, miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal haba lazaba la‘abodah be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyhyw pqdyhm lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm 1lpym wSS m1wt wSlSym even those that were order-numbered of them, throughout their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, were two thousand and six hundred and thirty. vayihyu pequdehem lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, ’alpayim veshesh me’ot usheloshim.
1lh pqwdy mSpHt bny grSwn kl h8bd b1hl mw8d 1Sr pqd mSh w1hrn 8l py yhwh these are they that were numbered of the families of children-betweens of drive-out-gershon, of all that might do work in the tent of until-conception, whom extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron did number according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’eleh fequde mishpekhot benei gereshon kal ha‘obed be’ohel mo‘ed, ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh.
wpqwdy mSpHt bny mrry lmSpHtm lbyt 1btm and those that were numbered of the families of children-betweens of bitter-merari, throughout their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, ufequdei mishpekhot benei merari, lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh w8d bn HmSym Snh kl hb1 lZb1 l8bdh b1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that entereth into the work, for the work in the tent of until-conception, miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal haba lazaba la‘abodah be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyhyw pqdyhm lmSpHtm SlSt 1lpym wm1tym even those that were order-numbered of them after their families, were three thousand and two hundred. vayihyu fequdehem lemishpekhotam, sheloshet ’alafim umatayim.
1lh pqwdy mSpHt bny mrry 1Sr pqd mSh w1hrn 8l py yhwh byd mSh these be those that were numbered of the families of children-betweens of bitter-merari, whom extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron numbered according to the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou by the hand of extracted-mose. ’eleh fequde mishpekhot benei merari, ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
kl hpqdym 1Sr pqd mSh w1hrn wnSy1y ySr1l 1t hlwym lmSpHtm wlbyt 1btm all those that were numbered of the join-levites, whom extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron and the chief of saturated-towards-israel numbered, after their families, and after the daughter-house of their fathers, kal hapequdim ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon unesi’ei yisra’el halviyim, lemishpekhotam ulebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wm8lh w8d bn HmSym Snh kl hb1 l8bd 8bdt 8bdh w8bdt mS1 b1hl mw8d from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that came to do the work of the ministry, and the work of the burden in the tent of until-conception. miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal haba la‘abod ‘abodat ‘abodah va‘abodat masa be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyhyw pqdyhm Smnt 1lpym wHmS m1wt wSmnym even those that were order-numbered of them, were eight thousand and five hundred and fourscore, vayihyu pequdehem, shemonat ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot ushemonim.
8l py yhwh pqd 1wtm byd mSh 1yS 1yS 8l 8bdtw w8l mS1w wpqdyw 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou they were numbered by the hand of extracted-mose, every one according to his work, and according to his burden: thus were they numbered of him, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. ‘al pi yhvh paqad beyad mosheh ’ish ’ish ‘al ‘abodato ve‘al masa’o, ufequdav ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Zw 1t bny ySr1l wySlHw mn hmHnh kl Zrw8 wkl zb wkl Tm1 lnpS order-prescribe children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they put out of the camp every waspish-speckled, and every one that hath an issue, and whosoever is ceased by the dead: zav benei yisra’el vishalekhu min hamakhaneh kal zarua‘ vekhal zab, vekhol tamei lanafesh.
mzkr 8d nqbh tSlHw 1l mHwZ lmHnh tSlHwm wl1 yTm1w 1t mHnyhm 1Sr 1ny Skn btwkm both rememberer and pierced ye put out, without the camp ye put them; that they cease not their camps, in the midst whereof i dwell. mizakhar ‘ad neqebah teshalekhu ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh teshalekhum, velo yetame’u makhanehem ’asher ’ani shokhen betokham.
wy8Sw kn bny ySr1l wySlHw 1wtm 1l mHwZ lmHnh k1Sr dbr yhwh 1l mSh kn 8Sw bny ySr1l and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel did so, and put them out without the camp: as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, so did children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vaya‘asu khen benei yisra’el vayshalekhu ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh, ka’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh ken ‘asu benei yisra’el.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l 1yS 1w 1Sh ky y8Sw mkl HT1t h1dm lm8l m8l byhwh w1Smh hnpS hhw1 speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, when a man or woman commit any miss that men commit, to do a fire-name to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and that person be fire-name; daber ’el benei yisra’el ’ish ’o ’ishah ki ya‘asu mikal khatot ha’adam lim‘ol ma‘al yhvh, ve’ashemah hanefesh hahiv.
whtwdw 1t HT1tm 1Sr 8Sw whSyb 1t 1Smw br1Sw wHmyStw ysp 8lyw wntn l1Sr 1Sm lw then they confess their miss which they have done: and he recompense his fire-name with the principal thereof, and add unto it the fifth part thereof, and give it unto him against whom he hath fire-nameed. vehitvadu khatatam ’asher ‘asu veheshib ’ashamo berosho vakhamishito yosef ‘alav, venatan la’asher ’asham lo.
w1m 1yn l1yS g1l lhSyb h1Sm 1lyw h1Sm hmwSb lyhwh lkhn mlbd 1yl hkprym 1Sr ykpr bw 8lyw and if the man have no kinsman to recompense the fire-name unto, let the fire-name be recompensed unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, even to the dimmer-server; beside the voiceless-ram of the out-of-town-ment, whereby an out-of-town-ment be made for him. ve’im ’en la’ish go’el lehashib ha’asham ’elav ha’asham hamushab yhvh lakohen, milebad ’el hakipurim ’asher yekhaper bo ‘alav.
wkl trwmh lkl qdSy bny ySr1l 1Sr yqrybw lkhn lw yhyh and every inward of all the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which they bring unto the dimmer-server, be his. vekhal terumah lekhal qadeshei bene yisra’el ’asher yaqribu lakohen lo yihyeh.
w1yS 1t qdSyw lw yhyw 1yS 1Sr ytn lkhn lw yhyh and every man's dedicateed things be his: whatsoever any man giveth the dimmer-server, it be his. ve’ish qodashav lo yihyu, ’ish ’asher yiten lakohen lo yihyeh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm 1yS 1yS ky tSTh 1Stw wm8lh bw m8l speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, if any man's woman go aside, and commit a trespass against him, daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ish ’ish ki tisteh ’ishto uma‘alah bo ma‘al.
wSkb 1yS 1th Skbt zr8 wn8lm m8yny 1ySh wnstrh why1 nTm1h w8d 1yn bh whw1 l1 ntpSh and a man lie with her carnally, and it be hid from the eyes of her man, and be kept close, and she be ceased, and there be no witness against her, neither she be taken with the manner; veshakhab ’ish ’otah shikhbat zera‘ vene‘lam me‘enei ’ishah venisterah vehi nitma’ah, ve‘ed ’en bah vehiv lo nitpasah.
w8br 8lyw rwH qn1h wqn1 1t 1Stw whw1 nTm1h 1w 8br 8lyw rwH qn1h wqn1 1t 1Stw why1 l1 nTm1h and breath-spirit of jealousy come upon him, and he be jealous of his woman, and she be ceased: or if breath-spirit of jealousy come upon him, and he be jealous of his woman, and she be not ceased: ve‘abar ‘alav ruakh qin’ah veqinei ’ishto vehiv nitma’ah, ’o ‘abar ‘alav ruakh qin’ah veqinei ’et ’ishto vehi lo nitma’ah.
whby1 h1yS 1t 1Stw 1l hkhn whby1 1t qrbnh 8lyh 8Syrt h1yph qmH S8rym l1 yZq 8lyw Smn wl1 ytn 8lyw lbnh ky mnHt qn1t hw1 mnHt zkrwn mzkrt 8wn then the man bring his woman unto the dimmer-server, and he inward her inward for her, the tenth part of an tired-ephah of gates-barley meal; he pour no name-from-oil upon it, nor put white-frankincense thereon; for it is an inward of jealousy, an rest-absorber of remembering, bringing torment to remembrance. vehebi ha’ish ’ishto ’el hakohen vehebi qarebanah ‘aleha ‘asirit ha’efah qemakh se‘orim, lo yizoq ‘alav shemen velo yiten ‘alav lebonah ki minkhat qena’ot hu minkhat zikaron mazkeret ‘avon.
whqryb 1th hkhn wh8mdh lpny yhwh and the dimmer-server bring her near, and set her before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vehiqrib hakohen, vehe‘emidah lifnei yhvh.
wlqH hkhn mym qdSym bkly HrS wmn h8pr 1Sr yhyh bqrq8 hmSkn yqH hkhn wntn 1l hmym and the dimmer-server take dedicated-finished from-waters in an earthen tool; and of the dust that is in the floor of the dwelling the dimmer-server take, and put it into the from-waters: velaqakh hakohen mayim qedoshim bikhli khares, umin he‘afar ’asher yihyeh beqarqa‘ hamishkan yiqakh hakohen venatan ’el hamayim.
wh8myd hkhn 1t h1Sh lpny yhwh wpr8 1t r1S h1Sh wntn 8l kpyh 1t mnHt hzkrwn mnHt qn1t hw1 wbyd hkhn yhyw my hmrym hm1rrym and the dimmer-server set the woman before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and uncover the woman's head, and put the rest-absorber of remembering in her hands, which is the jealousy mnkhtabsorber: and the dimmer-server have in his hand the bitter from-waters of the curse: vehe‘emid hakohen ha’ishah lifnei yhvh ufara‘ rosh ha’ishah venatan ‘al kapeha minkhat hazikaron minkhat qena’ot hi ubeyad hakohen yihyu mei hamarim ham’ararim
whSby8 1th hkhn w1mr 1l h1Sh 1m l1 Skb 1yS 1tk w1m l1 STyt Tm1h tHt 1ySk hnqy mmy hmrym hm1rrym h1lh and the dimmer-server charge her by an toward-oath, and say unto the woman, if no man have lain with thee, and if thou hast not gone aside to stained-ceasedness with another instead of thy man, be thou free from this bitter from-waters of the curse: vehishbia‘ ’otah hakohen ve’amar ’el ha’ishah ’im lo shakhab ’ish ’otakh ve’im lo satit tum’ah takhat ’ishekh, hinaqi mimei hamarim ham’ararim ha’eleh.
w1t ky STyt tHt 1ySk wky nTm1t wytn 1yS bk 1t Skbtw mbl8dy 1ySk and if thou hast gone aside to another instead of thy man, and if thou be ceased, and some man have lain with thee beside thine man: ve’at ki satit takhat ’ishekh vekhi nitmet, vayiten ’ish bakh shekhabeto mibal‘adei ’ishekh.
whSby8 hkhn 1t h1Sh bSb8t h1lh w1mr hkhn l1Sh ytn yhwh 1wtk l1lh wlSb8h btwk 8mk btt yhwh 1t yrkk nplt w1t bTnk Zbh then the dimmer-server charge the woman with an toward-oath of cursing, and the dimmer-server say unto the woman, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make thee a curse and an toward-oath among thy with-mum-people, when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou doth make thy thigh to rot, and thy nurture-belly to swell; vehishbia‘ hakohen ha’ishah bishbu‘at ha’alah ve’amar hakohen la’ishah yiten yhvh ’otakh le’alah velishbu‘ah betokh ‘amekh, betet yhvh yerekhekh nofelet ve’et bitnekh zabah.
wb1w hmym hm1rrym h1lh bm8yk lZbwt bTn wlnpl yrk w1mrh h1Sh 1mn 1mn and this from-waters of the curse go into thy bowels, to plow thy gut, and to fall thy thigh: and the woman say, nurture-amen, nurture-amen. uba’u hamayim ham’arerim ha’eleh beme‘ayikh lazbot beten velanpil yarekh, ve’amerah ha’ishah ’amen ’amen.
wktb 1t h1lt h1lh hkhn bspr wmHh 1l my hmrym and the dimmer-server write these tops in a book, and he blot them out with the bitter from-waters: vekhatab ha’alot ha’eleh hakohen basefer, umakhah ’el mei hamarim.
whSqh 1t h1Sh 1t my hmrym hm1rrym wb1w bh hmym hm1rrym lmrym and he cause the woman to drink the bitter from-waters of the curse: and the from-waters of the curse enter into her, and become bitter. vehishqah ’et ha’ishah mei hamarim ham’ararim, uba’u bah hamayim ham’ararim lemarim.
wlqH hkhn myd h1Sh 1t mnHt hqn1t whnyp 1t hmnHh lpny yhwh whqryb 1th 1l hmzbH then the dimmer-server take the jealousy mnkhtabsorber out of the woman's hand, and sieve-pana the inward before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and inward it upon the butcher-kitchen: velaqakh hakohen miyad ha’ishah minkhat haqena’ot, vehenif haminkhah lifnei yhvh vehiqrib ’otah ’el hamizbeakh.
wqmZ hkhn mn hmnHh 1t 1zkrth whqTyr hmzbHh w1Hr ySqh 1t h1Sh 1t hmym and the dimmer-server take an handful of the inward, even the memorial thereof, and burn it upon the butcher-kitchen, and afterward cause the woman to drink the from-waters. veqamaz hakohen min haminkhah ’azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbekhah, ve’akhar yashqeh ’et ha’ishah hamayim.
whSqh 1t hmym whyth 1m nTm1h wtm8l m8l b1ySh wb1w bh hmym hm1rrym lmrym wZbth bTnh wnplh yrkh whyth h1Sh l1lh bqrb 8mh and when he hath made her to drink the from-waters, then it come to pass, that, if she be ceased, and have done fire-name against her man, that the from-waters of the curse enter into her, and become bitter, and her nurture-belly swell, and her thigh rot: and the woman be a ontop among her with-mum-people. vehishqah hamayim vehayetah ’im nitme’ah vatim‘ol ma‘al be’ishah uba’u bah hamayim ham’ararim lemarim vezabetah bitnah venafelah yerekhah, vehayetah ha’ishah le’alah beqereb ‘amah.
w1m l1 nTm1h h1Sh wThrh hw1 wnqth wnzr8h zr8 and if the woman be not ceased, and be bright-climaxing; then she be cleaned, and be sown with seed. ve’im lo nitme’ah ha’ishah utehorah hi veniqetah venizre‘ah zara‘.
z1t twrt hqn1t 1Sr tSTh 1Sh tHt 1ySh wnTm1h this is the teaching of jealousies, when a woman goeth aside to another instead of her man, and is ceased; zot torat haqena’ot, ’asher tisteh ’ishah takhat ’ishah venitma’ah.
1w 1yS 1Sr t8br 8lyw rwH qn1h wqn1 1t 1Stw wh8myd 1t h1Sh lpny yhwh w8Sh lh hkhn 1t kl htwrh hz1t or when breath-spirit of jealousy cometh upon him, and he be jealous over his woman, and set the woman before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and the dimmer-server execute upon her all this teaching. ’o ’asher ta‘abor ‘alav ruakh qin’ah veqinei ’et ’ishto, vehe‘emid ha’ishah lifnei yhvh ve‘asah lah hakohen kal hatorah hazot.
wnqh h1yS m8wn wh1Sh hhw1 tS1 1t 8wnh then the man be guiltless from torment, and this woman bear her torment. veniqah ha’ish me‘avon, veha’ishah hahiv tisa ‘avonah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm 1yS 1w 1Sh ky ypl1 lndr ndr nzyr lhzyr lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when either man or woman separate themselves to vow a vow of a seperate-nazarite, to separate themselves unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ish ’o ’ishah ki yafli lindor neder nazir lehazir yhvh.
myyn wSkr yzyr HmZ yyn wHmZ Skr l1 ySth wkl mSrt 8nbym l1 ySth w8nbym lHym wybSym l1 y1kl he separate himself from wine-inherit and strong drink, and drink no vinegar of wine-inherit, or vinegar of strong drink, neither he drink any liquor of grapes, nor eat moist grapes, or dried. miyayin veshekhar yazir khomez yayin vekhomez shekhar lo yishteh, vekhal mishrat ‘anabim lo yishteh va‘anabim lakhim vibeshim lo yokhel.
kl ymy nzrw mkl 1Sr y8Sh mgpn hyyn mHrZnym w8d zg l1 y1kl all the days of his separation he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk. kol yemei nizro, mikol ’asher ye‘aseh migefen hayayin mekharzanim ve‘ad zag lo yokhel.
kl ymy ndr nzrw t8r l1 y8br 8l r1Sw 8d ml1t hymm 1Sr yzyr lyhwh qdS yhyh gdl pr8 S8r r1Sw all the days of the vow of his separation there no razor come upon his head: until the days be fulfilled, in the which he separateth himself unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, he be dedicated-finished, and let the locks of the gate-hair of his head grow. kal yemei neder nizro ta‘ar lo ya‘abor ‘al rosho, ‘ad melot hayamim ’asher yazir yhvh qadosh yihyeh gadel pera‘ se‘ar rosho.
kl ymy hzyrw lyhwh 8l npS mt l1 yb1 all the days that he separateth himself unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou he come at no dead body. kal yemei haziro yhvh, nefesh met lo yabo.
l1byw wl1mw l1Hyw wl1Htw l1 yTm1 lhm bmtm ky nzr 1lhyw 8l r1Sw he not make himself stained-ceased for his father, or for his mother, for his brother, or for his sister, when they die: because the fullness of his towards-these-elohim is upon his head. le’abiv ule’imo le’akhiv ule’akhoto lo yitama bemotam, ki nezer ’elohav ‘al rosho.
kl ymy nzrw qdS hw1 lyhwh all the days of his separation he is dedicated-finished unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. kol yemei nizro, qadosh hu yhvh.
wky ymwt mt 8lyw bpt8 pt1m wTm1 r1S nzrw wglH r1Sw bywm Thrtw bywm hSby8y yglHnw and if any man die very suddenly by him, and he hath ceased the head of his fullness; then he shave his head in the day of his bright-climaxingsing, on the seventh day he shave it. vekhi yamut met ‘alav befeta‘ pit’om vetimei rosh nizro, vegilakh rosho beyom tahorato bayom hashebi‘i yegalekhenu.
wbywm hSmyny yb1 Sty trym 1w Sny bny ywnh 1l hkhn 1l ptH 1hl mw8d and on the eighth day he inward two turtles, or two child-betweens of pigeons, to the dimmer-server, to the opening of the tent of until-conception: ubayom hashemini yabi shetei torim ’o shenei benei yonah, ’el hakohen ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
w8Sh hkhn 1Hd lHT1t w1Hd l8lh wkpr 8lyw m1Sr HT1 8l hnpS wqdS 1t r1Sw bywm hhw1 and the dimmer-server inward the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up, and make an out-of-town-ment for him, for that he missed by the dead, and dedicate-finify his head that same day. ve‘asah hakohen ’ekhad lekhatat ve’ekhad le‘olah vekhiper ‘alav me’asher khata ‘al hanafesh, veqidash rosho bayom hahu.
whzyr lyhwh 1t ymy nzrw whby1 kbS bn Sntw l1Sm whymym hr1Snym yplw ky Tm1 nzrw and he fill unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou the days of his separation, and bring a lamb of the first year for a fire-name: and the days that were before-turns be lost, because his separation was ceased. vehizir yhvh yemei nizro vehebi kebes ben shenato le’asham, vehayamim harishonim yipelu ki tamei nizro.
wz1t twrt hnzyr bywm ml1t ymy nzrw yby1 1tw 1l ptH 1hl mw8d and this is the teaching of the seperate-nazarite, when the days of his separation are fulfilled: he be brought unto the opening of the tent of until-conception: vezot torat hanazir, beyom melot yemei nizro yabi ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
whqryb 1t qrbnw lyhwh kbS bn Sntw tmym 1Hd l8lh wkbSh 1Ht bt Snth tmymh lHT1t w1yl 1Hd tmym lSlmym and he inward his inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, one he lamb of the first year simple for a on-up, and one ewe lamb of the first year simple for a miss, and one voiceless-ram simple for wholes, vehiqrib qarebano yhvh kebes ben shenato tamim ’ekhad le‘olah vekhabsah ’akhat bat shenatah temimah lekhatat, ve’ayil ’ekhad tamim lishlamim.
wsl mZwt slt Hlt blwlt bSmn wrqyqy mZwt mSHym bSmn wmnHtm wnskyhm and a basket of lit-mazat, cakes of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, and wafers of lit-mazat lubeed with name-from-oil, and their absorber, and their pourings. vesal mazot solet khalot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen, uminkhatam veniskehem.
whqryb hkhn lpny yhwh w8Sh 1t HT1tw w1t 8ltw and the dimmer-server bring them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and inward his miss, and his on-up: vehiqrib hakohen lifnei yhvh, ve‘asah khatato ve’et ‘olato.
w1t h1yl y8Sh zbH Slmym lyhwh 8l sl hmZwt w8Sh hkhn 1t mnHtw w1t nskw and he inward the voiceless-ram for a butcher of wholes unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, with the basket of lit-mazat: the dimmer-server inward also his absorber, and his pouring. ve’et ha’ayil ya‘aseh zebakh shelamim yhvh ‘al sal hamazot, ve‘asah hakohen minkhato ve’et nisko.
wglH hnzyr ptH 1hl mw8d 1t r1S nzrw wlqH 1t S8r r1S nzrw wntn 8l h1S 1Sr tHt zbH hSlmym and the seperate-nazarite shave the head of his separation at the opening of the tent of until-conception, and take the gate-hair of the head of his separation, and put it in the fire which is under the butcher of the wholes. vegilakh hanazir petakh ’ohel mo‘ed rosh nizro, velaqakh se‘ar rosh nizro venatan ‘al ha’esh ’asher takhat zebakh hashelamim.
wlqH hkhn 1t hzr8 bSlh mn h1yl wHlt mZh 1Ht mn hsl wrqyq mZh 1Hd wntn 8l kpy hnzyr 1Hr htglHw 1t nzrw and the dimmer-server take the sodden shoulder of the voiceless-ram, and one unleavened cake out of the basket, and one unleavened wafer, and put them upon the hands of the seperate-nazarite, after the gate-hair of his separation is shaven: velaqakh hakohen hazeroa‘ beshelah min ha’ayil vekhalat mazah ’akhat min hasal ureqiq mazah ’ekhad, venatan ‘al kapei hanazir ’akhar hitgalekho nizro.
whnyp 1wtm hkhn tnwph lpny yhwh qdS hw1 lkhn 8l Hzh htnwph w8l Swq htrwmh w1Hr ySth hnzyr yyn and the dimmer-server sieve-pana them for a sieve before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: this is dedicated-finished for the dimmer-server, with the sieve-pana breast and raise shoulder: and after that the seperate-nazarite may drink wine-inherit. vehenif ’otam hakohen tenufah lifnei yhvh qodesh hu lakohen ‘al khazeh hatenufah ve‘al shoq haterumah, ve’akhar yishteh hanazir yayin.
z1t twrt hnzyr 1Sr ydr qrbnw lyhwh 8l nzrw mlbd 1Sr tSyg ydw kpy ndrw 1Sr ydr kn y8Sh 8l twrt nzrw this is the teaching of the seperate-nazarite who hath vowed, and of his inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for his separation, beside that that his hand get: according to the vow which he vowed, so he must do after the teaching of his separation. zot torat hanazir ’asher yidor qarebano yhvh ‘al nizro milebad ’asher tasig yado, kefi nidro ’asher yidor ken ya‘aseh ‘al torat nizro.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l 1hrn w1l bnyw l1mr kh tbrkw 1t bny ySr1l 1mwr lhm speak unto cabinet-aaron and unto his children-betweens, saying, on this wise ye knee-fluffy-bless children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying unto them, daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav lemor koh tebarakhu benei yisra’el, ’amor lahem.
ybrkk yhwh wySmrk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou knee-fluffy-bless thee, and keep thee: yebarekhkha yhvh veyishmerekha.
y1r yhwh pnyw 1lyk wyHnk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make his face-turns shine upon thee, and be attracted unto thee: ya’er yhvh panav ’elekha vikhuneka.
yS1 yhwh pnyw 1lyk wySm lk Slwm yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou lift up his countenance upon thee, and give thee peace. yisa yhvh panav ’elekha veyasem lekha shalom.
wSmw 1t Smy 8l bny ySr1l w1ny 1brkm and they put my name upon children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and i will knee-fluffy-bless them. vesamu shemi ‘al benei yisra’el, va’ani ’abarakhem.
wyhy bywm klwt mSh lhqym 1t hmSkn wymSH 1tw wyqdS 1tw w1t kl klyw w1t hmzbH w1t kl klyw wymSHm wyqdS 1tm and it came to pass on the day that extracted-mose had fully set up the dwelling, and had lubeed it, and dedicated-finished it, and all the instruments thereof, both the butcher-kitchen and all the tools thereof, and had lubeed them, and dedicated-finished them; vayhi beyom kalot mosheh lehaqim hamishkan vayimshakh ’oto vayqadesh ’oto ve’et kal kelav ve’et hamizbeakh ve’et kal kelav, vayimshakhem vayqadesh ’otam.
wyqrybw nSy1y ySr1l r1Sy byt 1btm hm nSy1y hmTt hm h8mdym 8l hpqdym that the princes of saturated-towards-israel, heads of the daughter-house of their fathers, who were the princes of the branchs, and were over them that were numbered, inwarded: vayaqribu nesi’ei yisra’el rashei bet ’abotam, hem nesi’ei hamatot hem ha‘omedim ‘al hapequdim.
wyby1w 1t qrbnm lpny yhwh SS 8glt Zb wSny 8Sr bqr 8glh 8l Sny hnS1ym wSwr l1Hd wyqrybw 1wtm lpny hmSkn and they brought their inward before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, six covered wagons, and twelve wall-oxen; a wagon for two of the princes, and for each one an wall-ox: and they brought them before-turns the dwelling. vayabi’u qarebanam lifnei yhvh shesh ‘eglot zab ushenei ‘asar baqar ‘agalah ‘al shenei hanesi’im veshor le’ekhad, vayaqribu ’otam lifnei hamishkan.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qH m1tm whyw l8bd 1t 8bdt 1hl mw8d wntth 1wtm 1l hlwym 1yS kpy 8bdtw take it of them, that they may be to do the work of the tent of until-conception; and thou give them unto the join-levites, to every man according to his work. qakh me’itam vehayu la‘abod ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed, venatatah ’otam ’el halviyim ’ish kefi ‘abodato.
wyqH mSh 1t h8glt w1t hbqr wytn 1wtm 1l hlwym and extracted-mose took the wagons and the wall-oxen, and gave them unto the join-levites. vayiqakh mosheh ha‘agalot ve’et habaqar, vayiten ’otam ’el halviyim.
1t Sty h8glt w1t 1rb8t hbqr ntn lbny grSwn kpy 8bdtm two wagons and four wall-oxen he gave unto children-betweens of drive-out-gershon, according to their work: shetei ha‘agalot ve’et ’arba‘at habaqar natan libnei gereshon, kefi ‘abodatam.
w1t 1rb8 h8glt w1t Smnt hbqr ntn lbny mrry kpy 8bdtm byd 1ytmr bn 1hrn hkhn and four wagons and eight wall-oxen he gave unto children-betweens of bitter-merari, according unto their work, under the hand of with-palm-itamar child-between of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server. ve’et ’arba‘ ha‘agalot ve’et shemonat habaqar natan libnei merari, kefi ‘abodatam beyad ’itamar ben ’aharon hakohen.
wlbny qht l1 ntn ky 8bdt hqdS 8lhm bktp yS1w and unto children-betweens of obedient-hope-kohath he gave none: because the work of the dedicated-finished belonging unto them was that they should bear upon their shoulders. velibnei qehat lo natan, ki ‘abodat haqodesh ‘alehem bakatef yisa’u.
wyqrybw hnS1ym 1t Hnkt hmzbH bywm hmSH 1tw wyqrybw hnSy1m 1t qrbnm lpny hmzbH and the princes inwarded for dedicating of the butcher-kitchen in the day that it was lubeed, even the princes inwarded their inward before-turns the butcher-kitchen. vayaqribu hanesi’im khanukat hamizbeakh beyom himashakh vayaqribu hanesi’im qarebanam lifnei hamizbeakh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh nSy1 1Hd lywm nSy1 1Hd lywm yqrybw 1t qrbnm lHnkt hmzbH and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, they inward their inward, each prince on his day, for the dedicating of the butcher-kitchen. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, nasi ’ekhad layom nasi ’ekhad layom yaqribu qarebanam lakhanukat hamizbeakh.
wyhy hmqryb bywm hr1Swn 1t qrbnw nHSwn bn 8myndb lmTh yhwdh and he that inwarded his inward the first day was pioneer-nahshon child-between of my-people-contribute-aminadab, of the branch of know-judah: vayhi hamaqrib bayom harishon qarebano, nakhshon ben ‘aminadab lemateh yehudah.
wqrbnw q8rt ksp 1Ht SlSym wm1h mSqlh mzrq 1Hd ksp Sb8ym Sql bSql hqdS Snyhm ml1ym slt blwlh bSmn lmnHh and his inward was one silver charger, the weight thereof was an hundred and thirty light-shekels, one silver bowl of seventy light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished; both of them were full of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber: veqarebano qa‘arat kesef ’akhat sheloshim ume’ah mishqalah mizraq ’ekhad kesef shib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh, shenehem mele’im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah.
kp 1Ht 8Srh zhb ml1h qTrt one spoon of ten light-shekels of gold, full of incense: kaf ’akhat ‘asarah zahab mele’ah qetoret.
pr 1Hd bn bqr 1yl 1Hd kbS 1Hd bn Sntw l8lh one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one voiceless-ram, one lamb of the first year, for a on-up: par ’ekhad ben baqar ’ayil ’ekhad kebes ’ekhad ben shenato le‘olah.
S8yr 8zym 1Hd lHT1t one kid of the intense-goats for a miss: se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.

qrbnw q8rt ksp 1Ht SlSym wm1h mSqlh mzrq 1Hd ksp Sb8ym Sql bSql hqdS Snyhm ml1ym slt blwlh bSmn lmnHh his inward was one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty light-shekels, one silver bowl of seventy light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished; both of them full of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber: qarebano qa‘arat kesef ’akhat sheloshim ume’ah mishqalah mizraq ’ekhad kesef shib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh, shenehem mele’im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah.
kp 1Ht 8Srh zhb ml1h qTrt one golden spoon of ten light-shekels, full of incense: kaf ’akhat ‘asarah zahab mele’ah qetoret.
pr 1Hd bn bqr 1yl 1Hd kbS 1Hd bn Sntw l8lh one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one voiceless-ram, one lamb of the first year, for a on-up: par ’ekhad ben baqar ’ayil ’ekhad kebes ’ekhad ben shenato le‘olah.
S8yr 8zym 1Hd lHT1t one kid of the intense-goats for a miss: se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.
wlzbH hSlmym bqr Snym 1ylm HmSh 8tdym HmSh kbSym bny Snh HmSh zh qrbn pg8y1l bn 8krn and for a butcher of wholes, two wall-oxen, five voiceless-rams, five he intense-goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the inward of my-injury-towards-pagiel child-between of disturb-ocran. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim ’elim khamishah ‘atudim khamishah kebasim bene shanah khamishah, zeh qareban pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
bywm Snym 8Sr ywm nSy1 lbny nptly 1Hyr8 bn 8ynn on the twelfth day my-brother-ra-ahira child-between of torture-eye-enan, prince of children-betweens of twisted-naphtali, inwarded: beyom shenem ‘asar yom nasi libnei naftali, ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
qrbnw q8rt ksp 1Ht SlSym wm1h mSqlh mzrq 1Hd ksp Sb8ym Sql bSql hqdS Snyhm ml1ym slt blwlh bSmn lmnHh his inward was one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty light-shekels, one silver bowl of seventy light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished; both of them full of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber: qarebano qa‘arat kesef ’akhat sheloshim ume’ah mishqalah mizraq ’ekhad kesef shib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh, shenehem mele’im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah.
kp 1Ht 8Srh zhb ml1h qTrt one golden spoon of ten light-shekels, full of incense: kaf ’akhat ‘asarah zahab mele’ah qetoret.
pr 1Hd bn bqr 1yl 1Hd kbS 1Hd bn Sntw l8lh one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one voiceless-ram, one lamb of the first year, for a on-up: par ’ekhad ben baqar ’ayil ’ekhad kebes ’ekhad ben shenato le‘olah.

wlzbH hSlmym bqr Snym 1ylm HmSh 8tdym HmSh kbSym bny Snh HmSh zh qrbn 1Hyr8 bn 8ynn and for a butcher of wholes, two wall-oxen, five voiceless-rams, five he intense-goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the inward of my-brother-ra-ahira child-between of torture-eye-enan. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim ’elim khamishah ‘atudim khamishah kebasim bene shanah khamishah, zeh qareban ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
z1t Hnkt hmzbH bywm hmSH 1tw m1t nSy1y ySr1l q8rt ksp Stym 8Srh mzrqy ksp Snym 8Sr kpwt zhb Stym 8Srh this was the dedication of the butcher-kitchen, in the day when it was lubeed, by the princes of saturated-towards-israel: twelve chargers of silver, twelve silver bowls, twelve spoons of gold: zot khanukat hamizbeakh beyom himashakh ’oto me’et nesi’ei yisra’el, qa‘arot kesef shetem ‘esreh mizreqe khesef shenem ‘asar kapot zahab shetem ‘esreh.
SlSym wm1h hq8rh h1Ht ksp wSb8ym hmzrq h1Hd kl ksp hklym 1lpym w1rb8 m1wt bSql hqdS each charger of silver weighing an hundred and thirty light-shekels, each bowl seventy: all the silver tools weighed two thousand and four hundred light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished: sheloshim ume’ah haqe‘arah ha’akhat kesef veshib‘im hamizraq ha’ekhad, kol kesef hakelim ’alpayim ve’arba‘ me’ot besheqel haqodesh.
kpwt zhb Stym 8Srh ml1t qTrt 8Srh 8Srh hkp bSql hqdS kl zhb hkpwt 8Srym wm1h the golden spoons were twelve, full of incense, weighing ten light-shekels apiece, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished: all the gold of the spoons was an hundred and double-ten-twenty light-shekels. kapot zahab shetem ‘esreh mele’ot qetoret ‘asarah ‘asarah hakaf besheqel haqodesh, kal zehab hakapot ‘esrim ume’ah.
kl hbqr l8lh Snym 8Sr prym 1ylm Snym 8Sr kbSym bny Snh Snym 8Sr wmnHtm wS8yry 8zym Snym 8Sr lHT1t all the wall-oxen for the on-up were twelve bulls, the voiceless-rams twelve, the lambs of the first year twelve, with their absorber: and the kids of the intense-goats for miss twelve. kal habaqar la‘olah shenem ‘asar parim ’elim shenem ‘asar kebasim bene shanah shenem ‘asar uminkhatam, use‘irei ‘izim shenem ‘asar lekhatat.
wkl bqr zbH hSlmym 8Srym w1rb8h prym 1ylm SSym 8tdym SSym kbSym bny Snh SSym z1t Hnkt hmzbH 1Hry hmSH 1tw and all the wall-oxen for the butcher of the wholes were double-ten-twenty and four bulls, the voiceless-rams sixty, the he intense-goats sixty, the lambs of the first year sixty. this was the dedication of the butcher-kitchen, after that it was lubeed. vekhol beqar zebakh hashelamim ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah parim ’elim shishim ‘atudim shishim kebasim bene shanah shishim, zot khanukat hamizbeakh ’akharei himashakh ’oto.
wbb1 mSh 1l 1hl mw8d ldbr 1tw wySm8 1t hqwl mdbr 1lyw m8l hkprt 1Sr 8l 1rn h8dt mbyn Sny hkrbym wydbr 1lyw and when extracted-mose was gone into the tent of until-conception to speak with him, then he heard the voice of one speaking unto him from off the out-of-townment that was upon the cabinet of until-witness, from between-bin the two inward-cherubim: and he spake unto him. ubebo mosheh ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ledaber ’ito vayishma‘ haqol midaber ’elav me‘al hakaporet ’asher ‘al ’aron ha‘edut miben shenei hakerubim, vaydaber ’elav.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l 1hrn w1mrt 1lyw bh8ltk 1t hnrt 1l mwl pny hmnwrh y1yrw Sb8t hnrwt speak unto cabinet-aaron and say unto him, when thou lightest the lamps, the seven lamps give light over against the light-stream-candle. daber ’el ’aharon ve’amarta ’elav, beha‘alotekha hanerot ’el mul penei hamenorah ya’iru shib‘at hanerot.
wy8S kn 1hrn 1l mwl pny hmnwrh h8lh nrtyh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and cabinet-aaron did so; he lighted the lamps thereof over against the light-stream-candle, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vaya‘as ken ’aharon mul penei hamenorah he‘elah neroteha, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wzh m8Sh hmnrh mqSh zhb 8d yrkh 8d prHh mqSh hw1 kmr1h 1Sr hr1h yhwh 1t mSh kn 8Sh 1t hmnrh and this work of the light-stream-candle was of beaten gold, unto the shaft thereof, unto the flowers thereof, was beaten work: according unto the pattern which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had showed extracted-mose, so he made the light-stream-candle. vezeh ma‘aseh hamenorah miqshah zahab ‘ad yerekhah ‘ad pirkhah miqshah hi kamar’eh ’asher her’ah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asah hamenorah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qH 1t hlwym mtwk bny ySr1l wThrt 1tm take the join-levites from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and bright-climaxingse them. qakh halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el, vetiharta ’otam.
wkh t8Sh lhm lThrm hzh 8lyhm my HT1t wh8byrw t8r 8l kl bSrm wkbsw bgdyhm whThrw and thus thou do unto them, to bright-climaxingse them: sprinkle from-waters of purifying upon them, and let them shave all their flesh, and let them wash their clothes, and so make themselves bright-climaxing. vekhoh ta‘aseh lahem letaharam hazeh ‘alehem mei khatat, vehe‘ebiru ta‘ar ‘al kal besaram vekhibesu bigdehem vehiteharu.
wlqHw pr bn bqr wmnHtw slt blwlh bSmn wpr Sny bn bqr tqH lHT1t then let them take a bull child-between of visit-cattle with his absorber, even fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, and another bull child-between of visit-cattle thou take for a miss. velaqekhu par ben baqar uminkhato solet belulah bashamen, ufar sheni ben baqar tiqakh lekhatat.
whqrbt 1t hlwym lpny 1hl mw8d whqhlt 1t kl 8dt bny ySr1l and thou bring the join-levites before-turns the tent of until-conception: and thou gather the whole assembly of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel together: vehiqrabta halviyim lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed, vehiqhalta kal ‘adat benei yisra’el.
whqrbt 1t hlwym lpny yhwh wsmkw bny ySr1l 1t ydyhm 8l hlwym and thou bring the join-levites before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel put their hands upon the join-levites: vehiqrabta halviyim lifnei yhvh, vesamekhu bene yisra’el yedehem ‘al halviyim.
whnyp 1hrn 1t hlwym tnwph lpny yhwh m1t bny ySr1l whyw l8bd 1t 8bdt yhwh and cabinet-aaron inward the join-levites before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for an inward of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they may execute the work of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehenif ’aharon halviyim tenufah lifnei yhvh me’et benei yisra’el, vehayu la‘abod ‘abodat yhvh.
whlwym ysmkw 1t ydyhm 8l r1S hprym w8Sh 1t h1Hd HT1t w1t h1Hd 8lh lyhwh lkpr 8l hlwym and the join-levites lay their hands upon the heads of the bulls: and thou inward the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up, unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to make an out-of-town-ment for the join-levites. vehalviyim yismekhu yedehem ‘al rosh haparim, va‘aseh ha’ekhad khatat ve’et ha’ekhad ‘olah yhvh lekhaper ‘al halviyim.
wh8mdt 1t hlwym lpny 1hrn wlpny bnyw whnpt 1tm tnwph lyhwh and thou set the join-levites before-turns cabinet-aaron, and before-turns his children-betweens, and inward them for an inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. veha‘amadta halviyim lifnei ’aharon velifnei banav, vehenafta ’otam tenufah yhvh.
whbdlt 1t hlwym mtwk bny ySr1l whyw ly hlwym thus thou separate the join-levites from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and the join-levites be mine. vehibdalta halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el, vehayu li halviyim.
w1Hry kn yb1w hlwym l8bd 1t 1hl mw8d wThrt 1tm whnpt 1tm tnwph and after that the join-levites go in to do the work of the tent of until-conception: and thou bright-climaxingse them, and inward them for an inward. ve’akhare khen yabo’u halviyim la‘abod ’ohel mo‘ed, vetiharta ’otam vehenafta ’otam tenufah.
ky ntnym ntnym hmh ly mtwk bny ySr1l tHt pTrt kl rHm bkwr kl mbny ySr1l lqHty 1tm ly for they are wholly given unto me from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; instead of such as open every womb, even instead of the firstborn of all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, have i taken them unto me. ki netunim netunim hemah li mitokh benei yisra’el, takhat pitrat kal rekhem bekhor kol mibenei yisra’el laqakhti ’otam li.
ky ly kl bkwr bbny ySr1l b1dm wbbhmh bywm hkty kl bkwr b1rZ mZrym hqdSty 1tm ly for all the firstborn of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel are mine, both man and beast: on the day that i smote every firstborn in the land of narrows-mizraim i dedicated-finished them for myself. ki li khal bekhor bibnei yisra’el ba’adam ubabehemah, beyom hakoti khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim hiqdashti ’otam li.
w1qH 1t hlwym tHt kl bkwr bbny ySr1l and i have taken the join-levites for all the firstborn of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. va’eqakh halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el.
w1tnh 1t hlwym ntnym l1hrn wlbnyw mtwk bny ySr1l l8bd 1t 8bdt bny ySr1l b1hl mw8d wlkpr 8l bny ySr1l wl1 yhyh bbny ySr1l ngp bgSt bny ySr1l 1l hqdS and i have given the join-levites as a gift to cabinet-aaron and to his children-betweens from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, to do the work of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in the tent of until-conception, and to make an out-of-town-ment for children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: that there be no plague among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, when children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel come nigh unto the dedicated-finished. va’etenah halviyim netunim le’aharon ulebanav mitokh benei yisra’el la‘abod ‘abodat bene yisra’el be’ohel mo‘ed ulekhaper ‘al benei yisra’el, velo yihyeh bibnei yisra’el negef begeshet bene yisra’el ’el haqodesh.
wy8S mSh w1hrn wkl 8dt bny ySr1l llwym kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh llwym kn 8Sw lhm bny ySr1l and extracted-mose, and cabinet-aaron, and all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, did to the join-levites according unto all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose concerning the join-levites, so did children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel unto them. vaya‘as mosheh ve’aharon vekhal ‘adat bene yisra’el lalviyim, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh lalviyim ken ‘asu lahem benei yisra’el.
wytHT1w hlwym wykbsw bgdyhm wynp 1hrn 1tm tnwph lpny yhwh wykpr 8lyhm 1hrn lThrm and the join-levites were purified, and they washed their clothes; and cabinet-aaron inwarded them as an inward before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and cabinet-aaron made an out-of-town-ment for them to bright-climaxingse them. vayitkhate’u halviyim vaykhabesu bigdehem vayanef ’aharon ’otam tenufah lifnei yhvh, vaykhaper ‘alehem ’aharon letaharam.
w1Hry kn b1w hlwym l8bd 1t 8bdtm b1hl mw8d lpny 1hrn wlpny bnyw k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh 8l hlwym kn 8Sw lhm and after that went the join-levites in to do their work in the tent of until-conception before-turns cabinet-aaron, and before-turns his children-betweens: as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed extracted-mose concerning the join-levites, so did they unto them. ve’akhare khen ba’u halviyim la‘abod ‘abodatam be’ohel mo‘ed lifnei ’aharon velifnei banav, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ‘al halviyim ken ‘asu lahem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
z1t 1Sr llwym mbn HmS w8Srym Snh wm8lh ybw1 lZb1 Zb1 b8bdt 1hl mw8d this is it that belongeth unto the join-levites: from double-ten-twenty and five years old and upward they go in to wait upon the work of the tent of until-conception: zot ’asher lalviyim, miben khamesh ve‘esrim shanah vama‘lah yabo lizbo zaba ba‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
wmbn HmSym Snh ySwb mZb1 h8bdh wl1 y8bd 8wd and from the age of fifty years they cease waiting upon the work thereof, and work for no more: umiben khamishim shanah yashub mizeba ha‘abodah, velo ya‘abod ‘od.
wSrt 1t 1Hyw b1hl mw8d lSmr mSmrt w8bdh l1 y8bd kkh t8Sh llwym bmSmrtm and with their brethren in the tent of until-conception, to keep the charge, and do no work. thus thou do unto the join-levites touching their charge. vesheret ’et ’ekhav be’ohel mo‘ed lishmor mishmeret va‘abodah lo ya‘abod, kakhah ta‘aseh lalviyim bemishmerotam.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh bmdbr syny bSnh hSnyt lZ1tm m1rZ mZrym bHdS hr1Swn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose in the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai, in the first month of the second year after they were come out of the land of narrows-mizraim, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh bemidbar sinay bashanah hashenit lezetam me’erez mizrayim bakhodesh harishon lemor.
wy8Sw bny ySr1l 1t hpsH bmw8dw let children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel also keep the passover at his appointed season. veya‘asu bene yisra’el hapasakh bemo‘ado.
b1rb8h 8Sr ywm bHdS hzh byn h8rbym t8Sw 1tw bmw8dw kkl Hqtyw wkkl mSpTyw t8Sw 1tw in the fourteenth day of this month, at even, ye do it in his appointed season: according to all the rites of it, and according to all the ceremonies thereof, ye keep it. be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom bakhodesh hazeh ben ha‘arbayim ta‘asu ’oto bemo‘ado, kekhal khuqotav ukhekhal mishpatav ta‘asu ’oto.
wydbr mSh 1l bny ySr1l l8St hpsH and extracted-mose spake unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they should keep the passover. vaydaber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el la‘asot hapasakh.
wy8Sw 1t hpsH br1Swn b1rb8h 8Sr ywm lHdS byn h8rbym bmdbr syny kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh kn 8Sw bny ySr1l and they kept the passover on the fourteenth day of the first month at even in the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai: according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so did children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vaya‘asu hapesakh barishon be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh ben ha‘arbayim bemidbar sinay, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asu benei yisra’el.
wyhy 1nSym 1Sr hyw Tm1ym lnpS 1dm wl1 yklw l8St hpsH bywm hhw1 wyqrbw lpny mSh wlpny 1hrn bywm hhw1 and there were certain men, who were ceased by the dead body of a man, that they could not keep the passover on that day: and they came before-turns extracted-mose and before-turns cabinet-aaron on that day: vayhi ’anashim ’asher hayu teme’im lenefesh ’adam velo yakhelu la‘asot hapesakh bayom hahu, vayiqrebu lifnei mosheh velifnei ’aharon bayom hahu.
wy1mrw h1nSym hhmh 1lyw 1nHnw Tm1ym lnpS 1dm lmh ngr8 lblty hqrb 1t qrbn yhwh bm8dw btwk bny ySr1l and those men said unto him, we are ceased by the dead body of a man: wherefore are we kept back, that we may not inward an inward of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in his appointed season among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel? vayomeru ha’anashim hahemah ’elav ’anakhnu teme’im lenefesh ’adam, lamah nigara‘ lebilti haqrib qareban yhvh bemo‘ado betokh benei yisra’el.
wy1mr 1lhm mSh 8mdw w1Sm8h mh yZwh yhwh lkm and extracted-mose said unto them, stand still, and i will hear what yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will order-prescribe concerning you. vayomer ’alehem mosheh, ‘imdu ve’eshme‘ah mah yezaveh yhvh lakhem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l l1mr 1yS 1yS ky yhyh Tm1 lnpS 1w bdrk rHqh lkm 1w ldrtykm w8Sh psH lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, if any man of you or of your posterity be stained-ceased by reason of a dead body, or be in a journey afar off, yet he keep the passover unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor, ’ish ’ish ki yihyeh tamei lanefesh ’o bederekh rekhoqah lakhem ’o ledorotekhem ve‘asah fesakh yhvh.
bHdS hSny b1rb8h 8Sr ywm byn h8rbym y8Sw 1tw 8l mZwt wmrrym y1klhw the fourteenth day of the second month at even they do it, and eat it with lit-mazat and bitter herbs. bakhodesh hasheni be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom ben ha‘arbayim ya‘asu ’oto, ‘al mazot umerorim yokheluhu.
l1 yS1yrw mmnw 8d bqr w8Zm l1 ySbrw bw kkl Hqt hpsH y8Sw 1tw they leave none of it unto the morning, nor break any bone of it: according to all the ordinances of the passover they do it. lo yash’iru mimenu ‘ad boqer ve‘ezem lo yishberu bo, kekhal khuqat hapesakh ya‘asu ’oto.
wh1yS 1Sr hw1 Thwr wbdrk l1 hyh wHdl l8Swt hpsH wnkrth hnpS hhw1 m8myh ky qrbn yhwh l1 hqryb bm8dw HT1w yS1 h1yS hhw1 and the man that is bright-climaxing, and is not in a journey, and forbeareth to keep the passover, even the same being be cut off from his with-mum-people: because he brought not the inward of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in his appointed season, that man bear his miss. veha’ish ’asher hu tahor ubederekh lo hayah vekhadal la‘asot hapesakh venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha, ki qareban yhvh lo hiqrib bemo‘ado khet’o yisa ha’ish hahu.
wky ygwr 1tkm gr w8Sh psH lyhwh kHqt hpsH wkmSpTw kn y8Sh Hqh 1Ht yhyh lkm wlgr wl1zrH h1rZ and if a stranger sojourn among you, and will keep the passover unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; according to the ordinance of the passover, and according to the manner thereof, so he do: ye have one ordinance, both for the stranger, and for him that was born in the land. vekhi yagur ’itekhem ger ve‘asah fesakh yhvh kekhuqat hapesakh ukhemishpato ken ya‘aseh, khuqah ’akhat yihyeh lakhem velager ule’ezrakh ha’arez.
wbywm hqym 1t hmSkn ksh h8nn 1t hmSkn l1hl h8dt wb8rb yhyh 8l hmSkn kmr1h 1S 8d bqr and on the day that the dwelling was reared up the cloud covered the dwelling, namely, the tent of the until-witness: and at even there was upon the dwelling as it were the appearance of fire, until the morning. ubeyom haqim ’et hamishkan kisah he‘anan hamishkan le’ohel ha‘edut, uba‘ereb yihyeh ‘al hamishkan kemar’eh ’esh ‘ad boqer.
kn yhyh tmyd h8nn yksnw wmr1h 1S lylh so it was alway: the cloud covered it by day, and the appearance of fire by night. ken yihyeh tamid he‘anan yekhasenu, umar’eh ’esh layelah.
wlpy h8lt h8nn m8l h1hl w1Hry kn ys8w bny ySr1l wbmqwm 1Sr ySkn Sm h8nn Sm yHnw bny ySr1l and when the cloud was taken up from the dwelling, then after that children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel journeyed: and in the place where the cloud abode, there children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel pitched their tents. ulefi he‘alot he‘anan me‘al ha’ohel ve’akhare khen yis‘u benei yisra’el, ubimqom ’asher yishkan sham he‘anan sham yakhanu benei yisra’el.
8l py yhwh ys8w bny ySr1l w8l py yhwh yHnw kl ymy 1Sr ySkn h8nn 8l hmSkn yHnw at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel journeyed, and at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou they pitched: as long as the cloud abode upon the dwelling they rested in their tents. ‘al pi yhvh yis‘u benei yisra’el ve‘al pi yhvh yakhanu, kal yeme ’asher yishkon he‘anan ‘al hamishkan yakhanu.
wbh1ryk h8nn 8l hmSkn ymym rbym wSmrw bny ySr1l 1t mSmrt yhwh wl1 ys8w and when the cloud tarried long upon the dwelling many days, then children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel kept the charge of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and journeyed not. ubeha’arikh he‘anan ‘al hamishkan yamim rabim, veshameru bene yisra’el mishmeret yhvh velo yisa‘u.
wyS 1Sr yhyh h8nn ymym mspr 8l hmSkn 8l py yhwh yHnw w8l py yhwh ys8w and so it was, when the cloud was a few days upon the dwelling; according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou they abode in their tents, and according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou they journeyed. veyesh ’asher yihyeh he‘anan yamim mispar ‘al hamishkan, ‘al pi yhvh yakhanu ve‘al pi yhvh yisa‘u.
wyS 1Sr yhyh h8nn m8rb 8d bqr wn8lh h8nn bbqr wns8w 1w ywmm wlylh wn8lh h8nn wns8w and so it was, when the cloud abode from even unto the morning, and that the cloud was taken up in the morning, then they journeyed: whether it was by day or by night that the cloud was taken up, they journeyed. veyesh ’asher yihyeh he‘anan me‘ereb ‘ad boqer vena‘alah he‘anan baboqer venasa‘u, ’o yomam valaylah vena‘alah he‘anan venasa‘u.
1w ymym 1w HdS 1w ymym bh1ryk h8nn 8l hmSkn lSkn 8lyw yHnw bny ySr1l wl1 ys8w wbh8ltw ys8w or whether it were two days, or a month, or a year, that the cloud tarried upon the dwelling, remaining thereon, children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel abode in their tents, and journeyed not: and when it was taken up, they journeyed. ’o yomayim ’o khodesh ’o yamim beha’arikh he‘anan ‘al hamishkan lishkon ‘alav yakhanu bene yisra’el velo yisa‘u, ubehe‘aloto yisa‘u.
8l py yhwh yHnw w8l py yhwh ys8w 1t mSmrt yhwh Smrw 8l py yhwh byd mSh at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou they rested in the tents, and at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou they journeyed: they kept the charge of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou by the hand of extracted-mose. ‘al pi yhvh yakhanu ve‘al pi yhvh yisa‘u, mishmeret yhvh shamaru ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
8Sh lk Sty HZwZrt ksp mqSh t8Sh 1tm whyw lk lmqr1 h8dh wlms8 1t hmHnwt make thee two mouthpiece-trumpets of silver; of a whole piece thou make them: that thou mayest use them for the calling of the assembly, and for the journeying of the camps. ‘aseh lekha shetei khazozrot kesef miqshah ta‘aseh ’otam, vehayu lekha lemiqra ha‘edah ulemasa‘ ’et hamakhanot.
wtq8w bhn wnw8dw 1lyk kl h8dh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d and when they blow with them, all the assembly assemble themselves to thee at the opening of the tent of until-conception. vetaqe‘u bahen, veno‘adu ’elekha kal ha‘edah ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
w1m b1Ht ytq8w wnw8dw 1lyk hnSy1ym r1Sy 1lpy ySr1l and if they blow and with one mouthpiece-trumpet, then the princes, which are heads of the thousands of saturated-towards-israel, gather themselves unto thee. ve’im be’akhat yitqa‘u, veno‘adu ’elekha hanesi’im rashei ’alfei yisra’el.
wtq8tm trw8h wns8w hmHnwt hHnym qdmh when ye blow an alarm, then the camps that lie on the east parts go forward. uteqa‘tem teru‘ah, venase‘u hamakhanot hakhonim qedemah.
wtq8tm trw8h Snyt wns8w hmHnwt hHnym tymnh trw8h ytq8w lms8yhm when ye blow an alarm the second time, then the camps that lie on the dry-south side take their journey: they blow an alarm for their journeys. uteqa‘tem teru‘ah shenit venase‘u hamakhanot hakhonim temanah, teru‘ah yitqe‘u lemas‘ehem.
wbhqhyl 1t hqhl ttq8w wl1 try8w and when the until-witness is to be added together, ye blow, and ye not sound an alarm. ubehaqhil haqahal, titqe‘u velo tari‘u.
wbny 1hrn hkhnym ytq8w bHZZrwt whyw lkm lHqt 8wlm ldrtykm and children-betweens of cabinet-aaron, the dimmer-servers, blow with the mouthpiece-trumpets; and they be to you for an ordinance for ever throughout your generations. ubenei ’aharon hakohanim yitqe‘u bakhazozerot, vehayu lakhem lekhuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem.
wky tb1w mlHmh b1rZkm 8l hZr hZrr 1tkm whr8tm bHZZrwt wnzkrtm lpny yhwh 1lhykm wnwS8tm m1ybykm and if ye go to war in your land against the enemy that oppresseth you, then ye blow an alarm with the mouthpiece-trumpets; and ye be remembered before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and ye be saved from your father-adversaries. vekhi tabo’u milkhamah be’arzekhem ‘al hazar hazorer ’etkhem vahare‘otem bakhazozerot, vanizkartem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem venosha‘tem me’oyebekhem.
wbywm SmHtkm wbmw8dykm wbr1Sy HdSykm wtq8tm bHZZrt 8l 8ltykm w8l zbHy Slmykm whyw lkm lzkrwn lpny 1lhykm 1ny yhwh 1lhykm also in the day of your gladness, and in your solemn days, and in the beginnings of your months, ye blow with the mouthpiece-trumpets over your on-ups, and over the butchers of your wholes; that they may be to you for a memorial before-turns your towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ubeyom simkhatkhem ubemo‘adekhem uberashei khadeshekhem uteqa‘tem bakhazozerot ‘al ‘olotekhem ve‘al zibkhei shalmekhem, vehayu lakhem lezikaron lifnei ’elohekhem ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wyhy bSnh hSnyt bHdS hSny b8Srym bHdS n8lh h8nn m8l mSkn h8dt and it came to pass on the twentieth day of the second month, in the second year, that the cloud was taken up from off the dwelling of the until-witness. vayhi bashanah hashenit bakhodesh hasheni be‘esrim bakhodesh, na‘alah he‘anan me‘al mishkan ha‘edut.
wys8w bny ySr1l lms8yhm mmdbr syny wySkn h8nn bmdbr p1rn and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel took their journeys out of the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai; and the cloud rested in the place-of-word-desert of magnificence-paran. vayis‘u bene yisra’el lemas‘ehem mimidbar sinay, vayishkon he‘anan bemidbar paran.
wys8w br1Snh 8l py yhwh byd mSh and they first took their journey according to the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou by the hand of extracted-mose. vayis‘u barishonah, ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
wys8 dgl mHnh bny yhwdh br1Snh lZb1tm w8l Zb1w nHSwn bn 8myndb in the first place went the standard of the camp of children-betweens of know-judah according to their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was pioneer-nahshon child-between of my-people-contribute-aminadab. vayisa‘ degel makhaneh bene yehudah barishonah lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.
w8l Zb1 mTh bny ySSkr ntn1l bn Zw8r and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of wage-issachar was given-towards-nethaneel child-between of junior-zuar. ve‘al zeba mateh benei yisashkhar, netan’el ben zu‘ar.
w8l Zb1 mTh bny zbwln 1ly1b bn Hlwn and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of fertile-zebulun was my-towards-dad-my-towards-eliab child-between of success-sick-helon. ve‘al zeba mateh benei zebulun, ’eli’ab ben khelon.
whwrd hmSkn wns8w bny grSwn wbny mrry nS1y hmSkn and the dwelling was taken down; and children-betweens of drive-out-gershon and children-betweens of bitter-merari set forward, bearing the dwelling. vehurad hamishkan, venase‘u bene gereshon ubenei merari nose’ei hamishkan.
wns8 dgl mHnh r1wbn lZb1tm w8l Zb1w 1lyZwr bn Sdy1wr and the standard of the camp of buddy-see-child-reuben set forward according to their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was my-towards-flint-elizur child-between of my-breast-light-shediur. venasa‘ degel makhaneh re’uben lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o ’elizur ben shede’ur.
w8l Zb1 mTh bny Sm8wn Slmy1l bn Zwry Sdy and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of hear-home-simeon was my-whole-towards child-between of my-flint-my-breast-flint-zurishaddai. ve‘al zeba mateh benei shim‘on, shelumi’el ben zuri shaday.
w8l Zb1 mTh bny gd 1lysp bn d8w1l and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of luck-gad was my-towards-adds-my-towards-eliasaph child-between of know-towards-deuel. ve‘al zeba mateh bene gad, ’elyasaf ben de‘u’el.
wns8w hqhtym nS1y hmqdS whqymw 1t hmSkn 8d b1m and the obedient-hope-kohathites set forward, bearing the dedicated-finished: and the other did set up the dwelling against they came. venase‘u haqehatim nose’ei hamiqdash, veheqimu hamishkan ‘ad bo’am.
wns8 dgl mHnh bny 1prym lZb1tm w8l Zb1w 1lySm8 bn 8myhwd and the standard of the camp of children-betweens of fruitful-ephraim set forward according to their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was towards-saves-elishama child-between of with-my-glory-amihud. venasa‘ degel makhaneh bene ’efrayim lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o ’elishama‘ ben ‘amihud.
w8l Zb1 mTh bny mnSh gmly1l bn pdh Zwr and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of place-of-sleep-manasseh was my-detox-ripen-camel-towards-gamaliel child-between of cash-in-flint-pedahzur. ve‘al zeba mateh benei menasheh, gamli’el ben pedah
w8l Zb1 mTh bny bnymn 1bydn bn gd8wny and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin was my-father-deals-with-abidan child-between of my-cut-down-gideoni. ve‘al zeba mateh benei binyamin, ’abidan ben gid‘oni.
wns8 dgl mHnh bny dn m1sp lkl hmHnt lZb1tm w8l Zb1w 1Hy8zr bn 8mySdy and the standard of the camp of children-betweens of discuss-dan set forward, which was the rearward of all the camps throughout their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was my-brother-help-ahiezer child-between of my-with-my-breast-amishadai. venasa‘ degel makhaneh bene dan me’asef lekhal hamakhanot lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o ’akhi‘ezer ben ‘amishaday
w8l Zb1 mTh bny 1Sr pg8y1l bn 8krn and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of bliss-asher was my-injury-towards-pagiel child-between of disturb-ocran. ve‘al zeba mateh benei ’asher, pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
w8l Zb1 mTh bny nptly 1Hyr8 bn 8ynn and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of twisted-naphtali was my-brother-ra-ahira child-between of torture-eye-enan. ve‘al zeba mateh benei naftali, ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
1lh ms8y bny ySr1l lZb1tm wys8w thus were the journeyings of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel according to their troop-clusters, when they set forward. ’eleh mas‘ei bene yisra’el lezib’otam, vayisa‘u.
wy1mr mSh lHbb bn r8w1l hmdyny Htn mSh ns8ym 1nHnw 1l hmqwm 1Sr 1mr yhwh 1tw 1tn lkm lkh 1tnw whTbnw lk ky yhwh dbr Twb 8l ySr1l and extracted-mose said unto hobab, child-between of raguel the place-of-discussed-teaching-midianite, extracted-mose' father in law, we are journeying unto the place of which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said, i will give it you: come thou with us, and we will do thee good: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath bee-spoken good concerning saturated-towards-israel. vayomer mosheh lekhobab ben re‘u’el hamidyani khoten mosheh nose‘im ’anakhnu ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar yhvh ’oto ’eten lakhem, lekhah ’itanu vehetabnu lakh ki yhvh diber tob ‘al yisra’el.
wy1mr 1lyw l1 1lk ky 1m 1l 1rZy w1l mwldty 1lk and he said unto him, i will not go; and i will depart to mine own land, and to my kindred. vayomer ’elav lo ’elekh, ki ’im ’el ’arzi ve’el moladti ’elekh.
wy1mr 1l n1 t8zb 1tnw ky 8l kn yd8t Hntnw bmdbr whyyt lnw l8ynym and he said, leave us not, i pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest how we are to encamp in the place-of-word-desert, and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes. vayomer ’al na ta‘azob ki ‘al ken yada‘ta khanotenu bamidbar vehayita lanu le‘enayim.
whyh ky tlk 8mnw whyh hTwb hhw1 1Sr yyTyb yhwh 8mnw whTbnw lk and it be, if thou go with us, yea, it be, that what goodness yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do unto us, the same will we do unto thee. vehayah ki telekh ‘imanu, vehayah hatob hahu ’asher yetib yhvh ‘imanu vehetabnu lakh.
wys8w mhr yhwh drk SlSt ymym w1rwn bryt yhwh ns8 lpnyhm drk SlSt ymym ltwr lhm mnwHh and they departed from the mount of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou three days' journey: and the cabinet of the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou went before-turns them in the three days' journey, to search out a resting place for them. vayis‘u mehar yhvh derekh sheloshet yamim, va’aron berit yhvh nosea‘ lifnehem derekh sheloshet yamim latur lahem menukhah.
w8nn yhwh 8lyhm ywmm bns8m mn hmHnh and the cloud of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was upon them by day, when they went out of the camp. va‘anan yhvh ‘alehem yomam, benase‘am min hamakhaneh.
wyhy bns8 h1rn wy1mr mSh qwmh yhwh wypZw 1ybyk wynsw mSn1yk mpnyk and it came to pass, when the cabinet set forward, that extracted-mose said, rise up, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and let thine father-adversaries be scattered; and let them that hate thee flee before-turns thee. vayhi binsoa‘ ha’aron vayomer mosheh, qumah yhvh veyafuzu ’oyebekha veyanusu mesan’ekha mipanekha.
wbnHh y1mr Swbh yhwh rbbwt 1lpy ySr1l and when it rested, he said, return, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, unto the many thousands of saturated-towards-israel. ubenukhoh yomar, shubah yhvh ribbot ’alfei yisra’el.
