wyhy h8m kmt1nnym r8 b1zny yhwh wySm8 yhwh wyHr 1pw wtb8r bm 1S yhwh wt1kl bqZh hmHnh and when the with-mum-people complained, it displeased yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou heard it; and his nose-anger was kindled; and the fire of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou burnt among them, and consumed them that were in the uttermost parts of the camp. vayhi ha‘am kemit’onenim ra‘ be’azenei yhvh, vayishma‘ yhvh vayikhar ’apo vatib‘ar bam ’esh yhvh vatokhal biqzeh hamakhaneh.
wyZ8q h8m 1l mSh wytpll mSh 1l yhwh wtSq8 h1S and the with-mum-people cried unto extracted-mose; and when extracted-mose prayed unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, the fire was quenched. vayiz‘aq ha‘am ’el mosheh, vayitpalel mosheh ’el yhvh vatishqa‘ ha’esh.
wyqr1 Sm hmqwm hhw1 tb8rh ky b8rh bm 1S yhwh and he called the name of the place conflagration-taberah: because the fire of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou burnt among them. vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu tab‘erah, ki ba‘arah bam ’esh yhvh.
wh1spsp 1Sr bqrbw ht1ww t1wh wySbw wybkw gm bny ySr1l wy1mrw my y1klnw bSr and the mixed multitude that was among them fell a lusting: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel also wept again, and said, who give us flesh to eat? vehasafsuf ’asher beqirbo hit’avu ta’avah, vayashubu vayibku gam benei yisra’el vayomeru mi ya’akhilenu basar.
zkrnw 1t hdgh 1Sr n1kl bmZrym Hnm 1t hqS1ym w1t h1bTHym w1t hHZyr w1t hbZlym w1t hSwmym we remember the fish, which we did eat in narrows-mizraim freely; the cucumbers, and the melons, and the leeks, and the onions, and the garlic: zakharnu hadagah ’asher nokhal bemizrayim khinam, haqishu’im ve’et ha’abatikhim ve’et hekhazir ve’et habezalim ve’et hashumim.
w8th npSnw ybSh 1yn kl blty 1l hmn 8ynynw and now our being is dried away: there is nothing at all, beside this whats-that-manna, before-turns our eyes. ve‘atah nafshenu yebeshah ’en kol, bilti ’el haman ‘enenu.
whmn kzr8 gd hw1 w8ynw k8yn hbdlH and the whats-that-manna was as coriander seed, and the color thereof as the color of bdellium. vehaman kizra‘ gad hu, ve‘eno ke‘en habedolakh.
STw h8m wlqTw wTHnw brHym 1w dkw bmdkh wbSlw bprwr w8Sw 1tw 8gwt whyh T8mw kT8m lSd hSmn and the with-mum-people went about, and added it, and ground it in mills, or beat it in a mortar, and baked it in pans, and made cakes of it: and the taste of it was as the taste of fresh name-from-oil. shatu ha‘am velaqetu vetakhanu barekhayim ’o dakhu bamedokhah ubishelu baparur ve‘asu ’oto ‘ugot, vehayah ta‘mo keta‘am leshad hashamen.
wbrdt hTl 8l hmHnh lylh yrd hmn 8lyw and when the dew fell upon the camp in the night, the whats-that-manna fell upon it. uberedet hatal ‘al hamakhaneh layelah, yered haman ‘alav.
wySm8 mSh 1t h8m bkh lmSpHtyw 1yS lptH 1hlw wyHr 1p yhwh m1d wb8yny mSh r8 then extracted-mose heard the with-mum-people weep throughout their families, every man in the opening of his tent: and the nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was kindled greatly; extracted-mose also was displeased. vayishma‘ mosheh ha‘am bokheh lemishpekhotav ’ish lefetakh ’aholo, vayikhar ’af yhvh me’od ube‘enei mosheh ra‘.
wy1mr mSh 1l yhwh lmh hr8t l8bdk wlmh l1 mZty Hn b8ynyk lSwm 1t mS1 kl h8m hzh 8ly and extracted-mose said unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, wherefore hast thou afflicted thy worker? and wherefore have i not found favor in thy sight, that thou layest the burden of all this with-mum-people upon me? vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh lamah hare‘ota le‘abdekha velamah lo mazati khen be‘enekha, lasum masa kal ha‘am hazeh ‘alay.
h1nky hryty 1t kl h8m hzh 1m 1nky yldtyhw ky t1mr 1ly S1hw bHyqk k1Sr yS1 h1mn 1t hynq 8l h1dmh 1Sr nSb8t l1btyw have i conceived all this with-mum-people? have i begotten them, that thou shouldest say unto me, carry them in thy bosom, as a nursing father beareth the sucking child, unto the land which thou swarest unto their fathers? he’anokhi hariti kal ha‘am hazeh ’im ’anokhi yelidtihu, ki tomar ’elay sa’ehu bekheqekha ka’asher yisa ha’omen hayoneq ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ta la’abotav.
m1yn ly bSr ltt lkl h8m hzh ky ybkw 8ly l1mr tnh lnw bSr wn1klh whence should i have flesh to give unto all this with-mum-people? for they weep unto me, saying, give us flesh, that we may eat. me’ayin li basar latet lekhal ha‘am hazeh, ki yibku ‘alay lemor tenah lanu basar venokhelah.
l1 1wkl 1nky lbdy lS1t 1t kl h8m hzh ky kbd mmny i am not able to bear all this with-mum-people alone, because it is too heavy for me. lo ’ukhal ’anokhi lebadi laset kal ha‘am hazeh, ki khabed mimeni.
w1m kkh 1t 8Sh ly hrgny n1 hrg 1m mZ1ty Hn b8ynyk w1l 1r1h br8ty and if thou deal thus with me, kill me, i pray thee, out of hand, if i have found favor in thy sight; and let me not see my wretchedness. ve’im kakhah ’at ‘oseh li haregeni na harog ’im mazati khen be‘enekha, ve’al ’er’eh bera‘ati.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1sph ly Sb8ym 1yS mzqny ySr1l 1Sr yd8t ky hm zqny h8m wSTryw wlqHt 1tm 1l 1hl mw8d whtyZbw Sm 8mk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, gather unto me seventy men of the elders of saturated-towards-israel, whom thou knowest to be the elders of the with-mum-people, and officers over them; and bring them unto the tent of until-conception, that they may stand there with thee. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’esfah li shib‘im ’ish miziqnei yisra’el ’asher yada‘ta ki hem ziqnei ha‘am veshoterav, velaqakhta ’otam ’el ’ohel mo‘ed vehityazebu sham ‘imakh.
wyrdty wdbrty 8mk Sm w1Zlty mn hrwH 1Sr 8lyk wSmty 8lyhm wnS1w 1tk bmS1 h8m wl1 tS1 1th lbdk and i will come down and talk with thee there: and i will take of breath-spirit which is upon thee, and will put it upon them; and they bear the burden of the with-mum-people with thee, that thou bear it not thyself alone. veyaradti vedibarti ‘imekha sham ve’azalti min haruakh ’asher ‘alekha vesamti ‘alehem, venase’u ’itekha bemasa ha‘am velo tisa ’atah lebadekha.
w1l h8m t1mr htqdSw lmHr w1kltm bSr ky bkytm b1zny yhwh l1mr my y1klnw bSr ky Twb lnw bmZrym wntn yhwh lkm bSr w1kltm and say thou unto the with-mum-people, dedicate-finify yourselves against to morrow, and ye eat flesh: for ye have wept in the ears of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, who give us flesh to eat? for it was well with us in narrows-mizraim: therefore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will give you flesh, and ye eat. ve’el ha‘am tomar hitqadeshu lemakhar va’akhaltem basar ki bekhitem be’azenei yhvh lemor mi ya’akhilenu basar ki tob lanu bemizrayim, venatan yhvh lakhem basar va’akhaltem.
l1 ywm 1Hd t1klwn wl1 ywmym wl1 HmSh ymym wl1 8Srh ymym wl1 8Srym ywm ye not eat one day, nor two days, nor five days, neither ten days, nor double-ten-twenty days; lo yom ’ekhad tokhelun velo yomayim, velo khamishah yamim velo ‘asarah yamim velo ‘esrim yom.
8d HdS ymym 8d 1Sr yZ1 m1pkm whyh lkm lzr1 y8n ky m1stm 1t yhwh 1Sr bqrbkm wtbkw lpnyw l1mr lmh zh yZ1nw mmZrym and even a whole month, until it come out at your nostrils, and it be loathsome unto you: because that ye have despised yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou which is among you, and have wept before-turns him, saying, why came we forth out of narrows-mizraim? ‘ad khodesh yamim ‘ad ’asher yezei me’apekhem vehayah lakhem lezara, ya‘an ki me’astem yhvh ’asher beqirbekhem vatibku lefanav lemor lamah zeh yazanu mimizrayim.
wy1mr mSh SS m1wt 1lp rgly h8m 1Sr 1nky bqrbw w1th 1mrt bSr 1tn lhm w1klw HdS ymym and extracted-mose said, the with-mum-people, among whom i am, are six hundred thousand footmen; and thou hast said, i will give them flesh, that they may eat a whole month. vayomer mosheh shesh me’ot ’elef ragli ha‘am ’asher ’anokhi beqirbo, ve’atah ’amarta basar ’eten lahem ve’akhelu khodesh yamim.
hZ1n wbqr ySHT lhm wmZ1 lhm 1m 1t kl dgy hym y1sp lhm wmZ1 lhm the flocks and the visit-cattles be slain for them, to suffice them? or all the fish of the sea be added together for them, to suffice them? hazon ubaqar yishakhet lahem umaza lahem, ’im kal degei hayam ye’asef lahem umaza lahem.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hyd yhwh tqZr 8th tr1h hyqrk dbry 1m l1 and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's hand waxed short? thou see now whether my bee-word come to pass unto thee or not. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hayad yhvh tiqzar, ‘atah tir’eh hayiqrekha debari ’im lo.
wyZ1 mSh wydbr 1l h8m 1t dbry yhwh wy1sp Sb8ym 1yS mzqny h8m wy8md 1tm sbybt h1hl and extracted-mose went out, and told the with-mum-people the bee-words of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and added the seventy men of the elders of the with-mum-people, and set them round about the dwelling. vayezei mosheh vaydaber ’el ha‘am dibrei yhvh, vaye’esof shib‘im ’ish miziqnei ha‘am vaya‘amed ’otam sebibot ha’ohel.
wyrd yhwh b8nn wydbr 1lyw wy1Zl mn hrwH 1Sr 8lyw wytn 8l Sb8ym 1yS hzqnym wyhy knwH 8lyhm hrwH wytnb1w wl1 yspw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou came down in a cloud, and spake unto him, and took of breath-spirit that was upon him, and gave it unto the seventy elders: and it came to pass, that, when breath-spirit rested upon them, they brought-prophesied, and did not cease. vayered yhvh be‘anan vaydaber ’elav vayazel min haruakh ’asher ‘alav vayiten ‘al shib‘im hazeqenim, vayhi kenoakh ‘alehem haruakh vayitnabe’u velo yasafu.
wyS1rw Sny 1nSym bmHnh Sm h1Hd 1ldd wSm hSny mydd wtnH 8lyhm hrwH whmh bktbym wl1 yZ1w h1hlh wytnb1w bmHnh and there remained two of the men in the camp, the name of the one was on-chest-eldad, and the name of the other from-chest-medad: and breath-spirit rested upon them; and they were of them that were written, and went not out unto the dwelling: and they brought-prophesied in the camp. vayisha’aru shene ’anashim bamakhaneh shem ha’ekhad ’eldad veshem hasheni medad vatanakh ‘alehem haruakh vehemah baketubim velo yaze’u ha’ohelah, vayitnabe’u bamakhaneh.
wyrZ hn8r wygd lmSh wy1mr 1ldd wmydd mtnb1ym bmHnh and there ran a young man, and told extracted-mose, and said, on-chest-eldad and from-chest-medad do bring-prophesy in the camp. vayaraz hana‘ar vayaged lemosheh vayomar, ’eldad umedad mitnabe’im bamakhaneh.
wy8n yhwS8 bn nwn mSrt mSh mbHryw wy1mr 1dny mSh kl1m and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun, the worker of extracted-mose, one of his young men, answered and said, my lord-base extracted-mose, forbid them. vaya‘an yehoshua‘ bin nun mesharet mosheh mibekhurav vayomar, ’adoni mosheh kela’em.
wy1mr lw mSh hmqn1 1th ly wmy ytn kl 8m yhwh nby1ym ky ytn yhwh 1t rwHw 8lyhm and extracted-mose said unto him, enviest thou for my sake? would towards-these-elohim that all yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's with-mum-people were bringers, and that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou would put his breath-spirit upon them! vayomer lo mosheh hamqanei ’atah umi yiten kal ‘am yhvh nebi’im ki yiten yhvh rukho ‘alehem.
wy1sp mSh 1l hmHnh hw1 wzqny ySr1l and extracted-mose gat him into the camp, he and the elders of saturated-towards-israel. vaye’asef mosheh ’el hamakhaneh, hu veziqnei yisra’el.
wrwH ns8 m1t yhwh wygz Slwym mn hym wyTS 8l hmHnh kdrk ywm kh wkdrk ywm kh sbybwt hmHnh wk1mtym 8l pny h1rZ and there went forth a wind from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and brought quails from the sea, and let them fall by the camp, as it were a day's journey on this side, and as it were a day's journey on the other side, round about the camp, and as it were two cubits high upon the face-turns of the earth. veruakh nasa‘ me’et yhvh vayagaz salvim min hayam vayitosh ‘al hamakhaneh kederekh yom koh ukhederekh yom koh sebibot hamakhaneh, ukhe’amatayim ‘al penei ha’arez.
wyqm h8m kl hywm hhw1 wkl hlylh wkl ywm hmHrt wy1spw 1t hSlw hmm8yT 1sp 8Srh Hmrym wySTHw lhm STwH sbybwt hmHnh and the with-mum-people stood up all that day, and all that night, and all the next day, and they added the quails: he that added least added ten homers: and they spread them all abroad for themselves round about the camp. vayaqam ha‘am kal hayom hahu vekhal halaylah vekhol yom hamakhorat vaya’asfu haselav hamam‘it ’asaf ‘asarah khomarim, vayishtekhu lahem shatoakh sebibot hamakhaneh.
hbSr 8wdnw byn Snyhm Trm ykrt w1p yhwh Hrh b8m wyk yhwh b8m mkh rbh m1d and while the flesh was yet between-bin their teeth, ere it was chewed, the wrath of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was kindled against the with-mum-people, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou smote the with-mum-people with a very great plague. habasar ‘odenu ben shinehem terem yikaret, ve’af yhvh kharah ba‘am vayakh yhvh ba‘am makah rabah me’od.
wyqr1 1t Sm hmqwm hhw1 qbrwt ht1wh ky Sm qbrw 1t h8m hmt1wym and he called the name of that place graveyard-of-craving-kibrot-hatavah: because there they buried the with-mum-people that craved. vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu hata’avah, ki sham qaberu ha‘am hamit’avim.
mqbrwt ht1wh ns8w h8m HZrwt wyhyw bHZrwt and the with-mum-people journeyed from graveyard-of-craving-kibrot-hatavah unto gardens-hazerot; and abode at gardens-hazerot. miqibrot hata’avah nase‘u ha‘am khazerot, vayihyu bakhazerot.
wtdbr mrym w1hrn bmSh 8l 1dwt h1Sh hkSyt 1Sr lqH ky 1Sh kSyt lqH and rebel-bitter-miriam and cabinet-aaron spake against extracted-mose because of the spindle-spindle-cushn woman whom he had married: for he had married an spindle-spindle-cushn woman. vatedaber miryam ve’aharon bemosheh ‘al ’odot ha’ishah hakushit ’asher laqakh, ki ’ishah khushit laqakh.
wy1mrw hrq 1k bmSh dbr yhwh hl1 gm bnw dbr wySm8 yhwh and they said, hath yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou indeed bee-spoken only by extracted-mose? hath he not bee-spoken also by us? and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou heard it. vayomeru haraq ’akh bemosheh diber yhvh halo gam banu diber, vayishma‘ yhvh.
wh1yS mSh 8nw 8nyw m1d mkl h1dm 1Sr 8l pny h1dmh (now the man extracted-mose was very meek, above all the men which were upon the face-turns of the earth.) veha’ish mosheh ‘anav me’od, mikol ha’adam ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah.
wy1mr yhwh pt1m 1l mSh w1l 1hrn w1l mrym Z1w SlStkm 1l 1hl mw8d wyZ1w SlStm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake suddenly unto extracted-mose, and unto cabinet-aaron, and unto rebel-bitter-miriam, come out ye three unto the tent of until-conception. and they three came out. vayomer yhvh pit’om ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ve’el miryam ze’u shelashetekhem ’el ’ohel mo‘ed, vayeze’u shelashetam.
wyrd yhwh b8mwd 8nn wy8md ptH h1hl wyqr1 1hrn wmrym wyZ1w Snyhm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou came down in the page-column-erection of the cloud, and stood in the opening of the dwelling, and called cabinet-aaron and rebel-bitter-miriam: and they both came forth. vayered yhvh be‘amud ‘anan vaya‘amod petakh ha’ohel, vayiqra ’aharon umiryam vayeze’u shenehem.
wy1mr Sm8w n1 dbry 1m yhyh nby1km yhwh bmr1h 1lyw 1twd8 bHlwm 1dbr bw and he said, hear now my bee-words: if there be a bringer among you, i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will make myself hand-known unto him in a vision, and will speak unto him in a dream. vayomer shim‘u na debaray, ’im yihyeh nebi’akhem yhvh bamar’ah ’elav ’etvada‘ bakhalom ’adaber bo.
l1 kn 8bdy mSh bkl byty n1mn hw1 my worker extracted-mose is not so, who is faith-trainingful in all mine daughter-house. lo khen ‘abdi mosheh, bekhal beti ne’eman hu.
ph 1l ph 1dbr bw wmr1h wl1 bHydt wtmnt yhwh ybyT wmdw8 l1 yr1tm ldbr b8bdy bmSh with him will i speak mouth to mouth, even apparently, and not in dark speeches; and the similitude of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou he behold: wherefore then were ye not afraid to speak against my worker extracted-mose? peh ’el peh ’adaber bo umar’eh velo bekhidot utemunat yhvh yabit, umadua‘ lo yeretem ledaber be‘abdi bemosheh.
wyHr 1p yhwh bm wylk and the nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was kindled against them; and he departed. vayikhar ’af yhvh bam vayelakh.
wh8nn sr m8l h1hl whnh mrym mZr8t kSlg wypn 1hrn 1l mrym whnh mZr8t and the cloud departed from off the dwelling; and, behold, rebel-bitter-miriam became waspish-speckled-speckled, to-between-bin-between-build-white as snow: and cabinet-aaron looked upon rebel-bitter-miriam, and, behold, she was waspish-speckled-speckled. vehe‘anan sar me‘al ha’ohel vehineh miryam mezora‘at kashaleg, vayifen ’aharon ’el miryam vehineh mezora‘at.
wy1mr 1hrn 1l mSh by 1dny 1l n1 tSt 8lynw HT1t 1Sr nw1lnw w1Sr HT1nw and cabinet-aaron said unto extracted-mose, alas, my lord-base, i beseech thee, lay not the miss upon us, wherein we have done foolishly, and wherein we have missed. vayomer ’aharon ’el mosheh, bi ’adoni ’al na tashet ‘alenu khatat ’asher no’alnu va’asher khatanu.
1l n1 thy kmt 1Sr bZ1tw mrHm 1mw wy1kl HZy bSrw let her not be as one dead, of whom the flesh is half consumed when he cometh out of his mother's womb. ’al na tehi kamet, ’asher bezeto merekhem ’imo vaye’akhel khazi besaro.
wyZ8q mSh 1l yhwh l1mr 1l n1 rp1 n1 lh and extracted-mose cried unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, heal her now, o towards-these-elohim, i beseech thee. vayiz‘aq mosheh ’el yhvh lemor, ’el na refa na lah.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1byh yrq yrq bpnyh hl1 tklm Sb8t ymym tsgr Sb8t ymym mHwZ lmHnh w1Hr t1sp and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, if her father had and spit in her face-turns, should she not be ashamed seven days? let her be shut out from the camp seven days, and after that let her be received in again. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’abiha yaroq yaraq befaneha halo tikalem shib‘at yamim, tisager shib‘at yamim mikhuz lamakhaneh ve’akhar te’asef.
wtsgr mrym mHwZ lmHnh Sb8t ymym wh8m l1 ns8 8d h1sp mrym and rebel-bitter-miriam was shut out from the camp seven days: and the with-mum-people journeyed not till rebel-bitter-miriam was brought in again. vatisager miryam mikhuz lamakhaneh shib‘at yamim, veha‘am lo nasa‘ ‘ad he’asef miryam.
w1Hr ns8w h8m mHZrwt wyHnw bmdbr p1rn and afterward the with-mum-people removed from gardens-hazerot, and pitched in the place-of-word-desert of magnificence-paran. ve’akhar nase‘u ha‘am mekhazerot, vayakhanu bemidbar paran.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
SlH lk 1nSym wytrw 1t 1rZ kn8n 1Sr 1ny ntn lbny ySr1l 1yS 1Hd 1yS 1Hd lmTh 1btyw tSlHw kl nSy1 bhm send thou men, that they may search the land of mobile-trade-canaan, which i give unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: of every branch of their fathers ye send a man, every one a ruler among them. shelakh ’anashim veyaturu ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani noten libnei yisra’el, ’ish ’ekhad ’ish ’ekhad lemateh ’abotav tishlakhu kol nasi bahem.
wySlH 1tm mSh mmdbr p1rn 8l py yhwh klm 1nSym r1Sy bny ySr1l hmh and extracted-mose by the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sent them from the place-of-word-desert of magnificence-paran: all those men were heads of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayishlakh ’otam mosheh mimidbar paran ‘al pi yhvh, kulam ’anashim rashei bene yisra’el hemah.
w1lh Smwtm lmTh r1wbn Smw8 bn zkwr and these were their names: of the branch of buddy-see-child-reuben, hear-shamua child-between of remember-zakur. ve’eleh shemotam, lemateh re’uben shamua‘ ben zakur.
lmTh Sm8wn SpT bn Hwry of the branch of hear-home-simeon, lip-judge-shaphat child-between of my-hole-hori. lemateh shim‘on shafat ben khori.
lmTh yhwdh klb bn ypnh of the branch of know-judah, as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh. lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh.
lmTh ySSkr yg1l bn ywsp of the branch of wage-issachar, free-igal child-between of add-joseph. lemateh yisashkhar yig’al ben yosef.
lmTh 1prym hwS8 bn nwn of the branch of fruitful-ephraim, save-esus child-between of fish-nun. lemateh ’efrayim hoshea‘ bin nun.
lmTh bnymn plTy bn rpw1 of the branch of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin, emit-palti child-between of medicine-raphu. lemateh binyamin palti ben rafu.
lmTh zbwln gdy1l bn swdy of the branch of fertile-zebulun, luck-gaddiel child-between of secret-sodi. lemateh zebulun gadi’el ben sodi.
lmTh ywsp lmTh mnSh gdy bn swsy of the branch of add-joseph, namely, of the branch of place-of-sleep-manasseh, luck-gaddi child-between of my-horse. lemateh yosef lemateh menasheh, gadi ben susi.
lmTh dn 8my1l bn gmly of the branch of discuss-dan, my-with-towards child-between of my-ripen-camel. lemateh dan ‘ami’el ben gemali.
lmTh 1Sr stwr bn myk1l of the branch of bliss-asher, unkempt-contradict-sethur child-between of who-like-towards. lemateh ’asher setur ben mikha’el.
lmTh nptly nHby bn wpsy of the branch of twisted-naphtali, rest-owe-nahbi child-between of stripe-vophsi. lemateh naftali nakhbi ben vafesi.
lmTh gd g1w1l bn mky of the branch of luck-gad, rise-towards-geuel child-between of of-beat-machi. lemateh gad ge’u’el ben makhi.
1lh Smwt h1nSym 1Sr SlH mSh ltwr 1t h1rZ wyqr1 mSh lhwS8 bn nwn yhwS8 these are the names of the men which extracted-mose sent to spy out the land. and extracted-mose called save-esus child-between of fish-nun save-jesus. ’eleh shemot ha’anashim ’asher shalakh mosheh latur ha’arez, vayiqra mosheh lehoshea‘ bin nun yehoshua‘.
wySlH 1tm mSh ltwr 1t 1rZ kn8n wy1mr 1lhm 8lw zh bngb w8lytm 1t hhr and extracted-mose sent them to spy out the land of mobile-trade-canaan, and said unto them, get you up this way dry-southward, and go up into the mountain: vayishlakh ’otam mosheh latur ’erez kena‘an, vayomer ’alehem ‘alu zeh banegeb va‘alitem ’et hahar.
wr1ytm 1t h1rZ mh hw1 w1t h8m hySb 8lyh hHzq hw1 hrph hm8T hw1 1m rb and see the land, what it is, and the with-mum-people that dwelleth therein, whether they be strong or weak, few or many; ure’item ha’arez mah hi ve’et ha‘am hayosheb ‘aleha hekhazaq hu harafeh ham‘at hu ’im rab.
wmh h1rZ 1Sr hw1 ySb bh hTwbh hw1 1m r8h wmh h8rym 1Sr hw1 ywSb bhnh hbmHnym 1m bmbZrym and what the land is that they dwell in, whether it be good or bad; and what cities they be that they dwell in, whether in tents, or in strong holds; umah ha’arez ’asher hu yosheb bah hatobah hi ’im ra‘ah, umah he‘arim ’asher hu yosheb bahenah habemakhanim ’im bemibzarim.
wmh h1rZ hSmnh hw1 1m rzh hyS bh 8Z 1m 1yn whtHzqtm wlqHtm mpry h1rZ whymym ymy bkwry 8nbym and what the land is, whether it be fat or lean, whether there be wood therein, or not. and be ye of good courage, and bring of the fruit of the land. now the time was the time of the first ripe grapes. umah ha’arez hashemenah hi ’im razah hayesh bah ‘ez ’im ’ayin vehitkhazaqtem uleqakhtem miperi ha’arez, vehayamim yemei bikurei ‘anabim.
wy8lw wytrw 1t h1rZ mmdbr Zn 8d rHb lb1 Hmt so they went up, and searched the land from the place-of-word-desert of briar-zin unto wide-rehob, as men come to hot-hamath. vaya‘alu vayaturu ha’arez, mimidbar zin ‘ad rekhob lebo khamat.
wy8lw bngb wyb1 8d Hbrwn wSm 1Hymn SSy wtlmy ylydy h8nq wHbrwn Sb8 Snym nbnth lpny Z8n mZrym and they ascended by the dry-south, and came unto friend-joy-hebron; where my-brother-from-ahiman, my-six-sheshai, and furrow-talmai, the natives of giant-anak, were. (now friend-joy-hebron was between-built seven years before-turns ten-zoan in narrows-mizraim.) vaya‘alu banegeb vayabo ‘ad khebron vesham ’akhiman sheshay vetalmay yelidei ha‘anaq, vekhebron sheba‘ shanim nibnetah lifnei zo‘an mizrayim.
wyb1w 8d nHl 1Skl wykrtw mSm zmwrh w1Skwl 8nbym 1Hd wyS1hw bmwT bSnym wmn hrmnym wmn ht1nym and they came unto the brook of fire-all-eshcol, and cut down from thence a branch with one cluster of grapes, and they bare it between-bin two upon a staff; and they brought of the high-pomegranates, and of the figs. vayabo’u ‘ad nakhal ’eshkol vayikhretu misham zemorah ve’eshkol ‘anabim ’ekhad vayisa’uhu bamot bishnayim, umin harimonim umin hate’enim.
lmqwm hhw1 qr1 nHl 1Skwl 8l 1dwt h1Skwl 1Sr krtw mSm bny ySr1l the place was called the brook fire-all-eshcol, because of the cluster of grapes which children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel cut down from thence. lamaqom hahu qara nakhal ’eshkol, ‘al ’odot ha’eshkol ’asher karetu misham benei yisra’el.
wySbw mtwr h1rZ mqZ 1rb8ym ywm and they returned from searching of the land after forty days. vayashubu mitur ha’arez, miqez ’arba‘im yom.
wylkw wyb1w 1l mSh w1l 1hrn w1l kl 8dt bny ySr1l 1l mdbr p1rn qdSh wySybw 1wtm dbr w1t kl h8dh wyr1wm 1t pry h1rZ and they went and came to extracted-mose, and to cabinet-aaron, and to all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, unto the place-of-word-desert of magnificence-paran, to dedicated-finished-kadesh; and brought back bee-word unto them, and unto all the until-witness, and showed them the fruit of the land. vayelekhu vayabo’u ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ve’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ’el midbar paran qadeshah, vayashibu ’otam dabar ve’et kal ha‘edah vayar’um peri ha’arez.
wysprw lw wy1mrw b1nw 1l h1rZ 1Sr SlHtnw wgm zbt Hlb wdbS hw1 wzh pryh and they told him, and said, we came unto the land whither thou sentest us, and surely it floweth with milk and honey; and this is the fruit of it. vaysaperu lo vayomeru banu ’el ha’arez ’asher shelakhtanu, vegam zabat khalab udebash hi vezeh piryah.
1ps ky 8z h8m hySb b1rZ wh8rym bZrwt gdlt m1d wgm yldy h8nq r1ynw Sm nevertheless the with-mum-people be strong that dwell in the land, and the cities are walled, and very great: and moreover we saw the natives of giant-anak there. ’efes ki ‘az ha‘am hayosheb ba’arez, vehe‘arim bezurot gedolot me’od vegam yelidei ha‘anaq ra’inu sham.
8mlq ywSb b1rZ hngb whHty whybwsy wh1mry ywSb bhr whkn8ny ySb 8l hym w8l yd hyrdn the labour-moloch-king-labour-moloch-king-amalekites dwell in the land of the dry-south: and the tusk-cut-hittites, and the trampler-jebusites, and the talker-amorites, dwell in the mountains: and the mobile-trade-canaanites dwell by the sea, and by the coast of its-going-down-jordan. ‘amaleq yosheb be’erez hanegeb, vehakhiti vehaybusi veha’emori yosheb bahar vehakena‘ani yosheb ‘al hayam ve‘al yad hayarden.
wyhs klb 1t h8m 1l mSh wy1mr 8lh n8lh wyrSnw 1th ky ykwl nwkl lh and as-heart-dog-caleb stilled the with-mum-people before-turns extracted-mose, and said, let us go up at once, and possess it; for we are well able to overcome it. vayahas kaleb ha‘am ’el mosheh, vayomer ‘aloh na‘aleh veyarashnu ki yakhol nukhal lah.
wh1nSym 1Sr 8lw 8mw 1mrw l1 nwkl l8lwt 1l h8m ky Hzq hw1 mmnw and the men that went up with him said, we be not able to go up against the with-mum-people; for they are stronger than we. veha’anashim ’asher ‘alu ‘imo ’ameru lo nukhal la‘alot ’el ha‘am, ki khazaq hu mimenu.
wywZy1w dbt h1rZ 1Sr trw 1th 1l bny ySr1l l1mr h1rZ 1Sr 8brnw bh ltwr 1th 1rZ 1klt ywSbyh hw1 wkl h8m 1Sr r1ynw btwkh 1nSy mdwt and they brought up an bad report of the land which they had searched unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, the land, through which we have gone to search it, is a land that eateth up the inhabitants thereof; and all the with-mum-people that we saw in it are men of a great stature. vayozi’u dibat ha’arez ’asher taru ’el benei yisra’el lemor, ha’arez ’asher ‘abarnu bah latur ’erez ’okhelet yoshebeha hi vekhal ha‘am ’asher ra’inu betokhah ’anshei midot.
wSm r1ynw 1t hnpylym bny 8nq mn hnplym wnhy b8ynynw kHgbym wkn hyynw b8ynyhm and there we saw the giants, children-betweens of giant-anak, which come of the giants: and we were in our own sight as grasshoppers, and so we were in their sight. vesham ra’inu hanefilim benei ‘anaq min hanefilim, vanehi be‘enenu kakhagabim vekhen hayinu be‘enehem.
wtS1 kl h8dh wytnw 1t qwlm wybkw h8m blylh hhw1 and all the until-witness lifted up their voice, and cried; and the with-mum-people wept that night. vatisa kal ha‘edah vayitenu qolam, vayibku ha‘am balaylah hahu.
wylnw 8l mSh w8l 1hrn kl bny ySr1l wy1mrw 1lhm kl h8dh lw mtnw b1rZ mZrym 1w bmdbr hzh lw mtnw and all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel murmured against extracted-mose and against cabinet-aaron: and the whole until-witness said unto them, would towards-these-elohim that we had died in the land of narrows-mizraim! or would towards-these-elohim we had died in this place-of-word-desert! vayilonu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon kol benei yisra’el, vayomeru ’alehem kal ha‘edah lu matnu be’erez mizrayim ’o bamidbar hazeh lu matenu.
wlmh yhwh mby1 1tnw 1l h1rZ hz1t lnpl bHrb nSynw wTpnw yhyw lbz hlw1 Twb lnw Swb mZrymh and wherefore hath yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou brought us unto this land, to fall by the sword, that our women and our children-betweens should be a prey? were it not better for us to return into narrows-mizraim? velamah yhvh mebi ’otanu ’el ha’arez hazot linpol bakhereb nashenu vetapenu yihyu labaz, halo tob lanu shub mizrayemah.
wy1mrw 1yS 1l 1Hyw ntnh r1S wnSwbh mZrymh and they said one to another, let us make a captain, and let us return into narrows-mizraim. vayomeru ’ish ’el ’akhiv, nitenah rosh venashubah mizrayemah.
wypl mSh w1hrn 8l pnyhm lpny kl qhl 8dt bny ySr1l then extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron fell on their face-turns-turns before-turns all the assembly of the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayipol mosheh ve’aharon ‘al penehem, lifnei kal qehal ‘adat benei yisra’el.
wyhwS8 bn nwn wklb bn ypnh mn htrym 1t h1rZ qr8w bgdyhm and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun, and as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh, which were of them that searched the land, rent their clothes: vihoshua‘ bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh min hatarim ha’arez, qare‘u bigdehem.
wy1mrw 1l kl 8dt bny ySr1l l1mr h1rZ 1Sr 8brnw bh ltwr 1th Twbh h1rZ m1d m1d and they spake unto all the company of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, the land, which we passed through to search it, is an exceeding good land. vayomeru ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el lemor, ha’arez ’asher ‘abarnu bah latur tobah ha’arez me’od me’od.
1m HpZ bnw yhwh whby1 1tnw 1l h1rZ hz1t wntnh lnw 1rZ 1Sr hw1 zbt Hlb wdbS if yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou delight in us, then he will bring us into this land, and give it us; a land which floweth with milk and honey. ’im khafez banu yhvh vehebi ’otanu ’el ha’arez hazot unetanah lanu, ’erez ’asher hi zabat khalab udebash.
1k byhwh 1l tmrdw w1tm 1l tyr1w 1t 8m h1rZ ky lHmnw hm sr Zlm m8lyhm wyhwh 1tnw 1l tyr1m only rebel not ye to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, neither fear ye the with-mum-people of the land; for they are bread for us: their defense is departed from them, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is with us: fear them not. ’akh yhvh ’al timrodu ve’atem ’al tire’u ‘am ha’arez ki lakhmenu hem, sar zilam me‘alehem yhvh ’itanu ’al tira’um.
wy1mrw kl h8dh lrgwm 1tm b1bnym wkbwd yhwh nr1h b1hl mw8d 1l kl bny ySr1l and all the until-witness bade father-child-stone them with stones. and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared in the tent of until-conception before-turns all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayomeru kal ha‘edah lirgom ’otam ba’abanim, ukhebod yhvh nir’ah be’ohel mo‘ed ’el kal benei yisra’el.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 8d 1nh yn1Zny h8m hzh w8d 1nh l1 y1mynw by bkl h1twt 1Sr 8Syty bqrbw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, how long will this with-mum-people provoke me? and how long will it be ere they be coached by me, for all the signs which i have showed among them? vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘ad ’anah yena’azuni ha‘am hazeh, ve‘ad ’anah lo ya’aminu bi bekhol ha’otot ’asher ‘asiti beqirbo.
1knw bdbr w1wrSnw w18Sh 1tk lgwy gdwl w8Zwm mmnw i will hit them with the pestilence, and disinherit them, and will make of thee a greater nation and mightier than they. ’akenu badeber ve’orishenu, ve’e‘eseh ’otekha lego gadol ve‘azum mimenu.
wy1mr mSh 1l yhwh wSm8w mZrym ky h8lyt bkHk 1t h8m hzh mqrbw and extracted-mose said unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, then the narrows-mizraimians hear it, (for thou broughtest up this with-mum-people in thy might from among them;) vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh, veshame‘u mizrayim ki he‘elita bekhokhakha ha‘am hazeh miqirbo.
w1mrw 1l ywSb h1rZ hz1t Sm8w ky 1th yhwh bqrb h8m hzh 1Sr 8yn b8yn nr1h 1th yhwh w8nnk 8md 8lhm wb8md 8nn 1th hlk lpnyhm ywmm wb8mwd 1S lylh and they will tell it to the inhabitants of this land: for they have heard that thou yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou art among this with-mum-people, that thou yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou art seen face-turns to face-turns, and that thy cloud standeth over them, and that thou goest before-turns them, by day time in a page-column-erection of a cloud, and in a page-column-erection of fire by night. ve’ameru ’el yosheb ha’arez hazot shame‘u ki ’atah yhvh beqereb ha‘am hazeh, ’asher ‘ayin be‘ayin nir’ah ’atah yhvh va‘ananekha ‘omed ‘alehem ube‘amud ‘anan ’atah holekh lifnehem yomam ube‘amud ’esh layelah.
whmth 1t h8m hzh k1yS 1Hd w1mrw hgwym 1Sr Sm8w 1t Sm8k l1mr now if thou kill all this with-mum-people as one man, then the nations which have heard the fame of thee will speak, saying, vehematah ha‘am hazeh ke’ish ’ekhad, ve’ameru hagoyim ’asher shame‘u shim‘akha lemor.
mblty yklt yhwh lhby1 1t h8m hzh 1l h1rZ 1Sr nSb8 lhm wySHTm bmdbr because yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was not able to bring this with-mum-people into the land which he sware unto them, therefore he hath slain them in the place-of-word-desert. mibilti yekholet yhvh lehabi ha‘am hazeh ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ lahem, vayishkhatem bamidbar.
w8th ygdl n1 kH 1dny k1Sr dbrt l1mr and now, i beseech thee, let the dynamic of my lord-base be great, according as thou hast bee-spoken, saying, ve‘atah yigdal na koakh ’adonay, ka’asher dibarta lemor.
yhwh 1rk 1pym wrb Hsd nS1 8wn wpS8 wnqh l1 ynqh pqd 8wn 1bwt 8l bnym 8l SlSym w8l rb8ym yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is long-suffering, and of great mercy, forgiving torment and crime, and by no means clearing the fire-name, visiting the torment of the fathers upon children-betweens unto the third and fourth generation. yhvh ’erekh ’apayim verab khesed nosei ‘avon vafasha‘, venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed ‘avon ’abot ‘al banim ‘al shileshim ve‘al ribe‘im.
slH n1 l8wn h8m hzh kgdl Hsdk wk1Sr nS1th l8m hzh mmZrym w8d hnh pardon, i beseech thee, the torment of this with-mum-people according unto the greatness of thy mercy, and as thou hast released this with-mum-people, from narrows-mizraim even until now. selakh na la‘avon ha‘am hazeh kegodel khasdekha, vekha’asher nasatah la‘am hazeh mimizrayim ve‘ad henah.
wy1mr yhwh slHty kdbrk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said, i have pardoned according to thy bee-word: vayomer yhvh salakhti kidbarekha.
w1wlm Hy 1ny wyml1 kbwd yhwh 1t kl h1rZ and as truly as i live, all the earth be filled with the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ve’ulam khay ’ani, veyimalei khebod yhvh kal ha’arez.
ky kl h1nSym hr1ym 1t kbdy w1t 1tty 1Sr 8Syty bmZrym wbmdbr wynsw 1ty zh 8Sr p8mym wl1 Sm8w bqwly because all those men which have seen my heaviness, and my miracles, which i did in narrows-mizraim and in the place-of-word-desert, and have tempted me now these ten times, and have not hearkened to my voice; ki khal ha’anashim haro’im kebodi ve’et ’ototay ’asher ‘asiti bemizrayim ubamidbar, vaynasu ’oti zeh ‘eser pe‘amim velo shame‘u beqoli.
1m yr1w 1t h1rZ 1Sr nSb8ty l1btm wkl mn1Zy l1 yr1wh surely they not see the land which i sware unto their fathers, neither any of them that provoked me see it: ’im yir’u ’et ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti la’abotam, vekhal mena’azay lo yir’uha.
w8bdy klb 8qb hyth rwH 1Hrt 8mw wyml1 1Hry whby1tyw 1l h1rZ 1Sr b1 Smh wzr8w ywrSnh and my worker as-heart-dog-caleb, because he had another breath-spirit with him, and hath followed me fully, him will i bring into the land whereinto he went; and his seed possess it. ve‘abdi khaleb ‘eqeb hayetah ruakh ’akheret ‘imo vaymalei ’akharay, vahabi’otiv ’el ha’arez ’asher ba shamah vezar‘o yorishenah.
wh8mlqy whkn8ny ywSb b8mq mHr pnw ws8w lkm hmdbr drk ym swp (now the labour-moloch-king-labour-moloch-king-amalekites and the mobile-trade-canaanites dwelt in the valley.) tomorrow turn you, and get you into the place-of-word-desert by the way of the end sea. veha‘amaleqi vehakena‘ani yosheb ba‘emeq, makhar penu use‘u lakhem hamidbar derekh yam suf.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
8d mty l8dh hr8h hz1t 1Sr hmh mlynym 8ly 1t tlnwt bny ySr1l 1Sr hmh mlynym 8ly Sm8ty how long i bear with this bad until-witness, which murmur against me? i have heard the murmurings of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which they murmur against me. ‘ad matay la‘edah hara‘ah hazot ’asher hemah malinim ‘alay, telunot benei yisra’el ’asher hemah malinim ‘alay shama‘eti.
1mr 1lhm Hy 1ny n1m yhwh 1m l1 k1Sr dbrtm b1zny kn 18Sh lkm say unto them, as truly as i live, saith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, as ye have bee-spoken in mine ears, so will i do to you: ’emor ’alehem khay ’ani ne’um yhvh ’im lo ka’asher dibartem be’azenay, ken ’e‘eseh lakhem.
bmdbr hzh yplw pgrykm wkl pqdykm lkl msprkm mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh 1Sr hlyntm 8ly your carcasses fall in this place-of-word-desert; and all that were numbered of you, according to your whole number, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward which have murmured against me. bamidbar hazeh yipelu figrekhem vekhal pequdekhem lekhal misparkhem miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah, ’asher halinotem ‘alay.
1m 1tm tb1w 1l h1rZ 1Sr nS1ty 1t ydy lSkn 1tkm bh ky 1m klb bn ypnh wyhwS8 bn nwn doubtless ye not come into the land, concerning which i sware to make you dwell therein, save as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh, and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun. ’im ’atem tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher nasati yadi leshaken ’etkhem bah, ki ’im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua‘ bin nun.
wTpkm 1Sr 1mrtm lbz yhyh whby1ty 1tm wyd8w 1t h1rZ 1Sr m1stm bh and your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, them will i bring in, and they hand-know the land which ye have despised. vetapekhem ’asher ’amartem labaz yihyeh, vehebeti veyade‘u ha’arez ’asher me’astem bah.
wpgrykm 1tm yplw bmdbr hzh and as for you, your carcasses, they fall in this place-of-word-desert. ufigrekhem ’atem, yipelu bamidbar hazeh.
wbnykm yhyw r8ym bmdbr 1rb8ym Snh wnS1w 1t znwtykm 8d tm pgrykm bmdbr and your children-betweens wander in the place-of-word-desert forty years, and bear your whoredoms, until your carcasses be wasted in the place-of-word-desert. ubenekhem yihyu ro‘im bamidbar ’arba‘im shanah venase’u ’et zenutekhem, ‘ad tom pigrekhem bamidbar.
bmspr hymym 1Sr trtm 1t h1rZ 1rb8ym ywm ywm lSnh ywm lSnh tS1w 1t 8wntykm 1rb8ym Snh wyd8tm 1t tnw1ty after the number of the days in which ye searched the land, even forty days, each day for a year, ye bear your seasons, even forty years, and ye hand-know my breach of promise. bemispar hayamim ’asher tartem ’et ha’arez ’arba‘im yom yom lashanah yom lashanah tis’u ‘avonotekhem ’arba‘im shanah, vida‘tem tenu’ati.
1ny yhwh dbrty 1m l1 z1t 18Sh lkl h8dh hr8h hz1t hnw8dym 8ly bmdbr hzh ytmw wSm ymtw i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou have said, i will surely do it unto all this bad until-witness, that are added together against me: in this place-of-word-desert they be consumed, and there they die. ’ani yhvh dibarti ’im lo zot ’e‘eseh lekhal ha‘edah hara‘ah hazot hano‘adim ‘alay, bamidbar hazeh yitamu vesham yamutu.
wh1nSym 1Sr SlH mSh ltwr 1t h1rZ wySbw wylwnw wylynw 8lyw 1t kl h8dh lhwZy1 dbh 8l h1rZ and the men, which extracted-mose sent to search the land, who returned, and made all the until-witness to murmur against him, by bringing up a slander upon the land, veha’anashim ’asher shalakh mosheh latur ha’arez, vayashubu vayalinu ‘alav kal ha‘edah lehozi dibah ‘al ha’arez.
wymtw h1nSym mwZ1y dbt h1rZ r8h bmgph lpny yhwh even those men that did bring up the bad report upon the land, died by the plague before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayamutu ha’anashim mozi’ei dibat ha’arez ra‘ah, bamagefah lifnei yhvh.
wyhwS8 bn nwn wklb bn ypnh Hyw mn h1nSym hhm hhlkym ltwr 1t h1rZ and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun, and as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh, which were of the men that went to search the land, lived still. vihoshua‘ bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh, khayu min ha’anashim hahem haholekhim latur ha’arez.
wydbr mSh 1t hdbrym h1lh 1l kl bny ySr1l wyt1blw h8m m1d and extracted-mose told these sayings unto all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and the with-mum-people mourned greatly. vaydaber mosheh hadebarim ha’eleh ’el kal benei yisra’el, vayit’abelu ha‘am me’od.
wySkmw bbqr wy8lw 1l r1S hhr l1mr hnnw w8lynw 1l hmqwm 1Sr 1mr yhwh ky HT1nw and they rose up early in the morning, and gat them up into the head of the mountain, saying, lo, we be here, and will go up unto the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath promised: for we have missed. vayashkimu baboqer vaya‘alu ’el rosh hahar lemor, hinenu ve‘alinu ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar yhvh ki khatanu.
wy1mr mSh lmh zh 1tm 8brym 1t py yhwh whw1 l1 tZlH and extracted-mose said, wherefore now do ye transgress the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou? and it not prosper. vayomer mosheh lamah zeh ’atem ‘oberim pi yhvh, vehiv lo tizlakh.
1l t8lw ky 1yn yhwh bqrbkm wl1 tngpw lpny 1ybykm go not up, for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is not among you; that ye be not smitten before-turns your father-adversaries. ’al ta‘alu ki ’en yhvh beqirbekhem, velo tinagefu lifnei ’oyebekhem.
ky h8mlqy whkn8ny Sm lpnykm wnpltm bHrb ky 8l kn Sbtm m1Hry yhwh wl1 yhyh yhwh 8mkm for the labour-moloch-king-labour-moloch-king-amalekites and the mobile-trade-canaanites are there before-turns you, and ye fall by the sword: because ye are turned away from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, therefore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will not be with you. ki ha‘amaleqi vehakena‘ani sham lifnekhem unefaltem bekhareb, ki ‘al ken shabtem me’akharei yhvh velo yihyeh yhvh ‘imakhem.
wy8plw l8lwt 1l r1S hhr w1rwn bryt yhwh wmSh l1 mSw mqrb hmHnh and they presumed to go up unto the hill top: nevertheless the cabinet of the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and extracted-mose, departed not out of the camp. vaya‘pilu la‘alot ’el rosh hahar, va’aron berit yhvh umosheh lo mashu miqereb hamakhaneh.
wyrd h8mlqy whkn8ny hySb bhr hhw1 wykwm wyktwm 8d hHrmh then the labour-moloch-king-labour-moloch-king-amalekites came down, and the mobile-trade-canaanites which dwelt in that hill, and smote them, and discomfited them, even unto fishing-net-boycott-hormah. vayered ha‘amaleqi vehakena‘ani hayosheb bahar hahu, vayakum vayaketum ‘ad hakharemah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm ky tb1w 1l 1rZ mwSbtykm 1Sr 1ny ntn lkm speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when ye be come into the land of your habitations, which i give unto you, daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ki tabo’u ’el ’erez moshebotekhem ’asher ’ani noten lakhem.
w8Sytm 1Sh lyhwh 8lh 1w zbH lpl1 ndr 1w bndbh 1w bm8dykm l8Swt ryH nyHH lyhwh mn hbqr 1w mn hZ1n and will make an inward by fire unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, a on-up, or a butcher in performing a vow, or in a volunteer, or in your solemn until-conceptions, to make a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, of the visit-cattle or of the flock: va‘asitem ’isheh yhvh ‘olah ’o zebakh lefale neder ’o bindabah ’o bemo‘adekhem, la‘asot reakh nikhoakh yhvh min habaqar ’o min hazon.
whqryb hmqryb qrbnw lyhwh mnHh slt 8Srwn blwl brb8yt hhyn Smn then he that inwardeth his inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring a absorber of a tenth deal of basket-flour mingled with the fourth part of an here-hin of name-from-oil. vehiqrib hamaqrib qarebano yhvh, minkhah solet ‘isaron balul birbi‘it hahin shamen.
wyyn lnsk rby8yt hhyn t8Sh 8l h8lh 1w lzbH lkbS h1Hd and the fourth part of an here-hin of wine-inherit for a pouring thou prepare with the on-up or butcher, for one lamb. veyayin lanesekh rebi‘it hahin ta‘aseh ‘al ha‘olah ’o lazabakh, lakebes ha’ekhad.
1w l1yl t8Sh mnHh slt Sny 8Srnym blwlh bSmn SlSyt hhyn or for a voiceless-ram, thou prepare for a absorber two tenth deals of basket-flour mingled with the third part of an here-hin of name-from-oil. ’o la’ayil ta‘aseh minkhah solet shenei ‘esronim, belulah bashemen shelishit hahin.
wyyn lnsk SlSyt hhyn tqryb ryH nyHH lyhwh and for a pouring thou inward the third part of an here-hin of wine-inherit, for a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. veyayin lanesekh shelishit hahin, taqrib reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wky t8Sh bn bqr 8lh 1w zbH lpl1 ndr 1w Slmym lyhwh and when thou preparest a bull for a on-up, or for a butcher in performing a vow, or wholes unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vekhi ta‘aseh ben baqar ‘olah ’o zabakh, lefale neder ’o shelamim yhvh.
whqryb 8l bn hbqr mnHh slt SlSh 8Srnym blwl bSmn HZy hhyn then he bring with a bull a absorber of three tenth deals of basket-flour mingled with half an here-hin of name-from-oil. vehiqrib ‘al ben habaqar minkhah solet sheloshah ‘esronim, balul bashemen khazi hahin.
wyyn tqryb lnsk HZy hhyn 1Sh ryH nyHH lyhwh and thou bring for a pouring half an here-hin of wine-inherit, for a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. veyayin taqrib lanesekh khazi hahin, ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
kkh y8Sh lSwr h1Hd 1w l1yl h1Hd 1w lSh bkbSym 1w b8zym thus it be done for one bull, or for one voiceless-ram, or for a lamb, or a kid. kakhah ye‘aseh lashor ha’ekhad ’o la’ayil ha’ekhad, ’o laseh bakebasim ’o ba‘izim.
kmspr 1Sr t8Sw kkh t8Sw l1Hd kmsprm according to the number that ye prepare, so ye do to every one according to their number. kamispar ’asher ta‘asu, kakhah ta‘asu la’ekhad kemisparam.
kl h1zrH y8Sh kkh 1t 1lh lhqryb 1Sh ryH nyHH lyhwh all that are born of the country do these things after this manner, in inward a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. kal ha’ezrakh ya‘aseh kakhah ’eleh, lehaqrib ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wky ygwr 1tkm gr 1w 1Sr btwkkm ldrtykm w8Sh 1Sh ryH nyHH lyhwh k1Sr t8Sw kn y8Sh and if a stranger sojourn with you, or whosoever be among you in your generations, and will inward a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; as ye do, so he do. vekhi yagur ’itekhem ger ’o ’asher betokhkhem ledorotekhem ve‘asah ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh, ka’asher ta‘asu ken ya‘aseh.
hqhl Hqh 1Ht lkm wlgr hgr Hqt 8wlm ldrtykm kkm kgr yhyh lpny yhwh one ordinance be both for you of the until-witness, and also for the stranger that sojourneth with you, an ordinance for ever in your generations: as ye are, so the stranger be before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. haqahal khuqah ’akhat lakhem velager hagar, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem kakhem kager yihyeh lifnei yhvh.
twrh 1Ht wmSpT 1Hd yhyh lkm wlgr hgr 1tkm one teaching and one manner be for you, and for the stranger that sojourneth with you. torah ’akhat umishpat ’ekhad yihyeh lakhem, velager hagar ’itekhem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm bb1km 1l h1rZ 1Sr 1ny mby1 1tkm Smh speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when ye come into the land whither i bring you, daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, bebo’akhem ’el ha’arez ’asher ’ani mebi ’etkhem shamah.
whyh b1klkm mlHm h1rZ trymw trwmh lyhwh then it be, that, when ye eat of the bread of the land, ye inward up an raise-rum unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vehayah ba’akhalekhem milekhem ha’arez, tarimu terumah yhvh.
r1Syt 8rstkm Hlh trymw trwmh ktrwmt grn kn trymw 1th ye inward up a cake of the first of your dough for an raise-rum: as ye do the raise-rum of the threshingfloor, so ye raise it. reshit ‘arisotekhem khalah tarimu terumah, kitrumat goren ken tarimu ’otah.
mr1Syt 8rstykm ttnw lyhwh trwmh ldrtykm of the first of your dough ye give unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou an raise-rum in your generations. mereshit ‘arisotekhem titenu yhvh terumah, ledorotekhem.
wky tSgw wl1 t8Sw 1t kl hmZwt h1lh 1Sr dbr yhwh 1l mSh and if ye have erred, and not guard-observed all these order-prescriptions, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath bee-spoken unto extracted-mose, vekhi tishgu velo ta‘asu kal hamizvot ha’eleh, ’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh.
1t kl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1lykm byd mSh mn hywm 1Sr Zwh yhwh whl1h ldrtykm even all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed you by the hand of extracted-mose, from the day that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, and henceforward among your generations; kal ’asher zivah yhvh ’alekhem beyad mosheh, min hayom ’asher zivah yhvh vahale’ah ledorotekhem.
whyh 1m m8yny h8dh n8Sth lSggh w8Sw kl h8dh pr bn bqr 1Hd l8lh lryH nyHH lyhwh wmnHtw wnskw kmSpT wS8yr 8zym 1Hd lHTt then it be, if ought be committed by ignorance without the knowledge of the until-witness, that all the until-witness inward one bull child-between of visit-cattle for a on-up, for a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, with his absorber, and his pouring, according to the manner, and one kid of the intense-goats for a miss. vehayah ’im me‘enei ha‘edah ne‘estah lishgagah ve‘asu khal ha‘edah par ben baqar ’ekhad le‘olah lereakh nikhoakh yhvh uminkhato venisko kamishpat, use‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.
wkpr hkhn 8l kl 8dt bny ySr1l wnslH lhm ky Sggh hw1 whm hby1w 1t qrbnm 1Sh lyhwh wHT1tm lpny yhwh 8l Sggtm and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and it be released them; for it is ignorance: and they bring their inward, a butcher made by fire unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and their miss before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, for their ignorance: vekhiper hakohen ‘al kal ‘adat benei yisra’el venislakh lahem, ki shegagah hi vehem hebi’u qarebanam ’isheh yhvh vekhatatam lifnei yhvh ‘al shiggatam.
wnslH lkl 8dt bny ySr1l wlgr hgr btwkm ky lkl h8m bSggh and it be released all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and the stranger that sojourneth among them; seeing all the with-mum-people were in ignorance. venislakh lekhal ‘adat benei yisra’el velager hagar betokham, ki lekhal ha‘am bishgagah.
w1m npS 1Ht tHT1 bSggh whqrybh 8z bt Snth lHT1t and if any being miss through ignorance, then he inward a she intense-goat of the first year for a miss. ve’im nefesh ’akhat tekheta bishgagah, vehiqribah ‘ez bat shenatah lekhatat.
wkpr hkhn 8l hnpS hSggt bHT1h bSggh lpny yhwh lkpr 8lyw wnslH lw and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for the being that sinneth ignorantly, when he sinneth by ignorance before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to make an out-of-town-ment for him; and it be released him. vekhiper hakohen ‘al hanefesh hashogeget bekhet’ah bishgagah lifnei yhvh, lekhaper ‘alav venislakh lo.
h1zrH bbny ySr1l wlgr hgr btwkm twrh 1Ht yhyh lkm l8Sh bSggh ye have one teaching for him that sinneth through ignorance, both for him that is born among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and for the stranger that sojourneth among them. ha’ezrakh bibnei yisra’el velager hagar betokham, torah ’akhat lakhem la‘oseh bishgagah.
whnpS 1Sr t8Sh byd rmh mn h1zrH wmn hgr 1t yhwh hw1 mgdp wnkrth hnpS hhw1 mqrb 8mh and the being that doeth ought presumptuously, whether he be born in the land, or a stranger, the same reproacheth yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. vehanefesh ’asher ta‘aseh beyad ramah min ha’ezrakh umin hager yhvh hu megadef, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb ‘amah.
ky dbr yhwh bzh w1t mZwtw hpr hkrt tkrt hnpS hhw1 8wnh bh because he hath despised the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and hath broken his order-prescription, that being utterly be cut off; his torment be upon him. ki debar yhvh bazah ve’et mizvato hefar, hikaret tikaret hanefesh hahiv ‘avonah bah.
wyhyw bny ySr1l bmdbr wymZ1w 1yS mqSS 8Zym bywm hSbt and while children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel were in the place-of-word-desert, they found a man that added sticks upon the seven-sabbath day. vayihyu bene yisra’el bamidbar, vayimze’u ’ish meqoshesh ‘ezim beyom hashabat.
wyqrybw 1tw hmZ1ym 1tw mqSS 8Zym 1l mSh w1l 1hrn w1l kl h8dh and they that found him gathering sticks brought him unto extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, and unto all the until-witness. vayaqribu ’oto hamoze’im ’oto meqoshesh ‘ezim, ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ve’el kal ha‘edah.
wynyHw 1tw bmSmr ky l1 prS mh y8Sh lw and they put him in ward, because it was not declared what should be done to him. vayanikhu ’oto bamishmar, ki lo forash mah ye‘aseh lo.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh mwt ywmt h1yS rgwm 1tw b1bnym kl h8dh mHwZ lmHnh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, the man be deadly put to death: all the until-witness father-child-stone him with stones without the camp. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh mot yumat ha’ish, ragom ’oto ba’abanim kal ha‘edah mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wyZy1w 1tw kl h8dh 1l mHwZ lmHnh wyrgmw 1tw b1bnym wymt k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and all the until-witness brought him without the camp, and stoned him with stones, and he died; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayozi’u ’oto kal ha‘edah ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu ’oto ba’abanim vayamot, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm w8Sw lhm ZyZt 8l knpy bgdyhm ldrtm wntnw 8l ZyZt hknp ptyl tklt speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and bid them that they make them fringes in the borders of their garments throughout their generations, and that they put upon the fringe of the borders a ribband of blue: daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ve‘asu lahem zizit ‘al kanfei bigdehem ledorotam, venatenu ‘al zizit hakanaf petil tekhelet.
whyh lkm lZyZt wr1ytm 1tw wzkrtm 1t kl mZwt yhwh w8Sytm 1tm wl1 ttrw 1Hry lbbkm w1Hry 8ynykm 1Sr 1tm znym 1Hryhm and it be unto you for a fringe, that ye may look upon it, and remember all the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and do them; and that ye seek not after your own heart and your own eyes, after which ye use to go a whoring: vehayah lakhem lezizit ure’item ’oto uzekhartem kal mizvot yhvh va‘asitem ’otam, velo taturu ’akharei lebabkhem ve’akharei ‘enekhem ’asher ’atem zonim ’akharehem.
lm8n tzkrw w8Sytm 1t kl mZwty whyytm qdSym l1lhykm that ye may remember, and do all my order-prescriptions, and be dedicated-finished unto your towards-these-elohim. lema‘an tizkeru va‘asitem kal mizvotay, vihyitem qedoshim lelohekhem.
1ny yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr hwZ1ty 1tkm m1rZ mZrym lhywt lkm l1lhym 1ny yhwh 1lhykm i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which brought you out of the land of narrows-mizraim, to be your towards-these-elohim: i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem lelohim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wyqH qrH bn yZhr bn qht bn lwy wdtn w1byrm bny 1ly1b w1wn bn plt bny r1wbn now bald-ice-korah, child-between of aperture-izhar, child-between of obedient-hope-kohath, child-between of join-levi, and their-faith-training-dathan and my-father-high-abiram, children-betweens of my-towards-dad-my-towards-eliab, and on, child-between of fallen-peleth, children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben, took men: vayiqakh qorakh ben yizhar ben qehat ben levi, vedatan va’abiram benei ’eli’ab ve’on ben pelet benei re’uben.
wyqmw lpny mSh w1nSym mbny ySr1l HmSym wm1tym nSy1y 8dh qr1y mw8d 1nSy Sm and they rose up before-turns extracted-mose, with certain of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, two hundred and fifty princes of the assembly, famous in the until-witness, men of renown: vayaqumu lifnei mosheh va’anashim mibene yisra’el khamishim umatayim, nesi’ei ‘edah qeri’ei mo‘ed ’anshe shem.
wyqhlw 8l mSh w8l 1hrn wy1mrw 1lhm rb lkm ky kl h8dh klm qdSym wbtwkm yhwh wmdw8 ttnS1w 8l qhl yhwh and they added themselves together against extracted-mose and against cabinet-aaron, and said unto them, ye take too much upon you, seeing all the until-witness are dedicated-finished, every one of them, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is among them: wherefore then lift ye up yourselves above the until-witness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou? vayiqahalu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon vayomeru ’alehem rab lakhem ki khal ha‘edah kulam qedoshim ubetokham yhvh, umadua‘ titnase’u ‘al qehal yhvh.
wySm8 mSh wypl 8l pnyw and when extracted-mose heard it, he fell upon his face-turns: vayishma‘ mosheh vayipol ‘al panav.
wydbr 1l qrH w1l kl 8dtw l1mr bqr wyd8 yhwh 1t 1Sr lw w1t hqdwS whqryb 1lyw w1t 1Sr ybHr bw yqryb 1lyw and he spake unto bald-ice-korah and unto all his company, saying, even to morrow yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will show who are his, and who is dedicated-finished; and will cause him to come near unto him: even him whom he hath chosen will he cause to come near unto him. vaydaber ’el qorakh ve’el kal ‘adato lemor boqer veyoda‘ yhvh ’asher lo ve’et haqadosh vehiqrib ’elav, ve’et ’asher yibkhar bo yaqrib ’elav.
z1t 8Sw qHw lkm mHtwt qrH wkl 8dtw this do; take you censers, bald-ice-korah, and all his company; zot ‘asu, qekhu lakhem makhtot qorakh vekhal ‘adato.
wtnw bhn 1S wSymw 8lyhn qTrt lpny yhwh mHr whyh h1yS 1Sr ybHr yhwh hw1 hqdwS rb lkm bny lwy and put fire therein, and put incense in them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to morrow: and it be that the man whom yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou doth choose, he be dedicated-finished: ye take too much upon you, ye children-betweens of join-levi. utenu bahen ’esh vesimu ‘alehen qetoret lifnei yhvh makhar vehayah ha’ish ’asher yibkhar yhvh hu haqadosh, rab lakhem benei levi.
wy1mr mSh 1l qrH Sm8w n1 bny lwy and extracted-mose said unto bald-ice-korah, hear, i pray you, ye children-betweens of join-levi: vayomer mosheh ’el qorakh, shim‘u na benei levi.
hm8T mkm ky hbdyl 1lhy ySr1l 1tkm m8dt ySr1l lhqryb 1tkm 1lyw l8bd 1t 8bdt mSkn yhwh wl8md lpny h8dh lSrtm seemeth it and a small thing unto you, that the towards-these-elohim of saturated-towards-israel hath separated you from the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel, to bring you near to himself to do the work of the dwelling of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and to stand before-turns the until-witness to unto them? ham‘at mikem ki hibdil ’elohei yisra’el ’etkhem me‘adat yisra’el lehaqrib ’etkhem ’elav, la‘abod ‘abodat mishkan yhvh vela‘amod lifnei ha‘edah lesharetam.
wyqrb 1tk w1t kl 1Hyk bny lwy 1tk wbqStm gm khnh and he hath brought thee near to him, and all thy brethren children-betweens of join-levi with thee: and seek ye the dimmer-serverhood also? vayaqreb ’otekha ve’et kal ’akhekha bene levi ’itakh, ubiqashtem gam kehunah.
lkn 1th wkl 8dtk hn8dym 8l yhwh w1hrn mh hw1 ky tlwnw tlynw 8lyw for which cause both thou and all thy company are added together to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and what is cabinet-aaron, that ye murmur against him? lakhen ’atah vekhal ‘adatekha hano‘adim ‘al yhvh, ve’aharon mah hu ki talinu ‘alav.
wySlH mSh lqr1 ldtn wl1byrm bny 1ly1b wy1mrw l1 n8lh and extracted-mose sent to call their-faith-training-dathan and my-father-high-abiram, children-betweens of my-towards-dad-my-towards-eliab: which said, we will not come up: vayishlakh mosheh liqro ledatan vela’abiram benei ’eli’ab, vayomeru lo na‘aleh.
hm8T ky h8lytnw m1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS lhmytnw bmdbr ky tStrr 8lynw gm hStrr is it a small thing that thou hast brought us up out of a land that floweth with milk and honey, to kill us in the place-of-word-desert, except thou make thyself altogether a prince over us? ham‘at ki he‘elitanu me’erez zabat khalab udebash lahamitenu bamidbar, ki tistarer ‘alenu gam histarer.
1p l1 1l 1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS hby1tnw wttn lnw nHlt Sdh wkrm h8yny h1nSym hhm tnqr l1 n8lh moreover thou hast not brought us into a land that floweth with milk and honey, or given us inheritance of fields and vineyards: wilt thou put out the eyes of these men? we will not come up. ’af lo ’el ’erez zabat khalab udebash habi’otanu vatiten lanu nakhalat sadeh vakharem, ha‘enei ha’anashim hahem tenaqer lo na‘aleh.
wyHr lmSh m1d wy1mr 1l yhwh 1l tpn 1l mnHtm l1 Hmwr 1Hd mhm nS1ty wl1 hr8ty 1t 1Hd mhm and extracted-mose was very wroth, and said unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, respect not thou their inward: i have not taken one ass from them, neither have i hurt one of them. vayikhar lemosheh me’od vayomer ’el yhvh ’al tefen ’el minkhatam, lo khamor ’ekhad mehem nasati velo hare‘oti ’akhad mehem.
wy1mr mSh 1l qrH 1th wkl 8dtk hyw lpny yhwh 1th whm w1hrn mHr and extracted-mose said unto bald-ice-korah, be thou and all thy company before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, thou, and they, and cabinet-aaron, to morrow: vayomer mosheh ’el qorakh ’atah vekhal ‘adatekha heyu lifnei yhvh, ’atah vahem ve’aharon makhar.
wqHw 1yS mHttw wnttm 8lyhm qTrt whqrbtm lpny yhwh 1yS mHttw HmSym wm1tym mHtt w1th w1hrn 1yS mHttw and take every man his censer, and put incense in them, and bring ye before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou every man his censer, two hundred and fifty censers; thou also, and cabinet-aaron, each of you his censer. uqekhu ’ish makhtato unetatem ‘alehem qetoret vehiqrabtem lifnei yhvh ’ish makhtato khamishim umatayim makhtot, ve’atah ve’aharon ’ish makhtato.
wyqHw 1yS mHttw wytnw 8lyhm 1S wySymw 8lyhm qTrt wy8mdw ptH 1hl mw8d wmSh w1hrn and they took every man his censer, and put fire in them, and laid incense thereon, and stood in the opening of the tent of until-conception with extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron. vayiqkhu ’ish makhtato vayitenu ‘alehem ’esh vayasimu ‘alehem qetoret, vaya‘amdu petakh ’ohel mo‘ed umosheh ve’aharon.
wyqhl 8lyhm qrH 1t kl h8dh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d wyr1 kbwd yhwh 1l kl h8dh and bald-ice-korah added all the until-witness against them unto the opening of the tent of until-conception: and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared unto all the until-witness. vayaqhel ‘alehem qorakh kal ha‘edah ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, vayera khebod yhvh ’el kal ha‘edah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
hbdlw mtwk h8dh hz1t w1klh 1tm krg8 separate yourselves from inward this until-witness, that i may consume them in a moment. hibadelu mitokh ha‘edah hazot, va’akhaleh ’otam keraga‘.
wyplw 8l pnyhm wy1mrw 1l 1lhy hrwHt lkl bSr h1yS 1Hd yHT1 w8l kl h8dh tqZp and they fell upon their face-turns-turns, and said, o towards-these-elohim, the towards-these-elohim of breath-spirits of all flesh, one man miss, and wilt thou be wroth with all the until-witness? vayipelu ‘al penehem vayomeru ’el ’elohei harukhot lekhal basar, ha’ish ’ekhad yekheta ve‘al kal ha‘edah tiqzof.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l h8dh l1mr h8lw msbyb lmSkn qrH dtn w1byrm speak unto the until-witness, saying, get you up from about the dwelling of bald-ice-korah, their-faith-training-dathan, and my-father-high-abiram. daber ’el ha‘edah lemor, he‘alu misabib lemishkan qorakh datan va’abiram.
wyqm mSh wylk 1l dtn w1byrm wylkw 1Hryw zqny ySr1l and extracted-mose rose up and went unto their-faith-training-dathan and my-father-high-abiram; and the elders of saturated-towards-israel followed him. vayaqam mosheh vayelekh ’el datan va’abiram, vayelekhu ’akharav ziqnei yisra’el.
wydbr 1l h8dh l1mr swrw n1 m8l 1hly h1nSym hrS8ym h1lh w1l tg8w bkl 1Sr lhm pn tspw bkl HT1tm and he spake unto the until-witness, saying, depart, i pray you, from the tents of these wicked men, and touch nothing of theirs, lest ye be consumed in all their misses. vaydaber ’el ha‘edah lemor suru na me‘al ’aholei ha’anashim haresha‘im ha’eleh ve’al tige‘u bekhal ’asher lahem, pen tisafu bekhal khatotam.
wy8lw m8l mSkn qrH dtn w1byrm msbyb wdtn w1byrm yZ1w nZbym ptH 1hlyhm wnSyhm wbnyhm wTpm so they gat up from the dwelling of bald-ice-korah, their-faith-training-dathan, and my-father-high-abiram, on every side: and their-faith-training-dathan and my-father-high-abiram came out, and stood in the opening of their tents, and their women, and their children-betweens, and their little children-betweens. vaye‘alu me‘al mishkan qorekh datan va’abiram misabib, vedatan va’abiram yaze’u nizabim petakh ’aholehem uneshehem ubenehem vetapam.
wy1mr mSh bz1t td8wn ky yhwh SlHny l8Swt 1t kl hm8Sym h1lh ky l1 mlby and extracted-mose said, hereby ye hand-know that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath sent me to do all these works; for i have not done them of mine own mind. vayomer mosheh bezot tede‘un ki yhvh shelakhani la‘asot kal hama‘asim ha’eleh, ki lo milibi.
1m kmwt kl h1dm ymtwn 1lh wpqdt kl h1dm ypqd 8lyhm l1 yhwh SlHny if these men die the upstarting death of all men, or if they be visited after the visitation of all men; then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath not sent me. ’im kemot kal ha’adam yemutun ’eleh ufequdat kal ha’adam yipaqed ‘alehem, lo yhvh shelakhani.
w1m bry1h ybr1 yhwh wpZth h1dmh 1t pyh wbl8h 1tm w1t kl 1Sr lhm wyrdw Hyym S1lh wyd8tm ky n1Zw h1nSym h1lh 1t yhwh and if yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make a new thing, and the earth open her mouth, and swallow them up, with all that appertain unto them, and they go down quick into the pit; then ye understand that these men have provoked yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ve’im beri’ah yibra yhvh ufazetah ha’adamah piha ubale‘ah ’otam ve’et kal ’asher lahem veyaredu khayim she’olah, vida‘tem ki ni’azu ha’anashim ha’eleh yhvh.
wyhy kkltw ldbr 1t kl hdbrym h1lh wtbq8 h1dmh 1Sr tHtyhm and it came to pass, as he had made an end of speaking all these bee-words, that the ground clave asunder that was under them: vayhi kekhaloto ledaber kal hadebarim ha’eleh, vatibaqa‘ ha’adamah ’asher takhtehem.
wtptH h1rZ 1t pyh wtbl8 1tm w1t btyhm w1t kl h1dm 1Sr lqrH w1t kl hrkwS and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up, and their daughter-houses, and all the men that appertained unto bald-ice-korah, and all their goods. vatiftakh ha’arez piha vatibla‘ ve’et batehem, ve’et kal ha’adam ’asher leqorakh ve’et kal harakhush.
wyrdw hm wkl 1Sr lhm Hyym S1lh wtks 8lyhm h1rZ wy1bdw mtwk hqhl they, and all that appertained to them, went down alive into the pit, and the earth closed upon them: and they perished from inward the until-witness. vayeredu hem vekhal ’asher lahem khayim she’olah, vatekhas ‘alehem ha’arez vayobedu mitokh haqahal.
wkl ySr1l 1Sr sbybtyhm nsw lqlm ky 1mrw pn tbl8nw h1rZ and all saturated-towards-israel that were round about them fled at the cry of them: for they said, lest the earth swallow us up also. vekhal yisra’el ’asher sebibotehem nasu leqolam, ki ’ameru pen tibla‘enu ha’arez.
w1S yZ1h m1t yhwh wt1kl 1t hHmSym wm1tym 1yS mqryby hqTrt and there came out a fire from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and consumed the two hundred and fifty men that inwarded incense. ve’esh yaze’ah me’et yhvh, vatokhal ’et hakhamishim umatayim ’ish maqribei haqetoret.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
1mr 1l 1l8zr bn 1hrn hkhn wyrm 1t hmHtt mbyn hSrph w1t h1S zrh hl1h ky qdSw speak unto towards-stop-eleazar child-between of cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server, that he take up the censers out of the burning, and scatter thou the fire yonder; for they are dedicateed. ’emor ’el ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen veyarem hamakhtot miben haserefah ve’et ha’esh zereh hale’ah, ki qadeshu.
1t mHtwt hHT1ym h1lh bnpStm w8Sw 1tm rq8y pHym Zpwy lmzbH ky hqrybm lpny yhwh wyqdSw wyhyw l1wt lbny ySr1l the censers of these fauters against their own beings, let them make them broad plates for a covering of the butcher-kitchen: for they inwarded them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, therefore they are dedicateed: and they be a sign unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. makhtot hakhata’im ha’eleh benafshotam ve‘asu ’otam riqu‘ei fakhim zipui lamizbeakh ki hiqribum lifne yhvh vayiqdashu, veyihyu le’ot libnei yisra’el.
wyqH 1l8zr hkhn 1t mHtwt hnHSt 1Sr hqrybw hSrpym wyrq8wm Zpwy lmzbH and towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server took the brazen censers, wherewith they that were burnt had inwarded; and they were made broad plates for a covering of the butcher-kitchen: vayiqakh ’el‘azar hakohen makhtot hanekhoshet ’asher hiqribu haserufim, vayraqe‘um zipui lamizbeakh.
zkrwn lbny ySr1l lm8n 1Sr l1 yqrb 1yS zr 1Sr l1 mzr8 1hrn hw1 lhqTyr qTrt lpny yhwh wl1 yhyh kqrH wk8dtw k1Sr dbr yhwh byd mSh lw to be a memorial unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that no stranger, which is not of the seed of cabinet-aaron, come near to inward incense before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; that he be not as bald-ice-korah, and as his company: as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said to him by the hand of extracted-mose. zikaron libnei yisra’el lema‘an lo yiqrab ’ish zar ’asher lo mizera‘ ’aharon hu lehaqtir qetoret lifnei yhvh, velo yihyeh kheqorakh vekha‘adato ka’asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh lo.
wylnw kl 8dt bny ySr1l mmHrt 8l mSh w8l 1hrn l1mr 1tm hmtm 1t 8m yhwh and on the morrow all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel murmured against extracted-mose and against cabinet-aaron, saying, ye have killed the with-mum-people of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayilonu kal ‘adat bene yisra’el mimakhorat ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon lemor, ’atem hamitem ‘am yhvh.
wyhy bhqhl h8dh 8l mSh w8l 1hrn wypnw 1l 1hl mw8d whnh kshw h8nn wyr1 kbwd yhwh and it came to pass, when the until-witness was added against extracted-mose and against cabinet-aaron, that they looked toward the tent of until-conception: and, behold, the cloud covered it, and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared. vayhi behiqahel ha‘edah ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon vayifnu ’el ’ohel mo‘ed vehineh khisahu he‘anan, vayera kebod yhvh.
wyb1 mSh w1hrn 1l pny 1hl mw8d and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron came before-turns the tent of until-conception. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el penei ’ohel mo‘ed.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
hrmw mtwk h8dh hz1t w1klh 1tm krg8 wyplw 8l pnyhm get you up from inward this until-witness, that i may consume them as in a moment. and they fell upon their face-turns-turns. heromu mitokh ha‘edah hazot va’akhaleh ’otam keraga‘, vayipelu ‘al penehem.
wy1mr mSh 1l 1hrn qH 1t hmHth wtn 8lyh 1S m8l hmzbH wSym qTrt whwlk mhrh 1l h8dh wkpr 8lyhm ky yZ1 hqZp mlpny yhwh hHl hngp and extracted-mose said unto cabinet-aaron, take a censer, and put fire therein from off the butcher-kitchen, and put on incense, and go quickly unto the until-witness, and make an out-of-town-ment for them: for there is wrath gone out from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; the plague is begun. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon qakh hamakhtah veten ‘aleha ’esh me‘al hamizbeakh vesim qetoret veholekh meherah ’el ha‘edah vekhaper ‘alehem, ki yaza haqezef milifnei yhvh hekhel hanagef.
wyqH 1hrn k1Sr dbr mSh wyrZ 1l twk hqhl whnh hHl hngp b8m wytn 1t hqTrt wykpr 8l h8m and cabinet-aaron took as extracted-mose order-prescribed, and ran into the midst of the until-witness; and, behold, the plague was begun among the with-mum-people: and he put on incense, and made an out-of-town-ment for the with-mum-people. vayiqakh ’aharon ka’asher diber mosheh vayaraz ’el tokh haqahal vehineh hekhel hanegef ba‘am, vayiten haqetoret vaykhaper ‘al ha‘am.
wy8md byn hmtym wbyn hHyym wt8Zr hmgph and he stood between-bin the dead and the living; and the plague was stayed. vaya‘amod ben hametim uben hakhayim, vate‘azar hamagefah.
wyhyw hmtym bmgph 1rb8h 8Sr 1lp wSb8 m1wt mlbd hmtym 8l dbr qrH now they that died in the plague were fourteen thousand and seven hundred, beside them that died about the matter of bald-ice-korah. vayihyu hametim bamagefah ’arba‘ah ‘asar ’elef usheba‘ me’ot, milebad hametim ‘al debar qorakh.
wySb 1hrn 1l mSh 1l ptH 1hl mw8d whmgph n8Zrh and cabinet-aaron returned unto extracted-mose unto the opening of the tent of until-conception: and the plague was stayed. vayashab ’aharon ’el mosheh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, vehamagefah ne‘ezarah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l wqH m1tm mTh mTh lbyt 1b m1t kl nSy1hm lbyt 1btm Snym 8Sr mTwt 1yS 1t Smw tktb 8l mThw speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and take of every one of them a pen according to the daughter-house of their fathers, of all their leaders according to the daughter-house of their fathers twelve pens: write thou every man's name upon his pen. daber ’el benei yisra’el veqakh me’itam mateh mateh lebet ’ab kal nesi’ehem lebet ’abotam shenem ‘asar matot, ’ish shemo tikhtob ‘al matehu.
w1t Sm 1hrn tktb 8l mTh lwy ky mTh 1Hd lr1S byt 1bwtm and thou write cabinet-aaron's name upon the pen of join-levi: for one pen be for the head of the daughter-house of their fathers. ve’et shem ’aharon tikhtob ‘al mateh levi, ki mateh ’ekhad lerosh bet ’abotam.
whnHtm b1hl mw8d lpny h8dwt 1Sr 1w8d lkm Smh and thou lay them up in the tent of until-conception before-turns the until-witness, where i will until-witness with you. vehinakhtam be’ohel mo‘ed, lifnei ha‘edut ’asher ’iva‘ed lakhem shamah.
whyh h1yS 1Sr 1bHr bw mThw yprH whSkty m8ly 1t tlnwt bny ySr1l 1Sr hm mlynm 8lykm and it come to pass, that the man's pen, whom i choose, blossom: and i will make to cease from me the murmurings of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, whereby they murmur against you. vehayah ha’ish ’asher ’ebkhar bo matehu yifrakh, vahashikoti me‘alay telunot benei yisra’el ’asher hem malinim ‘alekhem.
wydbr mSh 1l bny ySr1l wytnw 1lyw kl nSy1yhm mTh lnSy1 1Hd mTh lnSy1 1Hd lbyt 1btm Snym 8Sr mTwt wmTh 1hrn btwk mTwtm and extracted-mose spake unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and every one of their leaders gave him a pen apiece, for each leader one, according to their fathers' daughter-houses, even twelve pens: and the pen of cabinet-aaron was among their pens. vaydaber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el vayitenu ’elav kal nesi’ehem mateh lenasi ’ekhad mateh lenasi ’ekhad lebet ’abotam shenem ‘asar matot, umateh ’aharon betokh matotam.
wynH mSh 1t hmTt lpny yhwh b1hl h8dt and extracted-mose laid up the pens before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in the dwelling of witness. vayanakh mosheh hamatot lifnei yhvh, be’ohel ha‘edut.
wyhy mmHrt wyb1 mSh 1l 1hl h8dwt whnh prH mTh 1hrn lbyt lwy wyZ1 prH wyZZ ZyZ wygml Sqdym and it came to pass, that on the morrow extracted-mose went into the dwelling of witness; and, behold, the pen of cabinet-aaron for the daughter-house of join-levi was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds. vayhi mimakhorat vayabo mosheh ’el ’ohel ha‘edut vehineh parakh mateh ’aharon lebet levi, vayozei ferakh vayazez ziz vayigmol sheqedim.
wyZ1 mSh 1t kl hmTt mlpny yhwh 1l kl bny ySr1l wyr1w wyqHw 1yS mThw and extracted-mose brought out all the pens from before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou unto all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and they looked, and took every man his pen. vayozei mosheh kal hamatot milifnei yhvh ’el kal benei yisra’el, vayir’u vayiqkhu ’ish matehu.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hSb 1t mTh 1hrn lpny h8dwt lmSmrt l1wt lbny mry wtkl tlwntm m8ly wl1 ymtw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, bring cabinet-aaron's pen again before-turns the until-witness, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hasheb mateh ’aharon lifnei ha‘edut lemishmeret le’ot libne meri, utekhal telunotam me‘alay velo yamutu.
wy8S mSh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw kn 8Sh and extracted-mose did so: as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him, so did he. vaya‘as mosheh, ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto ken ‘asah.
wy1mrw bny ySr1l 1l mSh l1mr hn gw8nw 1bdnw klnw 1bdnw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel spake unto extracted-mose, saying, behold, we die, we perish, we all perish. vayomeru benei yisra’el ’el mosheh lemor, hen gava‘nu ’abadnu kulanu ’abadnu.
kl hqrb hqrb 1l mSkn yhwh ymwt h1m tmnw lgw8 whosoever cometh any thing near unto the dwelling of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou die: we be consumed with dying? kol haqareb haqareb ’el mishkan yhvh yamut, ha’im tamnu ligvoa‘.
wy1mr yhwh 1l 1hrn 1th wbnyk wbyt 1byk 1tk tS1w 1t 8wn hmqdS w1th wbnyk 1tk tS1w 1t 8wn khntkm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto cabinet-aaron, thou and thy children-betweens and thy father's daughter-house with thee bear the torment of the dedicated-finished: and thou and thy children-betweens with thee bear the torment of your dimmer-serverhood. vayomer yhvh ’el ’aharon ’atah ubanekha ubet ’abikha ’itakh tis’u ‘avon hamiqdash, ve’atah ubanekha ’itakh tis’u ‘avon kehunatkhem.
wgm 1t 1Hyk mTh lwy SbT 1byk hqrb 1tk wylww 8lyk wySrtwk w1th wbnyk 1tk lpny 1hl h8dt and thy brethren also of the branch of join-levi, the branch of thy father, bring thou with thee, that they may be joined unto thee, and unto thee: and thou and thy children-betweens with thee before-turns the dwelling of witness. vegam ’akhekha mateh levi shebet ’abikha haqreb ’itakh veyilavu ‘alekha visharetukha, ve’atah ubanekha ’itakh lifnei ’ohel ha‘edut.
wSmrw mSmrtk wmSmrt kl h1hl 1k 1l kly hqdS w1l hmzbH l1 yqrbw wl1 ymtw gm hm gm 1tm and they keep thy charge, and the charge of all the dwelling: only they not come nigh the tools of the dedicated-finished and the butcher-kitchen, that neither they, nor ye also, die. veshameru mishmartekha umishmeret kal ha’ohel, ’akh ’el kelei haqodesh ve’el hamizbeakh lo yiqrabu velo yamutu gam hem gam ’atem.
wnlww 8lyk wSmrw 1t mSmrt 1hl mw8d lkl 8bdt h1hl wzr l1 yqrb 1lykm and they be joined unto thee, and keep the charge of the tent of until-conception, for all the work of the dwelling: and a stranger not come nigh unto you. venilvu ‘alekha veshameru mishmeret ’ohel mo‘ed lekhol ‘abodat ha’ohel, vezar lo yiqrab ’alekhem.
wSmrtm 1t mSmrt hqdS w1t mSmrt hmzbH wl1 yhyh 8wd qZp 8l bny ySr1l and ye keep the charge of the dedicated-finished, and the charge of the butcher-kitchen: that there be no wrath any more upon children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ushemartem mishmeret haqodesh ve’et mishmeret hamizbeakh, velo yihyeh ‘od qezef ‘al benei yisra’el.
w1ny hnh lqHty 1t 1Hykm hlwym mtwk bny ySr1l lkm mtnh ntnym lyhwh l8bd 1t 8bdt 1hl mw8d and i, behold, i have taken your brethren the join-levites from inward children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: to you they are given as a gift for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to do the work of the tent of until-conception. va’ani hineh laqakhti ’akhekhem halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el, lakhem matanah netunim yhvh la‘abod ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
w1th wbnyk 1tk tSmrw 1t khntkm lkl dbr hmzbH wlmbyt lprkt w8bdtm 8bdt mtnh 1tn 1t khntkm whzr hqrb ywmt therefore thou and thy children-betweens with thee keep your dimmer-server's office for everything of the butcher-kitchen, and within the breaker; and ye work for: i have given your dimmer-server's office unto you as a work of gift: and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. ve’atah ubanekha ’itekha tishmeru kehunatkhem lekhal debar hamizbeakh ulemibet laparokhet va‘abadtem, ‘abodat matanah ’eten kehunatkhem vehazar haqareb yumat.
wydbr yhwh 1l 1hrn w1ny hnh ntty lk 1t mSmrt trwmty lkl qdSy bny ySr1l lk nttym lmSHh wlbnyk lHq 8wlm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto cabinet-aaron, behold, i also have given thee the charge of mine raise-rums of all the dedicateed things of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; unto thee have i given them by reason of the lubeing, and to thy children-betweens, by an ordinance for ever. vaydaber yhvh ’el ’aharon va’ani hineh natati lekha mishmeret terumotay, lekhal qadeshei bene yisra’el lekha netatim lemashekhah ulebanekha lekhaq ‘olam.
zh yhyh lk mqdS hqdSym mn h1S kl qrbnm lkl mnHtm wlkl HT1tm wlkl 1Smm 1Sr ySybw ly qdS qdSym lk hw1 wlbnyk this be thine of the most dedicated-finished things, reserved from the fire: every inward of theirs, every absorber of theirs, and every miss of theirs, and every fire-name of theirs which they render unto me, be most dedicated-finished for thee and for thy children-betweens. zeh yihyeh lekha miqodesh haqodashim min ha’esh, kal qarebanam lekhal minkhatam ulekhal khatatam ulekhal ’ashamam ’asher yashibu li qadashim lekha hu ulebanekha.
bqdS hqdSym t1klnw kl zkr y1kl 1tw qdS yhyh lk in the most dedicated-finished place thou eat it; every rememberer eat it: it be dedicated-finished unto thee. beqodesh haqodashim tokhalenu, kal zakhar yokhal ’oto qodesh yihyeh lakh.
wzh lk trwmt mtnm lkl tnwpt bny ySr1l lk nttym wlbnyk wlbntyk 1tk lHq 8wlm kl Thwr bbytk y1kl 1tw and this is thine; the raise-rum of their gift, with all the sieves of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: i have given them unto thee, and to thy children-betweens and to thy children-betweenesss with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is bright-climaxing in thy daughter-house eat of it. vezeh lekha terumat matanam lekhal tenufot benei yisra’el lekha netatim ulebanekha velibnotekha ’itekha lekhaq ‘olam, kal tahor bebetekha yokhal ’oto.
