kl Hlb yZhr wkl Hlb tyrwS wdgn r1Sytm 1Sr ytnw lyhwh lk nttym all the best of the name-from-oil, and all the best of the wine-inherit, and of the wheat, the firstfruits of them which they inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, them have i given thee. kol kheleb yizhar vekhal kheleb tirosh vedagan, reshitam ’asher yitenu yhvh lekha netatim.
bkwry kl 1Sr b1rZm 1Sr yby1w lyhwh lk yhyh kl Thwr bbytk y1klnw and whatsoever is first ripe in the land, which they bring unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, be thine; every one that is bright-climaxing in thine daughter-house eat of it. bikurei kal ’asher be’arzam ’asher yabi’u yhvh lekha yihyeh, kal tahor bebetekha yokhalenu.
kl Hrm bySr1l lk yhyh every thing devoted in saturated-towards-israel be thine. kal kherem beyisra’el lekha yihyeh.
kl pTr rHm lkl bSr 1Sr yqrybw lyhwh b1dm wbbhmh yhyh lk 1k pdh tpdh 1t bkwr h1dm w1t bkwr hbhmh hTm1h tpdh every thing that openeth the womb-matrix in all flesh, which they bring unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, whether it be of men or beasts, be thine: nevertheless the firstborn of man thou surely redeem, and the firstling of stained-ceased beasts thou redeem. kal peter rekhem lekhal basar ’asher yaqribu yhvh ba’adam ubabehemah yihyeh lakh, ’akh padoh tifdeh bekhor ha’adam ve’et bekhor habehemah hateme’ah tifdeh.
wpdwyw mbn HdS tpdh b8rkk ksp HmSt Sqlym bSql hqdS 8Srym grh hw1 and those that are to be redeemed from a month old thou redeem, according to thine estimation, for the money of five light-shekels, after the light-shekel of the dedicated-finished, which is double-ten-twenty stranger-gerahs. ufeduyav miben khodesh tifdeh be‘erkekha kesef khameshet sheqalim besheqel haqodesh, ‘esrim gerah hu.
1k bkwr Swr 1w bkwr kSb 1w bkwr 8z l1 tpdh qdS hm 1t dmm tzrq 8l hmzbH w1t Hlbm tqTyr 1Sh lryH nyHH lyhwh and the firstling of a cow, or the firstling of a sheep, or the firstling of a intense-goat, no redeem; they are dedicated-finished: thou sprinkle their blood upon the butcher-kitchen, and burn their fat for a feminine-firy, for a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ’akh bekhor shor ’o bekhor keseb ’o bekhor ‘ez lo tifdeh qodesh hem, damam tizroq ‘al hamizbeakh ve’et khelbam taqtir ’isheh lereakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wbSrm yhyh lk kHzh htnwph wkSwq hymyn lk yhyh and the flesh of them be thine, as the sieve-pana breast and as the right shoulder are thine. ubesaram yihyeh lakh, kakhazeh hatenufah ukheshoq hayamin lekha yihyeh.
kl trwmt hqdSym 1Sr yrymw bny ySr1l lyhwh ntty lk wlbnyk wlbntyk 1tk lHq 8wlm bryt mlH 8wlm hw1 lpny yhwh lk wlzr8k 1tk all the raise-rums of the dedicated-finished things, which children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, have i given thee, and thy children-betweens and thy children-betweenesss with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou unto thee and to thy seed with thee. kol terumot haqodashim ’asher yarimu bene yisra’el yhvh natati lekha ulebanekha velibnotekha ’itekha lekhaq ‘olam, berit melakh ‘olam hi lifnei yhvh lekha ulezar‘akha ’itakh.
wy1mr yhwh 1l 1hrn b1rZm l1 tnHl wHlq l1 yhyh lk btwkm 1ny Hlqk wnHltk btwk bny ySr1l and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto cabinet-aaron, thou have no inheritance in their land, neither thou have any part among them: i am thy part and thine inheritance among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayomer yhvh ’el ’aharon be’arzam lo tinkhal vekheleq lo yihyeh lekha betokham, ’ani khelqekha venakhalatekha betokh benei yisra’el.
wlbny lwy hnh ntty kl m8Sr bySr1l lnHlh Hlp 8bdtm 1Sr hm 8bdym 1t 8bdt 1hl mw8d and, behold, i have given children-betweens of join-levi all the tenth in saturated-towards-israel for an inheritance, for their work which they work for, even the work of the tent of until-conception. velibnei levi hineh natati kal ma‘aser beyisra’el lenakhalah, khelef ‘abodatam ’asher hem ‘obedim ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
wl1 yqrbw 8wd bny ySr1l 1l 1hl mw8d lS1t HT1 lmwt neither must children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel henceforth come nigh the tent of until-conception, lest they bear miss, and die. velo yiqrebu ‘od benei yisra’el ’el ’ohel mo‘ed, laset khet lamut.
w8bd hlwy hw1 1t 8bdt 1hl mw8d whm yS1w 8wnm Hqt 8wlm ldrtykm wbtwk bny ySr1l l1 ynHlw nHlh and the join-levites do the work of the tent of until-conception, and they bear their torment: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations, that among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel they have no inheritance. ve‘abad halevi hu ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed vehem yis’u ‘avonam, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem ubetokh benei yisra’el lo yinkhalu nakhalah.
ky 1t m8Sr bny ySr1l 1Sr yrymw lyhwh trwmh ntty llwym lnHlh 8l kn 1mrty lhm btwk bny ySr1l l1 ynHlw nHlh and the tithes of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which they inward as an raise-rum unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, i have given to the join-levites to inherit: therefore i have said unto them, among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel they have no inheritance. ki ma‘sar bene yisra’el ’asher yarimu yhvh terumah natati lalviyim lenakhalah, ‘al ken ’amarti lahem betokh benei yisra’el lo yinkhalu nakhalah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
w1l hlwym tdbr w1mrt 1lhm ky tqHw m1t bny ySr1l 1t hm8Sr 1Sr ntty lkm m1tm bnHltkm whrmtm mmnw trwmt yhwh m8Sr mn hm8Sr thus speak unto the join-levites, and say unto them, when ye take of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel the tithes which i have given you from them for your inheritance, then ye inward up an raise-rum of it for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, even a tenth part of the tithe. ve’el halviyim tedaber ve’amarta ’alehem ki tiqkhu me’et bene yisra’el hama‘aser ’asher natati lakhem me’itam benakhalatkhem, vaharemotem mimenu terumat yhvh ma‘aser min hama‘aser.
wnHSb lkm trwmtkm kdgn mn hgrn wkml1h mn hyqb and this your raise-rum be reckoned unto you, as though it were the corn-swimming of the threshingfloor, and as the fulness of the wine-inheritpress. venekhshab lakhem terumatkhem, kadagan min hagoren vekhamle’ah min hayaqeb.
kn trymw gm 1tm trwmt yhwh mkl m8Srtykm 1Sr tqHw m1t bny ySr1l wnttm mmnw 1t trwmt yhwh l1hrn hkhn thus ye also inward an raise-rum unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou of all your tithes, which ye receive of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel; and ye give thereof yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's raise-rum to cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server. ken tarimu gam ’atem terumat yhvh mikol ma‘serotekhem ’asher tiqkhu me’et benei yisra’el, unetatem mimenu terumat yhvh le’aharon hakohen.
mkl mtntykm trymw 1t kl trwmt yhwh mkl Hlbw 1t mqdSw mmnw out of all your gifts ye inward every raise-rum of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, of all the best thereof, even the dedicateed part thereof out of it. mikol matenotekhem tarimu kal terumat yhvh, mikal khelbo miqdesho mimenu.
w1mrt 1lhm bhrymkm 1t Hlbw mmnw wnHSb llwym ktbw1t grn wktbw1t yqb therefore thou say unto them, when ye have raised the best thereof from it, then it be counted unto the join-levites as the increase of the threshingfloor, and as the increase of the wine-inheritpress. ve’amarta ’alehem, baharimekhem khelbo mimenu venekhshab lalviyim kitbu’at goren vekhitbu’at yaqeb.
w1kltm 1tw bkl mqwm 1tm wbytkm ky Skr hw1 lkm Hlp 8bdtkm b1hl mw8d and ye eat it in every place, ye and your daughter-households: for it is your reward for your work in the tent of until-conception. va’akhaltem ’oto bekhal maqom ’atem ubetekhem, ki sakhar hu lakhem khelef ‘abodatkhem be’ohel mo‘ed.
wl1 tS1w 8lyw HT1 bhrymkm 1t Hlbw mmnw w1t qdSy bny ySr1l l1 tHllw wl1 tmwtw and ye bear no miss by reason of it, when ye have raised from it the best of it: neither ye pollute the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, lest ye die. velo tis’u ‘alav khet baharimekhem khelbo mimenu, ve’et qadeshei bene yisra’el lo tekhalelu velo tamutu.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and unto cabinet-aaron, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
z1t Hqt htwrh 1Sr Zwh yhwh l1mr dbr 1l bny ySr1l wyqHw 1lyk prh 1dmh tmymh 1Sr 1yn bh mwm 1Sr l1 8lh 8lyh 8l this is the ordinance of the teaching which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed, saying, speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they bring thee a red heifer without spot, wherein is no blemish, and upon which never came yoke: zot khuqat hatorah ’asher zivah yhvh lemor, daber ’el benei yisra’el veyiqkhu ’elekha farah ’adumah temimah ’asher ’en bah mum ’asher lo ‘alah ‘aleha ‘ol.
wnttm 1th 1l 1l8zr hkhn whwZy1 1th 1l mHwZ lmHnh wSHT 1th lpnyw and ye give her unto towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, that he may bring her forth without the camp, and one slay her before-turns his face-turns: unetatem ’otah ’el ’el‘azar hakohen, vehozi ’otah ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh veshakhat ’otah lefanav.
wlqH 1l8zr hkhn mdmh b1Zb8w whzh 1l nkH pny 1hl mw8d mdmh Sb8 p8mym and towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server take of her blood with his finger, and sprinkle of her blood directly before-turns the tent of until-conception seven times: velaqakh ’el‘azar hakohen midamah be’ezba‘o, vehizah ’el nokhakh penei ’ohel mo‘ed midamah sheba‘ pe‘amim.
wSrp 1t hprh l8ynyw 1t 8rh w1t bSrh w1t dmh 8l prSh ySrp and one burn the heifer in his sight; her light-skin, and her flesh, and her blood, with her dung, he burn: vesaraf haparah le‘enav, ‘orah ve’et besarah ve’et damah ‘al pirshah yisrof.
wlqH hkhn 8Z 1rz w1zwb wSny twl8t whSlyk 1l twk Srpt hprh and the dimmer-server take cedar wood, and discharging-hyssop, and two caterpillars, and cast it into the midst of the burning of the heifer. velaqakh hakohen ‘ez ’erez ve’ezob usheni tola‘at, vehishlikh ’el tokh serefat haparah.
wkbs bgdyw hkhn wrHZ bSrw bmym w1Hr ybw1 1l hmHnh wTm1 hkhn 8d h8rb then the dimmer-server wash his clothes, and he bathe his flesh in from-waters, and afterward he come into the camp, and the dimmer-server be stained-ceased until the even. vekhibes begadav hakohen verakhaz besaro bamayim ve’akhar yabo ’el hamakhaneh, vetamei hakohen ‘ad ha‘areb.
whSrp 1th ykbs bgdyw bmym wrHZ bSrw bmym wTm1 8d h8rb and he that burneth her wash his clothes in from-waters, and bathe his flesh in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vehasoref ’otah yekhabes begadav bamayim verakhaz besaro bamayim, vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
w1sp 1yS Thwr 1t 1pr hprh whnyH mHwZ lmHnh bmqwm Thwr whyth l8dt bny ySr1l lmSmrt lmy ndh HT1t hw1 and a man that is bright-climaxing gather up the ashes of the heifer, and lay them up without the camp in a bright-climaxing place, and it be kept for the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel for a from-waters of separation: it is a bright-highness for miss. ve’asaf ’ish tahor ’efer haparah vehiniakh mikhuz lamakhaneh bemaqom tahor, vehayetah la‘adat bene yisra’el lemishmeret lemei nidah khatat hi
wkbs h1sp 1t 1pr hprh 1t bgdyw wTm1 8d h8rb whyth lbny ySr1l wlgr hgr btwkm lHqt 8wlm and he that gathereth the ashes of the heifer wash his clothes, and be stained-ceased until the even: and it be unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and unto the stranger that sojourneth among them, for a statute for ever. vekhibes ha’osef ’efer haparah begadav vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb, vehayetah libnei yisra’el velager hagar betokham lekhuqat ‘olam.
hng8 bmt lkl npS 1dm wTm1 Sb8t ymym he that toucheth the dead body of any man be stained-ceased seven days. hanogea‘ bemet lekhal nefesh ’adam, vetamei shib‘at yamim.
hw1 ytHT1 bw bywm hSlySy wbywm hSby8y yThr w1m l1 ytHT1 bywm hSlySy wbywm hSby8y l1 yThr he purify himself with it on the third day, and on the seventh day he be bright-climaxing: and if he purify not himself the third day, then the seventh day he not be bright-climaxing. hu yitkhata bo bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i yithar, ve’im lo yitkhata bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i lo yithar.
kl hng8 bmt bnpS h1dm 1Sr ymwt wl1 ytHT1 1t mSkn yhwh Tm1 wnkrth hnpS hhw1 mySr1l ky my ndh l1 zrq 8lyw Tm1 yhyh 8wd Tm1tw bw whosoever toucheth the dead body of any man that is dead, and purifieth not himself, ceaseth the dwelling of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and that being be cut off from saturated-towards-israel: because the from-waters of separation was not sprinkled upon him, he be stained-ceased; his stained-ceasedness is yet upon him. kal hanogea‘ bemet benefesh ha’adam ’asher yamut velo yitkhata mishkan yhvh time venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra’el, ki mei nidah lo zoraq ‘alav tamei yihyeh ‘od tum’ato bo.
z1t htwrh 1dm ky ymwt b1hl kl hb1 1l h1hl wkl 1Sr b1hl yTm1 Sb8t ymym this is the teaching, when a man dieth in a tent: all that come into the tent, and all that is in the tent, be stained-ceased seven days. zot hatorah ’adam ki yamut be’ohel, kal haba ’el ha’ohel vekhal ’asher ba’ohel yitma shib‘at yamim.
wkl kly ptwH 1Sr 1yn Zmyd ptyl 8lyw Tm1 hw1 and every open tool, which hath no covering bound upon it, is stained-ceased. vekhol keli fatuakh ’asher ’en zamid patil ‘alav, tamei hu.
wkl 1Sr yg8 8l pny hSdh bHll Hrb 1w bmt 1w b8Zm 1dm 1w bqbr yTm1 Sb8t ymym and whosoever toucheth one that is slain with a sword in the open fields, or a dead body, or a bone of a man, or a grave, be stained-ceased seven days. vekhol ’asher yiga‘ ‘al penei hasadeh bakhalal khereb ’o bemet ’o be‘ezem ’adam ’o beqaber, yitma shib‘at yamim.
wlqHw lTm1 m8pr Srpt hHT1t wntn 8lyw mym Hyym 1l kly and for an stained-ceased person they take of the ashes of the burnt heifer of bright-highness for miss, and running from-waters be put thereto in a tool: velaqekhu latame me‘afar serefat hakhatat, venatan ‘alav mayim khayim ’el keli.
wlqH 1zwb wTbl bmym 1yS Thwr whzh 8l h1hl w8l kl hklym w8l hnpSwt 1Sr hyw Sm w8l hng8 b8Zm 1w bHll 1w bmt 1w bqbr and a bright-climaxing person take discharging-hyssop, and dip it in the from-waters, and sprinkle it upon the tent, and upon all the tools, and upon the persons that were there, and upon him that touched a bone, or one slain, or one dead, or a grave: velaqakh ’ezob vetabal bamayim ’ish tahor vehizah ‘al ha’ohel ve‘al kal hakelim ve‘al hanefashot ’asher hayu sham, ve‘al hanogea‘ ba‘ezem ’o bekhalal ’o bamet ’o baqaber.
whzh hThr 8l hTm1 bywm hSlySy wbywm hSby8y wHT1w bywm hSby8y wkbs bgdyw wrHZ bmym wThr b8rb and the bright-climaxing person sprinkle upon the stained-ceased on the third day, and on the seventh day: and on the seventh day he purify himself, and wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be bright-climaxing at even. vehizah hatahor ‘al hatame bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i, vekhite’o bayom hashebi‘i vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetaher ba‘areb.
w1yS 1Sr yTm1 wl1 ytHT1 wnkrth hnpS hhw1 mtwk hqhl ky 1t mqdS yhwh Tm1 my ndh l1 zrq 8lyw Tm1 hw1 and the man that be stained-ceased, and not purify himself, that being be cut off from inward the until-witness, because he hath ceased the dedicated-finished of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: the from-waters of separation hath not been sprinkled upon him; he is stained-ceased. ve’ish ’asher yitma velo yitkhata venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mitokh haqahal, ki miqdash yhvh time mei nidah lo zoraq ‘alav tamei hu.
whyth lhm lHqt 8wlm wmzh my hndh ykbs bgdyw whng8 bmy hndh yTm1 8d h8rb and it be a perpetual statute unto them, that he that sprinkleth the from-waters of separation wash his clothes; and he that toucheth the from-waters of separation be stained-ceased until even. vehayetah lahem lekhuqat ‘olam, umazeh me hanidah yekhabes begadav vehanogea‘ bemei hanidah yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl 1Sr yg8 bw hTm1 yTm1 whnpS hng8t tTm1 8d h8rb and whatsoever the stained-ceased person toucheth be stained-ceased; and the being that toucheth it be stained-ceased until even. vekhol ’asher yiga‘ bo hatamei yitma, vehanefesh hanoga‘at titma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wyb1w bny ySr1l kl h8dh mdbr Zn bHdS hr1Swn wySb h8m bqdS wtmt Sm mrym wtqbr Sm then came children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, even the whole until-witness, into the place-of-word-desert of briar-zin in the first month: and the with-mum-people abode in dedicated-finished-kadesh; and rebel-bitter-miriam died there, and was buried there. vayabo’u bene yisra’el kal ha‘edah midbar zin bakhodesh harishon vayesheb ha‘am beqadesh, vatamat sham miryam vatiqaber sham.
wl1 hyh mym l8dh wyqhlw 8l mSh w8l 1hrn and there was no from-waters for the until-witness: and they added themselves together against extracted-mose and against cabinet-aaron. velo hayah mayim la‘edah, vayiqahalu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon.
wyrb h8m 8m mSh wy1mrw l1mr wlw gw8nw bgw8 1Hynw lpny yhwh and the with-mum-people chode with extracted-mose, and spake, saying, would towards-these-elohim that we had died when our brethren died before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou! vayareb ha‘am ‘im mosheh, vayomeru lemor velu gava‘nu bigva‘ ’akhenu lifnei yhvh.
wlmh hb1tm 1t qhl yhwh 1l hmdbr hzh lmwt Sm 1nHnw wb8yrnw and why have ye brought up the until-witness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou into this place-of-word-desert, that we and our in-them-animal should die there? velamah habetem qehal yhvh ’el hamidbar hazeh, lamut sham ’anakhnu ube‘irenu.
wlmh h8lytnw mmZrym lhby1 1tnw 1l hmqwm hr8 hzh l1 mqwm zr8 wt1nh wgpn wrmwn wmym 1yn lStwt and wherefore have ye made us to come up out of narrows-mizraim, to bring us in unto this bad place? it is no place of seed, or of figs, or of vines, or of high-pomegranates; neither is there any from-waters to drink. velamah he‘elitunu mimizrayim lehabi ’otanu ’el hamaqom hara‘ hazeh, lo meqom zera‘ ute’enah vegefen verimon umayim ’ayin lishtot.
wyb1 mSh w1hrn mpny hqhl 1l ptH 1hl mw8d wyplw 8l pnyhm wyr1 kbwd yhwh 1lyhm and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron went from the presence of the assembly unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, and they fell upon their face-turns-turns: and the heaviness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared unto them. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon mipenei haqahal ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed vayipelu ‘al penehem, vayera khebod yhvh ’alehem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qH 1t hmTh whqhl 1t h8dh 1th w1hrn 1Hyk wdbrtm 1l hsl8 l8ynyhm wntn mymyw whwZ1t lhm mym mn hsl8 whSqyt 1t h8dh w1t b8yrm take the pen, and gather thou the assembly together, thou, and cabinet-aaron thy brother, and speak ye unto the rock before-turns their eyes; and it give forth his from-waters, and thou bring forth to them from-waters out of the rock: so thou give the until-witness and their beasts drink. qakh hamateh vehaqhel ha‘edah ’atah ve’aharon ’akhikha vedibartem ’el hasela‘ le‘enehem venatan memav, vehozeta lahem mayim min hasela‘ vehishqita ha‘edah ve’et be‘iram.
wyqH mSh 1t hmTh mlpny yhwh k1Sr Zwhw and extracted-mose took the pen from before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, as he order-prescribed him. vayiqakh mosheh hamateh milifnei yhvh, ka’asher zivahu.
wyqhlw mSh w1hrn 1t hqhl 1l pny hsl8 wy1mr lhm Sm8w n1 hmrym hmn hsl8 hzh nwZy1 lkm mym and extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron added the until-witness together before-turns the rock, and he said unto them, hear now, ye rebels; must we fetch you from-waters out of this rock? vayaqhilu mosheh ve’aharon haqahal ’el penei hasala‘, vayomer lahem shim‘u na hamorim hamin hasela‘ hazeh nozi lakhem mayim.
wyrm mSh 1t ydw wyk 1t hsl8 bmThw p8mym wyZ1w mym rbym wtSt h8dh wb8yrm and extracted-mose lifted up his hand, and with his pen he smote the rock twice: and the from-waters came out abundantly, and the until-witness drank, and their beasts also. vayarem mosheh yado vayakh hasela‘ bematehu pa‘amayim, vayeze’u mayim rabim vateshet ha‘edah ube‘iram.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn y8n l1 h1mntm by lhqdySny l8yny bny ySr1l lkn l1 tby1w 1t hqhl hzh 1l h1rZ 1Sr ntty lhm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron, because ye was coached by me not, to dedicate-finify me in the eyes of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, therefore ye not bring this until-witness into the land which i have given them. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ya‘an lo he’emantem bi lehaqdisheni le‘enei benei yisra’el, lakhen lo tabi’u haqahal hazeh ’el ha’arez ’asher natati lahem.
hmh my mrybh 1Sr rbw bny ySr1l 1t yhwh wyqdS bm this is the from-waters of jam-meribah; because children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel strove with yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and he was dedicated-finished in them. hemah mei meribah ’asher rabu bene yisra’el ’et yhvh, vayiqadesh bam.
wySlH mSh ml1kym mqdS 1l mlk 1dwm kh 1mr 1Hyk ySr1l 1th yd8t 1t kl htl1h 1Sr mZ1tnw and extracted-mose sent messengers from dedicated-finished-kadesh unto the moloch-king of man-edom, thus saith thy brother saturated-towards-israel, thou knowest all the travail that hath befallen us: vayishlakh mosheh mal’akhim miqadesh ’el melekh ’edom, koh ’amar ’akhikha yisra’el ’atah yada‘ta kal hatela’ah ’asher meza’atenu.
wyrdw 1btynw mZrymh wnSb bmZrym ymym rbym wyr8w lnw mZrym wl1btynw how our fathers went down into narrows-mizraim, and we have dwelt in narrows-mizraim a long time; and the narrows-mizraimians vexed us, and our fathers: vayeredu ’abotenu mizraymah vanesheb bemizrayim yamim rabim, vayare‘u lanu mizrayim vela’abotenu.
wnZ8q 1l yhwh wySm8 qlnw wySlH ml1k wyZ1nw mmZrym whnh 1nHnw bqdS 8yr qZh gbwlk and when we cried unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, he heard our voice, and sent an angel-messanger, and hath brought us forth out of narrows-mizraim: and, behold, we are in dedicated-finished-kadesh, a light-city in the uttermost of thy border: vaniz‘aq ’el yhvh vayishma‘ qolenu vayishlakh mal’akh vayozi’enu mimizrayim, vehineh ’anakhnu beqadesh ‘ir qezeh gebulekha.
n8brh n1 b1rZk l1 n8br bSdh wbkrm wl1 nSth my b1r drk hmlk nlk l1 nTh ymyn wSm1wl 8d 1Sr n8br gbwlk let us pass, i pray thee, through thy country: we will not pass through the fields, or through the vineyards, neither will we drink of the from-waters of the wells: we will go by the moloch-king's high way, we will not turn to the right hand nor to the left, until we have passed thy borders. na‘berah na be’arzekha lo na‘abor besadeh ubekherem velo nishteh mei be’er, derekh hamelekh nelekh lo niteh yamin usemol ‘ad ’asher na‘abor gebulekha.
wy1mr 1lyw 1dwm l1 t8br by pn bHrb 1Z1 lqr1tk and man-edom said unto him, no pass by me, lest i come out against thee with the sword. vayomer ’elav ’edom lo ta‘abor bi, pen bakhereb ’ezei liqratekha.
wy1mrw 1lyw bny ySr1l bmslh n8lh w1m mymyk nSth 1ny wmqny wntty mkrm rq 1yn dbr brgly 18brh and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel said unto him, we will go by the high way: and if i and my in-them-animal drink of thy from-waters, then i will pay for it: i will only, without doing anything else, go through on my feet. vayomeru ’elav bene yisra’el bamsilah na‘aleh ve’im memekha nishteh ’ani umiqnay venatati mikhram, raq ’en beraglay ’e‘eborah.
wy1mr l1 t8br wyZ1 1dwm lqr1tw b8m kbd wbyd Hzqh and he said, no go through. and man-edom came out against him with much with-mum-people, and with a strong hand. vayomer lo ta‘abor, vayezei ’edom liqrato be‘am kabed ubeyad khazaqah.
wym1n 1dwm ntn 1t ySr1l 8br bgblw wyT ySr1l m8lyw thus man-edom refused to give saturated-towards-israel passage through his border: wherefore saturated-towards-israel turned away from him. vayma’en ’edom neton yisra’el ‘abor bigbulo, vayet yisra’el me‘alav.
wys8w mqdS wyb1w bny ySr1l kl h8dh hr hhr and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, even the whole until-witness, journeyed from dedicated-finished-kadesh, and came unto mount mount-hor. vayis‘u miqadesh, vayabo’u bene yisra’el kal ha‘edah hor hahar.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh w1l 1hrn bhr hhr 8l gbwl 1rZ 1dwm l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron in mount mount-hor, by the coast of the land of man-edom, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon behor hahar, ‘al gebul ’erez ’edom lemor.
y1sp 1hrn 1l 8myw ky l1 yb1 1l h1rZ 1Sr ntty lbny ySr1l 8l 1Sr mrytm 1t py lmy mrybh cabinet-aaron be added unto his with-mum-people: for he not enter into the land which i have given unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, because ye rebelled against my bee-word at the from-waters of jam-meribah. ye’asef ’aharon ’el ‘amav ki lo yabo ’el ha’arez ’asher natati libnei yisra’el, ‘al ’asher meritem pi lemei meribah.
qH 1t 1hrn w1t 1l8zr bnw wh8l 1tm hr hhr take cabinet-aaron and towards-stop-eleazar his child-between, and bring them up unto mount mount-hor: qakh ’aharon ve’et ’el‘azar beno, veha‘al ’otam hor hahar.
whpST 1t 1hrn 1t bgdyw whlbStm 1t 1l8zr bnw w1hrn y1sp wmt Sm and strip cabinet-aaron of his garments, and put them upon towards-stop-eleazar his child-between: and cabinet-aaron be added unto his with-mum-people, and die there. vehafshet ’aharon begadav vehilbashtam ’el‘azar beno, ve’aharon ye’asef umet sham.
wy8S mSh k1Sr Zwh yhwh wy8lw 1l hr hhr l8yny kl h8dh and extracted-mose did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed: and they went up into mount mount-hor in the sight of all the until-witness. vaya‘as mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh, vaya‘alu ’el hor hahar le‘enei kal ha‘edah.
wypST mSh 1t 1hrn 1t bgdyw wylbS 1tm 1t 1l8zr bnw wymt 1hrn Sm br1S hhr wyrd mSh w1l8zr mn hhr and extracted-mose stripped cabinet-aaron of his garments, and put them upon towards-stop-eleazar his child-between; and cabinet-aaron died there in the head of the mount: and extracted-mose and towards-stop-eleazar came down from the mount. vayafshet mosheh ’aharon begadav vayalbesh ’otam ’el‘azar beno vayamat ’aharon sham berosh hahar, vayered mosheh ve’el‘azar min hahar.
wyr1w kl h8dh ky gw8 1hrn wybkw 1t 1hrn SlSym ywm kl byt ySr1l and when all the until-witness saw that cabinet-aaron was dead, they mourned for cabinet-aaron thirty days, even all the daughter-house of saturated-towards-israel. vayir’u kal ha‘edah ki gava‘ ’aharon, vayibku ’et ’aharon sheloshim yom kol bet yisra’el.
wySm8 hkn8ny mlk 8rd ySb hngb ky b1 ySr1l drk h1trym wylHm bySr1l wySb mmnw Sby and when moloch-king bronze-arad the mobile-trade-canaanite, which dwelt in the dry-south, heard tell that saturated-towards-israel came by the way of the spies; then he fought against saturated-towards-israel, and took some of them prisoners. vayishma‘ hakena‘ani melekh ‘arad yosheb hanegeb ki ba yisra’el derekh ha’atarim, vayilakhem beyisra’el vayishb mimenu shebi.
wydr ySr1l ndr lyhwh wy1mr 1m ntn ttn 1t h8m hzh bydy whHrmty 1t 8ryhm and saturated-towards-israel vowed a vow unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and said, if thou wilt indeed deliver this with-mum-people into my hand, then i will utterly destroy their cities. vayidar yisra’el neder yhvh vayomar, ’im naton titen ha‘am hazeh beyadi vehakharamti ‘arehem.
wySm8 yhwh bqwl ySr1l wytn 1t hkn8ny wyHrm 1thm w1t 8ryhm wyqr1 Sm hmqwm Hrmh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hearkened to the voice of saturated-towards-israel, and delivered up the mobile-trade-canaanites; and they fishing-net-destroyed them and their cities: and he called the name of the place fishing-net-boycott-hormah. vayishma‘ yhvh beqol yisra’el vayiten hakena‘ani vayakharem ’ethem ve’et ‘arehem, vayiqra shem hamaqom kharemah.
wys8w mhr hhr drk ym swp lsbb 1t 1rZ 1dwm wtqZr npS h8m bdrk and they journeyed from mount mount-hor by the way of the end sea, to compass the land of man-edom: and the being of the with-mum-people was much discouraged because of the way. vayis‘u mehor hahar derekh yam suf lisbob ’erez ’edom, vatiqzar nefesh ha‘am badarekh.
wydbr h8m b1lhym wbmSh lmh h8lytnw mmZrym lmwt bmdbr ky 1yn lHm w1yn mym wnpSnw qZh blHm hqlql and the with-mum-people spake against towards-these-elohim, and against extracted-mose, wherefore have ye brought us up out of narrows-mizraim to die in the place-of-word-desert? for there is no bread, neither is there any from-waters; and our being loatheth this light bread. vaydaber ha‘am belohim ubemosheh lamah he‘elitunu mimizrayim lamut bamidbar, ki ’en lekhem ve’en mayim venafshenu qazah balekhem haqeloqel.
wySlH yhwh b8m 1t hnHSym hSrpym wynSkw 1t h8m wymt 8m rb mySr1l and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sent fiery serpents among the with-mum-people, and they bit the with-mum-people; and much with-mum-people of saturated-towards-israel died. vayshalakh yhvh ba‘am hanekhashim haserafim vaynashekhu ha‘am, vayamat ‘am rab miyisra’el.
wyb1 h8m 1l mSh wy1mrw HT1nw ky dbrnw byhwh wbk htpll 1l yhwh wysr m8lynw 1t hnHS wytpll mSh b8d h8m therefore the with-mum-people came to extracted-mose, and said, we have missed, for we have bee-spoken against yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and against thee; pray unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, that he take away the serpents from us. and extracted-mose prayed for the with-mum-people. vayabo ha‘am ’el mosheh vayomeru khatanu ki dibarnu yhvh vabakh hitpalel ’el yhvh veyaser me‘alenu hanakhash, vayitpalel mosheh be‘ad ha‘am.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 8Sh lk Srp wSym 1tw 8l ns whyh kl hnSwk wr1h 1tw wHy and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, make thee a fiery serpent, and set it upon a pole: and it come to pass, that every one that is bitten, when he looketh upon it, live. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘aseh lekha saraf vesim ’oto ‘al nes, vehayah kal hanashukh vera’ah ’oto vakhay.
wy8S mSh nHS nHSt wySmhw 8l hns whyh 1m nSk hnHS 1t 1yS whbyT 1l nHS hnHSt wHy and extracted-mose made a serpent of brass, and put it upon a pole, and it came to pass, that if a serpent had bitten any man, when he beheld the serpent of brass, he lived. vaya‘as mosheh nekhash nekhoshet vaysimehu ‘al hanes, vehayah ’im nashakh hanakhash ’ish vehibit ’el nekhash hanekhoshet vakhay.
wys8w bny ySr1l wyHnw b1bt and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel set forward, and pitched in thick-oboth. vayis‘u benei yisra’el, vayakhanu be’obot.
wys8w m1bt wyHnw b8yy h8brym bmdbr 1Sr 8l pny mw1b mmzrH hSmS and they journeyed from thick-oboth, and pitched at heaps-crossings-ijeabarim, in the place-of-word-desert which is before-turns from-father-moab, toward the sunrising. vayis‘u me’obot, vayakhanu be‘iyei ha‘abarim bamidbar ’asher ‘al penei mo’ab mimizrakh hashamesh.
mSm ns8w wyHnw bnHl zrd from thence they removed, and pitched in the valley of twig-zared. misham nasa‘u, vayakhanu benakhal zared.
mSm ns8w wyHnw m8br 1rnwn 1Sr bmdbr hyZ1 mgbwl h1mry ky 1rnwn gbwl mw1b byn mw1b wbyn h1mry from thence they removed, and pitched on the other side of pine-arnon, which is in the place-of-word-desert that cometh out of the coasts of the talker-amorites: for pine-arnon is the border of from-father-moab, between-bin from-father-moab and the talker-amorites. misham nasa‘u vayakhanu me‘eber ’arnon ’asher bamidbar hayozei migebul ha’emori, ki ’arnon gebul mo’ab ben mo’ab uben ha’emori.
8l kn y1mr bspr mlHmt yhwh 1t whb bswph w1t hnHlym 1rnwn wherefore it is said in the book of the wars of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, what he did in the end sea, and in the brooks of pine-arnon, ‘al ken ye’amar besefer milkhamot yhvh, vaheb besufah ve’et hanekhalim ’arnon.
w1Sd hnHlym 1Sr nTh lSbt 8r wnS8n lgbwl mw1b and at the stream of the brooks that goeth down to the dwelling of awake-ar, and lieth upon the border of from-father-moab. ve’eshed hanekhalim ’asher natah leshebet ‘ar, venish‘an ligbul mo’ab.
wmSm b1rh hw1 hb1r 1Sr 1mr yhwh lmSh 1sp 1t h8m w1tnh lhm mym and from thence they went to well-beer: that is the well whereof yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, gather the with-mum-people together, and i will give them from-waters. umisham be’erah, hi habe’er ’asher ’amar yhvh lemosheh ’esof ha‘am ve’etenah lahem mayim.
1z ySyr ySr1l 1t hSyrh hz1t 8ly b1r 8nw lh then saturated-towards-israel sang this song, spring up, o well; sing ye unto it: ’az yashir yisra’el hashirah hazot, ‘ali be’er ‘enu lah.
b1r Hprwh Srym krwh ndyby h8m bmHqq bmS8ntm wmmdbr mtnh the princes digged the well, the nobles of the with-mum-people digged it, by the direction of the teachinggiver, with their canvas. and from the place-of-word-desert they went to data-gift-matenah: be’er khafaruha sarim karuha nedibei ha‘am bimkhoqeq bemish‘anotam, umimidbar matanah.
wmmtnh nHly1l wmnHly1l bmwt and from data-gift-matenah to towards-my-stream: and from towards-my-stream to death-stage-bamot: umimatanah nakhali’el, uminakhali’el bamot.
wmbmwt hgy1 1Sr bSdh mw1b r1S hpsgh wnSqph 8l pny hySymn and from death-stage-bamot in the valley, that is in the country of from-father-moab, to the top of summit-pisgah, which looketh toward will-apply-jeshimon. umibamot hagay ’asher bisdeh mo’ab rosh hapisgah, venishqafah ‘al penei hayshimon.
wySlH ySr1l ml1kym 1l syHn mlk h1mry l1mr and saturated-towards-israel sent messengers unto curly-sihon moloch-king of the talker-amorites, saying, vayishlakh yisra’el mal’akhim ’el sikhon melekh ha’emori lemor.
18brh b1rZk l1 nTh bSdh wbkrm l1 nSth my b1r bdrk hmlk nlk 8d 1Sr n8br gblk let me pass through thy land: we will not turn into the fields, or into the vineyards; we will not drink of the from-waters of the well: and we will go along by the moloch-king's high way, until we be past thy borders. ’e‘berah be’arzekha lo niteh besadeh ubekherem lo nishteh mei be’er, bederekh hamelekh nelekh ‘ad ’asher na‘abor gebulekha.
wl1 ntn syHn 1t ySr1l 8br bgblw wy1sp syHn 1t kl 8mw wyZ1 lqr1t ySr1l hmdbrh wyb1 yhZh wylHm bySr1l and curly-sihon would not suffer saturated-towards-israel to pass through his border: and curly-sihon added all his with-mum-people together, and went out against saturated-towards-israel into the place-of-word-desert: and he came to stress-jahaz, and fought against saturated-towards-israel. velo natan sikhon yisra’el ‘abor bigbulo vaye’esof sikhon kal ‘amo vayezei liqrat yisra’el hamidbarah vayabo yahezah, vayilakhem beyisra’el.
wykhw ySr1l lpy Hrb wyyrS 1t 1rZw m1rnn 8d ybq 8d bny 8mwn ky 8z gbwl bny 8mwn and saturated-towards-israel smote him with the edge of the sword, and possessed his land from pine-arnon unto boxwood-jaboq, even unto children-betweens of with-ammon: for the border of children-betweens of with-ammon was strong. vayakehu yisra’el lefi khareb, vayirash ’et ’arzo me’arnon ‘ad yaboq ‘ad benei ‘amon ki ‘az gebul benei ‘amon.
wyqH ySr1l 1t kl h8rym h1lh wySb ySr1l bkl 8ry h1mry bHSbwn wbkl bntyh and saturated-towards-israel took all these cities: and saturated-towards-israel dwelt in all the cities of the talker-amorites, in score-heshbon, and in all the villages-daughters thereof. vayiqakh yisra’el kal he‘arim ha’eleh, vayesheb yisra’el bekhal ‘arei ha’emori bekheshbon ubekhal benoteha.
ky HSbwn 8yr syHn mlk h1mry hw1 whw1 nlHm bmlk mw1b hr1Swn wyqH 1t kl 1rZw mydw 8d 1rnn for score-heshbon was the light-city of curly-sihon the moloch-king of the talker-amorites, who had fought against the former moloch-king of from-father-moab, and taken all his land out of his hand, even unto pine-arnon. ki kheshbon ‘ir sikhon melekh ha’emori hi vehu nilkham bemelekh mo’ab harishon vayiqakh kal ’arzo miyado ‘ad ’arnon.
8l kn y1mrw hmSlym b1w HSbwn tbnh wtkwnn 8yr syHwn wherefore they that speak in proverbs say, come into score-heshbon, let the light-city of curly-sihon be between-built and prepared: ‘al ken yomeru hamoshelim bo’u kheshbon, tibaneh vetikonen ‘ir sikhon.
ky 1S yZ1h mHSbwn lhbh mqryt syHn 1klh 8r mw1b b8ly bmwt 1rnn for there is a fire gone out of score-heshbon, a flame from the light-city of curly-sihon: it hath consumed awake-ar of from-father-moab, and the lord-bases of the high places of pine-arnon. ki ’esh yaze’ah mekheshbon lehabah miqiryat sikhon, ’akhelah ‘ar mo’ab ba‘alei bamot ’arnon.
1wy lk mw1b 1bdt 8m kmwS ntn bnyw plyTm wbntyw bSbyt lmlk 1mry syHwn woe to thee, from-father-moab! thou art undone, o with-mum-people of chemosh: he hath given his children-betweens that escaped, and his children-betweenesss, into captivity unto curly-sihon moloch-king of the talker-amorites. ’o lekha mo’ab ’abadta ‘am kemosh, natan banav peletim ubenotav bashebit lemelekh ’emori sikhon.
wnyrm 1bd HSbwn 8d dybwn wnSym 8d npH 1Sr 8d mydb1 we have shot at them; score-heshbon is perished even unto slander-dibon, and we have laid them waste even unto volume-nophah, which reacheth unto medeba. vaniram ’abad kheshbon ‘ad dibon, vanashim ‘ad nofakh ’asher ‘ad medeba.
wySb ySr1l b1rZ h1mry thus saturated-towards-israel dwelt in the land of the talker-amorites. vayesheb yisra’el be’erez ha’emori.
wySlH mSh lrgl 1t y8zr wylkdw bntyh wyyrS wywrS 1t h1mry 1Sr Sm and extracted-mose sent to spy out help-jaazer, and they took the villages thereof, and drove out the talker-amorites that were there. vayishlakh mosheh leragel ya‘zer vayilkedu benoteha, vayoresh ha’emori ’asher sham.
wypnw wy8lw drk hbSn wyZ1 8wg mlk hbSn lqr1tm hw1 wkl 8mw lmlHmh 1dr8y and they turned and went up by the way of at-tooth-bashan: and mock-og the moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan went out against them, he, and all his with-mum-people, to the battle at live-prohibit-edrei. vayifnu vaya‘alu derekh habashan, vayezei ‘og melekh habashan liqratam hu vekhal ‘amo lamilkhamah ’edre‘i.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh 1l tyr1 1tw ky bydk ntty 1tw w1t kl 8mw w1t 1rZw w8Syt lw k1Sr 8Syt lsyHn mlk h1mry 1Sr ywSb bHSbwn and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, fear him not: for i have delivered him into thy hand, and all his with-mum-people, and his land; and thou do to him as thou didst unto curly-sihon moloch-king of the talker-amorites, which dwelt at score-heshbon. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’al tira ’oto ki beyadekha natati ’oto ve’et kal ‘amo ve’et ’arzo, ve‘asita lo ka’asher ‘asita lesikhon melekh ha’emori ’asher yosheb bekheshbon.
wykw 1tw w1t bnyw w1t kl 8mw 8d blty hS1yr lw Sryd wyyrSw 1t 1rZw so they smote him, and his children-betweens, and all his with-mum-people, until there was none left him alive: and they possessed his land. vayaku ’oto ve’et banav ve’et kal ‘amo ‘ad bilti hish’ir lo sarid, vayireshu ’et ’arzo.
wys8w bny ySr1l wyHnw b8rbwt mw1b m8br lyrdn yrHw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel set forward, and pitched in the plains of from-father-moab on this side its-going-down-jordan by moon-smell-jericho. vayis‘u benei yisra’el, vayakhanu be‘arbot mo’ab me‘eber leyarden yerekho.
wyr1 blq bn Zpwr 1t kl 1Sr 8Sh ySr1l l1mry and beat-balak child-between of bird-zipor saw all that saturated-towards-israel had done to the talker-amorites. vayar balaq ben zipor, kal ’asher ‘asah yisra’el la’emori.
wygr mw1b mpny h8m m1d ky rb hw1 wyqZ mw1b mpny bny ySr1l and from-father-moab was sore afraid of the with-mum-people, because they were many: and from-father-moab was distressed because of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayagar mo’ab mipenei ha‘am me’od ki rab hu, vayaqaz mo’ab mipenei benei yisra’el.
wy1mr mw1b 1l zqny mdyn 8th ylHkw hqhl 1t kl sbybtynw klHk hSwr 1t yrq hSdh wblq bn Zpwr mlk lmw1b b8t hhw1 and from-father-moab said unto the elders of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian, now this company lick up all that are round about us, as the wall-ox licketh up the grass of the field. and beat-balak child-between of bird-zipor was moloch-king of the from-father-moabites at that time. vayomer mo’ab ’el ziqnei midyan ‘atah yelakhakhu haqahal kal sebibotenu kilkhokh hashor yereq hasadeh, ubalaq ben zipor melekh lemo’ab ba‘et hahiv.
wySlH ml1kym 1l bl8m bn b8wr ptwrh 1Sr 8l hnhr 1rZ bny 8mw lqr1 lw l1mr hnh 8m yZ1 mmZrym hnh ksh 1t 8yn h1rZ whw1 ySb mmly he sent messengers therefore unto swallow-baalam child-between of in-the-skin-beor to pethor, which is by the river of the land of children-betweens of his with-mum-people, to call him, saying, behold, there is a with-mum-people come out from narrows-mizraim: behold, they cover the face-turns of the earth, and they abide over against me: vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el bil‘am ben be‘or petorah ’asher ‘al hanahar ’erez bene ‘amo liqro lo, lemor hineh ‘am yaza mimizrayim hineh khisah ‘en ha’arez vehu yosheb mimuli.
w8th lkh n1 1rh ly 1t h8m hzh ky 8Zwm hw1 mmny 1wly 1wkl nkh bw w1grSnw mn h1rZ ky yd8ty 1t 1Sr tbrk mbrk w1Sr t1r yw1r come now therefore, i pray thee, curse me this with-mum-people; for they are too mighty for me: peradventure i prevail, that we may hit them, and that i may drive them out of the land: for i wot that he whom thou knee-fluffy-blessest is knee-fluffy-blessed, and he whom thou cursest is cursed. ve‘atah lekhah na ’arah li ha‘am hazeh ki ‘azum hu mimeni ’ulay ’ukhal nakeh bo va’agareshenu min ha’arez, ki yada‘ti ’asher tebarekh meborakh va’asher ta’or yu’ar.
wylkw zqny mw1b wzqny mdyn wqsmym bydm wyb1w 1l bl8m wydbrw 1lyw dbry blq and the elders of from-father-moab and the elders of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian departed with the rewards of divination in their hand; and they came unto swallow-baalam, and spake unto him the bee-words of beat-balak. vayelekhu ziqnei mo’ab veziqnei midyan uqesamim beyadam, vayabo’u ’el bil‘am vaydaberu ’elav dibrei balaq.
wy1mr 1lyhm lynw ph hlylh whSbty 1tkm dbr k1Sr ydbr yhwh 1ly wySbw Sry mw1b 8m bl8m and he said unto them, lodge here this night, and i will bring you bee-word again, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou speak unto me: and the princes of from-father-moab abode with swallow-baalam. vayomer ’alehem linu foh halaylah vahashiboti ’etkhem dabar ka’asher yedaber yhvh ’elay, vayeshebu sare mo’ab ‘im bil‘am.
wyb1 1lhym 1l bl8m wy1mr my h1nSym h1lh 8mk and towards-these-elohim came unto swallow-baalam, and said, what men are these with thee? vayabo ’elohim ’el bil‘am, vayomer mi ha’anashim ha’eleh ‘imakh.
wy1mr bl8m 1l h1lhym blq bn Zpr mlk mw1b SlH 1ly and swallow-baalam said unto towards-these-elohim, beat-balak child-between of bird-zipor, moloch-king of from-father-moab, hath sent unto me, saying, vayomer bil‘am ’el ha’elohim, balaq ben zipor melekh mo’ab shalakh ’elay.
hnh h8m hyZ1 mmZrym wyks 1t 8yn h1rZ 8th lkh qbh ly 1tw 1wly 1wkl lhlHm bw wgrStyw behold, there is a with-mum-people come out of narrows-mizraim, which covereth the face-turns of the earth: come now, curse me them; peradventure i be able to overcome them, and drive them out. hineh ha‘am hayozei mimizrayim vaykhas ‘en ha’arez, ‘atah lekhah qabah li ’oto ’ulay ’ukhal lehilakhem bo vegerashtiv.
wy1mr 1lhym 1l bl8m l1 tlk 8mhm l1 t1r 1t h8m ky brwk hw1 and towards-these-elohim said unto swallow-baalam, no go with them; no curse the with-mum-people: for they are knee-fluffy-blessed. vayomer ’elohim ’el bil‘am lo telekh ‘imahem, lo ta’or ha‘am ki barukh hu.
wyqm bl8m bbqr wy1mr 1l Sry blq lkw 1l 1rZkm ky m1n yhwh ltty lhlk 8mkm and swallow-baalam rose up in the morning, and said unto the princes of beat-balak, get you into your land: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou refuseth to give me leave to go with you. vayaqam bil‘am baboqer vayomer ’el sarei balaq lekhu ’el ’arzekhem, ki me’en yhvh letiti lahalokh ‘imakhem.
wyqwmw Sry mw1b wyb1w 1l blq wy1mrw m1n bl8m hlk 8mnw and the princes of from-father-moab rose up, and they went unto beat-balak, and said, swallow-baalam refuseth to come with us. vayaqumu sarei mo’ab vayabo’u ’el balaq, vayomeru me’en bil‘am halokh ‘imanu.
wysp 8wd blq SlH Srym rbym wnkbdym m1lh and beat-balak sent yet again princes, more, and more honorable than they. vayosef ‘od balaq, sheloakh sarim rabim venikhbadim me’eleh.
wyb1w 1l bl8m wy1mrw lw kh 1mr blq bn Zpwr 1l n1 tmn8 mhlk 1ly and they came to swallow-baalam, and said to him, thus saith beat-balak child-between of bird-zipor, let nothing, i pray thee, here-hinder thee from coming unto me: vayabo’u ’el bil‘am, vayomeru lo koh ’amar balaq ben zipor ’al na timana‘ mehalokh ’elay.
ky kbd 1kbdk m1d wkl 1Sr t1mr 1ly 18Sh wlkh n1 qbh ly 1t h8m hzh for i will promote thee unto very great honor, and i will do whatsoever thou sayest unto me: come therefore, i pray thee, curse me this with-mum-people. ki khabed ’akhabedkha me’od vekhol ’asher tomar ’elay ’e‘eseh, ulekhah na qabah li ha‘am hazeh.
wy8n bl8m wy1mr 1l 8bdy blq 1m ytn ly blq ml1 bytw ksp wzhb l1 1wkl l8br 1t py yhwh 1lhy l8Swt qTnh 1w gdwlh and swallow-baalam answered and said unto the workers of beat-balak, if beat-balak would give me his daughter-house full of silver and gold, i cannot go beyond the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou my towards-these-elohim, to do less or more. vaya‘an bil‘am vayomer ’el ‘abdei balaq ’im yiten li balaq melo beto kesef vezahab, lo ’ukhal la‘abor pi yhvh ’elohay la‘asot qetanah ’o gedolah.
w8th Sbw n1 bzh gm 1tm hlylh w1d8h mh ysp yhwh dbr 8my now therefore, i pray you, tarry ye also here this night, that i may hand-know what yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will say unto me more. ve‘atah shebu na bazeh gam ’atem halayelah, ve’ede‘ah mah yosef yhvh daber ‘imi.
wyb1 1lhym 1l bl8m lylh wy1mr lw 1m lqr1 lk b1w h1nSym qwm lk 1tm w1k 1t hdbr 1Sr 1dbr 1lyk 1tw t8Sh and towards-these-elohim came unto swallow-baalam at night, and said unto him, if the men come to call thee, rise up, and go with them; and yet the bee-word which i say unto thee, that thou do. vayabo ’elohim ’el bil‘am laylah vayomer lo ’im liqro lekha ba’u ha’anashim qum lekh ’itam, ve’akh hadabar ’asher ’adaber ’elekha ’oto ta‘aseh.
wyqm bl8m bbqr wyHbS 1t 1tnw wylk 8m Sry mw1b and swallow-baalam rose up in the morning, and saddled his ass, and went with the princes of from-father-moab. vayaqam bil‘am baboqer vayakhabosh ’atono, vayelekh ‘im sarei mo’ab.
wyHr 1p 1lhym ky hwlk hw1 wytyZb ml1k yhwh bdrk lSTn lw whw1 rkb 8l 1tnw wSny n8ryw 8mw and towards-these-elohim's nose-anger was kindled because he went: and the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou stood in the way for an adversary-satan against him. now he was riding upon his ass, and his two workers were with him. vayikhar ’af ’elohim ki holekh hu vayityazeb mal’akh yhvh baderekh lesatan lo, vehu rokheb ‘al ’atono ushenei ne‘arav ‘imo.
wtr1 h1twn 1t ml1k yhwh nZb bdrk wHrbw Slwph bydw wtT h1twn mn hdrk wtlk bSdh wyk bl8m 1t h1twn lhTth hdrk and the ass saw the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and the ass turned aside out of the way, and went into the field: and swallow-baalam smote the ass, to turn her into the way. vatere ha’aton mal’akh yhvh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado vatet ha’aton min haderekh vatelekh basadeh, vayakh bil‘am ha’aton lehatotah hadarekh.
wy8md ml1k yhwh bmS8wl hkrmym gdr mzh wgdr mzh and the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou stood in a path of the vineyards, a wall being on this side, and a wall on that side. vaya‘amod mal’akh yhvh bemish‘ol hakeramim, gader mizeh vegader mizeh.
wtr1 h1twn 1t ml1k yhwh wtlHZ 1l hqyr wtlHZ 1t rgl bl8m 1l hqyr wysp lhkth and when the ass saw the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, she thrust herself unto the wall, and crushed swallow-baalam's foot against the wall: and he smote her again. vatere ha’aton mal’akh yhvh vatilakhez ’el haqir vatilkhaz regel bil‘am ’el haqir, vayosef lehakotah.
wywsp ml1k yhwh 8bwr wy8md bmqwm Zr 1Sr 1yn drk lnTwt ymyn wSm1wl and the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou went further, and stood in a narrow place, where was no way to turn either to the right hand or to the left. vayosef mal’akh yhvh ‘abor, vaya‘amod bemaqom zar ’asher ’en derekh lintot yamin usemol.
wtr1 h1twn 1t ml1k yhwh wtrbZ tHt bl8m wyHr 1p bl8m wyk 1t h1twn bmql and when the ass saw the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, she fell down under swallow-baalam: and swallow-baalam's nose-anger was kindled, and he smote the ass with a staff. vatere ha’aton mal’akh yhvh vatirbaz takhat bil‘am, vayikhar ’af bil‘am vayakh ha’aton bamaqel.
wyptH yhwh 1t py h1twn wt1mr lbl8m mh 8Syty lk ky hkytny zh SlS rglym and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou opened the mouth of the ass, and she said unto swallow-baalam, what have i done unto thee, that thou hast smitten me these three times? vayiftakh yhvh pi ha’aton, vatomer lebil‘am meh ‘asiti lekha ki hikitani zeh shalosh regalim.
wy1mr bl8m l1twn ky ht8llt by lw yS Hrb bydy ky 8th hrgtyk and swallow-baalam said unto the ass, because thou hast mocked me: i would there were a sword in mine hand, for now would i kill thee. vayomer bil‘am la’aton ki hit‘alalt bi, lu yesh khereb beyadi ki ‘atah haragtikh.
wt1mr h1twn 1l bl8m hlw1 1nky 1tnk 1Sr rkbt 8ly m8wdk 8d hywm hzh hhskn hsknty l8Swt lk kh wy1mr l1 and the ass said unto swallow-baalam, am not i thine ass, upon which thou hast ridden ever since i was thine unto this day? was i ever wont to do so unto thee? and he said, nay. vatomer ha’aton ’el bil‘am halo ’anokhi ’atonekha ’asher rakhabta ‘alay me‘odkha ‘ad hayom hazeh hahasken hiskanti la‘asot lekha koh, vayomer lo.
wygl yhwh 1t 8yny bl8m wyr1 1t ml1k yhwh nZb bdrk wHrbw Slph bydw wyqd wyStHw l1pyw then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou opened the eyes of swallow-baalam, and he saw the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and he bowed down his head, and fell flat on his face-turns. vaygal yhvh ‘enei bil‘am vayar mal’akh yhvh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado, vayiqod vayishtakhu le’apav.
wy1mr 1lyw ml1k yhwh 8l mh hkyt 1t 1tnk zh SlwS rglym hnh 1nky yZ1ty lSTn ky yrT hdrk lngdy and the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto him, wherefore hast thou smitten thine ass these three times? behold, i went out to withstand-satan thee, because thy way is perverse before-turns me: vayomer ’elav mal’akh yhvh ‘al mah hikita ’atonekha zeh shalosh regalim, hineh ’anokhi yazati lesatan ki yarat haderekh lenegdi.
wtr1ny h1twn wtT lpny zh SlS rglym 1wly nTth mpny ky 8th gm 1tkh hrgty w1wth hHyyty and the ass saw me, and turned from me these three times: unless she had turned from me, surely now also i had slain thee, and saved her alive. vatir’ani ha’aton vatet lefanay zeh shalosh regalim, ’ulay natetah mipanay ki ‘atah gam ’otekhah haragti ve’otah hekheyeti.
wy1mr bl8m 1l ml1k yhwh HT1ty ky l1 yd8ty ky 1th nZb lqr1ty bdrk w8th 1m r8 b8ynyk 1Swbh ly and swallow-baalam said unto the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, i have missed; for i hand-knew not that thou stoodest in the way against me: now therefore, if it is bad in you eyes, i will get me back again. vayomer bil‘am ’el mal’akh yhvh khatati ki lo yada‘ti ki ’atah nizab liqrati badarekh, ve‘atah ’im ra‘ be‘enekha ’ashubah li.
wy1mr ml1k yhwh 1l bl8m lk 8m h1nSym w1ps 1t hdbr 1Sr 1dbr 1lyk 1tw tdbr wylk bl8m 8m Sry blq and the angel-messanger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto swallow-baalam, go with the men: and only the bee-word that i speak unto thee, that thou speak. so swallow-baalam went with the princes of beat-balak. vayomer mal’akh yhvh ’el bil‘am lekh ‘im ha’anashim ve’efes hadabar ’asher ’adaber ’elekha tedaber, vayelekh bil‘am ‘im sarei balaq.
wySm8 blq ky b1 bl8m wyZ1 lqr1tw 1l 8yr mw1b 1Sr 8l gbwl 1rnn 1Sr bqZh hgbwl and when beat-balak heard that swallow-baalam was come, he went out to until-witness him unto a light-city of from-father-moab, which is in the border of pine-arnon, which is in the utmost coast. vayishma‘ balaq ki ba bil‘am, vayezei liqrato ’el ‘ir mo’ab ’asher ‘al gebul ’arnon ’asher biqzeh hagebul.
wy1mr blq 1l bl8m hl1 SlH SlHty 1lyk lqr1 lk lmh l1 hlkt 1ly h1mnm l1 1wkl kbdk and beat-balak said unto swallow-baalam, did i not earnestly send unto thee to call thee? wherefore camest thou not unto me? am i not able indeed to promote thee to honor? vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am halo shaloakh shalakhti ’elekha liqro lakh lamah lo halakhta ’elay, ha’umnam lo ’ukhal kabedekha.
wy1mr bl8m 1l blq hnh b1ty 1lyk 8th hykwl 1wkl dbr m1wmh hdbr 1Sr ySym 1lhym bpy 1tw 1dbr and swallow-baalam said unto beat-balak, lo, i am come unto thee: have i now any dynamic at all to say any thing? the bee-word that towards-these-elohim putteth in my mouth, that i speak. vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq hineh bati ’elekha ‘atah hayakhol ’ukhal daber me’umah, hadabar ’asher yasim ’elohim befi ’oto ’adaber.
wylk bl8m 8m blq wyb1w qryt HZwt and swallow-baalam went with beat-balak, and they came unto district-of-midnight-kirjathuzot. vayelekh bil‘am ‘im balaq, vayabo’u khuzot.
wyzbH blq bqr wZ1n wySlH lbl8m wlSrym 1Sr 1tw and beat-balak butchered wall-oxen and flock, and sent to swallow-baalam, and to the princes that were with him. vayizbakh balaq baqar vazon, vayshalakh lebil‘am velasarim ’asher ’ito.
wyhy bbqr wyqH blq 1t bl8m wy8lhw bmwt b8l wyr1 mSm qZh h8m and it came to pass on the morrow, that beat-balak took swallow-baalam, and brought him up into the high places of owner-baal, that thence he might see the utmost part of the with-mum-people. vayhi baboqer vayiqakh balaq bil‘am vaya‘alehu bamot ba‘al, vayar misham qezeh ha‘am.
wy1mr bl8m 1l blq bnh ly bzh Sb8h mzbHt whkn ly bzh Sb8h prym wSb8h 1ylym and swallow-baalam said unto beat-balak, between-build me here seven butcher-kitchens, and prepare me here seven bulls and seven voiceless-rams. vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq beneh li bazeh shib‘ah mizbekhot, vehakhen li bazeh shib‘ah farim veshib‘ah ’elim.
wy8S blq k1Sr dbr bl8m wy8l blq wbl8m pr w1yl bmzbH and beat-balak did as swallow-baalam had bee-spoken; and beat-balak and swallow-baalam inwarded on every butcher-kitchen a bull and a voiceless-ram. vaya‘as balaq ka’asher diber bil‘am, vaya‘al balaq ubil‘am par va’ayil bamizbeakh.
wy1mr bl8m lblq htyZb 8l 8ltk w1lkh 1wly yqrh yhwh lqr1ty wdbr mh yr1ny whgdty lk wylk Spy and swallow-baalam said unto beat-balak, stand by thy on-up, and i will go: peradventure yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will come to meet me: and whatsoever he showeth me i will tell thee. and he went to an high place. vayomer bil‘am lebalaq hityazeb ‘al ‘olatekha ve’elekhah ’ulay yiqareh yhvh liqrati udebar mah yar’eni vehigadti lakh, vayelekh shefi.
wyqr 1lhym 1l bl8m wy1mr 1lyw 1t Sb8t hmzbHt 8rkty w18l pr w1yl bmzbH and towards-these-elohim met swallow-baalam: and he said unto him, i have prepared seven butcher-kitchens, and i have inwarded upon every butcher-kitchen a bull and a voiceless-ram. vayiqar ’elohim ’el bil‘am, vayomer ’elav shib‘at hamizbekhot ‘arakhti va’a‘al par va’ayil bamizbeakh.
wySm yhwh dbr bpy bl8m wy1mr Swb 1l blq wkh tdbr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou put a bee-word in swallow-baalam's mouth, and said, return unto beat-balak, and thus thou speak. vayasem yhvh dabar befi bil‘am, vayomer shub ’el balaq vekhoh tedaber.
wySb 1lyw whnh nZb 8l 8ltw hw1 wkl Sry mw1b and he returned unto him, and, lo, he stood by his on-up, he, and all the princes of from-father-moab. vayashab ’elav vehineh nizab ‘al ‘olato, hu vekhal sarei mo’ab.
wyS1 mSlw wy1mr mn 1rm ynHny blq mlk mw1b mhrry qdm lkh 1rh ly y8qb wlkh z8mh ySr1l and he took up his parable, and said, beat-balak the moloch-king of from-father-moab hath brought me from high-aram, out of the mountains of the east, saying, come, curse me backstreet-jacob, and come, defy saturated-towards-israel. vayisa meshalo vayomar, min ’aram yankheni balaq melekh mo’ab meharre qedem lekhah ’arah li ya‘aqob ulekhah zo‘amah yisra’el.
mh 1qb l1 qbh 1l wmh 1z8m l1 z8m yhwh how i curse, whom towards-these-elohim hath not cursed? or how i defy, whom yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath not defied? mah ’eqob lo qaboh ’el, umah ’ez‘om lo za‘am yhvh.
ky mr1S Zrym 1r1nw wmgb8wt 1Swrnw hn 8m lbdd ySkn wbgwym l1 ytHSb for from the top of the rocks i see him, and from the hills i behold him: lo, the with-mum-people dwell alone, and not be reckoned among the nations. ki merosh zurim ’er’enu umigeba‘ot ’ashurenu, hen ‘am lebadad yishkon ubagoyim lo yitkhashab.
my mnh 8pr y8qb wmspr 1t rb8 ySr1l tmt npSy mwt ySrym wthy 1Hryty kmhw who can count the dust of backstreet-jacob, and the number of the fourth part of saturated-towards-israel? let me die the death of the just, and let my last end be like his! mi manah ‘afar ya‘aqob umispar roba‘ yisra’el, tamot nafshi mot yesharim utehi ’akhariti kamohu.
wy1mr blq 1l bl8m mh 8Syt ly lqb 1yby lqHtyk whnh brkt brk and beat-balak said unto swallow-baalam, what hast thou done unto me? i took thee to curse mine father-adversaries, and, behold, thou hast knee-fluffy-blessed them altogether. vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am meh ‘asita li, laqob ’oyebay leqakhtikha vehineh berakhta barekh.
wy8n wy1mr hl1 1t 1Sr ySym yhwh bpy 1tw 1Smr ldbr and he answered and said, must i not take heed to speak that which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath put in my mouth? vaya‘an vayomar, halo ’asher yasim yhvh befi ’eshmor ledaber.

l1 1yS 1l wykzb wbn 1dm wytnHm hhw1 1mr wl1 y8Sh wdbr wl1 yqymnh towards-these-elohim is not a man, that he should lie; neither child-between of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and he not do it? or hath he bee-spoken, and he not make it good? lo ’ish ’el vikhazeb uben ’adam veyitnekham, hahu ’amar velo ya‘aseh vediber velo yeqimenah.

l1 hbyT 1wn by8qb wl1 r1h 8ml bySr1l yhwh 1lhyw 8mw wtrw8t mlk bw he hath not beheld torment in backstreet-jacob, neither hath he seen perverseness in saturated-towards-israel: yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou his towards-these-elohim is with him, and the shout of a moloch-king is among them. lo hibit ’aven beya‘aqob velo ra’ah ‘amal beyisra’el, yhvh ’elohav ‘imo uteru‘at melekh bo.
1l mwZy1m mmZrym ktw8pt r1m lw towards-these-elohim brought them out of narrows-mizraim; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn. ’el mozi’am mimizrayim, keto‘afot re’em lo.
ky l1 nHS by8qb wl1 qsm bySr1l k8t y1mr ly8qb wlySr1l mh p8l 1l surely there is no enchantment against backstreet-jacob, neither is there any divination against saturated-towards-israel: according to this time it be said of backstreet-jacob and of saturated-towards-israel, what hath towards-these-elohim wrought! ki lo nakhash beya‘aqob velo qesem beyisra’el, ka‘et ye’amer leya‘aqob uleyisra’el mah pa‘al ’el.
hn 8m klby1 yqwm wk1ry ytnS1 l1 ySkb 8d y1kl Trp wdm Hllym ySth behold, the with-mum-people rise up as a gather-lion, and lift up himself as a gather-lion: he not lie down until he eat of the prey, and drink the blood of the slain. hen ‘am kelabi yaqum vekha’ari yitnasa, lo yishkab ‘ad yokhal teref vedam khalalim yishteh.

wyS1 mSlw wy1mr n1m bl8m bnw b8r wn1m hgbr Stm h8yn and he took up his parable, and said, swallow-baalam child-between of in-the-skin-beor hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said: vayisa meshalo vayomar, ne’um bil‘am beno be‘or une’um hageber shetum ha‘ayin.
n1m Sm8 1mry 1l 1Sr mHzh Sdy yHzh npl wglwy 8ynym he hath said, which heard the bee-words of towards-these-elohim, which saw the vision of the almighty, falling into a trance, and having his eyes open: ne’um shomea‘ ’imre ’el, ’asher makhazeh shaday yekhezeh nofel ugelui ‘enayim.
mh Tbw 1hlyk y8qb mSkntyk ySr1l how goodly are thy tents, o backstreet-jacob, and thy dwellings, o saturated-towards-israel! mah tobu ’ohalekha ya‘aqob, mishkenotekha yisra’el.
knHlym nTyw kgnt 8ly nhr k1hlym nT8 yhwh k1rzym 8ly mym as the valleys are they spread forth, as gardens by the river's side, as the trees of lign aloes which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath planted, and as cedar trees beside the from-waters. kinkhalim nitayu keganot ‘alei nahar, ka’ahalim nata‘ yhvh ka’arazim ‘ale mayim.
yzl mym mdlyw wzr8w bmym rbym wyrm m1gg mlkw wtnS1 mlktw he pour the from-waters out of his buckets, and his seed be in many from-waters, and his moloch-king be higher than roof-agag, and his moloch-kingdom be exalted. yizal mayim midaleyav vezar‘o bemayim rabim, veyarom me’agag malko vetinasei malkhuto.
1l mwZy1w mmZrym ktw8pt r1m lw y1kl gwym Zryw w8Zmtyhm ygrm wHZyw ymHZ towards-these-elohim brought him forth out of narrows-mizraim; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn: he eat up the nations his father-adversaries, and break their bones, and pierce them through with his arrows. ’el mozi’o mimizrayim keto‘afot re’em lo, yokhal goyim zarav ve‘azmotehem yegarem vekhizav yimkhaz.
kr8 Skb k1ry wklby1 my yqymnw mbrkyk brwk w1rryk 1rwr he couched, he lay down as a gather-lion, and as a gather-lion: who stir him up? knee-fluffy-blessed is he that knee-fluffy-blesseth thee, and cursed is he that curseth thee. kara‘ shakhab ka’ari ukhelabi mi yeqimenu, mebarakhekha barukh ve’orerekha ’arur.
wyHr 1p blq 1l bl8m wyspq 1t kpyw wy1mr blq 1l bl8m lqb 1yby qr1tyk whnh brkt brk zh SlS p8mym and beat-balak's nose-anger was kindled against swallow-baalam, and he smote his hands together: and beat-balak said unto swallow-baalam, i called thee to curse mine father-adversaries, and, behold, thou hast altogether knee-fluffy-blessed them these three times. vayikhar ’af balaq ’el bil‘am vayispoq kapav, vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am laqob ’oyebay qeratikha vehineh berakhta barekh zeh shalosh pe‘amim.
w8th brH lk 1l mqwmk 1mrty kbd 1kbdk whnh mn8k yhwh mkbwd therefore now flee thou to thy place: i thought to promote thee unto great honor; and, lo, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath kept thee back from honor. ve‘atah berakh lekha ’el meqomekha, ’amarti kabed ’akhabedkha vehineh mena‘akha yhvh mikabod.
wy1mr bl8m 1l blq hl1 gm 1l ml1kyk 1Sr SlHt 1ly dbrty l1mr and swallow-baalam said unto beat-balak, spake i not also to thy messengers which thou sentest unto me, saying, vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq, halo gam ’el mal’akhekha ’asher shalakhta ’elay dibarti lemor.
1m ytn ly blq ml1 bytw ksp wzhb l1 1wkl l8br 1t py yhwh l8Swt Twbh 1w r8h mlby 1Sr ydbr yhwh 1tw 1dbr if beat-balak would give me his daughter-house full of silver and gold, i cannot go beyond the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to do either good or bad of mine own mind; and what yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou saith, that will i speak? ’im yiten li balaq melo beto kesef vezahab lo ’ukhal la‘abor pi yhvh la‘asot tobah ’o ra‘ah milibi, ’asher yedaber yhvh ’oto ’adaber.
w8th hnny hwlk l8my lkh 1y8Zk 1Sr y8Sh h8m hzh l8mk b1Hryt hymym and now, behold, i go unto my with-mum-people: come therefore, and i will advertise thee what this with-mum-people do to thy with-mum-people in the latter days. ve‘atah hini holekh le‘ami, lekhah ’i‘azekha ’asher ya‘aseh ha‘am hazeh le‘amekha be’akharit hayamim.
wyS1 mSlw wy1mr n1m bl8m bnw b8r wn1m hgbr Stm h8yn and he took up his parable, and said, swallow-baalam child-between of in-the-skin-beor hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said: vayisa meshalo vayomar, ne’um bil‘am beno be‘or une’um hageber shetum ha‘ayin.
n1m Sm8 1mry 1l wyd8 d8t 8lywn mHzh Sdy yHzh npl wglwy 8ynym he hath said, which heard the bee-words of towards-these-elohim, and hand-knew the knowledge of the most high, which saw the vision of the almighty, falling into a trance, and having his eyes open: ne’um shomea‘ ’imre ’el veyodea‘ da‘at ‘elyon, makhazeh shaday yekhezeh nofel ugelui ‘enayim.
1r1nw wl1 8th 1Swrnw wl1 qrwb drk kwkb my8qb wqm SbT mySr1l wmHZ p1ty mw1b wqrqr kl bny St i see him, and not now: i behold him, and not nigh: there come a star out of backstreet-jacob, and a sceptre rise out of saturated-towards-israel, and hit the corners of from-father-moab, and destroy all children-betweens of drink-put-sheth. ’er’enu velo ‘atah ’ashurenu velo qarob, darakh kokhab miya‘aqob veqam shebet miyisra’el umakhaz pa’atei mo’ab veqarqar kal bene shet.
whyh 1dwm yrSh whyh yrSh S8yr 1ybyw wySr1l 8Sh Hyl and man-edom be a possession, hair-style-seir also be a possession for his father-adversaries; and saturated-towards-israel do valiantly. vehayah ’edom yereshah vehayah yereshah se‘ir ’oyebav, veyisra’el ‘oseh khayil.
wyrd my8qb wh1byd Sryd m8yr out of backstreet-jacob come he that have dominion, and destroy him that remaineth of the light-city. veyered miya‘aqob, vehe’ebid sarid me‘ir.
wyr1 1t 8mlq wyS1 mSlw wy1mr r1Syt gwym 8mlq w1Hrytw 8dy 1bd and when he looked on labour-moloch-king-amalek, he took up his parable, and said, labour-moloch-king-amalek was the first of the nations; and his latter end be that he perish for ever. vayar ‘amaleq vayisa meshalo vayomar, reshit goyim ‘amaleq ve’akharito ‘adei ’obed.
wyr1 1t hqyny wyS1 mSlw wy1mr 1ytn mwSbk wSym bsl8 qnk and he looked on the nest-nest-kenites, and took up his parable, and said, strong is thy dwelling place, and thou puttest thy nest in a rock. vayar haqeni vayisa meshalo vayomar, ’etan moshabekha vesim basela‘ qinekha.
ky 1m yhyh lb8r qyn 8d mh 1Swr tSbk nevertheless the nest-kenite be wasted, until beech-asshur carry thee away captive. ki ’im yihyeh leba‘er qayin, ‘ad mah ’ashur tishbeka.
wyS1 mSlw wy1mr 1wy my yHyh mSmw 1l and he took up his parable, and said, alas, who live when towards-these-elohim doeth this! vayisa meshalo vayomar, ’o mi yikhyeh misumo ’el.
wZym myd ktym w8nw 1Swr w8nw 8br wgm hw1 8dy 1bd and ships come from the coast of stains-chitim, and afflict beech-asshur, and afflict pass-eber, and he also perish for ever. vezim miyad kitim ve‘inu ’ashur ve‘inu ‘eber, vegam hu ‘adei ’obed.

wySb ySr1l bSTym wyHl h8m lznwt 1l bnwt mw1b and saturated-towards-israel abode in sailing-shitim, and the with-mum-people began to prostitute with children-betweenesss of from-father-moab. vayesheb yisra’el bashitim, vayakhel ha‘am liznot ’el benot mo’ab.
wtqr1n l8m lzbHy 1lhyhn wy1kl h8m wyStHww l1lhyhn and they called the with-mum-people unto the butchers of their towards-these-elohim: and the with-mum-people did eat, and bowed down to their towards-these-elohim. vatiqrena la‘am lezibkhei ’elohehen, vayokhal ha‘am vayishtakhavu lelohehen.
wyZmd ySr1l lb8l p8wr wyHr 1p yhwh bySr1l and saturated-towards-israel joined himself unto own-wide-open-baalpeor: and the nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was kindled against saturated-towards-israel. vayizamed yisra’el leba‘al pe‘or, vayikhar ’af yhvh beyisra’el.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh qH 1t kl r1Sy h8m whwq8 1wtm lyhwh ngd hSmS wySb Hrwn 1p yhwh mySr1l and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, take all the heads of the with-mum-people, and hang them up before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou against the sun, that the fierce nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou may be turned away from saturated-towards-israel. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh qakh kal rashei ha‘am vehoqa‘ ’otam yhvh neged hashamesh, veyashob kharon ’af yhvh miyisra’el.

whnh 1yS mbny ySr1l b1 wyqrb 1l 1Hyw 1t hmdynyt l8yny mSh wl8yny kl 8dt bny ySr1l whmh bkym ptH 1hl mw8d and, behold, one of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel came and inwarded unto his brethren a place-of-discussed-teaching-midianitish woman in the sight of extracted-mose, and in the sight of all the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, who were weeping before-turns the opening of the tent of until-conception. vehineh ’ish mibenei yisra’el ba vayaqreb ’el ’ekhav hamidyanit le‘enei mosheh ule‘enei kal ‘adat bene yisra’el, vehemah bokhim petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.

wyb1 1Hr 1yS ySr1l 1l hqbh wydqr 1t Snyhm 1t 1yS ySr1l w1t h1Sh 1l qbth wt8Zr hmgph m8l bny ySr1l and he went after the man of saturated-towards-israel into the tent, and thrust both of them through, the man of saturated-towards-israel, and the woman through her nurture-belly. so the plague was stayed from children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayabo ’akhar ’ish yisra’el ’el haqubah vayidqor shenehem ’ish yisra’el ve’et ha’ishah ’el qobatah, vate‘azar hamagefah me‘al benei yisra’el.

wSm 1yS ySr1l hmkh 1Sr hkh 1t hmdynyt zmry bn slw1 nSy1 byt 1b lSm8ny now the name of the saturated-towards-israelite that was slain, even that was slain with the place-of-discussed-teaching-midianitish woman, was my-songster-zimri, child-between of basket-salu, a leader of a chief daughter-house among the hear-home-simeonites. veshem ’ish yisra’el hamukeh ’asher hukah ’et hamidyanit zimri ben salu, nesi bet ’ab lashim‘oni.

ky 1mr yhwh lhm mwt ymtw bmdbr wl1 nwtr mhm 1yS ky 1m klb bn ypnh wyhwS8 bn nwn for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said of them, they surely die in the place-of-word-desert. and there was not left a man of them, save as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh, and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun. ki ’amar yhvh lahem mot yamutu bamidbar, velo notar mehem ’ish ki ’im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua‘ bin nun.

1bynw mt bmdbr whw1 l1 hyh btwk h8dh hnw8dym 8l yhwh b8dt qrH ky bHT1w mt wbnym l1 hyw lw our father died in the place-of-word-desert, and he was not in the company of them that added themselves together to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in the company of bald-ice-korah; and died in his own miss, and had no children-betweens. ’abinu met bamidbar vehu lo hayah betokh ha‘edah hano‘adim ‘al yhvh ba‘adat qorakh, ki bekhet’o met ubanim lo hayu lo.
lmh ygr8 Sm 1bynw mtwk mSpHtw ky 1yn lw bn tnh lnw 1Hzh btwk 1Hy 1bynw why should the name of our father be done away from inward his family, because he hath no child-between? give unto us therefore a possession among the brethren of our father. lamah yigara‘ shem ’abinu mitokh mishpakhto ki ’en lo ben, tenah lanu ’akhuzah betokh ’akhei ’abinu.

1Sr yZ1 lpnyhm w1Sr yb1 lpnyhm w1Sr ywZy1m w1Sr yby1m wl1 thyh 8dt yhwh kZ1n 1Sr 1yn lhm r8h which may go out before-turns them, and which may go in before-turns them, and which may lead them out, and which may bring them in; that the until-witness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou be not as sheep which have no shepherd. ’asher yezei lifnehem va’asher yabo lifnehem va’asher yozi’em va’asher yebi’em, velo tihyeh ‘adat yhvh kazon ’asher ’en lahem ro‘eh.

wlpny 1l8zr hkhn y8md wS1l lw bmSpT h1wrym lpny yhwh 8l pyw yZ1w w8l pyw yb1w hw1 wkl bny ySr1l 1tw wkl h8dh and he stand before-turns towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, who ask counsel for him after the decision-grammar of fires-urim before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: at his bee-word they go out, and at his bee-word they come in, both he, and all children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel with him, even all the until-witness. velifnei ’el‘azar hakohen ya‘amod vesha’al lo bemishpat ha’urim lifnei yhvh, ‘al piv yeze’u ve‘al piv yabo’u hu vekhal bene yisra’el ’ito vekhal ha‘edah.
wy8S mSh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw wyqH 1t yhwS8 wy8mdhw lpny 1l8zr hkhn wlpny kl h8dh and extracted-mose did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed him: and he took save-joshua-jesus, and set him before-turns towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, and before-turns all the until-witness: vaya‘as mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto, vayiqakh yehoshua‘ vaya‘amidehu lifnei ’el‘azar hakohen velifnei kal ha‘edah.
wysmk 1t ydyw 8lyw wyZwhw k1Sr dbr yhwh byd mSh and he laid his hands upon him, and gave him a charge, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed by the hand of extracted-mose. vayismokh yadav ‘alav vayzavehu, ka’asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh.

w1mrt lhm zh h1Sh 1Sr tqrybw lyhwh kbSym bny Snh tmymm Snym lywm 8lh tmyd and thou say unto them, this is the feminine-firy which ye inward unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual on-up. ve’amarta lahem zeh ha’isheh ’asher taqribu yhvh, kebasim bene shanah temimim shenayim layom ‘olah tamid.
1t hkbS 1Hd t8Sh bbqr w1t hkbS hSny t8Sh byn h8rbym the one lamb thou inward in the morning, and the other lamb thou inward at even; hakebes ’ekhad ta‘aseh baboqer, ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim.
w8Syryt h1yph slt lmnHh blwlh bSmn ktyt rby8t hhyn and a tenth part of an tired-ephah of basket-flour for a absorber, mingled with the fourth part of an here-hin of beaten name-from-oil. va‘asirit ha’efah solet leminkhah, belulah beshemen katit rebi‘it hahin.
8lt tmyd h8Syh bhr syny lryH nyHH 1Sh lyhwh it is a continual on-up, which was ordained in mount bush-(proto-)sinai for a smell fragrance, a butcher made by fire unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ‘olat tamid, ha‘asuyah behar sinay lereakh nikhoakh ’isheh yhvh.
wnskw rby8t hhyn lkbS h1Hd bqdS hsk nsk Skr lyhwh and the pouring thereof be the fourth part of an here-hin for the one lamb: in the dedicated-finished place thou cause the strong wine-inherit to be poured unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou for a pouring. venisko rebi‘it hahin lakebes ha’ekhad, baqodesh hasekh nesekh shekhar yhvh.
w1t hkbS hSny t8Sh byn h8rbym kmnHt hbqr wknskw t8Sh 1Sh ryH nyHH lyhwh and the other lamb thou inward at even: as the absorber of the morning, and as the pouring thereof, thou inward it, a butcher made by fire, of a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim, keminkhat haboqer ukhenisko ta‘aseh ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wbywm hSbt Sny kbSym bny Snh tmymm wSny 8Srnym slt mnHh blwlh bSmn wnskw and on the seven-sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of basket-flour for a absorber, mingled with name-from-oil, and the pouring thereof: ubeyom hashabat shene khebasim bene shanah temimim, ushenei ‘esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen venisko.
8lt Sbt bSbtw 8l 8lt htmyd wnskh this is the on-up of every seven-sabbath, beside the continual on-up, and his pouring. ‘olat shabat beshabato, ‘al ‘olat hatamid veniskah.
wbr1Sy HdSykm tqrybw 8lh lyhwh prym bny bqr Snym w1yl 1Hd kbSym bny Snh Sb8h tmymm and in the beginnings of your months ye inward a on-up unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; two bull child-between of visit-cattles, and one voiceless-ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot; uberashei khadeshekhem taqribu ‘olah yhvh, parim bene baqar shenayim ve’ayil ’ekhad kebasim bene shanah shib‘ah temimim.
wSlSh 8Srnym slt mnHh blwlh bSmn lpr h1Hd wSny 8Srnym slt mnHh blwlh bSmn l1yl h1Hd and three tenth deals of basket-flour for a absorber, mingled with name-from-oil, for one bull; and two tenth deals of basket-flour for a absorber, mingled with name-from-oil, for one voiceless-ram; usheloshah ‘esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen lapar ha’ekhad, ushenei ‘esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen la’ayil ha’ekhad.
w8Srn 8Srwn slt mnHh blwlh bSmn lkbS h1Hd 8lh ryH nyHH 1Sh lyhwh and a several tenth deal of basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber unto one lamb; for a on-up of a smell fragrance, a butcher made by fire unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ve‘isaron ‘isaron solet minkhah belulah bashemen lakebes ha’ekhad, ‘olah reakh nikhoakh ’isheh yhvh.
wnskyhm HZy hhyn yhyh lpr wSlySt hhyn l1yl wrby8t hhyn lkbS yyn z1t 8lt HdS bHdSw lHdSy hSnh and their pourings be half an here-hin of wine-inherit unto a bull, and the third part of an here-hin unto a voiceless-ram, and a fourth part of an here-hin unto a lamb: this is the on-up of every month throughout the months of the year. veniskehem khazi hahin yihyeh lapar ushelishit hahin la’ayil urebi‘it hahin lakebes yayin, zot ‘olat khodesh bekhadesho lekhadeshei hashanah.
wS8yr 8zym 1Hd lHT1t lyhwh 8l 8lt htmyd y8Sh wnskw and one kid of the intense-goats for a miss unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou be inwarded, beside the continual on-up, and his pouring. use‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat yhvh, ‘al ‘olat hatamid ye‘aseh venisko.
wbHdS hr1Swn b1rb8h 8Sr ywm lHdS psH lyhwh and in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. ubakhodesh harishon be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh, pesakh yhvh.
wbHmSh 8Sr ywm lHdS hzh Hg Sb8t ymym mZwt y1kl and in the fifteenth day of this month is the until-conception: seven days lit-mazat be eaten. ubakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hazeh khag, shib‘at yamim mazot ye’akhel.
bywm hr1Swn mqr1 qdS kl ml1kt 8bdh l1 t8Sw in the first day be an dedicated-finished convocation; ye do no manner of servile work therein: bayom harishon miqra qodesh, kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
whqrbtm 1Sh 8lh lyhwh prym bny bqr Snym w1yl 1Hd wSb8h kbSym bny Snh tmymm yhyw lkm and ye inward a butcher made by fire for a on-up unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; two bull child-between of visit-cattles, and one voiceless-ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they be unto you simple: vehiqrabtem ’isheh ‘olah yhvh parim bene baqar shenayim ve’ayil ’ekhad, veshib‘ah khebasim benei shanah temimim yihyu lakhem.
wmnHtm slt blwlh bSmn SlSh 8Srnym lpr wSny 8Srnym l1yl t8Sw and their absorber be of basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil: three tenth deals ye inward for a bull, and two tenth deals for a voiceless-ram; uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen, sheloshah ‘esronim lapar ushenei ‘esronim la’ayil ta‘asu.
8Srwn 8Srwn t8Sh lkbS h1Hd lSb8t hkbSym a several tenth deal thou inward for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs: ‘isaron ‘isaron ta‘aseh lakebes ha’ekhad, leshib‘at hakebasim.
wS8yr HT1t 1Hd lkpr 8lykm and one intense-goat for a miss, to make an out-of-town-ment for you. use‘ir khatat ’ekhad, lekhaper ‘alekhem.
mlbd 8lt hbqr 1Sr l8lt htmyd t8Sw 1t 1lh ye inward these beside the on-up in the morning, which is for a continual on-up. milebad ‘olat haboqer ’asher le‘olat hatamid, ta‘asu ’eleh.
k1lh t8Sw lywm Sb8t ymym lHm 1Sh ryH nyHH lyhwh 8l 8wlt htmyd y8Sh wnskw after this manner ye inward daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the butcher made by fire, of a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: it be inwarded beside the continual on-up, and his pouring. ka’eleh ta‘asu layom shib‘at yamim lekhem ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh, ‘al ‘olat hatamid ye‘aseh venisko.
wbywm hSby8y mqr1 qdS yhyh lkm kl ml1kt 8bdh l1 t8Sw and on the seventh day ye have an dedicated-finished convocation; ye do no servile work. ubayom hashebi‘i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem, kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
wbywm hbkwrym bhqrybkm mnHh HdSh lyhwh bSb8tykm mqr1 qdS yhyh lkm kl ml1kt 8bdh l1 t8Sw also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new absorber unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, after your weeks be out, ye have an dedicated-finished convocation; ye do no servile work: ubeyom habikurim behaqribekhem minkhah khadashah yhvh beshabu‘otekhem, miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.

wbHdS hSby8y b1Hd lHdS mqr1 qdS yhyh lkm kl ml1kt 8bdh l1 t8Sw ywm trw8h yhyh lkm and in the seventh month, on the first day of the month, ye have an dedicated-finished convocation; ye do no servile work: it is a day of blowing the mouthpiece-trumpets unto you. ubakhodesh hashebi‘i be’ekhad lakhodesh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu, yom teru‘ah yihyeh lakhem.

wb8Swr lHdS hSby8y hzh mqr1 qdS yhyh lkm w8nytm 1t npStykm kl ml1kh l1 t8Sw and ye have on the tenth day of this seventh month an dedicated-finished convocation; and ye pauper your beings: ye not do any work therein: ube‘asor lakhodesh hashebi‘i hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve‘initem nafshotekhem, kal melakhah lo ta‘asu.

wbywm hSby8y prym Sb8h 1ylm Snym kbSym bny Snh 1rb8h 8Sr tmymm and on the seventh day seven bulls, two voiceless-rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year simple: ubayom hashebi‘i parim shib‘ah ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.

bywm hSmyny 8Zrt thyh lkm kl ml1kt 8bdh l1 t8Sw on the eighth day ye have a solemn assembly: ye do no servile work therein: bayom hashemini ‘azeret tihyeh lakhem, kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
whqrbtm 8lh 1Sh ryH nyHH lyhwh pr 1Hd 1yl 1Hd kbSym bny Snh Sb8h tmymm and ye inward a on-up, a butcher made by fire, of a smell fragrance unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: one bull, one voiceless-ram, seven lambs of the first year simple: vehiqrabtem ‘olah ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh par ’ekhad ’ayil ’ekhad, kebasim bene shanah shib‘ah temimim.
