1lh t8Sw lyhwh bmw8dykm lbd mndrykm wndbtykm l8ltykm wlmnHtykm wlnskykm wlSlmykm these things ye do unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in your set until-conceptions, beside your vows, and your volunteers, for your on-ups, and for your absorbers, and for your pourings, and for your wholes. ’eleh ta‘asu yhvh bemo‘adekhem, lebad minidrekhem venidbotekhem le‘olotekhem uleminkhotekhem uleniskekhem uleshalmekhem.
wy1mr mSh 1l bny ySr1l kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and extracted-mose told children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayomer mosheh ’el benei yisra’el, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr mSh 1l r1Sy hmTwt lbny ySr1l l1mr zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh and extracted-mose spake unto the heads of the branchs concerning children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath order-prescribed. vaydaber mosheh ’el rashei hamatot libnei yisra’el lemor, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh.
1yS ky ydr ndr lyhwh 1w hSb8 Sb8h l1sr 1sr 8l npSw l1 yHl dbrw kkl hyZ1 mpyw y8Sh if a man vow a vow unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, or swear an toward-oath to bind his being with a bond; he not break his bee-word, he do according to all that proceedeth out of his mouth. ’ish ki yidor neder yhvh ’o hishaba‘ shebu‘ah le’sor ’isar ‘al nafsho lo yakhel debaro, kekhal hayozei mipiv ya‘aseh.
w1Sh ky tdr ndr lyhwh w1srh 1sr bbyt 1byh bn8ryh if a woman also vow a vow unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and bind herself by a bond, being in her father's daughter-house in her youth; ve’ishah ki tidor neder yhvh, ve’aserah ’isar bebet ’abiha bin‘ureha.
wSm8 1byh 1t ndrh w1srh 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh whHryS lh 1byh wqmw kl ndryh wkl 1sr 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh yqwm and her father hear her vow, and her bond wherewith she hath bound her being, and her father hold his peace at her; then all her vows stand, and every bond wherewith she hath bound her being stand. veshama‘ ’abiha nidrah ve’esarah ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah vehekherish lah ’abiha, veqamu kal nedareha vekhal ’isar ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqum.
w1m hny1 1byh 1th bywm Sm8w kl ndryh w1sryh 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh l1 yqwm wyhwh yslH lh ky hny1 1byh 1th and if her father disallow her in the day that he heareth; not any of her vows, or of her bonds wherewith she hath bound her being, stand: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou forgive her, because her father disallowed her. ve’im heni ’abiha ’otah beyom shame‘o kal nedareha ve’esareha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah lo yaqum, yhvh yislakh lah ki heni ’abiha ’otah.
w1m hyw thyh l1yS wndryh 8lyh 1w mbT1 Sptyh 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh and if she had at all an man, when she vowed, or uttered ought out of her lips, wherewith she bound her being; ve’im hayo tihyeh le’ish unedareha ‘aleha, ’o mibta sefateha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah.
wSm8 1ySh bywm Sm8w whHryS lh wqmw ndryh w1srh 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh yqmw and her man heard it, and held his peace at her in the day that he heard it: then her vows stand, and her bonds wherewith she bound her being stand. veshama‘ ’ishah beyom shame‘o vehekherish lah, veqamu nedareha ve’esareha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqumu.
w1m bywm Sm8 1ySh yny1 1wth whpr 1t ndrh 1Sr 8lyh w1t mbT1 Sptyh 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh wyhwh yslH lh and if her man disallowed her on the day that he heard it; then he make her vow which she vowed, and that which she uttered with her lips, wherewith she bound her being, of none effect: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou forgive her. ve’im beyom shemoa‘ ’ishah yani ’otah vehefer nidrah ’asher ‘aleha ve’et mibta sefateha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah, yhvh yislakh lah.
wndr 1lmnh wgrwSh kl 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh yqwm 8lyh and every vow of a widow, and of her that is divorced, wherewith they have bound their beings, stand against her. veneder ’almanah ugerushah, kol ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqum ‘aleha.
w1m byt 1ySh ndrh 1w 1srh 1sr 8l npSh bSb8h and if she vowed in her man's daughter-house, or bound her being by a bond with an toward-oath; ve’im bet ’ishah nadarah, ’o ’aserah ’isar ‘al nafshah bishbu‘ah.
wSm8 1ySh whHrS lh l1 hny1 1th wqmw kl ndryh wkl 1sr 1Sr 1srh 8l npSh yqwm and her man heard it, and held his peace at her, and disallowed her not: then all her vows stand, and every bond wherewith she bound her being stand. veshama‘ ’ishah vehekherish lah lo heni ’otah, veqamu kal nedareha vekhal ’isar ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqum.
w1m hpr ypr 1tm 1ySh bywm Sm8w kl mwZ1 Sptyh lndryh wl1sr npSh l1 yqwm 1ySh hprm wyhwh yslH lh and if her man hath utterly made them void on the day he heard them; then whatsoever proceeded out of her lips concerning her vows, or concerning the bond of her being, not stand: her man hath made them void; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou forgive her. ve’im hafer yafer ’otam ’ishah beyom shame‘o kal moza sefateha lindareha ule’isar nafshah lo yaqum, ’ishah haferam yhvh yislakh lah.
kl ndr wkl Sb8t 1sr l8nt npS 1ySh yqymnw w1ySh yprnw every vow, and every binding toward-oath to afflict the being, her man may establish it, or her man may make it void. kal neder vekhal shebu‘at ’isar le‘anot nafesh, ’ishah yeqimenu ve’ishah yeferenu.
w1m hHrS yHryS lh 1ySh mywm 1l ywm whqym 1t kl ndryh 1w 1t kl 1sryh 1Sr 8lyh hqym 1tm ky hHrS lh bywm Sm8w and if her man altogether hold his peace at her from day to day; then he establisheth all her vows, or all her bonds, which are upon her: he confirmeth them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard them. ve’im hakharesh yakharish lah ’ishah miyom ’el yom veheqim kal nedareha ’o kal ’esareha ’asher ‘aleha, heqim ’otam ki hekherish lah beyom shame‘o.
w1m hpr ypr 1tm 1Hry Sm8w wnS1 1t 8wnh and if he any ways make them void after that he hath heard them; then he bear her torment. ve’im hafer yafer ’otam ’akharei shame‘o, venasa ‘avonah.
1lh hHqym 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh byn 1yS l1Stw byn 1b lbtw bn8ryh byt 1byh these are the statutes, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, between-bin a man and his woman, between-bin the father and his daughter-hoof-bat-child, being yet in her youth in her father's daughter-house. ’eleh hakhuqim ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ben ’ish le’ishto, ben ’ab lebito bin‘ureha bet ’abiha.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
nqm nqmt bny ySr1l m1t hmdynym 1Hr t1sp 1l 8myk avenge children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel of the place-of-discussed-teaching-midianites: afterward thou be added unto thy with-mum-people. neqom niqmat benei yisra’el me’et hamidyanim, ’akhar te’asef ’el ‘amekha.
wydbr mSh 1l h8m l1mr hHlZw m1tkm 1nSym lZb1 wyhyw 8l mdyn ltt nqmt yhwh bmdyn and extracted-mose spake unto the with-mum-people, saying, arm some of yourselves unto the troop-cluster, and let them go against the place-of-discussed-teaching-midianites, and avenge yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian. vaydaber mosheh ’el ha‘am lemor hekhalezu me’itekhem ’anashim lazaba, veyihyu ‘al midyan latet niqmat yhvh bemidyan.
1lp lmTh 1lp lmTh lkl mTwt ySr1l tSlHw lZb1 of every branch a thousand, throughout all the branchs of saturated-towards-israel, ye send to the troop-cluster. ’elef lamateh ’elef lamateh, lekhol matot yisra’el tishlekhu lazaba.
wymsrw m1lpy ySr1l 1lp lmTh Snym 8Sr 1lp HlwZy Zb1 so there were delivered out of the thousands of saturated-towards-israel, a thousand of every branch, twelve thousand armed for troop-cluster. vayimaseru me’alfei yisra’el ’elef lamateh, shenem ‘asar ’elef khaluzei zaba.
wySlH 1tm mSh 1lp lmTh lZb1 1tm w1t pynHs bn 1l8zr hkhn lZb1 wkly hqdS wHZZrwt htrw8h bydw and extracted-mose sent them to the troop-cluster, a thousand of every branch, them and mouth-attempt-pinehas child-between of towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, to the troop-cluster, with the dedicated-finished instruments, and the mouthpiece-trumpets to blow in his hand. vayishlakh ’otam mosheh ’elef lamateh lazaba, ’otam ve’et pinekhas ben ’el‘azar hakohen lazaba ukhelei haqodesh vakhazozerot hateru‘ah beyado.
wyZb1w 8l mdyn k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh wyhrgw kl zkr and they troop-clusterred against the place-of-discussed-teaching-midianites, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose; and they slew all the rememberers. vayizbe’u ‘al midyan ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, vayahargu kal zakhar.
w1t mlky mdyn hrgw 8l Hllyhm 1t 1wy w1t rqm w1t Zwr w1t Hwr w1t rb8 HmSt mlky mdyn w1t bl8m bn b8wr hrgw bHrb and they slew the moloch-kings of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian, beside the rest of them that were slain; namely, my-desire-evi, and weave-rekem, and flint-zur, and small-place-prince-hur, and one-fourth-great-grandson-reba, five moloch-kings of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian: swallow-baalam also child-between of in-the-skin-beor they slew with the sword. ve’et malkhei midyan haregu ‘al khalehem ’evi ve’et reqem ve’et zur ve’et khur ve’et reba‘ khameshet malkhei midyan, ve’et bil‘am ben be‘or haregu bekhareb.
wySbw bny ySr1l 1t nSy mdyn w1t Tpm w1t kl bhmtm w1t kl mqnhm w1t kl Hylm bzzw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel took all the women of place-of-discussed-teaching-midian captives, and their little ones, and took the spoil of all their in-them-animal, and all their flocks, and all their goods. vayishbu bene yisra’el neshei midyan ve’et tapam, ve’et kal behemtam ve’et kal miqnehem ve’et kal khelam bazazu.
w1t kl 8ryhm bmwSbtm w1t kl Tyrtm Srpw b1S and they burnt all their cities wherein they dwelt, and all their goodly castles, with fire. ve’et kal ‘arehem bemoshebotam ve’et kal tirotam, sarefu ba’esh.
wyqHw 1t kl hSll w1t kl hmlqwH b1dm wbbhmh and they took all the spoil, and all the prey, both of men and of beasts. vayiqkhu kal hashalal ve’et kal hamalqoakh, ba’adam ubabehemah.
wyb1w 1l mSh w1l 1l8zr hkhn w1l 8dt bny ySr1l 1t hSby w1t hmlqwH w1t hSll 1l hmHnh 1l 8rbt mw1b 1Sr 8l yrdn yrHw and they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil, unto extracted-mose, and towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, and unto the until-witness of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, unto the camp at the plains of from-father-moab, which are by its-going-down-jordan near moon-smell-jericho. vayabi’u ’el mosheh ve’el ’el‘azar hakohen ve’el ‘adat bene yisra’el hashebi ve’et hamalqoakh ve’et hashalal ’el hamakhaneh, ’el ‘arbot mo’ab ’asher ‘al yarden yerekho.
wyZ1w mSh w1l8zr hkhn wkl nSy1y h8dh lqr1tm 1l mHwZ lmHnh and extracted-mose, and towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, and all the princes of the until-witness, went forth to until-witness them without the camp. vayeze’u mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen vekhal nesi’ei ha‘edah liqratam, ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wyqZp mSh 8l pqwdy hHyl Sry h1lpym wSry hm1wt hb1ym mZb1 hmlHmh and extracted-mose was wroth with the officers of the troop-cluster, with the captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, which came from the battle. vayiqzof mosheh ‘al pequdei hekhayil, sarei ha’alafim vesarei hame’ot haba’im mizeba hamilkhamah.
wy1mr 1lyhm mSh hHyytm kl nqbh and extracted-mose said unto them, have ye saved all the women alive? vayomer ’alehem mosheh, hakhiyitem kal neqebah.
hn hnh hyw lbny ySr1l bdbr bl8m lmsr m8l byhwh 8l dbr p8wr wthy hmgph b8dt yhwh behold, these caused children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, through the counsel of swallow-baalam, to commit fire-name to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou in the matter of peor, and there was a plague among the until-witness of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. hen henah hayu libnei yisra’el bidbar bil‘am limsar ma‘al yhvh ‘al debar pe‘or, vatehi hamagefah ba‘adat yhvh.
w8th hrgw kl zkr bTp wkl 1Sh yd8t 1yS lmSkb zkr hrgw now therefore kill every rememberer among the little ones, and kill every woman that hath hand-known man by lying with him. ve‘atah hirgu khal zakhar bataf, vekhal ’ishah yoda‘at ’ish lemishkab zakhar harogu.
wkl hTp bnSym 1Sr l1 yd8w mSkb zkr hHyw lkm and all the women children-betweens, that have not hand-known a man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves. vekhol hataf banashim ’asher lo yade‘u mishkab zakhar, hakhayu lakhem.
w1tm Hnw mHwZ lmHnh Sb8t ymym kl hrg npS wkl ng8 bHll ttHT1w bywm hSlySy wbywm hSby8y 1tm wSbykm and do ye abide without the camp seven days: whosoever hath killed any person, and whosoever hath touched any slain, purify both yourselves and your captives on the third day, and on the seventh day. ve’atem khanu mikhuz lamakhaneh shib‘at yamim, kol horeg nefesh vekhol nogea‘ bekhalal titkhate’u bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i ’atem ushebikhem.
wkl bgd wkl kly 8wr wkl m8Sh 8zym wkl kly 8Z ttHT1w and purify all your raiment, and all that is made of light-skins, and all work of intense-goats' gate-hair, and all things made of wood. vekhal beged vekhal keli ‘or vekhal ma‘aseh ‘izim vekhal ‘ez, titkhata’u.
wy1mr 1l8zr hkhn 1l 1nSy hZb1 hb1ym lmlHmh z1t Hqt htwrh 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server said unto the men of troop-cluster which went to the battle, this is the ordinance of the teaching which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose; vayomer ’el‘azar hakohen ’el ’anshei hazaba haba’im lamilkhamah, zot khuqat hatorah ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
1k 1t hzhb w1t hksp 1t hnHSt 1t hbrzl 1t hbdyl w1t h8prt only the gold, and the silver, the brass, the iron, the tin, and the lead, ’akh hazahab ve’et hakasef, hanekhoshet habarzel habedil ve’et ha‘ofaret.
kl dbr 1Sr yb1 b1S t8byrw b1S wThr 1k bmy ndh ytHT1 wkl 1Sr l1 yb1 b1S t8byrw bmym every thing that may abide the fire, ye make it go through the fire, and it be bright-climaxing: nevertheless it be purified with the from-waters of separation: and all that abideth not the fire ye make go through the from-waters. kal dabar ’asher yabo ba’esh ta‘abiru ba’esh vetaher ’akh bemei nidah yitkhata, vekhol ’asher lo yabo ba’esh ta‘abiru bamayim.

wHZyt 1t hmlqwH byn tpSy hmlHmh hyZ1ym lZb1 wbyn kl h8dh and divide the prey into two parts; between-bin them that took the war upon them, who went out to battle, and between-bin all the until-witness: vekhazita hamalqoakh ben tofesei hamilkhamah hayoze’im lazaba, uben kal ha‘edah.
whrmt mks lyhwh m1t 1nSy hmlHmh hyZ1ym lZb1 1Hd npS mHmS hm1wt mn h1dm wmn hbqr wmn hHmrym wmn hZ1n and levy a tribute unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou of the men of troop-cluster which went out to battle: one being of five hundred, both of the persons, and of the beeves, and of the asses, and of the sheep: vaharemota mekhes yhvh me’et ’anshei hamilkhamah hayoze’im lazaba ’ekhad nefesh mekhamesh hame’ot, min ha’adam umin habaqar umin hakhamorim umin hazon.
mmHZytm tqHw wntth l1l8zr hkhn trwmt yhwh take it of their half, and give it unto towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, for an raise-rum of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. mimakhazitam tiqakhu, venatatah le’el‘azar hakohen terumat yhvh.
wmmHZt bny ySr1l tqH 1Hd 1Hz mn hHmSym mn h1dm mn hbqr mn hHmrym wmn hZ1n mkl hbhmh wntth 1tm llwym Smry mSmrt mSkn yhwh and of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel's half, thou take one portion of fifty, of the beings of man, of the beeves, of the asses, and of the flocks, of all manner of beasts, and give them unto the join-levites, which keep the charge of the dwelling of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. umimakhazit bene yisra’el tiqakh ’ekhad ’akhuz min hakhamishim min ha’adam min habaqar min hakhamorim umin hazon mikal habehemah, venatatah ’otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan yhvh.

wyqH mSh mmHZt bny ySr1l 1t h1Hz 1Hd mn hHmSym mn h1dm wmn hbhmh wytn 1tm llwym Smry mSmrt mSkn yhwh k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh even of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel's half, extracted-mose took one portion of fifty, both of man and of beast, and gave them unto the join-levites, which kept the charge of the dwelling of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vayiqakh mosheh mimakhazit bene yisra’el ha’akhuz ’ekhad min hakhamishim min ha’adam umin habehemah, vayiten ’otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan yhvh ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqrbw 1l mSh hpqdym 1Sr l1lpy hZb1 Sry h1lpym wSry hm1wt and the officers which were over thousands of the troop-cluster, the soaked-princes of thousands, and soaked-princes of hundreds, came near unto extracted-mose: vayiqrebu ’el mosheh hapequdim ’asher le’alfei hazaba, sarei ha’alafim vesarei hame’ot.

wnqrb 1t qrbn yhwh 1yS 1Sr mZ1 kly zhb 1Z8dh wZmyd Tb8t 8gyl wkwmz lkpr 8l npStynw lpny yhwh we have therefore brought an inward for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, what every man hath gotten, of jewels of gold, chains, and bracelets, rings, earrings, and tablets, to make an out-of-town-ment for our beings before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vanaqreb qareban yhvh ’ish ’asher maza kheli zahab ’ez‘adah vezamid taba‘at ‘agil vekhumaz, lekhaper ‘al nafshotenu lifnei yhvh.

wyhy kl zhb htrwmh 1Sr hrymw lyhwh SSh 8Sr 1lp Sb8 m1wt wHmSym Sql m1t Sry h1lpym wm1t Sry hm1wt and all the gold of the inward that they inwarded up to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty light-shekels. vayhi kal zehab haterumah ’asher herimu yhvh shishah ‘asar ’elef sheba‘ me’ot vakhamishim shaqel, me’et sarei ha’alafim ume’et sarei hame’ot.
1nSy hZb1 bzzw 1yS lw (for the men of war had taken spoil, every man for himself.) ’anshei hazaba bazezu ’ish lo.
wyqH mSh w1l8zr hkhn 1t hzhb m1t Sry h1lpym whm1wt wyb1w 1tw 1l 1hl mw8d zkrwn lbny ySr1l lpny yhwh and extracted-mose and towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the tent of until-conception, for a memorial for children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayiqakh mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen hazahab me’et sarei ha’alafim vehame’ot, vayabi’u ’oto ’el ’ohel mo‘ed zikaron libne yisra’el lifnei yhvh.
wmqnh rb hyh lbny r1wbn wlbny gd 8Zwm m1d wyr1w 1t 1rZ y8zr w1t 1rZ gl8d whnh hmqwm mqwm mqnh now children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben and children-betweens of luck-gad had a very great multitude of in-them-animal: and when they saw the land of jazer, and the land of roll-until-heap-gilead, that, behold, the place was a place for in-them-animal; umiqneh rab hayah libnei re’uben velibne gad ‘azum me’od, vayir’u ’erez ya‘zer ve’et ’erez gil‘ad vehineh hamaqom meqom miqneh.
wyb1w bny gd wbny r1wbn wy1mrw 1l mSh w1l 1l8zr hkhn w1l nSy1y h8dh l1mr children-betweens of luck-gad and children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben came and spake unto extracted-mose, and to towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, and unto the princes of the until-witness, saying, vayabo’u bene gad ubenei re’uben, vayomeru ’el mosheh ve’el ’el‘azar hakohen ve’el nesi’ei ha‘edah lemor.
8Trwt wdybn wy8zr wnmrh wHSbwn w1l8lh wSbm wnbw wb8n decorate-crown-atarot, and slander-dibon, and jazer, and nimrah, and score-heshbon, and top-to-no-eleale, and coming-shebam, and at-him-nebo, and beon, ‘atarot vedibon veya‘zer venimrah vekheshbon ve’el‘aleh, usebam unebo ube‘on.
h1rZ 1Sr hkh yhwh lpny 8dt ySr1l 1rZ mqnh hw1 wl8bdyk mqnh even the country which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou smote before-turns the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel, is a land for in-them-animal, and thy workers have in-them-animal: ha’arez ’asher hikah yhvh lifnei ‘adat yisra’el ’erez miqneh hi vela‘abadekha miqneh.
wy1mrw 1m mZ1nw Hn b8ynyk ytn 1t h1rZ hz1t l8bdyk l1Hzh 1l t8brnw 1t hyrdn wherefore, said they, if we have found attractiveness in thy sight, let this land be given unto thy workers for a possession, and bring us not over its-going-down-jordan. vayomeru ’im mazanu khen be‘enekha yutan ha’arez hazot la‘abadekha la’akhuzah, ’al ta‘abirenu hayarden.
wy1mr mSh lbny gd wlbny r1wbn h1Hykm yb1w lmlHmh w1tm tSbw ph and extracted-mose said unto children-betweens of luck-gad and to children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben, your brethren go to war, and ye sit here? vayomer mosheh libne gad velibnei re’uben, ha’akhekhem yabo’u lamilkhamah ve’atem teshebu foh.
wlmh tnw1wn tny1wn 1t lb bny ySr1l m8br 1l h1rZ 1Sr ntn lhm yhwh and wherefore discourage ye the heart of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel from going over into the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath given them? velamah teni’un leb benei yisra’el, me‘abor ’el ha’arez ’asher natan lahem yhvh.
kh 8Sw 1btykm bSlHy 1tm mqdS brn8 lr1wt 1t h1rZ thus did your fathers, when i sent them from finished-desert-staggering-kadeshbarnea to see the land. koh ‘asu ’abotekhem, beshalekhi ’otam miqadesh barnea‘ lir’ot ha’arez.
wy8lw 8d nHl 1Skwl wyr1w 1t h1rZ wyny1w 1t lb bny ySr1l lblty b1 1l h1rZ 1Sr ntn lhm yhwh for when they went up unto the valley of fire-all-eshcol, and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they should not go into the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had given them. vaya‘alu ‘ad nakhal ’eshkol vayir’u ha’arez vayani’u leb benei yisra’el, lebilti bo ’el ha’arez ’asher natan lahem yhvh.
wyHr 1p yhwh bywm hhw1 wySb8 l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's nose-anger was kindled the same time, and he sware, saying, vayikhar ’af yhvh bayom hahu, vayishaba‘ lemor.
1m yr1w h1nSym h8lym mmZrym mbn 8Srym Snh wm8lh 1t h1dmh 1Sr nSb8ty l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb ky l1 ml1w 1Hry surely none of the men that came up out of narrows-mizraim, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, see the land which i sware unto their-dick-abraham, unto laughter-isaac, and unto backstreet-jacob; because they have not wholly followed me: ’im yir’u ha’anashim ha‘olim mimizrayim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ti le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob, ki lo mil’u ’akharay.
blty klb bn ypnh hqnzy wyhwS8 bn nwn ky ml1w 1Hry yhwh save as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh the kenezite, and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun: for they have wholly followed yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. bilti kaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi vihoshua‘ bin nun, ki mil’u ’akharei yhvh.
wyHr 1p yhwh bySr1l wyn8m bmdbr 1rb8ym Snh 8d tm kl hdwr h8Sh hr8 b8yny yhwh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's nose-anger was kindled against saturated-towards-israel, and he made them wander in the place-of-word-desert forty years, until all the generation, that had done bad in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, was consumed. vayikhar ’af yhvh beyisra’el vayni‘em bamidbar ’arba‘im shanah, ‘ad tom kal hador ha‘oseh hara‘ be‘enei yhvh.
whnh qmtm tHt 1btykm trbwt 1nSym HT1ym lspwt 8wd 8l Hrwn 1p yhwh 1l ySr1l and, behold, ye are risen up in your fathers' stead, an increase of missing men, to augment yet the fierce nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou toward saturated-towards-israel. vehineh qamtem takhat ’abotekhem tarbut ’anashim khata’im, lispot ‘od ‘al kharon ’af yhvh ’el yisra’el.
ky tSwbn m1Hryw wysp 8wd lhnyHw bmdbr wSHtm lkl h8m hzh for if ye turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the place-of-word-desert; and ye destroy all this with-mum-people. ki teshubun me’akharav veyasaf ‘od lehanikho bamidbar, veshikhatem lekhal ha‘am hazeh.
wygSw 1lyw wy1mrw gdrt Z1n nbnh lmqnnw ph w8rym lTpnw and they came near unto him, and said, we will between-build sheepfolds here for our in-them-animal, and cities for our little ones: vayigeshu ’elav vayomeru gidrot zon nibneh lemiqnenu poh, ve‘arim letapenu.
w1nHnw nHlZ HSym lpny bny ySr1l 8d 1Sr 1m hby1nm 1l mqwmm wySb Tpnw b8ry hmbZr mpny ySby h1rZ and we ourselves will go ready armed before-turns children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, until we have brought them unto their place: and our little ones dwell in the fenced cities because of the inhabitants of the land. va’anakhnu nekhalez khushim lifnei benei yisra’el ‘ad ’asher ’im habi’onum ’el meqomam, veyashab tapenu be‘arei hamibzar mipenei yoshebei ha’arez.
l1 nSwb 1l btynw 8d htnHl bny ySr1l 1yS nHltw we will not return unto our daughter-houses, until children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel have inherited every man his inheritance. lo nashub ’el batenu, ‘ad hitnakhel benei yisra’el ’ish nakhalato.
ky l1 nnHl 1tm m8br lyrdn whl1h ky b1h nHltnw 1lynw m8br hyrdn mzrHh for we will not inherit with them on yonder side its-going-down-jordan, or forward; because our inheritance is fallen to us on this side its-going-down-jordan eastward. ki lo ninkhal ’itam me‘eber layarden vahale’ah, ki ba’ah nakhalatenu ’elenu me‘eber hayarden mizrakhah.
wy1mr 1lyhm mSh 1m t8Swn 1t hdbr hzh 1m tHlZw lpny yhwh lmlHmh and extracted-mose said unto them, if ye will do this thing, if ye will go armed before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to war, vayomer ’alehem mosheh ’im ta‘asun hadabar hazeh, ’im tekhalezu lifnei yhvh lamilkhamah.
w8br lkm kl HlwZ 1t hyrdn lpny yhwh 8d hwrySw 1t 1ybyw mpnyw and will go all of you pioneering over its-going-down-jordan before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, until he hath driven out his father-adversaries from before-turns him, ve‘abar lakhem kal khaluz hayarden lifnei yhvh, ‘ad horisho ’oyebav mipanav.
wnkbSh h1rZ lpny yhwh w1Hr tSbw whyytm nqyym myhwh wmySr1l whyth h1rZ hz1t lkm l1Hzh lpny yhwh and the land be lambed before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: then afterward ye return, and be guiltless before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and before-turns saturated-towards-israel; and this land be your possession before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. venikhbeshah ha’arez lifnei yhvh ve’akhar tashubu vihyitem neqiyim yhvh umiyisra’el, vehayetah ha’arez hazot lakhem la’akhuzah lifnei yhvh.
w1m l1 t8Swn kn hnh HT1tm lyhwh wd8w HT1tkm 1Sr tmZ1 1tkm and if ye will not do so, behold, ye have missed to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and be sure your miss will find you out. ve’im lo ta‘asun ken hineh khatatem yhvh, ude‘u khatatkhem ’asher timza ’etkhem.
bnw lkm 8rym lTpkm wgdrt lZn1km whyZ1 mpykm t8Sw between-build you cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which hath proceeded out of your mouth. benu lakhem ‘arim letapekhem ugederot lezona’akhem, vehayozei mipikhem ta‘asu.
wy1mr bny gd wbny r1wbn 1l mSh l1mr 8bdyk y8Sw k1Sr 1dny mZwh and children-betweens of luck-gad and children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben spake unto extracted-mose, saying, thy workers will do as my lord-base order-prescribeeth. vayomer bene gad ubenei re’uben ’el mosheh lemor, ‘abadekha ya‘asu ka’asher ’adoni mezaveh.

wyZw lhm mSh 1t 1l8zr hkhn w1t yhwS8 bn nwn w1t r1Sy 1bwt hmTwt lbny ySr1l so concerning them extracted-mose order-prescribed towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun, and the chief fathers of the branchs of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: vayzav lahem mosheh ’el‘azar hakohen ve’et yehoshua‘ bin nun, ve’et rashei ’abot hamatot libnei yisra’el.
wy1mr mSh 1lhm 1m y8brw bny gd wbny r1wbn 1tkm 1t hyrdn kl HlwZ lmlHmh lpny yhwh wnkbSh h1rZ lpnykm wnttm lhm 1t 1rZ hgl8d l1Hzh and extracted-mose said unto them, if children-betweens of luck-gad and children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben will pass with you over its-going-down-jordan, every man armed to battle, before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and the land be subdued before-turns you; then ye give them the land of roll-until-heap-gilead for a possession: vayomer mosheh ’alehem ’im ya‘abru bene gad ubene re’uben ’itekhem hayarden kal khaluz lamilkhamah lifnei yhvh venikhbeshah ha’arez lifnekhem, unetatem lahem ’erez hagil‘ad la’akhuzah.
