nHnw n8br HlwZym lpny yhwh 1rZ kn8n w1tnw 1Hzt nHltnw m8br lyrdn we will pass over pioneering before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou into the land of mobile-trade-canaan, that the possession of our inheritance on this side its-going-down-jordan may be ours. nakhnu na‘abor khaluzim lifnei yhvh ’erez kena‘an, ve’itanu ’akhuzat nakhalatenu me‘eber layarden.
wytn lhm mSh lbny gd wlbny r1wbn wlHZy SbT mnSh bn ywsp 1t mmlkt syHn mlk h1mry w1t mmlkt 8wg mlk hbSn h1rZ l8ryh bgblt 8ry h1rZ sbyb and extracted-mose gave unto them, even to children-betweens of luck-gad, and to children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben, and unto half the branch of place-of-sleep-manasseh child-between of add-joseph, the moloch-kingdom of curly-sihon moloch-king of the talker-amorites, and the moloch-kingdom of mock-og moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan, the land, with the cities thereof in the coasts, even the cities of the country round about. vayiten lahem mosheh libne gad velibnei re’uben velakhazi shebet menasheh ben yosef mamlekhet sikhon melekh ha’emori ve’et mamlekhet ‘og melekh habashan, ha’arez le‘areha bigbulot ‘arei ha’arez sabib.
wybnw bny gd 1t dybn w1t 8Trt w1t 8r8r and children-betweens of luck-gad between-built slander-dibon, and decorate-crown-atarot, and juniper-object-aroer, vayibnu bene gad dibon ve’et ‘atarot, ve’et ‘aro‘er.
w1t 8Trt Swpn w1t y8zr wygbhh and decorate-crown-atrot, rabbit-shophan, and help-jaazer, and rise-jogbehah, ve’et shofan ve’et ya‘zer veyagebohah.
w1t byt nmrh w1t byt hrn 8ry mbZr wgdrt Z1n and house-of-leopardess-betnimrah, and house-of-sing-betharan, fenced cities: and folds for sheep. ve’et bet nimrah ve’et bet haran, ‘arei mibzar vegidrot zon.
wbny r1wbn bnw 1t HSbwn w1t 1l8l1 w1t qrytym and children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben between-built score-heshbon, and top-to-no-eleale, and towns-kirjatim, ubenei re’uben banu kheshbon ve’et ’el‘ale, ve’et qiryatayim.
w1t nbw w1t b8l m8wn mwsbt Sm w1t Sbmh wyqr1w bSmt 1t Smwt h8rym 1Sr bnw and at-him-nebo, and residence-of-owner-baal-baalmeon, (their names being changed,) and stage-shibmah: and gave other names unto the cities which they between-between-builded. ve’et nebo ve’et ba‘al me‘on musabot shem ve’et sibmah, vayiqre’u shemot he‘arim ’asher banu.
wylkw bny mkyr bn mnSh gl8dh wylkdh wywrS 1t h1mry 1Sr bh and children-betweens of recognize-of-beat-machir child-between of place-of-sleep-manasseh went to roll-until-heap-gilead, and took it, and dispossessed the talker-amorite which was in it. vayelekhu benei makhir ben menasheh gil‘adah vayilkeduha, vayoresh ha’emori ’asher bah.
wytn mSh 1t hgl8d lmkyr bn mnSh wySb bh and extracted-mose gave roll-until-heap-gilead unto recognize-of-beat-machir child-between of place-of-sleep-manasseh; and he dwelt therein. vayiten mosheh hagil‘ad lemakhir ben menasheh, vayesheb bah.
wy1yr bn mnSh hlk wylkd 1t Hwtyhm wyqr1 1thn Hwt y1yr and glow-jair child-between of place-of-sleep-manasseh went and took the small towns thereof, and called them farm-of-glow-havotjair. veya’ir ben menasheh halakh vayilkod khavotehem, vayiqra ’ethen khavot ya’ir.
wnbH hlk wylkd 1t qnt w1t bntyh wyqr1 lh nbH bSmw and bark-abuse-nobah went and took elegy-kenat, and the villages thereof, and called it bark-abuse-nobah, after his own name. venobakh halakh vayilkod qenat ve’et benoteha, vayiqra lah nobakh bishmo.
1lh ms8y bny ySr1l 1Sr yZ1w m1rZ mZrym lZb1tm byd mSh w1hrn these are the journeys of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, which went forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim with their troop-clusters under the hand of extracted-mose and cabinet-aaron. ’eleh mas‘ei bene yisra’el ’asher yaze’u me’erez mizrayim lezib’otam, beyad mosheh ve’aharon.
wyktb mSh 1t mwZ1yhm lms8yhm 8l py yhwh w1lh ms8yhm lmwZ1yhm and extracted-mose wrote their goings out according to their journeys by the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: and these are their journeys according to their goings out. vayikhtob mosheh moza’ehem lemas‘ehem ‘al pi yhvh, ve’eleh mas‘ehem lemoza’ehem.
wys8w mr8mss bHdS hr1Swn bHmSh 8Sr ywm lHdS hr1Swn mmHrt hpsH yZ1w bny ySr1l byd rmh l8yny kl mZrym and they departed from born-by-ra-voiceless-ramses in the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month; on the morrow after the passover children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel went out with an high hand in the sight of all the narrows-mizraimians. vayis‘u mera‘meses bakhodesh harishon bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh harishon, mimakhorat hapesakh yaze’u bene yisra’el beyad ramah le‘enei kal mizrayim.
wmZrym mqbrym 1t 1Sr hkh yhwh bhm kl bkwr wb1lhyhm 8Sh yhwh SpTym for the narrows-mizraimians buried all their firstborn, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had smitten among them: upon their towards-these-elohim also yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou executed decision-grammars. umizrayim meqaberim ’asher hikah yhvh bahem kal bekhor, ubelohehem ‘asah yhvh shefatim.
wys8w bny ySr1l mr8mss wyHnw bskt and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel removed from born-by-ra-voiceless-ramses, and pitched in booths-succoth. vayis‘u bene yisra’el mera‘meses, vayakhanu besukot.
wys8w mskt wyHnw b1tm 1Sr bqZh hmdbr and they departed from booths-succoth, and pitched in you-etam, which is in the edge of the place-of-word-desert. vayis‘u misukot, vayakhanu be’etam ’asher biqzeh hamidbar.
wys8w m1tm wySb 8l py hHyrt 1Sr 8l pny b8l Zpwn wyHnw lpny mgdl and they removed from you-etam, and turned again unto mouth-of-the-choice-pihahirot, which is before-turns owner-of-cipher-baalzephon: and they pitched before-turns tower-migdol. vayis‘u me’etam vayashab ‘al hakhirot ’asher ‘al penei ba‘al zefon, vayakhanu lifnei migdol.
wys8w mpny hHyrt wy8brw btwk hym hmdbrh wylkw drk SlSt ymym bmdbr 1tm wyHnw bmrh and they departed from before-turns mouth-of-the-choice-pihahirot, and passed through the midst of the sea into the place-of-word-desert, and went three days' journey in the place-of-word-desert of you-etam, and pitched in bitter-marah. vayis‘u mipenei hakhirot vaya‘abru betokh hayam hamidbarah, vayelekhu derekh sheloshet yamim bemidbar ’etam vayakhanu bemarah.
wys8w mmrh wyb1w 1ylmh wb1ylm Stym 8Srh 8ynt mym wSb8ym tmrym wyHnw Sm and they removed from bitter-marah, and came unto bind-elim: and in bind-elim were twelve fountains of from-waters, and threescore and ten palm trees; and they pitched there. vayis‘u mimarah vayabo’u ’elimah, ube’elim shetem ‘esreh ‘enot mayim veshib‘im temarim vayakhanu sham.
wys8w m1ylm wyHnw 8l ym swp and they removed from bind-elim, and encamped by the end sea. vayis‘u me’elim, vayakhanu ‘al yam suf.
wys8w mym swp wyHnw bmdbr syn and they removed from the end sea, and encamped in the place-of-word-desert of miss. vayis‘u miyam suf, vayakhanu bemidbar sin.
wys8w mmdbr syn wyHnw bdpqh and they took their journey out of the place-of-word-desert of miss, and encamped in knock-dophkah. vayis‘u mimidbar sin, vayakhanu bedafeqah.
wys8w mdpqh wyHnw b1lwS and they departed from knock-dophkah, and encamped in knead-alush. vayis‘u midafeqah, vayakhanu be’alush.
wys8w m1lwS wyHnw brpydm wl1 hyh Sm mym l8m lStwt and they removed from knead-alush, and encamped at upholstery-rephidim, where was no from-waters for the with-mum-people to drink. vayis‘u me’alush, vayakhanu birfidim velo hayah sham mayim la‘am lishtot.
wys8w mrpydm wyHnw bmdbr syny and they departed from upholstery-rephidim, and pitched in the place-of-word-desert of bush-(proto-)sinai. vayis‘u merefidim, vayakhanu bemidbar sinay.
wys8w mmdbr syny wyHnw bqbrt ht1wh and they removed from the place-of-word-desert of bush-missai, and pitched at graveyard-of-craving-kibrot-hatavah. vayis‘u mimidbar sinay, vayakhanu beqibrot hata’avah.
wys8w mqbrt ht1wh wyHnw bHZrt and they departed from graveyard-of-craving-kibrot-hatavah, and encamped at gardens-hazerot. vayis‘u miqibrot hata’avah, vayakhanu bakhazerot.
wys8w mHZrt wyHnw brtmh and they departed from gardens-hazerot, and pitched in harness-ritmah. vayis‘u mekhazerot, vayakhanu beritmah.
wys8w mrtmh wyHnw brmn prZ and they departed from harness-ritmah, and pitched at pomegranate-breach-rimonparez. vayis‘u meritmah, vayakhanu berimon parez.
wys8w mrmn prZ wyHnw blbnh and they departed from pomegranate-breach-rimonparez, and pitched in white-build-libnah. vayis‘u merimon parez, vayakhanu belibnah.
wys8w mlbnh wyHnw brsh and they removed from white-build-libnah, and pitched at her-eyelash-risah. vayis‘u milibnah, vayakhanu berisah.
wys8w mrsh wyHnw bqhlth and they journeyed from her-eyelash-risah, and pitched in her-congregation-kelelatah. vayis‘u merisah, vayakhanu biqhelatah.
wys8w mqhlth wyHnw bhr Spr and they went from her-congregation-kelelatah, and pitched in mount boost-bull-shapher. vayis‘u miqehelatah, vayakhanu behar shafer.
wys8w mhr Spr wyHnw bHrdh and they removed from mount boost-bull-shapher, and encamped in anxiety-haradah. vayis‘u mehar shafer, vayakhanu bakharadah.
wys8w mHrdh wyHnw bmqhlt and they removed from anxiety-haradah, and pitched in of-community-makheloth. vayis‘u mekharadah, vayakhanu bemaqhelot.
wys8w mmqhlt wyHnw btHt and they removed from of-community-makheloth, and encamped at under-tahat. vayis‘u mimaqhelot, vayakhanu betakhat.
wys8w mtHt wyHnw btrH and they departed from under-tahat, and pitched at effort-tarah. vayis‘u mitakhat, vayakhanu betarakh.
wys8w mtrH wyHnw bmtqh and they removed from effort-tarah, and pitched in sweetening-mitcah. vayis‘u mitarakh, vayakhanu bemitqah.
wys8w mmtqh wyHnw bHSmnh and they went from sweetening-mitcah, and pitched in eight-rain-hashmonah. vayis‘u mimitqah, vayakhanu bekhashmonah.
wys8w mHSmnh wyHnw bmsrwt and they departed from eight-rain-hashmonah, and encamped at deliveries-moseroth. vayis‘u mekhashmonah, vayakhanu bemoserot.
wys8w mmsrwt wyHnw bbny y8qn and they departed from deliveries-moseroth, and pitched in between-children-of-corner-benejaakan. vayis‘u mimoserot, vayakhanu bibnei ya‘aqan.
wys8w mbny y8qn wyHnw bHr hgdgd and they removed from between-children-of-corner-benejaakan, and encamped at the-tickle. vayis‘u mibenei ya‘aqan, vayakhanu bekhor hagidgad.
wys8w mHr hgdgd wyHnw byTbth and they went from the-tickle, and pitched in her-fourth-month-jotbatah. vayis‘u mekhor hagidgad, vayakhanu beyatebatah.
wys8w myTbth wyHnw b8brnh and they removed from her-fourth-month-jotbatah, and encamped at pass-traverse-ebronah. vayis‘u miyatebatah, vayakhanu be‘abronah.
wys8w m8brnh wyHnw b8Zywn gbr and they departed from pass-traverse-ebronah, and encamped at wood-strong-man-eziongaber. vayis‘u me‘abronah, vayakhanu be‘ezyon gaber.
wys8w m8Zywn gbr wyHnw bmdbr Zn hw1 qdS and they removed from wood-strong-man-eziongaber, and pitched in the place-of-word-desert of briar-zin, which is dedicated-finished-kadesh. vayis‘u me‘ezyon gaber, vayakhanu bemidbar zin hi qadesh.
wys8w mqdS wyHnw bhr hhr bqZh 1rZ 1dwm and they removed from dedicated-finished-kadesh, and pitched in mount mount-hor, in the edge of the land of man-edom. vayis‘u miqadesh, vayakhanu behor hahar biqzeh ’erez ’edom.
wy8l 1hrn hkhn 1l hr hhr 8l py yhwh wymt Sm bSnt h1rb8ym lZ1t bny ySr1l m1rZ mZrym bHdS hHmySy b1Hd lHdS and cabinet-aaron the dimmer-server went up into mount mount-hor at the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and died there, in the fortieth year after children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel were come out of the land of narrows-mizraim, in the first day of the fifth month. vaya‘al ’aharon hakohen ’el hor hahar ‘al pi yhvh vayamat sham, bishnat ha’arba‘im lezet bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim bakhodesh hakhamishi be’ekhad lakhodesh.
w1hrn bn SlS w8Srym wm1t Snh bmtw bhr hhr and cabinet-aaron was an hundred and double-ten-twenty and three years old when he died in mount mount-hor. ve’aharon ben shalosh ve‘esrim ume’at shanah, bemoto behor hahar.
wySm8 hkn8ny mlk 8rd whw1 ySb bngb b1rZ kn8n bb1 bny ySr1l and moloch-king bronze-arad the mobile-trade-canaanite, which dwelt in the dry-south in the land of mobile-trade-canaan, heard of the coming of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayishma‘ hakena‘ani melekh ‘arad vehu yosheb banegeb be’erez kena‘an, bebo benei yisra’el.
wys8w mhr hhr wyHnw bZlmnh and they departed from mount mount-hor, and pitched in image-idol-zalmonah. vayis‘u mehor hahar, vayakhanu bezalmonah.
wys8w mZlmnh wyHnw bpwnn and they departed from image-idol-zalmonah, and pitched in found-punon. vayis‘u mizalmonah, vayakhanu befunon.
wys8w mpwnn wyHnw b1bt and they departed from found-punon, and pitched in thick-oboth. vayis‘u mipunon, vayakhanu be’obot.
wys8w m1bt wyHnw b8yy h8brym bgbwl mw1b and they departed from thick-oboth, and pitched in heaps-crossings-ijeabarim, in the border of from-father-moab. vayis‘u me’obot, vayakhanu be‘iyei ha‘abarim bigbul mo’ab.
wys8w m8yym wyHnw bdybn gd and they departed from islands-iim, and pitched in slander-dibongad. vayis‘u me‘iyim, vayakhanu bedibon gad.
wys8w mdybn gd wyHnw b8lmn dbltymh and they removed from slander-dibongad, and encamped in the-hidden-fig-cakes-almon-diblataim. vayis‘u midibon gad, vayakhanu be‘almon diblatayemah.
wys8w m8lmn dbltymh wyHnw bhry h8brym lpny nbw and they removed from the-hidden-fig-cakes-almon-diblataim, and pitched in the mountains of crossings-over-abarim, before-turns at-him-nebo. vayis‘u me‘almon diblatayemah, vayakhanu beharei ha‘abarim lifnei nebo.
wys8w mhry h8brym wyHnw b8rbt mw1b 8l yrdn yrHw and they departed from the mountains of crossings-over-abarim, and pitched in the plains of from-father-moab by its-going-down-jordan near moon-smell-jericho. vayis‘u meharei ha‘abarim, vayakhanu be‘arbot mo’ab ‘al yarden yerekho.
wyHnw 8l hyrdn mbyt hySmt 8d 1bl hSTym b8rbt mw1b and they pitched by its-going-down-jordan, from desolate-house-betjesimot even unto vapor-abelshittim in the plains of from-father-moab. vayakhanu ‘al hayarden mibet hayshimot ‘ad hashitim, be‘arbot mo’ab.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh b8rbt mw1b 8l yrdn yrHw l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose in the plains of from-father-moab by its-going-down-jordan near moon-smell-jericho, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh be‘arbot mo’ab, ‘al yarden yerekho lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm ky 1tm 8brym 1t hyrdn 1l 1rZ kn8n speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when ye are passed over its-going-down-jordan into the land of mobile-trade-canaan; daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ki ’atem ‘oberim hayarden ’el ’erez kena‘an.
whwrStm 1t kl ySby h1rZ mpnykm w1bdtm 1t kl mSkytm w1t kl Zlmy msktm t1bdw w1t kl bmtm tSmydw then ye drive out all the inhabitants of the land from before-turns you, and destroy all their pictures, and destroy all their images, and quite pluck down all their high places: vehorashtem kal yoshebei ha’arez mipenekhem ve’ibadtem kal maskiyotam, ve’et kal zalmei masekhotam te’abedu ve’et kal bamotam tashmidu.
whwrStm 1t h1rZ wySbtm bh ky lkm ntty 1t h1rZ lrSt 1th and ye dispossess the inhabitants of the land, and dwell therein: for i have given you the land to possess it. vehorashtem ha’arez vishabtem bah, ki lakhem natati ha’arez lareshet.
whtnHltm 1t h1rZ bgwrl lmSpHtykm lrb trbw 1t nHltw wlm8T tm8yT 1t nHltw 1l 1Sr yZ1 lw Smh hgwrl lw yhyh lmTwt 1btykm ttnHlw and ye divide the land by cover-lot for an inheritance among your families: and to the more ye give the more inheritance, and to the fewer ye give the less inheritance: every man's inheritance be in the place where his lot falleth; according to the branchs of your fathers ye inherit. vehitnakhaltem ha’arez begoral lemishpekhotekhem larab tarbu nakhalato velam‘at tam‘it nakhalato ’el ’asher yezei lo shamah hagoral lo yihyeh, lematot ’abotekhem titnekhalu.
w1m l1 twrySw 1t ySby h1rZ mpnykm whyh 1Sr twtyrw mhm lSkym b8ynykm wlZnynm bZdykm wZrrw 1tkm 8l h1rZ 1Sr 1tm ySbym bh and if ye will not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before-turns you; then it come to pass, that those which ye let remain of them be pricks in your eyes, and thorns in your sides, and vex you in the land wherein ye dwell. ve’im lo torishu yoshebei ha’arez mipenekhem vehayah ’asher totiru mehem lesikim be‘enekhem velizninim bezidekhem, vezararu ’etkhem ‘al ha’arez ’asher ’atem yoshebim bah.
whyh k1Sr dmyty l8Swt lhm 18Sh lkm moreover it come to pass, that i do unto you, as i thought to do unto them. vehayah ka’asher dimiti la‘asot lahem ’e‘eseh lakhem.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Zw 1t bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm ky 1tm b1ym 1l h1rZ kn8n z1t h1rZ 1Sr tpl lkm bnHlh 1rZ kn8n lgbltyh order-prescribe children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when ye come into the land of mobile-trade-canaan; (this is the land that fall unto you for an inheritance, even the land of mobile-trade-canaan with the coasts thereof:) zav benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ki ’atem ba’im ’el ha’arez kena‘an, zot ha’arez ’asher tipol lakhem benakhalah ’erez kena‘an ligbuloteha.
whyh lkm p1t ngb mmdbr Zn 8l ydy 1dwm whyh lkm gbwl ngb mqZh ym hmlH qdmh then your dry-south quarter be from the place-of-word-desert of briar-zin along by the coast of man-edom, and your dry-south border be the outmost coast of the salt sea eastward: vehayah lakhem pe’at negeb mimidbar zin ‘al yedei ’edom, vehayah lakhem gebul negeb miqzeh yam hamelakh qedemah.
wnsb lkm hgbwl mngb lm8lh 8qrbym w8br Znh whyh whyw twZ1tyw mngb lqdS brn8 wyZ1 HZr 1dr w8br 8Zmnh and your border turn from the dry-south to the ascent of scorpions-akrabim, and pass on to briar-zin: and the going forth thereof be from the dry-south to finished-desert-staggering-kadeshbarnea, and go on to garden-maple-hazar-adar, and pass on to skeleton-azmon: venasab lakhem hagebul minegeb lema‘aleh ‘aqrabim ve‘abar zinah vehayah vehayu toz’otav minegeb leqadesh barnea‘, veyaza ’adar ve‘abar ‘azmonah.
wnsb hgbwl m8Zmwn nHlh mZrym whyw twZ1tyw hymh and the border fetch a compass from skeleton-azmon unto the river of narrows-mizraim, and the goings out of it be at the sea. venasab hagebul me‘azmon nakhlah mizrayim, vehayu toz’otav hayamah.
wgbwl ym whyh lkm hym hgdwl wgbwl zh yhyh lkm gbwl ym and as for the sea-western border, ye even have the great sea for a border: this be your sea-west border. ugebul yam vehayah lakhem hayam hagadol ugebul, zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul yam.
wzh yhyh lkm gbwl Zpwn mn hym hgdl tt1w lkm hr hhr and this be your hide-north border: from the great sea ye point out for you mount mount-hor: vezeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon, min hayam hagadol teta’u lakhem hor hahar.
mhr hhr tt1w lb1 Hmt whyw twZ1t hgbl Zddh from mount mount-hor ye point out your border unto the entrance of hot-hamath; and the goings forth of the border be to flank-zedad: mehor hahar teta’u lebo khamat, vehayu toz’ot hagebul zedadah.
wyZ1 hgbl zprnh whyw twZ1tyw HZr 8ynn zh yhyh lkm gbwl Zpwn and the border go on to sweet-smell-ziphron, and the goings out of it be at garden-eye-hazarenan: this be your hide-north border. veyaza hagebul zifronah vehayu toz’otav ‘enan, zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon.
wht1wytm lkm lgbwl qdmh mHZr 8ynn Spmh and ye point out your east border from garden-eye-hazarenan to moustache-shepham: vehit’avitem lakhem ligbul qedemah, mekhazar ‘enan shefamah.
wyrd hgbl mSpm hrblh mqdm l8yn wyrd hgbwl wmHh 8l ktp ym knrt qdmh and the coast go down from moustache-shepham to fight-riblah, on the east side of eye-ain; and the border descend, and reach unto the side of the sea of like-candle-kineret eastward: veyarad hagebul mishefam hariblah miqedem la‘ayin, veyarad hagebul umakhah ‘al ketef yam kineret qedemah.
wyrd hgbwl hyrdnh whyw twZ1tyw ym hmlH z1t thyh lkm h1rZ lgbltyh sbyb and the border go down to its-going-down-jordan, and the goings out of it be at the salt sea: this be your land with the coasts thereof round about. veyarad hagebul hayardenah vehayu toz’otav yam hamelakh, zot tihyeh lakhem ha’arez ligbuloteha sabib.
wyZw mSh 1t bny ySr1l l1mr z1t h1rZ 1Sr ttnHlw 1th bgwrl 1Sr Zwh yhwh ltt ltS8t hmTwt wHZy hmTh and extracted-mose order-prescribed children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, saying, this is the land which ye inherit by lot, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed to give unto the nine branchs, and to the half branch: vayzav mosheh benei yisra’el lemor, zot ha’arez ’asher titnakhalu ’otah begoral ’asher zivah yhvh latet letish‘at hamatot vakhazi hamateh.
ky lqHw mTh bny hr1wbny lbyt 1btm wmTh bny hgdy lbyt 1btm wHZy mTh mnSh lqHw nHltm for the branch of children-betweens of buddy-see-child-reuben according to the daughter-house of their fathers, and the branch of children-betweens of luck-gad according to the daughter-house of their fathers, have received their inheritance; and half the branch of place-of-sleep-manasseh have received their inheritance: ki laqekhu mateh benei har’ubeni lebet ’abotam umateh bene hagadi lebet ’abotam, vakhazi mateh menasheh laqekhu nakhalatam.
Sny hmTwt wHZy hmTh lqHw nHltm m8br lyrdn yrHw qdmh mzrHh the two branchs and the half branch have received their inheritance on this side its-going-down-jordan near moon-smell-jericho eastward, toward the sunrising. shenei hamatot vakhazi hamateh, laqekhu nakhalatam me‘eber leyarden yerekho qedemah mizrakhah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
1lh Smwt h1nSym 1Sr ynHlw lkm 1t h1rZ 1l8zr hkhn wyhwS8 bn nwn these are the names of the men which divide the land unto you: towards-stop-eleazar the dimmer-server, and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun. ’eleh shemot ha’anashim ’asher yinkhalu lakhem ha’arez, ’el‘azar hakohen vihoshua‘ bin nun.
wnSy1 1Hd nSy1 1Hd mmTh tqHw lnHl 1t h1rZ and ye take one prince of every branch, to divide the land by inheritance. venasi ’ekhad nasi ’ekhad mimateh, tiqkhu linkhol ha’arez.
w1lh Smwt h1nSym lmTh yhwdh klb bn ypnh and the names of the men are these: of the branch of know-judah, as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh. ve’eleh shemot ha’anashim, lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh.
wlmTh bny Sm8wn Smw1l bn 8myhwd and of the branch of children-betweens of hear-home-simeon, shemuel child-between of with-my-glory-amihud. ulemateh benei shim‘on shemu’el ben ‘amihud.
lmTh bnymn 1lydd bn kslwn of the branch of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin, my-towards-breast-elidad child-between of fool-basket-chislon. lemateh binyamin ’elidad ben kislon.
wlmTh bny dn nSy1 bqy bn ygly and the branch of children-betweens of discuss-dan, skilled-buki child-between of my-roll-jogli. ulemateh bene dan nasi, buqi ben yageli.
lbny ywsp lmTh bny mnSh nSy1 Hny1l bn 1pd the prince of children-betweens of add-joseph, for the branch of children-betweens of place-of-sleep-manasseh, grace-towards-haniel child-between of cash-in-ephod. libnei yosef lemateh bene menasheh nasi, khani’el ben ’efod.
wlmTh bny 1prym nSy1 qmw1l bn SpTn and the branch of children-betweens of fruitful-ephraim, get-up-towards-kemuel child-between of lip-shiphtan. ulemateh bene ’efrayim nasi, qemu’el ben shiftan.
wlmTh bny zbwln nSy1 1lyZpn bn prnk and the branch of children-betweens of fertile-zebulun, elizaphan child-between of bull-parnach. ulemateh bene zebulun nasi, ’elizafan ben parnakh.
wlmTh bny ySSkr nSy1 plTy1l bn 8zn and the branch of children-betweens of wage-issachar, emit-paltiel child-between of goat-courage-azan. ulemateh bene yisashkhar nasi, palti’el ben ‘azan.
wlmTh bny 1Sr nSy1 1Hyhwd bn Slmy and the branch of children-betweens of bliss-asher, ahihud child-between of my-peace-shelomi. ulemateh bene ’asher nasi, ’akhihud ben shelomi.
wlmTh bny nptly nSy1 pdh1l bn 8myhwd and the branch of children-betweens of twisted-naphtali, redemption-towards-pedahel child-between of with-my-glory-amihud. ulemateh bene naftali nasi, pedah’el ben ‘amihud.
1lh 1Sr Zwh yhwh lnHl 1t bny ySr1l b1rZ kn8n these are they whom yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed to divide the inheritance unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in the land of mobile-trade-canaan. ’eleh ’asher zivah yhvh, lenakhel bene yisra’el be’erez kena‘an.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh b8rbt mw1b 8l yrdn yrHw l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose in the plains of from-father-moab by its-going-down-jordan near moon-smell-jericho, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh be‘arbot mo’ab, ‘al yarden yerekho lemor.
Zw 1t bny ySr1l wntnw llwym mnHlt 1Hztm 8rym lSbt wmgrS l8rym sbybtyhm ttnw llwym order-prescribe children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, that they give unto the join-levites of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and ye give also unto the join-levites plots for the cities round about them. zav benei yisra’el venatenu lalviyim minakhalat ’akhuzatam ‘arim lashabet, umigrash le‘arim sebibotehem titenu lalviyim.
whyw h8rym lhm lSbt wmgrSyhm yhyw lbhmtm wlrkSm wlkl Hytm and the cities they have to dwell in; and the plots of them be for their in-them-animal, and for their goods, and for all their beasts. vehayu he‘arim lahem lashabet, umigreshehem yihyu libhemtam velirkhusham ulekhol khayatam.
wmgrSy h8rym 1Sr ttnw llwym mqyr h8yr wHwZh 1lp 1mh sbyb and the plots of the cities, which ye give unto the join-levites, reach from the wall of the light-city and outward a thousand cubits round about. umigreshei he‘arim ’asher titenu lalviyim, miqir ha‘ir vakhuzah ’elef ’amah sabib.
wmdtm mHwZ l8yr 1t p1t qdmh 1lpym b1mh w1t p1t ngb 1lpym b1mh w1t p1t ym 1lpym b1mh w1t p1t Zpwn 1lpym b1mh wh8yr btwk zh yhyh lhm mgrSy h8rym and ye measure from without the light-city on the east side two thousand cubits, and on the dry-south side two thousand cubits, and on the sea-west side two thousand cubits, and on the hide-north side two thousand cubits; and the light-city be in the midst: this be to them the plots of the cities. umadotem mikhuz la‘ir pe’at qedemah ’alpayim ba’amah ve’et pe’at negeb ’alpayim ba’amah ve’et pe’at yam ’alpayim ba’amah ve’et pe’at zafon ’alpayim ba’amah veha‘ir batavekh, zeh yihyeh lahem migreshei he‘arim.
w1t h8rym 1Sr ttnw llwym 1t SS 8ry hmqlT 1Sr ttnw lns Smh hrZH w8lyhm ttnw 1rb8ym wStym 8yr and among the cities which ye give unto the join-levites there be six cities for refuge, which ye appoint for the manslayer, that he may flee thither: and to them ye add forty and two cities. ve’et he‘arim ’asher titenu lalviyim shesh ‘arei hamiqlat ’asher titenu lanus shamah harozeakh, va‘alehem titenu ’arba‘im ushetayim ‘ir.
kl h8rym 1Sr ttnw llwym 1rb8ym wSmnh 8yr 1thn w1t mgrSyhn so all the cities which ye give to the join-levites be forty and eight cities: them ye give with their plots. kal he‘arim ’asher titenu lalviyim ’arba‘im ushemoneh ‘ir, ’ethen ve’et migreshehen.
wh8rym 1Sr ttnw m1Hzt bny ySr1l m1t hrb trbw wm1t hm8T tm8yTw 1yS kpy nHltw 1Sr ynHlw ytn m8ryw llwym and the cities which ye give be of the possession of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: from them that have many ye give many; and from them that have few ye give few: every one give of his cities unto the join-levites according to his inheritance which he inheriteth. vehe‘arim ’asher titenu me’akhuzat bene yisra’el me’et harab tarbu ume’et ham‘at tam‘itu, ’ish kefi nakhalato ’asher yinkhalu yiten me‘arav lalviyim.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr 1l bny ySr1l w1mrt 1lhm ky 1tm 8brym 1t hyrdn 1rZh kn8n speak unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and say unto them, when ye be come over its-going-down-jordan into the land of mobile-trade-canaan; daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ki ’atem ‘oberim hayarden ’arzah kena‘an.
whqrytm lkm 8rym 8ry mqlT thyynh lkm wns Smh rZH mkh npS bSggh then ye appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee thither, which killeth any person at unawares. vehiqritem lakhem ‘arim ‘arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem, venas shamah rozeakh makeh nefesh bishgagah.
whyw lkm h8rym lmqlT mg1l wl1 ymwt hrZH 8d 8mdw lpny h8dh lmSpT and they be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before-turns the until-witness in decision-grammar. vehayu lakhem he‘arim lemiqlat migo’el, velo yamut harozeakh ‘ad ‘amedo lifnei ha‘edah lamishpat.
wh8rym 1Sr ttnw SS 8ry mqlT thyynh lkm and of these cities which ye give six cities ye have for refuge. vehe‘arim ’asher titenu, shesh ‘arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem.
1t SlS h8rym ttnw m8br lyrdn w1t SlS h8rym ttnw b1rZ kn8n 8ry mqlT thyynh ye give three cities on this side its-going-down-jordan, and three cities ye give in the land of mobile-trade-canaan, which be cities of refuge. shelosh he‘arim titenu me‘eber layarden ve’et shelosh he‘arim titenu be’erez kena‘an, ‘arei miqlat tihyenah.
lbny ySr1l wlgr wltwSb btwkm thyynh SS h8rym h1lh lmqlT lnws Smh kl mkh npS bSggh these six cities be a refuge, both for children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, and for the stranger, and for the sojourner among them: that every one that killeth any person unawares may flee thither. libnei yisra’el velager velatoshab betokham tihyenah shesh he‘arim ha’eleh lemiqlat, lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah.
w1m bkly brzl hkhw wymt rZH hw1 mwt ywmt hrZH and if he hit him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he is a murderer: the murderer surely be put to death. ve’im bikhli barzel hikahu vayamot rozeakh hu, mot yumat harozeakh.
w1m b1bn yd 1Sr ymwt bh hkhw wymt rZH hw1 mwt ywmt hrZH and if he hit him with throwing a father-child-stone, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer surely be put to death. ve’im be’eben yad ’asher yamut bah hikahu vayamot rozeakh hu, mot yumat harozeakh.
1w bkly 8Z yd 1Sr ymwt bw hkhw wymt rZH hw1 mwt ywmt hrZH or if he hit him with an hand weapon of wood, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer surely be put to death. ’o bikhli ‘ez yad ’asher yamut bo hikahu vayamot rozeakh hu, mot yumat harozeakh.
g1l hdm hw1 ymyt 1t hrZH bpg8w bw hw1 ymytnw the revenger of blood himself slay the murderer: when he until-witnesseth him, he slay him. go’el hadam hu yamit harozeakh, befig‘o bo hu yemitenu.
w1m bSn1h yhdpnw 1w hSlyk 8lyw bZdyh wymt and if he thrust him of hatred, or hurl at him by laying of wait, that he die; ve’im besin’ah yehdafenu, ’o hishlikh ‘alav bizdiyah vayamot.
1w b1ybh hkhw bydw wymt mwt ywmt hmkh rZH hw1 g1l hdm ymyt 1t hrZH bpg8w bw or in enmity hit him with his hand, that he die: he that smote him surely be put to death; for he is a murderer: the revenger of blood slay the murderer, when he until-witnesseth him. ’o be’ebah hikahu beyado vayamot mot yumat hamakeh rozeakh hu, go’el hadam yamit harozeakh befig‘o bo.
w1m bpt8 bl1 1ybh hdpw 1w hSlyk 8lyw kl kly bl1 Zdyh and if he thrust him suddenly without enmity, or have cast upon him any thing without laying of wait, ve’im befeta‘ belo ’ebah hadafo, ’o hishlikh ‘alav kal keli belo zediyah.
1w bkl 1bn 1Sr ymwt bh bl1 r1wt wypl 8lyw wymt whw1 l1 1wyb lw wl1 mbqS r8tw or with any father-child-stone, wherewith a man may die, seeing him not, and cast it upon him, that he die, and was not his enemy, neither sought his harm: ’o bekhal ’eben ’asher yamut bah belo re’ot vayapel ‘alav vayamot, vehu lo ’oyeb lo velo mebaqesh ra‘ato.
wSpTw h8dh byn hmkh wbyn g1l hdm 8l hmSpTym h1lh then the until-witness decide between-bin the slayer and the revenger of blood according to these decision-grammars: veshafetu ha‘edah ben hamakeh uben go’el hadam, ‘al hamishpatim ha’eleh.
whZylw h8dh 1t hrZH myd g1l hdm whSybw 1tw h8dh 1l 8yr mqlTw 1Sr ns Smh wySb bh 8d mwt hkhn hgdl 1Sr mSH 1tw bSmn hqdS and the until-witness deliver the slayer out of the hand of the revenger of blood, and the until-witness restore him to the light-city of his refuge, whither he was fled: and he abide in it unto the death of the high dimmer-server, which was lubeed with the dedicated-finished name-from-oil. vehizilu ha‘edah harozeakh miyad go’el hadam veheshibu ’oto ha‘edah ’el ‘ir miqlato ’asher nas shamah, veyashab bah ‘ad mot hakohen hagadol ’asher mashakh beshemen haqodesh.
w1m yZ1 yZ1 hrZH 1t gbwl 8yr mqlTw 1Sr ynws Smh and if the slayer at any time come without the border of the light-city of his refuge, whither he was fled; ve’im yazo yezei harozeakh, gebul ‘ir miqlato ’asher yanus shamah.
wmZ1 1tw g1l hdm mHwZ lgbwl 8yr mqlTw wrZH g1l hdm 1t hrZH 1yn lw dm and the revenger of blood find him without the borders of the light-city of his refuge, and the revenger of blood kill the slayer; he not be guilty of blood: umaza ’oto go’el hadam mikhuz ligbul ‘ir miqlato, verazakh go’el hadam harozeakh ’en lo dam.
ky b8yr mqlTw ySb 8d mwt hkhn hgdl w1Hry mwt hkhn hgdl ySwb hrZH 1l 1rZ 1Hztw because he should have remained in the light-city of his refuge until the death of the high dimmer-server: and after the death of the high dimmer-server the slayer return into the land of his possession. ki be‘ir miqlato yesheb ‘ad mot hakohen hagadol, ve’akharei mot hakohen hagadol yashub harozeakh ’el ’erez ’akhuzato.
whyw 1lh lkm lHqt mSpT ldrtykm bkl mwSbtykm so these things be for a statute of decision-grammar unto you throughout your generations in all your dwellings. vehayu ’eleh lakhem lekhuqat mishpat ledorotekhem, bekhol moshebotekhem.
kl mkh npS lpy 8dym yrZH 1t hrZH w8d 1Hd l1 y8nh bnpS lmwt whoso killeth any person, the murderer be put to death by the mouth of witnesses: and one witness not testify against any person to cause him to die. kal makeh nefesh lefi ‘edim yirzakh harozeakh, ve‘ed ’ekhad lo ya‘aneh benefesh lamut.
wl1 tqHw kpr lnpS rZH 1Sr hw1 rS8 lmwt ky mwt ywmt moreover ye take no satisfaction for the life of a murderer, which is fire-name of death: and he be deadly put to death. velo tiqkhu khofer lenefesh rozeakh ’asher hu rasha‘ lamut, ki mot yumat.
wl1 tqHw kpr lnws 1l 8yr mqlTw lSwb lSbt b1rZ 8d mwt hkhn and ye take no satisfaction for him that is fled to the light-city of his refuge, that he should come again to dwell in the land, until the death of the dimmer-server. velo tiqkhu khofer lanus ’el ‘ir miqlato, lashub lashebet ba’arez ‘ad mot hakohen.
wl1 tHnypw 1t h1rZ 1Sr 1tm bh ky hdm hw1 yHnyp 1t h1rZ wl1rZ l1 ykpr ldm 1Sr Spk bh ky 1m bdm Spkw so ye not pollute the land wherein ye are: for blood it ceaseth the land: and the land cannot be bright-climaxingsed of the blood that is shed therein, and by the blood of him that shed it. velo takhanifu ha’arez ’asher ’atem bah ki hadam hu yakhanif ha’arez, vela’arez lo yekhupar ladam ’asher shupakh bah ki ’im bedam shofekho.
wl1 tTm1 1t h1rZ 1Sr 1tm ySbym bh 1Sr 1ny Skn btwkh ky 1ny yhwh Skn btwk bny ySr1l cease not therefore the land which ye inhabit, wherein i dwell: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou dwell among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. velo tetamei ha’arez ’asher ’atem yoshebim bah ’asher ’ani shokhen betokhah, ki ’ani yhvh shokhen betokh benei yisra’el.
wyqrbw r1Sy h1bwt lmSpHt bny gl8d bn mkyr bn mnSh mmSpHt bny ywsp wydbrw lpny mSh wlpny hnS1ym r1Sy 1bwt lbny ySr1l and the chief fathers of the families of children-betweens of roll-until-heap-gilead, child-between of recognize-of-beat-machir, child-between of place-of-sleep-manasseh, of the families of children-betweens of add-joseph, came near, and spake before-turns extracted-mose, and before-turns the leaders, the chief fathers of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: vayiqrebu rashei ha’abot lemishpakhat bene gil‘ad ben makhir ben menasheh mimishpekhot benei yosef, vaydaberu lifnei mosheh velifnei hanesi’im rashei ’abot libnei yisra’el.
wy1mrw 1t 1dny Zwh yhwh ltt 1t h1rZ bnHlh bgwrl lbny ySr1l w1dny Zwh byhwh ltt 1t nHlt ZlpHd 1Hynw lbntyw and they said, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed my lord-base to give the land for an inheritance by lot to children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: and my lord-base was order-prescribed by yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to give the inheritance of whip-sharp-zelophehad our brother unto his children-betweenesss. vayomeru ’adoni zivah yhvh latet ha’arez benakhalah begoral libnei yisra’el, vadoni zuvah yhvh latet nakhalat zelafekhad ’akhinu libnotav.
whyw l1Hd mbny SbTy bny ySr1l lnSym wngr8h nHltn mnHlt 1btynw wnwsp 8l nHlt hmTh 1Sr thyynh lhm wmgrl nHltnw ygr8 and if they be married to any of children-betweens of the other branchs of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, then their inheritance be taken from the inheritance of our fathers, and be put to the inheritance of the branch whereunto they are received: so it be taken from the lot of our inheritance. vehayu le’ekhad mibenei shibtei bene yisra’el lenashim venigre‘ah nakhalatan minakhalat ’abotenu venosaf ‘al nakhalat hamateh ’asher tihyenah lahem, umigoral nakhalatenu yigarea‘.
w1m yhyh hybl lbny ySr1l wnwsph nHltn 8l nHlt hmTh 1Sr thyynh lhm wmnHlt mTh 1btynw ygr8 nHltn and when the river-jubilee of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel be, then their inheritance be put unto the inheritance of the branch whereunto they are received: so their inheritance be taken away from the inheritance of the branch of our fathers. ve’im yihyeh hayobel libnei yisra’el venosfah nakhalatan ‘al nakhalat hamateh ’asher tihyenah lahem, uminakhalat mateh ’abotenu yigara‘ nakhalatan.
wyZw mSh 1t bny ySr1l 8l py yhwh l1mr kn mTh bny ywsp dbrym and extracted-mose order-prescribed children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel according to the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, the branch of children-betweens of add-joseph hath said well. vayzav mosheh benei yisra’el ‘al pi yhvh lemor, ken mateh bene yosef doberim.
zh hdbr 1Sr Zwh yhwh lbnwt ZlpHd l1mr lTwb b8ynyhm thyynh lnSym 1k lmSpHt mTh 1byhm thyynh lnSym this is the thing which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou doth order-prescribe concerning children-betweenesss of whip-sharp-zelophehad, saying, let them marry to whom they think best; only to the family of the branch of their father they marry. zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh libnot zelafekhad lemor latob be‘enehem tihyenah. ’akh lemishpakhat mateh ’abihem tihyenah lenashim.
wl1 tsb nHlh lbny ySr1l mmTh 1l mTh ky 1yS bnHlt mTh 1btyw ydbqw bny ySr1l so not the inheritance of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel remove from branch to branch: for every one of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel keep himself to the inheritance of the branch of his fathers. velo tisob nakhalah libnei yisra’el mimateh ’el mateh, ki ’ish benakhalat mateh ’abotav yidbequ benei yisra’el.
wkl bt yrSt nHlh mmTwt bny ySr1l l1Hd mmSpHt mTh 1byh thyh l1Sh lm8n yyrSw bny ySr1l 1yS nHlt 1btyw and every daughter-hoof-bat-child, that possesseth an inheritance in any branch of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, be woman unto one of the family of the branch of her father, that children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel may enjoy every man the inheritance of his fathers. vekhal bat yoreshet nakhalah mimatot benei yisra’el le’ekhad mimishpakhat mateh ’abiha tihyeh le’ishah, lema‘an yireshu benei yisra’el ’ish nakhalat ’abotav.
wl1 tsb nHlh mmTh lmTh 1Hr ky 1yS bnHltw ydbqw mTwt bny ySr1l neither the inheritance remove from one branch to another branch; and every one of the branchs of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel keep himself to his own inheritance. velo tisob nakhalah mimateh lemateh ’akher, ki ’ish benakhalato yidbequ matot benei yisra’el.
k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh kn 8Sw bnwt ZlpHd even as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose, so did children-betweenesss of whip-sharp-zelophehad: ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, ken ‘asu benot zelafekhad.
wthyynh mHlh trZh wHglh wmlkh wn8h bnwt ZlpHd lbny ddyhn lnSym for illness-mahlah, want-placate-solve-tirzah, and partridge-hoglah, and queen-milcah, and rest-noah, children-betweenesss of whip-sharp-zelophehad, were married unto their father's brothers' children-betweens: vatihyenah makhlah tirzah vekhagelah umilkah veno‘ah benot zelafekhad, libnei dodehen lenashim.
mmSpHt bny mnSh bn ywsp hyw lnSym wthy nHltn 8l mTh mSpHt 1byhn and they were married into the families of children-betweens of place-of-sleep-manasseh child-between of add-joseph, and their inheritance remained in the branch of the family of their father. mimishpekhot bene menasheh ben yosef hayu lenashim, vatehi nakhalatan ‘al mateh mishpakhat ’abihen.
1lh hmZwt whmSpTym 1Sr Zwh yhwh byd mSh 1l bny ySr1l b8rbt mw1b 8l yrdn yrHw these are the order-prescriptions and the decision-grammars, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed by the hand of extracted-mose unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in the plains of from-father-moab by its-going-down-jordan near moon-smell-jericho. ’eleh hamizvot vehamishpatim ’asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh ’el benei yisra’el, be‘arbot mo’ab ‘al yarden yerekho.
1lh hdbrym 1Sr dbr mSh 1l kl ySr1l b8br hyrdn bmdbr b8rbh mwl swp byn p1rn wbyn tpl wlbn wHZrt wdy zhb these be the bee-words which extracted-mose spake unto all saturated-towards-israel on this side its-going-down-jordan in the place-of-word-desert, in the plain over against the end sea, between-bin magnificence-paran, and bland-tophel, and white-laban, and gardens-hazerot, and enough-gold-dizahab. ’eleh hadebarim ’asher diber mosheh ’el kal yisra’el be‘eber hayarden, bamidbar ba‘arabah mol suf ben paran uben tofel velaban vakhazerot vedi zahab.
1Hd 8Sr ywm mHrb drk hr S8yr 8d qdS brn8 (there are eleven days' journey from sword-horeb by the way of mount hair-style-seir unto finished-desert-staggering-kadeshbarnea.) ’akhad ‘asar yom mekhoreb derekh har se‘ir, ‘ad barnea‘.
wyhy b1rb8ym Snh b8Sty 8Sr HdS b1Hd lHdS dbr mSh 1l bny ySr1l kkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tw 1lhm and it came to pass in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month, on the first day of the month, that extracted-mose spake unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, according unto all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had given him in order-prescription unto them; vayhi be’arba‘im shanah be‘ashte ‘asar khodesh be’ekhad lakhodesh, diber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh ’oto ’alehem.
1Hry hktw 1t syHn mlk h1mry 1Sr ywSb bHSbwn w1t 8wg mlk hbSn 1Sr ywSb b8Strt b1dr8y after he had slain curly-sihon the moloch-king of the talker-amorites, which dwelt in score-heshbon, and mock-og the moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan, which dwelt at you-gave-fire-astarot in live-prohibit-edrei: ’akharei hakoto sikhon melekh ha’emori ’asher yosheb bekheshbon, ve’et ‘og melekh habashan ’asher yosheb be‘ashtarot be’edre‘i.
b8br hyrdn b1rZ mw1b hw1yl mSh b1r 1t htwrh hz1t l1mr on this side its-going-down-jordan, in the land of from-father-moab, began extracted-mose to declare this teaching, saying, be‘eber hayarden be’erez mo’ab, ho’il mosheh be’er hatorah hazot lemor.
yhwh 1lhynw dbr 1lynw bHrb l1mr rb lkm Sbt bhr hzh yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim spake unto us in sword-horeb, saying, ye have dwelt long enough in this mount: yhvh ’elohenu diber ’elenu bekhoreb lemor, rab lakhem shebet bahar hazeh.
pnw ws8w lkm wb1w hr h1mry w1l kl Sknyw b8rbh bhr wbSplh wbngb wbHwp hym 1rZ hkn8ny whlbnwn 8d hnhr hgdl nhr prt turn you, and take your journey, and go to the mount of the talker-amorites, and unto all the places nigh thereunto, in the plain, in the hills, and in the vale, and in the dry-south, and by the sea side, to the land of the mobile-trade-canaanites, and unto build-white-lebanon, unto the great river, the river cow-euphrates. penu use‘u lakhem ubo’u har ha’emori ve’el kal shekhenav ba‘arabah bahar ubashefelah ubanegeb ubekhof hayam, ’erez hakena‘ani vehalebanon ‘ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat.
r1h ntty lpnykm 1t h1rZ b1w wrSw 1t h1rZ 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btykm l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb ltt lhm wlzr8m 1Hryhm behold, i have set the land before-turns you: go in and possess the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto your fathers, their-dick-abraham, laughter-isaac, and backstreet-jacob, to give unto them and to their seed after them. re’eh natati lifnekhem ha’arez, bo’u ureshu ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekhem le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob latet lahem ulezar‘am ’akharehem.
w1mr 1lkm b8t hhw1 l1mr l1 1wkl lbdy S1t 1tkm and i spake unto you at that time, saying, i am not able to bear you myself alone: va’omar ’alekhem ba‘et hahiv lemor, lo ’ukhal lebadi se’et ’etkhem.
yhwh 1lhykm hrbh 1tkm whnkm hywm kkwkby hSmym lrb yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars of namespaces for multitude. yhvh ’elohekhem hirbah ’etkhem, vehinekhem hayom kekhokhbei hashamayim larob.
yhwh 1lhy 1bwtkm ysp 8lykm kkm 1lp p8mym wybrk 1tkm k1Sr dbr lkm (yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of your fathers make you a thousand times so many more as ye are, and knee-fluffy-bless you, as he hath promised you!) yhvh ’elohei ’abotekhem yosef ‘alekhem kakhem ’elef pe‘amim, vibarekh ’etkhem ka’asher diber lakhem.
1ykh 1S1 lbdy TrHkm wmS1km wrybkm how can i myself alone bear your cumbrance, and your burden, and your strife? ’ekhah ’esa lebadi, tarekhakhem umasa’akhem veribekhem.
hbw lkm 1nSym Hkmym wnbnym wyd8ym lSbTykm w1Symm br1Sykm take you wise men, and understanding, and hand-known among your branchs, and i will make them rulers over you. habu lakhem ’anashim khakhamim unebonim vidu‘im leshibtekhem, va’asimem berashekhem.
wt8nw 1ty wt1mrw Twb hdbr 1Sr dbrt l8Swt and ye answered me, and said, the thing which thou hast bee-spoken is good for us to do. vata‘anu ’oti, vatomeru tob hadabar ’asher dibarta la‘asot.
w1qH 1t r1Sy SbTykm 1nSym Hkmym wyd8ym w1tn 1tm r1Sym 8lykm Sry 1lpym wSry m1wt wSry HmSym wSry 8Srt wSTrym lSbTykm so i took the chief of your branchs, wise men, and hand-known, and made them heads over you, captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, and captains over fifties, and captains over tens, and officers among your branchs. va’eqakh rashei shibtekhem ’anashim khakhamim vidu‘im va’eten ’otam rashim ‘alekhem, sarei ’alafim vesarei me’ot vesarei khamishim vesarei ‘asarot veshoterim leshibtekhem.
w1Zwh 1t SpTykm b8t hhw1 l1mr Sm8 byn 1Hykm wSpTtm Zdq byn 1yS wbyn 1Hyw wbyn grw and i charged your decides at that time, saying, hear the causes between-bin your brethren, and decide justly between-bin every man and his brother, and the stranger that is with him. va’azaveh shofetekhem ba‘et hahiv lemor, shamoa‘ ben ’akhekhem ushefatem zedeq ben ’ish uben ’akhiv uben gero.
l1 tkyrw pnym bmSpT kqTn kgdl tSm8wn l1 tgwrw mpny 1yS ky hmSpT l1lhym hw1 whdbr 1Sr yqSh mkm tqrbwn 1ly wSm8tyw ye not respect persons in decision-grammar; and ye hear the small as well as the great; ye not be afraid of the face-turns of man; for the decision-grammar is towards-these-elohim's: and the cause that is too hard for you, bring it unto me, and i will hear it. lo takiru fanim bamishpat kaqaton kagadol tishma‘un lo taguru mipene ’ish ki hamishpat lelohim hu, vehadabar ’asher yiqsheh mikem taqribun ’elay ushema‘tiv.
w1Zwh 1tkm b8t hhw1 1t kl hdbrym 1Sr t8Swn and i order-prescribed you at that time all the things which ye should do. va’azaveh ’etkhem ba‘et hahiv, kal hadebarim ’asher ta‘asun.
wns8 mHrb wnlk 1t kl hmdbr hgdwl whnwr1 hhw1 1Sr r1ytm drk hr h1mry k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1lhynw 1tnw wnb1 8d qdS brn8 and when we departed from sword-horeb, we went through all that great and terrible place-of-word-desert, which ye saw by the way of the mountain of the talker-amorites, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim order-prescribed us; and we came to finished-desert-staggering-kadeshbarnea. vanisa‘ mekhoreb vanelekh kal hamidbar hagadol vehanora hahu ’asher re’item derekh har ha’emori ka’asher zivah yhvh ’elohenu ’otanu, vanabo ‘ad barnea‘.
w1mr 1lkm b1tm 8d hr h1mry 1Sr yhwh 1lhynw ntn lnw and i said unto you, ye are come unto the mountain of the talker-amorites, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim doth give unto us. va’omar ’alekhem, batem ‘ad har ha’emori ’asher yhvh ’elohenu noten lanu.
r1h ntn yhwh 1lhyk lpnyk 1t h1rZ 8lh rS k1Sr dbr yhwh 1lhy 1btyk lk 1l tyr1 w1l tHt behold, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath set the land before-turns thee: go up and possess it, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of thy fathers hath said unto thee; fear not, neither be discouraged. re’eh natan yhvh ’elohekha lefanekha ha’arez, ‘aleh resh ka’asher diber yhvh ’elohei ’abotekha lakh ’al tira ve’al tekhat.
wtqrbwn 1ly klkm wt1mrw nSlHh 1nSym lpnynw wyHprw lnw 1t h1rZ wySbw 1tnw dbr 1t hdrk 1Sr n8lh bh w1t h8rym 1Sr nb1 1lyhn and ye came near unto me every one of you, and said, we will send men before-turns us, and they search us out the land, and bring us bee-word again by what way we must go up, and into what cities we come. vatiqrebun ’elay kulekhem vatomeru nishlekhah ’anashim lefanenu veyakhperu lanu ha’arez, veyashibu ’otanu dabar ’et haderekh ’asher na‘aleh bah ve’et he‘arim ’asher nabo ’alehen.
wyyTb b8yny hdbr w1qH mkm Snym 8Sr 1nSym 1yS 1Hd lSbT and the saying pleased me well: and i took twelve men of you, one of a branch: vayitab be‘enay hadabar, va’eqakh mikem shenem ‘asar ’anashim ’ish ’ekhad lashabet.
wypnw wy8lw hhrh wyb1w 8d nHl 1Skl wyrglw 1th and they turned and went up into the mountain, and came unto the valley of fire-all-eshcol, and searched it out. vayifnu vaya‘alu haharah vayabo’u ‘ad nakhal ’eshkol, vayragelu ’otah.
wyqHw bydm mpry h1rZ wywrdw 1lynw wySbw 1tnw dbr wy1mrw Twbh h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhynw ntn lnw and they took of the fruit of the land in their hands, and brought it down unto us, and brought us bee-word again, and said, it is a good land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim doth give us. vayiqkhu beyadam miperi ha’arez vayoridu ’elenu, vayashibu ’otanu dabar vayomeru tobah ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohenu noten lanu.
wl1 1bytm l8lt wtmrw 1t py yhwh 1lhykm notwithstanding ye would not go up, and rebelled against the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim: velo ’abitem la‘alot, vatamru pi yhvh ’elohekhem.
wtrgnw b1hlykm wt1mrw bSn1t yhwh 1tnw hwZy1nw m1rZ mZrym ltt 1tnw byd h1mry lhSmydnw and ye murmured in your tents, and said, because yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hated us, he hath brought us forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim, to deliver us into the hand of the talker-amorites, to destroy us. vateragenu be’aholekhem vatomeru besin’at yhvh ’otanu hozi’anu me’erez mizrayim, latet ’otanu beyad ha’emori lehashmidenu.
1nh 1nHnw 8lym 1Hynw hmsw 1t lbbnw l1mr 8m gdwl wrm mmnw 8rym gdlt wbZwrt bSmym wgm bny 8nqym r1ynw Sm whither we go up? our brethren have discouraged our heart, saying, the with-mum-people is greater and taller than we; the cities are great and walled up to namespaces; and moreover we have seen children-betweens of the giant-anakims there. ’anah ’anakhnu ‘olim ’akhenu hemasu lebabenu lemor ‘am gadol varam mimenu ‘arim gedolot ubezurot bashamayim, vegam benei ‘anaqim ra’inu sham.
w1mr 1lkm l1 t8rZwn wl1 tyr1wn mhm then i said unto you, dread not, neither be afraid of them. va’omar ’alekhem, lo ta‘arzun velo tire’un mehem.
yhwh 1lhykm hhlk lpnykm hw1 ylHm lkm kkl 1Sr 8Sh 1tkm bmZrym l8ynykm yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim which goeth before-turns you, he fight for you, according to all that he did for you in narrows-mizraim before-turns your eyes; yhvh ’elohekhem haholekh lifnekhem hu yilakhem lakhem, kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’itekhem bemizrayim le‘enekhem.
wbmdbr 1Sr r1yt 1Sr nS1k yhwh 1lhyk k1Sr yS1 1yS 1t bnw bkl hdrk 1Sr hlktm 8d b1km 8d hmqwm hzh and in the place-of-word-desert, where thou hast seen how that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim conceived-of thee, as a man doth bear his child-between, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place. ubamidbar ’asher ra’ita ’asher nesa’akha yhvh ’elohekha ka’asher yisa ’ish beno, bekhal haderekh ’asher halakhtem ‘ad bo’akhem ‘ad hamaqom hazeh.
wbdbr hzh 1ynkm m1mynm byhwh 1lhykm yet in this thing ye did not be coached by yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, ubadabar hazeh, ’enekhem ma’aminim yhvh ’elohekhem.
hhlk lpnykm bdrk ltwr lkm mqwm lHntkm b1S lylh lr1tkm bdrk 1Sr tlkw bh wb8nn ywmm who went in the way before-turns you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to show you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day. haholekh lifnekhem baderekh latur lakhem maqom lakhanotekhem, ba’esh laylah lar’otekhem baderekh ’asher telekhu bah ube‘anan yomam.
wySm8 yhwh 1t qwl dbrykm wyqZp wySb8 l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou heard the voice of your bee-words, and was wroth, and sware, saying, vayishma‘ yhvh qol dibrekhem, vayiqzof vayishaba‘ lemor.
1m yr1h 1yS b1nSym h1lh hdwr hr8 hzh 1t h1rZ hTwbh 1Sr nSb8ty ltt l1btykm surely there not one of these men of this bad generation see that good land, which i sware to give unto your fathers. ’im yir’eh ’ish ba’anashim ha’eleh hador hara‘ hazeh, ha’arez hatobah ’asher nishba‘ti latet la’abotekhem.
zwlty klb bn ypnh hw1 yr1nh wlw 1tn 1t h1rZ 1Sr drk bh wlbnyw y8n 1Sr ml1 1Hry yhwh save as-heart-dog-caleb child-between of turn-jephuneh; he see it, and to him will i give the land that he hath trodden upon, and to his children-betweens, because he hath wholly followed yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. zulati kaleb ben yefuneh hu yir’enah velo ’eten ha’arez ’asher darakh bah ulebanav, ya‘an ’asher milei ’akharei yhvh.
gm by ht1np yhwh bgllkm l1mr gm 1th l1 tb1 Sm also yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was angry with me for your sakes, saying, thou also not go in thither. gam bi hit’anaf yhvh biglalkhem lemor, gam ’atah lo tabo sham.
yhwS8 bn nwn h8md lpnyk hw1 yb1 Smh 1tw Hzq ky hw1 ynHlnh 1t ySr1l and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun, which standeth before-turns thee, he go in thither: encourage him: for he cause saturated-towards-israel to inherit it. yehoshua‘ bin nun ha‘omed lefanekha hu yabo shamah, ’oto khazeq ki hu yankhilenah yisra’el.
wTpkm 1Sr 1mrtm lbz yhyh wbnykm 1Sr l1 yd8w hywm Twb wr8 hmh yb1w Smh wlhm 1tnnh whm yyrSwh moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children-betweens, which in that day had no knowledge between-bin good and bad, they go in thither, and unto them will i give it, and they possess it. vetapekhem ’asher ’amartem labaz yihyeh ubenekhem ’asher lo yade‘u hayom tob vara‘ hemah yabo’u shamah, velahem ’etenenah vehem yirashuha.
w1tm pnw lkm ws8w hmdbrh drk ym swp and as for you, turn you, and take your journey into the place-of-word-desert by the way of the end sea. ve’atem penu lakhem, use‘u hamidbarah derekh yam suf.
wt8nw wt1mrw 1ly HT1nw lyhwh 1nHnw n8lh wnlHmnw kkl 1Sr Zwnw yhwh 1lhynw wtHgrw 1yS 1t kly mlHmtw wthynw l8lt hhrh then ye answered and said unto me, we have missed to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, we will go up and fight, according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim order-prescribed us. and when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war, ye were ready to go up into the hill. vata‘anu vatomeru ’elay khatanu yhvh ’anakhnu na‘aleh venilkhamnu kekhol ’asher zivanu yhvh ’elohenu, vatakhgeru ’ish ’et kelei milkhamto vatahinu la‘alot haharah.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly 1mr lhm l1 t8lw wl1 tlHmw ky 1ynny bqrbkm wl1 tngpw lpny 1ybykm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, say unto them. go not up, neither fight; for i am not among you; lest ye be smitten before-turns your father-adversaries. vayomer yhvh ’elay ’emor lahem lo ta‘alu velo tilakhamu ki ’eneni beqirbekhem, velo tinagefu lifnei ’oyebekhem.
w1dbr 1lykm wl1 Sm8tm wtmrw 1t py yhwh wtzdw wt8lw hhrh so i spake unto you; and ye would not hear, and rebelled against the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and went presumptuously up into the hill. va’adaber ’alekhem velo shema‘tem, vatamru pi yhvh vatazidu vata‘alu haharah.
wyZ1 h1mry hySb bhr hhw1 lqr1tkm wyrdpw 1tkm k1Sr t8Synh hdbrym wyktw 1tkm bS8yr 8d Hrmh and the talker-amorites, which dwelt in that mountain, came out against you, and chased you, as bees do, and destroyed you in hair-style-seir, even unto fishing-net-boycott-hormah. vayezei ha’emori hayosheb bahar hahu liqratkhem vayirdefu ’etkhem ka’asher ta‘asenah hadeborim, vayaketu ’etkhem bese‘ir ‘ad kharemah.
wtSbw wtbkw lpny yhwh wl1 Sm8 yhwh bqlkm wl1 h1zyn 1lykm and ye returned and wept before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou would not hearken to your voice, nor give ear unto you. vatashubu vatibku lifnei yhvh, velo shama‘ yhvh beqolekhem velo he’ezin ’alekhem.
wtSbw bqdS ymym rbym kymym 1Sr ySbtm so ye abode in dedicated-finished-kadesh many days, according unto the days that ye abode there. vateshebu beqadesh yamim rabim, kayamim ’asher yeshabtem.
wnpn wns8 hmdbrh drk ym swp k1Sr dbr yhwh 1ly wnsb 1t hr S8yr ymym rbym then we turned, and took our journey into the place-of-word-desert by the way of the end sea, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto me: and we compassed mount hair-style-seir many days. vanefen vanisa‘ hamidbarah derekh yam suf ka’asher diber yhvh ’elay, vanasab har se‘ir yamim rabim.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto me, saying, vayomer yhvh ’elay lemor.
rb lkm sb 1t hhr hzh pnw lkm Zpnh ye have compassed this mountain long enough: turn you hide-northward. rab lakhem sob ’et hahar hazeh, penu lakhem zafonah.
w1t h8m Zw l1mr 1tm 8brym bgbwl 1Hykm bny 8Sw hySbym bS8yr wyyr1w mkm wnSmrtm m1d and order-prescribe thou the with-mum-people, saying, ye are to pass through the coast of your brethren children-betweens of do-esau, which dwell in hair-style-seir; and they be afraid of you: take ye good heed unto yourselves therefore: ve’et ha‘am zav lemor ’atem ‘oberim bigbul ’akhekhem bene ‘esav hayoshebim bese‘ir, veyire’u mikem venishmartem me’od.
1l ttgrw bm ky l1 1tn lkm m1rZm 8d mdrk kp rgl ky yrSh l8Sw ntty 1t hr S8yr meddle not with them; for i will not give you of their land, no, not so much as a foot breadth; because i have given mount hair-style-seir unto do-esau for a possession. ’al titgaru bam ki lo ’eten lakhem me’arzam ‘ad midrakh kaf ragel, ki yerushah le‘esav natati har se‘ir.
1kl tSbrw m1tm bksp w1kltm wgm mym tkrw m1tm bksp wStytm ye buy meat of them for money, that ye may eat; and ye also buy from-waters of them for money, that ye may drink. ’okhel tishberu me’itam bakesef va’akhaltem, vegam mayim tikhru me’itam bakesef ushetitem.
ky yhwh 1lhyk brkk bkl m8Sh ydk yd8 lktk 1t hmdbr hgdl hzh zh 1rb8ym Snh yhwh 1lhyk 8mk l1 Hsrt dbr for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath knee-fluffy-blessed thee in all the works of thy hand: he knoweth thy walking through this great place-of-word-desert: these forty years yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath been with thee; thou hast lacked nothing. ki yhvh ’elohekha berakhkha bekhol ma‘aseh yadekha yada‘ lekhtekha hamidbar hagadol hazeh, zeh ’arba‘im shanah yhvh ’elohekha ‘imakh lo khasarta dabar.
wn8br m1t 1Hynw bny 8Sw hySbym bS8yr mdrk h8rbh m1ylt wm8Zyn gbr wnpn wn8br drk mdbr mw1b and when we passed by from our brethren children-betweens of do-esau, which dwelt in hair-style-seir, through the way of the plain from elath, and from wood-strong-man-eziongaber, we turned and passed by the way of the place-of-word-desert of from-father-moab. vana‘abor me’et ’akhenu bene ‘esav hayoshebim bese‘ir miderekh ha‘arabah me’elat ume‘ezyon gaber, vanefen vana‘abor derekh midbar mo’ab.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly 1l tZr 1t mw1b w1l ttgr bm mlHmh ky l1 1tn lk m1rZw yrSh ky lbny lwT ntty 1t 8r yrSh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, distress not the from-father-moabites, neither contend with them in battle: for i will not give thee of their land for a possession; because i have given awake-ar unto children-betweens of cover-lot for a possession. vayomer yhvh ’elay ’el tazar mo’ab ve’al titgar bam milkhamah, ki lo ’eten lekha me’arzo yerushah ki libne lot natati ‘ar yerushah
h1mym lpnym ySbw bh 8m gdwl wrb wrm k8nqym the emims dwelt therein in times past, a with-mum-people great, and many, and tall, as the giant-anakims; ha’emim lefanim yashebu bah, ‘am gadol verab varam ka‘anaqim.
rp1ym yHSbw 1p hm k8nqym whm1bym yqr1w lhm 1mym which also were accounted giants, as the giant-anakims; and the from-father-moabites called them emims. refa’im yekhashebu ’af hem ka‘anaqim, vehamo’abim yiqre’u lahem ’emim.
wbS8yr ySbw hHrym lpnym wbny 8Sw yyrSwm wySmydwm mpnyhm wySbw tHtm k1Sr 8Sh ySr1l l1rZ yrStw 1Sr ntn yhwh lhm the my-hole-horims also dwelt in hair-style-seir beforetime; and children-betweens of do-esau succeeded them, when they had destroyed them from before-turns them, and dwelt in their stead; as saturated-towards-israel did unto the land of his possession, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou gave unto them. ubese‘ir yashebu hakhorim lefanim ubenei ‘esav yirashum vayashmidum mipenehem vayeshebu takhtam, ka’asher ‘asah yisra’el le’erez yerushato ’asher natan yhvh lahem.
8th qmw w8brw lkm 1t nHl zrd wn8br 1t nHl zrd now rise up, said i, and get you over the brook twig-zered. and we went over the brook twig-zered. ‘atah qumu ve‘ibru lakhem nakhal zared, vana‘abor nakhal zared.
whymym 1Sr hlknw mqdS brn8 8d 1Sr 8brnw 1t nHl zrd SlSym wSmnh Snh 8d tm kl hdwr 1nSy hmlHmh mqrb hmHnh k1Sr nSb8 yhwh lhm and the space in which we came from finished-desert-staggering-kadeshbarnea, until we were come over the brook twig-zered, was thirty and eight years; until all the generation of the men of war were wasted out from inward the troop-cluster, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto them. vehayamim ’asher halakhnu miqadesh barnea‘ ‘ad ’asher ‘abarnu ’et nakhal zered sheloshim ushemoneh shanah, ‘ad tom kal hador ’anshei hamilkhamah miqereb hamakhaneh ka’asher nishba‘ yhvh lahem.
wgm yd yhwh hyth bm lhmm mqrb hmHnh 8d tmm for indeed the hand of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was against them, to destroy them from inward the troop-cluster, until they were consumed. vegam yad yhvh hayetah bam lehumam miqereb hamakhaneh, ‘ad tumam.
wyhy k1Sr tmw kl 1nSy hmlHmh lmwt mqrb h8m so it came to pass, when all the men of war were consumed and dead from inward the with-mum-people, vayhi kha’asher tamu kal ’anshei hamilkhamah lamut miqereb ha‘am..
wydbr yhwh 1ly l1mr that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto me, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’elay lemor.
