wqrbt mwl bny 8mwn 1l tZrm w1l ttgr bm ky l1 1tn m1rZ bny 8mwn lk yrSh ky lbny lwT nttyh yrSh and when thou comest nigh over against children-betweens of with-ammon, distress them not, nor meddle with them: for i will not give thee of the land of children-betweens of with-ammon any possession; because i have given it unto children-betweens of cover-lot for a possession. veqarabta mul benei ‘amon ’al tezurem ve’al titgar bam, ki lo ’eten me’erez bene ‘amon lekha yerushah ki libne lot netatiha yerushah.
1rZ rp1ym tHSb 1p hw1 rp1ym ySbw bh lpnym wh8mnym yqr1w lhm zmzmym (that also was accounted a land of giants: giants dwelt therein in old time; and the with-ammonites call them buzzers-zamzumim; ’erez refa’im tekhasheb ’af hi refa’im yashebu bah lefanim veha‘amonim yiqre’u lahem zamzumim.
8m gdwl wrb wrm k8nqym wySmydm yhwh mpnyhm wyyrSm wySbw tHtm a with-mum-people great, and many, and tall, as the giant-anakims; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou destroyed them before-turns them; and they succeeded them, and dwelt in their stead: ‘am gadol verab varam ka‘anaqim, vayashmidem yhvh mipenehem vayirashum vayeshebu takhtam.
k1Sr 8Sh lbny 8Sw hySbym bS8yr 1Sr hSmyd 1t hHry mpnyhm wyyrSm wySbw tHtm 8d hywm hzh as he did to children-betweens of do-esau, which dwelt in hair-style-seir, when he destroyed the my-hole-horims from before-turns them; and they succeeded them, and dwelt in their stead even unto this day: ka’asher ‘asah libnei ‘esav hayoshebim bese‘ir, ’asher hishmid hakhori mipenehem vayirashum vayeshebu takhtam ‘ad hayom hazeh.
wh8wym hySbym bHZrym 8d 8zh kptrym hyZ1ym mkptwr hSmydm wySbw tHtm and the awful-avims which dwelt in premises-hazerim, even unto goat-courage-azah, the buttons-button-solved-caphtorims, which came forth out of button-solved-caphtor, destroyed them, and dwelt in their stead.) veha‘avim hayoshebim bakhazerim ‘ad ‘azah, kaftorim hayoze’im mikaftor hishmidum vayeshebu takhtam.
qwmw s8w w8brw 1t nHl 1rnn r1h ntty bydk 1t syHn mlk HSbwn h1mry w1t 1rZw hHl rS whtgr bw mlHmh rise ye up, take your journey, and pass over the river pine-arnon: behold, i have given into thine hand curly-sihon the talker-amorite, moloch-king of score-heshbon, and his land: begin to possess it, and contend with him in battle. qumu se‘u ve‘ibru nakhal ’arnon re’eh natati beyadekha sikhon melekh kheshbon ha’emori ve’et ’arzo hakhel rash, vehitgar bo milkhamah.
hywm hzh 1Hl tt pHdk wyr1tk 8l pny h8mym tHt kl hSmym 1Sr ySm8wn Sm8k wrgzw wHlw mpnyk this day will i begin to put the dread of thee and the fear of thee upon the nations that are under the whole namespaces, who hear report of thee, and tremble, and be in anguish because of thee. hayom hazeh ’akhel tet pakhdekha veyir’atekha ‘al penei ha‘amim takhat kal hashamayim, ’asher yishme‘un shim‘akha veragezu vekhalu mipanekha
w1SlH ml1kym mmdbr qdmwt 1l syHwn mlk HSbwn dbry Slwm l1mr and i sent messengers out of the place-of-word-desert of kedemoth unto curly-sihon moloch-king of score-heshbon with bee-words of peace, saying, va’eshlakh mal’akhim mimidbar qedemot ’el sikhon melekh kheshbon, dibrei shalom lemor.
18brh b1rZk bdrk bdrk 1lk l1 1swr ymyn wSm1wl let me pass through thy land: i will go along by the high way, i will neither turn unto the right hand nor to the left. ’e‘berah be’arzekha baderekh baderekh ’elekh, lo ’asur yamin usemol.
1kl bksp tSbrny w1klty wmym bksp ttn ly wStyty rq 18brh brgly thou sell me meat for money, that i may eat; and give me from-waters for money, that i may drink: only i will pass through on my feet; ’okhel bakesef tashbireni ve’akhalti umayim bakesef titen li veshatiti, raq ’e‘berah beraglay.
k1Sr 8Sw ly bny 8Sw hySbym bS8yr whmw1bym hySbym b8r 8d 1Sr 18br 1t hyrdn 1l h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhynw ntn lnw (as children-betweens of do-esau which dwell in hair-style-seir, and the from-father-moabites which dwell in awake-ar, did unto me;) until i pass over its-going-down-jordan into the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim giveth us. ka’asher ‘asu li benei ‘esav hayoshebim bese‘ir vehamo’abim hayoshebim be‘ar, ‘ad ’asher ’e‘ebor hayarden ’el ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohenu noten lanu.
wl1 1bh syHn mlk HSbwn h8brnw bw ky hqSh yhwh 1lhyk 1t rwHw w1mZ 1t lbbw lm8n ttw bydk kywm hzh and curly-sihon moloch-king of score-heshbon would not let us pass by him: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hardened his breath-spirit, and made his heart obstinate, that he might deliver him into thy hand, as appeareth this day. velo ’abah sikhon melekh kheshbon ha‘abirenu bo, ki hiqshah yhvh ’elohekha rukho ve’imez lebabo lema‘an tito beyadekha kayom hazeh.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly r1h hHlty tt lpnyk 1t syHn w1t 1rZw hHl rS lrSt 1t 1rZw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, behold, i have begun to give curly-sihon and his land before-turns thee: begin to possess, that thou mayest inherit his land. vayomer yhvh ’elay re’eh hakhiloti tet lefanekha sikhon ve’et ’arzo, hakhel rash lareshet ’arzo.
wyZ1 syHn lqr1tnw hw1 wkl 8mw lmlHmh yhZh then curly-sihon came out against us, he and all his with-mum-people, to fight at stress-jahaz. vayezei sikhon liqratenu hu vekhal ‘amo lamilkhamah yahezah.
wytnhw yhwh 1lhynw lpnynw wnk 1tw w1t bnw bnyw w1t kl 8mw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim delivered him before-turns us; and we smote him, and his children-betweens, and all his with-mum-people. vayitenehu yhvh ’elohenu lefanenu, vanakh ’oto ve’et banav ve’et kal ‘amo.
wnlkd 1t kl 8ryw b8t hhw1 wnHrm 1t kl 8yr mtm whnSym whTp l1 hS1rnw Sryd and we took all his cities at that time, and fishing-net-destroyed the men, and the women, and the little ones, of every light-city, we left none to remain: vanilkod kal ‘arav ba‘et hahiv vanakharem kal ‘ir metim vehanashim vehataf, lo hish’arnu sarid.
rq hbhmh bzznw lnw wSll h8rym 1Sr lkdnw only the in-them-animal we took for a prey unto ourselves, and the spoil of the cities which we took. raq habehemah bazaznu lanu, ushelal he‘arim ’asher lakhadenu.
m8r8r 1Sr 8l Spt nHl 1rnn wh8yr 1Sr bnHl w8d hgl8d l1 hyth qryh 1Sr Sgbh mmnw 1t hkl ntn yhwh 1lhynw lpnynw from juniper-object-aroer, which is by the brink of the river of pine-arnon, and from the light-city that is by the river, even unto roll-until-heap-gilead, there was not one light-city too strong for us: yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim delivered all unto us: me‘aro‘er ’asher ‘al sefat nakhal ’arnon veha‘ir ’asher banakhal ve‘ad hagil‘ad lo hayetah qiryah ’asher sagebah mimenu, hakol natan yhvh ’elohenu lefanenu.
rq 1l 1rZ bny 8mwn l1 qrbt kl yd nHl ybq w8ry hhr wkl 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1lhynw only unto the land of children-betweens of with-ammon thou camest not, nor unto any place of the river boxwood-jaboq, nor unto the cities in the mountains, nor unto whatsoever yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim forbade us. raq ’el ’erez bene ‘amon lo qarabeta, kal yad nakhal yaboq ve‘arei hahar vekhol ’asher zivah yhvh ’elohenu.
wnpn wn8l drk hbSn wyZ1 8wg mlk hbSn lqr1tnw hw1 wkl 8mw lmlHmh 1dr8y then we turned, and went up the way to at-tooth-bashan: and mock-og the moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan came out against us, he and all his with-mum-people, to battle at live-prohibit-edrei. vanefen vana‘al derekh habashan, vayezei ‘og melekh habashan liqratenu hu vekhal ‘amo lamilkhamah ’edre‘i.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly 1l tyr1 1tw ky bydk ntty 1tw w1t kl 8mw w1t 1rZw w8Syt lw k1Sr 8Syt lsyHn mlk h1mry 1Sr ywSb bHSbwn and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, fear him not: for i will deliver him, and all his with-mum-people, and his land, into thy hand; and thou do unto him as thou didst unto curly-sihon moloch-king of the talker-amorites, which dwelt at score-heshbon. vayomer yhvh ’elay ’al tira ’oto ki beyadekha natati ’oto ve’et kal ‘amo ve’et ’arzo, ve‘asita lo ka’asher ‘asita lesikhon melekh ha’emori ’asher yosheb bekheshbon.
wytn yhwh 1lhynw bydnw gm 1t 8wg mlk hbSn w1t kl 8mw wnkhw 8d blty hS1yr lw Sryd so yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim delivered into our hands mock-og also, the moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan, and all his with-mum-people: and we smote him until none was left to him remaining. vayiten yhvh ’elohenu beyadenu gam ‘og melekh habashan ve’et kal ‘amo, vanakehu ‘ad bilti hish’ir lo sarid.
wnlkd 1t kl 8ryw b8t hhw1 l1 hyth qryh 1Sr l1 lqHnw m1tm SSym 8yr kl Hbl 1rgb mmlkt 8wg bbSn and we took all his cities at that time, there was not a city which we took not from them, threescore cities, all the region of lump-argob, the moloch-kingdom of mock-og in at-tooth-bashan. vanilkod kal ‘arav ba‘et hahiv lo hayetah qiryah ’asher lo laqakhnu me’itam, shishim ‘ir kal khebel ’argob mamlekhet ‘og babashan.
kl 1lh 8rym bZrwt Hwmh gbhh dltym wbryH lbd m8ry hprzy hrbh m1d all these cities were fenced with high walls, hair-gates, and bars; beside unwalled towns a great many. kal ’eleh ‘arim bezurot khomah gebohah delatayim uberiakh, lebad me‘arei haperazi harbeh me’od.
wnHrm 1wtm k1Sr 8Synw lsyHn mlk HSbwn hHrm kl 8yr mtm hnSym whTp and we fishing-net-destroyed them, as we did unto curly-sihon moloch-king of score-heshbon, utterly destroying the men, women, and children-betweens, of every light-city. vanakharem ’otam ka’asher ‘asinu lesikhon melekh kheshbon, hakharem kal ‘ir metim hanashim vehataf.
wkl hbhmh wSll h8rym bzwnw lnw and all the in-them-animal, and the spoil of the cities, we took for a prey to ourselves. vekhal habehemah ushelal he‘arim bazonu lanu.
wnqH b8t hhw1 1t h1rZ myd Sny mlky h1mry 1Sr b8br hyrdn mnHl 1rnn 8d hr Hrmwn and we took at that time out of the hand of the two moloch-kings of the talker-amorites the land that was on this side its-going-down-jordan, from the river of pine-arnon unto mount fishing-net-hermon; vaniqakh ba‘et hahiv ha’arez miyad shenei malkhei ha’emori ’asher be‘eber hayarden, minakhal ’arnon ‘ad har khermon.
Zydnym yqr1w lHrmwn Sryn wh1mry yqr1w lw Snyr (which fishing-net-hermon the side-by-side-sidonians call armor-plate-sirion; and the talker-amorites call it tooth-meadow;) zidonim yiqre’u lekhermon siryon, veha’emori yiqre’u lo senir.
kl 8ry hmySr wkl hgl8d wkl hbSn 8d slkh w1dr8y 8ry mmlkt 8wg bbSn all the cities of the plain, and all roll-until-heap-gilead, and all at-tooth-bashan, unto poor-salchah and live-prohibit-edrei, cities of the moloch-kingdom of mock-og in at-tooth-bashan. kol ‘arei hamishor vekhal hagil‘ad vekhal habashan ‘ad salkhah ve’edre‘i, ‘arei mamlekhet ‘og babashan.
ky rq 8wg mlk hbSn nS1r mytr hrp1ym hnh 8rSw 8rS brzl hlh hw1 brbt bny 8mwn tS8 1mwt 1rkh w1rb8 1mwt rHbh b1mt 1yS for only mock-og moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan remained of the remnant of giants; behold his bedstead was a bedstead of iron; is it not in much-rabat of children-betweens of with-ammon? nine cubits was the length thereof, and four cubits the breadth of it, after the cubit of a man. ki raq ‘og melekh habashan nish’ar miyeter harefa’im hineh ‘arso ‘eres barzel haloh hi berabat benei ‘amon, tesha‘ ’amot ’arekah ve’arba‘ ’amot rakhebah be’amat ’ish.
w1t h1rZ hz1t yrSnw b8t hhw1 m8r8r 1Sr 8l nHl 1rnn wHZy hr hgl8d w8ryw ntty lr1wbny wlgdy and this land, which we possessed at that time, from juniper-object-aroer, which is by the river pine-arnon, and half mount roll-until-heap-gilead, and the cities thereof, gave i unto the buddy-see-child-reubenites and to the luck-gadites. ve’et ha’arez hazot yarashnu ba‘et hahiv, me‘aro‘er ’asher ‘al nakhal ’arnon vakhazi har hagil‘ad ve‘arav natati laru’ubeni velagadi.
wytr hgl8d wkl hbSn mmlkt 8wg ntty lHZy SbT hmnSh kl Hbl h1rgb lkl hbSn hhw1 yqr1 1rZ rp1ym and the rest of roll-until-heap-gilead, and all at-tooth-bashan, being the moloch-kingdom of mock-og, gave i unto the half branch of place-of-sleep-manasseh; all the region of lump-argob, with all at-tooth-bashan, which was called the land of giants. veyeter hagil‘ad vekhal habashan mamlekhet ‘og natati lakhazi shebet hamnasheh, kol khebel ha’argob lekhal habashan hahu yiqarei ’erez refa’im.
y1yr bn mnSh lqH 1t kl Hbl 1rgb 8d gbwl hgSwry whm8kty wyqr1 1tm 8l Smw 1t hbSn Hwt y1yr 8d hywm hzh glow-jair child-between of place-of-sleep-manasseh took all the country of lump-argob unto the coasts of geshuri and maachathi; and called them after his own name, at-tooth-ranches-shine-bashan-havot-jair, unto this day. ya’ir ben menasheh laqakh kal khebel ’argob ‘ad gebul hageshuri vehama‘akhati, vayiqra ‘al shemo habashan khavot ya’ir ‘ad hayom hazeh.
wlmkyr ntty 1t hgl8d and i gave roll-until-heap-gilead unto recognize-of-beat-machir. ulemakhir natati hagil‘ad.
wlr1wbny wlgdy ntty mn hgl8d w8d nHl 1rnn twk hnHl wgbl w8d ybq hnHl gbwl bny 8mwn and unto the buddy-see-child-reubenites and unto the luck-gadites i gave from roll-until-heap-gilead even unto the river pine-arnon half the valley, and the border even unto the river boxwood-jaboq, which is the border of children-betweens of with-ammon; velaru’ubeni velagadi natati min hagil‘ad ve‘ad nakhal ’arnon tokh hanakhal ugebul, ve‘ad yaboq hanakhal gebul benei ‘amon.
wh8rbh whyrdn wgbl mknrt w8d ym h8rbh ym hmlH tHt 1Sdt hpsgh mzrHh the plain also, and its-going-down-jordan, and the coast thereof, from like-candle-kineret even unto the sea of the plain, even the salt sea, under fire-being right-peak eastward. veha‘arabah vehayarden ugebul, mikineret ve‘ad yam ha‘arabah yam hamelakh takhat ’ashdot hapisgah mizrakhah.
w1Zw 1tkm b8t hhw1 l1mr yhwh 1lhykm ntn lkm 1t h1rZ hz1t lrSth HlwZym t8brw lpny 1Hykm bny ySr1l kl bny Hyl and i order-prescribed you at that time, saying, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim hath given you this land to possess it: ye pass over armed before-turns your brethren children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, all that are until-witness for the war. va’azav ’etkhem ba‘et hahiv lemor, yhvh ’elohekhem natan lakhem ha’arez hazot lerishtah khaluzim ta‘abru lifnei ’akhekhem bene yisra’el kal bene khayil.
rq nSykm wTpkm wmqnkm yd8ty ky mqnh rb lkm ySbw b8rykm 1Sr ntty lkm and your women, and your little ones, and your in-them-animal, (for i hand-know that ye have much in-them-animal,) abide in your cities which i have given you; raq neshekhem vetapekhem umiqnekhem yada‘ti ki miqneh rab lakhem, yeshebu be‘arekhem ’asher natati lakhem.
8d 1Sr ynyH yhwh l1Hykm kkm wyrSw gm hm 1t h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhykm ntn lhm b8br hyrdn wSbtm 1yS lyrStw 1Sr ntty lkm until yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou have given rest unto your brethren, as well as unto you, and until they also possess the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim hath given them beyond its-going-down-jordan: and then ye return every man unto his possession, which i have given you. ‘ad ’asher yaniakh yhvh la’akhekhem kakhem veyareshu gam hem ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekhem noten lahem be‘eber hayarden, veshabtem ’ish lirushato ’asher natati lakhem.
w1t yhwSw8 Zwyty b8t hhw1 l1mr 8ynyk hr1t 1t kl 1Sr 8Sh yhwh 1lhykm lSny hmlkym h1lh kn y8Sh yhwh lkl hmmlkwt 1Sr 1th 8br Smh and i order-prescribed save-joshua-jesus at that time, saying, thine eyes have seen all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim hath done unto these two moloch-kings: so yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do unto all the moloch-kingdoms whither thou passest. ve’et yehoshua‘ ziveti ba‘et hahiv lemor, ‘enekha haro’ot kal ’asher ‘asah yhvh ’elohekhem lishnei hamelakhim ha’eleh ken ya‘aseh yhvh lekhal hamamlakhot ’asher ’atah ‘ober shamah.
l1 tyr1wm ky yhwh 1lhykm hw1 hnlHm lkm ye not fear them: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim he fight for you. lo tira’um, ki yhvh ’elohekhem hu hanilkham lakhem.
w1tHnn 1l yhwh b8t hhw1 l1mr and i besought yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou at that time, saying, va’etkhanan ’el yhvh, ba‘et hahiv lemor.
1dny yhwh 1th hHlwt lhr1wt 1t 8bdk 1t gdlk w1t ydk hHzqh 1Sr my 1l bSmym wb1rZ 1Sr y8Sh km8Syk wkgbwrtk o lord-base towards-these-elohim, thou hast begun to show thy worker thy greatness, and thy mighty hand: for what towards-these-elohim is there in namespaces or in earth, that can do according to thy works, and according to thy might? ’adonay yhvh ’atah hakhilota lehar’ot ‘abdekha gadelekha ve’et yadekha hakhazaqah, ’asher mi ’el bashamayim uba’arez ’asher ya‘aseh khema‘asekha vekhigburotekha.
18brh n1 w1r1h 1t h1rZ hTwbh 1Sr b8br hyrdn hhr hTwb hzh whlbnwn i pray thee, let me go over, and see the good land that is beyond its-going-down-jordan, that goodly mountain, and build-white-lebanon. ’e‘berah na ve’er’eh ha’arez hatobah ’asher be‘eber hayarden, hahar hatob hazeh vehalebanon.
wyt8br yhwh by lm8nkm wl1 Sm8 1ly wy1mr yhwh 1ly rb lk 1l twsp dbr 1ly 8wd bdbr hzh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was wroth with me for your sakes, and would not hear me: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, let it suffice thee; speak no more unto me of this matter. vayit‘aber yhvh bi lema‘ankhem velo shama‘ ’elay, vayomer yhvh ’elay rab lakh ’al tosef daber ’elay ‘od badabar hazeh.
8lh r1S hpsgh wS1 8ynyk ymh wZpnh wtymnh wmzrHh wr1h b8ynyk ky l1 t8br 1t hyrdn hzh get thee up into the top of summit-pisgah, and lift up thine eyes sea-westward, and hide-northward, and dry-southward, and eastward, and behold it with thine eyes: for no go over this its-going-down-jordan. ‘aleh rosh hapisgah vesa ‘enekha yamah vezafonah vetemanah umizrakhah ure’eh be‘enekha, ki lo ta‘abor hayarden hazeh.
wZw 1t yhwS8 wHzqhw w1mZhw ky hw1 y8br lpny h8m hzh whw1 ynHyl 1wtm 1t h1rZ 1Sr tr1h and charge save-joshua-jesus, and encourage him, and strengthen him: for he go over before-turns this with-mum-people, and he cause them to inherit the land which thou see. vezav yehoshua‘ vekhazeqehu ve’amezehu, ki hu ya‘abor lifnei ha‘am hazeh vehu yankhil ’otam ha’arez ’asher tir’eh.
wnSb bgy1 mwl byt p8wr so we abode in the valley over against house-gaping-betpeor. vanesheb bagay mul bet pe‘or.
w8th ySr1l Sm8 1l hHqym w1l hmSpTym 1Sr 1nky mlmd 1tkm l8Swt lm8n tHyw wb1tm wyrStm 1t h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhy 1btykm ntn lkm now therefore hearken, o saturated-towards-israel, unto the statutes and unto the decision-grammars, which i teach you, for to do them, that ye may live, and go in and possess the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of your fathers giveth you. ve‘atah yisra’el shema‘ ’el hakhuqim ve’el hamishpatim ’asher ’anokhi melamed ’etkhem la‘asot, lema‘an tikhyu ubatem virishtem ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohei ’abotekhem noten lakhem.
l1 tspw 8l hdbr 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm wl1 tgr8w mmnw lSmr 1t mZwt yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm ye not add unto the bee-word which i order-prescribe you, neither ye diminish ought from it, that ye may keep the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim which i order-prescribe you. lo tosifu ‘al hadabar ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem velo tigre‘u mimenu, lishmor mizvot yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem.
8ynykm hr1t 1t 1Sr 8Sh yhwh bb8l p8wr ky kl h1yS 1Sr hlk 1Hry b8l p8wr hSmydw yhwh 1lhyk mqrbk your eyes have seen what yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did because of own-wide-open-baalpeor: for all the men that followed own-wide-open-baalpeor, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath destroyed them from inward you. ‘enekhem haro’ot ’asher ‘asah yhvh beba‘al pe‘or, ki khal ha’ish ’asher halakh ba‘al pe‘or hishmido yhvh ’elohekha miqirbekha.
w1tm hdbqym byhwh 1lhykm Hyym klkm hywm and ye that did cleave unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim are alive every one of you this day. ve’atem hadebeqim yhvh ’elohekhem, khayim kulekhem hayom.
r1h lmdty 1tkm Hqym wmSpTym k1Sr Zwny yhwh 1lhy l8Swt kn bqrb h1rZ 1Sr 1tm b1ym Smh lrSth behold, i have taught you statutes and decision-grammars, even as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou my towards-these-elohim order-prescribed me, that ye should do so in the land whither ye go to possess it. re’eh limadti ’etkhem khuqim umishpatim ka’asher zivani yhvh ’elohay, la‘asot ken beqereb ha’arez ’asher ’atem ba’im shamah lerishtah.
wSmrtm w8Sytm ky hw1 Hkmtkm wbyntkm l8yny h8mym 1Sr ySm8wn 1t kl hHqym h1lh w1mrw rq 8m Hkm wnbwn hgwy hgdwl hzh keep therefore and do them; for this is your wisdom and your understanding in the sight of the nations, which hear all these statutes, and say, surely this great nation is a wise and understanding with-mum-people. ushemartem va‘asitem ki hi khakhematkhem ubinatkhem le‘enei ha‘amim, ’asher yishme‘un kal hakhuqim ha’eleh ve’ameru raq ‘am khakham venabon hago hagadol hazeh.
ky my gwy gdwl 1Sr lw 1lhym qrbym 1lyw kyhwh 1lhynw bkl qr1nw 1lyw for what nation is there so great, who hath towards-these-elohim so nigh unto them, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim is in all things that we call upon him for? ki mi go gadol ’asher lo ’elohim qerobim ’elav, yhvh ’elohenu bekhal qare’enu ’elav.
wmy gwy gdwl 1Sr lw Hqym wmSpTym Zdyqm kkl htwrh hz1t 1Sr 1nky ntn lpnykm hywm and what nation is there so great, that hath statutes and decision-grammars so just as all this teaching, which i set before-turns you this day? umi go gadol ’asher lo khuqim umishpatim zadiqim, kekhol hatorah hazot ’asher ’anokhi noten lifnekhem hayom.
rq hSmr lk wSmr npSk m1d pn tSkH 1t hdbrym 1Sr r1w 8ynyk wpn yswrw mlbbk kl ymy Hyyk whwd8tm lbnyk wlbny bnyk only take heed to thyself, and keep thy being diligently, lest thou forget the things which thine eyes have seen, and lest they depart from thy heart all the days of thy life: and teach them thy children-betweens, and thy children-betweens' children-betweens; raq hishamer lekha ushemor nafshekha me’od pen tishkakh hadebarim ’asher ra’u ‘enekha ufen yasuru milebabekha kol yemei khayekha, vehoda‘tam lebanekha velibnei banekha.
ywm 1Sr 8mdt lpny yhwh 1lhyk bHrb b1mr yhwh 1ly hqhl ly 1t h8m w1Sm8m 1t dbry 1Sr ylmdwn lyr1h 1ty kl hymym 1Sr hm Hyym 8l h1dmh w1t bnyhm ylmdwn specially the day that thou stoodest before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim in sword-horeb, when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, gather me the with-mum-people together, and i will make them hear my bee-words, that they may learn to fear me all the days that they live upon the earth, and that they may teach their children-betweens. yom ’asher ‘amadta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha bekhoreb be’emor yhvh ’elay haqhel li ha‘am ve’ashmi‘em debaray, ’asher yilmedun leyir’ah ’oti kal hayamim ’asher hem khayim ‘al ha’adamah ve’et benehem yelamedun.
wtqrbwn wt8mdwn tHt hhr whhr b8r b1S 8d lb hSmym HSk 8nn w8rpl and ye came near and stood under the mountain; and the mountain burned with fire unto the midst of namespaces, with darkness, clouds, and thick darkness. vatiqrebun vata‘amdun takhat hahar, vehahar bo‘er ba’esh ‘ad leb hashamayim khoshekh ‘anan va‘arafel.
wydbr yhwh 1lykm mtwk h1S qwl dbrym 1tm Sm8ym wtmwnh 1ynkm r1ym zwlty qwl and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto you out of the midst of the fire: ye heard the voice of the bee-words, and saw no similitude; only ye heard a voice. vaydaber yhvh ’alekhem mitokh ha’esh, qol debarim ’atem shome‘im utemunah ’enekhem ro’im zulati qol.
wygd lkm 1t brytw 1Sr Zwh 1tkm l8Swt 8Srt hdbrym wyktbm 8l Sny lHwt 1bnym and he declared unto you his covenant, which he order-prescribed you to perform, even ten order-prescriptions; and he wrote them upon two tables of father-child-stone. vayaged lakhem berito ’asher zivah ’etkhem la‘asot ‘aseret hadebarim, vayikhtebem ‘al shenei lukhot ’abanim.
w1ty Zwh yhwh b8t hhw1 llmd 1tkm Hqym wmSpTym l8Stkm 1tm b1rZ 1Sr 1tm 8brym Smh lrSth and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed me at that time to teach you statutes and decision-grammars, that ye might do them in the land whither ye go over to possess it. ve’oti zivah yhvh ba‘et hahiv lelamed ’etkhem khuqim umishpatim, la‘asotekhem ’otam ba’arez ’asher ’atem ‘oberim shamah lerishtah.
wnSmrtm m1d lnpStykm ky l1 r1ytm kl tmwnh bywm dbr yhwh 1lykm bHrb mtwk h1S take ye therefore good heed unto yourselves; for ye saw no manner of similitude on the day that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto you in sword-horeb out of the midst of the fire: venishmartem me’od lenafshotekhem, ki lo re’item kal temunah beyom diber yhvh ’alekhem bekhoreb mitokh ha’esh.
pn tSHtwn w8Sytm lkm psl tmwnt kl sml tbnyt zkr 1w nqbh lest ye corrupt yourselves, and make you a graven image, the similitude of any figure, the likeness of rememberer or pierced, pen tashkhitun va‘asitem lakhem pesel temunat kal samel, tabnit zakhar ’o neqebah.
tbnyt kl bhmh 1Sr b1rZ tbnyt kl Zpwr knp 1Sr t8wp bSmym the likeness of any beast that is on the earth, the likeness of any winged fowl that flieth in the air, tabnit kal behemah ’asher ba’arez, tabnit kal zipor kanaf ’asher ta‘uf bashamayim.
tbnyt kl rmS b1dmh tbnyt kl dgh 1Sr bmym mtHt l1rZ the likeness of any thing that creepeth on the ground, the likeness of any fish that is in the from-waters beneath the earth: tabnit kal romes ba’adamah, tabnit kal dagah ’asher bamayim mitakhat la’arez.
wpn tS1 8ynyk hSmymh wr1yt 1t hSmS w1t hyrH w1t hkwkbym kl Zb1 hSmym wndHt whStHwyt lhm w8bdtm 1Sr Hlq yhwh 1lhyk 1tm lkl h8mym tHt kl hSmym and lest thou lift up thine eyes unto namespaces, and when thou seest the sun, and the moon, and the stars, even all the troop-cluster of namespaces, shouldest be driven to partake-shatakh them, and work for them, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath divided unto all nations under the whole namespaces. ufen tisa ‘enekha hashamaymah vera’ita hashemesh ve’et hayareakh ve’et hakokhabim kol zeba hashamayim venidakhta vehishtakhavita lahem va‘abadtam, ’asher khalaq yhvh ’elohekha lekhol ha‘amim takhat kal hashamayim.
w1tkm lqH yhwh wywZ1 1tkm mkwr hbrzl mmZrym lhywt lw l8m nHlh kywm hzh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace, even out of narrows-mizraim, to be unto him a with-mum-people of inheritance, as ye are this day. ve’etkhem laqakh yhvh vayozi ’etkhem mikur habarzel mimizrayim, lihyot lo le‘am nakhalah kayom hazeh.
wyhwh ht1np by 8l dbrykm wySb8 lblty 8bry 1t hyrdn wlblty b1 1l h1rZ hTwbh 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk nHlh furthermore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was angry with me for your sakes, and sware that i should not go over its-going-down-jordan, and that i should not go in unto that good land, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee for an inheritance: yhvh hit’anef bi ‘al dibrekhem, vayishaba‘ lebilti ‘aberi hayarden ulebilti bo ’el ha’arez hatobah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha nakhalah.
ky 1nky mt b1rZ hz1t 1ynny 8br 1t hyrdn w1tm 8brym wyrStm 1t h1rZ hTwbh hz1t and i must die in this land, i must not go over its-going-down-jordan: and ye go over, and possess that good land. ki ’anokhi met ba’arez hazot ’eneni ‘ober hayarden, ve’atem ‘oberim virishtem ha’arez hatobah hazot.
hSmrw lkm pn tSkHw 1t bryt yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr krt 8mkm w8Sytm lkm psl tmwnt kl 1Sr Zwk yhwh 1lhyk take heed unto yourselves, lest ye forget the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which he made with you, and make you a graven image, or the likeness of any thing, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath forbidden thee. hishameru lakhem pen tishkekhu berit yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher karat ‘imakhem, va‘asitem lakhem pesel temunat kol ’asher zivekha yhvh ’elohekha.
ky yhwh 1lhyk 1S 1klh hw1 1l qn1 for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim is a consuming fire, even a jealous towards-these-elohim. ki yhvh ’elohekha ’esh ’okhelah hu, ’el qana.
ky twlyd bnym wbny bnym wnwSntm b1rZ whSHtm w8Sytm psl tmwnt kl w8Sytm hr8 b8yny yhwh 1lhyk lhk8ysw when thou beget children-betweens, and children-betweens's children-betweens, and ye have remained long in the land, and corrupt yourselves, and make a graven image, or the likeness of any thing, and do bad in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to provoke him to nose-anger: ki tolid banim ubenei banim venoshantem ba’arez, vehishkhatem va‘asitem pesel temunat kol va‘asitem hara‘ be‘enei yhvh ’elohekha lehakh‘iso.
h8ydty bkm hywm 1t hSmym w1t h1rZ ky 1bd t1bdwn mhr m8l h1rZ 1Sr 1tm 8brym 1t hyrdn Smh lrSth l1 t1rykn ymym 8lyh ky hSmd tSmdwn i call namespaces and earth to witness against you this day, that ye soon utterly perish from off the land whereunto ye go over its-going-down-jordan to possess it; ye not prolong your days upon it, and utterly be destroyed. ha‘idoti bakhem hayom hashamayim ve’et ha’arez ki ’abod tobedun maher me‘al ha’arez ’asher ’atem ‘oberim hayarden shamah lerishtah, lo ta’arikhun yamim ‘aleha ki hishamed tishamedun.
whpyZ yhwh 1tkm b8mym wnS1rtm mty mspr bgwym 1Sr ynhg yhwh 1tkm Smh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou scatter you among the nations, and ye be left few in number among the nations, whither yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou lead you. vehefiz yhvh ’etkhem ba‘amim, venish’artem metei mispar bagoyim ’asher yenaheg yhvh ’etkhem shamah.
w8bdtm Sm 1lhym m8Sh ydy 1dm 8Z w1bn 1Sr l1 yr1wn wl1 ySm8wn wl1 y1klwn wl1 yryHn and there ye work for towards-these-elohim, the work of men's hands, wood and father-child-stone, which neither see, nor hear, nor eat, nor smell. va‘abadtem sham ’elohim ma‘aseh yedei ’adam, ‘ez va’eben ’asher lo yir’un velo yishme‘un velo yokhelun velo yerikhun.
wbqStm mSm 1t yhwh 1lhyk wmZ1t ky tdrSnw bkl lbbk wbkl npSk and if from thence thou seek yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, thou find him, if thou seek him with all thy heart and with all thy being. ubiqashtem misham yhvh ’elohekha umazata, ki tidreshenu bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
bZr lk wmZ1wk kl hdbrym h1lh b1Hryt hymym wSbt 8d yhwh 1lhyk wSm8t bqlw when thou art in tribulation, and all these things are come upon thee, even in the latter days, if thou turn to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and be hearing unto his voice; bazar lekha umeza’ukha kol hadebarim ha’eleh, be’akharit hayamim veshabta ‘ad yhvh ’elohekha veshama‘ta beqolo.
ky 1l rHwm yhwh 1lhyk l1 yrpk wl1 ySHytk wl1 ySkH 1t bryt 1btyk 1Sr nSb8 lhm (for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim is a merciful towards-these-elohim;) he will not forsake thee, neither destroy thee, nor forget the covenant of thy fathers which he sware unto them. ki ’el rakhum yhvh ’elohekha lo yarpekha velo yashkhitekha, velo yishkakh berit ’abotekha ’asher nishba‘ lahem.
ky S1l n1 lymym r1Snym 1Sr hyw lpnyk lmn hywm 1Sr br1 1lhym 1dm 8l h1rZ wlmqZh hSmym w8d qZh hSmym hnhyh kdbr hgdwl hzh 1w hnSm8 kmhw for ask now of the days that are past, which were before-turns thee, since the day that towards-these-elohim created man upon the earth, and ask from the one side of namespaces unto the other, whether there hath been any such thing as this great thing is, or hath been heard like it? ki she’al na leyamim rishonim ’asher hayu lefanekha lemin hayom ’asher bara ’elohim ’adam ‘al ha’arez ulemiqzeh hashamayim ve‘ad qezeh hashamayim, hanihyah kadabar hagadol hazeh ’o hanishma‘ kamohu.
hSm8 8m qwl 1lhym mdbr mtwk h1S k1Sr Sm8t 1th wyHy did ever with-mum-people hear the voice of towards-these-elohim speaking out of the midst of the fire, as thou hast heard, and live? hashama‘ ‘am qol ’elohim medaber mitokh ha’esh ka’asher shama‘ta ’atah vayekhi.
1w hnsh 1lhym lbw1 lqHt lw gwy mqrb gwy bmst b1tt wbmwptym wbmlHmh wbyd Hzqh wbzrw8 nTwyh wbmwr1ym gdlym kkl 1Sr 8Sh lkm yhwh 1lhykm bmZrym l8ynyk or hath towards-these-elohim assayed to go and take him a nation from the midst of another nation, by temptations, by signs, and by wonders, and by war, and by a mighty hand, and by a stretched out arm, and by great terrors, according to all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim did for you in narrows-mizraim before-turns your eyes? ’o hanisah ’elohim labo laqakhat lo go miqereb go bemasot be’otot ubemoftim ubemilkhamah ubeyad khazaqah ubizroa‘ netuyah ubemora’im gedolim, kekhol ’asher ‘asah lakhem yhvh ’elohekhem bemizrayim le‘enekha.
1th hr1t ld8t ky yhwh hw1 h1lhym 1yn 8wd mlbdw unto thee it was showed, that thou mightest hand-know that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou he is towards-these-elohim; there is none else beside him. ’atah hare’eta lada‘at ki yhvh hu ha’elohim, ’en ‘od milbado.
mn hSmym hSmy8k 1t qlw lysrk w8l h1rZ hr1k 1t 1Sw hgdwlh wdbryw Sm8t mtwk h1S out of namespaces he made thee to hear his voice, that he might instruct thee: and upon earth he showed thee his great fire; and thou heardest his bee-words out of the midst of the fire. min hashamayim hishmi‘akha qolo leyasereka, ve‘al ha’arez her’akha ’isho hagedolah udebarav shama‘ta mitokh ha’esh.
wtHt ky 1hb 1t 1btyk wybHr bzr8w 1Hryw wywZ1k bpnyw bkHw hgdl mmZrym and because he loved thy fathers, therefore he chose their seed after them, and brought thee out in his sight with his mighty dynamic out of narrows-mizraim; vetakhat ki ’ahab ’abotekha vayibkhar bezar‘o ’akharav, vayozi’akha befanav bekhokho hagadol mimizrayim.
lhwryS gwym gdlym w8Zmym mmk mpnyk lhby1k ltt lk 1t 1rZm nHlh kywm hzh to drive out nations from before-turns thee greater and mightier than thou art, to bring thee in, to give thee their land for an inheritance, as it is this day. lehorish goyim gedolim va‘azumim mimekha mipanekha, lahabi’akha latet lekha ’arzam nakhalah kayom hazeh.
wyd8t hywm whSbt 1l lbbk ky yhwh hw1 h1lhym bSmym mm8l w8l h1rZ mtHt 1yn 8wd hand-know therefore this day, and consider it in thine heart, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou he is towards-these-elohim in namespaces above, and upon the earth beneath: there is none else. veyada‘ta hayom vahashebota ’el lebabekha ki yhvh hu ha’elohim bashamayim mima‘al ve‘al ha’arez mitakhat, ’en ‘od.
wSmrt 1t Hqyw w1t mZwtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm 1Sr yyTb lk wlbnyk 1Hryk wlm8n t1ryk ymym 8l h1dmh 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk kl hymym thou keep therefore his statutes, and his order-prescriptions, which i order-prescribe thee this day, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children-betweens after thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days upon the earth, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee, all days. veshamarta khuqav ve’et mizvotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom ’asher yitab lekha ulebanekha ’akharekha, ulema‘an ta’arikh yamim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha kal hayamim.
1z ybdyl mSh SlS 8rym b8br hyrdn mzrHh SmS then extracted-mose severed three cities on this side its-going-down-jordan toward the sunrising; ’az yabdil mosheh shalosh ‘arim be‘eber hayarden, mizrekhah shamesh.
lns Smh rwZH 1Sr yrZH 1t r8hw bbly d8t whw1 l1 Sn1 lw mtmwl SlSwm wns 1l 1Ht mn h8rym h1l wHy that the slayer might flee thither, which should kill his neighbor unawares, and hated him not in times past; and that fleeing unto one of these cities he might live: lanus shamah rozeakh ’asher yirzakh re‘ehu bibli da‘at vehu lo sonei lo mitemol shilshom, venas ’el ’akhat min he‘arim ha’el vakhay.
1t bZr bmdbr b1rZ hmySr lr1wbny w1t r1mt bgl8d lgdy w1t gwln bbSn lmnSy namely, ore-bezer in the place-of-word-desert, in the plain country, of the buddy-see-child-reubenites; and voiceless-ramoth in roll-until-heap-gilead, of the luck-gadites; and wave-reveal-golan in at-tooth-bashan, of the place-of-sleep-manassites. bezer bamidbar be’erez hamishor laru’ubeni, ve’et ramot bagil‘ad lagadi ve’et golan babashan lamnashi.
wz1t htwrh 1Sr Sm mSh lpny bny ySr1l and this is the teaching which extracted-mose set before-turns children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: vezot hatorah, ’asher sam mosheh lifnei benei yisra’el.
1lh h8dt whHqym whmSpTym 1Sr dbr mSh 1l bny ySr1l bZ1tm mmZrym these are the testimonies, and the statutes, and the decision-grammars, which extracted-mose spake unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel, after they came forth out of narrows-mizraim. ’eleh ha‘edot vehakhuqim vehamishpatim, ’asher diber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el bezetam mimizrayim.
b8br hyrdn bgy1 mwl byt p8wr b1rZ syHn mlk h1mry 1Sr ywSb bHSbwn 1Sr hkh mSh wbny ySr1l bZ1tm mmZrym on this side its-going-down-jordan, in the valley over against house-gaping-betpeor, in the land of curly-sihon moloch-king of the talker-amorites, who dwelt at score-heshbon, whom extracted-mose and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel smote, after they were come forth out of narrows-mizraim: be‘eber hayarden bagay mul bet pe‘or be’erez sikhon melekh ha’emori ’asher yosheb bekheshbon, ’asher hikah mosheh ubenei yisra’el bezetam mimizrayim.
wyyrSw 1t 1rZw w1t 1rZ 8wg mlk hbSn Sny mlky h1mry 1Sr b8br hyrdn mzrH SmS and they possessed his land, and the land of mock-og moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan, two moloch-kings of the talker-amorites, which were on this side its-going-down-jordan toward the sunrising; vayireshu ’et ’arzo ve’et ’erez ‘og melekh habashan shenei malkhei ha’emori ’asher be‘eber hayarden, mizrakh shamesh.
m8r8r 1Sr 8l Spt nHl 1rnn w8d hr Sy1n hw1 Hrmwn from juniper-object-aroer, which is by the bank of the river pine-arnon, even unto mount zenith-sion, which is fishing-net-hermon, me‘aro‘er ’asher ‘al sefat nakhal ’arnon ve‘ad har si’on hu khermon.

wyqr1 mSh 1l kl ySr1l wy1mr 1lhm Sm8 ySr1l 1t hHqym w1t hmSpTym 1Sr 1nky dbr b1znykm hywm wlmdtm 1tm wSmrtm l8Stm and extracted-mose called all saturated-towards-israel, and said unto them, hear, o saturated-towards-israel, the statutes and decision-grammars which i speak in your ears this day, that ye may learn them, and keep, and do them. vayiqra mosheh ’el kal yisra’el vayomer ’alehem shema‘ yisra’el hakhuqim ve’et hamishpatim ’asher ’anokhi dober be’azenekhem hayom, ulemadtem ’otam ushemartem la‘asotam.

l1 1t 1btynw krt yhwh 1t hbryt hz1t ky 1tnw 1nHnw 1lh ph hywm klnw Hyym yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made not this covenant with our fathers, and with us, even us, who are all of us here alive this day. lo ’et ’abotenu karat yhvh haberit hazot, ki ’itanu ’anakhnu ’eleh foh hayom kulanu khayim.
pnym bpnym dbr yhwh 8mkm bhr mtwk h1S yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou talked with you face-turns to face-turns in the mount out of the midst of the fire, panim befanim diber yhvh ‘imakhem bahar mitokh ha’esh.
1nky 8md byn yhwh wbynykm b8t hhw1 lhgyd lkm 1t dbr yhwh ky yr1tm mpny h1S wl1 8lytm bhr l1mr (i stood between-bin yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou and you at that time, to show you the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: for ye were afraid by reason of the fire, and went not up into the mount;) saying, ’anokhi ‘omed ben yhvh ubenekhem ba‘et hahiv lehagid lakhem debar yhvh, ki yeretem mipenei ha’esh velo ‘alitem bahar lemor..

l1 yhyh lk 1lhym 1Hrym 8l pny thou have none other towards-these-elohim before-turns me. lo yihyeh lekha ’elohim ’akherim ‘al panaya.
l1 t8Sh lk psl kl tmwnh 1Sr bSmym mm8l w1Sr b1rZ mtHt w1Sr bmym mtHt l1rZ no make thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing that is in namespaces above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the from-waters beneath the earth: lo ta‘aseh lekha fesel kal temunah ’asher bashamayim mima‘al va’asher ba’arez mitakhat va’asher bamayim mitakhat la’arez.
l1 tStHwh lhm wl1 t8bdm ky 1nky yhwh 1lhyk 1l qn1 pqd 8wn 1bwt 8l bnym w8l SlSym w8l rb8ym lSn1y no bow down thyself unto them, nor work for them: for i yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim am a jealous towards-these-elohim, visiting the torment of the fathers upon children-betweens unto the third and fourth generation of them that hate me, lo tishtakhaveh lahem velo ta‘abedem ki ’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha ’el qana poqed ‘avon ’abot ‘al banim ve‘al shileshim ve‘al ribe‘im lesone’ay.
w8Sh Hsd l1lpym l1hby wlSmry mZwtw mZwty and showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my order-prescriptions. ve‘oseh khesed la’alafim le’ohabay uleshomerei mizvotay.
l1 tS1 1t Sm yhwh 1lhyk lSw1 ky l1 ynqh yhwh 1t 1Sr yS1 1t Smw lSw1 no take the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim in vain: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain. lo tisa shem yhvh ’elohekha lashav, ki lo yenaqeh yhvh ’asher yisa shemo lashav.
Smwr 1t ywm hSbt lqdSw k1Sr Zwk yhwh 1lhyk keep the seven-sabbath day to dedicate-finify it, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath order-prescribed thee. shamor yom hashabat leqadesho ka’asher zivekha yhvh ’elohekha
SSt ymym t8bd w8Syt kl ml1ktk six days thou labor, and do all thy work: sheshet yamim ta‘abod ve‘asita kla melakhtekha.
wywm hSby8y Sbt lyhwh 1lhyk l1 t8Sh kl ml1kh 1th wbnk wbtk w8bdk w1mtk wSwrk wHmrk wkl bhmtk wgrk 1Sr bS8ryk lm8n ynwH 8bdk w1mtk kmwk and the seventh day is the seven-sabbath of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: in it no do any work, thou, nor thy child-between, nor thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, nor thy worker, nor thy mum-true-maid, nor thine wall-ox, nor thine ass, nor any of thy in-them-animal, nor thy stranger that is within thy hair-gates; that thy worker and thy mum-true-maid may rest as well as thou. veyom hashebi‘i shabat yhvh ’elohekha lo ta‘aseh khal melakhah ’atah ubinkha ubitekha ve‘abdekha va’amatekha veshorkha vakhamorekha vekhal behemtekha vegerekha ’asher bish‘arekha lema‘an yanuakh ‘abdekha va’amatekha kamokha.
wzkrt ky 8bd hyyt b1rZ mZrym wyZ1k yhwh 1lhyk mSm byd Hzqh wbzr8 nTwyh 8l kn Zwk yhwh 1lhyk l8Swt 1t ywm hSbt and remember that thou wast a worker in the land of narrows-mizraim, and that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim brought thee out thence through a mighty hand and by a stretched out arm: therefore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim order-prescribed thee to keep the seven-sabbath day. vezakharta ki ‘ebed hayita be’erez mizrayim vayozi’akha yhvh ’elohekha misham beyad khazaqah ubizroa‘ netuyah ‘al ken zivekha yhvh ’elohekha la‘asot yom hashabat.
kbd 1t 1byk w1t 1mk k1Sr Zwk yhwh 1lhyk lm8n y1rykn ymyk wlm8n yyTb lk 8l h1dmh 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk give weight to thy father and thy mother, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath order-prescribed thee; that thy days may be prolonged, and that it may go well with thee, in the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee. kabed ’abikha ve’et ’imekha ka’asher zivekha yhvh ’elohekha, lema‘an ya’arikhun yamekha ulema‘an yitab lakh ‘al ha’adamah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
l1 trZH no kill. lo trezakh.
wl1 tn1p neither thou commit adultery. velo tne’af.
wl1 tgnb neither thou steal. velo tgenob.
wl1 t8nh br8k 8d Sw1 neither thou bear false witness against thy neighbor. velo ta‘aneh bere‘akha ‘ed shav.
wl1 tHmd 1St r8k wl1 tt1wh byt r8k Sdhw w8bdw w1mtw Swrw wHmrw wkl 1Sr lr8k neither thou desire thy neighbor's woman, neither thou covet thy neighbor's daughter-house, his field, or his worker, or his mum-true-maid, his wall-ox, or his ass, or any thing that is thy neighbor's. velo takhmod ’eshet re‘ekha, velo tit’aveh bet re‘ekha sadehu ve‘abdo va’amato shoro vakhamoro vekhol ’asher lere‘ekha.
1t hdbrym h1lh dbr yhwh 1l kl qhlkm bhr mtwk h1S h8nn wh8rpl qwl gdwl wl1 ysp wyktbm 8l Sny lHt 1bnym wytnm 1ly these bee-words yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto all your assembly in the mount out of the midst of the fire, of the cloud, and of the thick darkness, with a great voice: and he added no more. and he wrote them in two tables of father-child-stone, and delivered them unto me. hadebarim ha’eleh diber yhvh ’el kal qehalkhem bahar mitokh ha’esh he‘anan veha‘arafel qol gadol velo yasaf, vayikhtebem ‘al shenei lukhot ’abanim vayitenem ’elay.
wyhy kSm8km 1t hqwl mtwk hHSk whhr b8r b1S wtqrbwn 1ly kl r1Sy SbTykm wzqnykm and it came to pass, when ye heard the voice out of the midst of the darkness, (for the mountain did burn with fire,) that ye came near unto me, even all the heads of your branchs, and your elders; vayhi keshame‘akhem haqol mitokh hakhoshekh vehahar bo‘er ba’esh, vatiqrebun ’elay kal rashei shibtekhem veziqnekhem.
wt1mrw hn hr1nw yhwh 1lhynw 1t kbdw w1t gdlw w1t qlw Sm8nw mtwk h1S hywm hzh r1ynw ky ydbr 1lhym 1t h1dm wHy and ye said, behold, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim hath showed us his heaviness and his greatness, and we have heard his voice out of the midst of the fire: we have seen this day that towards-these-elohim doth talk with man, and he liveth. vatomeru hen her’anu yhvh ’elohenu kebodo ve’et gadelo ve’et qolo shama‘nu mitokh ha’esh, hayom hazeh ra’inu ki yedaber ’elohim ’et ha’adam vakhay.
w8th lmh nmwt ky t1klnw h1S hgdlh hz1t 1m yspym 1nHnw lSm8 1t qwl yhwh 1lhynw 8wd wmtnw now therefore why should we die? for this great fire will consume us: if we hear the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim any more, then we die. ve‘atah lamah namut ki tokhelenu ha’esh hagedolah hazot, ’im yosefim ’anakhnu lishmoa‘ qol yhvh ’elohenu ‘od vamatenu.
ky my kl bSr 1Sr Sm8 qwl 1lhym Hyym mdbr mtwk h1S kmnw wyHy for who is there of all flesh, that hath heard the voice of the living towards-these-elohim speaking out of the midst of the fire, as we have, and lived? ki mi khal basar ’asher shama‘ qol ’elohim khayim medaber mitokh ha’esh kamonu vayekhi.
qrb 1th wSm8 1t kl 1Sr y1mr yhwh 1lhynw w1t tdbr 1lynw 1t kl 1Sr ydbr yhwh 1lhynw 1lyk wSm8nw w8Synw go thou near, and hear all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim say: and speak thou unto us all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim speak unto thee; and we will hear it, and do it. qerab ’atah ushama‘ kal ’asher yomar yhvh ’elohenu, ve’at tedaber ’elenu kal ’asher yedaber yhvh ’elohenu ’elekha veshama‘nu ve‘asinu.
wySm8 yhwh 1t qwl dbrykm bdbrkm 1ly wy1mr yhwh 1ly Sm8ty 1t qwl dbry h8m hzh 1Sr dbrw 1lyk hyTybw kl 1Sr dbrw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou heard the voice of your bee-words, when ye spake unto me; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, i have heard the voice of the bee-words of this with-mum-people, which they have bee-spoken unto thee: they have well said all that they have bee-spoken. vayishma‘ yhvh qol dibrekhem bedaberkhem ’elay, vayomer yhvh ’elay ma‘ti qol dibrei ha‘am hazeh ’asher diberu ’elekha hetibu kal ’asher diberu.
my ytn whyh lbbm zh lhm lyr1h 1ty wlSmr 1t kl mZwty kl hymym lm8n yyTb lhm wlbnyhm l8lm o that there were such an heart in them, that they would fear me, and keep all my order-prescriptions always, that it might be well with them, and with their children-betweens for ever! mi yiten vehayah lebabam zeh lahem leyir’ah ’oti velishmor kal mizvotay kal hayamim, lema‘an yitab lahem velibnehem le‘olam.
lk 1mr lhm Swbw lkm l1hlykm go say to them, get you into your tents again. lekh ’emor lahem, shubu lakhem le’aholekhem.
w1th ph 8md 8mdy w1dbrh 1lyk 1t kl hmZwh whHqym whmSpTym 1Sr tlmdm w8Sw b1rZ 1Sr 1nky ntn lhm lrSth and as for thee, stand thou here by me, and i will speak unto thee all the order-prescriptions, and the statutes, and the decision-grammars, which thou teach them, that they may do them in the land which i give them to possess it. ve’atah poh ‘amod ‘imadi va’adaberah ’elekha kal hamizvah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim ’asher telamedem, ve‘asu ba’arez ’asher ’anokhi noten lahem lerishtah.
wSmrtm l8Swt k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1lhykm 1tkm l1 tsrw ymyn wSm1l ye guard-observe to do therefore as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim hath order-prescribed you: ye not turn aside to the right hand or to the left. ushemartem la‘asot ka’asher zivah yhvh ’elohekhem ’etkhem, lo tasuru yamin usemol.
