wl1 tby1 tw8bh 1l bytk whyyt Hrm kmhw SqZ tSqZnw wt8b tt8bnw ky Hrm hw1 neither thou bring an abomination into thine daughter-house, lest thou be a cursed thing like it: and thou utterly detest it, and thou utterly crave-abhor it; for it is a cursed thing. velo tabi to‘ebah ’el betekha vehayita kherem kamohu, shaqez teshaqezenu veta‘eb teta‘abenu ki kherem hu.
kl hmZwh 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm tSmrwn l8Swt lm8n tHywn wrbytm wb1tm wyrStm 1t h1rZ 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btykm all the order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe thee this day ye guard-observe to do, that ye may live, and multiply, and go in and possess the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto your fathers. kal hamizvah ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom tishmerun la‘asot, lema‘an tikhyun urebitem ubatem virishtem ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekhem.
wzkrt 1t kl hdrk 1Sr hlykk yhwh 1lhyk zh 1rb8ym Snh bmdbr lm8n 8ntk lnstk ld8t 1t 1Sr blbbk htSmr mZwtw mZwtyw 1m l1 and thou remember all the way which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim led thee these forty years in the place-of-word-desert, to humble thee, and to prove thee, to hand-know what was in thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep his order-prescriptions, or no. vezakharta kal haderekh ’asher holikhakha yhvh ’elohekha zeh ’arba‘im shanah bamidbar, lema‘an ‘anotekha lenasotekha lada‘at ’asher bilbabekha hatishmor mizvotav ’im lo.
wy8nk wyr8bk wy1klk 1t hmn 1Sr l1 yd8t wl1 yd8wn 1btyk lm8n hwd8k ky l1 8l hlHm lbdw yHyh h1dm ky 8l kl mwZ1 py yhwh yHyh h1dm and he humbled thee, and suffered thee to hunger, and fed thee with whats-that-manna, which thou hand-knewest not, neither did thy fathers hand-know; that he might make thee hand-know that man doth not live by bread only, and by every bee-word that proceedeth out of the mouth of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou doth man live. vay‘anekha vayar‘ibekha vaya’akhilkha haman ’asher lo yada‘ta velo yade‘un ’abotekha, lema‘an hodi‘akha ki lo ‘al halekhem lebado yikhyeh ha’adam ki ‘al kal moza fi yhvh yikhyeh ha’adam.
Smltk l1 blth m8lyk wrglk l1 bZqh zh 1rb8ym Snh thy raiment waxed not old upon thee, neither did thy foot swell, these forty years. simlatekha lo baletah me‘alekha veraglekha lo bazeqah, zeh ’arba‘im shanah.
wyd8t 8m lbbk ky k1Sr yysr 1yS 1t bnw yhwh 1lhyk mysrk thou also consider in thine heart, that, as a man chasteneth his child-between, so yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim chasteneth thee. veyada‘ta ‘im lebabekha, ki ka’asher yeyaser ’ish beno yhvh ’elohekha meyasereka.
wSmrt 1t mZwt yhwh 1lhyk llkt bdrkyw wlyr1h 1tw therefore thou keep the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to walk in his ways, and to fear him. veshamarta mizvot yhvh ’elohekha, lalekhet bidrakhav uleyir’ah ’oto.
ky yhwh 1lhyk mby1k 1l 1rZ Twbh 1rZ nHly mym 8ynt wthmt yZ1ym bbq8h wbhr for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim bringeth thee into a good land, a land of brooks of from-waters, of fountains and depths that spring out of valleys and hills; ki yhvh ’elohekha mebi’akha ’el ’erez tobah, ’erez nakhalei mayim ‘ayanot utehomot yoze’im babiq‘ah ubahar.
1rZ HTh wS8rh wgpn wt1nh wrmwn 1rZ zyt Smn wdbS a land of wheat, and gates-barley, and vines, and fig trees, and high-pomegranates; a land of name-from-oil olive, and honey; ’erez khitah use‘orah vegefen ute’enah verimon, ’erez zet shemen udebash.
1rZ 1Sr l1 bmsknt t1kl bh lHm l1 tHsr kl bh 1rZ 1Sr 1bnyh brzl wmhrryh tHZb nHSt a land wherein thou eat bread without scarceness, no lack any thing in it; a land whose stones are iron, and out of whose hills thou mayest dig brass. ’erez ’asher lo bemiskenut tokhal bah lekhem lo tekhsar kol bah, ’erez ’asher ’abaneha barzel umeharareha takhzob nekhoshet.
w1klt wSb8t wbrkt 1t yhwh 1lhyk 8l h1rZ hTbh 1Sr ntn lk when thou hast eaten and art full, then thou knee-fluffy-bless yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim for the good land which he hath given thee. ve’akhalta vesaba‘eta, uberakhta yhvh ’elohekha ‘al ha’arez hatobah ’asher natan lakh.
hSmr lk pn tSkH 1t yhwh 1lhyk lblty Smr mZwtyw wmSpTyw wHqtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm beware that thou forget not yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, in not keeping his order-prescriptions, and his decision-grammars, and his statutes, which i order-prescribe thee this day: hishamer lekha pen tishkakh yhvh ’elohekha, lebilti shemor mizvotav umishpatav vekhuqotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom.
pn t1kl wSb8t wbtym Twbym tbnh wySbt lest when thou hast eaten and art full, and hast between-built goodly daughter-houses, and dwelt therein; pen tokhal vesaba‘eta, ubatim tobim tibneh veyashabeta.
wbqrk wZ1nk yrbyn wksp wzhb yrbh lk wkl 1Sr lk yrbh and when thy visit-cattles and thy flocks multiply, and thy silver and thy gold is multiplied, and all that thou hast is multiplied; ubeqarekha vezonekha yirbeyun vekhesef vezahab yirbeh lakh, vekhol ’asher lekha yirbeh.
wrm lbbk wSkHt 1t yhwh 1lhyk hmwZy1k m1rZ mZrym mbyt 8bdym then thine heart be lifted up, and thou forget yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, which brought thee forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim, from the daughter-house of bondage; veram lebabekha, veshakhakhta yhvh ’elohekha hamozi’akha me’erez mizrayim mibet ‘abadim.
hmwlykk bmdbr hgdl whnwr1 nHS Srp w8qrb wZm1wn 1Sr 1yn mym hmwZy1 lk mym mZwr hHlmyS who led thee through that great and terrible place-of-word-desert, wherein were fiery serpents, and scorpions, and drought, where there was no from-waters; who brought thee forth from-waters out of the rock of flint; hamolikhakha bamidbar hagadol vehanora nakhash saraf ve‘aqrab vezima’on ’asher ’en mayim, hamozi lekha mayim mizur hakhalamish.
hm1klk mn bmdbr 1Sr l1 yd8wn 1btyk lm8n 8ntk wlm8n nstk lhyTbk b1Hrytk who fed thee in the place-of-word-desert with whats-that-manna, which thy fathers hand-knew not, that he might humble thee, and that he might prove thee, to do thee good at thy latter end; hama’akhilkha man bamidbar ’asher lo yade‘un ’abotekha, lema‘an ‘anotekha ulema‘an nasotekha lehetibkha be’akharitekha.
w1mrt blbbk kHy w8Zm ydy 8Sh ly 1t hHyl hzh and thou say in thine heart, my dynamic and the might of mine hand hath gotten me this wealth. ve’amarta bilbabekha, kokhi ve‘ozem yadi ‘asah li hakhayil hazeh.
wzkrt 1t yhwh 1lhyk ky hw1 hntn lk kH l8Swt Hyl lm8n hqym 1t brytw 1Sr nSb8 l1btyk kywm hzh and thou remember yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: for it is he that giveth thee dynamic to get wealth, that he may establish his covenant which he sware unto thy fathers, as it is this day. vezakharta yhvh ’elohekha ki hu hanoten lekha koakh la‘asot khayil, lema‘an haqim berito ’asher nishba‘ la’abotekha kayom hazeh.
whyh 1m SkH tSkH 1t yhwh 1lhyk whlkt 1Hry 1lhym 1Hrym w8bdtm whStHwyt lhm h8dty bkm hywm ky 1bd t1bdwn and it be, if thou do at all forget yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and walk after other towards-these-elohim, and work for them, and partake-shatakh them, i testify against you this day that ye surely perish. vehayah ’im shakhoakh tishkakh yhvh ’elohekha vehalakhta ’akharei ’elohim ’akherim va‘abadtam vehishtakhavita lahem, ha‘idoti bakhem hayom ki ’abod tobedun.
kgwym 1Sr yhwh m1byd mpnykm kn t1bdwn 8qb l1 tSm8wn bqwl yhwh 1lhykm as the nations which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou destroyeth before-turns your face-turns, so ye perish; because ye would not be hearing unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. kagoyim ’asher yhvh ma’abid mipenekhem ken tobedun, ‘eqeb lo tishme‘un beqol yhvh ’elohekhem.
Sm8 ySr1l 1th 8br hywm 1t hyrdn lb1 lrSt gwym gdlym w8Zmym mmk 8rym gdlt wbZrt bSmym hear, o saturated-towards-israel: thou art to pass over its-going-down-jordan this day, to go in to possess nations greater and mightier than thyself, cities great and fenced up to namespaces, shema‘ yisra’el ’atah ‘ober hayom hayarden labo lareshet goyim gedolim va‘azumim mimeka, ‘arim gedolot ubezurot bashamayim.
8m gdwl wrm bny 8nqym 1Sr 1th yd8t w1th Sm8t my ytyZb lpny bny 8nq a with-mum-people great and tall, children-betweens of the giant-anakims, whom thou knowest, and of whom thou hast heard say, who can stand before-turns children-betweens of giant-anak! ‘am gadol varam benei ‘anaqim, ’asher ’atah yada‘ta ve’atah shama‘ta mi yityazeb lifnei benei ‘anaq.
wyd8t hywm ky yhwh 1lhyk hw1 h8br lpnyk 1S 1klh hw1 ySmydm whw1 ykny8m lpnyk whwrStm wh1bdtm mhr k1Sr dbr yhwh lk understand therefore this day, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim is he which goeth over before-turns thee; as a consuming fire he destroy them, and he inward them down before-turns thy face-turns: so thou drive them out, and destroy them quickly, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath said unto thee. veyada‘ta hayom ki yhvh ’elohekha hu ha‘ober lefanekha ’esh ’okhelah hu yashmidem vehu yakhni‘em lefanekha, vehorashtam veha’abadtam maher ka’asher diber yhvh lakh.
1l t1mr blbbk bhdp yhwh 1lhyk 1tm mlpnyk l1mr bZdqty hby1ny yhwh lrSt 1t h1rZ hz1t wbrS8t hgwym h1lh yhwh mwrySm mpnyk speak not thou in thine heart, after that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath cast them out from before-turns thee, saying, for my being right yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath brought me in to possess this land: and for the wickedness of these nations yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou doth drive them out from before-turns thee. ’al tomar bilbabekha bahadof yhvh ’elohekha ’otam milefanekha lemor bezidqati hebi’ani yhvh lareshet ha’arez hazot, uberish‘at hagoyim ha’eleh yhvh morisham mipanekha.
l1 bZdqtk wbySr lbbk 1th b1 lrSt 1t 1rZm ky brS8t hgwym h1lh yhwh 1lhyk mwrySm mpnyk wlm8n hqym 1t hdbr 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btyk l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb not for thy being right, or for the uprightness of thine heart, dost thou go to possess their land: and for the wickedness of these nations yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim doth drive them out from before-turns thee, and that he may perform the bee-word which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto thy fathers, their-dick-abraham, laughter-isaac, and backstreet-jacob. lo bezidqatekha ubeyosher lebabekha ’atah ba lareshet ’arzam, ki berish‘at hagoyim ha’eleh yhvh ’elohekha morisham mipanekha ulema‘an haqim hadabar ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekha le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob.
wyd8t ky l1 bZdqtk yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk 1t h1rZ hTwbh hz1t lrSth ky 8m qSh 8rp 1th understand therefore, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee not this good land to possess it for thy being right; for thou art a stiffnecked with-mum-people. veyada‘ta ki lo bezidqatekha yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha ha’arez hatobah hazot lerishtah, ki ‘am qesheh ‘oref ’atah.
zkr 1l tSkH 1t 1Sr hqZpt 1t yhwh 1lhyk bmdbr lmn hywm 1Sr yZ1t m1rZ mZrym 8d b1km 8d hmqwm hzh mmrym hyytm 8m yhwh remember, and forget not, how thou provokedst yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim to wrath in the place-of-word-desert: from the day that thou didst depart out of the land of narrows-mizraim, until ye came unto this place, ye have been rebellious to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. zekhor ’al tishkakh ’asher hiqzafta yhvh ’elohekha bamidbar, lemin hayom ’asher yazata me’erez mizrayim ‘ad bo’akhem ‘ad hamaqom hazeh mamrim heyitem ‘im yhvh.
wbHrb hqZptm 1t yhwh wyt1np yhwh bkm lhSmyd 1tkm also in sword-horeb ye provoked yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to wrath, so that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was angry with you to have destroyed you. ubekhoreb hiqzaftem yhvh, vayit’anaf yhvh bakhem lehashmid ’etkhem.
b8lty hhrh lqHt lwHt h1bnym lwHt hbryt 1Sr krt yhwh 8mkm w1Sb bhr 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh lHm l1 1klty wmym l1 Styty when i was gone up into the mount to receive the tables of father-child-stone, even the tables of the covenant which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou made with you, then i abode in the mount forty days and forty nights, i neither did eat bread nor drink from-waters: ba‘aloti haharah laqakhat lukhot ha’abanim lukhot haberit ’asher karat yhvh ‘imakhem, va’esheb bahar ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im laylah lekhem lo ’akhalti umayim lo shatiti.
wytn yhwh 1ly 1t Sny lwHt h1bnym ktbym b1Zb8 1lhym w8lyhm kkl hdbrym 1Sr dbr yhwh 8mkm bhr mtwk h1S bywm hqhl and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou delivered unto me two tables of father-child-stone written with the finger of towards-these-elohim; and on them was written according to all the bee-words, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake with you in the mount out of the midst of the fire in the day of the assembly. vayiten yhvh ’elay shenei lukhot ha’abanim ketubim be’ezba‘ ’elohim, va‘alehem kekhal hadebarim ’asher diber yhvh ‘imakhem bahar mitokh ha’esh beyom haqahal.
wyhy mqZ 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh ntn yhwh 1ly 1t Sny lHt h1bnym lHwt hbryt and it came to pass at the end of forty days and forty nights, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou gave me the two tables of father-child-stone, even the tables of the covenant. vayhi miqez ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im layelah, natan yhvh ’elay shenei lukhot ha’abanim lukhot haberit.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly qwm rd mhr mzh ky SHt 8mk 1Sr hwZ1t mmZrym srw mhr mn hdrk 1Sr Zwytm 8Sw lhm mskh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, arise, get thee down quickly from hence; for thy with-mum-people which thou hast brought forth out of narrows-mizraim have corrupted themselves; they are quickly turned aside out of the way which i order-prescribed them; they have made them a molten image. vayomer yhvh ’elay qum red maher mizeh ki shikhet ‘amekha ’asher hozeta mimizrayim, saru maher min haderekh ’asher zivitim ‘asu lahem masekhah.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly l1mr r1yty 1t h8m hzh whnh 8m qSh 8rp hw1 furthermore yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto me, saying, i have seen this with-mum-people, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked with-mum-people: vayomer yhvh ’elay lemor, ra’iti ha‘am hazeh vehineh ‘am qesheh ‘oref hu.
hrp mmny w1Smydm w1mHh 1t Smm mtHt hSmym w18Sh 1wtk lgwy 8Zwm wrb mmnw let me alone, that i may destroy them, and blot out their name from under namespaces: and i will make of thee a nation mightier and greater than they. heref mimeni ve’ashmidem ve’emkheh shemam mitakhat hashamayim, ve’e‘eseh ’otkha lego ‘azum varab mimenu.
w1pn w1rd mn hhr whhr b8r b1S wSny lHt hbryt 8l Sty ydy so i turned and came down from the mount, and the mount burned with fire: and the two tables of the covenant were in my two hands. va’efen va’ered min hahar vehahar bo‘er ba’esh, ushenei lukhot haberit ‘al shetei yaday.
w1r1 whnh HT1tm lyhwh 1lhykm 8Sytm lkm 8gl mskh srtm mhr mn hdrk 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1tkm and i looked, and, behold, ye had missed to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and had made you a molten calf: ye had turned aside quickly out of the way which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had order-prescribed you. va’ere vehineh khatatem yhvh ’elohekhem ‘asitem lakhem ‘egel masekhah, sartem maher min haderekh ’asher zivah yhvh ’etkhem.
w1tpS bSny hlHt w1Slkm m8l Sty ydy w1Sbrm l8ynykm and i took the two tables, and cast them out of my two hands, and brake them before-turns your eyes. va’etpos bishnei halukhot va’ashlikhem me‘al shetei yaday, va’ashaberem le‘enekhem.
w1tnpl lpny yhwh kr1Snh 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh lHm l1 1klty wmym l1 Styty 8l kl HT1tkm 1Sr HT1tm l8Swt hr8 b8yny yhwh lhk8ysw and i fell down before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, as at the first, forty days and forty nights: i did neither eat bread, nor drink from-waters, because of all your misses which ye missed, in doing wickedly in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to provoke him to nose-anger. va’etnapal lifnei yhvh karishonah ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im laylah lekhem lo ’akhalti umayim lo shatiti, ‘al kal khatatkhem ’asher khatatem la‘asot hara‘ be‘enei yhvh lehakh‘iso.
ky ygrty mpny h1p whHmh 1Sr qZp yhwh 8lykm lhSmyd 1tkm wySm8 yhwh 1ly gm bp8m hhw1 for i was afraid of the nose-anger and hot displeasure, wherewith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was wroth against you to destroy you. and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hearkened unto me at that time also. ki yagoreti mipenei ha’af vehakhemah ’asher qazaf yhvh ‘alekhem lehashmid ’etkhem, vayishma‘ yhvh ’elay gam bapa‘am hahiv.
wb1hrn ht1np yhwh m1d lhSmydw w1tpll gm b8d 1hrn b8t hhw1 and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was very angry with cabinet-aaron to have destroyed him: and i prayed for cabinet-aaron also the same time. ube’aharon hit’anaf yhvh me’od lehashmido, va’etpalel gam be‘ad ’aharon ba‘et hahiv.
w1t HT1tkm 1Sr 8Sytm 1t h8gl lqHty w1Srp 1tw b1S w1kt 1tw THwn hyTb 8d 1Sr dq l8pr w1Slk 1t 8prw 1l hnHl hyrd mn hhr and i took your miss, the calf which ye had made, and burnt it with fire, and stamped it, and ground it very small, even until it was as small as dust: and i cast the dust thereof into the brook that descended out of the mount. ve’et khatatkhem ’asher ‘asitem ha‘egel laqakhti va’esrof ’oto ba’esh va’ekot ’oto takhon heteb ‘ad ’asher daq le‘afar, va’ashlikh ‘afaro ’el hanakhal hayored min hahar.
wbtb8rh wbmsh wbqbrt ht1wh mqZpym hyytm 1t yhwh and at conflagration-taberah, and at load-essay-massah, and at graveyard-of-craving-kibrot-hatavah, ye provoked yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to wrath. ubetab‘erah ubemasah ubeqibrot hata’avah, maqzifim heyitem yhvh.
wbSlH yhwh 1tkm mqdS brn8 l1mr 8lw wrSw 1t h1rZ 1Sr ntty lkm wtmrw 1t py yhwh 1lhykm wl1 h1mntm lw wl1 Sm8tm bqlw likewise when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sent you from finished-desert-staggering-kadeshbarnea, saying, go up and possess the land which i have given you; then ye rebelled against the order-prescription of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and ye was coached by him not, nor hearkened to his voice. ubishloakh yhvh ’etkhem miqadesh barnea‘ lemor ‘alu ureshu ha’arez ’asher natati lakhem, vatamru pi yhvh ’elohekhem velo he’emantem lo velo shema‘tem beqolo.
mmrym hyytm 8m yhwh mywm d8ty 1tkm ye have been rebellious to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou from the day that i hand-knew you. mamrim heyitem ‘im yhvh, miyom da‘ti ’etkhem.
w1tnpl lpny yhwh 1t 1rb8ym hywm w1t 1rb8ym hlylh 1Sr htnplty ky 1mr yhwh lhSmyd 1tkm thus i fell down before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou forty days and forty nights, as i fell down at the first; because yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had said he would destroy you. va’etnapal lifnei yhvh ’arba‘im hayom ve’et ’arba‘im halaylah ’asher hitnapaleti, ki ’amar yhvh lehashmid ’etkhem.
w1tpll 1l yhwh w1mr 1dny yhwh 1l tSHt 8mk wnHltk 1Sr pdyt bgdlk 1Sr hwZ1t mmZrym byd Hzqh i prayed therefore unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and said, o lord-base towards-these-elohim, destroy not thy with-mum-people and thine inheritance, which thou hast redeemed through thy greatness, which thou hast brought forth out of narrows-mizraim with a mighty hand. va’etpalel ’el yhvh va’omar ’adonay yhvh ’al tashkhet ‘amekha venakhalatekha ’asher padita begadelekha, ’asher hozeta mimizrayim beyad khazaqah.
zkr l8bdyk l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb 1l tpn 1l qSy h8m hzh w1l rS8w w1l HT1tw remember thy workers, their-dick-abraham, laughter-isaac, and backstreet-jacob; look not unto the stubbornness of this with-mum-people, nor to their wickedness, nor to their miss: zekhor la‘abadekha le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob, ’al tefen ’el qeshi ha‘am hazeh ve’el rish‘o ve’el khatato.
pn y1mrw h1rZ 1Sr hwZ1tnw mSm mbly yklt yhwh lhby1m 1l h1rZ 1Sr dbr lhm wmSn1tw 1wtm hwZy1m lhmtm bmdbr lest the land whence thou broughtest us out say, because yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was not able to bring them into the land which he promised them, and because he hated them, he hath brought them out to slay them in the place-of-word-desert. pen yomeru ha’arez ’asher hozetanu misham mibeli yekholet yhvh lahabi’am ’el ha’arez ’asher diber lahem, umisin’ato ’otam hozi’am lahamitam bamidbar.
whm 8mk wnHltk 1Sr hwZ1t bkHk hgdl wbzr8k hnTwyh yet they are thy with-mum-people and thine inheritance, which thou broughtest out by thy mighty dynamic and by thy stretched out arm. vehem ‘amekha venakhalatekha, ’asher hozeta bekhokhakha hagadol ubizro‘akha hanetuyah.
b8t hhw1 1mr yhwh 1ly psl lk Sny lwHt 1bnym kr1Snym w8lh 1ly hhrh w8Syt lk 1rwn 8Z at that time yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, hew thee two tables of father-child-stone like unto the first, and come up unto me into the mount, and make thee an cabinet of wood. ba‘et hahiv ’amar yhvh ’elay pesal lekha shene lukhot ’abanim karishonim va‘aleh ’elay haharah, ve‘asita lekha ’aron ‘ez.
w1ktb 8l hlHt 1t hdbrym 1Sr hyw 8l hlHt hr1Snym 1Sr Sbrt wSmtm b1rwn and i will write on the tables the bee-words that were in the first tables which thou brakest, and thou put them in the cabinet. ve’ekhtob ‘al halukhot hadebarim ’asher hayu ‘al halukhot harishonim ’asher shibarta, vesamtam ba’aron.
w18S 1rwn 8Zy STym w1psl Sny lHt 1bnym kr1Snym w18l hhrh wSny hlHt bydy and i made an cabinet of sailing-shitim wood, and hewed two tables of father-child-stone like unto the first, and went up into the mount, having the two tables in mine hand. va’a‘as ’aron ‘azei shitim va’efsol shene lukhot ’abanim karishonim, va’a‘al haharah ushenei halukhot beyadi.
wyktb 8l hlHt kmktb hr1Swn 1t 8Srt hdbrym 1Sr dbr yhwh 1lykm bhr mtwk h1S bywm hqhl wytnm yhwh 1ly and he wrote on the tables, according to the first writing, the ten order-prescriptions, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto you in the mount out of the midst of the fire in the day of the assembly: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou gave them unto me. vayikhtob ‘al halukhot kamikhtab harishon ‘aseret hadebarim ’asher diber yhvh ’alekhem bahar mitokh ha’esh beyom haqahal, vayitenem yhvh ’elay.
w1pn w1rd mn hhr w1Sm 1t hlHt b1rwn 1Sr 8Syty wyhyw Sm k1Sr Zwny yhwh and i turned myself and came down from the mount, and put the tables in the cabinet which i had made; and there they be, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed me. va’efen va’ered min hahar va’asim halukhot ba’aron ’asher ‘asiti, vayihyu sham ka’asher zivani yhvh.
wbny ySr1l ns8w mb1rt bny y8qn mwsrh Sm mt 1hrn wyqbr Sm wykhn 1l8zr bnw tHtyw and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel took their journey from well-beeroth of children-betweens of jaakan to mosera: there cabinet-aaron died, and there he was buried; and towards-stop-eleazar his child-between ed in the dimmer-server's office in his stead. ubenei yisra’el nase‘u mibe’erot bene ya‘aqan moserah, sham met ’aharon vayiqaber sham vaykhahen ’el‘azar beno takhtav.
mSm ns8w hgdgdh wmn hgdgdh yTbth 1rZ nHly mym from thence they journeyed unto tickling-gudelohimah; and from tickling-gudelohimah to good-daughter-jotbat, a land of rivers of from-waters. misham nase‘u hagudgodah, umin hagudgodah yatebatah ’erez nakhalei mayim.
b8t hhw1 hbdyl yhwh 1t SbT hlwy lS1t 1t 1rwn bryt yhwh l8md lpny yhwh lSrtw wlbrk bSmw 8d hywm hzh at that time yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou separated the branch of join-levi, to bear the cabinet of the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to stand before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou to unto him, and to knee-fluffy-bless in his name, unto this day. ba‘et hahiv hibdil yhvh shebet halevi laset ’aron berit yhvh, la‘amod lifnei yhvh leshareto ulebarekh bishmo ‘ad hayom hazeh.
8l kn l1 hyh llwy Hlq wnHlh 8m 1Hyw yhwh hw1 nHltw k1Sr dbr yhwh 1lhyk lw wherefore join-levi hath no part nor inheritance with his brethren; yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou is his inheritance, according as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim promised him. ‘al ken lo hayah lelevi kheleq venakhalah ‘im ’ekhav, yhvh hu nakhalato ka’asher diber yhvh ’elohekha lo.
w1nky 8mdty bhr kymym hr1Snym 1rb8ym ywm w1rb8ym lylh wySm8 yhwh 1ly gm bp8m hhw1 l1 1bh yhwh hSHytk and i stayed in the mount, according to the first time, forty days and forty nights; and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hearkened unto me at that time also, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou would not destroy thee. ve’anokhi ‘amadti bahar kayamim harishonim ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im layelah, vayishma‘ yhvh ’elay gam bapa‘am hahiv lo ’abah yhvh hashkhitekha.
wy1mr yhwh 1ly qwm lk lms8 lpny h8m wyb1w wyrSw 1t h1rZ 1Sr nSb8ty l1btm ltt lhm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto me, arise, take thy journey before-turns the with-mum-people, that they may go in and possess the land, which i sware unto their fathers to give unto them. vayomer yhvh ’elay qum lekh lemasa‘ lifnei ha‘am, veyabo’u veyirshu ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti la’abotam latet lahem.
w8th ySr1l mh yhwh 1lhyk S1l m8mk ky 1m lyr1h 1t yhwh 1lhyk llkt bkl drkyw wl1hbh 1tw wl8bd 1t yhwh 1lhyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk and now, saturated-towards-israel, what doth yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim require of thee, and to fear yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to walk in all his ways, and to love him, and to work for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim with all thy heart and with all thy being, ve‘atah yisra’el mah yhvh ’elohekha sho’el me‘imakh, ki ’im leyir’ah yhvh ’elohekha lalekhet bekhal derakhav ule’ahabah ’oto vela‘abod yhvh ’elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
lSmr 1t mZwt yhwh w1t Hqtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm lTwb lk to keep the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and his statutes, which i order-prescribe thee this day for thy good? lishmor mizvot yhvh ve’et khuqotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, letob lakh.
hn lyhwh 1lhyk hSmym wSmy hSmym h1rZ wkl 1Sr bh behold, the namespaces and the namespaces of namespacess is yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's thy towards-these-elohim, the earth also, with all that therein is. hen yhvh ’elohekha hashamayim ushemei hashamayim, ha’arez vekhal ’asher bah.
rq b1btyk HSq yhwh l1hbh 1wtm wybHr bzr8m 1Hryhm bkm mkl h8mym kywm hzh only yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had a delight in thy fathers to love them, and he chose their seed after them, even you above all with-mum-people, as it is this day. raq ba’abotekha khashaq yhvh le’ahabah ’otam, vayibkhar bezar‘am ’akharehem bakhem mikal ha‘amim kayom hazeh.
wmltm 1t 8rlt lbbkm w8rpkm l1 tqSw 8wd scribe-circumcise therefore the foreskin of your heart, and be no more stiffnecked. umaltem ‘arelat lebabkhem, ve‘arepekhem lo taqshu ‘od.
ky yhwh 1lhykm hw1 1lhy h1lhym w1dny h1dnym h1l hgdl hgbr whnwr1 1Sr l1 yS1 pnym wl1 yqH SHd for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim is towards-these-elohim of towards-these-elohim, and lord-base of lord-bases, a great towards-these-elohim, a mighty, and a terrible, which regardeth not persons, nor taketh reward: ki yhvh ’elohekhem hu ’elohei ha’elohim va’adonei ha’adonim, ha’el hagadol hagibor vehanora ’asher lo yisa fanim velo yiqakh shokhad.
8Sh mSpT ytwm w1lmnh w1hb gr ltt lw lHm wSmlh he doth execute the decision-grammar of the fatherless and widow, and loveth the stranger, in giving him food and raiment. ‘oseh mishpat yatom ve’almanah, ve’oheb ger latet lo lekhem vesimlah.
w1hbtm 1t hgr ky grym hyytm b1rZ mZrym love ye therefore the stranger: for ye were strangers in the land of narrows-mizraim. va’ahabtem hager, ki gerim heyitem be’erez mizrayim.
1t yhwh 1lhyk tyr1 1tw t8bd wbw tdbq wbSmw tSb8 thou fear yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim; him thou work for, and to him thou cleave, and swear by his name. yhvh ’elohekha tira ’oto ta‘abod, ubo tidbaq ubishmo tishabea‘.
hw1 thltk whw1 1lhyk 1Sr 8Sh 1tk 1t hgdlt w1t hnwr1t h1lh 1Sr r1w 8ynyk he is thy praise, and he is thy towards-these-elohim, that hath done for thee these great and terrible things, which thine eyes have seen. hu tehilatekha vehu ’elohekha, ’asher ‘asah ’itekha hagedolot ve’et hanora’ot ha’eleh ’asher ra’u ‘enekha.
bSb8ym npS yrdw 1btyk mZrymh w8th Smk yhwh 1lhyk kkwkby hSmym lrb thy fathers went down into narrows-mizraim with threescore and ten persons; and now yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath made thee as the stars of namespaces for multitude. beshib‘im nefesh yaredu ’abotekha mizrayemah, ve‘atah samekha yhvh ’elohekha kekhokhbei hashamayim larob.
w1hbt 1t yhwh 1lhyk wSmrt mSmrtw wHqtyw wmSpTyw wmZwtyw kl hymym therefore thou love yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and keep his charge, and his statutes, and his decision-grammars, and his order-prescriptions, alway. ve’ahabta yhvh ’elohekha, veshamarta mishmarto vekhuqotav umishpatav umizvotav kal hayamim.
wyd8tm hywm ky l1 1t bnykm 1Sr l1 yd8w w1Sr l1 r1w 1t mwsr yhwh 1lhykm 1t gdlw 1t ydw hHzqh wzr8w hnTwyh and hand-know ye this day: for i speak not with your children-betweens which have not hand-known, and which have not seen the chastisement of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, his greatness, his mighty hand, and his stretched out arm, vida‘tem hayom ki lo ’et benekhem ’asher lo yade‘u va’asher lo ra’u musar yhvh ’elohekhem, gadelo yado hakhazaqah uzero‘o hanetuyah.
w1t 1ttyw w1t m8Syw 1Sr 8Sh btwk mZrym lpr8h mlk mZrym wlkl 1rZw and his miracles, and his acts, which he did in the midst of narrows-mizraim unto big-house-pharaoh the moloch-king of narrows-mizraim, and unto all his land; ve’et ’ototav ve’et ma‘asav ’asher ‘asah betokh mizrayim, lefar‘oh melekh mizrayim ulekhal ’arzo.
w1Sr 8Sh lHyl mZrym lswsyw wlrkbw 1Sr hZyp 1t my ym swp 8l pnyhm brdpm 1Hrykm wy1bdm yhwh 8d hywm hzh and what he did unto the army of narrows-mizraim, unto their horses, and to their chariots; how he made the from-waters of the end sea to overflow them as they pursued after you, and how yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath destroyed them unto this day; va’asher ‘asah lekhel mizrayim lesusav ulerikhbo ’asher hezif mei yam suf ‘al penehem beradefam ’akharekhem, vay’abedem yhvh ‘ad hayom hazeh.
w1Sr 8Sh lkm bmdbr 8d b1km 8d hmqwm hzh and what he did unto you in the place-of-word-desert, until ye came into this place; va’asher ‘asah lakhem bamidbar, ‘ad bo’akhem ‘ad hamaqom hazeh.
w1Sr 8Sh ldtn wl1byrm bny 1ly1b bn r1wbn 1Sr pZth h1rZ 1t pyh wtbl8m w1t btyhm w1t 1hlyhm w1t kl hyqwm 1Sr brglyhm bqrb kl ySr1l and what he did unto their-faith-training-dathan and my-father-high-abiram, children-betweens of my-towards-dad-my-towards-eliab, child-between of buddy-see-child-reuben: how the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up, and their daughter-households, and their tents, and all the substance that was in their possession, in the midst of all saturated-towards-israel: va’asher ‘asah ledatan vela’abiram benei ’eli’ab ben re’uben ’asher pazetah ha’arez piha vatibla‘em ve’et batehem ve’et ’aholehem, ve’et kal hayqum ’asher beraglehem beqereb kal yisra’el.
ky 8ynykm hr1t 1t kl m8Sh yhwh hgdl 1Sr 8Sh and your eyes have seen all the great acts of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou which he did. ki ‘enekhem haro’ot kal ma‘aseh yhvh hagadol, ’asher ‘asah.
wSmrtm 1t kl hmZwh 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm lm8n tHzqw wb1tm wyrStm 1t h1rZ 1Sr 1tm 8brym Smh lrSth therefore ye keep all the order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe you this day, that ye may be strong, and go in and possess the land, whither ye go to possess it; ushemartem kal hamizvah ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, lema‘an tekhezqu ubatem virishtem ha’arez ’asher ’atem ‘oberim shamah lerishtah.
wlm8n t1rykw ymym 8l h1dmh 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btykm ltt lhm wlzr8m 1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS and that ye may prolong your days in the land, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto your fathers to give unto them and to their seed, a land that floweth with milk and honey. ulema‘an ta’arikhu yamim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekhem latet lahem ulezar‘am, ’erez zabat khalab udebash.
ky h1rZ 1Sr 1th b1 Smh lrSth l1 k1rZ mZrym hw1 1Sr yZ1tm mSm 1Sr tzr8 1t zr8k whSqyt brglk kgn hyrq for the land, whither thou goest in to possess it, is not as the land of narrows-mizraim, from whence ye came out, where thou sowedst thy seed, and wateredst it with thy foot, as a garden of herbs: ki ha’arez ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah lo khe’erez mizrayim hi ’asher yezatem misham, ’asher tizra‘ zar‘akha vehishqita beraglekha kegan hayaraq.
wh1rZ 1Sr 1tm 8brym Smh lrSth 1rZ hrym wbq8t lmTr hSmym tSth mym and the land, whither ye go to possess it, is a land of hills and valleys, and drinketh from-waters of the rain of namespaces: veha’arez ’asher ’atem ‘oberim shamah lerishtah ’erez harim ubeqa‘ot, limtar hashamayim tishteh mayim.
1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk drS 1th tmyd 8yny yhwh 1lhyk bh mrSyt hSnh w8d 1Hryt Snh a land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim careth for: the eyes of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim are always upon it, from the beginning of the year even unto the end of the year. ’erez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha doresh tamid ‘enei yhvh ’elohekha bah mereshit hashanah ve‘ad ’akharit shanah.
whyh 1m Sm8 tSm8w 1l mZwty 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm hywm l1hbh 1t yhwh 1lhykm wl8bdw bkl lbbkm wbkl npSkm and it come to pass, if ye hearken diligently unto my order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe you this day, to love yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and to work for him with all your heart and with all your being, vehayah ’im shamoa‘ tishme‘u ’el mizvotay ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom, le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekhem ule‘abedo bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem.
wntty mTr 1rZkm b8tw ywrh wmlqwS w1spt dgnk wtyrSk wyZhrk that i will give you the rain of your land in his due season, the first rain and the latter rain, that thou mayest gather in thy corn-swimming, and thy wine-inherit, and thine name-from-oil. venatati metar ’arzekhem be‘ito yoreh umalqosh, ve’asafta deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha.
wntty 8Sb bSdk lbhmtk w1klt wSb8t and i will send grass in thy fields for thy in-them-animal, that thou mayest eat and be full. venatati ‘eseb besadekha libhemtekha, ve’akhalta vesaba‘eta.
hSmrw lkm pn ypth lbbkm wsrtm w8bdtm 1lhym 1Hrym whStHwytm lhm take heed to yourselves, that your heart be not deceived, and ye turn aside, and work for other towards-these-elohim, and partake-shatakh them; hishameru lakhem pen yifteh lebabkhem, vesartem va‘abadtem ’elohim ’akherim vehishtakhavitem lahem.
wHrh 1p yhwh bkm w8Zr 1t hSmym wl1 yhyh mTr wh1dmh l1 ttn 1t ybwlh w1bdtm mhrh m8l h1rZ hTbh 1Sr yhwh ntn lkm and then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's wrath be kindled against you, and he shut up the namespaces, that there be no rain, and that the land yield not her fruit; and lest ye perish quickly from off the good land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou giveth you. vekharah ’af yhvh bakhem ve‘azar hashamayim velo yihyeh matar veha’adamah lo titen yebulah, va’abadtem meherah me‘al ha’arez hatobah ’asher yhvh noten lakhem.
wSmtm 1t dbry 1lh 8l lbbkm w8l npSkm wqSrtm 1tm l1wt 8l ydkm whyw lTwTpt byn 8ynykm therefore ye lay up these my bee-words in your heart and in your being, and bind them for a sign upon your hand, that they may be as frontlets between-bin your eyes. vesamtem debaray ’eleh ‘al lebabkhem ve‘al nafshekhem, uqeshartem ’otam le’ot ‘al yedkhem vehayu letotafot ben ‘enekhem.

whwryS yhwh 1t kl hgwym h1lh mlpnykm wyrStm gwym gdlym w8Zmym mkm then will yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou drive out all these nations from before-turns you, and ye possess greater nations and mightier than yourselves. vehorish yhvh kal hagoyim ha’eleh milifnekhem, virishtem goyim gedolim va‘azumim mikem.
kl hmqwm 1Sr tdrk kp rglkm bw lkm yhyh mn hmdbr whlbnwn mn hnhr nhr prt w8d hym h1Hrwn yhyh gblkm every place whereon the soles of your feet tread be yours: from the place-of-word-desert and build-white-lebanon, from the river, the river cow-euphrates, even unto the uttermost sea your coast be. kal hamaqom ’asher tidrokh kaf raglekhem bo lakhem yihyeh, min hamidbar vehalebanon min hanahar nehar perat ve‘ad hayam ha’akharon yihyeh gebulkhem.
l1 ytyZb 1yS bpnykm pHdkm wmwr1km ytn yhwh 1lhykm 8l pny kl h1rZ 1Sr tdrkw bh k1Sr dbr lkm there no man be able to stand before-turns you: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim lay the fear of you and the dread of you upon all the land that ye tread upon, as he hath said unto you. lo yityazeb ’ish bifnekhem, pakhdekhem umora’akhem yiten yhvh ’elohekhem ‘al penei khal ha’arez ’asher tidrekhu bah ka’asher diber lakhem.
r1h 1nky ntn lpnykm hywm brkh wqllh behold, i set before-turns you this day a knee-fluffy-blessing and a curse; re’eh ’anokhi noten lifnekhem hayom, berakhah uqelalah.
1t hbrkh 1Sr tSm8w 1l mZwt yhwh 1lhykm 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm hywm a knee-fluffy-blessing, if ye obey the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which i order-prescribe you this day: ’et haberakhah, ’asher tishme‘u ’el mizvot yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom.
whqllh 1m l1 tSm8w 1l mZwt yhwh 1lhykm wsrtm mn hdrk 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm hywm llkt 1Hry 1lhym 1Hrym 1Sr l1 yd8tm and a curse, if ye will not obey the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and turn aside out of the way which i order-prescribe you this day, to go after other towards-these-elohim, which ye have not hand-known. vehaqelalah ’im lo tishme‘u ’el mizvot yhvh ’elohekhem vesartem min haderekh ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom, lalekhet ’akharei ’elohim ’akherim ’asher lo yeda‘tem.
whyh ky yby1k yhwh 1lhyk 1l h1rZ 1Sr 1th b1 Smh lrSth wntth 1t hbrkh 8l hr grzym w1t hqllh 8l hr 8ybl and it come to pass, when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath brought thee in unto the land whither thou goest to possess it, that thou put the knee-fluffy-blessing upon mount grasses-gerizim, and the curse upon mount mourning-ebal. vehayah ki yebi’akha yhvh ’elohekha ’el ha’arez ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah, venatatah haberakhah ‘al har gerizim ve’et haqelalah ‘al har ‘ebal.
hl1 hmh b8br hyrdn 1Hry drk mbw1 hSmS b1rZ hkn8ny hySb b8rbh mwl hglgl 1Zl 1lwny mrh are they not on the other side its-going-down-jordan, by the way where the sun goeth down, in the land of the mobile-trade-canaanites, which dwell in the champaign over against roll-gilgal, beside the plains of teacher-moreh? halo hemah be‘eber hayarden ’akharei derekh mebo hashemesh be’erez hakena‘ani hayosheb ba‘arabah, mul hagilgal ’ezel ’elonei moreh.
ky 1tm 8brym 1t hyrdn lb1 lrSt 1t h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhykm ntn lkm wyrStm 1th wySbtm bh for ye pass over its-going-down-jordan to go in to possess the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim giveth you, and ye possess it, and dwell therein. ki ’atem ‘oberim hayarden labo lareshet ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekhem noten lakhem, virishtem ’otah vishabtem bah.
wSmrtm l8Swt 1t kl hHqym w1t hmSpTym 1Sr 1nky ntn lpnykm hywm and ye guard-observe to do all the statutes and decision-grammars which i set before-turns you this day. ushemartem la‘asot kal hakhuqim ve’et hamishpatim, ’asher ’anokhi noten lifnekhem hayom.
1lh hHqym whmSpTym 1Sr tSmrwn l8Swt b1rZ 1Sr ntn yhwh 1lhy 1btyk lk lrSth kl hymym 1Sr 1tm Hyym 8l h1dmh these are the statutes and decision-grammars, which ye guard-observe to do in the land, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth. ’eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim ’asher tishmerun la‘asot ba’arez ’asher natan yhvh ’elohei ’abotekha lekha lerishtah, kal hayamim ’asher ’atem khayim ‘al ha’adamah.
1bd t1bdwn 1t kl hmqmwt 1Sr 8bdw Sm hgwym 1Sr 1tm yrSym 1tm 1t 1lhyhm 8l hhrym hrmym w8l hgb8wt wtHt kl 8Z r8nn ye utterly destroy all the places, wherein the nations which ye possess worked for their towards-these-elohim, upon the high mountains, and upon the hills, and under every green tree: ’abed te’abedun kal hameqomot ’asher ‘abedu sham hagoyim ’asher ’atem yoreshim ’elohehem, ‘al heharim haramim ve‘al hageba‘ot vetakhat kal ‘ez ra‘anan
wntZtm 1t mzbHtm wSbrtm 1t mZbtm w1Sryhm tSrpwn b1S wpsyly 1lhyhm tgd8wn w1bdtm 1t Smm mn hmqwm hhw1 and ye overthrow their butcher-kitchens, and break their column-stands, and burn their groves with fire; and ye hew down the graven images of their towards-these-elohim, and destroy the names of them out of that place. venitaztem mizbkhotam veshibartem mazebotam va’asherehem tisrefun ba’esh ufesilei ’elohehem tegade‘un, ve’ibadtem shemam min hamaqom hahu.
l1 t8Swn kn lyhwh 1lhykm ye not do so unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. lo ta‘asun ken yhvh ’elohekhem.
ky 1m 1l hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhykm mkl SbTykm lSwm 1t Smw Sm lSknw tdrSw wb1t Smh and unto the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim choose out of all your branchs to put his name there, even unto his habitation ye seek, and thither thou come: ki ’im ’el hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekhem mikal shibtekhem lasum shemo sham, leshikhno tidreshu ubata shamah.
whb1tm Smh 8ltykm wzbHykm w1t m8Srtykm w1t trwmt ydkm wndrykm wndbtykm wbkrt bqrkm wZ1nkm and thither ye inward your on-ups, and your butchers, and your tithes, and raise-rums of your hand, and your vows, and your volunteers, and the firstlings of your visit-cattles and of your flocks: vahabetem shamah ‘olotekhem vezibkhekhem ve’et ma‘serotekhem ve’et terumat yedkhem, venidrekhem venidbotekhem ubekhorot beqarkhem vezonekhem.
w1kltm Sm lpny yhwh 1lhykm wSmHtm bkl mSlH ydkm 1tm wbtykm 1Sr brkk yhwh 1lhyk and there ye eat before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and ye rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your daughter-households, wherein yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath knee-fluffy-blessed thee. va’akhaltem sham lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem usemakhtem bekhol mishlakh yedkhem ’atem ubatekhem, ’asher berakhkha yhvh ’elohekha.
l1 t8Swn kkl 1Sr 1nHnw 8Sym ph hywm 1yS kl hySr b8ynyw ye not do after all the things that we do here this day, every man whatsoever is right in his own eyes. lo ta‘asun kekhol ’asher ’anakhnu ‘osim poh hayom, ’ish kal hayashar be‘enav.
ky l1 b1tm 8d 8th 1l hmnwHh w1l hnHlh 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk for ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim giveth you. ki lo batem ‘ad ‘atah, ’el hamenukhah ve’el hanakhalah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
w8brtm 1t hyrdn wySbtm b1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhykm mnHyl 1tkm whnyH lkm mkl 1ybykm msbyb wySbtm bTH and when ye go over its-going-down-jordan, and dwell in the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim giveth you to inherit, and when he giveth you rest from all your father-adversaries round about, so that ye dwell in safety; va‘abartem hayarden vishabtem ba’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekhem mankhil ’etkhem, veheniakh lakhem mikal ’oyebekhem misabib vishabtem betakh.
whyh hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhykm bw lSkn Smw Sm Smh tby1w 1t kl 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm 8wltykm wzbHykm m8Srtykm wtrmt ydkm wkl mbHr ndrykm 1Sr tdrw lyhwh then there be a place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim choose to cause his name to dwell there; thither ye bring all that i order-prescribe you; your on-ups, and your butchers, your tithes, and the raise-rum of your hand, and all your choice vows which ye vow unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: vehayah hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekhem bo leshaken shemo sham shamah tabi’u kal ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem, ‘olotekhem vezibkhekhem ma‘serotekhem uterumat yedkhem vekhol mibkhar nidrekhem ’asher tideru yhvh.
wSmHtm lpny yhwh 1lhykm 1tm wbnykm wbntykm w8bdykm w1mhtykm whlwy 1Sr bS8rykm ky 1yn lw Hlq wnHlh 1tkm and ye rejoice before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, ye, and your children-betweens, and your children-betweenesss, and your workers, and your maid-mothers, and the join-levite that is within your hair-gates; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you. usemakhtem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem ’atem ubenekhem ubenotekhem ve‘abdekhem ve’amhotekhem, vehalevi ’asher besha‘arekhem ki ’en lo kheleq venakhalah ’itekhem.
hSmr lk pn t8lh 8ltyk bkl mqwm 1Sr tr1h take heed to thyself that thou inward not thy on-ups in every place that thou seest: hishamer lekha pen ta‘aleh ‘olotekha, bekhal maqom ’asher tir’eh.
ky 1m bmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh b1Hd SbTyk Sm t8lh 8ltyk wSm t8Sh kl 1Sr 1nky mZwk and in the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou choose in one of thy branchs, there thou up-to thy on-ups, and there thou do all that i order-prescribe thee. ki ’im bamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh be’akhad shebatekha sham ta‘aleh ‘olotekha, vesham ta‘aseh kol ’asher ’anokhi mezaveka.
rq bkl 1wt npSk tzbH w1klt bSr kbrkt yhwh 1lhyk 1Sr ntn lk bkl S8ryk hTm1 whThwr y1klnw kZby wk1yl notwithstanding thou mayest kill and eat flesh in all thy hair-gates, whatsoever thy being lusteth after, according to the knee-fluffy-blessing of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim which he hath given thee: the stained-ceased and the bright-climaxing may eat thereof, as of the swollen-gazelle, and as of the to-hart. raq bekhal ’avat nafshekha tizbakh ve’akhalta basar kebirkat yhvh ’elohekha ’asher natan lekha bekhal she‘arekha, hatamei vehatahor yokhelenu kazebi vekha’ayal.
rq hdm l1 t1klw 8l h1rZ tSpknw kmym only ye not eat the blood; ye pour it upon the earth as from-waters. raq hadam lo tokhelu, ‘al ha’arez tishpekhenu kamayim.
l1 twkl l1kl bS8ryk m8Sr dgnk wtyrSk wyZhrk wbkrt bqrk wZ1nk wkl ndryk 1Sr tdr wndbtyk wtrwmt ydk thou mayest not eat within thy hair-gates the tithe of thy corn-swimming, or of thy wine-inherit, or of thy name-from-oil, or the firstlings of thy visit-cattles or of thy flock, nor any of thy vows which thou vowest, nor thy volunteers, or raise-rum of thine hand: lo tukhal le’ekhol bish‘arekha ma‘sar deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha ubekhorot beqarekha vezonekha, vekhal nedarekha ’asher tidor venidbotekha uterumat yadekha.
ky 1m lpny yhwh 1lhyk t1klnw bmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk bw 1th wbnk wbtk w8bdk w1mtk whlwy 1Sr bS8ryk wSmHt lpny yhwh 1lhyk bkl mSlH ydk and thou must eat them before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim in the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim choose, thou, and thy child-between, and thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, and thy worker, and thy mum-true-maid, and the join-levite that is within thy hair-gates: and thou rejoice before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim in all that thou puttest thine hands unto. ki ’im lifnei yhvh ’elohekha tokhelenu bamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha bo ’atah ubinkha ubitekha ve‘abdekha va’amatekha vehalevi ’asher bish‘arekha, vesamakhta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha bekhol mishlakh yadekha.
hSmr lk pn t8zb 1t hlwy kl ymyk 8l 1dmtk take heed to thyself that thou forsake not the join-levite as long as thou livest upon the earth. hishamer lekha pen ta‘azob halevi, kal yamekha ‘al ’admatekha.
ky yrHyb yhwh 1lhyk 1t gbwlk k1Sr dbr lk w1mrt 1klh bSr ky t1wh npSk l1kl bSr bkl 1wt npSk t1kl bSr when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim enlarge thy border, as he hath promised thee, and thou say, i will eat flesh, because thy being longeth to eat flesh; thou mayest eat flesh, whatsoever thy being lusteth after. ki yarkhib yhvh ’elohekha gebulekha ka’asher diber lakh ve’amarta ’okhelah basar ki te’aveh le’ekhol basar, bekhal ’avat nafshekha tokhal basar.
ky yrHq mmk hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk lSwm Smw Sm wzbHt mbqrk wmZ1nk 1Sr ntn yhwh lk k1Sr Zwytk w1klt bS8ryk bkl 1wt npSk if the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath chosen to put his name there be too far from thee, then thou kill of thy visit-cattle and of thy flock, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath given thee, as i have order-prescribed thee, and thou eat in thy hair-gates whatsoever thy being lusteth after. ki yirkhaq mimekha hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha lasum shemo sham vezabakhta mibeqarekha umizonekha ’asher natan yhvh lekha ka’asher zivitikha, ve’akhalta bish‘arekha bekhol ’avat nafshekha.
1k k1Sr y1kl 1t hZby w1t h1yl kn t1klnw hTm1 whThwr yHdw y1klnw even as the swollen-gazelle and the to-hart is eaten, so thou eat them: the stained-ceased and the bright-climaxing eat of them alike. ’akh ka’asher ye’akhel hazebi ve’et ha’ayal ken tokhelenu, hatamei vehatahor yakhdav yokhelenu.
rq Hzq lblty 1kl hdm ky hdm hw1 hnpS wl1 t1kl hnpS 8m hbSr only be sure that thou eat not the blood: for the blood is the life; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh. raq khazaq lebilti ’akhol hadam ki hadam hu hanafesh, velo tokhal hanefesh ‘im habasar.
l1 t1klnw 8l h1rZ tSpknw kmym no eat it; thou pour it upon the earth as from-waters. lo tokhelenu, ‘al ha’arez tishpekhenu kamayim.
l1 t1klnw lm8n yyTb lk wlbnyk 1Hryk ky t8Sh hySr b8yny yhwh no eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children-betweens after thee, when thou do that which is right in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. lo tokhelenu, lema‘an yitab lekha ulebanekha ’akharekha ki ta‘aseh hayashar be‘enei yhvh.
rq qdSyk 1Sr yhyw lk wndryk tS1 wb1t 1l hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh only thy dedicated-finished things which thou hast, and thy vows, thou take, and go unto the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou choose: raq qadashekha ’asher yihyu lekha unedarekha, tisa ubata ’el hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh.
w8Syt 8ltyk hbSr whdm 8l mzbH yhwh 1lhyk wdm zbHyk ySpk 8l mzbH yhwh 1lhyk whbSr t1kl and thou inward thy on-ups, the flesh and the blood, upon the butcher-kitchen of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: and the blood of thy butchers be poured out upon the butcher-kitchen of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and thou eat the flesh. ve‘asita ‘olotekha habasar vehadam ‘al mizbakh yhvh ’elohekha, vedam zebakhekha yishafekh ‘al mizbakh yhvh ’elohekha vehabasar tokhel.
Smr wSm8t 1t kl hdbrym h1lh 1Sr 1nky mZwk lm8n yyTb lk wlbnyk 1Hryk 8d 8wlm ky t8Sh hTwb whySr b8yny yhwh 1lhyk observe and hear all these bee-words which i order-prescribe thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children-betweens after thee for ever, when thou doest that which is good and right in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. shemor veshama‘ta kal hadebarim ha’eleh ’asher ’anokhi mezaveka, lema‘an yitab lekha ulebanekha ’akharekha ‘ad ‘olam ki ta‘aseh hatob vehayashar be‘enei yhvh ’elohekha.
ky ykryt yhwh 1lhyk 1t hgwym 1Sr 1th b1 Smh lrSt 1wtm mpnyk wyrSt 1tm wySbt b1rZm when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim cut off the nations from before-turns thee, whither thou goest to possess them, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their land; ki yakhrit yhvh ’elohekha hagoyim ’asher ’atah ba shamah lareshet mipanekha, veyarashta ’otam veyashabta be’arzam.
hSmr lk pn tnqS 1Hryhm 1Hry hSmdm mpnyk wpn tdrS l1lhyhm l1mr 1ykh y8bdw hgwym h1lh 1t 1lhyhm w18Sh kn gm 1ny take heed to thyself that thou be not snared by following them, after that they be destroyed from before-turns thee; and that thou inquire not after their towards-these-elohim, saying, how did these nations work for their towards-these-elohim? even so will i do likewise. hishamer lekha pen tinaqesh ’akharehem ’akharei hishamedam mipanekha, ufen tidrosh lelohehem lemor ’ekhah ya‘abdu hagoyim ha’eleh ’elohehem ve’e‘eseh ken gam ’ani.
l1 t8Sh kn lyhwh 1lhyk ky kl tw8bt yhwh 1Sr Sn1 8Sw l1lhyhm ky gm 1t bnyhm w1t bntyhm ySrpw b1S l1lhyhm no do so unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: for every abomination to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, which he hateth, have they done unto their towards-these-elohim; for even their children-betweens and their children-betweenesss they have burnt in the fire to their towards-these-elohim. lo ta‘aseh khen yhvh ’elohekha, ki kal to‘abat yhvh ’asher sane ‘asu lelohehem ki gam benehem ve’et benotehem yisrefu ba’esh lelohehem.
1t kl hdbr 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm 1tw tSmrw l8Swt l1 tsp 8lyw wl1 tgr8 mmnw what thing soever i order-prescribe you, guard-observe to do it: no add thereto, nor diminish from it. kal hadabar ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem tishmeru la‘asot, lo tosef ‘alav velo tigra‘ mimenu.
ky yqwm bqrbk nby1 1w Hlm Hlwm wntn 1lyk 1wt 1w mwpt if there arise among you a bringer, or a dreamer of dreams, and giveth thee a sign or a wonder, ki yaqum beqirbekha nabi ’o kholem khalom, venatan ’elekha ’ot ’o mofet.
wb1 h1wt whmwpt 1Sr dbr 1lyk l1mr nlkh 1Hry 1lhym 1Hrym 1Sr l1 yd8tm wn8bdm and the sign or the wonder come to pass, whereof he spake unto thee, saying, let us go after other towards-these-elohim, which thou hast not hand-known, and let us work for them; uba ha’ot vehamofet ’asher diber ’elekha lemor, nelekhah ’akharei ’elohim ’akherim ’asher lo yeda‘tam vena‘abedem.
l1 tSm8 1l dbry hnby1 hhw1 1w 1l Hwlm hHlwm hhw1 ky mnsh yhwh 1lhykm 1tkm ld8t hySkm 1hbym 1t yhwh 1lhykm bkl lbbkm wbkl npSkm no hearken unto the bee-words of that bringer, or that dreamer of dreams: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim proveth you, to hand-know whether ye love yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim with all your heart and with all your being. lo tishma‘ ’el dibrei hanabi hahu ’o ’el kholem hakhalom hahu, ki menaseh yhvh ’elohekhem ’etkhem lada‘at hayishkhem ’ohabim yhvh ’elohekhem bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem.
1Hry yhwh 1lhykm tlkw w1tw tyr1w w1t mZwtyw tSmrw wbqlw tSm8w w1tw t8bdw wbw tdbqwn ye walk after yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and fear him, and keep his order-prescriptions, and obey his voice, and ye work for him, and cleave unto him. ’akharei yhvh ’elohekhem telekhu ve’oto tira’u, ve’et mizvotav tishmoru ubeqolo tishma‘u ve’oto ta‘abodu ubo tidbaqun.
whnby1 hhw1 1w Hlm hHlwm hhw1 ywmt ky dbr srh 8l yhwh 1lhykm hmwZy1 1tkm m1rZ mZrym whpdk mbyt 8bdym lhdyHk mn hdrk 1Sr Zwk yhwh 1lhyk llkt bh wb8rt hr8 mqrbk and that bringer, or that dreamer of dreams, be put to death; because he hath bee-spoken to turn you away from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, which brought you out of the land of narrows-mizraim, and redeemed you out of the daughter-house of bondage, to thrust thee out of the way which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim order-prescribed thee to walk in. so thou put the bad away from the midst of thee. vehanabi hahu ’o kholem hakhalom hahu yumat ki diber sarah ‘al yhvh ’elohekhem hamozi ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim vehapodekha mibet ‘abadim lehadikhakha min haderekh ’asher zivekha yhvh ’elohekha lalekhet bah, ubi‘arta hara‘ miqirbekha.
ky ysytk 1Hyk bn 1mk 1w bnk 1w btk 1w 1St Hyqk 1w r8k 1Sr knpSk bstr l1mr nlkh wn8bdh 1lhym 1Hrym 1Sr l1 yd8t 1th w1btyk if thy brother, child-between of thy mother, or thy child-between, or thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, or the woman of thy bosom, or thy friend, which is as thine own being, entice thee secretly, saying, let us go and work for other towards-these-elohim, which thou hast not hand-known, thou, nor thy fathers; ki yesitekha ’akhikha ben ’imekha ’o binkha ’o bitekha ’o ’eshet kheqekha ’o re‘akha ’asher kenafshekha baseter lemor, nelekhah vena‘abdah ’elohim ’akherim ’asher lo yada‘ta ’atah va’abotekha.
m1lhy h8mym 1Sr sbybtykm hqrbym 1lyk 1w hrHqym mmk mqZh h1rZ w8d qZh h1rZ namely, of the towards-these-elohim of the with-mum-people which are round about you, nigh unto thee, or far off from thee, from the one end of the earth even unto the other end of the earth; me’elohei ha‘amim ’asher sebibotekhem haqerobim ’elekha ’o harekhoqim mimeka, miqzeh ha’arez ve‘ad qezeh ha’arez.
l1 t1bh lw wl1 tSm8 1lyw wl1 tHws 8ynk 8lyw wl1 tHml wl1 tksh 8lyw no consent unto him, nor hearken unto him; neither thine eye pity him, neither thou spare, neither thou conceal him: lo tobeh lo velo tishma‘ ’elav, velo takhos ‘enekha ‘alav velo takhmol velo tekhaseh ‘alav.
ky hrg thrgnw ydk thyh bw br1Swnh lhmytw wyd kl h8m b1Hrnh and thou surely kill him; thine hand be first upon him to put him to death, and afterwards the hand of all the with-mum-people. ki harog tahargenu yadekha tihyeh bo barishonah lahamito, veyad kal ha‘am ba’akharonah.
wsqltw b1bnym wmt ky bqS lhdyHk m8l yhwh 1lhyk hmwZy1k m1rZ mZrym mbyt 8bdym and thou father-child-stone him with stones, that he die; because he hath sought to thrust thee away from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, which brought thee out of the land of narrows-mizraim, from the daughter-house of bondage. useqalto ba’abanim vamet, ki biqesh lehadikhakha me‘al yhvh ’elohekha hamozi’akha me’erez mizrayim mibet ‘abadim.
wkl ySr1l ySm8w wyr1wn wl1 ywspw l8Swt kdbr hr8 hzh bqrbk and all saturated-towards-israel hear, and fear, and do no more any such wickedness as this is among you. vekhal yisra’el yishme‘u veyira’un, velo yosifu la‘asot kadabar hara‘ hazeh beqirbekha.
ky tSm8 b1Ht 8ryk 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk lSbt Sm l1mr if thou hear say in one of thy cities, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath given thee to dwell there, saying, ki tishma‘ be’akhat ‘arekha ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha lashebet sham lemor.
yZ1w 1nSym bny bly8l mqrbk wydyHw 1t ySby 8yrm l1mr nlkh wn8bdh 1lhym 1Hrym 1Sr l1 yd8tm certain men, children-betweens of in-good-time-wear-out-belial, are gone out from inward you, and have withdrawn the inhabitants of their light-city, saying, let us go and work for other towards-these-elohim, which ye have not hand-known; yaze’u ’anashim bene beliya‘al miqirbekha vayadikhu yoshebei ‘iram lemor, nelekhah vena‘abdah ’elohim ’akherim ’asher lo yeda‘tem.
wdrSt wHqrt wS1lt hyTb whnh 1mt nkwn hdbr n8Sth htw8bh hz1t bqrbk then thou inquire, and make search, and ask diligently; and, behold, if it be truth, and the thing certain, that such abomination is wrought among you; vedarashta vekhaqarta vesha’alta heteb, vehineh ’emet nakhon hadabar ne‘estah hato‘ebah hazot beqirbekha.
hkh tkh 1t ySby h8yr hhw1 hhy1 lpy Hrb hHrm 1th w1t kl 1Sr bh w1t bhmth lpy Hrb thou surely hit the inhabitants of that light-city with the edge of the sword, destroying it utterly, and all that is therein, and the in-them-animal thereof, with the edge of the sword. hakeh takeh yoshebei ha‘ir hahu hahi lefi khareb, hakharem ’otah ve’et kal ’asher bah ve’et behemtah lefi khareb.
w1t kl Sllh tqbZ 1l twk rHbh wSrpt b1S 1t h8yr w1t kl Sllh klyl lyhwh 1lhyk whyth tl 8wlm l1 tbnh 8wd and thou gather all the spoil of it into the midst of the street thereof, and burn with fire the light-city, and all the spoil thereof every whit, for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: and it be an heap for ever; it not be between-built again. ve’et kal shelalah tiqboz ’el tokh rekhobah vesarafta ba’esh ha‘ir ve’et kal shelalah kalil yhvh ’elohekha, vehayetah tel ‘olam lo tibaneh ‘od.
wl1 ydbq bydk m1wmh mn hHrm lm8n ySwb yhwh mHrwn 1pw wntn lk rHmym wrHmk whrbk k1Sr nSb8 l1btyk and there cleave nought of the cursed thing to thine hand: that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou may turn from the fierceness of his nose-anger, and give thee womb-mercies, and have uterus-compassion on thee, and multiply thee, as he hath sworn unto thy fathers; velo yidbaq beyadekha me’umah min hakherem, lema‘an yashub yhvh mekharon ’apo venatan lekha rakhamim verikhamkha vehirbekha ka’asher nishba‘ la’abotekha.
ky tSm8 bqwl yhwh 1lhyk lSmr 1t kl mZwtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm l8Swt hySr b8yny yhwh 1lhyk when thou hearken to the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to keep all his order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe thee this day, to do that which is right in the eyes of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. ki tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor kal mizvotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, la‘asot hayashar be‘enei yhvh ’elohekha.
bnym 1tm lyhwh 1lhykm l1 ttgddw wl1 tSymw qrHh byn 8ynykm lmt ye are children-betweens of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim: ye not cut yourselves, nor make any baldness between-bin your eyes for the dead. banim ’atem yhvh ’elohekhem, lo titgodedu velo tasimu qarekhah ben ‘enekhem lamet.
ky 8m qdwS 1th lyhwh 1lhyk wbk bHr yhwh lhywt lw l8m sglh mkl h8mym 1Sr 8l pny h1dmh for thou art an dedicated-finished with-mum-people unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath chosen thee to be a peculiar with-mum-people unto himself, above all the nations that are upon the earth. ki ‘am qadosh ’atah yhvh ’elohekha, ubekha bakhar yhvh lihyot lo le‘am segulah mikol ha‘amim ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah.
l1 t1kl kl tw8bh no eat any abominable thing. lo tokhal kal to‘ebah.
z1t hbhmh 1Sr t1klw Swr Sh kSbym wSh 8zym these are the beasts which ye eat: the wall-ox, the sheep, and the intense-goat, zot habehemah ’asher tokhelu, shor seh khesabim veseh ‘izim.
1yl wZby wyHmwr w1qw wdySn wt1w wzmr the to-hart, and the swollen-gazelle, and the grave-donkey, and the wild intense-goat, and the fertilize-pygarg, and the wild wall-ox, and the singer-chamois. ’ayal uzebi veyakhmur, ve’aqo vedishon ute’o vazamer.
wkl bhmh mprst prsh wSs8t Ss8 Sty prswt m8lt grh bbhmh 1th t1klw and every beast that parteth the part-hoof, and cleaveth the cleft into two claws, and cheweth the cud among the beasts, that ye eat. vekhal behemah mafreset parsah veshosa‘at shesa‘ shetei ferasot ma‘alat gerah babehemah, tokhelu.
1k 1t zh l1 t1klw mm8ly hgrh wmmprysy hprsh hSsw8h 1t hgml w1t h1rnbt w1t hSpn ky m8lh grh hmh wprsh l1 hprysw Tm1ym hm lkm nevertheless these ye not eat of them that chew the cud, or of them that divide the cloven part-hoof; as the ripen-camel, and the pine-house-hare, and the turn-coney: for they chew the cud, and divide not the part-hoof; therefore they are stained-ceased unto you. ’akh zeh lo tokhelu mima‘alei hagerah umimafrisei haparsah hashesu‘ah, hagamal ve’et ha’arnebet ve’et hashafan ki ma‘aleh gerah hemah ufarsah lo hifrisu teme’im hem lakhem.
w1t hHzyr ky mprys prsh hw1 wl1 grh Tm1 hw1 lkm mbSrm l1 t1klw wbnbltm l1 tg8w and the return-swine, because it divideth the part-hoof, yet cheweth not the cud, it is stained-ceased unto you: ye not eat of their flesh, nor touch their dead carcass. ve’et hakhazir ki mafris parsah hu velo gerah tamei hu lakhem, mibesaram lo tokhelu ubeniblatam lo tiga‘u.
1t zh t1klw mkl 1Sr bmym kl 1Sr lw snpyr wqSqSt t1klw these ye eat of all that are in the from-waters: all that have fins and scales ye eat: zeh tokhelu mikol ’asher bamayim, kol ’asher lo senapir veqasqeset tokhelu.
wkl 1Sr 1yn lw snpyr wqSqSt l1 t1klw Tm1 hw1 lkm and whatsoever hath not fins and scales ye may not eat; it is stained-ceased unto you. vekhol ’asher ’en lo senapir veqasqeset lo tokhelu, tamei hu lakhem.
kl Zpwr Thrh t1klw of all bright-climaxing birds ye eat. kal zipor tehorah tokhelu.
wzh 1Sr l1 t1klw mhm hnSr whprs wh8znyh and these are they of which ye not eat: the drop-eagle, and the slize-spread-ossifrage, and the daring-ospray, vezeh ’asher lo tokhelu mehem, hanesher vehaperes veha‘azeniyah.
whr1h w1t h1yh whdyh lmynh and the view-glede, and the where-buzzard, and the enough-kite after his kind, vehara’ah ve’et ha’ayah vehadayah leminah.
w1t kl 8rb lmynw and every evening-raven after his kind, ve’et kal ‘oreb lemino.
w1t bt hy8nh w1t htHms w1t hSHp w1t hnZ lmynhw and the daughter-of-dove-ostrich, and the rob-night-go-out-hawk, and the sprocket-seagull, and the go-out-hawk after his kind, ve’et bat haya‘anah ve’et hatakhmas ve’et hashakhaf, ve’et hanez leminehu.
1t hkws w1t hynSwp whtnSmt the cup-daughter-of-dove-ostrich, and the blow-daughter-of-dove-ostrich, and the give-that-dead-barn-daughter-of-dove-ostrich, hakos ve’et hayanshuf vehatinshamet.
whq1t w1t hrHmh w1t hSlk and the now-pelican, and the gier drop-eagle, and the send-cormorant, vehaqa’at ve’et harakhamah ve’et hashalakh.
whHsydh wh1nph lmynh whdwkypt wh8Tlp and the charity-stork, and the sift-heron after her kind, and the pushing-lapwing, and the hoof-bat. vehakhasidah veha’anafah leminah, vehadukhifat veha‘atalef.
wkl SrZ h8wp Tm1 hw1 lkm l1 y1klw and every creeping thing that flieth is stained-ceased unto you: they not be eaten. vekhol sherez ha‘of tamei hu lakhem, lo ye’akhelu.
kl 8wp Thwr t1klw and of all bright-climaxing fowls ye may eat. kal ‘of tahor tokhelu.
l1 t1klw kl nblh lgr 1Sr bS8ryk ttnnh w1klh 1w mkr lnkry ky 8m qdwS 1th lyhwh 1lhyk l1 tbSl gdy bHlb 1mw ye not eat of anything that dieth of itself: thou give it unto the stranger that is in thy hair-gates, that he may eat it; or thou mayest sell it unto an alien: for thou art an dedicated-finished with-mum-people unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. no seethe a kid in his mother's milk. lo tokhelu khal nebelah lager ’asher bish‘arekha titenenah va’akhalah ’o makhor lenakheri ki ‘am qadosh ’atah yhvh ’elohekha, lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb ’imo.
8Sr t8Sr 1t kl tbw1t zr8k hyZ1 hSdh Snh Snh thou truly tithe all the increase of thy seed, that the field bringeth forth year by year. ‘aser te‘aser kal tebu’at zar‘ekha, hayozei hasadeh shanah shanah.
w1klt lpny yhwh 1lhyk bmqwm 1Sr ybHr lSkn Smw Sm m8Sr dgnk tyrSk wyZhrk wbkrt bqrk wZ1nk lm8n tlmd lyr1h 1t yhwh 1lhyk kl hymym and thou eat before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, in the stand-up-place which he choose to place his name there, the tithe of thy corn-swimming, of thy wine-inherit, and of thine name-from-oil, and the firstlings of thy visit-cattles and of thy flocks; that thou mayest learn to fear yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim always. ve’akhalta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha bamaqom ’asher yibkhar leshaken shemo sham ma‘sar deganekha tiroshekha veyizharekha ubekhorot beqarekha vezonekha, lema‘an tilmad leyir’ah yhvh ’elohekha kal hayamim.
wky yrbh mmk hdrk ky l1 twkl S1tw ky yrHq mmk hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk lSwm Smw Sm ky ybrkk yhwh 1lhyk and if the way be too long for thee, so that thou art not able to carry it; or if the place be too far from thee, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim choose to set his name there, when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath knee-fluffy-blessed thee: vekhi yirbeh mimekha haderekh ki lo tukhal se’eto ki yirkhaq mimekha hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha lasum shemo sham, ki yebarekhkha yhvh ’elohekha.
wntth bksp wZrt hksp bydk whlkt 1l hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk bw then thou turn it into money, and bind up the money in thine hand, and go unto the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim choose: venatatah bakasef, vezarta hakesef beyadekha vehalakhta ’el hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha bo.
wntth hksp bkl 1Sr t1wh npSk bbqr wbZ1n wbyyn wbSkr wbkl 1Sr tS1lk npSk w1klt Sm lpny yhwh 1lhyk wSmHt 1th wbytk and thou bestow that money for whatsoever thy being lusteth after, for wall-oxen, or for sheep, or for wine-inherit, or for strong drink, or for whatsoever thy being desireth: and thou eat there before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and thou rejoice, thou, and thine daughter-household, venatatah hakesef bekhol ’asher te’aveh nafshekha babaqar ubazon ubayayin ubashekhar ubekhol ’asher tish’alekha nafshekha, ve’akhalta sham lifnei yhvh ’elohekha vesamakhta ’atah ubetekha.
whlwy 1Sr bS8ryk l1 t8zbnw ky 1yn lw Hlq wnHlh 8mk and the join-levite that is within thy hair-gates; no forsake him; for he hath no part nor inheritance with thee. vehalevi ’asher bish‘arekha lo ta‘azbenu, ki ’en lo kheleq venakhalah ‘imakh.
mqZh SlS Snym twZy1 1t kl m8Sr tbw1tk bSnh hhw1 whnHt bS8ryk at the end of three years thou bring forth all the tithe of thine increase the same year, and lay it up within thy hair-gates: miqzeh shalosh shanim tozi kal ma‘sar tebu’atekha bashanah hahiv, vehinakhta bish‘arekha.
wb1 hlwy ky 1yn lw Hlq wnHlh 8mk whgr whytwm wh1lmnh 1Sr bS8ryk w1klw wSb8w lm8n ybrkk yhwh 1lhyk bkl m8Sh ydk 1Sr t8Sh and the join-levite, (because he hath no part nor inheritance with thee,) and the stranger, and the fatherless, and the widow, which are within thy hair-gates, come, and eat and be satisfied; that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim may knee-fluffy-bless thee in all the work of thine hand which thou doest. uba halevi ki ’en lo kheleq venakhalah ‘imakh vehager vehayatom veha’almanah ’asher bish‘arekha ve’akhelu vesabe‘u, lema‘an yebarekhkha yhvh ’elohekha bekhal ma‘aseh yadekha ’asher ta‘aseh.
mqZ Sb8 Snym t8Sh SmTh at the end of every seven years thou make a release. miqez sheba‘ shanim ta‘aseh shemitah.
wzh dbr hSmTh SmwT kl b8l mSh ydw 1Sr ySh br8hw l1 ygS 1t r8hw w1t 1Hyw ky qr1 SmTh lyhwh and this is the manner of the release: every creditor that lendeth ought unto his neighbor release it; he not exact it of his neighbor, or of his brother; because it is called yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's release. vezeh debar hashemitah shamot kal ba‘al masheh yado ’asher yasheh bere‘ehu, lo yigos re‘ehu ve’et ’akhiv ki qara shemitah yhvh.
1t hnkry tgS w1Sr yhyh lk 1t 1Hyk tSmT ydk of a foreigner thou mayest exact it again: and that which is thine with thy brother thine hand release; hanakheri tigos, va’asher yihyeh lekha ’et ’akhikha tashmet yadekha.
1ps ky l1 yhyh bk 1bywn ky brk ybrkk yhwh b1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk nHlh lrSth save when there be no poor among you; for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou greatly knee-fluffy-bless thee in the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee for an inheritance to possess it: ’efes ki lo yihyeh bekha ’ebyon, ki barekh yebarekhkha yhvh ba’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lerishtah.
rq 1m Smw8 tSm8 bqwl yhwh 1lhyk lSmr l8Swt 1t kl hmZwh hz1t 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm only if thou carefully hearken unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to guard-observe to do all these order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe thee this day. raq ’im shamoa‘ tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha, lishmor la‘asot kal hamizvah hazot ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom.
ky yhwh 1lhyk brkk k1Sr dbr lk wh8bTt gwym rbym w1th l1 t8bT wmSlt bgwym rbym wbk l1 ymSlw for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-blesseth thee, as he promised thee: and thou lend unto many nations, and no borrow; and thou reign over many nations, and they not reign over thee. ki yhvh ’elohekha berakhkha ka’asher diber lakh, veha‘abata goyim rabim ve’atah lo ta‘abot umashalta begoyim rabim ubekha lo yimsholu.
ky yhyh bk 1bywn m1Hd 1Hyk b1Hd S8ryk b1rZk 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk l1 t1mZ 1t lbbk wl1 tqpZ 1t ydk m1Hyk h1bywn if there be among you a poor man of one of thy brethren within any of thy hair-gates in thy land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee, no harden thine heart, nor shut thine hand from thy poor brother: ki yihyeh bekha ’ebyon me’akhad ’akhekha be’akhad she‘arekha be’arzekha ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh, lo te’amez lebabekha velo tiqpoz yadekha me’akhikha ha’ebyon.
ky ptH tptH 1t ydk lw wh8bT t8byTnw dy mHsrw 1Sr yHsr lw and thou open thine hand wide unto him, and surely lend him sufficient for his need, in that which he wanteth. ki fatoakh tiftakh yadekha lo, veha‘abet ta‘abitenu dei makhsoro ’asher yekhsar lo.
hSmr lk pn yhyh dbr 8m lbbk bly8l l1mr qrbh Snt hSb8 Snt hSmTh wr8h 8ynk b1Hyk h1bywn wl1 ttn lw wqr1 8lyk 1l yhwh whyh bk HT1 beware that there be not a thought in thy wicked heart, saying, the seventh year, the year of release, is at hand; and thine eye be bad against thy poor brother, and thou givest him nought; and he cry unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou against thee, and it be miss unto thee. hishamer lekha pen yihyeh dabar ‘im lebabekha beliya‘al lemor qarebah shenat hasheba‘ shenat hashemitah vera‘ah ‘enekha be’akhikha ha’ebyon velo titen lo, veqara ‘alekha ’el yhvh vehayah bekha khet.
ntwn ttn lw wl1 yr8 lbbk bttk lw ky bgll hdbr hzh ybrkk yhwh 1lhyk bkl m8Sk wbkl mSlH ydk thou surely give him, and thine heart not be grieved when thou givest unto him: because that for this thing yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-bless thee in all thy works, and in all that thou puttest thine hand unto. naton titen lo velo yera‘ lebabekha betitekha lo, ki biglal hadabar hazeh yebarekhkha yhvh ’elohekha bekhal ma‘asekha ubekhol mishlakh yadekha.
ky l1 yHdl 1bywn mqrb h1rZ 8l kn 1nky mZwk l1mr ptH tptH 1t ydk l1Hyk l8nyk wl1bynk b1rZk for the poor never cease out of the land: therefore i order-prescribe thee, saying, thou open thine hand wide unto thy brother, to thy poor, and to thy needy, in thy land. ki lo yekhdal ’ebyon miqereb ha’arez, ‘al ken ’anokhi mezavekha lemor patoakh tiftakh yadekha le’akhikha la‘aniyekha ule’ebyonekha be’arzekha.
ky ymkr lk 1Hyk h8bry 1w h8bryh w8bdk SS Snym wbSnh hSby8t tSlHnw HpSy m8mk and if thy brother, an cross-over-hebrew man, or an cross-over-hebrew woman, be sold unto thee, and work for thee six years; then in the seventh year thou let him go free from thee. ki yimakher lekha ’akhikha ha‘ibri ’o ha‘ibriyah va‘abadekha shesh shanim, ubashanah hashebi‘it teshalekhenu khafeshi me‘imakh.
wky tSlHnw HpSy m8mk l1 tSlHnw ryqm and when thou sendest him out free from thee, no let him go away empty: vekhi teshalekhenu khafeshi me‘imakh, lo teshalekhenu reqam.
h8nyq t8nyq lw mZ1nk wmgrnk wmyqbk 1Sr brkk yhwh 1lhyk ttn lw thou furnish him liberally out of thy flock, and out of thy floor, and out of thy wine-inheritpress: of that wherewith yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath knee-fluffy-blessed thee thou give unto him. ha‘aneq ta‘aniq lo mizonekha umigarenekha umiyiqbekha, ’asher berakhkha yhvh titen lo.
wzkrt ky 8bd hyyt b1rZ mZrym wypdk yhwh 1lhyk 8l kn 1nky mZwk 1t hdbr hzh hywm and thou remember that thou wast a worker in the land of narrows-mizraim, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim redeemed thee: therefore i order-prescribe thee this thing to day. vezakharta ki ‘ebed hayita be’erez mizrayim vayifdekha yhvh ’elohekha, ‘al ken ’anokhi mezavekha hadabar hazeh hayom.
whyh ky y1mr 1lyk l1 1Z1 m8mk ky 1hbk w1t bytk ky Twb lw 8mk and it be, if he say unto thee, i will not go away from thee; because he loveth thee and thine daughter-house, because he is well with thee; vehayah ki yomar ’elekha lo ’ezei me‘imakh, ki ’ahebekha ve’et betekha ki tob lo ‘imakh.
wlqHt 1t hmrZ8 wntth b1znw wbdlt whyh lk 8bd 8wlm w1p l1mtk t8Sh kn then thou take an awl, and thrust it through his ear unto the opening, and he be thy worker for ever. and also unto thy mum-true-maid thou do likewise. velaqakhta hamarzea‘ venatatah be’azeno ubadelet vehayah lekha ‘ebed ‘olam, ve’af la’amatekha ta‘aseh ken.
l1 yqSh b8ynk bSlHk 1tw HpSy m8mk ky mSnh Skr Skyr 8bdk SS Snym wbrkk yhwh 1lhyk bkl 1Sr t8Sh it not seem hard unto thee, when thou sendest him away free from thee; for he hath been worth a double hired worker to thee, in serving thee six years: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-bless thee in all that thou doest. lo yiqsheh be‘enekha beshalekhakha ’oto khafeshi me‘imakh ki mishneh sekhar sakhir ‘abadekha shesh shanim, uberakhkha yhvh ’elohekha bekhol ’asher ta‘aseh.
kl hbkwr 1Sr ywld bbqrk wbZ1nk hzkr tqdyS lyhwh 1lhyk l1 t8bd bbkr Swrk wl1 tgz bkwr Z1nk all the firstling rememberers that come of thy visit-cattle and of thy flock thou dedicate-finify unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: thou do no work with the firstling of thy bull, nor shear the firstling of thy sheep. kal habekhor ’asher yivaled bibqarekha ubezonekha hazakhar taqdish yhvh ’elohekha, lo ta‘abod bibkhor shorekha velo tagoz bekhor zonekha.
lpny yhwh 1lhyk t1klnw Snh bSnh bmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1th wbytk thou eat it before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim year by year in the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou choose, thou and thy daughter-household. lifnei yhvh ’elohekha tokhalenu shanah beshanah bamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh, ’atah ubetekha.
wky yhyh bw mwm psH 1w 8wr kl mwm r8 l1 tzbHnw lyhwh 1lhyk and if there be any blemish therein, as if it be lame, or blind, or have any ill blemish, no butcher it unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. vekhi yihyeh bo mum piseakh ’o ‘iver kol mum ra‘, lo tizbakhenu yhvh ’elohekha.
bS8ryk t1klnw hTm1 whThwr yHdw kZby wk1yl thou eat it within thy hair-gates: the stained-ceased and the bright-climaxing person eat it alike, as the swollen-gazelle, and as the to-hart. bish‘arekha tokhalenu, hatamei vehatahor yakhdav kazebi vekha’ayal.
rq 1t dmw l1 t1kl 8l h1rZ tSpknw kmym only no eat the blood thereof; thou pour it upon the ground as from-waters. raq damo lo tokhel, ‘al ha’arez tishpekhenu kamayim.
Smwr 1t HdS h1byb w8Syt psH lyhwh 1lhyk ky bHdS h1byb hwZy1k yhwh 1lhyk mmZrym lylh observe the month of spring-abib, and keep the passover unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: for in the month of spring-abib yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim brought thee forth out of narrows-mizraim by night. shamor khodesh ha’abib ve‘asita pesakh yhvh ’elohekha, ki bekhodesh ha’abib hozi’akha yhvh ’elohekha mimizrayim layelah.
wzbHt psH lyhwh 1lhyk Z1n wbqr bmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh lSkn Smw Sm thou therefore butcher the passover unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, of the flock and the visit-cattle, in the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou choose to place his name there. vezabakhta pesakh yhvh ’elohekha zon ubaqar, bamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh leshaken shemo sham.
l1 t1kl 8lyw HmZ Sb8t ymym t1kl 8lyw mZwt lHm 8ny ky bHpzwn yZ1t m1rZ mZrym lm8n tzkr 1t ywm Z1tk m1rZ mZrym kl ymy Hyyk thou eat no leaven with it; seven days thou eat lit-mazat therewith, even the bread of affliction; for thou camest forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim in haste: that thou mayest remember the day when thou camest forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim all the days of thy life. lo tokhal ‘alav khamez shib‘at yamim tokhal ‘alav mazot lekhem ‘oni, ki bekhipazon yazata me’erez mizrayim lema‘an tizkor yom zetekha me’erez mizrayim kol yemei khayekha.
wl1 yr1h lk S1r bkl gblk Sb8t ymym wl1 ylyn mn hbSr 1Sr tzbH b8rb bywm hr1Swn lbqr and there be no leaven seen with thee in all thy coast seven days; neither there any thing of the flesh, which thou butcherdst the first day at even, remain all night until the morning. velo yera’eh lekha se’or bekhal gebulkha shib‘at yamim, velo yalin min habasar ’asher tizbakh ba‘ereb bayom harishon laboqer.
l1 twkl lzbH 1t hpsH b1Hd S8ryk 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk thou mayest not butcher the passover within any of thy hair-gates, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee: lo tukhal lizboakh hapasakh, be’akhad she‘arekha ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
ky 1m 1l hmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk lSkn Smw Sm tzbH 1t hpsH b8rb kbw1 hSmS mw8d Z1tk mmZrym and at the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim choose to place his name in, there thou butcher the passover at even, at the going down of the sun, at the season that thou camest forth out of narrows-mizraim. ki ’im ’el hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha leshaken shemo sham tizbakh hapesakh ba‘areb, kebo hashemesh mo‘ed zetekha mimizrayim.
wbSlt w1klt bmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk bw wpnyt bbqr whlkt l1hlyk and thou roast and eat it in the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim choose: and thou turn in the morning, and go unto thy tents. ubishalta ve’akhalta bamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha bo, ufanita baboqer vehalakhta le’ohalekha.
SSt ymym t1kl mZwt wbywm hSby8y 8Zrt lyhwh 1lhyk l1 t8Sh ml1kh six days thou eat lit-mazat: and on the seventh day be a solemn assembly to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: thou do no work therein. sheshet yamim tokhal mazot, ubayom hashebi‘i ‘azeret yhvh ’elohekha lo ta‘aseh melakhah.
Sb8h Sb8t tspr lk mhHl HrmS bqmh tHl lspr Sb8h Sb8wt seven weeks thou number unto thee: begin to number the seven weeks from such time as thou beginnest to put the sickle to the corn-swimming. shib‘ah shabu‘ot tispar lakh, mehakhel khermesh baqamah takhel lispor shib‘ah shabu‘ot.
w8Syt Hg Sb8wt lyhwh 1lhyk mst ndbt ydk 1Sr ttn k1Sr ybrkk yhwh 1lhyk and thou keep the until-conception of weeks unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim with a tribute of a volunteer of thine hand, which thou give unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, according as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath knee-fluffy-blessed thee: ve‘asita khag shabu‘ot yhvh ’elohekha misat nidbat yadekha ’asher titen, ka’asher yebarekhkha yhvh ’elohekha.
wSmHt lpny yhwh 1lhyk 1th wbnk wbtk w8bdk w1mtk whlwy 1Sr bS8ryk whgr whytwm wh1lmnh 1Sr bqrbk bmqwm 1Sr ybHr yhwh 1lhyk lSkn Smw Sm and thou rejoice before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, thou, and thy child-between, and thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, and thy worker, and thy mum-true-maid, and the join-levite that is within thy hair-gates, and the stranger, and the fatherless, and the widow, that are among you, in the stand-up-place which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath chosen to place his name there. vesamakhta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha ’atah ubinkha ubitekha ve‘abdekha va’amatekha vehalevi ’asher bish‘arekha vehager vehayatom veha’almanah ’asher beqirbekha, bamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha leshaken shemo sham.
wzkrt ky 8bd hyyt bmZrym wSmrt w8Syt 1t hHqym h1lh and thou remember that thou wast a worker in narrows-mizraim: and thou guard-observe and do these statutes. vezakharta ki ‘ebed hayita bemizrayim, veshamarta ve‘asita hakhuqim ha’eleh.
Hg hskt t8Sh lk Sb8t ymym b1spk mgrnk wmyqbk thou guard-observe the until-conception of dwellings seven days, after that thou hast added in thy corn-swimming and thy wine-inherit: khag hasukot ta‘aseh lekha shib‘at yamim, be’asepekha migarenekha umiyiqbekha.
