wyhwh h1myrk hywm lhywt lw l8m sglh k1Sr dbr lk wlSmr kl mZwtyw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath avouched thee this day to be his peculiar with-mum-people, as he hath promised thee, and that thou shouldest keep all his order-prescriptions; yhvh he’emirekha hayom lihyot lo le‘am segulah ka’asher diber lakh, velishmor kal mizvotav.
wlttk 8lywn 8l kl hgwym 1Sr 8Sh lthlh wlSm wltp1rt wlhytk 8m qdS lyhwh 1lhyk k1Sr dbr and to make thee high above all nations which he hath made, in praise, and in name, and in honor; and that thou mayest be an dedicated-finished with-mum-people unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, as he hath bee-spoken. uletitekha ‘elyon ‘al kal hagoyim ’asher ‘asah lithilah uleshem uletif’aret, velihyotekha ‘am qadosh yhvh ’elohekha ka’asher diber.
wyZw mSh wzqny ySr1l 1t h8m l1mr Smr 1t kl hmZwh 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm hywm and extracted-mose with the elders of saturated-towards-israel order-prescribed the with-mum-people, saying, keep all the order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe you this day. vayzav mosheh veziqnei yisra’el ha‘am lemor, shamor kal hamizvah ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom.
whyh bywm 1Sr t8brw 1t hyrdn 1l h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk whqmt lk 1bnym gdlwt wSdt 1tm bSyd and it be on the day when ye pass over its-going-down-jordan unto the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee, that thou set thee up great stones, and plaster them with plaster: vehayah bayom ’asher ta‘abru hayarden ’el ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh, vahaqemota lekha ’abanim gedolot vesadta ’otam basid.
wktbt 8lyhn 1t kl dbry htwrh hz1t b8brk lm8n 1Sr tb1 1l h1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk 1rZ zbt Hlb wdbS k1Sr dbr yhwh 1lhy 1btyk lk and thou write upon them all the bee-words of this teaching, when thou art passed over, that thou mayest go in unto the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee, a land that floweth with milk and honey; as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of thy fathers hath promised thee. vekhatabta ‘alehen kal dibrei hatorah hazot be‘aberekha, lema‘an tabo ’el ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha ’erez zabat khalab udebash ka’asher diber yhvh ’elohe ’abotekha lakh.
whyh b8brkm 1t hyrdn tqymw 1t h1bnym h1lh 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm hywm bhr 8ybl wSdt 1wtm bSyd therefore it be when ye be gone over its-going-down-jordan, that ye set up these stones, which i order-prescribe you this day, in mount mourning-ebal, and thou plaster them with plaster. vehayah be‘aberekhem hayarden taqimu ha’abanim ha’eleh ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom behar ‘ebal, vesadta ’otam basid.
wbnyt Sm mzbH lyhwh 1lhyk mzbH 1bnym l1 tnyp 8lyhm brzl and there thou between-build an butcher-kitchen unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, an butcher-kitchen of stones: no lift up any iron tool upon them. ubanita sham mizbeakh yhvh ’elohekha, mizbakh ’abanim lo tanif ‘alehem barzel.
1bnym Slmwt tbnh 1t mzbH yhwh 1lhyk wh8lyt 8lyw 8wlt lyhwh 1lhyk thou between-build the butcher-kitchen of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim of whole stones: and thou inward on-ups thereon unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim: ’abanim shelemot tibneh mizbakh yhvh ’elohekha, veha‘alita ‘alav ‘olot yhvh ’elohekha.
wzbHt Slmym w1klt Sm wSmHt lpny yhwh 1lhyk and thou inward wholes, and eat there, and rejoice before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. vezabakhta shelamim ve’akhalta sham, vesamakhta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha.
wktbt 8l h1bnym 1t kl dbry htwrh hz1t b1r hyTb and thou write upon the stones all the bee-words of this teaching very plainly. vekhatabta ‘al ha’abanim kal dibrei hatorah hazot ba’er heteb.
wydbr mSh whkhnym hlwym 1l kl ySr1l l1mr hskt wSm8 ySr1l hywm hzh nhyyt l8m lyhwh 1lhyk and extracted-mose and the dimmer-servers the join-levites spake unto all saturated-towards-israel, saying, take heed, and hearken, o saturated-towards-israel; this day thou art become the with-mum-people of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. vaydaber mosheh vehakohanim halviyim ’el kal yisra’el lemor, hasket ushema‘ yisra’el hayom hazeh nihyeta le‘am yhvh ’elohekha.
wSm8t bqwl yhwh 1lhyk w8Syt 1t mZwtw w1t Hqyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm thou therefore obey the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and do his order-prescriptions and his statutes, which i order-prescribe thee this day. veshama‘ta beqol yhvh ’elohekha, ve‘asita mizvotav ve’et khuqav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom.
wyZw mSh 1t h8m bywm hhw1 l1mr and extracted-mose charged the with-mum-people the same day, saying, vayzav mosheh ha‘am bayom hahu lemor.
1lh y8mdw lbrk 1t h8m 8l hr grzym b8brkm 1t hyrdn Sm8wn wlwy wyhwdh wySSkr wywsp wbnymn these stand upon mount grasses-gerizim to knee-fluffy-bless the with-mum-people, when ye are come over its-going-down-jordan; hear-home-simeon, and join-levi, and know-judah, and wage-issachar, and add-joseph, and he-between-of-righthand-benjamin: ’eleh ya‘amdu lebarekh ha‘am ‘al har gerizim be‘aberekhem hayarden, shim‘on velevi vihudah veyisashkhar veyosef ubinyamin.
w1lh y8mdw 8l hqllh bhr 8ybl r1wbn gd w1Sr wzbwln dn wnptly and these stand upon mount mourning-ebal to curse; buddy-see-child-reuben, luck-gad, and bliss-asher, and fertile-zebulun, discuss-dan, and twisted-naphtali. ve’eleh ya‘amdu ‘al haqelalah behar ‘ebal, re’uben gad ve’asher uzebulun dan venaftali.
w8nw hlwym w1mrw 1l kl 1yS ySr1l qwl rm and the join-levites speak, and say unto all the men of saturated-towards-israel with a loud voice, ve‘anu halviyim ve’ameru ’el kal ’ish yisra’el qol ram.
1rwr h1yS 1Sr y8Sh psl wmskh tw8bt yhwh m8Sh ydy HrS wSm bstr w8nw kl h8m w1mrw 1mn cursed be the man that maketh any graven or molten image, an abomination unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, the work of the hands of the craftsman, and putteth it in a secret place. and all the with-mum-people answer and say, nurture-amen. ’arur ha’ish ’asher ya‘aseh fesel umasekhah to‘abat yhvh ma‘aseh yedei kharash vesam basater, ve‘anu khal ha‘am ve’ameru ’amen.
1rwr mqlh 1byw w1mw w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that setteth light by his father or his mother. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur maqleh ’abiv ve’imo, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr msyg gbwl r8hw w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that removeth his neighbor's landmark. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur masig gebul re‘ehu, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr mSgh 8wr bdrk w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that maketh the blind to wander out of the way. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur mashgeh ‘iver badarekh, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr mTh mSpT gr ytwm w1lmnh w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that perverteth the decision-grammar of the stranger, fatherless, and widow. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur mateh mishpat ger yatom ve’almanah, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr Skb 8m 1St 1byw ky glh knp 1byw w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that lieth with his father's woman; because he uncovereth his father's skirt. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur shokheb ‘im ’eshet ’abiv ki gilah kenaf ’abiv, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr Skb 8m kl bhmh w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that lieth with any manner of beast. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur shokheb ‘im kal behemah, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr Skb 8m 1Htw bt 1byw 1w bt 1mw w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that lieth with his sister, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of his father, or the daughter-hoof-bat-child of his mother. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur shokheb ‘im ’akhoto bat ’abiv ’o bat ’imo, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr Skb 8m Htntw w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that lieth with his mother in teaching. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur shokheb ‘im khotanto, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr mkh r8hw bstr w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that hits his neighbor secretly. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur makeh re‘ehu basater, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr lqH SHd lhkwt npS dm nqy w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that taketh reward to slay an innocent person. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur loqeakh shokhad lehakot nefesh dam naqi, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
1rwr 1Sr l1 yqym 1t dbry htwrh hz1t l8Swt 1wtm w1mr kl h8m 1mn cursed be he that confirmeth not all the bee-words of this teaching to do them. and all the with-mum-people say, nurture-amen. ’arur ’asher lo yaqim dibrei hatorah hazot la‘asot ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
whyh 1m Smw8 tSm8 bqwl yhwh 1lhyk lSmr l8Swt 1t kl mZwtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm wntnk yhwh 1lhyk 8lywn 8l kl gwyy h1rZ and it come to pass, if thou hearken diligently unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to guard-observe and to do all his order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe thee this day, that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim will set thee on high above all nations of the earth: vehayah ’im shamoa‘ tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor la‘asot kal mizvotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, unetanekha yhvh ’elohekha ‘elyon ‘al kal goyei ha’arez.
wb1w 8lyk kl hbrkwt h1lh whSygk ky tSm8 bqwl yhwh 1lhyk and all these knee-fluffy-blessings come on thee, and overtake thee, if thou hearken unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. uba’u ‘alekha kal haberakhot ha’eleh vehisigukha, ki tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha.
brwk 1th b8yr wbrwk 1th bSdh knee-fluffy-blessed thou be in the light-city, and knee-fluffy-blessed thou be in the field. barukh ’atah ba‘ir, ubarukh ’atah basadeh.
brwk pry bTnk wpry 1dmtk wpry bhmtk Sgr 1lpyk w8Strwt Z1nk knee-fluffy-blessed be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy ground, and the fruit of thy in-them-animal, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep. barukh peri bitnekha uferi ’admatekha uferi behemtekha, shegar ’alafekha ve‘ashterot zonekha.
brwk Tn1k wmS1rtk knee-fluffy-blessed be thy basket and thy store. barukh tan’akha umish’artekha.
brwk 1th bb1k wbrwk 1th bZ1tk knee-fluffy-blessed thou be when thou comest in, and knee-fluffy-blessed thou be when thou goest out. barukh ’atah bebo’ekha, ubarukh ’atah bezetekha.
ytn yhwh 1t 1ybyk hqmym 8lyk ngpym lpnyk bdrk 1Hd yZ1w 1lyk wbSb8h drkym ynwsw lpnyk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou cause thine father-adversaries that rise up against thee to be smitten before-turns thy face-turns: they come out against thee one way, and flee before-turns thee seven ways. yiten yhvh ’oyebekha haqamim ‘alekha nigafim lefanekha, bederekh ’ekhad yeze’u ’elekha ubeshib‘ah derakhim yanusu lefanekha.
yZw yhwh 1tk 1t hbrkh b1smyk wbkl mSlH ydk wbrkk b1rZ 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk ntn lk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribe the knee-fluffy-blessing upon thee in thy storehouses, and in all that thou settest thine hand unto; and he knee-fluffy-bless thee in the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim giveth thee. yezav yhvh ’itekha haberakhah ba’asamekha ubekhol mishlakh yadekha, uberakhkha ba’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
yqymk yhwh lw l8m qdwS k1Sr nSb8 lk ky tSmr 1t mZwt yhwh 1lhyk whlkt bdrkyw yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou establish thee an dedicated-finished with-mum-people unto himself, as he hath sworn unto thee, if thou keep the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and walk in his ways. yeqimekha yhvh lo le‘am qadosh ka’asher nishba‘ lakh, ki tishmor mizvot yhvh ’elohekha vehalakhta bidrakhav.
wr1w kl 8my h1rZ ky Sm yhwh nqr1 8lyk wyr1w mmk and all with-mum-people of the earth see that thou art called by the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and they be afraid of thee. vera’u kal ‘amei ha’arez ki shem yhvh niqra ‘alekha, veyare’u mimeka.
whwtrk yhwh lTwbh bpry bTnk wbpry bhmtk wbpry 1dmtk 8l h1dmh 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btyk ltt lk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make thee plenteous in goods, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy in-them-animal, and in the fruit of thy ground, in the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto thy fathers to give thee. vehotirkha yhvh letobah bifri bitnekha ubifri behamtekha ubifri ’admatekha, ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekha latet lakh.
yptH yhwh lk 1t 1wZrw hTwb 1t hSmym ltt mTr 1rZk b8tw wlbrk 1t kl m8Sh ydk whlwyt gwym rbym w1th l1 tlwh yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou open unto thee his good treasure, the namespaces to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to knee-fluffy-bless all the work of thine hand: and thou lend unto many nations, and no borrow. yiftakh yhvh lekha ’ozaro hatob hashamayim latet metar ’arzekha be‘ito ulebarekh kal ma‘aseh yadekha, vehilvita goyim rabim ve’atah lo tilveh.
wntnk yhwh lr1S wl1 lznb whyyt rq lm8lh wl1 thyh lmTh ky tSm8 1l mZwt yhwh 1lhyk 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm lSmr wl8Swt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make thee the head, and not the tail; and thou be above only, and no be beneath; if that thou hearken unto the order-prescriptions of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, which i order-prescribe thee this day, to guard-observe and to do them: unetanekha yhvh lerosh velo lezanab vehayita raq lema‘lah velo tihyeh lematah, ki tishma‘ ’el mizvot yhvh ’elohekha ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom lishmor vela‘asot.
wl1 tswr mkl hdbrym 1Sr 1nky mZwh 1tkm hywm ymyn wSm1wl llkt 1Hry 1lhym 1Hrym l8bdm and no go aside from any of the bee-words which i order-prescribe thee this day, to the right hand, or to the left, to go after other towards-these-elohim to work for them. velo tasur mikal hadebarim ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom yamin usemol, lalekhet ’akharei ’elohim ’akherim le‘abedam.
whyh 1m l1 tSm8 bqwl yhwh 1lhyk lSmr l8Swt 1t kl mZwtyw wHqtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm wb1w 8lyk kl hqllwt h1lh whSygwk and it come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to guard-observe to do all his order-prescriptions and his statutes which i order-prescribe thee this day; that all these curses come upon thee, and overtake thee: vehayah ’im lo tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor la‘asot kal mizvotav vekhuqotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, uba’u ‘alekha kal haqelalot ha’eleh vehisigukha.
1rwr 1th b8yr w1rwr 1th bSdh cursed thou be in the light-city, and cursed thou be in the field. ’arur ’atah ba‘ir, ve’arur ’atah basadeh.
1rwr Tn1k wmS1rtk cursed be thy basket and thy store. ’arur tan’akha umish’artekha.
1rwr pry bTnk wpry 1dmtk Sgr 1lpyk w8Strwt Z1nk cursed be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy land, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep. ’arur peri bitnekha uferi ’admatekha, shegar ’alafekha ve‘ashterot zonekha.
1rwr 1th bb1k w1rwr 1th bZ1tk cursed thou be when thou comest in, and cursed thou be when thou goest out. ’arur ’atah bebo’ekha, ve’arur ’atah bezetekha.
ySlH yhwh bk 1t hm1rh 1t hmhwmh w1t hmg8rt bkl mSlH ydk 1Sr t8Sh 8d hSmdk w8d 1bdk mhr mpny r8 m8llyk 1Sr 8zbtny yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou send upon thee cursing, vexation, and rebuke, in all that thou settest thine hand unto for to do, until thou be destroyed, and until thou perish quickly; because of the wickedness of thy doings, whereby thou hast forsaken me. yeshalakh yhvh bekha hame’erah hamehumah ve’et hamig‘eret bekhal mishlakh yadekha ’asher ta‘aseh, ‘ad hishamedkha ve‘ad ’abadekha maher mipenei roa‘ ma‘alalekha ’asher ‘azabtani.
ydbq yhwh bk 1t hdbr 8d kltw 1tk m8l h1dmh 1Sr 1th b1 Smh lrSth yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make the pestilence cleave unto thee, until he have consumed thee from off the land, whither thou goest to possess it. yadbeq yhvh bekha ’et hadaber, ‘ad kaloto ’otekha me‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah.
ykkh yhwh bSHpt wbqdHt wbdlqt wbHrHr wbHrb wbSdpwn wbyrqwn wrdpwk 8d 1bdk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hit thee with a consumption, and with a fever, and with an inflammation, and with an extreme burning, and with the sword, and with blasting, and with mildew; and they pursue thee until thou perish. yakekhah yhvh bashakhefet ubaqadakhat ubadaleqet ubakharkhur ubakhereb ubashidafon ubayeraqon, uredafukha ‘ad ’abedekha.
whyw Smyk 1Sr 8l r1Sk nHSt wh1rZ 1Sr tHtyk brzl and thy namespaces that is over thy head be brass, and the earth that is under thee be iron. vehayu shamekha ’asher ‘al roshekha nekhoshet, veha’arez ’asher takhtekha barzel.
ytn yhwh 1t mTr 1rZk 1bq w8pr mn hSmym yrd 8lyk 8d hSmdk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou make the rain of thy land powder and dust: from namespaces it come down upon thee, until thou be destroyed. yiten yhvh metar ’arzekha ’abaq ve‘afar, min hashamayim yered ‘alekha ‘ad hishamedakh.
ytnk yhwh ngp lpny 1ybyk bdrk 1Hd tZ1 1lyw wbSb8h drkym tnws lpnyw whyyt lz8wh lkl mmlkwt h1rZ yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou cause thee to be smitten before-turns thine father-adversaries: thou go out one way against them, and flee seven ways before-turns them: and be removed into all the moloch-kingdoms of the earth. yitenkha yhvh nigaf lifnei ’oyebekha bederekh ’ekhad tezei ’elav ubeshib‘ah derakhim tanus lefanav, vehayita leza‘avah lekhol mamlekhot ha’arez.
whyth nbltk lm1kl lkl 8wp hSmym wlbhmt h1rZ w1yn mHryd and thy carcass be meat unto all fowls of the air, and unto the beasts of the earth, and no man fray them away. vehayetah niblatekha lema’akhal lekhal ‘of hashamayim ulebehemat ha’arez, ve’en makharid.
ykkh yhwh bSHyn mZrym wb8plym wbTHrym wbgrb wbHrs 1Sr l1 twkl lhrp1 yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will hit thee with the botch of narrows-mizraim, and with the emerods, and with the scab, and with the itch, whereof thou canst not be healed. yakekhah yhvh bishkhin mizrayim ubatekhorim ubagarab ubekhares, ’asher lo tukhal leherafe.
ykkh yhwh bSg8wn wb8wrwn wbtmhwn lbb yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hit thee with madness, and blindness, and astonishment of heart: yakekhah yhvh beshiga‘on ube‘ivaron, ubetimhon lebab.
whyyt mmSS bZhrym k1Sr ymSS h8wr b1plh wl1 tZlyH 1t drkyk whyyt 1k 8Swq wgzwl kl hymym w1yn mwSy8 and thou grope at noonday, as the blind gropeth in darkness, and no prosper in thy ways: and thou be only oppressed and spoiled evermore, and no man save thee. vehayita memashesh bazahorayim ka’asher yemashesh ha‘iver ba’afelah velo tazliakh derakhekha, vehayita ’akh ‘ashuq vegazul kal hayamim ve’en moshia‘.
1Sh t1rS w1yS 1Hr ySglnh ySkbnh byt tbnh wl1 tSb bw krm tT8 wl1 tHllnw thou betroth a woman, and another man lie with her: thou between-build an daughter-house, and no dwell therein: thou plant a vineyard, and not gather the grapes thereof. ’ishah te’ares ve’ish ’akher yishkabenah bayit tibneh velo tesheb bo, kerem tita‘ velo tekhalelenu.
Swrk TbwH l8ynyk wl1 t1kl mmnw Hmrk gzwl mlpnyk wl1 ySwb lk Z1nk ntnwt l1ybyk w1yn lk mwSy8 thine wall-ox be slain before-turns thine eyes, and no eat thereof: thine ass be violently taken away from before-turns thy face-turns, and not be restored to thee: thy sheep be given unto thine father-adversaries, and thou have none to rescue them. shorkha tabuakh le‘enekha velo tokhal mimenu khamorekha gazul milefanekha velo yashub lakh, zonekha netunot le’oyebekha ve’en lekha moshia‘.
bnyk wbntyk ntnym l8m 1Hr w8ynyk r1wt wklwt 1lyhm kl hywm w1yn l1l ydk thy children-betweens and thy children-betweenesss be given unto another with-mum-people, and thine eyes look, and fail with longing for them all the day long; and there be no might in thine hand. banekha ubenotekha netunim le‘am ’akher ve‘enekha ro’ot vekhalot ’alehem kal hayom, ve’en le’el yadekha.
pry 1dmtk wkl ygy8k y1kl 8m 1Sr l1 yd8t whyyt rq 8Swq wrZwZ kl hymym the fruit of thy land, and all thy labors, a nation which thou knowest not eat up; and thou be only oppressed and crushed alway: peri ’admatekha vekhal yegi‘akha yokhal ‘am ’asher lo yada‘eta, vehayita raq ‘ashuq verazuz kal hayamim.
whyyt mSg8 mmr1h 8ynyk 1Sr tr1h so that thou be mad for the sight of thine eyes which thou see. vehayita meshuga‘, mimar’eh ‘enekha ’asher tir’eh.
ykkh yhwh bSHyn r8 8l hbrkym w8l hSqym 1Sr l1 twkl lhrp1 mkp rglk w8d qdqdk yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hit thee in the knees, and in the legs, with a sore botch that cannot be healed, from the sole of thy foot unto the top of thy head. yakekhah yhvh bishkhin ra‘ ‘al habirkayim ve‘al hashoqayim ’asher lo leherafe, mikaf raglekha ve‘ad qadeqodekha.
ywlk yhwh 1tk w1t mlkk 1Sr tqym 8lyk 1l gwy 1Sr l1 yd8t 1th w1btyk w8bdt Sm 1lhym 1Hrym 8Z w1bn yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring thee, and thy moloch-king which thou set over thee, unto a nation which neither thou nor thy fathers have hand-known; and there thou work for other towards-these-elohim, wood and father-child-stone. yolekh yhvh ’otekha ve’et malkekha ’asher taqim ‘alekha ’el go ’asher lo yada‘ta ’atah va’abotekha, ve‘abadta sham ’elohim ’akherim ‘ez va’aben.
whyyt lSmh lmSl wlSnynh bkl h8mym 1Sr ynhgk yhwh Smh and thou become an astonishment, a proverb, and a byword, among all nations whither yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou lead thee. vehayita leshamah lemashal velishninah, bekhol ha‘amim ’asher yenahegkha yhvh shamah.
zr8 rb twZy1 hSdh wm8T t1sp ky yHslnw h1rbh thou carry much seed out into the field, and gather and little in; for the locust consume it. zera‘ rab tozi hasadeh, ume‘at te’esof ki yakhselenu ha’arbeh.
krmym tT8 w8bdt wyyn l1 tSth wl1 t1gr ky t1klnw htl8t thou plant vineyards, and dress them, and neither drink of the wine-inherit, nor gather the grapes; for the worms eat them. keramim tita‘ ve‘abadeta, veyayin lo tishteh velo te’egor ki tokhelenu hatola‘at.
zytym yhyw lk bkl gbwlk wSmn l1 tswk ky ySl zytk thou have olive trees throughout all thy coasts, and no lube thyself with the name-from-oil; for thine olive cast his fruit. zetim yihyu lekha bekhal gebulekha, veshemen lo tasukh ki yishal zetekha.
bnym wbnwt twlyd wl1 yhyw lk ky ylkw bSby thou beget children-betweens and children-betweenesss, and no enjoy them; for they go into captivity. banim ubanot tolid, velo yihyu lakh ki yelekhu bashebi.
kl 8Zk wpry 1dmtk yyrS hZlZl all thy trees and fruit of thy land the locust consume. kal ‘ezekha uferi ’admatekha, yeyaresh hazelazal.
hgr 1Sr bqrbk y8lh 8lyk m8lh m8lh w1th trd mTh mTh the stranger that is within thee get up above thee very high; and thou come down very low. hager ’asher beqirbekha ya‘aleh ‘alekha ma‘lah ma‘elah, ve’atah tered matah matah.
hw1 ylwk w1th l1 tlwnw hw1 yhyh lr1S w1th thyh lznb he lend to thee, and no lend to him: he be the head, and thou be the tail. hu yalvekha ve’atah lo talvenu, hu yihyeh lerosh ve’atah tihyeh lezanab.
wb1w 8lyk kl hqllwt h1lh wrdpwk whSygwk 8d hSmdk ky l1 Sm8t bqwl yhwh 1lhyk lSmr mZwtyw wHqtyw 1Sr Zwk moreover all these curses come upon thee, and pursue thee, and overtake thee, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst not unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to keep his order-prescriptions and his statutes which he order-prescribed thee: uba’u ‘alekha kal haqelalot ha’eleh uredafukha vehisigukha ‘ad hishamedakh, ki lo shama‘ta beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav ’asher zivakh.
whyw bk l1wt wlmwpt wbzr8k 8d 8wlm and they be upon thee for a sign and for a wonder, and upon thy seed for ever. vehayu bekha le’ot ulemofet, ubezar‘akha ‘ad ‘olam.
tHt 1Sr l1 8bdt 1t yhwh 1lhyk bSmHh wbTwb lbb mrb kl because thou worked forst not yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim with joyfulness, and with gladness of heart, for the abundance of all things; takhat ’asher lo ‘abadta yhvh ’elohekha besimkhah ubetub lebab, merob kol.
w8bdt 1t 1ybyk 1Sr ySlHnw yhwh bk br8b wbZm1 wb8yrm wbHsr kl wntn 8l brzl 8l Zw1rk 8d hSmydw 1tk therefore thou work for thine father-adversaries which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou send against thee, in hunger, and in thirst, and in nakedness, and in want of all things: and he put a yoke of iron upon thy neck, until he have destroyed thee. ve‘abadta ’oyebekha ’asher yeshalekhenu yhvh bakh bera‘ab ubezama ube‘erom ubekhoser kol, venatan ‘ol barzel ‘al zavarekha ‘ad hishmido ’otakh.
yS1 yhwh 8lyk gwy mrHwq mqZh h1rZ k1Sr yd1h hnSr gwy 1Sr l1 tSm8 lSnw yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring a nation against thee from far, from the end of the earth, as swift as the drop-eagle flieth; a nation whose tongue no understand; yisa yhvh ‘alekha go merakhoq miqzeh ha’arez ka’asher yid’eh hanasher, go ’asher lo tishma‘ leshono.
gwy 8z pnym 1Sr l1 yS1 pnym lzqn wn8r l1 yHn a nation of fierce countenance, which not regard the person of the old, nor show favor to the young: go ‘az panim, ’asher lo yisa fanim lezaqen vena‘ar lo yakhon.
w1kl pry bhmtk wpry 1dmtk 8d hSmdk 1Sr l1 yS1yr lk dgn tyrwS wyZhr Sgr 1lpyk w8Strt Z1nk 8d h1bydw 1tk and he eat the fruit of thy in-them-animal, and the fruit of thy land, until thou be destroyed: which also not leave thee either corn-swimming, wine-inherit, or name-from-oil, or the increase of thy kine, or flocks of thy sheep, until he have destroyed thee. ve’akhal peri behemtekha uferi ’admatekha ‘ad hishamedakh ’asher lo yash’ir lekha dagan tirosh veyizhar shegar ’alafekha ve‘ashterot zonekha, ‘ad ha’abido ’otakh.
whZr lk bkl S8ryk 8d rdt Hmtyk hgbhwt whbZrwt 1Sr 1th bTH bhn bkl 1rZk whZr lk bkl S8ryk bkl 1rZk 1Sr ntn yhwh 1lhyk lk and he besiege thee in all thy hair-gates, until thy high and fenced walls come down, wherein thou trustedst, throughout all thy land: and he besiege thee in all thy hair-gates throughout all thy land, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath given thee. vehezar lekha bekhal she‘arekha ‘ad redet khomotekha hagebohot vehabezurot ’asher ’atah boteakh bahen bekhal ’arzekha, vehezar lekha bekhal she‘arekha bekhal ’arzekha ’asher natan yhvh ’elohekha lakh.
w1klt pry bTnk bSr bnyk wbntyk 1Sr ntn lk yhwh 1lhyk bmZwr wbmZwq 1Sr yZyq lk 1ybk and thou eat the fruit of thine own body, the flesh of thy children-betweens and of thy children-betweenesss, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath given thee, in the siege, and in the straitness, wherewith thine father-adversaries distress thee: ve’akhalta feri bitnekha besar banekha ubenotekha ’asher natan lekha yhvh ’elohekha, bemazor ubemazoq ’asher yaziq lekha ’oyebekha.
h1yS hrk bk wh8ng m1d tr8 8ynw b1Hyw wb1St Hyqw wbytr bnyw 1Sr ywtyr so that the man that is tender among you, and very delicate, his eye be bad toward his brother, and toward the woman of his bosom, and toward the remnant of his children-betweens which he leave: ha’ish harakh bekha vehe‘anog me’od, tera‘ ‘eno be’akhiv ube’eshet kheqo ubeyeter banav ’asher yotir.
mtt l1Hd mhm mbSr bnyw 1Sr y1kl mbly hS1yr lw kl bmZwr wbmZwq 1Sr yZyq lk 1ybk bkl S8ryk so that he will not give to any of them of the flesh of his children-betweens whom he eat: because he hath nothing left him in the siege, and in the straitness, wherewith thine father-adversaries distress thee in all thy hair-gates. mitet le’akhad mehem mibesar banav ’asher yokhel mibeli hish’ir lo kol, bemazor ubemazoq ’asher yaziq lekha ’oyibkha bekhal she‘arekha.
hrkh bk wh8ngh 1Sr l1 nsth kp rglh hZg 8l h1rZ mht8ng wmrk tr8 8ynh b1yS Hyqh wbbnh wbbth the tender and delicate woman among you, which would not adventure to set the sole of her foot upon the ground for delicateness and tenderness, her eye be bad toward the man of her bosom, and toward her child-between, and toward her daughter-hoof-bat-child, harakah bekha veha‘anugah ’asher lo nisetah khaf raglah hazeg ‘al ha’arez mehit‘aneg umerokh, tera‘ ‘enah be’ish kheqah ubibnah ubebitah.
wbSlyth hywZt mbyn rglyh wbbnyh 1Sr tld ky t1klm bHsr kl bstr bmZwr wbmZwq 1Sr yZyq lk 1ybk bS8ryk and toward her young one that cometh out from between-bin her feet, and toward her children-betweens which she bear: for she eat them for want of all things secretly in the siege and straitness, wherewith thine enemy distress thee in thy hair-gates. ubeshilyatah hayozet miben ragleha ubebaneha ’asher teled ki tokhelem bekhoser kol basater, bemazor ubemazoq ’asher yaziq lekha ’oyibkha bish‘arekha.
1m l1 tSmr l8Swt 1t kl dbry htwrh hz1t hktwbym bspr hzh lyr1h 1t hSm hnkbd whnwr1 hzh 1t yhwh 1lhyk if thou wilt not guard-observe to do all the bee-words of this teaching that are written in this book, that thou mayest fear this glorious and fearful name, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim; ’im lo tishmor la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot haketubim basefer hazeh, leyir’ah hashem hanikhbad vehanora hazeh yhvh ’elohekha.
whpl1 yhwh 1t mktk w1t mkwt zr8k mkwt gdlwt wn1mnwt wHlym r8ym wn1mnym then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will make thy plagues wonderful, and the plagues of thy seed, even great plagues, and of long continuance, and sore sicknesses, and of long continuance. vehifla yhvh makotekha ve’et makot zar‘ekha, makot gedolot vene’emanot vakholayim ra‘im vene’emanim.
whSyb bk 1t kl mdwh mZrym 1Sr ygrt mpnyhm wdbqw bk moreover he will bring upon thee all the diseases of narrows-mizraim, which thou wast afraid of; and they cleave unto thee. veheshib bekha kal madveh mizrayim ’asher yagoreta mipenehem, vedabequ bakh.
gm kl Hly wkl mkh 1Sr l1 ktwb bspr htwrh hz1t y8lm yhwh 8lyk 8d hSmdk also every sickness, and every plague, which is not written in the book of this teaching, them will yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring upon thee, until thou be destroyed. gam kal kholi vekhal makah ’asher lo khatub besefer hatorah hazot, ya‘lem yhvh ‘alekha ‘ad hishamedakh.
wnS1rtm bmty m8T tHt 1Sr hyytm kkwkby hSmym lrb ky l1 Sm8t bqwl yhwh 1lhyk and ye be left few in number, whereas ye were as the stars of namespaces for multitude; because thou wouldest not obey the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim. venish’artem bimtei me‘at takhat ’asher heyitem kekhokhbei hashamayim larob, ki lo shama‘ta beqol yhvh ’elohekha.
whyh k1Sr SS yhwh 8lykm lhyTyb 1tkm wlhrbwt 1tkm kn ySyS yhwh 8lykm lh1byd 1tkm wlhSmyd 1tkm wnsHtm m8l h1dmh 1Sr 1th b1 Smh lrSth and it come to pass, that as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou rejoiced over you to do you good, and to multiply you; so yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will rejoice over you to destroy you, and to bring you to nought; and ye be plucked from off the land whither thou goest to possess it. vehayah ka’asher sas yhvh ‘alekhem lehetib ’etkhem uleharbot ’etkhem ken yasis yhvh ‘alekhem leha’abid ’etkhem ulehashmid ’etkhem, venisakhtem me‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah.
whpyZk yhwh bkl h8mym mqZh h1rZ w8d qZh h1rZ w8bdt Sm 1lhym 1Hrym 1Sr l1 yd8t 1th w1btyk 8Z w1bn and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou scatter thee among all with-mum-people, from the one end of the earth even unto the other; and there thou work for other towards-these-elohim, which neither thou nor thy fathers have hand-known, even wood and father-child-stone. vehefizekha yhvh bekhal ha‘amim miqzeh ha’arez ve‘ad qezeh ha’arez, ve‘abadta sham ’elohim ’akherim ’asher lo yada‘ta ’atah va’abotekha ‘ez va’aben.
wbgwym hhm l1 trgy8 wl1 yhyh mnwH lkp rglk wntn yhwh lk Sm lb rgz wklywn 8ynym wd1bwn npS and among these nations thou find no ease, neither the sole of thy foot have rest: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou give thee there a trembling heart, and failing of eyes, and sorrow of mind: ubagoyim hahem lo targia‘ velo yihyeh manoakh lekhaf raglekha, venatan yhvh lekha sham leb ragaz vekhilyon ‘enayim veda’abon nafesh.
whyw Hyyk tl1ym lk mngd wpHdt lylh wywmm wl1 t1myn bHyyk and thy life hang in doubt before-turns thee; and thou fear day and night, and have none assurance of thy life: vehayu khayekha telu’im lekha mineged, ufakhadta laylah veyomam velo ta’amin bekhayekha.
bbqr t1mr my ytn 8rb wb8rb t1mr my ytn bqr mpHd lbbk 1Sr tpHd wmmr1h 8ynyk 1Sr tr1h in the morning thou say, would towards-these-elohim it were even! and at even thou say, would towards-these-elohim it were morning! for the fear of thine heart wherewith thou fear, and for the sight of thine eyes which thou see. baboqer tomar mi yiten ‘ereb uba‘ereb tomar mi yiten boqer, mipakhad lebabekha ’asher tifkhad umimar’eh ‘enekha ’asher tir’eh.
whSybk yhwh mZrym b1nywt bdrk 1Sr 1mrty lk l1 tsyp 8wd lr1th whtmkrtm Sm l1ybyk l8bdym wlSpHwt w1yn qnh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou bring thee into narrows-mizraim again with ships, by the way whereof i spake unto thee, thou see it no more again: and there ye be sold unto your father-adversaries for workers and bondwomen, and no man buy you. veheshibekha yhvh mizrayim ba’oniyot baderekh ’asher ’amarti lekha lo tosif ‘od lir’otah, vehitmakartem sham le’oyebekha la‘abadim velishfakhot ve’en qoneh.
1lh dbry hbryt 1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh lkrt 1t bny ySr1l b1rZ mw1b mlbd hbryt 1Sr krt 1tm bHrb these are the bee-words of the covenant, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose to make with children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel in the land of from-father-moab, beside the covenant which he made with them in sword-horeb. ’eleh dibrei haberit ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh likhrot ’et benei yisra’el be’erez mo’ab, milebad haberit ’asher karat ’itam bekhoreb.
wyqr1 mSh 1l kl ySr1l wy1mr 1lhm 1tm r1ytm 1t kl 1Sr 8Sh yhwh l8ynykm b1rZ mZrym lpr8h wlkl 8bdyw wlkl 1rZw and extracted-mose called unto all saturated-towards-israel, and said unto them, ye have seen all that yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou did before-turns your eyes in the land of narrows-mizraim unto big-house-pharaoh, and unto all his workers, and unto all his land; vayiqra mosheh ’el kal yisra’el vayomer ’alehem, ’atem re’item kal ’asher ‘asah yhvh le‘enekhem be’erez mizrayim lefar‘oh ulekhal ‘abadav ulekhal ’arzo.
hmswt hgdlt 1Sr r1w 8ynyk h1tt whmptym hgdlym hhm the great temptations which thine eyes have seen, the signs, and those great miracles: hamasot hagedolot ’asher ra’u ‘enekha, ha’otot vehamofetim hagedolim hahem.
wl1 ntn yhwh lkm lb ld8t w8ynym lr1wt w1znym lSm8 8d hywm hzh yet yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath not given you an heart to perceive, and eyes to see, and ears to hear, unto this day. velo natan yhvh lakhem leb lada‘at ve‘enayim lir’ot ve’azenayim lishmoa‘, ‘ad hayom hazeh.
w1wlk 1tkm 1rb8ym Snh bmdbr l1 blw Slmtykm m8lykm wn8lk l1 blth m8l rglk and i have led you forty years in the place-of-word-desert: your clothes are not waxen old upon you, and thy shoe is not waxen old upon thy foot. va’olekh ’etkhem ’arba‘im shanah bamidbar, lo balu salmotekhem me‘alekhem vena‘alkha lo baletah me‘al raglekha.
lHm l1 1kltm wyyn wSkr l1 Stytm lm8n td8w ky 1ny yhwh 1lhykm ye have not eaten bread, neither have ye drunk wine-inherit or strong drink: that ye might hand-know that i am yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim. lekhem lo ’akhaltem veyayin veshekhar lo shetitem, lema‘an tede‘u ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wtb1w 1l hmqwm hzh wyZ1 syHn mlk HSbwn w8wg mlk hbSn lqr1tnw lmlHmh wnkm and when ye came unto this place, curly-sihon the moloch-king of score-heshbon, and mock-og the moloch-king of at-tooth-bashan, came out against us unto battle, and we smote them: vatabo’u ’el hamaqom hazeh, vayezei sikhon melekh kheshbon ve‘og melekh habashan liqratenu lamilkhamah vanakem.
wnqH 1t 1rZm wntnh lnHlh lr1wbny wlgdy wlHZy SbT hmnSy and we took their land, and gave it for an inheritance unto the buddy-see-child-reubenites, and to the luck-gadites, and to the half branch of place-of-sleep-manasseh. vaniqakh ’arzam vanitenah lenakhalah lar’ubeni velagadi, velakhazi shebet hamnashi.
wSmrtm 1t dbry hbryt hz1t w8Sytm 1tm lm8n tSkylw 1t kl 1Sr t8Swn keep therefore the bee-words of this covenant, and do them, that ye may prosper in all that ye do. ushemartem dibrei haberit hazot va‘asitem ’otam, lema‘an taskilu kal ’asher ta‘asun.
1tm nZbym hywm klkm lpny yhwh 1lhykm r1Sykm SbTykm zqnykm wSTrykm kl 1yS ySr1l ye stand this day all of you before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim; your captains of your branchs, your elders, and your officers, with all the men of saturated-towards-israel, ’atem nizabim hayom kulekhem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem, rashekhem shibtekhem ziqnekhem veshoterekhem kol ’ish yisra’el.
Tpkm nSykm wgrk 1Sr bqrb mHnyk mHTb 8Zyk 8d S1b mymyk your little ones, your women, and thy stranger that is in thy camp, from the hewer of thy wood unto the drawer of thy from-waters: tapekhem neshekhem vegerekha ’asher beqereb makhanekha, mekhoteb ‘ezekha ‘ad sho’eb memekha.
l8brk bbryt yhwh 1lhyk wb1ltw 1Sr yhwh 1lhyk krt 8mk hywm that thou shouldest enter into covenant with yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and into his toward-oath, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim maketh with thee this day: le‘aberekha bibrit yhvh ’elohekha ube’alato, ’asher yhvh ’elohekha koret ‘imekha hayom.
lm8n hqym 1tk hywm lw l8m whw1 yhyh lk l1lhym k1Sr dbr lk wk1Sr nSb8 l1btyk l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb that he may establish thee to day for a with-mum-people unto himself, and that he may be unto thee a towards-these-elohim, as he hath said unto thee, and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers, to their-dick-abraham, to laughter-isaac, and to backstreet-jacob. lema‘an haqim ’otekha hayom lo le‘am vehu yihyeh lekha lelohim ka’asher diber lakh, vekha’asher nishba‘ la’abotekha le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob.
wl1 1tkm lbdkm 1nky krt 1t hbryt hz1t w1t h1lh hz1t neither with you only do i make this covenant and this toward-oath; velo ’itekhem lebadekhem, ’anokhi koret haberit hazot ve’et ha’alah hazot.
ky 1t 1Sr ySnw ph 8mnw 8md hywm lpny yhwh 1lhynw w1t 1Sr 1ynnw ph 8mnw hywm and with him that standeth here with us this day before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim, and also with him that is not here with us this day: ki ’et ’asher yeshno poh ‘imanu ‘omed hayom lifnei yhvh ’elohenu, ve’et ’asher ’enenu poh ‘imanu hayom.
ky 1tm yd8tm 1t 1Sr ySbnw b1rZ mZrym w1t 1Sr 8brnw bqrb hgwym 1Sr 8brtm (for ye hand-know how we have dwelt in the land of narrows-mizraim; and how we came through the nations which ye passed by; ki ’atem yeda‘tem ’asher yashabnu be’erez mizrayim, ve’et ’asher ‘abarnu beqereb hagoyim ’asher ‘abartem.
wtr1w 1t SqwZyhm w1t gllyhm 8Z w1bn ksp wzhb 1Sr 8mhm and ye have seen their thorny-abominations, and their heap-idols, wood and father-child-stone, silver and gold, which were among them:) vatir’u shiquzehem ve’et gilulehem, ‘ez va’eben kesef vezahab ’asher ‘imahem.
pn yS bkm 1yS 1w 1Sh 1w mSpHh 1w SbT 1Sr lbbw pnh hywm m8m yhwh 1lhynw llkt l8bd 1t 1lhy hgwym hhm pn yS bkm SrS prh r1S wl8nh lest there should be among you man, or woman, or family, or branch, whose heart turneth away this day from yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim, to go and work for the towards-these-elohim of these nations; lest there should be among you a root that beareth gall and wormwood; pen yesh bakhem ’ish ’o ’ishah ’o mishpakhah ’o shebet ’asher lebabo foneh hayom me‘im yhvh ’elohenu lalekhet la‘abod ’elohei hagoyim hahem, pen yesh bakhem shoresh poreh rosh vela‘anah.
whyh bSm8w 1t dbry h1lh hz1t whtbrk blbbw l1mr Slwm yhyh ly ky bSrrwt lby 1lk lm8n spwt hrwh 1t hZm1h and it come to pass, when he heareth the bee-words of this curse, that he knee-fluffy-bless himself in his heart, saying, i have peace, though i walk in the imagination of mine heart, to add drunkenness to thirst: vehayah beshame‘o dibrei ha’alah hazot vehitbarekh bilbabo lemor shalom yihyeh li ki bishrirut libi ’elekh, lema‘an sefot haravah ’et hazeme’ah.
l1 y1bh yhwh slH lw ky 1z y8Sn 1p yhwh wqn1tw b1yS hhw1 wrbZh bw kl h1lh hktwbh bspr hzh wmHh yhwh 1t Smw mtHt hSmym yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will not spare him, and then the nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou and his jealousy smoke against that man, and all the curses that are written in this book lie upon him, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou blot out his name from under namespaces. lo yobeh yhvh seloakh lo ki ’az ye‘shan ’af yhvh veqin’ato ba’ish hahu verabezah bo kal ha’alah haketubah basefer hazeh, umakhah yhvh shemo mitakhat hashamayim.
whbdylw yhwh lr8h mkl SbTy ySr1l kkl 1lwt hbryt hktwbh bspr htwrh hzh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou separate him unto bad out of all the branchs of saturated-towards-israel, according to all the curses of the covenant that are written in this book of the teaching: vehibdilo yhvh lera‘ah mikol shibtei yisra’el, kekhol ’alot haberit haketubah besefer hatorah hazeh.
w1mr hdwr h1Hrwn bnykm 1Sr yqwmw m1Hrykm whnkry 1Sr yb1 m1rZ rHwqh wr1w 1t mkwt h1rZ hhw1 w1t tHl1yh 1Sr Hlh yhwh bh so that the generation to come of your children-betweens that rise up after you, and the stranger that come from a far land, say, when they see the plagues of that land, and the sicknesses which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath laid upon it; ve’amar hador ha’akharon benekhem ’asher yaqumu me’akharekhem vehanakheri ’asher yabo me’erez rekhoqah, vera’u makot ha’arez hahiv ve’et takhalu’eha ’asher khilah yhvh bah.
gpryt wmlH Srph kl 1rZh l1 tzr8 wl1 tZmH wl1 y8lh bh kl 8Sb kmhpkt sdm w8mrh 1dmh wZbyym wZbwym 1Sr hpk yhwh b1pw wbHmtw and that the whole land thereof is brimstone, and salt, and burning, that it is not sown, nor beareth, nor any grass groweth therein, like the overthrow of splint-blood-sodom, and sheaves-gomorrah, earth-admah, and swollen-zeboim, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou overthrew in his nose-anger, and in his wrath: gaferit vamelakh serefah khal ’arzah lo tizara‘ velo tazmiakh velo ya‘aleh bah kal ‘eseb, kemahpekhat sedom va‘amorah ’admah uzebyim uzeboyim ’asher hafakh yhvh be’apo ubakhamato.
w1mrw kl hgwym 8l mh 8Sh yhwh kkh l1rZ hz1t mh Hry h1p hgdwl hzh even all nations say, wherefore hath yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou done thus unto this land? what meaneth the heat of this great nose-anger? ve’ameru kal hagoyim ‘al meh ‘asah yhvh kakhah la’arez hazot, meh khori ha’af hagadol hazeh.
w1mrw 8l 1Sr 8zbw 1t bryt yhwh 1lhy 1btm 1Sr krt 8mm bhwZy1w 1tm m1rZ mZrym then men say, because they have forsaken the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou towards-these-elohim of their fathers, which he made with them when he brought them forth out of the land of narrows-mizraim: ve’ameru ‘al ’asher ‘azebu berit yhvh ’elohei ’abotam, ’asher karat ‘imam behozi’o ’otam me’erez mizrayim.
wylkw wy8bdw 1lhym 1Hrym wyStHww lhm 1lhym 1Sr l1 yd8wm wl1 Hlq lhm for they went and worked for other towards-these-elohim, and partook-shatakh them, towards-these-elohim whom they hand-knew not, and whom he had not given unto them: vayelekhu vaya‘abdu ’elohim ’akherim vayishtakhavu lahem, ’elohim ’asher lo yeda‘um velo khalaq lahem.
wyHr 1p yhwh b1rZ hhw1 lhby1 8lyh 1t kl hqllh hktwbh bspr hzh and the nose-anger of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou was kindled against this land, to bring upon it all the curses that are written in this book: vayikhar ’af yhvh ba’arez hahiv, lehabi ‘aleha kal haqelalah haketubah basefer hazeh.
wytSm yhwh m8l 1dmtm b1p wbHmh wbqZp gdwl wySlkm 1l 1rZ 1Hrt kywm hzh and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou rooted them out of their land in nose-anger, and in wrath, and in great indignation, and cast them into another land, as it is this day. vayiteshem yhvh me‘al ’admatam be’af ubekhemah ubeqezef gadol, vayashlikhem ’el ’erez ’akheret kayom hazeh.
hnstrt lyhwh 1lhynw whnglt lnw wlbnynw 8d 8wlm l8Swt 1t kl dbry htwrh hz1t the secret things belong unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou our towards-these-elohim: and those things which are revealed belong unto us and to our children-betweens for ever, that we may do all the bee-words of this teaching. hanistarot yhvh ’elohenu, vehaniglot lanu ulebanenu ‘ad ‘olam la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot.
whyh ky yb1w 8lyk kl hdbrym h1lh hbrkh whqllh 1Sr ntty lpnyk whSbt 1l lbbk bkl hgwym 1Sr hdyHk yhwh 1lhyk Smh and it come to pass, when all these things are come upon thee, the knee-fluffy-blessing and the curse, which i have set before-turns thee, and thou call them to mind among all the nations, whither yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath driven thee, vehayah khi yabo’u ‘alekha kal hadebarim ha’eleh haberakhah vehaqelalah ’asher natati lefanekha, vahashebota ’el lebabekha bekhal hagoyim ’asher hidikhakha yhvh ’elohekha shamah.
wSbt 8d yhwh 1lhyk wSm8t bqlw kkl 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm 1th wbnyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk and return unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and obey his voice according to all that i order-prescribe thee this day, thou and thy children-betweens, with all thine heart, and with all thy being; veshabta ‘ad yhvh ’elohekha veshama‘ta beqolo kekhol ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, ’atah ubanekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
wSb yhwh 1lhyk 1t Sbwtk wrHmk wSb wqbZk mkl h8mym 1Sr hpyZk yhwh 1lhyk Smh that then yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim will turn thy captivity, and have compassion upon thee, and will return and gather thee from all the nations, whither yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim hath scattered thee. veshab yhvh ’elohekha shebutekha verikhamekha, veshab veqibezkha mikal ha‘amim ’asher hefizekha yhvh ’elohekha shamah.
1m yhyh ndHk bqZh hSmym mSm yqbZk yhwh 1lhyk wmSm yqHk if any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of namespaces, from thence will yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee: ’im yihyeh nidakhakha biqzeh hashamayim, misham yeqabezkha yhvh ’elohekha umisham yiqakhekha.
whby1k yhwh 1lhyk 1l h1rZ 1Sr yrSw 1btyk wyrSth whyTbk whrbk m1btyk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim will bring thee into the land which thy fathers possessed, and thou possess it; and he will do thee good, and multiply thee above thy fathers. vehebi’akha yhvh ’elohekha ’el ha’arez ’asher yareshu ’abotekha virishtah, vehetibkha vehirbekha me’abotekha.
wml yhwh 1lhyk 1t lbbk w1t lbb zr8k l1hbh 1t yhwh 1lhyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk lm8n Hyyk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim will scribe-circumcise thine heart, and the heart of thy seed, to love yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim with all thine heart, and with all thy being, that thou mayest live. umal yhvh ’elohekha lebabekha ve’et lebab zar‘ekha, le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha lema‘an khayekha.
wntn yhwh 1lhyk 1t kl h1lwt h1lh 8l 1ybyk w8l Sn1yk 1Sr rdpwk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim will put all these curses upon thine father-adversaries, and on them that hate thee, which persecuted thee. venatan yhvh ’elohekha kal ha’alot ha’eleh, ‘al ’oyebekha ve‘al sone’ekha ’asher redafukha.
w1th tSwb wSm8t bqwl yhwh w8Syt 1t kl mZwtyw 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm and thou return and obey the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and do all his order-prescriptions which i order-prescribe thee this day. ve’atah tashub veshama‘ta beqol yhvh, ve‘asita kal mizvotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom.
whwtyrk yhwh 1lhyk bkl m8Sh ydk bpry bTnk wbpry bhmtk wbpry 1dmtk lTwbh ky ySwb yhwh lSwS 8lyk lTwb k1Sr SS 8l 1btyk and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim will make thee plenteous in every work of thine hand, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy in-them-animal, and in the fruit of thy land, for good: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou will again rejoice over thee for good, as he rejoiced over thy fathers: vehotirekha yhvh ’elohekha bekhol ma‘aseh yadekha bifri bitnekha ubifri behemtekha ubifri ’admatekha letobah, ki yashub yhvh lasus ‘alekha letob ka’asher sas ‘al ’abotekha.
ky tSm8 bqwl yhwh 1lhyk lSmr mZwtyw wHqtyw hktwbh bspr htwrh hzh ky tSwb 1l yhwh 1lhyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk if thou hearken unto the voice of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to keep his order-prescriptions and his statutes which are written in this book of the teaching, and if thou turn unto yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim with all thine heart, and with all thy being. ki tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav haketubah besefer hatorah hazeh, ki tashub ’el yhvh ’elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
ky hmZwh hz1t 1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm l1 npl1t hw1 mmk wl1 rHqh hw1 for this order-prescription which i order-prescribe thee this day, it is not hidden from thee, neither is it far off. ki hamizvah hazot ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, lo niflet hi mimekha velo rekhoqah hi
l1 bSmym hw1 l1mr my y8lh lnw hSmymh wyqHh lnw wySm8nw 1th wn8Snh it is not in namespaces, that thou shouldest say, who go up for us to namespaces, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it? lo bashamayim hi lemor mi ya‘aleh lanu hashamaymah veyiqakheha lanu veyashmi‘enu ’otah vena‘asenah.
wl1 m8br lym hw1 l1mr my y8br lnw 1l 8br hym wyqHh lnw wySm8nw 1th wn8Snh neither is it beyond the sea, that thou shouldest say, who go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it? velo me‘eber layam hi lemor mi ya‘abar lanu ’el ‘eber hayam veyiqakheha lanu veyashmi‘enu ’otah vena‘asenah.
ky qrwb 1lyk hdbr m1d bpyk wblbbk l8Stw and the bee-word is very nigh unto thee, in thy mouth, and in thy heart, that thou mayest do it. ki qarob ’elekha hadabar me’od, befikha ubilbabekha la‘asoto.
r1h ntty lpnyk hywm 1t hHyym w1t hTwb w1t hmwt w1t hr8 see, i have set before-turns thee this day life and good, and death and bad; re’eh natati lefanekha hayom hakhayim ve’et hatob, ve’et hamavet ve’et hara‘.
1Sr 1nky mZwk hywm l1hbh 1t yhwh 1lhyk llkt bdrkyw wlSmr mZwtyw wHqtyw wmSpTyw wHyyt wrbyt wbrkk yhwh 1lhyk b1rZ 1Sr 1th b1 Smh lrSth in that i order-prescribe thee this day to love yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, to walk in his ways, and to keep his order-prescriptions and his statutes and his decision-grammars, that thou mayest live and multiply: and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-bless thee in the land whither thou goest to possess it. ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav velishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav umishpatav, vekhayita verabita uberakhkha yhvh ’elohekha ba’arez ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah.
w1m ypnh lbbk wl1 tSm8 wndHt whStHwyt l1lhym 1Hrym w8bdtm and if thine heart turn away, so that thou wilt not hear, and be drawn away, and partake-shatakh other towards-these-elohim, and work for them; ve’im yifneh lebabekha velo tishma‘, venidakhta vehishtakhavita lelohim ’akherim va‘abadtam.
hgdty lkm hywm ky 1bd t1bdwn l1 t1rykn ymym 8l h1dmh 1Sr 1th 8br 1t hyrdn lb1 Smh lrSth i denounce unto you this day, that ye surely perish, and that ye not prolong your days upon the land, whither thou passest over its-going-down-jordan to go to possess it. higadti lakhem hayom ki ’abod tobedun, lo ta’arikhun yamim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atah ‘ober hayarden labo shamah lerishtah.
h8ydty bkm hywm 1t hSmym w1t h1rZ hHyym whmwt ntty lpnyk hbrkh whqllh wbHrt bHyym lm8n tHyh 1th wzr8k i call namespaces and earth to record this day against you, that i have set before-turns you life and death, knee-fluffy-blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live: ha‘idoti bakhem hayom hashamayim ve’et ha’arez hakhayim vehamavet natati lefanekha haberakhah vehaqelalah, ubakharta bakhayim lema‘an tikhyeh ’atah vezar‘ekha.
l1hbh 1t yhwh 1lhyk lSm8 bqlw wldbqh bw ky hw1 Hyyk w1rk ymyk lSbt 8l h1dmh 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btyk l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb ltt lhm that thou mayest love yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, and that thou mayest obey his voice, and that thou mayest cleave unto him: for he is thy life, and the length of thy days: that thou mayest dwell in the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sware unto thy fathers, to their-dick-abraham, to laughter-isaac, and to backstreet-jacob, to give them. le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekha lishmoa‘ beqolo uledabeqah bo, ki hu khayekha ve’orekh yamekha lashebet ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekha le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob latet lahem.
wylk mSh wydbr 1t hdbrym h1lh 1l kl ySr1l and extracted-mose went and spake these bee-words unto all saturated-towards-israel. vayelekh mosheh, vaydaber hadebarim ha’eleh ’el kal yisra’el.
wy1mr 1lhm bn m1h w8Srym Snh 1nky hywm l1 1wkl 8wd lZ1t wlbw1 wyhwh 1mr 1ly l1 t8br 1t hyrdn hzh and he said unto them, i am an hundred and double-ten-twenty years old this day; i can no more go out and come in: also yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath said unto me, no go over this its-going-down-jordan. vayomer ’alehem ben me’ah ve‘esrim shanah ’anokhi hayom lo ’ukhal ‘od lazet velabo, yhvh ’amar ’elay lo ta‘abor hayarden hazeh.
yhwh 1lhyk hw1 8br lpnyk hw1 ySmyd 1t hgwym h1lh mlpnyk wyrStm yhwS8 hw1 8br lpnyk k1Sr dbr yhwh yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, he will go over before-turns thee, and he will destroy these nations from before-turns thee, and thou possess them: and save-joshua-jesus, he go over before-turns thee, as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath said. yhvh ’elohekha hu ‘ober lefanekha hu yashmid hagoyim ha’eleh milefanekha virishtam, yehoshua‘ hu ‘ober lefanekha ka’asher diber yhvh.
w8Sh yhwh lhm k1Sr 8Sh lsyHwn wl8wg mlky h1mry wl1rZm 1Sr hSmyd 1tm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou do unto them as he did to curly-sihon and to mock-og, moloch-kings of the talker-amorites, and unto the land of them, whom he destroyed. ve‘asah yhvh lahem ka’asher ‘asah lesikhon ule‘og malkhei ha’emori ule’arzam, ’asher hishmid ’otam.
wntnm yhwh lpnykm w8Sytm lhm kkl hmZwh 1Sr Zwyty 1tkm and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou give them up before-turns your face-turns, that ye may do unto them according unto all the order-prescriptions which i have order-prescribed you. unetanam yhvh lifnekhem, va‘asitem lahem kekhal hamizvah ’asher ziviti ’etkhem.
Hzqw w1mZw 1l tyr1w w1l t8rZw mpnyhm ky yhwh 1lhyk hw1 hhlk 8mk l1 yrpk wl1 y8zbk be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee. khizqu ve’imzu ’al tire’u ve’al ta‘arzu mipenehem, ki yhvh ’elohekha hu haholekh ‘imakh lo yarpekha velo ya‘azbeka.
wyqr1 mSh lyhwS8 wy1mr 1lyw l8yny kl ySr1l Hzq w1mZ ky 1th tbw1 1t h8m hzh 1l h1rZ 1Sr nSb8 yhwh l1btm ltt lhm w1th tnHylnh 1wtm and extracted-mose called unto save-joshua-jesus, and said unto him in the sight of all saturated-towards-israel, be strong and of a good courage: for thou must go with this with-mum-people unto the land which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath sworn unto their fathers to give them; and thou cause them to inherit it. vayiqra mosheh lihoshua‘ vayomer ’elav le‘enei khal yisra’el khazaq ve’emaz ki ’atah tabo ’et ha‘am hazeh ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotam latet lahem, ve’atah tankhilenah ’otam.
wyhwh hw1 hhlk lpnyk hw1 yhyh 8mk l1 yrpk wl1 y8zbk l1 tyr1 wl1 tHt and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, he it is that doth go before-turns thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed. yhvh hu haholekh lefanekha hu yihyeh ‘imakh lo yarpekha velo ya‘azbeka, lo tira velo tekhat.
wyktb mSh 1t htwrh hz1t wytnh 1l hkhnym bny lwy hnS1ym 1t 1rwn bryt yhwh w1l kl zqny ySr1l and extracted-mose wrote this teaching, and delivered it unto the dimmer-servers children-betweens of join-levi, which bare the cabinet of the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and unto all the elders of saturated-towards-israel. vayikhtob mosheh hatorah hazot vayitenah ’el hakohanim benei levi hanose’im ’aron berit yhvh, ve’el kal ziqnei yisra’el.
wyZw mSh 1wtm l1mr mqZ Sb8 Snym bm8d Snt hSmTh bHg hskwt and extracted-mose order-prescribed them, saying, at the end of every seven years, in the solemnity of the year of release, in the until-conception of dwellings, vayzav mosheh ’otam lemor, miqez sheba‘ shanim bemo‘ed shenat hashemitah bekhag hasukot.
bbw1 kl ySr1l lr1wt 1t pny yhwh 1lhyk bmqwm 1Sr ybHr tqr1 1t htwrh hz1t ngd kl ySr1l b1znyhm when all saturated-towards-israel is come to appear before-turns yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou thy towards-these-elohim in the stand-up-place which he choose, thou read this teaching before-turns all saturated-towards-israel in their hearing. bebo khal yisra’el lera’ot penei yhvh ’elohekha bamaqom ’asher yibkhar, tiqra hatorah hazot neged kal yisra’el be’azenehem.
hqhl 1t h8m h1nSym whnSym whTp wgrk 1Sr bS8ryk lm8n ySm8w wlm8n ylmdw wyr1w 1t yhwh 1lhykm wSmrw l8Swt 1t kl dbry htwrh hz1t gather the with-mum-people together, men and women, and children-betweens, and thy stranger that is within thy hair-gates, that they may hear, and that they may learn, and fear yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, and guard-observe to do all the bee-words of this teaching: haqhel ha‘am ha’anashim vehanashim vehataf vegerekha ’asher bish‘arekha, lema‘an yishme‘u ulema‘an yilmedu veyare’u yhvh ’elohekhem veshameru la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot.
wbnyhm 1Sr l1 yd8w ySm8w wlmdw lyr1h 1t yhwh 1lhykm kl hymym 1Sr 1tm Hyym 8l h1dmh 1Sr 1tm 8brym 1t hyrdn Smh lrSth and that their children-betweens, which have not hand-known any thing, may hear, and learn to fear yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, as long as ye live in the land whither ye go over its-going-down-jordan to possess it. ubenehem ’asher lo yade‘u yishme‘u velamedu leyir’ah yhvh ’elohekhem, kal hayamim ’asher ’atem khayim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atem ‘oberim hayarden shamah lerishtah.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hn qrbw ymyk lmwt qr1 1t yhwS8 whtyZbw b1hl mw8d w1Zwnw wylk mSh wyhwS8 wytyZbw b1hl mw8d and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, behold, thy days approach that thou must die: call save-joshua-jesus, and present yourselves in the tent of until-conception, that i may give him a charge. and extracted-mose and save-joshua-jesus went, and presented themselves in the tent of until-conception. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hen qarebu yamekha lamut qera yehoshua‘ vehityazebu be’ohel mo‘ed va’azavenu, vayelekh mosheh vihoshua‘ vayityazebu be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyr1 yhwh b1hl b8mwd 8nn wy8md 8mwd h8nn 8l ptH h1hl and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou appeared in the dwelling in a page-column-erection of a cloud: and the page-column-erection of the cloud stood over the opening of the dwelling. vayera yhvh ba’ohel be‘amud ‘anan, vaya‘amod ‘amud he‘anan ‘al petakh ha’ohel.
wy1mr yhwh 1l mSh hnk Skb 8m 1btyk wqm h8m hzh wznh 1Hry 1lhy nkr h1rZ 1Sr hw1 b1 Smh bqrbw w8zbny whpr 1t bryty 1Sr krty 1tw and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto extracted-mose, behold, thou sleep with thy fathers; and this with-mum-people will rise up, and go a whoring after the towards-these-elohim of the strangers of the land, whither they go to be among them, and will forsake me, and break my covenant which i have made with them. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hinekha shokheb ‘im ’abotekha, veqam ha‘am hazeh vezanah ’akharei ’elohei nekhar ha’arez ’asher hu ba shamah beqirbo va‘azabani vehefer beriti ’asher karati ’ito.
wHrh 1py bw bywm hhw1 w8zbtym whstrty pny mhm whyh l1kl wmZ1hw r8wt rbwt wZrwt w1mr bywm hhw1 hl1 8l ky 1yn 1lhy bqrby mZ1wny hr8wt h1lh then my nose-anger be kindled against them in that day, and i will forsake them, and i will hide my face-turns from them, and they be devoured, and many bads and troubles befall them; so that they will say in that day, are not these bads come upon us, because our towards-these-elohim is not among us? vekharah ’api bo bayom hahu va‘azabtim vehistarti fanay mehem vehayah le’ekhol umeza’uhu ra‘ot rabot vezarot, ve’amar bayom hahu halo ‘al ki ’en ’elohay beqirbi meza’uni hara‘ot ha’eleh.
w1nky hstr 1styr pny bywm hhw1 8l kl hr8h 1Sr 8Sh ky pnh 1l 1lhym 1Hrym and i will surely hide my face-turns in that day for all the bads which they have wrought, in that they are turned unto other towards-these-elohim. ve’anokhi haster ’astir panay bayom hahu ‘al kal hara‘ah ’asher ‘asah, ki fanah ’el ’elohim ’akherim.
w8th ktbw lkm 1t hSyrh hz1t wlmdh 1t bny ySr1l Symh bpyhm lm8n thyh ly hSyrh hz1t l8d bbny ySr1l now therefore write ye this song for you, and teach it children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel: put it in their mouths, that this song may be a witness for me against children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ve‘atah kitbu lakhem hashirah hazot velamedah bene yisra’el simah befihem, lema‘an tihyeh li hashirah hazot le‘ed bibnei yisra’el.
ky 1by1nw 1l h1dmh 1Sr nSb8ty l1btyw zbt Hlb wdbS w1kl wSb8 wdSn wpnh 1l 1lhym 1Hrym w8bdwm wn1Zwny whpr 1t bryty for when i have brought them into the land which i sware unto their fathers, that floweth with milk and honey; and they have eaten and filled themselves, and waxen fat; then will they turn unto other towards-these-elohim, and work for them, and provoke me, and break my covenant. ki ’abi’enu ’el ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ti la’abotav zabat khalab udebash ve’akhal vesaba‘ vedashen, ufanah ’el ’elohim ’akherim va‘abadum veni’azuni vehefer beriti.
whyh ky tmZ1n 1tw r8wt rbwt wZrwt w8nth hSyrh hz1t lpnyw l8d ky l1 tSkH mpy zr8w ky yd8ty 1t yZrw 1Sr hw1 8Sh hywm bTrm 1by1nw 1l h1rZ 1Sr nSb8ty and it come to pass, when many bads and troubles are befallen them, that this song testify against them as a witness; for it not be forgotten out of the mouths of their seed: for i hand-know their imagination which they go about, even now, before-turns i have brought them into the land which i sware. vehayah ki timzena ’oto ra‘ot rabot vezarot ve‘anetah hashirah hazot lefanav le‘ed ki lo tishakhakh mipi zar‘o, ki yada‘ti yizro ’asher hu ‘oseh hayom beterem ’abi’enu ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘eti.
wyktb mSh 1t hSyrh hz1t bywm hhw1 wylmdh 1t bny ySr1l extracted-mose therefore wrote this song the same day, and taught it children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. vayikhtob mosheh hashirah hazot bayom hahu, vaylamedah benei yisra’el.
wyZw 1t yhwS8 bn nwn wy1mr Hzq w1mZ ky 1th tby1 1t bny ySr1l 1l h1rZ 1Sr nSb8ty lhm w1nky 1hyh 8mk and he gave save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun a charge, and said, be strong and of a good courage: for thou bring children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel into the land which i sware unto them: and i will be with thee. vayzav ’et yehoshua‘ bin nun vayomer khazaq ve’emaz ki ’atah tabi benei yisra’el ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti lahem, ve’anokhi ’ehyeh ‘imakh.
wyhy kklwt mSh lktb 1t dbry htwrh hz1t 8l spr 8d tmm and it came to pass, when extracted-mose had made an end of writing the bee-words of this teaching in a book, until they were finished, vayhi kekhalot mosheh likhtob dibrei hatorah hazot ‘al sefer, ‘ad tumam.
wyZw mSh 1t hlwym nS1y 1rwn bryt yhwh l1mr that extracted-mose order-prescribed the join-levites, which conceived-of the cabinet of the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, saying, vayzav mosheh halviyim nose’ei ’aron berit yhvh lemor.
lqH 1t spr htwrh hzh wSmtm 1tw mZd 1rwn bryt yhwh 1lhykm whyh Sm bk l8d take this book of the teaching, and put it in the side of the cabinet of the covenant of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou your towards-these-elohim, that it may be there for a witness against thee. laqoakh sefer hatorah hazeh vesamtem ’oto mizad ’aron berit yhvh ’elohekhem, vehayah sham bekha le‘ed.
ky 1nky yd8ty 1t mryk w1t 8rpk hqSh hn b8wdny Hy 8mkm hywm mmrym hytm 8m yhwh w1p ky 1Hry mwty for i hand-know thy rebellion, and thy stiff neck: behold, while i am yet alive with you this day, ye have been rebellious to yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou; and how much more after my death? ki ’anokhi yada‘ti meryekha ve’et ‘arepekha haqasheh, hen be‘odeni khay ‘imakhem hayom mamrim heyitem ‘im yhvh ve’af ki ’akharei moti.
hqhylw 1ly 1t kl zqny SbTykm wSTrykm w1dbrh b1znyhm 1t hdbrym h1lh w18ydh bm 1t hSmym w1t h1rZ gather unto me all the elders of your branchs, and your officers, that i may speak these bee-words in their ears, and call namespaces and earth to record against them. haqhilu ’elay kal ziqnei shibtekhem veshoterekhem, va’adaberah be’azenehem hadebarim ha’eleh ve’a‘idah bam hashamayim ve’et ha’arez.
ky yd8ty 1Hry mwty ky hSHt tSHtwn wsrtm mn hdrk 1Sr Zwyty 1tkm wqr1t 1tkm hr8h b1Hryt hymym ky t8Sw 1t hr8 b8yny yhwh lhk8ysw bm8Sh ydykm for i hand-know that after my death ye will utterly corrupt yourselves, and turn aside from the way which i have order-prescribed you; and bad will befall you in the latter days; because ye will do bad in the sight of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, to provoke him to nose-anger through the work of your hands. ki yada‘ti ’akharei moti ki hashkhet tashkhitun vesartem min haderekh ’asher ziviti ’etkhem, veqarat ’etkhem hara‘ah be’akharit hayamim ki ta‘asu hara‘ be‘enei yhvh lehakh‘iso bema‘aseh yedekhem.
wydbr mSh b1zny kl qhl ySr1l 1t dbry hSyrh hz1t 8d tmm and extracted-mose spake in the ears of all the until-witness of saturated-towards-israel the bee-words of this song, until they were ended. vaydaber mosheh be’azenei kal qehal yisra’el dibrei hashirah hazot, ‘ad tumam.
h1zynw hSmym w1dbrh wtSm8 h1rZ 1mry py give ear, o ye namespacess, and i will speak; and hear, o earth, the bee-words of my mouth. ha’azinu hashamayim va’adaberah, vetishma‘ ha’arez ’imre fi.
y8rp kmTr lqHy tzl kTl 1mrty kS8yrm 8ly dS1 wkrbybym 8ly 8Sb my take-lessons drop as the rain, my speech distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass: ya‘arof kamatar liqkhi tizal katal ’imrati, kis‘irim ‘ale deshe vekhirbibim ‘ale ‘eseb.
ky Sm yhwh 1qr1 hbw gdl l1lhynw because i will publish the name of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: ascribe ye greatness unto our towards-these-elohim. ki shem yhvh ’eqra, habu godel lelohenu.
hZwr tmym p8lw ky kl drkyw mSpT 1l 1mwnh w1yn 8wl Zdyq wySr hw1 he is the rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are decision-grammar: a towards-these-elohim of truth and without torment, just and right is he. hazur tamim pa‘olo ki khal derakhav mishpat, ’el ’emunah ve’en ‘avel zadiq veyashar hu.
SHt lw l1 bnyw mwmm dwr 8qS wptltl they have corrupted themselves, their spot is not the spot of his children-betweens: they are a perverse and crooked generation. shikhet lo lo banav mumam, dor ‘iqesh ufetaltol.
h lyhwh tgmlw z1t 8m nbl wl1 Hkm hlw1 hw1 1byk qnk hw1 8Sk wyknnk do ye thus requite yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, o foolish with-mum-people and unwise? is not he thy father that hath bought thee? hath he not made thee, and established thee? ha yhvh tigmelu zot ‘am nabal velo khakham, halo hu ’abikha qanekha hu ‘asekha vaykhonenekha.
zkr ymwt 8wlm bynw Snwt dwr wdwr S1l 1byk wygdk zqnyk wy1mrw lk remember the days of old, consider the years of many generations: ask thy father, and he will show thee; thy elders, and they will tell thee. zekhor yemot ‘olam binu shenot dor vador, she’al ’abikha veyagedekha zeqenekha veyomeru lakh.
bhnHl 8lywn gwym bhprydw bny 1dm yZb gblt 8mym lmspr bny ySr1l when the most high divided to the nations their inheritance, when he separated children-betweens of earth-blood-man-adam, he set the bounds of the with-mum-people according to the number of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. behankhel ‘elyon goyim behafrido benei ’adam, yazeb gebulot ‘amim lemispar benei yisra’el.
ky Hlq yhwh 8mw y8qb Hbl nHltw for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou's portion is his with-mum-people; backstreet-jacob is the lot of his inheritance. ki kheleq yhvh ‘amo, ya‘aqob khebel nakhalato.
ymZ1hw b1rZ mdbr wbthw yll ySmn ysbbnhw ybwnnhw yZrnhw k1ySwn 8ynw he found him in a place-of-word-desert land, and in the waste howling place-of-word-desert; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye. yimza’ehu be’erez midbar ubetohu yelel yeshimon, yesobebenhu yebonehu yizerenhu ke’ishon ‘eno.
knSr y8yr qnw 8l gwzlyw yrHp yprS knpyw yqHhw yS1hw 8l 1brtw as an drop-eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: kenesher ya‘ir qino ‘al gozalav yerakhef, yifros kenafav yiqakhehu yisa’ehu ‘al ’ebrato.
yhwh bdd ynHnw w1yn 8mw 1l nkr so yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou alone did lead him, and there was no strange towards-these-elohim with him. yhvh badad yankhenu, ve’en ‘imo ’el nekhar.
yrkbhw 8l bmwty bmty 1rZ wy1kl tnwbt Sdy wynqhw dbS msl8 wSmn mHlmyS Zwr he made him ride on the high places of the earth, that he might eat the increase of the fields; and he made him to suck honey out of the rock, and name-from-oil out of the flinty rock; yarkibehu ‘al bamotei ’arez vayokhal tenubot saday, vayeniqehu debash misela‘ veshemen mekhalmish zur.
Hm1t bqr wHlb Z1n 8m Hlb krym w1ylym bny bSn w8twdym 8m Hlb klywt HTh wdm 8nb tSth Hmr butter of kine, and milk of sheep, with fat of lambs, and voiceless-rams of the breed of at-tooth-bashan, and intense-goats, with the fat of eliminate-kidneys of wheat; and thou didst drink the pure-tahor blood of the grape. khem’at baqar vakhaleb zon ‘im kheleb karim ve’elim bene bashan ve‘atudim ‘im kheleb kilyot khitah, vedam ‘enab tishteh khamer.
wySmn ySrwn wyb8T Smnt 8byt kSyt wyTS 1lwh 8Shw wynbl Zwr yS8tw and soaked-jeshurun waxed fat, and kicked: thou art waxen fat, thou art grown thick, thou art covered with fatness; then he forsook towards-these-elohim which made him, and lightly esteemed the rock of his saving. vayishman yeshurun vayib‘at shamanta ‘abita kasita, vayitosh ’eloha ‘asahu vaynabel zur yeshu‘ato.
yqn1hw bzrym btw8bt yk8yshw they provoked him to jealousy with strange towards-these-elohim, with abominations provoked they him to nose-anger. yaqni’uhu bezarim, beto‘ebot yakh‘isuhu.
yzbHw lSdym l1 1lh 1lhym l1 yd8wm HdSym mqrb b1w l1 S8rwm 1btykm they butcherd unto devils, not to towards-these-elohim; to towards-these-elohim whom they hand-knew not, to new towards-these-elohim that came newly up, whom your fathers feared not. yizbekhu lashedim lo ’eloha ’elohim lo yeda‘um, khadashim miqarob ba’u lo se‘arum ’abotekhem.
Zwr yldk tSy wtSkH 1l mHllk of the rock that begat thee thou art unmindful, and hast forgotten towards-these-elohim that formed thee. zur yeladekha teshi, vatishkakh ’el mekholelekha.
wyr1 yhwh wyn1Z mk8s bnyw wbntyw and when yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou saw it, he crave-abhorred them, because of the provoking of his children-betweens, and of his children-betweenesss. vayar yhvh vayin’az, mika‘as banav ubenotav.
wy1mr 1styrh pny mhm 1r1h mh 1Hrytm ky dwr thpkt hmh bnym l1 1mn bm and he said, i will hide my face-turns from them, i will see what their end be: for they are a very froward generation, children-betweens in whom is no faith-training. vayomer ’astirah fanay mehem ’er’eh mah ’akharitam, ki dor tahpukhot hemah banim lo ’emun bam.
hm qn1wny bl1 1l k8swny bhblyhm w1ny 1qny1m bl1 8m bgwy nbl 1k8ysm they have moved me to jealousy with that which is not towards-these-elohim; they have provoked me to nose-anger with their vanities: and i will move them to jealousy with those which are not a with-mum-people; i will provoke them to nose-anger with a foolish nation. hem qin’uni belo ’el ki‘asuni behablehem, va’ani ’aqni’em belo ‘am bego nabal ’akh‘isem.
ky 1S qdHh b1py wtyqd 8d S1wl tHtyt wt1kl 1rZ wyblh wtlhT mwsdy hrym for a fire is kindled in mine nose-anger, and burn unto the lowest question-hell, and consume the earth with her increase, and set on fire the foundations of the mountains. ki ’esh qadekhah be’api vatiqad ‘ad she’ol takhtit, vatokhal ’erez vibulah vatelahet mosdei harim.
1sph 8lymw r8wt HZy 1klh bm i will heap mischiefs upon them; i will spend mine arrows upon them. ’aspeh ‘alemo ra‘ot, khizay ’akhaleh bam.
mzy r8b wlHmy rSp wqTb mryry wSn bhmwt 1SlH bm 8m Hmt zHly 8pr they be burnt with hunger, and devoured with burning heat, and with bitter destruction: i will also send the teeth of beasts upon them, with the poison of serpents of the dust. mezei ra‘ab ulekhumei reshef veqeteb meriri, veshen behemot ’ashalakh bam ‘im khamat zokhalei ‘afar.
mHwZ tSkl Hrb wmHdrym 1ymh gm bHwr gm btwlh ywnq 8m 1yS Sybh the sword without, and terror within, destroy both the young man and the virgin, the suckling also with the man of gray gate-hairs. mikhuz teshakel khereb umekhadarim ’emah, gam bakhur gam betulah yoneq ‘im ’ish sebah.
1mrty 1p1yhm 1Sbyth m1nwS zkrm i said, i would scatter them into corners, i would make the remembrance of them to cease from inward men: ’amarti ’af’ehem, ’ashbitah me’enosh zikhram.
lwly k8s 1wyb 1gwr pn ynkrw Zrymw pn y1mrw ydynw rmh wl1 yhwh p8l kl z1t were it not that i feared the wrath of the enemy, lest their adversaries should behave themselves strangely, and lest they should say, our hand is high, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hath not done all this. lule ka‘as ’oyeb ’agur pen yenakeru zaremo, pen yomeru yadenu ramah velo yhvh pa‘al kal zot.
ky gwy 1bd 8Zwt hmh w1yn bhm tbwnh for they are a nation void of counsel, neither is there any understanding in them. ki go ’obad ‘ezot hemah, ve’en bahem tebunah.
lw Hkmw ySkylw z1t ybynw l1Hrytm o that they were wise, that they understood this, that they would consider their latter end! lu khakhemu yaskilu zot, yabinu le’akharitam.
1ykh yrdp 1Hd 1lp wSnym ynysw rbbh 1m l1 ky Zwrm mkrm wyhwh hsgyrm how should one chase a thousand, and two put ten thousand to flight, except their rock had sold them, and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou had shut them up? ’ekhah yirdof ’ekhad ’elef ushenayim yanisu rebabah, ’im lo ki zuram mekharam yhvh hisgiram.
ky l1 kZwrnw Zwrm w1ybynw plylym for their rock is not as our rock, even our father-adversaries themselves being decides. ki lo khezurenu zuram, ve’oyebenu pelilim.
ky mgpn sdm gpnm wmSdmt 8mrh 8nbmw 8nby rwS 1Sklt mrrt lmw for their vine is of the vine of splint-blood-sodom, and of the fields of sheaves-gomorrah: their grapes are grapes of gall, their clusters are bitter: ki migefen sedom gafnam umishadmot ‘amorah, ‘anabemo ‘inebe rosh ’ashkelot merorot lamo.
Hmt tnynm yynm wr1S ptnym 1kzr their wine-inherit is the poison of dragons, and the cruel venom of asps. khamat taninim yenam, verosh petanim ’akhzar.
hl1 hw1 kms 8mdy Htm b1wZrty is not this laid up in store with me, and sealed up among my treasures? halo hu kamus ‘imadi, khatum be’ozrotay.
ly nqm wSlm l8t tmwT rglm ky qrwb ywm 1ydm wHS 8tdt lmw to me belongeth vengeance and recompence; their foot slide in due time: for the day of their calamity is at hand, and the things that come upon them make haste. li naqam veshilem le‘et tamut raglam, ki qarob yom ’edam vekhash ‘atidot lamo.
ky ydyn yhwh 8mw w8l 8bdyw ytnHm ky yr1h ky 1zlt yd w1ps 8Zwr w8zwb for yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou decide his with-mum-people, and repent himself for his workers, when he seeth that their dynamic is gone, and there is none shut up, or left. ki yadin yhvh ‘amo ve‘al ‘abadav yitnekham, ki yir’eh ki ’azelat yad ve’efes ‘azur ve‘azub.
w1mr 1y 1lhymw Zwr Hsyw bw and he say, where are their towards-these-elohim, their rock in whom they trusted, ve’amar ’ei ’elohemo, zur khasayu bo.
1Sr Hlb zbHymw y1klw yStw yyn nsykm yqwmw wy8zrkm yhy 8lykm strh which did eat the fat of their butchers, and drank the wine-inherit of their pourings? let them rise up and help you, and be your protection. ’asher kheleb zebakhemo yokhelu yishtu yen nesikham, yaqumu veya‘zerukhem ‘alekhem sitrah.
r1w 8th ky 1ny 1ny hw1 w1yn 1lhym 8mdy 1ny 1myt w1Hyh mHZty w1ny 1rp1 w1yn mydy mZyl see now that i, even i, am he, and there is no towards-these-elohim with me: i kill, and i make alive; i wound, and i heal: neither is there any that can deliver out of my hand. re’u ‘atah ki ’ani ’ani hu ve’en ’elohim ‘imadi, ’ani ’amit va’akhayeh makhazti va’ani ’erpa ve’en miyadi mazil.
ky 1S1 1l Smym ydy w1mrty Hy 1nky l8lm for i lift up my hand to namespaces, and say, i live for ever. ki ’esa ’el shamayim yadi, ve’amarti khay ’anokhi le‘olam.
1m Snwty brq Hrby wt1Hz bmSpT ydy 1Syb nqm lZry wlmSn1y 1Slm if i whet my glittering sword, and mine hand take hold on decision-grammar; i will render vengeance to mine father-adversaries, and will reward them that hate me. ’im shanoti beraq kharbi vetokhez bemishpat yadi, ’ashib naqam lezaray velimsan’ay ’ashalem.
1Skyr HZy mdm wHrby t1kl bSr mdm Hll wSbyh mr1S pr8wt 1wyb i will make mine arrows drunk with blood, and my sword devour flesh; and that with the blood of the slain and of the captives, from the beginning of revenges upon the enemy. ’ashkir khizay midam vekharbi tokhal basar, midam khalal veshibyah merosh par‘ot ’oyeb.
hrnynw gwym 8mw ky dm 8bdyw yqwm wnqm ySyb lZryw wkpr 1dmtw 8mw rejoice, o ye nations, with his with-mum-people: for he will avenge the blood of his workers, and will render vengeance to his adversaries, and will be merciful unto his land, and to his with-mum-people. harninu goyim ‘amo ki dam ‘abadav yiqom, venaqam yashib lezarav vekhiper ’admato ‘amo.
wyb1 mSh wydbr 1t kl dbry hSyrh hz1t b1zny h8m hw1 whwS8 bn nwn and extracted-mose came and spake all the bee-words of this song in the ears of the with-mum-people, he, and save-hoshea-jesus child-between of fish-nun. vayabo mosheh vaydaber kal dibrei hashirah hazot be’azenei ha‘am, hu vehoshea‘ bin nun.
wykl mSh ldbr 1t kl hdbrym h1lh 1l kl ySr1l and extracted-mose made an end of speaking all these bee-words to all saturated-towards-israel: vaykhal mosheh ledaber kal hadebarim ha’eleh ’el kal yisra’el.
wy1mr 1lhm Symw lbbkm lkl hdbrym 1Sr 1nky m8yd bkm hywm 1Sr tZwm 1t bnykm lSmr l8Swt 1t kl dbry htwrh hz1t and he said unto them, set your hearts unto all the bee-words which i testify among you this day, which ye order-prescribe your children-betweens to guard-observe to do, all the bee-words of this teaching. vayomer ’alehem simu lebabkhem lekhal hadebarim ’asher ’anokhi me‘id bakhem hayom, ’asher tezavum benekhem lishmor la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot.
ky l1 dbr rq hw1 mkm ky hw1 Hyykm wbdbr hzh t1rykw ymym 8l h1dmh 1Sr 1tm 8brym 1t hyrdn Smh lrSth for it is not a vain thing for you; because it is your life: and through this thing ye prolong your days in the land, whither ye go over its-going-down-jordan to possess it. ki lo dabar req hu mikem ki hu khayekhem, ubadabar hazeh ta’arikhu yamim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atem ‘oberim hayarden shamah lerishtah.
wydbr yhwh 1l mSh b8Zm hywm hzh l1mr and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou spake unto extracted-mose that selfsame day, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh be‘ezem hayom hazeh lemor.
8lh 1l hr h8brym hzh hr nbw 1Sr b1rZ mw1b 1Sr 8l pny yrHw wr1h 1t 1rZ kn8n 1Sr 1ny ntn lbny ySr1l l1Hzh get thee up into this mountain crossings-over-abarim, unto mount at-him-nebo, which is in the land of from-father-moab, that is over against moon-smell-jericho; and behold the land of mobile-trade-canaan, which i give unto children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel for a possession: ‘aleh ’el har ha‘abarim hazeh har nebo ’asher be’erez mo’ab ’asher ‘al penei yerekho, ure’eh ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani noten libnei yisra’el la’akhuzah.
wmt bhr 1Sr 1th 8lh Smh wh1sp 1l 8myk k1Sr mt 1hrn 1Hyk bhr hhr wy1sp 1l 8myw and die in the mount whither thou goest up, and be added unto thy with-mum-people; as cabinet-aaron thy brother died in mount mount-hor, and was added unto his with-mum-people: umut bahar ’asher ’atah ‘oleh shamah vehe’asef ’el ‘amekha, ka’asher met ’aharon ’akhikha behor hahar vaye’asef ’el ‘amav.
8l 1Sr m8ltm by btwk bny ySr1l bmy mrybt qdS mdbr Zn 8l 1Sr l1 qdStm 1wty btwk bny ySr1l because ye fire-nameed against me among children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel at the from-waters of jam-meribahkadesh, in the place-of-word-desert of briar-zin; because ye dedicated-finished me not in the midst of children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ‘al ’asher me‘altem bi betokh benei yisra’el beme meribat qadesh midbar zin, ‘al ’asher lo qidashtem ’oti betokh benei yisra’el.
ky mngd tr1h 1t h1rZ wSmh l1 tbw1 1l h1rZ 1Sr 1ny ntn lbny ySr1l yet thou see the land before-turns thee; and no go thither unto the land which i give children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel. ki mineged tir’eh ha’arez, veshamah lo tabo ’el ha’arez ’asher ’ani noten libnei yisra’el.
wz1t hbrkh 1Sr brk mSh 1yS h1lhym 1t bny ySr1l lpny mwtw and this is the knee-fluffy-blessing, wherewith extracted-mose the man of towards-these-elohim knee-fluffy-blessed children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel before-turns his death. vezot haberakhah ’asher berakh mosheh ’ish ha’elohim benei yisra’el, lifnei moto.
wy1mr yhwh msyny b1 wzrH mS8yr lmw hwpy8 mhr p1rn w1th mrbbt qdS mymynw 1Sdt 1S dt lmw and he said, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou came from bush-(proto-)sinai, and rose up from hair-style-seir unto them; he shined forth from mount magnificence-paran, and he came with ten thousands of dedicated-finisheds: from his right hand went a fiery teaching for them. vayomar yhvh misinay ba vezarakh mise‘ir lamo hofia‘ mehar paran ve’atah meribbot qodesh, mimino ’esh dat lamo.
1p Hbb 8mym kl qdSyw bydk whm tkw lrglk yS1 mdbrtyk yea, he loved the with-mum-people; all his dedicated-finisheds are in thy hand: and they sat down at thy feet; every one receive of thy bee-words. ’af khobeb ‘amim kal qedoshav beyadekha, vehem tuku leraglekha yisa midaberotekha.
twrh Zwh lnw mSh mwrSh qhlt y8qb extracted-mose order-prescribed us a teaching, even the inheritance of the until-witness of backstreet-jacob. torah zivah lanu mosheh, morashah qehilat ya‘aqob.
wyhy bySrwn mlk bht1sp r1Sy 8m yHd SbTy ySr1l and he was moloch-king in soaked-jeshurun, when the heads of the with-mum-people and the branchs of saturated-towards-israel were added together. vayhi bishurun melekh, behit’asef rashei ‘am yakhad shibtei yisra’el.
