wllwy 1mr tmyk w1wryk l1yS Hsydk 1Sr nsytw bmsh trybhw 8l my mrybh and of join-levi he said, let thy naively-finished-thummim and thy fires-urim be with thy dedicated-finished one, whom thou didst prove at load-essay-massah, and with whom thou didst strive at the from-waters of jam-meribah; ulelevi ’amar tumekha ve’urekha le’ish khasidekha, ’asher nisito bemasah teribehu ‘al mei meribah.
h1mr l1byw wl1mw l1 r1ytyw w1t 1Hyw l1 hkyr w1t bnw bnyw l1 yd8 ky Smrw 1mrtk wbrytk ynZrw who said unto his father and to his mother, i have not seen him; neither did he acknowledge his brethren, nor hand-knew his own children-betweens: for they have guard-observed thy bee-word, and kept thy covenant. ha’omer le’abiv ule’imo lo re’itiv ve’et ’ekhav lo hikir ve’et banav lo yada‘, ki shameru ’imratekha uberitekha yinzoru.

brk yhwh Hylw wp8l ydyw trZh mHZ mtnym qmyw wmSn1yw mn yqwmwn knee-fluffy-bless, yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, his substance, and accept the work of his hands; hit through the loins of them that rise against him, and of them that hate him, that they rise not again. barekh yhvh khelo ufo‘al yadav tirzeh, mekhaz matenayim qamav umesan’av min yequmun.
lbnymn 1mr ydyd yhwh ySkn lbTH 8lyw Hpp 8lyw kl hywm wbyn ktypyw Skn and of he-between-of-righthand-benjamin he said, the beloved of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou dwell in safety by him; and the lord-base cover him all the day long, and he dwell between-bin his shoulders. lebinyamin ’amar yedid yhvh yishkon labetakh ‘alav, khofef ‘alav kal hayom uben ketefav shakhen.
wlywsp 1mr mbrkt yhwh 1rZw mmgd Smym mTl wmthwm rbZt tHt and of add-joseph he said, knee-fluffy-blessed of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou be his land, for the precious things of namespaces, for the dew, and for the deep that coucheth beneath, uleyosef ’amar meborekhet yhvh ’arzo, mimeged shamayim mital umitehom robezet takhat.
wmmgd tbw1t SmS wmmgd grS yrHym and for the precious fruits brought forth by the sun, and for the precious things put forth by the moon, umimeged tebu’ot shamesh, umimeged geresh yerakhim.
wmr1S hrry qdm wmmgd gb8wt 8wlm and for the chief things of the ancient mountains, and for the precious things of the lasting hills, umerosh harre qedem, umimeged gib‘ot ‘olam.
wmmgd 1rZ wml1h wrZwn Skny snh tbw1th lr1S ywsp wlqdqd nzyr 1Hyw and for the precious things of the earth and fulness thereof, and for the good will of him that dwelt in the bush: let the knee-fluffy-blessing come upon the head of add-joseph, and upon the top of the head of him that was separated from his brethren. umimeged ’erez umelo’ah urezon shokheni seneh, tabotah lerosh yosef uleqadeqod nezir ’ekhav.
bkwr Swrw hdr lw wqrny r1m qrnyw bhm 8mym yngH yHdw 1psy 1rZ whm rbbwt 1prym whm 1lpy mnSh his heaviness is like the firstling of his bull, and his horn-rays are like the horn-rays of unicorns: with them he push the with-mum-people together to the ends of the earth: and they are the ten thousands of fruitful-ephraim, and they are the thousands of place-of-sleep-manasseh. bekhor shoro hadar lo veqarnei re’em qarnav bahem ‘amim yenagakh yakhdav ’afse ’arez, vehem ribbot ’efrayim vehem ’alfei menasheh.
wlzbwln 1mr SmH zbwln bZ1tk wySSkr b1hlyk and of fertile-zebulun he said, rejoice, fertile-zebulun, in thy going out; and, wage-issachar, in thy tents. velizbulun ’amar semakh zebulun bezetekha, veyisashkhar be’ohalekha.
8mym hr yqr1w Sm yzbHw zbHy Zdq ky Sp8 ymym yynqw wSpwny Tmwny Hwl they call the with-mum-people unto the mountain; there they inward butchers of being right: for they suck of the abundance of the seas, and of treasures hid in the sand. ‘amim har yiqra’u sham yizbekhu zibkhe zedeq, ki shefa‘ yamim yinaqu usefunei temunei khol.
wlgd 1mr brwk mrHyb gd klby1 Skn wTrp zrw8 1p qdqd and of luck-gad he said, knee-fluffy-blessed be he that enlargeth luck-gad: he dwelleth as a gather-lion, and teareth the arm with the crown of the head. ulegad ’amar barukh markhib gad, kelabi shakhen vetaraf zeroa‘ ’af qadeqod.
wyr1 r1Syt lw ky Sm Hlqt mHqq spwn wyt1 r1Sy 8m Zdqt yhwh 8Sh wmSpTyw 8m ySr1l and he provided the first part for himself, because there, in a portion of the teachinggiver, was he seated; and he came with the heads of the with-mum-people, he executed the being right of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, and his decision-grammars with saturated-towards-israel. vayar reshit lo ki sham khelqat mekhoqeq safun, vayetei rashei ‘am zidqat yhvh ‘asah umishpatav ‘im yisra’el.
wldn 1mr dn gwr 1ryh yznq mn hbSn and of discuss-dan he said, discuss-dan is a gather-lion's whelp: he leap from at-tooth-bashan. uledan ’amar dan gur ’aryeh, yezaneq min habashan.
wlnptly 1mr nptly Sb8 rZwn wml1 brkt yhwh ym wdrwm yrSh and of twisted-naphtali he said, o twisted-naphtali, satisfied with favor, and full with the knee-fluffy-blessing of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou: possess thou the sea-west and the dry-south. ulenaftali ’amar naftali seba‘ razon umalei birkat yhvh, yam vedarom yerashah.
wl1Sr 1mr brwk mbnym 1Sr yhy rZwy 1Hyw wTbl bSmn rglw and of bliss-asher he said, let bliss-asher be knee-fluffy-blessed with children-betweens; let him be acceptable to his brethren, and let him dip his foot in name-from-oil. ule’asher ’amar barukh mibanim ’asher, yehi rezui ’ekhav vetobel bashemen raglo.
brzl wnHSt mn8lyk wkymyk db1k thy shoes be iron and brass; and as thy days, so thy strength be. barzel unekhoshet min‘alekha, ukheyamekha dabe’ekha.
1yn k1l ySrwn rkb Smym b8zrk wbg1wtw SHqym there is none like unto the towards-these-elohim of soaked-jeshurun, who rideth upon the namespaces in thy help, and in his excellency on the sky. ’en ka’el yeshurun, rokheb shamayim be‘ezrekha ubega’avato shekhaqim.
m8nh 1lhy qdm wmtHt zr8t 8wlm wygrS mpnyk 1wyb wy1mr hSmd the eternal towards-these-elohim is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he thrust out the enemy from before-turns thee; and say, destroy them. me‘onah ’elohei qedem umitakhat zero‘ot ‘olam, vaygaresh mipanekha ’oyeb vayomer hashmed.
wySkn ySr1l bTH bdd 8yn y8qb 1l 1rZ dgn wtyrwS 1p Smyw y8rpw Tl saturated-towards-israel then dwell in safety alone: the fountain of backstreet-jacob be upon a land of corn-swimming and wine-inherit; also his namespacess drop down dew. vayishkon yisra’el betakh badad ‘en ya‘aqob ’el ’erez dagan vetirosh, ’af shamav ya‘arfu tal.
1Sryk ySr1l my kmwk 8m nwS8 byhwh mgn 8zrk w1Sr Hrb g1wtk wykHSw 1ybyk lk w1th 8l bmwtymw tdrk happy art thou, o saturated-towards-israel: who is like unto thee, o with-mum-people saved by yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou, the shield of thy help, and who is the sword of thy excellency! and thine father-adversaries be found liars unto thee; and thou tread upon their high places. ’ashrekha yisra’el mi khamokha ‘am nosha‘ yhvh magen ‘ezrekha va’asher khereb ga’avatekha, veyikakhashu ’oyebekha lakh ve’atah ‘al bamotemo tidrokh.
wy8l mSh m8rbt mw1b 1l hr nbw r1S hpsgh 1Sr 8l pny yrHw wyr1hw yhwh 1t kl h1rZ 1t hgl8d 8d dn and extracted-mose went up from the plains of from-father-moab unto the mountain of at-him-nebo, to the top of summit-pisgah, that is over against moon-smell-jericho. and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou showed him all the land of roll-until-heap-gilead, unto discuss-dan, vaya‘al mosheh me‘arbot mo’ab ’el har nebo rosh hapisgah ’asher ‘al penei yerekho, vayar’ehu yhvh kal ha’arez hagil‘ad ‘ad dan.
w1t kl nptly w1t 1rZ 1prym wmnSh w1t kl 1rZ yhwdh 8d hym h1Hrwn and all twisted-naphtali, and the land of fruitful-ephraim, and place-of-sleep-manasseh, and all the land of know-judah, unto the utmost sea, ve’et kal naftali ve’et ’erez ’efrayim umenasheh, ve’et kal ’erez yehudah ‘ad hayam ha’akharon.
w1t hngb w1t hkkr bq8t yrHw 8yr htmrym 8d Z8r and the dry-south, and the plain of the valley of moon-smell-jericho, the light-city of palm trees, unto grief-zoar. ve’et hanegeb ve’et hakikar biq‘at yerekho ‘ir hatemarim ‘ad zo‘ar.
wy1mr yhwh 1lyw z1t h1rZ 1Sr nSb8ty l1brhm lyZHq wly8qb l1mr lzr8k 1tnnh hr1ytyk b8ynyk wSmh l1 t8br and yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou said unto him, this is the land which i sware unto their-dick-abraham, unto laughter-isaac, and unto backstreet-jacob, saying, i will give it unto thy seed: i have caused thee to see it with thine eyes, and no go over thither. vayomer yhvh ’elav zot ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob lemor lezar‘akha ’etenenah, her’itikha be‘enekha veshamah lo ta‘abor.
wymt Sm mSh 8bd yhwh b1rZ mw1b 8l py yhwh so extracted-mose the worker of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou died there in the land of from-father-moab, according to the bee-word of yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou. vayamat sham mosheh ‘ebed yhvh be’erez mo’ab ‘al pi yhvh.
wyqbr 1tw bgy b1rZ mw1b mwl byt p8wr wl1 yd8 1yS 1t qbrtw 8d hywm hzh and he buried him in a valley in the land of from-father-moab, over against house-gaping-betpeor: and no man knoweth of his sepulchre unto this day. vayiqbor ’oto bagay be’erez mo’ab mul bet pe‘or, velo yada‘ ’ish qeburato ‘ad hayom hazeh.
wmSh bn m1h w8Srym Snh bmtw l1 khth 8ynw wl1 ns lHh and extracted-mose was an hundred and double-ten-twenty years old when he died: his eye was not dim, nor his natural force abated. umosheh ben me’ah ve‘esrim shanah bemoto, lo khahatah ‘eno velo nas lekhoh.
wybkw bny ySr1l 1t mSh b8rbt mw1b SlSym ywm wytmw ymy bky 1bl mSh and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel wept for extracted-mose in the plains of from-father-moab thirty days: so the days of weeping and mourning for extracted-mose were ended. vayibku benei yisra’el ’et mosheh be‘arbot mo’ab sheloshim yom, vayitemu yemei bekhi ’ebel mosheh.
wyhwS8 bn nwn ml1 rwH Hkmh ky smk mSh 1t ydyw 8lyw wySm8w 1lyw bny ySr1l wy8Sw k1Sr Zwh yhwh 1t mSh and save-joshua-jesus child-between of fish-nun was full of breath-spirit of wisdom; for extracted-mose had laid his hands upon him: and children-betweens of saturated-towards-israel hearkened unto him, and did as yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou order-prescribed extracted-mose. vihoshua‘ bin nun malei ruakh khakhmah ki samakh mosheh yadav ‘alav, vayishme‘u ’elav bene yisra’el vaya‘asu ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wl1 qm nby1 8wd bySr1l kmSh 1Sr yd8w yhwh pnym 1l pnym and there arose not a bringer since in saturated-towards-israel like unto extracted-mose, whom yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou hand-knew face-turns to face-turns, velo qam nabi ‘od beyisra’el kemosheh, ’asher yeda‘o yhvh panim ’el panim.
lkl h1twt whmwptym 1Sr SlHw yhwh l8Swt b1rZ mZrym lpr8h wlkl 8bdyw wlkl 1rZw in all the signs and the wonders, which yeahoh-yhwh-aeiou sent him to do in the land of narrows-mizraim to big-house-pharaoh, and to all his workers, and to all his land, lekhal ha’otot vehamoftim ’asher shelakho yhvh la‘asot be’erez mizrayim, lefar‘oh ulekhal ‘abadav ulekhal ’arzo.
wlkl hyd hHzqh wlkl hmwr1 hgdwl 1Sr 8Sh mSh l8yny kl ySr1l and in all that mighty hand, and in all the great terror which extracted-mose showed in the sight of all saturated-towards-israel. ulekhol hayad hakhazaqah ulekhol hamora hagadol, ’asher ‘asah mosheh le‘enei kal yisra’el.
